1b1(rnying rgyud): mchags sa nas// rgya gar skad du/ san d+hI ma hAs pa shi kag d+hAm smra ba tsag tanA nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don
1b2(rnying rgyud): na// ngo bo nyid rtogs kun bzad de// bde gshegs 'og min gnas mchog tu// rigs lnga rgyal ba la sogs pa// rang shar chos sku byin rlabs bshad// de tshe sems dpas don
1b3(rnying rgyud): rig nas// gtsang ros lha li gnas chen du// brtse dgongs dus la babagyur nas// rig 'dzin sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// nges don rang gi dngos bshad// de nas shAka
1b4(rnying rgyud): thubaskul pa las// 'dim gling bde ldan ga nas dag// dang ldan dus kyi das na// gsang bdag sprul pa'i dang nyanal// rdzub kyang legs pa'i chog tu gsungs// dayang
1b5(rnying rgyud): gro
2a1(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// skad cig yud tsam thang gcig la// gdul bya'i 'khor la tha dad kyang // dus gsum gcig ste khyad med phyir// rim par dbyer
2a2(rnying rgyud): med ngo bos gcig/ de skad gsungs pa'i don go nas// skal ldan 'dus pa rnams kyis kyang // gus nyan dad pas rtse gcig tu// dad cing mos pa'i yid kyis 'khod// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'
2a3(rnying rgyud): yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan gdwags phyir// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// bden pa yid kyis de skad gsol// nges don bshad dus gang la bab// snod kyi rim pa gang la bstan//
2a4(rnying rgyud): tshig dang yi ges ji ltar mtshon// kun rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// legs so dang ldan 'khor rnams nyon//
2a5(rnying rgyud): da ni na su / sus ma du rgyu/ sa kyi nga mdu zhu de'i
2b1(rnying rgyud): dra // dayang dus kyi sa na// sangs rgyas bathun pa 'jig pa ma// 'ang sa tho yad kyi myang thogs sa// rgyud dang namang pa 'byug/ mang dang mams kyitshas da// / thanA kyis kun nu 'grang sha/ dacan du rang gang da
2b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa tsam gyis rtogs pa yi// 'bras bu sangs rgyas dus 'dir 'byung // da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor nams nyon// dang ldan slob ma ba rtse gdung can// mngags pa'i las la gus par byed// yid 'thad rjes la phangs med dbul// mi khrel gtad thang nam
2b3(rnying rgyud): pa bshad// de dang mi ldan snod ngan ni// kyod la khengs pa'i dargyal can// ser sna che la gtor pong chung // man ngag sred chen kun la spel// phyi zhag chung zhing tham smod// zas la ngan la nor dang che// chos la rang bzo rig pa 'jug/ rang chud mdul gzhan
2b4(rnying rgyud): ston// rnam smin mi blta grags pa sgrub// gyi nang med par byar kha gtong // de dag sdod ngan mi rnams la// yang dag nges don 'di bstan na// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis srog bcad nas// phyi mar mnar med dmyal bar srung // de phyir ma brtags chos mi
2b5(rnying rgyud): shad// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// tshig dang migs don mtshond// man ngag snying pos khog sub nas// don dang mi 'galas brjod la// tshig tung don chen rdzogs par bshad// de lta mi shes gang zag gis// don med tshig gi sa gang 'og dkrun
2b6(rnying rgyud): rtsal bshad zo chos gzhung nyams byed// mtshams med sdig pa'i chang mi phod// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying ngo // rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ don gyi gleng gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas sun rig ston pa des/
2b7(rnying rgyud): des dod rtsi ba 'di gsungs sa// rdo ba gzhi le gnas lugs dang // lha sgom spyod pa 'bris bu'i don// rtogs pa'i yon tan dasgra'i dus// mngon du grub pangs pa shad nyon// yul med po dang byung sku// 'khor 'das ma rig gdod nas byung // dadon kun pa ma nas
3a1(rnying rgyud): gnas// 'dus ma byas kyinamamakha' 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i sgo partan// dper na ljang chen lding ba bzhin/ ngas pa'i lta bas dang ldan pas// subar 'das dngas pa cad ldang yang// gtung ngan don gdan
3a2(rnying rgyud): med// ma ki ta yis gang thebs bzhin// lta ba ngo bo nyid rtogs pas// ci dran ma bsgoms chos nyid gsal// bzhag blang med pa rgyud du gnas// bi shwa karmas byas legs bzhin// rnal 'byor spyod lam thams cad du// ye shes rtsab don gyis zin// nyes
3a3(rnying rgyud): skyon gyis gos med pa// yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan bzhin// rang sems chos srur don rtogs pas// mi yi lus la sangs rgyas thugs// gdul bya gzugs su shugs las 'byung // de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag ngo bo gcig gcig la// tshig gis
3a4(rnying rgyud): mtshon patha dad kyang // yul med rang gsal nyid du 'dus// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ nges don rtsa ba gcig par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i
3a5(rnying rgyud): la phan don du// yid kyis dran pas 'di skad gsol// snang med ngo bo gnas lugs gang // gzhi la 'pho 'gyur ji ltar med// sems can kun la ji ltar yod// kun rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad nus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'tshar pa
3a6(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal ba// snang srid rdo bo gnas lugs ni// dus gsum med pa'i sngon rol na// 'das pa pas kyang dang byung ba// nu rkyen med pa'i sngon rol du// 'bras bu rang byung snying po byung // 'byung ba chen po'i sngon rol du// da dang nam mkha' dragra mnyam gyir/
3a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cadad nyid yin// bsten pa med pa'i sngon rol du// sangs rgyas pas kyang rang sems smra// rtog pa med pa'i sngon rol du// skya ba'i chos su rang sems byung // skye 'chi med pa'i sngan rol du// myang 'das pas kyang rang sems sngo// chos ti
3b1(rnying rgyud): ni pa'i na rlo d+ha// b+hang brjod las dang sems sa// bde gshegs med pa'i sngon du las// sems can las kyang chos thug// mdzan mag med pa na la na// bskad pas kyang du das// ngan kum dra' byas byag// rang byung du nga byu ba
3b2(rnying rgyud): dephyir mi skye don mi 'grub// rtse 'chi med pa rdo rje 'chang // bani nam mkha'i rang bzhin to// bag chags ma brtags sa chu med// gzugs med ye shes dbo la// rlung med me ni ci la 'byung // de kyi ngo bo nyid kyi na// de ma do'i sems pa
3b3(rnying rgyud): ljon// rang byung nga ba nyid la ni// rgyu med ma skyes yang dag yod// blo slar bral ba'i rig pa la// 'phel 'grib med pas kun du gnas// yang dag byang chub snying po la// thogs pa med cing spang ba med// 'khor 'das gnyis kyis 'dzin pa de//
3b4(rnying rgyud): yin nyidon du med// chos sgra mtshan nyid rnam par dag/ bdag med chos la skye 'chi med// ngo bo nyid la bsgom mi dgos// mar mi rang gi mtshan nyid 'dra// yod med yul gyi mapa las 'das// de don rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// gdon nas
3b5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po chad byu don gyi snying po rang byung ba'i ba'i dbar ma'i rlud las/ snang med don gyi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le ste gsum pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpa' yang nyon cig/ rang rig ca ba chos sum/ yod
3b6(rnying rgyud): tan lhag ma med par rdzogs// rang byung sangs rgyas ye shes su// ma skyes yongs su grub pa'i lha// chos rnams kun gyi 'byung gnas te// ngo bo dmigs med brjod las 'das// yang dge lta ba mthar sbyin pas// pha rol phyin pa yi nas gnas// ma
3b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas rkyen kyi sangs rgyas la// 'gro ba yongs kyi 'pho bsgyur// bskyed pa med pa'i 'brus bral// byas pa med pa'i cho 'phrul 'byung // thams cad rang byung ngayi rtsal// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// don la 'gyur med lta ba rigazhi// yul la mi ltas dang rje
4a1(rnying rgyud): sra// ye nas nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// gaN+DI'as 'gyur med byang chub sems// skyon gyis mgos dran pa la// 'pho gyur med par 'dal ba'i sgra// ma thu mo 'gag nga nga klong // bsgom pa ma rnyed 'dra na
4a2(rnying rgyud): 'bra' med da lta nga yi thugs// bskal par 'khyams kyang skye 'chi med// de rtogs rig pa kun gyi gzhi// ma bsgoms ye shes mthar phyin pa// re ba med phyir lung mi srid// gdod nas 'gyur med ye shes su// rdzogs pa chen po rmad zung don gyi snying por rang byang 'dres
4a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ gzhi las 'pho 'gyur med pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// sems can kun gyi lus nang na// rang rig rgyal po ye shes de// rang gi sems la ye nas gnas
4a4(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag nges pa'i chos su ni// dngos por ma grub yul las 'das// rig pa rgyan chags de nyid ni// 'gro drug kun gyi sems la kAnas// skye med ye shes rang byung ste// ched du ma byas rang gsal ba// de nyid ranga'ajig
4a5(rnying rgyud): tsam las na// bcos su med pas nam mkha' 'dra// sems can kun gzhi bzhi chal// rang byung chos sku yod med kyang // lung med rkyen gyis rang rig bsgribs// de phyir ye yod rtogs par bya// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sems can lus kyi tshor
4a6(rnying rgyud): ba la// rang rig ye shes rgyun mi 'chad// 'du 'bral med pas ye nas gnas// de phyir nyon mongs srubs nang na// kun bzang ye shes sems la gnas// nges don lung bstan don rtogs nas// de don gzhan nas bsgrub mi dgos// sems can byang
4a7(rnying rgyud): chub su 'dod pa// kun gzhi'i gseb nas don tshol la// de yi dang la gnas par gyis// de don rgyal ba'i dgongs pa yin// bde gshegs rnams kyi snying po yang // sems can lus la yod mod kyang // shes pa ma mthong tsam du bas// de mthong sa
4b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i gdams dgar// shes brtag tu 'bral ba med// dayang 'das pa'i snying ba nyon// ma rig 'khrul pa yod bzhin du// 'bras bu sangs rgyas thugs la gnas// dpyir gzhan nas 'byung ba zad// thog ma ma yin dus 'dir dang // da yang ra /
4b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes ni// til la mar gyis khyab pa bzhin// 'gro drug kun la rang rig khyab// skye 'gag med par chun du gnas// dper nas gting nam mkha' bzhin// 'gro 'od med par chos su gnas// de don ma rtogs blos bslad nas// 'khor bar 'khyams
4b3(rnying rgyud): nyams pa med// rang rgyud rig pa'i ye shes ni// sprin med mkha' la nyi shar bzhin// 'dus ma byas pa'i klong dkyil na// rang rig ye shes chos su bzhugs// rin chen ga'ung 'od thim ltar// lus kyi nang na chos smra yod// lus zhig dran pa lugs
4b4(rnying rgyud): su 'jug/ de bzhin 'khor ba'i rgyud kha 'khor// don rtags rang rig gnas su che// rig pa rang byung ngo bo de// sems can kun gyi yid la gnas// de phyir 'khor 'das kun gyi gzhi// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo
4b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ sems can kun la gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun rig rje la yang gsol pa// don gyi gnas lugs rtogs thabs gang // kun rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhus
4b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i don gsan bka' stsal pa// de don ngas bshad yid kyis nyon// nges pa'i bla ma lung ldan la// dad pa brtson 'grus dam tshig gis// bkud sti rim gro gus byas nas// man ngag snying po snang bar 'gyur// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dper
4b7(rnying rgyud): phreng chen bzhin// rgyal po'i bka' yi btson phul gyis// brid bsdigs g.yo skyes nor 'dod pa// srog stong med pas phan mi thogs// de bzhin nges pa'i lung ldan gyis// gdams ngag chos sku ma bstan na// thabs dang g.yo sgyu sna tshogs kyis//
5a1(rnying rgyud): bka' rkun skyon gyis chos btsal yang // rang sems mi rtogs ngan song lgang // da yang 'dus pa'i snying pa nyon// phrag dag med par bzang sems kyis// srog snyed rgyal po la byin la// bram ze gser glang 'dra
5a2(rnying rgyud): byung // gnyis ka mnga' thang ci bas ma 'grub// de bzhin bla ma lung ldan la// yid 'thad dbul zhing ci gsung nyan// shes rab rno la gsang thub pa// man ngag snying po gnang ba'i phyir// slob mas rang sems rtogs par nges// de phyir bla ma bkur par gces
5a3(rnying rgyud): des don gnang ba'i thabs su bshad// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ nges don rtogs par bya thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis yang gsol pa// nges pa'i don gyi gdams dang
5a4(rnying rgyud): gi// ma rig mun sel lta ba dang // 'khor 'das mtha' yi ma reg dang // ye shes lhun grub lta ba gang // mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// yang dag 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rang byung snying po gnas lugs 'di// nyi
5a5(rnying rgyud): ma shar bas mun pa sangs// des lung bstan pas ma rig brlag/ thig le chos sru brdal khyab ste// rig pa rang shar bcos pa med// de don lhun grub ye nas gsal// rang byung snying po rang gsal thugs// ye nas tha snyad kun dang bral// ji bzhin gsal la
5a6(rnying rgyud): don rtog med// don dam spros bral lta ba'i mchog/ rtsol med spyod pa yul las 'das// yang dag klong gyur don la mkhas// de nyid don la sus sbyor bar// tshogs brgyad shes pa'i yul las 'das// mngon du gyur pas thugs la bkra// kun gyis rtogs
5a7(rnying rgyud): dkang byang chub bde// mi g.yo mi rtog chos sku lam// rang rig bde ba ye shes klong // gcig tu rtog rna pa'i thig le gsal// lta ba dbus dang mtha' med pas// spang len ma btsa lhun gyis grub// skye med klong du rig pa 'phyo// rten med chags pa'i yul
5b1(rnying rgyud): dang bral// sgom med lta ba'i ngang gis gsal// mtshon pa'i tshig gis bkri dang bral// skye med gdeng chub 'du 'bral med// snang med rig pa dngos po bral// yang dag zugs la sprobasu med// ma spos spun grub rig pa shar// kun khyab don 'dus mtha'
5b2(rnying rgyud): ma reg/ ye shes su mchog chos sru brdal// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'gro drug sems can rang byung su// 'di ltar snang ba ma lus kun// gdod nas med pa'i don rtogs pas// ye shes gcig gi dang du 'dus// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba rnams//
5b3(rnying rgyud): byas nas 'ching ba'i las yin pas// gzhil med ces btsal mi dgos// ma bsgoms 'du 'bral med par blta// rdzogs pa chen po mang byung don gyi snying po dang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ ma rig mun pa sel ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / da
5b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sangs rgyas sems can 'byung ba kun// glo bur byung phyir gnas lugs min// de phyir 'jig rten chos la dpe mi lang // / 'khor 'das gzhi ma don ma reg/ de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// pha med ma med nags kyi bye'u// nam
5b5(rnying rgyud): mkha'i mthongs su 'thon pa ltar// blo bur 'khor 'das gnyis par na// chos su rtogs pas ma rig spangs// gdod ma'i rang byung 'di nyid ni// ltang rtogs pas chog pa'i phyir// 'khor 'das gnyis po gdod nas med// yul dang ma bral ngo bo nyid//
5b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i don la gnas// ye rdzogs chos klu'i snying po yin// de dogs mapa kun rnam par zhi// tshig tu mtshon med ye nas bden// gcig dang du ma mtha' yi chos// de phyir 'khor 'das gnyis las 'das// 'di zhes ma bklags lta ba'i chos/
5b7(rnying rgyud): nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dngos po med byer rtog pa bral// kun la khyab pas chad pa thal// dbus mtha' bral bas rang byung sku// chos skunam mkha' lta bu la// brjod med lta ba dran pa'i gzungs// de don byin ci ma log par// yaM shes lam pa/
6a1(rnying rgyud): gnas par smra// rang rig nges pa'i lta ba la// yangs pa med par yid la blta// de yang yul can ma yin tA// dang la rang blta shin tugs la// dgosas mthar byin lags thugs// chos nyid gos thal 'gyur 'dzad
6a2(rnying rgyud): dang drung ye shes gnyug mar gnas// de nyid mi 'bral skya ba'i mchog/ de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi chos nyid la// ji srid dpag chags yod pa'i bar// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams so// ji srid bag chags dag na ni// snang 'a'i
6a3(rnying rgyud): yung rnams gdod nas med/ thag sbrul mtho yor ji bzhin no// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ mtha' ma reg pa bstan pa'i lde'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'jus pa'i 'khod rnams
6a4(rnying rgyud): la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// rang sems chos sku'i lta ba ni// kun la khyab pa'i rig pa yin// 'dus ma byas pa'i don rtogs pas// mtha' bral rig pa gcig yin no// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kun gyi mnyam nyid kyal ba'i
6a5(rnying rgyud): thugs// ma lus sems can thams cad la// chos su khyab pa brdal ba'i sku// mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' 'dra// rig pa ma bslang gnyug mar gnas// dmigs 'dzin med par rang gis gsal// dngos po med pa shes rab yod// napa
6a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' nyi ma'i 'od shar 'dra// 'dus ma byas kyi ye shes kyis// rten 'azang med pa nyon mongs sel// 'byung ba lnga la dag ma lus// mi 'gyur 'joms pas rdo rje 'dra// thams don bstan rnal 'byor pas// the tshom med par dang sems rtogs// thazas
6a7(rnying rgyud): cad gcig 'ardzogs pa ste// ma rig long ba'i mig 'byed 'dra// ye shes rig pa de nyid ni// yod med dbus dang mthar med pas// sang nges la le mdzod 'gyung med// ka shi sa rin chen 'dra// de yang rdo rje sems dpa'ad// ma 'tshal
6b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin la// yul mad chos su rang byung de// re dogs rdul tsam med pa'i phyir// sun grub ye shes chen po yin// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung ba de ba'i 'khor mo'i rgyud las/ ye shes sman gyis thub pa'i lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste
6b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// ma bsgoms ting 'dzin ji lta dgas la// 'bras ba tsun gyi spong ba gang // ri dgas med pa'i 'bras bu'am// kun rig skyon pas bshad du gsol// de skad rgyas pa'i do na gsananas// 'dus pa
6b3(rnying rgyud): la bka' stsal pa// ma ba sgoms 'bras med ting 'dzin ni// rnam smin lus kyi rten bcas pa'i// tha ma la kun gzhi bzhi chal// lung ldan gyen gyi gdams dag gis// rang sems chos srung ngo sprad pas// dmigs 'dzin med par rang gis gsal// gnyug mang
6b4(rnying rgyud): nas la 'phel 'grib med// yul sems gnyis la dpyod dang bral// mtha' dbus mi dmigs dran las 'das// yi nas dag phyir bya ba med// btsal du med pas sems las 'das// kun la khyab pas btsal mi dgos// 'gag pa med pas rig pa
6b5(rnying rgyud): steng // ma byas kying na 'jig pa med// rig pa gsal bas rang ngo shes// ji bzhin pa lam gyes pa// ma bcos rkyen gyis mi 'gyur ba// rtaganang ma yin bsdus pa med// so so ma yin 'dres pa med// dngos med sems kyi ting 'dzin gsal// gtang gzhag
6b6(rnying rgyud): med pas chos skul// phying rgod mi 'byung rgyan du gnas// ye shes don la 'chang chub med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang rig ye shes 'di nyid la// bsgom du med phyir yengs pa med// gzung du med la zhel gsal// rang yid ches la khar mi mon//
6b7(rnying rgyud): hri da gsal la zhen pa med// rang gi bya ngos med grol// dran pa mi ba rlag 'gro 'ong med// dran pa'i rig paci sbyong yad// de nyid dus nangos gzung med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po ton// yid kyi yul dum bsgoms te// lta ba'i don dang 'bral med phyir//
7a1(rnying rgyud): smra sa na sa
7a2(rnying rgyud): do pagan grub she// mang sa can nus nas// deg ga du du ba ma gsam/ na gas panas/ nags smra// dpa di ba man so//
7a3(rnying rgyud): ba bzhin/ man ma snron pa drin gis sa// thos rnam migs mang gnas// dam ngas 'i na/ ni zhes ts+tsha // brnas sa na dra bal/ mas pa zang 'ad na// gas pa na
7a4(rnying rgyud): zhin// dargyad chos rgya // ma nyid pags papa na// galas mi 'thungasangs rgyas 'breg/ dpa bung po dgra pa ni// srung rje mad do// tshe nam na ga 'dim rig/ na gang 'i byung yang / da
7a5(rnying rgyud): donan dran pas// mu bkrams don dang 'bral ba med// dgos pa'i nyim chung brten pa na// tham ma khas don dranapal// tu na smras byas na// 'a'i rgyas su myur du drug// dra yas rje sems 'i byed// des pa don gyigadang
7a6(rnying rgyud): bzlom du med byeng mings pa med// dul pa'i che bar // 'bang dngas sum gyis bzhi byer// mi med da pa du mye pa/ ma slong pa du / sa nyi dam sgrims thugasu mi byung / rje'aji mi ta kyi
7a7(rnying rgyud): rnams sa / da da
7b1(rnying rgyud): na smra myong // dbang 'do na na// sa gas na na/ na jug// mang du 'a chu// ma sa
7b2(rnying rgyud): rngon pa babyin po rang don kyi thong 'a 'dziga'i mi da y-in/ 'bral meng tshun gyi na bstan pa'i byi kyi bcwag cig pa'i / den sa can ga rgyal bams// 'tha' ma dag slong bka mya du// ra byung 'gas
7b3(rnying rgyud): rnamis/ pa drimi mings tshogs kyis kyis// dayi rnasems dpa nyon// sde rtses 'grag rgyun byed// bsam nganas ngan gas pa yid laganaso// gsung bugs ra tu byabya// sangs rgyas sems canag nyi kyis gsang/
7b4(rnying rgyud): ming sridam pa'i spyod pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun kyi das pa drin// yang dag byung chu ba sgoms lani// mi dmigs par yang dpyad du med// mi gnas par ying bsam du med// dbyer bye bral nam mkha' 'dra// dayang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/
7b5(rnying rgyud): byung di bzhin nyid// dpyid du byed 'bachos nyid la// ma bsgoms dmigs su me da pa ste// ting 'angan shes btags pa yin// mirtag par yang mi sems la// kun pa khyab pa'i mags pa// sran gong tha byed rtsod pa'i mcho
7b6(rnying rgyud): da'i mas pa byung / su sum med pa ma/ sa pa 'as mashes // ba nimam gyu myong ban// migs dang sa da 'a byed/
7b7(rnying rgyud): ngab du minas su rjong / ni min cing ba mi byed// 'i'i kyi kyi sa/ rgyas so sa// sa sas 'gyon// dru dus su na na
8a1(rnying rgyud): par rang gsal pa// de nyid nyams kyi dam pa'i mchog/ me 'dzin mi spyong rang gsal tsam// 'bral med rgyun gyi spyad par bshad// gul mtshanam ldan yang // dadra na dgag sgrub med gsan// sangs rgya
8a2(rnying rgyud): lhalta sbom ngo bo gcig/ rnal 'byor spyod pa thams cad du// don dam spyod pa yin pa'i phyir// ma dran gnyid dang nyon mongs la// rang gar song tshe de nyid la// ngo bo nyid dran gnod mi nus// de lta nyid du ye shes phyir// ched du ma byas spyod du med//
8a3(rnying rgyud): chen po rmang byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ 'bral med rgyun gyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / 'dus pa'i 'khor la drug lnga ni// rang grol ston pas bka' stsal pa// rang sems don rtogs spyod mi spa
8a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog 'khor ba re// nges pa'i gdeng ldan rnal 'byor pa// chu mthun bag chags mi gsog pas// jo mo dus gsum skur gyur kyang // bslab pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa med// bag chags
8a5(rnying rgyud): gsog na yi dwags gnas su skye// mtho ris thar pa dag la brten mi 'cha'// rang sems snying po rtogs pa yis// 'chi med srog la gcad du med// zhe sdang mnar sems rig pa'i don// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ya ming // rang rig ye shes don ldan pas//
8a6(rnying rgyud): ma rig rna tshogs don du shes// ye nas chos nyid brdal ba la// ma rig sgrib pa sbyang du med// don rtogs rgyal ye shes la// yid ches chos su dang byung thugs// 'gran zla 'jig rten gsum na med// de nyid nga rtul rab nyid// phrag dog go smra rtson
8a7(rnying rgyud): med pas// de phyir ma spangs rang sar dag/ lta ba ngan la phrag dog gsal// de phyir phrag dog gsang ba'i sku// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems can log rtog chen po ches// gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi ldog phyir// dug lnga rang la brten te 'azlog/ ma
8b1(rnying rgyud): nga su sangs // dub 'dum pa tam s+ho// gan na/ gas // na smra/ ga sa ba // ga ma sa na//
8b2(rnying rgyud): kyi dang gis rgyas/ smon pa mas ga byas pa/ gro dwags pa // dgas pa tsun pa mang byeng don kyi ba byung ba ba mi'i rgyu pa/ dus rna na lda da
8b3(rnying rgyud): gsus pa'o// / da yang 'dus pa'i snying pa rten// 'bras cu ma 'byung ngas bzhud kyis// legs par zung la med kyis nyon// gnas pa'i ting 'dzin don ldan pas// oM shes bag chags cha ma nyam gyir// gsalal mi /
8b4(rnying rgyud): dus mnyam pas// 'dod khams gyur ni skye dbang yon// de rtse 'phos na chos nyid mthong // mi g.yo ba yi ting 'dzin gyis// nam rtog de nyid kyi lanon pas// gtsang maris kyi lhar skyes nas// de nyid dus na mngon sangs rgyas// mnyam nyid ldan pa'i
8b5(rnying rgyud): ma byong kyis// sra pa da cig nyid la// dbas pa srungs rgyas chos kyi'o// dbye med pa shes kun pa rang thags// dayang mi mang tu b+h+ring ton// mnyam pa'i dan la le gnas pas// 'bras bu rig pung nyid// de nam brjod padun rtsi /
8b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs 'ams gnas sa kyi byung // nyi mas byung kyil ma zhen cing // stong pa'i mi 'din don gsul bas// dang rig ye shes mthu tas kyi'o// gzugs med 'ams kyig ts+tsha// rang sems rtog pa mngon myur bas// de dang dga' yod pa shes
8b7(rnying rgyud): na meng thugs lags so// tan nams du srung me 'gyur// dang po lta bas bdag mid pyir// mtshan ma'i yul la mnan gyir// yul nyid sems su sdung pa med// 'dod lams gnas su lhung mi 'gyur// dayang 'dus pa'i snying po nyid// dpa
9a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' nyi shar mun pa med// de bzhin rang rig chos skul// ma rig med pa ye shes 'char// sangs rgyas thugs la 'chang nub med// dpyir 'bras bu sangs rgyas mchog/ rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung dan gyi snying po dang /
9a2(rnying rgyud): byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu ltung ba med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// thugs kyi gdeng chud skal ba la// mi nub yongs kyi gter du ni/
9a3(rnying rgyud): dus gsum rgyal ba'i chos kyi sku// rang byung thugs su gsal ba'i don// mnyam nyid 'gro don byed pa'i lam// tshad ma rang gi dbang phyug gis// rjes 'tsho ba thugs kyi sras mchog la// skye 'gag 'khor ba spang len med// bdag 'dzin bral ba rgyal ba'i
9a4(rnying rgyud): zugs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'du 'bral 'chi med ye shes lus// rig pa phyogs med byang chub 'char// so so ma yin ye nas gcig/ de phyir yon tan bstan pa dka'// byang chub dang du thams cad 'dus// mtha' mnyam dbang phyug chen
9a5(rnying rgyud): po'i thugs// ye shes sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// sde snod chos rnams thugs la rdzogs// 'jig rten khams na 'gran zla med// zhe 'dod rigs lnga ma bsrubs kyang // rang gi sems la sangs rgyas rdzogs// de nyid 'bras bu dam par gsungs
9a6(rnying rgyud): de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// sngon tshe rnam gzigs bstan pa la// bram ze dpal ldan bya ba'i bu// rang sems rtogs pa'i don med pas// gzhan nas 'bras bu zhe 'dod kyis// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nam 'grub ces// yid la bsam
9a7(rnying rgyud): shing lha bsgoms pas// 'bras bu med cing 'khor bar skyes// daphyir ro ngogs med par bya// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ri med don 'di dran byas na// chos nyid sangs rgyas sa la gnas// dogs med don las ma g.yos na// sgrib pa
9b1(rnying rgyud): sbyang ba'i thabs ma dgos// da yang blo gros dam pa nyon// ngan nyid kyi chos sul// gang yang ma bkag nam mkha' bzhin// 'khor 'das zhen med 'bras bu yin// de nyid rang sems snying por bshad// 'gro drug gams can 'ams cad pa// chos su dang nga/
9b2(rnying rgyud): yod rtogs na// sgom zhing sgrub pa'i nad dang bral// ye shes ngo bo lta'i sems// de dogs med shes 'bras bu'i mchog/ dus gsum dang sems 'gyur med don// med la mi zad dang byung thugs// sangs rgyas zhe 'ani de la bya// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don
9b3(rnying rgyud): gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ re dogs med pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / kun rig rgyal pos yang gsungs pa// sdud med lta ba'i rig pa yis// ma btsal 'byung med chos kyi sku// bag chags med pas
9b4(rnying rgyud): yul dang bral// da lta nyid du rang byung sku// dngos med nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// shes rig gsal ba'i khyad par 'phags// de las 'gran zla gang yang med// rtogs pa'i yon tan brjod mi lang // de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyen// dang sems rig pa
9b5(rnying rgyud): rang byung de// yengs med don shar rang byung thugs// spyi mthun nyi ma stong bas gsal// de nyid rtogs pas bsgom mi dgos// ye shes rig pa gsal ba des// ma rig mun pa gdod nas med// bag chags nyon mongs gtan nas brlag/ dgongs pa sangs
9b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun dang mnyam// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dper na rgya mtsho rlabs su 'byung // de bzhin don rtogs spyod pa yang // 'bral med rig pa ye shes rgyan mi 'chad// don 'di rtogs pa spyod pa'i tshe// tshogs bsags sgrib pas bcu pas// skad cig
9b7(rnying rgyud): 'di 'dra khyad par 'phags// lus ngag rtsol med rig spyod bde// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// rang drin 'bras bu rang la che// gzugs dang bral bas skye 'chi med// rang las byung bas ye shes sku// yul med rig pa mngon sangs rgyas// 'di rtogs dbras
10a1(rnying rgyud): bu ldan gru'ade// bsam pa rnam gyis kun 'grub te// 'ching bu rin ldan khyad par bstan// skyeb ma len mngon sangs rgyas// dA yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// da rtags mazad ngan rgyan gter// dang
10a2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu yon tan ni// gzugs med rig pa ye shes sku// tha ma la rang sems nga yi thugs// stong rig dran pa yi gsungs// rig pa'i yon tan gang gis 'grub// ye nas phrin las dang byung bas// rig pa spos bral chos sur rdzogs// da yang
10a3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// 'gyur med lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhi// chos nyid bde chen klong yangs lam// skye 'chi med pa'i 'bras bu smin// de dag gcig phyir rgyal ba'i thugs// gser glengs rdo med pa bzhin// sems can dus ni sangs rgyas la/
10a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan mtshan dang dpe byad dang // ye shes su la kun kyang thugs// de ltar tha ma lus sems kyis// sems las ma lus sangs rgyas rnyed// rku las ma byung 'bras bu rtogs// lung las ma brten chos rnams shes// theg dgu'i chos rnams gcig las med//
10a5(rnying rgyud): dug lnga mya ngan 'das pa dag/ thugs kyi klong rdol chos kyi sku// 'khor ba'i nang gi lus yod kyang // pad+ma dang ni 'dam bzhin du// nyon mongs las kyis gos pa med// de phyir sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// gas pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba
10a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ che ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i le'u skye bcu drug pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'khor gyi the tshom bsal ba'i phyir// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// rang byung ye shes ngo bo la// gzhal bya mi dmigs don
10a7(rnying rgyud): lags// snang ba mtshan ma 'di nyid kyi// gtan tshigs mgu ba gsungs pa ci// don de gang gis rtogs pa'i thabs// blta med gsungs pa ci yi phyir// golas lung med bstan pa'i phyir// mthun dpe gang gis gang la mtshon// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos pa//
10b1(rnying rgyud): kun sa spyad / ngas pa smra smra / na smra// na // sa ldan nas // ma/ da
10b2(rnying rgyud): sa /
10b3(rnying rgyud): /
10b4(rnying rgyud): sa sadepa /
10b5(rnying rgyud): na na /
10b6(rnying rgyud): ma da
10b7(rnying rgyud): na 'a / / rnam sagang
11a1(rnying rgyud): bas+yA // man ga gas pa nas / rgyun tugs san tud dug sa// na bya mtshan pas/ 'as // da
11a2(rnying rgyud): thabs pazhin du// sems min mi 'ad kyi myig ltar// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po ston// mig rjes su khyab pa'i phyir// de bzhin nyid du nga shir bas// gang yang dam par mi ltabs// khams cadad bzhin dang sa krol// de tir ma la mig sa
11a3(rnying rgyud): gtang gzhag med pa'i ting nga 'dzin// ma sgoms blangs su 'gyur bar dgos// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid la// nam rtog mtshan mchi byung yang // dmigs nas gsal ba bslab mi bya// dper na nam mkha' 'di nyid la/
11a4(rnying rgyud): sprin dang khu rlangs la sogs pa'i// 'jig rten zhig nas med pa ltar// ji bzhin nyid du dang dran pas// dus mnyam gsal bas yang dag ste// de la gnyen pos bcos su med// tha snyad rang gsal bcos par bshad// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/
11a5(rnying rgyud): med thig le rang shar bas// yang dag don la mi 'jug pani// ngobo nyid du gyur pas na// don du gnyer ba gang yang med// swa gzhan du g.yos med phyir// ched du banom du med pa ste// dmigs pa gtad pa'i don dang za'// don mi gnyer la dgra med 'dra//
11a6(rnying rgyud): de yang 'dus pas yang gsol pa// gtang gzhag med pa'i sgom pa la// mi mthun mi 'byung gsungs pa ni// rnal 'byor pa de ma yengs na// byar med 'grog med gsungs pa ci// de nyid 'ching bar mi 'gyur ba'i// phyogs bral bstan pa ji ltar legs//
11a7(rnying rgyud): kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du// kye 'chi med par ye 'char ba// snang med zhen rtog thams cad kyang // gang yang chos skur gsal ba las// gtang gzhag rtsol sems cil
11b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung // gzhan du mi 'gyur klungs gnas pas// mi mthun mtshon ma gang yang med// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dbyings dang mtshan ma thams cad kun// gzhil ma grub don shes phyir// rang gsal yul la rtog pa med// dag dang ma dag
11b2(rnying rgyud): cad kun// gang yang dgag sgrub med pa'i phyir// bzhag dang longs par yengs med don// 'byung 'jug med pas bsgom mi dgos// rtsol ba med phyir spyod pa'i mchog/ da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bdag gzhan kanas ma thu
11b3(rnying rgyud): byed ma lus thams cad kun// 'gro drug las dang bde gshegs mdzod// ci spyod chos grur ye gnas pas// gang yang mtshan nyid dbyer med de// byed pa nyid na grol bar nges// blang dang dor dab dang gis med// de yis 'ching bdag la 'gyur// rdzogs
11b4(rnying rgyud): nga chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ rdo rje sems dpa' thugs rtog bsal ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// ting 'dzin nyams dang ldan pa la// nam spyod pa nyam
11b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsun nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bkang stsal pa// mnyam bzhag rjes thob par do la// snang ba 'od dang grag pa ng+ga// 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang bsru ba brjed// lha brang shes dngas pa'i la
11b6(rnying rgyud): da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rnal 'byor dam pas mnyam bzhag tshe// mtshan mo mun nag sprin rum nas// nam langs nyi shar shin tu gsal// khams gsum sems can dge sdig las// gang yang ma lus sa kyi shes// rdorje snying rje'i bdud lug
11b7(rnying rgyud): sems can snying rje'i gdung ba rtse// ting 'dzin btang nas gzhan don rtsom// de phyir bdud kyi de'ang 'gyur lung // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nam mkha' stong la dgra byung na'// 'di gshegs chos rnams sna tshogs ston// ni 'am
12a1(rnying rgyud): ba dang // yid du 'ong ba'i sgra zos 'gyur// ting 'dzin btang nas glu gar byed// ngam zhing ngo mtshar dga' sems skye// de la zhen 'gyur nyams dang bral// dag 'brod bdud kyis rang bskus phyung // da yang 'dus par
12a2(rnying rgyud): nyin// sgrom nyams rmil ma gang yang rung // 'jigs pa'i gzugs sogs mi dge bas// rang la gnas pa jig 'gyur bas// ting 'dzin por nas rgyang na bdud// mi dga' thug bsngal nyas bga' byung // de tshol sa la lug /
12a3(rnying rgyud): gcig bungag tu 'gro// gzugs kyi bdud gyi dbang 'gyur byung // da yang rdo rje sems dpa ston// nyams dang zil ma dag rgyang // 'di du dang ba'i gzugs bstan te// dus gsum nyes legs thams cad ston// gzhan la pas bden par byu /
12a4(rnying rgyud): da'o nyam pa'i bdud zhugs te// ting 'dzin pa nyid nas grong la yan// par du byed bden byed mi badren// tha mar rtswa pa thams cang rdzun// bsrub rdzun gyis rang ba sti myong // de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lci ba'i bdud ni dag dang // yung 'dag
12a5(rnying rgyud): ma shes phyir// snang ba gzugs sogs zhen pa ste// yul sems zhug la ci spyod brdud// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byed don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor lta ba'i bdud bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
12a6(rnying rgyud): ya sems dpa' nyon// rgos bying byugs la ba'i dud// dran med thugs pa pa pa'i bdud// rkyen gyis nod pa ma tog bdud// 'gro ba ma g.yo bdud rnams 'byung // de yang 'dus pa'i sbyong bo nyon// ting 'don myang rgya ba 'dod nas/
12a7(rnying rgyud): yun dang bsgoms pas tshad ma zin// myos pa byung ba'i bdud zhugs te// ma rig dbang gis gnyid du song // gsal ba bor nas bying bsol/ de nyid rtsol bas ting 'dzin nyams// ma btsal tshwa la ma bzang ngan byung // da byar byed ba'i bdud gyes
12b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ deyang 'dran pa'i nga nyon// rang gachos pa ma'inapas// bajig dbang gas la gas pazlabs// dran pa med pa'i bad zhugs te// dang blomathugs pas 'ad gnyams// rang gzod pasan pa dang byed// rtad ba du
12b2(rnying rgyud): dbrel// bsgoms pa sa dzin ma bdud gyis bzlas// phyi bung lda gdams pas gyi/ deyang mib kyi sems dpa' byen// gcigasu ciganas 'dres pa dgal// gzhin gyi rgya pa sakun te// ting ba nas smin pa
12b3(rnying rgyud): tshul la shes pa sna tshogs rten// matog med pas nyon mongs 'byung // spang srung zhen pas rang rgyu byed// de mying g.yeng ba'i brjid kyis bsdus/ da yang khor gyi snying pa nyon// yang yang goms pa sa byas pas// 'gro brgyan bya bdud cu
12b4(rnying rgyud): to// gang yang phred ba'i tshig rutsam// yid la byed pas mi g.yo bral// nan tan chung bas nyams mid phyir// khod can mun du yang yang byung // nges pa'i gdeng dang mi man pas// 'gro ba'i bdud kyis bsus phyir ltung / dri bang 'khor dun
12b5(rnying rgyud): kon// don pa'i bdud ni de dag dang // gdams ngag med pa rnams la phyi/ dza 'an rnams la gnod mi rtogs// mye rtogs kyi sgom bdud du 'gyur// rdzogs pa chen po med byu don gyi spyo por nga byung ba ba'i chud pas/
12b6(rnying rgyud): nyams kyi bdud bstan pa'i la'u ste bcud dgra pa'o// / dayang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// zlab 'du 'ang longs spyod bdud/ nyam sa dge 'byin pa gnas kyi bdud// bsgrubs pa yon tan shin pa gnas kyi dang // sems
12b7(rnying rgyud): ngan badrud rnams 'byung // / de 'ang 'arus pa'i snying banyan// dkon par gnas na dang ldan da// sangs slod 'du nga'i brjid thugs te// ting 'dzin pa dag nas gzhan sems na/ de don tha dod sa 'ad// ga 'du
13a1(rnying rgyud): ma dzes pa bcan rnam pa 'dun pa gas bas bzlas// la garten pa la kha san byag// 'dug bdang kyis dang ba sa drung // dbang ngarngas mas dpa nan// dang 'brad pa la gnas pa ni// ngab
13a2(rnying rgyud): shis 'dre mod lha gnyen yod// rang bstod zhen pa'i bdud zhugs te// ting 'dzin btang nas nyams dga' brtsib// srung mas gzhan du 'gro bang med// zer zhing bdag rtogs don dang bral// rang sems gzhan pas bcud du lungs// gnas
13a3(rnying rgyud): bdud kyis rang bkrus lhung // da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// rnal 'byor mkhas pas bsgom 'dod la// g.yeng ba'i bdud ni khong zhugs te// gzhan gyis bstod pas ting 'dzin btang // chos 'chad sman dang bzo rnams byed// 'dod pa'i rdzas
13a4(rnying rgyud): la zhen pa skyes// gzhan don byang chub yin zer nas// bya ba'i g.yeng ba ched du byed// don dang bral bas rang bslus lhung // da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rnal 'byor 'khor ngan gdung drags pas// sems 'khrugs bdud ni khor zhugs te// 'jod
13a5(rnying rgyud): ngan chog shes med par 'dod// drin du mi tshor phyur kha gtang // de tshed da log mi rnams 'phya// sgo sbyar 'debs la zhe sdang 'byung // 'khor ngan bdud kyis rang bskus lhung // nga yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// spyod pa'i bdud ni de dag dang // 'jig rten
13a6(rnying rgyud): chos brgyad zhen las 'byung // de phyir g.yeng ba'i don du gnyer// 'khor ba dang blang rang bskyas phung // rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ myod pa'i bdud bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / da yang
13a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// 'jig rten mkha' 'gro lung bstan bdud// nyams su rkyong bzhen pa'i bdud// zhe 'dod tshul 'chos bdud dang ni// sgom chags pa de bsogs 'don bdud// gdeng med srung 'debs ni sdang bdud// dmyal spro 'ad /
13b1(rnying rgyud): bdud rnams 'byung // da yang 'dus pa'i labar rnams nyon// nAl 'byong lta ba mnyam bzhags// nya ma'i sras su mdzan byung // phyugs sum 'dug 'am don gyis// gzhan don byed pa'i yon tan badzad// dam mkha' 'bru' bdud zhugs te/
13b2(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin btang nas gzhan don brtson// chos su mi btags rje yang byed// don dang bral phyir bdud bsdus 'gyur// da yang 'dus pa'i byung po nyon// rnal 'byer don ldan bsgom pa la// zang cing bzla nyams myong ba// lta ba'i don chen mdzin pas/
13b3(rnying rgyud): khriganas zhen pa'i bdud rmugs te// rkyen mthub ci 'phel 'grib yod/ bag mnyal ba'i marig pas// ma ga ye shes pa shes d+d+hi // lha med zhan pas bdud bsres drang // da yang 'das pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// don med bsgom pa'i byang ba pa
13b4(rnying rgyud): gder med tshul 'chos gsog can te// kha'ajam gting 'khrul bdud zhugs te// gzhan dag brid kyir dge la brtson// man dag med kyi gsang bskad// rang nyid bslus pa'i bdud zhugs lhung // gyi mar yi dwags lte 'byor skye// de yang 'khor gyi sbya
13b5(rnying rgyud): nyon// lta ba thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// dbang gsum pa yi bde ba la// dka' ba bzhi la zhen pa yis// 'dod chags srid pa'i bdud zhugs te// byi ba shug pho mo kun bsags nas// 'dod chags spyad pas ting 'dzin 'phel// de phyir dbang la brten
13b6(rnying rgyud): dgos zer// chags pa'i bdud zhugs rang bslus ltung // nga yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nges pa'i don ldan rnal 'byor pas// mnyam du de nas 'gran pa'i phyir// smad sems zhe sdang bdud zhugs te// rang nyams zhen pas gzhan dag la//
13b7(rnying rgyud): gdams dag can la skur ba 'debs// rnal 'byor pa la gnod mi tshugs// de phyir rang nyams dang nyid lung // phyi mang tsha ba'i dmyal bar phye// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges pa'i don ldan rnal 'byor kyis// des don yang dag bka' ba ni// gang
14a1(rnying rgyud): zug spang kyur slo btags te// mchog pa pa nan// dmyal bdud na yong grags// bka nadun ma 'oga'abyud// nas nga kyang byas rgya chud/ dbyor bdud bskus dmyal ba tug
14a2(rnying rgyud): dA yang 'das pa'i snying po da// bdud kyi skyong yul bco ba rgyad kyang / ba pa yinate// na ba drug tsug pa yin/ dkyir ba du yin pa'i bdu// rdzogs pa chen po rgyad byung don gyi stong bar byung bde ba'i 'khor lo gyud las
14a3(rnying rgyud): kyi bdud bstan pa'i le'u ste nye gcig pa'o// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// lha skem spyod pa nyams kyi bdud// de dag zil gyis dri ltar mnan// kun rig N+DIl pos bshad du gsol// zhus pas do gas na bka' stsal
14a4(rnying rgyud): pa// gyi nang chos kun rang byung sra// bad+mad nyid rtogs na chos nyid dang // de phyir lung ldan pa la zhus// rang sems rtogs na bdud med do// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// mnor don la bsgoms pa'iH// sdang ba 'od kyi bdud byung na// chos
14a5(rnying rgyud): sru kha dog bral ba'i phyir// gsal la mi n+to ga zil gyis mnan// thag pa dgra yi bdud byung ni// chos nyid sgra dang bral ba'i phyir// rjes su 'bral med rang bzhin ni// lta ba'i rig pas zil gyis mnan// 'jigs pa gzugs kyi bdud zhugs na/
14a6(rnying rgyud): gzhi la snang ba med pa'i phyir// ltos med rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// gzugs can mtshan mazil gyis ma nAn/ bslu brdzun gyi bdud byung na// chos nyid tshi ga las 'das pa'i phyir// bden par 'dzin pa'i skyon bral bas// bden par 'dzin
14a7(rnying rgyud): med zil kyis mnan// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// bying ba gsal ba'i bdud byung na// nyid gsum gcig pa'i mnang gagis// gti mug chos srur rang brim pas// ye nas lha ba zil gyis mnin// rdugs pa bde ba'i bdud byung na// 'dis
14b1(rnying rgyud): 'gri ba med pa'i don shes byar// rang byung bde ba'i lta ba la// mnyam nyid rig pas zil gyis mnan// rgod pa mi rtog bdud byung na// snang ba bag chags brtas pa la// rang rig bag chags med pa'i phyir// srang skad zhen med zil gyis mnan//
14b2(rnying rgyud): dmig po'i bdud byung na// le nas mi g.yo'i dang byung la// goms pa'i dbang gis ting 'dzin gsal// mi brjed gzungs kyis zil gyis mnan// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lha sgom bdud ni de dag dang / rang byung chos su'i don rtogs pas// ga
14b3(rnying rgyud): byung zil gnon rang brlag pas// 'bras bu ye shes spun gyis grub// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ lha sgom gyi bdud zil gyis mnan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / dayang rdo rje sems dpa'
14b4(rnying rgyud): nyon// de yi dang la gnas pa'i tshe// 'du 'dzi longs spyod bdud byung na// ting 'dzin dgra ru shes pa'i phyir// 'dod chung chog shes zil gyis mnan// zhen pa gnas kyi bdud byung na// yul la nges med ma chags pas// lta ba dang rig yul med phyir//
14b5(rnying rgyud): zhen pa med pa'i zil gyis mnan// yon tan g.yeng ba'i brgyad byung na// bdag don ma 'grub par du yang // mi dbang mi gtang don dran pas// gzhan don ma rgya zil gyis mnan// 'khor ngan sems 'khrugs bdud byung na// mthar thug
14b6(rnying rgyud): 'brel ba med pa'i phyir// gnas skabs 'brel pa ting 'dzin dgra// gdung sems bsgyangs la zil gyis mnan// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// zil gyis mnan thabs de dag kyang // spang len dgag grub med par dgos// des don spyod pa
14b7(rnying rgyud): gcig gi dang // de phyir 'bras bu lhun gyis grub// rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po ring byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las// spyod pa'i bdud zil gyis mnan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/
15a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gros srung bstan badzad byu na// rang dag 'gyur mad rtogs pa la/ gzhan du stonan pa ska bar shes// dngogs med pa zil gyis mnan// nyanas spyong zhen pa bdud byung na// sa kyi mdab
15a2(rnying rgyud): chos bu ni// ting 'dzin rkyen gyis mi 'gyur phyir// zhen med lta bas zil gyis mnan// zhen 'dod tshul 'chos bdud byung na// gang yang ma bcos don dran pas// rang byung nges sku gdeng ldan phyir// rtogs pa drang po'i zil gyis mnan// bde ba
15a3(rnying rgyud): bogs 'dod brdud byung na// rang byung ye shes rten med phyir// dbang la mi ltos 'phel 'grib med// mu rkyen 'byung 'dod zil gyis mnan// gdeng med srung 'debs bdud byung na// nges don sgo sbar bral ba'i phyir// lung lhan can la gnod me nus/
15a4(rnying rgyud): lta spyod khams kyis zil gyis mnan// nga rgyal sgro 'dogs bdud byung na// rang byung don la sgro 'dogs bral// de don nges pa'i gdams ngag 'di// snod ngan spangs la zil gyis mnan// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// de dag
15a5(rnying rgyud): nyams kyi bdud rnams kyang / rtogs na rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam// de phyir sgom pa brjod mi bya// de don sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po rmang byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ nyams kyi bdud zil gyis
15a6(rnying rgyud): mnan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// rang sems rtogs pas zil mnan pa'i// 'bras bu thob dus sangs rgyas nam// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i don gas na bka' stsal pa//
15a7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rtogs pa'i gdeng ldan pas// tshe yi tha ba 'chi kha'i dus// sarba me rlung ri mthim ste// dbugs brtsegs thu mthun byed pa'i tshe// 'di yi sdang banub ka dang // phyi ma'i snang ba 'char ka ru// rnam shes snang ba skyes pa'i tshe// du bsla
15b1(rnying rgyud): slong mad// 'byung ba ngas ma zhig parnam/ can di sa s+ho// rang 'a ga thaMd pas slod dran// dag camagasasabu du / gang badrag pa dus na// mang ma tsha da tu/ blang dag// dang /
15b2(rnying rgyud): na / mim sa/ 'a pas // dgangs / das/
15b3(rnying rgyud): nangs// ngas rgyas pa ta sa // di gas na/ na pa byed gsam/ cang du byug/ pa / shA
15b4(rnying rgyud): y-is rgya na du/ de ga na/ ga sa man/ ga sa sa hA/ ga
15b5(rnying rgyud): sa ngag sa sa/ ma sa
15b6(rnying rgyud): de rje sems dpas yang gastsol ba// me rtogs 'khor bar 'byams par// del byung grogang+yas byung // sun rig rgyal pos pashid du gsol// de ga lus de 'di dgas nanas/
15b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// me rtogs 'khor bar 'khyams pa yi// de'i snying grog 'du byung // sun rig rgyal pos bshud du gsol// de skad lus pa'i do nags na nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/
15b8(rnying rgyud): sa da gachos dngas ston/ shing rgyaganyis 'dung/ gro byung gnyis kyi med pa byer/ sa'i 'on ma sdug pa pa gyud/ da rjemams dab // bang kyi drung /
15b9(rnying rgyud): nges med bzhi la blo gtad pas/
16a1(rnying rgyud): sa smra// / na /
16a2(rnying rgyud): na sa chags / gas sa// sa na la/ da/
16a3(rnying rgyud): smraldan/
16a4(rnying rgyud): gyur kyang // bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa yis/
16a5(rnying rgyud): nyid ma nas gzhan rgol ba// ru d+ha'i sgor lhung rtag tu 'khor// tshig gi phrin las ci mkhas kyang // ma rtogs dngos por 'dzin pa yis// rang rgyud dang mya rdzas mngon zhen gyir// bgag sasems can thog yo rtse med myod// rlu
16b1(rnying rgyud): dal pa hA/ gan nga nas kya su// nas nas nag // da ba ga /
16b2(rnying rgyud): na na sa/
16b3(rnying rgyud): kyis ma na/ smra sbya nan// 'do stsa/ yang rnab ma
16b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin ga nan sa/ su dum sa sa na
16b5(rnying rgyud): me / dang 'dus pa ra / sa ngas/ / la /
16b6(rnying rgyud): nga dgas pa sa dang sa nas/ sa ngas sas / da ma 'di sa rung // dmi // sa
16b7(rnying rgyud): sri myu / //
17a1(rnying rgyud): da // dz+nyAn pas ba lams pa padang/ chags pa ban du na rang kyang dubyu 'dong ba rgyud pas/ byu ga tud nga / gas na
17a2(rnying rgyud): don gyi snying po dang byung ba ra ba'i dakhong po'i chung gser gyi dril shing can ces kyang rdzogs so// / ma gang kyi mkhan po'i ma pa mi dang / bod kyi po d+da gtags don su spangs bskur cing byas te gtan la rab pa'o// // nyad teng 'dzin parang po la bshad
17a3(rnying rgyud): gter du ma nang ga dang bcas pa bajug/ mgon po nag po dang rdo rje legs pa dang / rdo na rtsanA gcigs la gtad/ dbu cu bzang zug me drag lasrasa?/ 'brom po shes sti blos bton nas/ sras dbang phyug rdza ma rgyal ba shad / des sras ye shes ser
17a4(rnying rgyud): gtad/ des jog ston 'od 'bar la gtad/ des rong pag rlabs chung ba dang / nyang ba na rin chen gtsug tor la gtad pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ san+ti ma hA sa man+ta b+ha dra tsi ta gu h+ya nA ma tan+ta/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po
17a5(rnying rgyud): shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos stong gsal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
17a6(rnying rgyud): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kya ma he// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin tshogs rnams// rig pa skyong gsal rtogs 'dod na// dang po sems nyid gzung ba dang // de nas lam du blang bar bya// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ kye rtse bcom
17a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang // rig pa stong gas la rtogs pa yi// sems gzung lam du blang ba ni// de don rim pa ji ltar lags// de skad gsol ba'i tshagags na nas// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// sems gzung rim pa 'di lta ste// mtho dang ri mo 'jam drung dang /
17b1(rnying rgyud): na nan// shA nga du rdzun // / sa/
17b2(rnying rgyud): dag na/ sa pa na/ // / sa sa /
17b3(rnying rgyud): gluzlang// de bzhin gzugs la bzung ba ni// rgyu gdugs ste na bdag 'jug/ de nyid lakho dag la gtsang // dbar po dag pa gzung // shog rje'i 'khong lo rnams byung // b+hanang drug pa dbang ni// pra pe sa ga
17b4(rnying rgyud): na/
17b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' rnams// sems 'don pa yi dus nyid du// yon tan skyon du snang ba'i phyir// smon rnams bcos pa 'di ltar bya// rlung gyes par ni gyur pa la// shes pa rgod cing gnyid mi ribs// de la bsu ma nye
17b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad can rgyan// mthus paskyes par gyur ban// sang pod dbang por ldang ba dang // bdag kyis na rjo myed// de dag mi ba byur no// kha zas pas pa g-i bcos par gyi// sebs 'dzin pa la chung tid // g.yeng ba bres brgyangs pas bad
18a1(rnying rgyud): na / du sun na du rdzu sa du du
18a2(rnying rgyud): dab sa sa / du su sa na/
18a3(rnying rgyud): du sa nga sa
18a4(rnying rgyud): dun sa // 'i sa pa/
18a5(rnying rgyud): smras / 'a nga/ sa sa
18a6(rnying rgyud): ga / sa sa
18a7(rnying rgyud): blo po'i gas gas pa pa spyo rgya kyi zhes byeb/ bcom ldan 'das rje mengs sa pa ma nga pol rgyag 'tsha mo// dadras dpa ban ma rje'i bangs rgyas pa 'brel ba/ dag sa stong gsam gyid na nyams su da /
18b1(rnying rgyud): dang bas panagan gsu / sags dun/ na du/ na da/ da sa nga/ pa nga pa nga/ gsas
18b2(rnying rgyud): yol gca pa dang / ngag bral gcang pa dang / ba pa zhus pas kyang pa dang / dorjes pa dpon pa gtsang ba dang / drag drung lagazung bdang / rnam pa pa drug kya / de ma ga nga ni/ dgas 'a
18b3(rnying rgyud): dal shes pa gtud lasun gsum ma mtha' cwa bdun la sogs pa bsgom mo// ri mo'i la sems sazung ba ni/ ri ma nang du shes pa bsgril la gzung // 'jam drang lag rung ba ni/ steng drung mnan/ 'og rlung bsdams par rlung rangs dang zhag dbungs
18b4(rnying rgyud): pang 'gro tshur 'gro ga he la gtad lagazung ba'o// thig le la gzung ba ni/ mrid zag tu thig la ser ya da bar ma/ rtser bsams pa la gzung bar// gdugs la gzung ba ni/ 'og tu rgya gdugs bsam/ snying du dang nyid bsams la/ gzugs de 'phor ba
18b5(rnying rgyud): la zhes pa gzung / 'khor po la gzung ba ni/ nan tan mdzin na rnams shog bu 'i gdugs byas la de bskor sA ru khris drang gtang / zla bang dril gragasi la la gzung ngo // yig 'drul gzung ba ni/ sems kyi gnas gzhi dra/ dz+r-i ma aSh+Ta bu'i pi gal
18b6(rnying rgyud): ma yengs par gtad la gzung ngo // 'gro ba bzang ma shes rab ma la gzung ba ni/ yab yum mkha' gsang brlab par byas la/ dbang po gnyis spad de byang chub sems rdo rje'i sbed par sdeb pa la gzung ba'o// rdo rje slob dpon la gzung ba ni/ spyi bor bla ma ngas pa
18b7(rnying rgyud): ladelagakyang // drag rgyang la gzung dzin/ shes pa 'grang rdzog zas pa gzung // rnamamapa' la gsung ban/ mdun kyi rnam mkha'i sezhes pa gtad la khe'i tshig tu sbed pa 'jud pa 'am/ gzhu bdu pa su brangan pacur rgyas la
19a1(rnying rgyud): gzung ba'o// de rnams ma yengs par byas la gzung bar byed pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las le'u ste dang pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ de nas lo gnon bstanapa
19a2(rnying rgyud): ne/ sems gzung ba la rlung skyes nA/ shes pa rgod spa zing por 'ong / gnyid mi phebs so// de la bsku ma nye bya/ zas bcud can bsten no// mkhris pa phyes nas ser por mthong ba la sogs byung na bsil gtang ngo // bad kan skyes nas sleb
19a3(rnying rgyud): dang / 'khrog pa dang / dngag mi bde ba byung na/ bcag khams bsrung ngo // zhes gsungs so// rgyud phyi ma'i phye ma las le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa ni/ de ltar sems zin nas rig pa stod gsal du shes pa
19a4(rnying rgyud): lte ba'o// de'i dang du gsal bsgom pa'o// de las ma yangs par spyod pa'o// de 'chi ba'i dus su dran pa dang skye ba bskyed de gdams ngag gis 'pho bar bya'o// de las 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes lnga'o// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi ma'i phyi ma las le'u
19a5(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ rgyud 'di ni rgyud snga ma'i bskong ba zhes bya ba yin pas/ rdo rje sems dpyas gces sbas kyis gzung zhing bcang bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal te chos nyid kyi ngang du gyur to// zhes gsungs so//
19a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po yi shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud kyi ma'i phyi ma las le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / mthar thug/ pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ san ti ma hA sa maN+Da b+ha dra bi ta guha tsu ma taH/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po
19a7(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa kyi ma gas pa'i rgyud ces byab/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal kun tu bzang pos pa bka' stsal pa/ nyon gdapal rdo rjesems dpa'/ lteng gis pa rig pa zos gyur rtogs par 'dod
19b1(rnying rgyud): na/ dang bsanas 'anganabyas pa/ nganas pa'adra gang ban/ napa 'ang rlabs la ban pa nas kyang// skam med shes rab la btu pan/ dan sa bangs cad dag pa kyang bu su chugs pang/ sa sa kyang byed pas cang/
19b2(rnying rgyud): ngar shes par bya'o// zhes bka' stsal to// rgyang phyi ma las le 'u ste dang po'o// / de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal pa/ sdang srid 'dinges pa med pa'i phyir na sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdang bangs pa med pa ni/ dpe nasanyes 'ang
19b3(rnying rgyud): mthong / yi dgas kyis rnag khrag tu mthong / mis chu ru mthong ste/ des na nges pa med do// des na snang ba 'di rang gi sems kyi 'khrul snang ngo // sems dang byung ye shes stong gsal du snang ba'o// zhes gsungs so// chud kyi ma las la
19b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'o// / de nas par bka' stsal pa/ snang ba ye nas med rang bzhin du sdang ba yin te/ min pa la yin par gzung bas 'phrul te/ nga bdag tu gzung nas de las nyon mongs pa'i byung ste/ des 'khor bar 'khyams pa yin te/ rang
19b5(rnying rgyud): pa stong gsal rtogs pas/ nang nyams phyir shar byas sdang ba la 'khrul sdang du mthong ba'o// na bun d+ha thung bun ni lang de mthong tsam na/ nyon mangs pa las log nas/ shin tu chos nyid dam par 'gyur te/ rnal byor gyi dbang phyug dam pa'o// zhes
19b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rgyung mi ma las le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ de ltar rdo rje sems dpas de la don tams su blang zhing / bla med ye shes gsal ba'i rgyud 'di gzung bar bya'o// zhes bka'
19b7(rnying rgyud): stsal pas 'khor rnams thams cad yi rang bar gyur to// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po la shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma las le'u ste bzhi ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gurba shrI sid+ha dang / lo ts+tsha brdo rje pang dbang gter
20a1(rnying rgyud): bsgyur ra// rgyug tu dang / mnas rgya dus da pa/ brta papa la/ ma/ 'a dus/ ba na du du chu sa mas can mas dmas sargyas na par bklags papa rgyad pa tha
20a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ chos kyi dbyings spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang na/ ring byung rig pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung po chen po/ rgyal ba rigs lnga dang 'du 'bal med par bzhugs so// 'di sad bdag
20a3(rnying rgyud): thos pa'i rgyus gcig na/ mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gi zhing khams na/ 'od mtha' med kyi yul can na/ rnam par grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi grangs brgyan ma bkod par snang ba zhes bye ba bzhugs so// de'i tshigs pa'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// kye kye sangs rgyas rang
20a4(rnying rgyud): kyi phreng ba chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas gsu sa gsung du gsom/ zhes byas so// de nas rnam par grol pa'i sangs rgyas 'ang gi phung pos bka' mas/ phyogs pa'i bdag khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas chos kyi phu gi ste ga'i dkyil na bzugs sa// ye shes
20a5(rnying rgyud): zad thal rang gi mig gi dkyil na gzhugs so// sangs rgyas khro bo'i sgra ngadage klang pa'i dkyil na bzhugs so// zhes gsungs so// de nas sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung pos 'diska ces gsungs so// kye gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi steng ga'i dkyil na sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung
20a6(rnying rgyud): chen por bzhugs so// sangs rgyas brten pa rang gi lus la brten no// bzhugs pa rang gi snying gi dkyil na bzhugs so// gsal ba rang gi mig na thar gsal lo// rang gi klang pa'i dkyil na sangs rgyas khro bo'i lha thams cad bzhugs so// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag
20a7(rnying rgyud): pas 'di skad zas zhus so// kye sangs kyis 'od kyi phung po chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi rang lus gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus so// de nas 'od kyi phreng po chen pos bka' stsal ba/ gyo gsang ba'i bdag po sangs rgyas kyi lus 'ad lnga'i phung por yod de// 'od bdog lnga phral
20b1(rnying rgyud): dngas bgasal la 'am ga rangs na bathag la nyam ga/ mang ba do// ga pa dang bzugs pa dis sabyas pa na// sa kya kyis 'o sa rgyang song gas pa bya// sangs cas kyims dus bya bar byang na sadags pa 'a gags sa
20b2(rnying rgyud): de nasags pa'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung po chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi lte ba gsung du gsol/ zhes sus so// de nas sangs rgyas 'ad kyi zung posu bka' stsal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi stsu pa ni 'od zung bal blta'o// sangasakyis pa'i dang gsu mapa
20b3(rnying rgyud): lta ba dang / ye shes pa lta ba'i lta ba dang / dge snang la blta ba'i skye ba dang gsumago// chos sba la bta bu'i lta ba ni/ rang gi shes par so sa gnas pa'i dus na chos su yin no// rdo rje sams dpa'i me long la rang gi tshig bcug nas bltas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dang bdog thang dngas pa
20b4(rnying rgyud): gsal la 'tshor ba/ rang bzhin pablag pa/ nyam bas dpar 'jo bar mdog gsum du 'char bde/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams la bsdu ba'i lta ba yin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas ya gsang pa'i bdag thos 'dis ces nus so// kye sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gsum gsung gsol
20b5(rnying rgyud): nas/ sus cu 'o rgyu ba ngas pa' phrul gas sa rgyas mi gnas tho sa 'ang bcung gnas yul loshesapa 'acar 'ang ga ga par nga bdudas pa yod tan byed do// nga dgas dag 'bu 'i dados pa snang ga sungs rgya sa tsa da
20b6(rnying rgyud): ga tu bye / ga pa dang gis na lang dag zugagis slo bangs sa rgya ba par nga myig pa zhe tu cu sa brnyed pa na na yi do/ sa gsus so// dedasas rgya 'od nga pos din 'phra gshegs pa'i bdag ga nga rlo la b+ha d+hid pa pa
20b7(rnying rgyud): rgya kyi sa pa la na 'dzumed pa lan / sa mdza kyi gangs ba na jal ya da rjeg pa dasas ma pa // sasasu // sa pang gas pa'i gangos zusapa kyisang rgyan 'od phre ca go/ sang rgya kyiganas sugs sasupa gang drugaso nig zas so// de nas pa
21a1(rnying rgyud): // rgyas 'od kyi phung pos bka' stsal pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon ci// sems can thams cad la rang gi snying gi dkyil nas stong pa rig pa snying po can du gnas so// tig pa 'od kyi khang pa na 'od mtha' med pa'i yul can du gnas so// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gsungs pa gsang pa'i bdag
21a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi 'char lugs gsum nyon cig/ sangs rgyas kyi me long la bltas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams 'char ro// rang gi rig pa la bltas pas// rtags 'phral la 'char ro// rang gi rig pa lam langs pa dang lus 'od lnga las/ nyams su blangs pas dag sdang sprug par 'char ro// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang
21a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// kye sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung po sangs rgyas kyi grol ba gsum du gsung du gsol/ ces byas so// sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung pos bka' stsal pa/ rang 'chi ba'i dus su dag snang ngo shes pas 'khrul snang dag snang du grol te/ sha khrag gi lus rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i skur grola'o// sems
21a4(rnying rgyud): rtogs bcas ye shes mi rtog par grol lo// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// kye sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung po sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa gsum gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus so// de nas sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung pos bka' stsal pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cing // snang bar de log 'ong
21a5(rnying rgyud): bas bag cha ga spyad mi dgos/ ye shes tshang khab tu 'ong bas ched du bsgom mi dgos so// rang gi rig pa la skye shi med pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi dgos/ zhes bka' stsal to// ma sangs rgyas rang chas kyi rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dngos su bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di
21a6(rnying rgyud): skad ces zhus so// kye sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung po/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs kyang / chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba gdams ngag la 'dus/ gdams ngag thams cad kyi dmar thag gar gcad ces zhus so// de nas yang sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung pos bka' stsal pa/ rang 'chi ba'i tshe/ drod rkang pa'i mthil nas/
21a7(rnying rgyud): yal/ skye bo tshangs pa'i bya gnas yang 'thon/ sems glo ba'i nang nas 'thon nas dbugs sna sgor chad/ sangs rgyas snying gi nang nas byon nas mig nas phar la don pa'i dus su/ snang ba thams cad 'od du 'char te/ shar ba de rang gis sangs rgyas su ngo shes pas rang 'od dang sba la thi ma nas sangs rgyabs// gdams
21b1(rnying rgyud): dag zams cad dmar thag spang srid thams cad kyang dang 'od du shar ba'i dus bcad do// zhes gsungs so// de nas gsang pa'i bdag pos 'di skad ces byas so// e ma spangs rgyas 'od kyi bral can po/ gdams dag na sa dgos ma nas gus pas/ gdams dag 'bru ba'i byangs dgos/ 'bri ba du
21b2(rnying rgyud): bcad ces zhus pas/ sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung pos bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po dang 'chi ba'i dus su/ 'chi lugs gnyis yin te/ kun ta bzang mo'i ngang du 'chi ba dang / kun tu bzang mo'i ngang du 'chi ba'o// kun tu bzang mo'i dang du 'chi na/ nad thams cad klog pa rtswa le zhugs nas/ 'chi nga
21b3(rnying rgyud): gzer chung bar nyal der 'chi bas so// kun tu bzang po'i nang du 'chi na/ nad snying la 'dus nas/ na tsha zug gzer shin tu che bar 'chi ba yin te/ na tsha tsug gzer lhag pa de la/ rtogs pa'o zhes rab lhag pade te byas/ bdag 'chi ba'i dus kyi dmar pag su \u0f7fbrdang po'i rang du 'chi ba badzad do// de nas yang
21b4(rnying rgyud): bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// kye sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung po/ gdams ngag byas pa gcig sangs rgyas pas/ sangs rgyas pa'i dus kyis dmar thag gar gcad ces zhus so// de nas sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung pos bka' stsal pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ sangs rgyab la gnyis yin no// chos nyid ma dang sradang /
21b5(rnying rgyud): dang / ye shes rang sa zin pa'o// chos nyid ma dang 'phrad pa ni/ 'phrul snang 'gags nas dag snang 'char ba yin no// ye shes rang sa zin pa na/ 'od lnga po shes pas rang gi snang ba la thim nas sangs rgya bas/ bdag sangs rgya ba'i dus kyis dmar thag chos nyid ma dang 'phrad pa'i dus su bcad do// zhes gsungs so// ma sangs
21b6(rnying rgyud): rang chas kyi rgyud las/ dmar zag gsum bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// kye sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung po chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga gsung du gsol/ ces zhus so// de nas sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung pos bka' stsal pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po
21b7(rnying rgyud): khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rnam pa lnga ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyag gcig dang / thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba dang / rig pa kun tu bzang po dang / sangs rgyas gzhon nu bum pa'i sku dang / rang bzhin lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas dang lnga yin no// kye nyon cig/ rang gi rig pa ngo bo stong pa kun tu
22a1(rnying rgyud): bzang ma / gapags 'a sa bar ba'o// nas par dag par ma byar chud sram sa cas tagagacag yin pas rag ting ga 'drus sangs rgyas rung ba ma bya mam dngas gnas sum pa bu'o// dab pa gang ngang 'gags par nas lung du sa shes
22a2(rnying rgyud): snying gi dkyil na sangs rgyas bzhug pas rang bzhin lhun gyi grub pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// sangs rgyas chos kyi sku rten pa rang gi lus la bstan no// bzhugs pa rang gi snying gi dkyil na bzhugs so// gsal ba rang gi mig na phar gsala'o// sangs rgyas rang chas kyi rgyud las/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bstan pa'i le'u stogasum pa'o//
22a3(rnying rgyud): yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces lus so// de nas yang rnam par grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung pos bka' stsal pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi ye shes rang ngo shes pa de sangs rgya pa la gsum mo// 'dug pa dang grol ba dang mtha' byin pa'o// 'jug pa la gnyis yin no// dag skar rang la tshung 'jug pa ni/ rang 'chi ba'i
22a4(rnying rgyud): tshe rang gi sangs rgyas rang la 'char ba de yin no// rang phar la 'jug pa ni/ rang gi sangs rgyas 'char ba'i tshe rang ngo shes pas sangs rgya ba'o// rang gi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal la dus rtag tu blta ba'o// grol ba la gsum yin no// rig po sbubs nas 'thon pas phyi nang gi chos thams cad krol lo// rig pa sems dang bral bas
22a5(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzi gyi rnam par rtog pa las grol la// rig pa rang lus thob nas/ rang gi ye shes rangs 'dzin nas/ ma rig pa rig pa'i ye shes sa grol lo// mthar byin pa sangs rgyas nas sems can du mi ldog pa'o// sangs rgyas rang mas kyi rgyud las grol tshul bstan pa'i 'i'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas yang gas pa'i bdag ngos 'din /
22a6(rnying rgyud): nus pa/ e maho// bde gsheg dod kyi phung po chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi yin pa gsum gsung du gsol/ ces zhus so// de nas sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung pos bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po byas pa'i chos kyi ma byas pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa min no// sangs rgyas 'das ma byas pa yin pas byas pa'i chos kyi sangs rgyas thob pa
22a7(rnying rgyud): minano// de nas gsang ba'i bdage pos zhus pa/ rnam par grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung po// sang sa rgyas kyi yin pa gsum gsung du gsol/ ces zhus so// rang gi rig pa 'od phung chen por bzhug pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi bdo'o// sangs rgyas kyi sbal sku dang ye shes rgyan chad med par bzhug pa yin no// rang gi rig pa la sgel
22b1(rnying rgyud): med par sa bsas mnyam da gsal bar bathug pa lan/ gapas pa' cos cima'o/ ga pa shos rabs sabyed pa mang ga sa pa krug/ ga thar pa dang thar bas su' zlag/ dad pas gnas 'thamapas 'angs la pan rtan gyis nga shi byas pa nga khengs napa
22b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas yongs su su thub drug shengs zung rtad pa'acha ro// jo gas ngas sangs rgya'o// masangs rgyas dang mas ni chud pas/ lu dang ye shes ci'i ga lngapa 'o// de nas yang gas pa pa pos nus pa/ semano// rnam par brel ba'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi lo yang kyi ga gsung dang po la
22b3(rnying rgyud): da pas pa pa ga/ thegs dgag mas da das pa ni sa na dag nas pa dang sngal nams da ga ca 'angags pa mi ga pa sa datha' ba yi ga gso// pa
22b4(rnying rgyud): 'cha cag to// de sa gas pa'i bdag pos sus gsang cas kyi nga ngag su ga sung ngan pa pa/ ces thus pa// ya / lag pa kyi pa'i dus sus sa rgyama'i byad gagasum bas zhis par kyi gyi/ sang rgyas pa dang myong pa shes badrug pa cu nga// nab gis lam
22b5(rnying rgyud): ra / sa sa 'a byas rje pas ngags sa ba te // su pa na pa dag pa zlas pa zus pa man pa 'am 'a sa rdzab byang yan ma dgang du sol/ rdzus pa'i/ slong sa mas pa 'phrul ga #
22b6(rnying rgyud): kyis kyai ma pa mas rkyen can dus da mi me gi/ dal nas shig/ napapa rgyas dang ma gan gsag/ mags par gyi shi/ shi su'i da rkyed kyi ba'i sa sum mya pa dang / lung ma
22b7(rnying rgyud): shig nga pa'i gi sa shes pa / dang gis ngogs pa cod gi/ sa sa lag/ dang ras gzhag das sangs rgya pa'i 'bu bdu sa/ kyi srungasas spangs segs pa thas pa rdzud nas pa/ sa pasas sa brdzogs /
23a1(rnying rgyud): ma / ! smras k+Shak+Shak+Sha / ngas na na/ rnam sa mams pa gas sa rnam na
23a2(rnying rgyud): gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rnyed/ thog ma'i ston pa 'od mi 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa chos nyid dus gsum gyi 'gag med pa na/ rang
23a3(rnying rgyud): dngos me ces phrul ci na mongs pa'i drim med pa/ phral mdun chu med de/ thugs rje la dmi kol mi mang 'di/ rin pa che gsang ba'i sbubs na rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i blang pa la/ rang sbyang ngortog pa'i 'khor dang 'a tha la med par brtsam
23a4(rnying rgyud): b+hA // 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dras gcig na/ yul chos nyid la la shes 'od du gsal ba/ ye shes kyi gzhal yas/ pang chen po'i thabs sa/ longs su'i zhing khams ye shes kyi snang ba 'od dang bcas pa ni/ yul chos nyid la leshe
23a5(rnying rgyud): 'ad dugasalag/ ye shes kyi snang ba 'ang dang bcas pa ni/ rin po che 'od 'bar ba phra sangs rgyas bzhi brgyartsa gnyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ gzigs snad gsum ma 'gags par/ thugs rje nyi ma dang 'o'ad zer bzhin du 'byung zhing /
23a6(rnying rgyud): shes kyi snang ba 'od war gas la bdang 'du 'bral med par bzhugs so// snang ba 'od du gsal ba de'i tshe/ rdo rjesems dpa' dang gi rig pa'i rang gdangs sre shes nas/ ye shes rangs rin nas sangs rgyas so// de'i tsha bad+ha pa de ldan
23a7(rnying rgyud): grong khyer du sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' la/ brags rje rang byung gi sgra drug sun mong ma yin pa'i 'khor dang bdun ye shes mkha' 'gros tra/ sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyis bskor nas/ skra dang ye shes kyi snang bam
23b1(rnying rgyud): 'gags pa/ gsal ba'i dgongs pa la zhugs so// de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / sangs rgyas kyi yul lnga gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus so// dz+nyAn pany+tsa ka la ha tsar+ya/
23b2(rnying rgyud): mo lathong khyer gnyis na/ mi nang lnga bzhugs pa'i man ngagago// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ e me hA// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par nyod cig/ rang la tshur bstan nas chos kyi bu'i phul/ rang gi zang khrig gi stod pa
23b3(rnying rgyud): e ma ho// ye shes kyi yul rang gi byad yin no// longs su'i yul rang gi mgo yin na// sprul sku'i yul rang gi rgal tshig yin no// yang sbrul thig le'i yul rang gi lus thams cad yin no// gsang ba'i bdag po phar la bstan nas/
23b4(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i lu thas yinas sam dpa' yidzin/ ye shes kyi yul ba 'ong pa / gag pa yin// yi la ba'i kyi la la nga ba pa'i ni/ na pa'i 'ag 'di/
23b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas/ gsang ba'i bdag pos yul chos kyi dbyings su rtogs so// mtshan mar sdang ba thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du rtogs so// 'od lnga sangs rgyas kyi rang lus yin par rtogs so// rang gi rig pa ye shes su rtogs so// de nas
23b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma ho sangs rgyas thugs rje can/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas lnga bstan du gsol/ zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po sangs rgyas chos kyi
23b7(rnying rgyud): sgra nga na nying gi dpe lan ba zugs so// ye shes zang thal gyi the byung pa byes na bcugs // 'angs myong rdzogs pa'i sgra dang gi zad pa'i dkyi 'ad bzhugs so// thugs rje bral pa'i blarang gi gsungs pa'i nang na bzhugs so/ thig 'ar
24a1(rnying rgyud): ma ston na na / sa/ sa/ ga dus
24a2(rnying rgyud): ga dum dus / das pa /
24a3(rnying rgyud): ng+ge mi ting ba dashar bar la shes lhung dab bzhugs sa// 'byud ba 'di du byung de dgasal bcir dgas // dag pa byung ba pa yin rdzogs bcu sha na/ thub pa med par basmrag // ngag ting ga na dus sa sa dz+nyAn
24a4(rnying rgyud): lce mya' bdapas lajug pa 'a par bzhugs s+ho/ sa rgya la drim med papa ga gapa pa gags 'di/ gzhes pa shAb rgyas dug rnyedapa byed kyi mas jig nga ga
24a5(rnying rgyud): rab stong par bzhugs so// ye shes gsal bar bzhugs so// kha dog byeng par bzhugs so// gsal la 'tshor bar bzhugs so// 'od du 'gro bar bzhugs so// prA me pA po bar bzhugs so// yinas phyogs dang ngas me
24a6(rnying rgyud): par sna dag pa chen par bzugs su// rigs kyi pa legs par ston la med la chug/ sangs rgyas sa zla brtan pa dang zu zin 'i skyed la na/ bzhugs par dag sbyong gi dkyil na gags so// gsal ngarnapa pa pa
24a7(rnying rgyud): gsala'o// dka rang ga cing ga kyil nasangs sa mdzad sa mdu bzugs sa// dang gis pas su tsu// ra gas ba rgyas pa thams padam su pa zugs / pa dam
24b1(rnying rgyud): kha dag rdzas khengs nas pa dang// zhes gsungasas// donas gsang ba'i 'dab pas 'di spyan gyis chus do// ske rtse bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang / sang+yas rgyag kyis gsal ba sdug par drugasal/ zhes 'a // shAnan 'das kyis pa
24b2(rnying rgyud): sprul pa/ e ma ho// gsang ba'i bdag po nges zung zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi khams 'od lngar gsal lo// sangs rgyas kyi lus 'od ldar gsal lo// 'od kha dog lnga nub pa med par gsal lo// 'od lnga rang gi ting gi rlung nagasala'o//
24b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga 'od lngar gsal lo// zhes gsungs so// bstan pa thams cad kyi bu gcig pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / bud+d+ha badz+ra/ ma hA tsit+ta/ rin po che za ma tog na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhugs pa'i n+dan/
24b4(rnying rgyud): ngag la/ de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces byas so// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'tshang / sangs rgyas ngo sprod lnga lnga gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ rang gi mig lha'i
24b5(rnying rgyud): bu'i zag sor gyis bkab la/ phyag sor lam yengs par bltas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa mngon sum du 'char ro// rang gi mig me long gi nang du bcug nas bltas na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams mngon sum du 'char ro// 'khar bar
24b6(rnying rgyud): lags par chus bkang nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i me long bstan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams mtshon cha'i rtse mo bzhin du 'phro ba 'char ro// nam mkha'i snying po la rang gi mig bcug nas bltas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams phra la dngas pa 'char ro// grong
24b7(rnying rgyud): khyer grangs med sna rtse nyi ma la bstan nas/ de rang gi mig la bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams 'char ro// kye gsang ba'i bdag po legs par nyon la dgongs shig/ yid gtod cig/ nga rdo rje sems dpa'i gdams pa rin po che 'di ni 'jig rten
25a1(rnying rgyud): du 'byung bar dka'a'o// 'di ni las zad pa'i gang zag las can la bstan na// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi snying gnang na/ sangs rgyas thams cad gyi sgra kyang 'bu tsam la/ stan phral thag ca
25a2(rnying rgyud): gnas so// gdams so// sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od lnga'i khang pa can gyi nang na gnas pa de la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i me long la bltas pas rang la mngon sum du 'char ro// dengo shes pas chog go// ma 'ongs pa'i sems can la de bzhin du non cing /
25a3(rnying rgyud): bka' phul to// bstan pa thams cad kyi bu gcig po'i rgyud las mngon sum du bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / dz+nyAn/ legs tsak+Shats+tshiH/ d+harmA sa kA ya/ pratsit+ta/ tring rat+na din gseram ni chos nyid 'ber ba yid/ g.yu ni legs yin no/
25a4(rnying rgyud): lha khang la snying nang gi sangs rgyas yin no// rin po rgya ni chos kyu yin no/ lnga'i mchod rten dang byung du bya rtse cid pa po grangs pa byon nas mu tig gi/ rang gi rig pags pa pa 'di yin no/ 'khor lo la bzhugs pa'i mnang gi gro/ sangs rgyas 'od rdzas banor nas yod pa yin no// / thA gA tA ma thA
25a5(rnying rgyud): gAkhA gra pa Nag+hAHsangs rgyas 'od lnga'i lus su yod do// pra hA Ag+na ma thAH'od rnga snying ginang na yod do// mag Da sA ga rgya 'od lnga rang 'od yin par rigis nas sangs ca'o// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma e ma sangs rgyas thugs rje can// sku gsum gyi ngo bo gsung
25a6(rnying rgyud): du gsol/ zhes zhus so// A yA s+t+ra/ kye rdo rje 'dzin pa khod nyon cig/ ma yengs par nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ phung po phung po lhag ma med par sangs rmas pas 'dod pa'i mis 'di ltar shes par bya'o// rang gi sbrang gi nang na 'od la
25a7(rnying rgyud): dog lnga'i dkyil na sangs rgyas rigs lnga'i sku tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa spu nyung 'dra tsam la spyan spya gi tid na po phral thag tsam sna tshogs gcer grol du bzhugs so// lha de yang ngo bo gsal la zang thal ba/ 'dzin rtog dang tha
25b1(rnying rgyud): 'bagasas parnagasas/ ngas nga sa song gan nas sa sa dang mas mas cupa thal tha 'gas padu du zlum masatha pa da mnyas dung/ sa mthas ngas
25b2(rnying rgyud): dulam 'jigs so// 'angags pa sazlog// cigs ba'i dzinapa pa legs par rnam tu 'ad 'gri bar kyis nyid glang gi nas sa pa / nga gas sad dang / dadags pa pa da
25b3(rnying rgyud): gi gas med lta dang 'dra'abral med par 'phags pa yin no// rang gi dang 'ad zhes byas sangs rgyas kyi thu zab pa yin no// rang la sangs rgyas dang rdzas su yod pa de/ srid pa'i ma long la byanya sa pas/ sangs rgyas da
25b4(rnying rgyud): 'char na yin no// ma n+ya bamanA/ sar+b+ba mas dzin na/ pam ma/ des kyi bu sangs rgyas dang la yod pa sgra gzhan dumatshol zhig/ sangs rgyas 'ad sa'i lus pa lags bstsags pa 'ba' da tho mo//
25b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sbrul 'gyur ba med pas kyi 'dzi dang bral la/ sa 'dab sangs rgyas ma ma na/ rdza ma ya gi'ang padas te/ thams cad rang 'gas pas sangs rgyas pas dka' thab dang thal ba'o// sangs cas 'od ci bra lags pa lanan
25b6(rnying rgyud): bas nga ba da/ bdu rnam da nga gi shing ga gas so// bstan pa thams pad kyi ga rnasas ngas rgyas pams kun pa'i la hU~M ba ma /
25b7(rnying rgyud): mas bam ma las sad ca bas da cid pa ma sa pa dru mapas mthangs sa ba da da/ thams mangs / sa ga ba brjo bas mags dod pa/
26a1(rnying rgyud): gas sa/ // rga nam lag tu da nasas sa rgyas rnas sa dpa nal dang/
26a2(rnying rgyud): matir ma nyan no// kA pa// ma// ba// \u0f7f/ am+b+ha la/ mUH/ baH/ kA pa/ d+ham/ ba/ a/ gsu nas dung med// de na pa dag brdorje pa 'di skad snyam /
26a3(rnying rgyud): ma smras sa sa/ sa
26a4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po sangs rgyas rang la yod de// ji ngo gas na sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral mi// ces gsungs so// bsnyen pa thams cad kyi bu gcig pa'i rgyud las sangs rgyas kyis gdams ngag
26a5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u zhe bskye la/ b+hed d+ha/ A/ ta nAg ta/ bral/ baH/ ni/ hrata/ gu laM/ @\u0f7f/ hoH/ pAnA~M/ praH/ kA la/ lA/ AH/ gsungs nas dgangs pa 'i gshegs so// nam mkha'i dkyilanas
26a6(rnying rgyud): khang pa ri na ngo che 'od 'brar ba lnga/ bzhugs pa'i mnang gde nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// gyi sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang / sangs rgyas kyi bzugs tshul gsung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyag
26a7(rnying rgyud): myong ma sangs par gan cig/ rang gi gling gi dkyil nasangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku zung 'brubs la spyan tshul pag tsam du bzugs sa// rang gi snying gi nang nasangs rgyas rgyal ba rigs lngal bar dang bcas pa thams cad seng ga dang / glang po che dang / ta /
26b1(rnying rgyud): rmA thA dang / shang shang gi gudan la sum dog lnga dang ldan pa/ phag mtshan rdo rje rtse lab bsdams pa/ nar bu'i rna ba ca dang / bad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dang / rnga rnga myams dang / 'khor 'grubs brgyad pa rnams pa/ nam ma'ad 'byar ba
26b2(rnying rgyud): snying gi nang na lta bzhugs so// rang gi zad pa'i nga na sangs rgyas khro bo'i bu/ badz+ra ha~M rbaka dang / bat+ta ga sa ka dang / rad+hi na ka dang / padz+ra hU~M ruka dang / kam he tsun dang / khrag 'byung gi rgya tshogs thams cad mngon su mi d+ha bzhungs so/
26b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag po/ rang gi klad pa'i nang na khrag 'thung gi lha tshogs thams cad sna tshogs gcer grol du bzhugs so// rang gi lus 'di la sangs rgyas kyi grong khyer te khri chig stong yod do// grong khyer de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi mus thams cad khya nas yod do//
26b4(rnying rgyud): rang gi rtsa yi nang bde bar gshegs pa'i pus khengs nas bzhugs so// kye gsang ba'i bdag po legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig/ grangs sam gapa' las byung ba'i man she la dri ma med pa gcig nyi ma la 'phyar bas/ 'od kha do lde zug par
26b5(rnying rgyud): ro// de yang 'di ska ste/ kha dog mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o// don de lta bu rang gi snying gi dkyil na bzhugs so// rang 'chi ba'i dus su 'od lnga gas la la 'tsher ba rang bzhin bkrag la nyamang ba/
26b6(rnying rgyud): byang thang chen po la sdig tu 'gru ba bzhin mer mer por 'ong ngo // de lam 'jigs shig/ 'od las zar mtshon cha'i tshar pa babs pa 'ong ngo // de la ma sbags shig/ 'od kyi nang thams cad nas chos nyid kyi rang sgra 'brug stong ldir ba 'dra bgrag la
26b7(rnying rgyud): 'od / de la ma dngangs shig/ de gsum la ma 'jigs ma dngangs mthed pas na sangs rgya'o// de gsum la 'jigs skrag nas bred pa de ni/ rdzogs ldan mun pa nag po'i rgyal khams thab/ nyin mo nyi ma'i snang ba med pa/ mtshan ma tha pa'i snang ba med
27a1(rnying rgyud): pa/ nang nub mo'i snang ba med pa/ rlung char dang mun pa nag po'i gseb na shin tu sdug bsngal lo// de nas 'khor ba win gyi khargya dang 'dra bar 'khor zhing sdug bsngal lo// des na gdams ngag di'i ga
27a2(rnying rgyud): shes pa gal che'o// 'di ma shes na phan med do// zhes gsungs so// bstan pa thams cad kyi za gcig pu'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul bstan pa'i le'u sbrel pa'o// / de nas pang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'dis
27a3(rnying rgyud): kye kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang / sangs rgyas kyi mngon rtags gsung du gsol/ ces zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas la gnyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
