27a4(rnying rgyud): dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de la/ 'od dang / skra dang / gdung dang / su 'ong ngo // 'od gyen la 'greng nas skas kyi tshul du byung na/ dbugs chad pa dang sangs mi bya bar zhag ldanas
27a5(rnying rgyud): rgya'o// 'od khang khyim gyi tshul du byung na/ zhag lnga nas brtan pa thob nas sangs mi rgya bar/ dbugs chad pa dang sangs rgya'o// sbrul gnyis te wA Sh+Ta zer na zhag lnga la sangs rgyas so// skra thur zer na zhag bdun nas sangs rgya'o//
27a6(rnying rgyud): lngal gdung dkar ngor byung na rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams su skyes nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o// gdung ser por byung na rin chen 'byung ldan gyi zhing khams su skyes nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o// gdung la dag dmang por zung
27a7(rnying rgyud): snang ba mtha' yas kyi zhing khams su skyes nas mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgya'o// gdug pa dag sdang gung thung na don dgrub pa'i zhing khams su skyes nas mngon par sangs rgya'o// gdug pa rog mthing gar byung na rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing khams sus /
27b1(rnying rgyud): rgya ba yin no// skul gnyis zhi ba'i sku byung na snang ba 'di 'gags pa dang sangs rgya'// khra ba'i bu byung na zhag ldanas sangs rgyar// de bzhin du 'dra dang / sgra dang / gdung dang / su 'byung ra// zhes gsungs so// bstan pa thams cad tu zug
27b2(rnying rgyud): bu'i chung las/ mngon rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhusaso// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // sra yi gnas lugs gsung dugasal// ces zhus so// de nas
27b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po zhu ba legs so// rang gi snying gi nang na dbus rnam par snang mdzad su mdog mthing gA yab sum 'khor dang bcas pa 'od lnga'i dkyil na yod do// rang gi snying gi shar na rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum 'khor bcas
27b4(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// rang gi snying gi lhon rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so// rang gi snying gi nang nub na snang ba tha' yas yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so// rang gi snying gi byang na don yod grub pa yang yub 'khor dang bcas pa bcu
27b5(rnying rgyud): so// rang gi grad pa'i nang thams cad khro bo'i srus khengs nas yod do// rang gi rag pa ma 'gags par gsal ba 'di'i chos kyi sgra yin no// sangs rgyas rgyal ba rigs lnga rang gi snying gi nang na bzhugs so// longs su yin no// rang de glang bdu khar dag
27b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i nang na bzhugs pa de sprul pa'i lha yin no// rang gi klad pa'i nang gi dbus na 'od kha dog lha yod do// 'od wa'i nang na sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs so// rang gi gzungs pa'i nang na sangs kyis kyi sku ru bzhugs so// rang gi lus rtsa'i dra bar yod de/
27b7(rnying rgyud): nang na sangs rgyas kyi grong khyer yod do// de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skus khengs nas yod do// 'od lnga sangs rgyas kyi zhing lus su shes sangs rgya'o// khrug pa lnga shes na dbugs ma chad pa la sangs rgya'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje sems
28a1(rnying rgyud): dpa ga' nas tha dug da ra sa dug pas / gzugasas// byas pa na/ sa gang bab/
28a2(rnying rgyud): bkang nas pang po lhag ma med par sangs rgyas so// de dga' ba di brtul nas/ shes kyi zad pa nas dang phyogs bzur bas pas brgyal bsangs tsam na/ sangs rgyas rdo rjesems dpa'i chos nyid nga ldeng gi nam pa / me gas spram sna rkyen
28a3(rnying rgyud): nas phyag g.yas pa'i sor mo brkyangs nas/ d+ha mar d+ha si d+ha pa yaM/ zhes pa'i sgra byung nas rin po cheg su'i za me tog sen gang bragacig dbu thog tu babs so// de khartse nas gzigs pas/ gsar gyi shog phul ga yu'i yi ge bris pa gcig 'judug nas de gnas
28a4(rnying rgyud): bas+t+ra/ sangs rgyas rnga rje sems dpa'i rnal khrims/ tshig gsum zhes kya ba phung po lhag ma med par sangs rgya ba 'di 'dug sa// der dga' ba rjes de bzhes pas/ dga' ba rdo rje rngang ba lhan med du sangs rgyas so// bstan pa thams /
28a5(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'i rnang las/ phral bshad pa'i le ge bdun pa'o// / bstan pa thams cad kyi bragacig brdzogs so// / tham byig sa gsum la sangs rgyug/ zhes gang dus sa// rigs sas di lta / ra ga shi nang na/
28a6(rnying rgyud): 'i sgra mngon sum du bzhugs so// 'char ba mngon sum du 'char ra// kye gsang ba'i bdag po gdams pa bstan pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi sum 'o gi gzug brtan bzhin 'cha // rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal tshems tshig gsum po// dga'
28a7(rnying rgyud): gas kyis cang du sa/ zhes gsungasas// de nas pa sangs rgyas don sems dpas 'das/ dga'i sa pa rigs kyis/ ngasa'i gnas pams su la gas zhi nas/ pa gyu 'junas / sa
28b1(rnying rgyud): na// sa sung ldag mad dus das sacag/ danas ma d+ma brkyad nas/ snabananamasas nad pa rtag ngamams / das sas ga pasug na pa dang / na gas ga gsas pa ga nal 'a na// dang /
28b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan med pa 'bras ba rnam ci'i shA skrin/ snyam pa/ dgan rdzogs so// / hU~M/ gsang // 'o// na ma ngas/ gnad kyi gdams gzhor gsum/ 'di la gnyis te/ brgyad pa dang man ngag gi// brgyad pa lag
28b3(rnying rgyud): na pang kyil gangasad rtags mdza ma ya 'dags pa sasum/ rigal na she sa byung ga tu ga da pa/ bzud pa/ bgyi do 'i bdab ba 'a la gsams lda pa/ 'ad ny-id dag rten drang sa
28b4(rnying rgyud): lung dag/ reg pa'ab brnyed dpa/ spo sa bad pa pa napa/ rid pa'as sa nas/ nang ltar brdud ba/ gsang bsdus don ra brgyad pa'o// gnyis pa man dag ltar la'ang gsum ste/ da lta nyams su blangs pa'i man ga dang / 'chi ba lam byer dang / dod pa
28b5(rnying rgyud): ba de 'am dang gdang gas mam// de yang 'ang la sa sa rmi kha bar dgasum// gdams dag gdab pa'i snying sa yin// zhes pashad pas da ka'i man drug shes gas la gsum ste/ gnas lags pa'i na/ 'char lugs pa non/ mtham
28b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag dang gsum 'o// de la ma kyim da krung bca 'di ba yang mthub par gnas panas stong sa dang ba 'di yin na// thani dgrar gyi gas pa'am/ dag pags la la ma 'gags pas/ sA la 'jig bye / san te/ mthu gang+gA ba ba rna
28b7(rnying rgyud): sa' nas kyan/ ga rgya la sa gags par chu kyis rgya // thas/ gnyis btsun/
28b8(rnying rgyud): bapa'o// de'i 'od 'bri ku ta gnyis la zug ste/ de yang rtsa rin po che gser gyi sbu bu tsam gcig gi rtse mo bum phrag
29a1(rnying rgyud): tu mes te/ gnyis kyi 'atri ku t+ta zhes bya'o// mag gnyis la jug/ gcag tshangs pa'i drug shA dza// de nas ye shes rgyu ba'i las zhes bya ste/ de'i drung na yang rig pa tshung bas mya ngan las 'das
29a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam du tshud pa yin no// de ni gnas lugs don gyi sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// rang la gnas pa'i chos nyid mngon sum du gtan la phebs pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang chas su gnas pa de/ thabs bya ma'i gdams dgal
29a3(rnying rgyud): brten nas/ gnas lugs don gyi ye shes/ ngos tsor gyis zin pade kA yin no// de ngo shes pas sangs rgya'o// de'i phyir sems can thams cad rang gis do shes pas sangs rgyas dka' thab dang thal lo// 'dod pa'i don rin po che
29a4(rnying rgyud): pa yin no// de ltar yin pa la yin par ngo ma shes ma rtogs pa'i sems can rnams ni/ 'gru byed dbugs kyi rta po la/ dngos po dang rdzas su ma grub pa'o// ze byed spre'u'i rig pa zhon nas/ gzung 'dzin dang chab sdang gi dbang gis 'khor bar ltung ba'o//
29a5(rnying rgyud): 'chi kha ma'i man ngag lam du khyer ba la gsum ste/ 'chi ltas bstan pa dang / bsla ba bstan pa dang / ma slus na 'pho ba bstan pa dang gsum mo// ltas la gnyis te/ rtags dang ltas so// de la gsum gsum ste drug go// de la rtags gsum na
29a6(rnying rgyud): lus rtag pa rdo rje sems dpa'i mo ngan na 'chi bas te/ dag yon rkyen gyi sngang zangs nyon mongs skyes na/ dgra rin chagra sems drag po kyi san dgra yin/ lag pa'i sor mo rnams rtse sprad de/ bsgrengs la gung mo gnyis nang du bskum pa/ khathal ma bajug par srin lag tshigs
29a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis cad na tsho bres pas/ gnyis kha phyed dam blta/ phyed na 'chi mnga' bar 'dzag na med kyi 'bros payi no// 'ag 'id pa gsus ni la ra gdams ngag sa dngas dmyal ba sang na/ ngag gi da ltar la mi bas ma rig pa so mar bzhag/ ces pas/ dus gsum
29b1(rnying rgyud): gyis mi stegs par/ gnas lugs kyi steng du shes pa rang lugs phyam gyis bzhag ste/ de'i rig pa mig la gtad/ mig bar snang stong pa la gtad nas bzhag pas/ ma bu sor bzhag ster mi dgongs pa gnas lugs ngo bo ma stongs par ri//
29b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin gsal la ma 'gags par/ mtshan nyid de yang lus las chos nyid stong pa la rang rig ye shes su/ mdu sor bzhag mnyam nyid dgongs pa'o// zhes so/ spong gsal dbyer med kyi dgongs pa shes pa gsal bya dang bcas pa/ nyams gzung
29b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang bral ba/ rig pa gsal la 'dzin med du 'char ngo ro// de'i gdangs tsit+ta rin po che'i nang na/ 'od kha dog lnga'i rang bzhin du/ tshom bu lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so// yang tsit+ta rin po che zur brgyad pa/ du 'phru
29b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i nang na rtsa bzhi gsungs so// de 'dun gzhi'i lha rnam nas chos nyid dang rang byung gi rtsa mthing ba/ nyon mongs can gyi yid tu// ye shes kyi ser po// yid kyi napa shes rgya/ rang rgyud kyi rtsa dmar po/ zho lnga'i rnam shes hUM/ yon tan gyi rtsa ljang bu'o// de ba
29b5(rnying rgyud): thag khug pa'i tshul du yod/ de bzhi'i rtse mo gcig tu 'dus pa las/ rtsa'i dngas ma dar dkar lus gcus bkyed gyi srud pa tsam gcig/ de la khrag gi dngas ma mtshal cog la ma lta bur gnas ste/ de la drod kyi daHsa ma me long ngos la nyi ma sha ra ba
29b6(rnying rgyud): tsam gcig gnas so// de rlung stsal dang stobs bskyed/ gi dwangs ma gser sa 'og tu bcug pa'i rlangs pa tsam gcig gnas so// de bzhi'i dkyil na 'od kyi dngas mtshon gyi gru gru bsgril ba lta bu gnas so// de'i dkyil na rig pa shes byed kyi gzhi dran
29b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rten/ srog mi shigs pa'i thig le/ a badz+rA hU~M zhes bya ba/ dran rig gi ngo bo/ dngos po dang rdzas su ma grub pa/ rig pa dang snang ba med pa/ ngo bo dang don du ni yod do// ye shes kyi dbang po lnga dang bcas pa/ gdangs 'od
30a1(rnying rgyud): dag ga byugs sas kyil byung pa pa btsun sags pas smras nan na ldan
30a2(rnying rgyud): zlas/ na chags sbyin yan gshen nga pa ga pa ga/ nas pa nga 'dag pa na nas zhes sa thang pa ba
30a3(rnying rgyud): nga chug so pas nga nas par rig pa rkyong pas kyang na las 'das pa'i lam du chud payinan/ rnga tsam gcig bsam la/ dal ya dkar po nyi shu rtsa gcig skar la bsdus pa ltar dkar khrig gi banam la/ a ya zhes dbugs kyis thubadz+rad bzlas pas/
30a4(rnying rgyud): e ga cig la gcig kyi sa nas tshangs pa'i zug nas/ rig pa sa phyir thang cir 'dzin pas snang bathams cad rang gli ga sa nga ma / gsal gyi yang du su bal/ dag pa gtud la dbugs rje rgyad pa sdam mo// de'adal
30a5(rnying rgyud): phrag dog gis 'gro'o// gseb lam nas 'pho ba ni/ rig pa mig la gtad/ mig bar snang la gtad/ yid 'od gsal la gtad la 'pho'o// gas tho tha'am mtshan babs su'o/ lam la 'pho ba ni/ s+thA rma nas rig pa
30a6(rnying rgyud): dbugs dang 'grogs nas smr-i du 'thon ste dkar po bdun gyi nam mkha' la bla ma dang yi dmagasal pa'i thugs kar yang dang yang du bstim mo// 'pho ba'i dus de rnams su skyil ma gsum sar nyams sa tha pa'i phyi la mnyams gdang su chud pas
30a7(rnying rgyud): Sha gnas bas pa'i kyil // na sagasus ni phre bsranas dang sri thanas ca da sa ga ga bsan ro// rtags kyi bsunas pa su khye na// da la thugs rdzags gas par bya// dad pa pa gshes sum pa
30b1(rnying rgyud): dadang ldan par smras te/ sman mags man nying du mar// don dug reg pa 'dagasal gnyis su med par brim nas/
30b2(rnying rgyud): dusmra sa
30b3(rnying rgyud): thim pa/
30b4(rnying rgyud): rmi lam yul bu dang po chem/ nga bzhi jig 'bang 'das kyis phyogs cad dumasmin te/
30b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid bar do la gnyis te/ snang ba de la 'dris shing goms pa dang / de la 'jug go// spang ba gsum dang 'o rig pa da ma/ zer dang shes pa so// pra dang gsu
30b6(rnying rgyud): ga gas sa / dang gsum/
30b7(rnying rgyud): mo// dang po'i//
30b8(rnying rgyud): dbugs chad pa'i dus su/ sAng srid thams cad khadog lnga ru zhag lnga 'char te/ bsam gtan gyi zhag gsum gnas so// 'od kyi zer ni gdams ngag ma bstan pa la dar /
30b9(rnying rgyud): rloms sum bzhags par dran par ben par byed/ 'od ni/ dbugs chad pa'i dus hA/ snang srid thams ca kha dog lu du dag rdza 'char te/ pasam gtad ci gag gsum gzus sa/ 'od kyi bar ni gdams ngag ma bstan pa la bar// mtshon
30b10(rnying rgyud): ma/
30b11(rnying rgyud): su su
31a1(rnying rgyud): thams pa dgas pa// rnabs su mas pas thams ca ngad gang/ dang rje mar rnathams cad cang byung / zas dkyang brnams ca dang d+ha bams kyis rag thathams cad dgag pa du la'i thal dbang ba snga gang / dbang po nga la brang blda nga dang /
31a2(rnying rgyud): pas don ma gyi 'byung ba lnga po 'di thams cad chos nyid 'dagasal du na dgas so/ yul du 'byung ba ltar spang la/ zer ni tshogs drug 'gag med do// nyon cig ma yengs nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu gang zhig phung po lhag ma med par sangs rgya bar 'dod pas ying+ge 'di ltar
31a3(rnying rgyud): shes par bya'o// rang gi snying nang na 'od kha dog lnga'i dkyil na sangs rgyas rgyal ba rigs lnga'i sku tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor bcas pa sru nyung 'brul spyan phral zag tsam sna tshogs gcer bur bzhugs so// sku de 'angang ba gas pa bzang thal ba 'dzin tog dang
31a4(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i ye shes su gzugs so// de ltar rang gi snying gi nang na sangs rgyas kyi spus dra 'bu tsam bAzhugs shing 'khrul snang 'gags pa'i dus su su chen mo nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa/ 'bring po da btsam gyis khengs nas rang 'char ra/
31a5(rnying rgyud): lam 'jigs shig/ de ngo shes pas chog go// gyi gsang ba'i bdag po legs par rung zhig/ rang 'chi khar chos nyid rang snang gi nam mkha' la/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra mngon sum du 'char ro// de ngo shes pas chog go// rang gi
31a6(rnying rgyud): reg pa 'od lnga dang 'du 'bral med par 'grogs pa yin no// ma nu/ sarba/ \u0f7f/ dz+nyAn/ kA ya/ paH/ rigs kyi bu rang la sangs rgyas kyi sku rang la yod pas gzhan du mi 'tshal cig/ sangs rgyas 'od lnga'i lus su bzhugs nas gsapa
31a7(rnying rgyud): 'gri ba dang bral lo// sangs rgyas kyi sprul 'gyur ba med pas skye'iche dang bral lo// sangs rgyas thams cad rang ngo shes pas sangs rgyas pa'i dka' thub dang bral lo// sangs rgyas 'od kyi sra gsapa la rtog pa med pas/ rang la
31b1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin med pa bde ba rgyun chad med par rang gi snying gi nang na bzhugs so// bstan pa thams cad kyi bu gcig pu'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas sku gsum bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / srang thob 'das ca da da/
31b2(rnying rgyud): mi phrad pa tsa ma di nga gang na ya legs 'byung / yangs bcan po chos kyi gnas sngags men/ batha rnam par song ba/ ba las kyi mapa'as brlabs pas/ AM bde bzen go// a ma pa/ lA ye shes nyi ma dang la rung //
31b3(rnying rgyud): chung sa/ ma/ sa ma rgyas bathong ngodo// maHgang nagazhan med pa'o// praH bsgom pa/ gab gso bar dza/ 'o rtags pa'ang ma gapo bar/ nga/ dwa byed pa ma gapor
31b4(rnying rgyud): dag bcos su'i gnas lugs 'gyur ba med cing gsal sri med/ sha 'bras bumi 'gyur ba zang thob med/ man+da/ drag po med pas 'gyur bzed cing thi ba med/ A dbang gi gnas thugs slabasam brjod rdul yin/ saT phraganas grags 'ong su'i
31b5(rnying rgyud): su yod/ 'od la la gsal 'grib med do// gsa' lam 'gags pas 'od lngar dgasal lo// nyas thugs kyi gnas lugs rnam tog thal ba yin/ gye ba med pa 'gyur ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad mes po rang la yod/ 'di'i nang na ye she 'o//
31b6(rnying rgyud): da / kyi srung bam 'do na na pa la yigs 'byung// ngab ta 'dradas/ kyi gas thang bte shi/ dab la babyi'i sa shes padzin/ A zhag mngan chags kyis ma rig pa ga nga gagasang / rig pacom pa su ring/
31b7(rnying rgyud): ga sa' pa'i gas ca po bzhagag/ a no dpa' 'a yin/ ras mngos pa lad/ rang dang gi dngas pa gnas pa thaMd/ ma pa'i nga mthung gas mthod pa tang/ rami gas dam/
32a1(rnying rgyud): su smra dun nachu ma na du /
32a2(rnying rgyud): //
32a3(rnying rgyud): zhe btabs pas prA tha ye shes thayin no// mA khyi mthatha mangs rig nam tog thams cad zang byayin no// byabyan khram/ \u0f7fngo thod gsus kyi sangs rgyas kyi ma ma yin/ zugs thub/ a ta sa/ sangs rgyas dang nga bas can tug byed dzin/ nangon
32a4(rnying rgyud): na'angs rgyas ma shes na 'khor ba yin/ b+hags/ chub shAT mA maHpraSh+Ta/ sam ti/ rom+b+ha nyaM/ rang byas pa yod/ kal/ 'od thugs/ b+h+ri d+ha/ rig pa migs da 'jo bcwags/ ton+da/ yen ston ci/ ting ga
32a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas pa zugs/ braSh+Ta/ badz+ra ma d+ha/ rdo'i mu ben no// ye shes spyan lags la 'brib med pa yin/ bying ma ga parang ngo'i 'khrul ba med pa yin/ a ma la/ kye 'a med pa mnyam nyid/ ma hA/ bcwa sangs rgyas
32a6(rnying rgyud): med pa chen po yin/ kA ya d+ha ma la/ mnyam pa nyid yin/ a byi ba med do/ gsungs nas cang med do// k+ShI gsalal 'chor ba med pa yin/ ngang ngo shes na 'khor ba'i thug bsngal dang bral ba'i snang ba 'di rmil ma dang khyad med de yod ma gyong 'bral snang ji lam
32a7(rnying rgyud): dang wabs bden par mtshan/ dga' ra ba rdo rjes 'di skad ces sbas so// kye kyai sangs rgyas thugs rje can/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal du gsol// ces zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
32b1(rnying rgyud): gas pa 'a sa // rlom gas na/ na byu cig ldan su ngas rdzun kyi pa sa gyur rlo na na/
32b2(rnying rgyud): rma.A hA thAg ta/ gul ban pa ni byu bul rtso/ pa ni thashwashA le nyams yasi/ gsungs nas dgongs pa la gshegs so// na'i sa nyid kyin ma pa ci yon// nam mapa'i dkyil na sbyina'i se 'dzin no// khang pa'i mya
32b3(rnying rgyud): bani dang gi lus yin 'od lnga ling dog lnga yin no// ngo che 'od/ de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces byas so// kye kye sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang / sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul gsum gsung du gsol// ces zhus so// bcom
32b4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis nywa phrul / phywa glan rdo'i khyod ma yengs par nyon cig/ rlung gi zhing gi nang nasangs rgyas 'od la'i thung par bzhugs so// rang gi slong gi dkyil nas des rgyas mi byung 'thubs la spyan kyang bag gang bzlugs
32b5(rnying rgyud): so// rang gi snying gi nang na 'od kha dog lnga'i dkyil nas/ sangs rgyas rgyal ba rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad seng ge dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / shang shang gi gdan dang / chu kha dog lnga dang
32b6(rnying rgyud): ldan pa/ phyag mtshan rdo rje rje rdza ba rnams pa/ nor bu rin po che dang / bad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dang / rdo rje rgya gra ma dang / 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad pa rnams bsdams nas/ rin po che 'dabab ba'i grwa dang /
32b7(rnying rgyud): bya
32b8(rnying rgyud): gi snying gi nang na da lha bzhugs so// rang gi wad pa'i nang na/ sangs rgyas khro bo'i mu badz+ra hi ru ka dang / praH he draka dang / rat+na he ru ka dang / pad+ma he ru ka dang / ka ma he chug dang / khrag 'thung gi lha tshogs thams cad mngon
33a1(rnying rgyud): sum du 'azhugs so// kye gsang pa'i bdag po rang gi gyud pa'i nang na phyag 'thung gi lha tshogs sna tshogs gcer grol du bzhugs so// rang gi lus 'di la sangs rgyas kyi grong khyer nyi khri da
33a2(rnying rgyud): grong kyad na// mod khyer de dag thams cad nasangs rgyas kyi thamams ca ngas nas kyi gams ca kyis kyang nas yod // rang gis ni rnams cad pa bad+mag shegs pa'i thas me napa med de// thegs pa 'an pa
33a3(rnying rgyud): pa nyon la yid la bang shig/ gangs sasu g+ha sa t+palas byung ba'i sman she sa dri ma ma las byung bas maud la dog lnga thug pa 'char ro// de yang 'di sa ste/ kha dog mthong gA dang / dkar po dang / phreng po dang / dam
33a4(rnying rgyud): po dang / yang gyu'o// de bzhin du rang ge steng gi dkyilan bzhugs so// rang 'chi ba'i dus sgra 'od lpags la lnga 'tshang ba/ rang bzhin gyis bzag la nya ma dpra/ saus kwa'i byang thang chen po la/ sdig rgya chub bzhin med med 'ong ngo //
33a5(rnying rgyud): dri lam 'dzegs shig/ 'od zer mtshon cha char pa babs pa 'ja ba'o 'od// de lam thag cigs/ 'od kyi nang thams cad nas chos sted rang sgra 'brug stong snying ba ltar drag la che ba'o// de la mdudrangs shig/ de gsum la mi 'jigs mi dang
33a6(rnying rgyud): mi byed pa de ni sangs rgya su yin no// de gsum la byed 'jigs skrag pa de ni rdzogs ldan sman pa nag po'i rgyal khams zhes bya ba/ nyin mo nyi ma'i sdang ba med/ rngub tso zla ba'i ldang ba med/ nang nub me'i snang ba med pa/ rlung dang char dang mun pa nag/
33a7(rnying rgyud): ma gas pa na/ shin tu sdug bsngal la/ 'khor ba phrin gyi bachu dang 'drabs 'khong zhing 'thams so// des nag dmas pa 'di gnad tsha// 'di ma shes na phan med do// zhes gsungs so// bstan pa thams cad bu gcig pu'i rgyud las/
33b1(rnying rgyud): skad kyi yin nam/
33b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces nus so// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / sangs rgyas kyi mngon rtags gsum sasung du gsol// ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das
33b3(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsal ba/ phyag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas la gnyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyab dang / yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgya ba'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya ba de la/ 'od dang spa dang / gdung dang /
33b4(rnying rgyud): 'od gyen la 'grengs nas/ smras pa'i tshul du 'ong ngo // dbugs chad pa dang / sangs mi rga bar zhag lnga nas sangs rgya'o// 'od 'ang khyim gyi tshul du byung na/ zhag lnga nas brtan pa thob nas sangs mi rgyu bar/ dbugs
33b5(rnying rgyud): padang / la ba sa na rnas sangs rdzun no// gzugs rnapa 'dun nas na// ga / drangs ma pa 'i dang byams pa da// sa nas ma
33b6(rnying rgyud): par sangs rgya'o// ser po byung na/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi zhing khams su skyes nas mngon par sangs rgya'o// gdung kha dog dmar po byung nA/ snang ba mtha' yas kyi zhing khams su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o// gdung kha dog
33b7(rnying rgyud): ljang khu byung na/ don yod grub pa'i zhing khams su bya'o// / kha dog mthing ga byung na/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing khams su sangs rgya ba yin no// sru la gnyis te zhi ba'i sku byung na snang ba 'di 'gags pa dang sangs rgya'o// khro bo'i
33b8(rnying rgyud): rlung mi ga 'anas su thug/ da bdi du dang / brang gang su/ 'i su min// 'phreng pa sa kyi'i mam sa tu kyis badrin pa'i bye /
34a1(rnying rgyud): nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // chu lnga'i gnas lugs gsung du gsol// ces nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa pa/ gAs
34a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag pos zhus pa legs so// rang gi snying gi dkyil na/ dbus rnam par snang mdzad zla mdog mthing g.yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so// rang gi snying gi nub na snang ba mtha' yas yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so// rang gi byang/
34a3(rnying rgyud): na don yod grub pa yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so// rang gi klad pa'i nang na sangs rgyas khro bo'i skus/ khengs nas yod do// rang gi rig pa ma 'gags par gsal ba 'di chos rku yin no// sangs rgyas rgyal ba rigs lnga rang gi snying gi nadra na bzhugs pa
34a4(rnying rgyud): longs sku yin no// rang gi klad pa'i dung khang dkar po'i nang na yod pa de sprul pa'i sku yin no// rang gi klad pa'i nang gi dbus 'od kha dog lnga yod do// 'od lnga'i nang na sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs so// rang gi gzhungs pa'i nang na sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs
34a5(rnying rgyud): so// rang gi lus rtsa'i dra bar yod do// rtsa'i nang na sangs rgyas kyi grong khyer yod do// 'od lnga sangs rgyas kyi rang lus su shes na sangs rgya'o// khug pa lnga shes na dbugs ma chad pa la sangs rgya'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i
34a6(rnying rgyud): zhal nas/ slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje la/ rigs kyi bu ngas 'jig rten gyi khams su rang lo nyi shu rtsa bzhir sprul pa'i sku du bzhugs so// sems can gyi lo stong brgyad brgya lon no// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha' 'od kyis bkang nas phung po lhag ma
34a7(rnying rgyud): med par sangs rgyas so// de dga' ra ba rdo rje brgyal nas/ kye kye kyi hud zer nas skad phyogs bzung bos pas/ de ba rgyal bsangs tsam na sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' chos nyid rang snang gi nam mkha' la ye shes sgyu ma lta bu'i sras byon nas/ phyag
34b1(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa'im na brgyad na/ d+ham+b+ha sa rnam la/ zhes pa'i mthung dang na pa chags pa mdugs nagang 'acig pa'i thog ba sa// da cenas gzigs pasdu ga tsu kye+e gag la ga TI gnas pa gci 'dug sa/ da gsung/
34b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal chems tshig gsum pa zhes bya baphung po lhag ma med par spangs rgya ba 'di 'dug go// der dga' ra ba rdo rjes bltas pas/ dga' rab rdo rje phung po lhag ma med par sangs rgyas so// bstan pa thams cad kyi bu gcig pa'i
34b3(rnying rgyud): kyi sku lA bA shad pa'i leng+ga ste 'dun pa'o// / rdzogs so// dbang porab rtogs pa'i khyang par can la skad cig ma gsum mam/ wal sangs rgyas rgyal/ dang po 'khor bdod nas skyugs/ gnyis bra la/ bden pa mthong / gsum pa
34b4(rnying rgyud): rjeg zhu'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ bzhi pa chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid mthen/ gsal rig pa byugs rdo rje 'byung ngo // tha ma skad cig gsum la sangs rgya'o// zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ snying gi nang na rigs lnga'i sku mngon sum bzhugs so//
34b5(rnying rgyud): ba mngon sum du 'char ro// kye gsang ba'i bdag po gdams pa bstan pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi sku me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin 'char ro// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal chems tshig gsum pa'o// dga' rab rdo rjes thugs kyi dkyil du thos// zhes
34b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje sems de pa'i zhal nas/ dga' ra ba rdo rje ngas 'jig rten gyi khams su/ lo nyi shu lon nas sprul pa'i srung bzhugs so// sems can gyi lo stong brgyad brgya lon no// zhes phung po lhag med du sangs rgyas so// de nas rim par bzud
34b7(rnying rgyud): nas/ lce btsun gyis 'chad pa lhag can du sbas so// de nas lce sgom nag por bton nas/ phyi skor nad skor gsang skor gsum byon no// gsang skor bla na med pa 'bras bu rin po che'i skor 'di mi la byin re skan/ sa ma yA/ nar kan rdzogs so// // rgya rgya rgya/
35a1(rnying rgyud): la/ phya gang gad nga/ us co mas sa te na/ bod skad du/ mnang gang gi dgongs pa rgyal ba'i bka' zhes pa'i rgyud/ sangs cas thod ma 'gyur ba la phrag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis bstan pa'i das ci na/ skal ba
35a2(rnying rgyud): po chen po/ ye shes kyi gzhal med yang na/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba'i dgongs pa la bzhugs so// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpa' longs spyor rdzogs pa'i bu'i zhig khams na
35a3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje rang gi dkyil 'khor/ sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa la bzhugs so// de'i tsho gas ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces lus so// kye sde bcom ldan 'das sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa gsung dugasol/ zhes zhus so// bcom
35a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po khyod ma yengs par nyon cig/ ngas klu dang ye shes 'du 'bral mod pa'i don bstan to// kyu gsang ba'i bdag po sangs rgyas chos kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku dang / ye shes 'od kyi sgra du bzhugs pas mtshan pa'i
35a5(rnying rgyud): gzugs sam mtshan ma'i lus med do// kye gsang ba'i bdag po sangs rgyas kyi sku la mtshan ma'i gzugs med pa de yin no// khyod ma yengs par nyon cig/ rang gi shes rig gi ngo bo stong sa de ba 'di/ dngos po dang mtshan ma ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub par stong sar de
35a6(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa 'di ka chos nyid kun tu bzang mo yin no// rang gi rig pa 'di stong pa pa do tsani stong pa phyung chang du ma song bar/ rang gi shes pa sang nges la leb 'di rig pa kun tu bzang po yin no// rang gi rig pa'i ngo bo stong pa dang / rang gi shes pa thal le ba dbyer med mi phyed par
35a7(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa 'de/ sangs rgyas chos kyi sku yin no// reg pa ma 'gags par gsal ba 'di sangs rgyas su ngo shes nas dang rang gis longs spyod pade/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i su yin no// rang gi shes mas nges la le ba 'di/ sangs rgyas yi na rang gi shes pa dang
35b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas yin no// gzhan la bstan pas gzhan sangs rgyas 'de thugs rje phrul pa'i yin no// bye gsang pa'i bdag par ngadag ri blang gsal la reg geb dregs la ba 'ongs nas kyi slong lta bu shes lda to// reg ma mas 'ad byim dang
35b2(rnying rgyud): shes yin no// rang gi rig pa gsal stong dbyer mi phyed pa'i ngos nas/ mtham pa rjid kyi ye shes yin no// rang gi rig pa der shes kyi shes rab mi 'gag pa'i ngos nas/ so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes yin no// rang gi rig pathogs pa med pa'i sos nas/ bya ba grub pa'i
35b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes yin no// rang gi rig pasal la ba 'di sangs rgyas kyi sku yin no// rang gi rigs ma 'gags par thal leb 'di chos kyi ye shes yin no// sangs rgyas su dang ye shes 'du 'brar med par bzhugs pa yin no// kye gsang pa'i bdag po rang gi shes reg gi ngo bos la le ba'i
35b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas su ngo shes nas/ rang gi rig pa dang la rang bltab de sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa la 'jog pa yin no// zhes gsungs so// mnang ga sbyong gi dgongs pa rgyal ba'i bka' zhes pa 'i'i rgyud las/ sgra dang ye shes 'dra 'bral med pa'i gleng gzhi'i reng snyed ma mo//
35b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces lus so// kye gre bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas su dang ye shes rang 'a ji ltar du bzhugs zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ge gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ sems can thams cad pa rang dzi
35b6(rnying rgyud): mngag dartsal na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sku mdog mthing gar bzhugs so// me long lta bu'i ye shes dkar por bzhugs so// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ser por bzhugs so// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes dmar por bzhugs so// byab grub pa'i ye shes ldang
35b7(rnying rgyud): gung bzhugs so// rang rangage phreng gi dkyil na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mes so/ sangs rgyas 'od kyi phung po chen por bzhugs so// kye gas pa'i bdag po rang gi mingag rdo rje sems dpa'i me long la bcug nas bstan na/ sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba'i bu cham
36a1(rnying rgyud): la dngas pa/ gsal la 'tsher ba/ rang bzhin stug la tha mang ba/ mdzes pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba mngon sum du med med 'char ro// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po/ rang ra gI k+ta dkyil na rig pa kun tu 'azang po'i gdangs la
36a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i kun tu bzang po sku mdog dkar por bzhugs so// chos nyid kun tu bzang mo'i gdangs las/ mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i kun tu bzang mo sku mdog mthing gar bzhugs so// kun bzang yab yum gnyis kyi sku ru rang gi snying gi dkyil na bzhugs so// dbus/
36a3(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad sku mdogs thing ga seng ge'i gdanA la bzhugs pa/ phyag na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bsnams pa/ yum nam mkha' dbyings phyug ma dang / kun tu zhal yab yum zhal sbyar nas/ rang rang gi snying gi dkyi lan bzhugs so// rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog
36a4(rnying rgyud): dkar po phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams pa/ glang po che'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ yum sangs rgyas spyan dang zhal skyong nas yod ngo do// byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / byams pa mi thi gnyis/ sems ma lA se ma dang / sA le ma gnyis kyis bskor nas/ rang
36a5(rnying rgyud): gi tsi k+ta'i shar na bzhugs so// rin chen 'byung ldan su mdog ser po// phyag na nor bu rin po che bsnams pa/ rta mchog gi gdun la bzhugs pa/ yum mA ma kI dang zhal myor nas bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po
36a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis/ sems ma gI rti ma dang / nI rti ma gnyis kyis bskor nas rang rang gi tsit+ta'i lho na bzhugs so// snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po phyag na pad+ma 'dab brgyad brnams pa/ rma bya'i gang na la bzhugs pa/ yu ma gos dkar mo dang zhal sbyor nas yod do//
36a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ngas gzigs dang / 'jam dpal gnyis/ sems ma pe ma dang / bu ma gnyis kyis bskor nas/ rang gi tsi sti'i nub na bzhugs so// don yod grub pa sku mdog lngang gu/ phyag na rdo rje kya gra ma bsdams pa/ nam mkha'
36b1(rnying rgyud): lding gi gdun la bzhugs pa/ yu ma mtshig sgrol mdang zhal skyor nas 'ong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang // sgrib pa rnam par sel ba gnyis/ sems ma A lo ki dang / gaN+DIm gnyis kyis bskyor nas/ rajig sa'i byan na
36b2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// rang gi tsit+taShe shang nakhro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang / skyo ma lcags kyu mi zhal sbyar nas yod do// rang gi tsit+ta'i sgron khro bogashin rje gsheng po dang / sbom zhags pa mazhal gyor nus yod do// rang gi tso/ 'i nub na kho bo ta mgrin dang/
36b3(rnying rgyud): sgo m+b+ha sngags zlog mnal spyod nas yod do// rangag tsona'i byang na gre bo brgyad kyi 'khyil ba dang / sgo mthil bu ma gnyis zhal spyod nas yod do// rang gi 'i dkyil na zhi ba'i thurnams ca su cung 'bru na na la ldan phral thag dang bcas pa tsam du bzhugs so//
36b4(rnying rgyud): rang gi sde gtsug bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyun/ rang bung sangs rgyas dbang pob rgya byin bzhugs so// rang gi skrag pa'i rtsa basmin gyi dralta bu'i nang na/ rang thag bzang ris bzhugs so// rtswa gi sIng gi srog pacu'i shel gyi srubs na/ rang bang gi
36b5(rnying rgyud): thub pa bzhugs so// rang gi sde 'u sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil na/ rang byung gi sangs rgyas rab tu btAn pa bzhugs so// rang gi gsang pa bde bskyed na/ rang byung gi kha'abar ma bzhugs so// rang gi rlung ba'i rtsa bzhag 'khyil ba'i nang ni/ rang byu gi ni bad+ma/
36b6(rnying rgyud): mgo can ba skyugs so// rang gi so/ da kyi la na zhi pa'i ma tshogs bkrugs tshul bstan pa'i len / gnyis pa'o// / segasang ba'i bdag po khro ba'i sangs kyis thams cad dang rang gi klud bdud gi gzhal yas khang na/ rdzong po las me tog byas pa
36b7(rnying rgyud): bcomacan sa sa sa/ ga sa / ga du / dbung byi bral/ breng sa kyi spyod grabs gyu pa/
37a1(rnying rgyud): na dad smya dang/ ma pa/ smra nas sa ga sa na/ gnan yo sa dang/ bdus shes dag/ rnam pag yang mas
37a2(rnying rgyud): sbal 'khril pa/ mgul nas 'khyud pa/ zhal du skyob pa/ rang gi klad pa dung khang gi dkyil na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das dpal praHhe druka su mdog skrag nag/ dbu gsum pa/ g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dam ba/ dbus phyug nag zhabs pa'i gyad kyi dong
37a3(rnying rgyud): skyabs su bzhugs pa/ phyag zag pa/ gAyas kyi dang po na 'khor lo/ bar pa na dgra s+tha/ tha man ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi dang po ni dril bu dang / bar pa na b+han+ta dmar gyis bkang ba/ tha man thong gshol brtsams pa/ yum bud+d+ha kro d+hi smr-i rI ma yab la 'khri' pa/
37a4(rnying rgyud): mgul nas 'khyud ba/ zhal tu stob pa/ rang gi klad pa dung khang gi shar na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das dpal ra t+na he ru ka sku mdo ga ser nag dbu gsum pa/ zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ dbus ser nag/ zhabs bzhi gyad kyi nor stangs su bzhugs
37a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ phyag drug pa/ g.yas kyi dang po ni rin po che 'bar ba brnams pa/ bar ba na kha T+wAM ga/ tha ma na be rngon bsdams pa/ g.yon pa dang po ni dril bu/ bar ba na bAD+ga dmar gyis bkang ba/ tha ma tri shUl dang thong gshol ba rnams pa/ yu ma dang kro rje ma yang
37a6(rnying rgyud): sul 'khril/ mgul nas la khyud pa/ zhal du stob pa/ khu tshur gdengs pa/ rang gi klang pa dung khang gi lho na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma he ru ka spyi mdog dmar nag dbu gsum pa/ zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ dbus
37a7(rnying rgyud): dmar nag la/ zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs su bzhugs so// phyag drug pa/ g.yas kyi dang pon pad+ma/ gar pa ma ba nI ga/ tha ma na dbyug to bsdams pa/ g.yon dang po ni dril \u0f7f/ bar man b+had+hadamang gyis bkang ba/ tha man rje chung bsdams pa/
37b1(rnying rgyud): ba rnamasapa la 'brel ba/ mthul nas 'gyur ba/ ga' sto pa/ gas pa da// the / sa nga zhugasas+ho// bcom ldan 'das dpa // smram+sa dan thagasas la/ shA'agags dka ba/ dang/
37b2(rnying rgyud): dmyang ba/ dbus ldang nag/ zhabs bzhi spyad kyi dong skabs su bzhugs pa/ phyag drug pa/ g.yas kyi dang byon dal mi/ bar pan baT+wAMg/ tha man dbyug to// g.yon gyi dang po ni dril bu/ bad pa nag b+had mar gyis bkang ba/ tha man to
37b3(rnying rgyud): gshol bsnams pa/ yu ma ka makro nI shwa rI ma yab la 'khyil ba/ mgul nas 'khrud pa/ zhal du skyob pa/ bla tshur 'chang ba/ rang rang gi klad bdung khang gi gzhal yas khang gi byang na bzhugs so// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ shar na ko Ta ri
37b4(rnying rgyud): mdakar mo/ phyag g.yas na zhing dbyug thogs pa/ g.yon pa naHb+had mar kyis bkang ba bsdams pa/ ston tsenA ri ser mo// phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ nub na bra mo dmang mo/ phyag g.yas na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'phyang ba/ g.yon paH
37b5(rnying rgyud): dmar gyis bkang ba bsnams pa/ byed na po ti li nAg mo/ g.yas pardo rje bsdams pa/ g.yon pa b+had+ha mar gyis bkang ba bsdams pa/ shang lto mtshams na bug mang ser g.yas ma grum gzengs nas/ g.yon pas nal du 'dzud pa/ lho rnaMm
37b6(rnying rgyud): mtshams na b+ha wA ljang ser/ g.yon pa tha zag gis bkang bab sdams pa/ g.yas pa jigs mdzub 'bar bas 'khrugs shing rim pa'i tshul gyis zhal du skyob pa dang / nub byeng mtshams na tsat+tA'i si pra/ g.yas ni no// brnams pa/
37b7(rnying rgyud): g.yon pas lus ze bdang / phra dgar mtshams na sge gcan sa mthing nas/ mgo lus thal nas za pa dang khrag thug pa yang yod do// gnas kyi ga sung ma bcad po das thag 'thung yum dz+wal bkor nas/ rang gi zad pa du bang gin nga
38a1(rnying rgyud): das mngon sum du thugs so// ba'i rgyu ma la ldan nulag sa nga gi spyad pa nang na 'thugs so// de'i cing ma tha bdug pa gagadun meng ga ma zhuganan lag 'a bAzhis rnam par 'ardol nasu/ 'a du
38a2(rnying rgyud): thogs nas ral ba gsig pa yod do// glang bdung bang gi ston/ b+ha s+t+rI mu la dmang po stag gi mgo can/ lag gnyis thang du badz+ral nas/ mig 'bru phyogs su blta ba dang / mche la gnyer ba yang yod do// nub na sri la mu ba krug na rmi'i mgo da/ lag pa
38a3(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa sra mi thogs pa/ g.yon pa mA maH ni khrag phrag pa yang yod do// byudun phrin mu la skum dog zing nag sbrang mo'i mgo n+dan/ lag gnyis rlo bskyenas mig 'bru tshugs su bstab dang / drug bang gigan skyo mtshams na/ ga ta su la bya rgod mgo can/
38a4(rnying rgyud): mdog dmar ser/ zhing chen phrag la bkal nas/ keng rus lag na thogs pa yod do// dung khang gi lho nub mtshams na/ kaM ka mu la dmar nag kaM ka'i mgo can/ zhing chen 'phrag 'khur ba yod do// drung khang gi nub byung mtshams na sa ba chu kha sgra mdog nag mo gya rog
38a5(rnying rgyud): mgo can/ phyag g.yon pa kuny+tsa thogs pa/ g.yas par la gri bogs pa khro snying zab dang / khrag ldag pa yod do// byang shar mtshams na hu lu mu kha thug pa'i mgo can/ sgra mdog mthing nag g.yas rdo rje thogs pa/ yul gyi seng ha ma bkyad po des/ khrag 'ja
38a6(rnying rgyud): ya ba sngal bskor nas/ rang rang gi slad pa dud khang gi nang nad lta bzhugs so// rta'i mgo n+dan su mdog dkar mo/ phyag g.yas na lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa b+ha b+ha dmar gyis bkang ba bsnams pa/ rang rang gi dung khang gi shar na bzhugs so// phag pa'i mgo can
38a7(rnying rgyud): sku mdog ser mo/ phyag g.yas pa glu ma'i zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa bya rgod kyi mche ba bsnams pa/ phag gdong zhags pa maM dung khang gi lhon bzhugs so// seng ge'i mgo can sku mdog dmang mo/ phyag gnyis lcags klog bsdams pas dbang du sdud pa/
38b1(rnying rgyud): seng gdong lcags srog mdung khang gi nub na bzhugs so// sbrul gyi mgo can gru mdog ljang k+Sha/ phyag na dril bu bsdams pa/ sbrul mgo rdo rje dril bu ma zhes bya ba dang / rang gi dru khang gi byang na bzhugs so// kye gsang ba'i bdag po rang rang gi klad mong du dang rnaM/
38b2(rnying rgyud): gi nang na/ he ru ka drag po'i lha rang byung gi lha sum cu tha ma pa'i phyi rol na klad rgya dang gnyis kyi mtshams na/ dbang phyug ma rnams gnas pa ni/ srin mo srug nag phyag na rdo rje thong khrag bsnams pa yod do// tshangs pa ser mo lag na pad+ma thogs pa dang /
38b3(rnying rgyud): chen dkar ljang rdo rje thogs pa dang / gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang / dga' ba ma ser mo spu gri thogs pa dang / gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phen pa dang / rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu bsnams pa dang / ma bdun shar na bzhugs so// brgya
38b4(rnying rgyud): byin dkar mo rgyu zhags thogs pa dang / zhi ba dmar mo bum pa thogs pa dang / bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma bsnams pa dang / zla ba dkar mo rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / be con ldang nag dbyub to 'phyang ba dang / srin mo dmar mo thong khrag 'thung ba dang / rdo rje ser mor ma'o/
38b5(rnying rgyud): ma zhags pa bsnams pa dang / ma bdun lho na bzhugs so// za ba ljang nag be con thogs pa dang / dga' ba dmar mo khog chen 'dzin pa dang / stobs chen dkar mo dbyug to thogs pa dang / srin mo rdo rje spu gri 'dzin pa dang / 'dod pa dmar mo
38b6(rnying rgyud): mda' gzhu 'gengs pa dang / nor srung ljang mo bum pa 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog bsnams pa dang / ma bdun nub na bzhugs so// rlung lha sngo skya ba dan 'phyar ba dang / mi mo dmar ser bas la shing 'dzin pa dang / phag
38b7(rnying rgyud): nag mo mche zhags sdom pa dang / rdo rje dmar mo zhing chung 'dzin pa dang / sna chen ldang nag thod khrag 'thung ba dang / chu lha sngon mo sbrul zhags bsdams pa dang / rdo rje ldang nag dril bu bsnams pa dang / ma bdun bya ngan bzhugs so//
39a1(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ he ru// drag pa'i lha rang byung gi sku'i rtsal las rang 'char ro// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ zhi ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi snying gi dkyi ldan/ su'ung 'bru rnam pa
39a2(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pa ma 'gags par/ spyan phul thag chad pa tsam du bzhugs so// khro bo'i sangs rgyas thams cad sku nyung 'bu tsam la/ phrin las kyi rtsal ma 'gags par/ spyan phul thag chad pa tsam du bzhugs so// zhes gsungs so// man
39a3(rnying rgyud): drag snying gi dgongs pa rgyal ba'i bka' las rang rang gi lus la sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul bsten pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces lus so// kye kye bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i
39a4(rnying rgyud): sems can gyi sku dang ye shes rang la shar bde de ji lta ba du ma shes pa lags zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ mal gyi tha mar ni ha la/ gos kyi tha mar ni bgos/ zas kyi tha mar ni rba/
39a5(rnying rgyud): skom gyi tha mar ni 'thung / gtam gyi tha ma ni sba ba'i dus der/ rang la 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal drag po 'ong ngo // rang gi dbugs dur dang phyara'agro tshur 'gro byed pa'i dus der/ nye ba dang 'brel pa na re khyod ni nad ded tsug ci rtsed zer ba'i dus su/ nye ba dang
39a6(rnying rgyud): 'brel pas gdung ba'i smre sngags bton to// de tsam na da re sa ngas mi thar pa 'dug btsug byed na snyam pa'i sdug bsngal mi mthod pa yod do// dus sdug cir byas nas bsngags pa las sa snyam nas/ nor rdzas dor ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yod
39a7(rnying rgyud): ngo/ snga ma'i lus mi 'dra bar song nas/ rang gi lag mgo dang kha lce yang mi 'gyur bar song ba'i dus su/ lus kyi nyams so bri ba'i sdug bsngal yod // nga shi nas cir skyen snyam pa'i phung po nyid mtshams sbyar ba'i sdug bsngal drag po mi bzod pa yod do//
39b1(rnying rgyud): gyi gsang ba'i bdag po/ sems can thams cad skyes pa dang nyin mtshan med par tsho chu bas mi sdod par 'gro'o// dA res shi nas 'dir mi song bar mi skrod par 'gro'o// sang nang par mi shi ba'i dpe med pas mgyogs par 'gyu'o// cha med kyi yul du 'gro ga/
39b2(rnying rgyud): las rkus med par 'gro'o// dad tsug byed na skams nas snying mi dga'o// gshin rje'i srungs sar 'gro bas 'jigs pa che'o// skyel ma mi rnyed pas mgon skyabs med do// rang dge sdig gnyis las mi shong bas 'phrang dog go// lam de la thams cad mi 'gro
39b3(rnying rgyud): mi srid pas bzungs med do// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ rang gi sems slob nas 'thon nas/ dbugs sa sgor chad pa'i tshe/ chos nyid dag pa'i snang ba phra la dngas pa/ gsal la 'dzer ba/ rang 'grin bajug pa/ mdzes pa'i 'od zer phyogs bzung 'grong/ @#
39b4(rnying rgyud): ngab sos kha'i thang la/ smig tu chu ba bzhin du me de re/ rang sdang 'od dang spu ru 'char ro// de la ma 'jigs shig/ 'od kyi nang thams cad nas chos nyid kyi dang skri 'brug stong lder ba tsam/ skra grag la ldir che ba/ di ri ba yod do// de la ma dngangs shig// 'od las nged mtshon
39b5(rnying rgyud): cha ba 'babs pa 'jab/ mtshon gyi sna tshogs su zing zing ba yod do// de la ma skrag cig/ kye gsang ba'i bdug po/ nga lta ngom thad na/ sbom sru ji ltar byas kyang / gdams pa dang mi 'phrad pal/ 'od kyis 'jigs so// sbas dngangs so// zer gyis phrag go//
39b6(rnying rgyud): gdams pa'i gnang ma shes na/ 'od dang gusam ma shes ma 'khor ba 'bram mo// glegs pa'i bdag pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' chen pa sa mi sa// su mdo ga sug na/ dbyug sums/ 6gajug pa/ thabs padeb/ zhal gsas dka ba/ zhwa
39b7(rnying rgyud): g.yon dmar ba/ dbus mthing nag la smra'od kyi lung ngor 'bang ba/ sman dgu sdang ni gtug zigs pa/ sprin ma thog bzhin du 'thub/ mche bzang lag ba ba/ aN dang ga 'i ta skad can/ thug pa'i bla chen po zlogs pa/ dbu sbed mar ser gyen du 'phyi'i/
40a1(rnying rgyud): zhing 'jag 'dang blodragam kyis brdzun pa/ thang can gyig rgyun dang / zhing cad cig sa ga zhi dang / smyug gi sham thabs gsal ba/ thal rtson kyis tsham tha dang / dak+ta'i thig dang / bas kang rgyu gas rapa
40a2(rnying rgyud): srul nag dang thod paskam rlon gis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang pon rdo rje 'dzin pa/ bar ba na ra la gI/ tha ma na dgra sta/ g.yon gyi dang po na dril bu/ bar pa na b+ha sna mar gyis bkang ba/ tha mthong gshol bsnams pa/ rgan sgra dang thug tshom dang /
40a3(rnying rgyud): lnga 'brug stong mir ba/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i lugs bla nas ye shes kyi me bar ba/ khrung gis 'degs pa'i gdan la/ brgyang bgram du bzhugs pa lab sum nam skyong ni tra~Mrang gi skad pa jung yang gi gzhal yas khang nas 'dzin nas rang la char // de las
40a4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs shig/ mdang myi shig/ ma skrag cig/ rang gi sangs rgyas dang las shar par shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das phrulapa \u0f89\u0fa4 ma dog mthing nag zhil gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmang ba
40a5(rnying rgyud): dbus sngonag/ yum 'brogro m+b+hi rba drim dpa zhal srung nas/ rang gi klad bdud khang shar nas 'thon nas rang pa 'char ro// da nge shes par rjes la ma 'jigs/ khrag 'thung dri po la ba sum skra mdog seng nag/ ga la gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas
40a6(rnying rgyud): dkar/ g.yon du mar/ dkris ser nag/ yab yum rang gi ngas bang gi lho nas 'thon nas rang la 'char ro// de la ma 'jigs par rang gi sangs rgyas rang la shwar bas shes par gyis shig/ khrag 'thung pad+ma yab yus rang gi dung khang gi nub nas 'char ro//
40a7(rnying rgyud): dri la ma 'jigs shig/ lan 'thung las kyi la ba yus ma dog sdang dgang pa gsum pa/ thag drug pa/ zhal g.yas dkar pa/ g.yon sdugs/ gi da pa bang gi kyang das 'dzin nas la'o// / de la ma 'jigs par spyod pa skyed sa
40b1(rnying rgyud): gI klad pa dung khang shar nas ko'u rI dkar mo/ g.yas zhing dbyug thogs pa g.yon pa b+hAn+ta dmar gyis bkang ba bsdams pa/ dung khang gi skyon tso 'u rI ma ser mo mda' gzhu 'gengs pa 'char ro// dung khang gi nub na phra mo dmar mo/ g.yas pa chu srin gyi rtsal mtshan
40b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa b+har+b+ha dmar gyis bkang ba 'char ro// dung khang gi byang na be ta li nig mo/ g.yas pa sdigs mdzubs kyi rtse la rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'phyar zhing gdengs la/ g.yon pa b+hany+dza dmar gyis bkang po 'dzin pa 'char ro// dung khang gI shar lho mtshams
40b3(rnying rgyud): nas puk+ka dmar ser/ phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis rgyu zhags 'dren pa 'char ro// dung khang gi lho nub nas g+hasma rI sku mdog ljang nag dung dmar phyag gnyis kyis bzung nas 'thung ba 'char ro// dung khang gi nub byang mtshams nas tsaN+Da lI ser skya phyag g.yas
40b4(rnying rgyud): pa tsiN+Da bsnams pa/ g.yon pa zhing chung bzung ba 'char ro// dung khang gi byang shar mtshams na/ sA shan+ti mthing nag zhing mgo lus phral nas stob pa dang / gnas kyi ko'u rI ma brgyad po de/ rang gi klad pa dung khang gi nang nas rang la 'char ro// de la ma 'jigs shig
40b5(rnying rgyud): de'i phyi rim klad bdud khang gi shar nas/ sed+d+ha ser mo seng ge'i mgo can phyag g.yas g.yon thugs kar bskol ba 'char ro// lho na sa b+hA g+h+ri mu kha dmar mo stag gi mgo can/ rdo rje khu tshur dpung khar bsnol ba/ nub nas sri la mu kha wa'i mgo can/ zhing log pa
40b6(rnying rgyud): dral nas rak+ta ldag pa/ byang na shA na mu kha mthing nag spyang mo'i mgo can/ phyag g.yon gyis zhing bzung nas/ g.yas kyis sgrol ba/ sher lho mtshams nas kri ta mu kha dkar ser bya rgod kyi mgo can/ zhing 'phrag la bkal nas g.yon pa b+han+ta rak+ta sa bkang nas 'thung
40b7(rnying rgyud): pa/ lho nub mtshams nas ka ka mu kha dmar nag ka ka'i mgo can/ zhing phrag la khur ba/ nub byang mtshams nas/ kha kha mu kha nag mo byo rog mgo can/ rgyu zhags 'dren pa/ byang shar mtshams nas hu lu mu kha da kar khra 'ug pa'i mgo can/ phyag g.yas lcags
41a1(rnying rgyud): Ta/ g.yon ba b+han dmar gyis bkang bathogs nas/ khrag cem lngagacing ba ba dang / rang briskad pa du yang gi nang na yang pa'i ma men pa byung rang la 'jar// dal su ltung bas na/ dang shA ga shang nas tu dang dadang sa
41a2(rnying rgyud): g.yas lpags kyu/ g.yon tun+ta dmar gyis bkang po/ lto nas phrag gdong zhags pa maser mo g.yas zhags pa/ g.yon bya rgod kyi mche ba/ rngub nas lugs phrog ma dmang mo/ phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags klog bzung ba/ byang nas dril dumanas mo/ g.yas
41a3(rnying rgyud): dril bu g.yon byargyud mar gyis bkang ba/ sgo ma bzhi rang gi bla dbadu du khang gi nang nas 'thon nas rang la 'char ro// de ngo shes par gyis shig/ de'i phyi rim dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad he ruka drag po'i lha rang byung gi sum b+ha'i phyi rol na/ klad rgya dang gnyis kyis mtshams nas
41a4(rnying rgyud): rang la 'char te/ srin mo sdug nag g.yag gi mgo// rdo rje thong khrag bsnams pa dang / tshangs pa ser mo bad+ma thogs pa dang / lha chen dkar ljang rdo rje thogs pa dang / gtogs 'dod sngon mo khor mo 'dzin pa dang / dga' bser mo su bri 'dzin pa dang /
41a5(rnying rgyud): gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'bon pa/ rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu can/ shar gyi ma bdun 'char ro// brgya byin dkar mo nu zhags thogs pa dang // zhi ba dmar mo bum pa 'dzin pa dang / bdud ci mar mo paH/ zla ba dkar mo rdo rje/ bcon lnga sa gang thug to// sbyin
41a6(rnying rgyud): med mar mthong khrag 'thung ba/ rdo rje ser mo nags pa thogs pa/ lho nas bdun 'char ro// zab ldang nag be con thogs pa/ dga' ba dmar mo khog chen 'dzin pa/ stobs chen dkar mo dbyug to 'phyar ba/ srin mo rdo rje spu mi 'dzin pa/ 'dod pa de mar mo
41a7(rnying rgyud): mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ nor srung ljang mo bum pa 'dzin pa/ rdo rje dmar mo lcags kyu thogs pa/ nub kyi ma bdun 'char ro// rlung lha rngon ma pa dan 'gyur ba/ mi mo dmar ser gsal shing thogs pa/ phag yon ga mo mche zhags sdom pa/ rdo rje dmar mo
41b1(rnying rgyud): zhing rlung 'dzin pa/ sna chan ljang nag zong khrag 'thung ba/ rdo rje ljang nag zil bu 'dzin pa/ ma bdun mang nas 'thon nas he ru ka drag po'i sku'i rtsal la/ rang gi glad bdud pang gi nang nas khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brdzud 'thon nas/ rang la 'char bya'i dus rna/
41b2(rnying rgyud): rang gi rig pa'i rang gdangs rang la shar bar ro shes pas/ khrag 'thung gi sku la gnyis su med par thim nas sangs rgyas so// da lto ngo ma spad na khrag 'thung gi lha thams cad gshin rje ru mthong nas khrag 'thung gi lhas 'jigs so// dang nga po// pra/
41b3(rnying rgyud): brgyal lo// rang snang bdud du song nas 'khor bar 'khyam mo// khro bo'i slu bar dor 'char lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ rang snang gi sku dang / ye shes kyi zhing khams ngo shes par gyis shing /
41b4(rnying rgyud): dzin can rnas ba ma'abar ba'i lo ga sang sems 'a dung sa zung ba // dmam pa mthang dag 'od 'dog mapa gar 'gyu // ma ga 'dangs su nim pa cing mdang na cad la bye 'dog cig// ye ge rnam
41b5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa/ phyag na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsnams pa/ yum nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma dang kun tu zhal sbyar nas srur 'char ro// 'byung bas thams cad kha dog dkar por 'char ro// 'od dkar po rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po/
41b6(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ glang po che'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ yum sangs rgyas spyan dang zhal sbyar nas bzhugs pa/ sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / byams pa mi tri gnyis/ sems ma lA s+ye ma dang mA le ma gnyis kyis bskor nas/ sa
41b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi sku drug 'char ro// 'byung ba chu thams cad 'od kha dog ser por 'char ro// 'od ser po rin chen 'byung ldan ser po/ phyag na nor bu rin po che bsdams pa/ rta'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ yum mA ma kI dang zhal phyang nas bzhugs pa/ sems dpa'
42a1(rnying rgyud): ga nang sa ma tho po dang / bam mams ces/ senas sa sa dang / nas gnyis kyis bshang nam/ sangs rgyasa'i klurgyag da/ 'byung bas thams cad bdag dam nga pa nga// 'ad
42a2(rnying rgyud): sra snang ba mtha' las sku mdog dmar po/ phyag na badra 'da' brgyad brtsams pa/ mabya'i gdan la bzhugs so// yu ma gos dkar mo dpa zhal gyur nas yod do// sems dpe'i spyan ras gzigs dang / 'jam dpal gnying / skyems ma be ma dang /
42a3(rnying rgyud): mganyis kyis bskor nas sku drug tu 'char ro// 'byung bachung thams cad 'od ljang gur 'char ro// 'od ldang gang don yod grub pa gru mdog lda su/ phyug na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa/ shang shang gi gdan la bzhugs pa/ mAm dmachog grol ma dang / sems dpa'
42a4(rnying rgyud): drug gan rje dang / grib pa nam par sel ba gnyis/ sems ma A lo ka dang / bAn tem gnyis kyis bskor nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa su drug 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi smrab bzhing yang 'char ro// na la shang / gshin rjegashed te/ lpags glog mdu/
42a5(rnying rgyud): jil bum byang nas 'char ro// phar gyin dzuzhwa las/ thub pa drug tu 'char ro// gri gtsug nas pa rgya byin/ sdug pa nas thugs bzang ris/ srog pa rtsa nas kyA thub/ lci ba nas seng ge rab btan/ gsang ba nas kha 'bar ma/ rkang mthil nas glang mgro can
42a6(rnying rgyud): 'chang ngo ro// thabs shes shA thag med pa las/ glan pa nga ya la ma dzong // 'ongs su zhib tu rtsa gnyis/ rlung gi rdzas las 'char ro// segs pa'i bdag po/ de da ge spang pa ma shes su shes pa gyis shig/ ba po zhi ba'i
42a7(rnying rgyud): thugs bstan pa'i len sa pa'o// zhi ba'i sru dang khro bo'i bruche pa rnam mkha'i mtha' dang sarnas pa/ 'bring po rabatsas nas/ tha ma chung 'grus mgyis khengs nas 'char ro// zhag rdza bar ldang sridagasas thams cad 'od dang thus /
42b1(rnying rgyud): snang ba thams cad 'od dang srur shar bde/ rlung gi rig pa'i gdangs su shes pas/ rang 'od la gnyis su med par thim nas tshad// rigs kyi bud kya ngom smad na/ zhi ba'i sramago po nag por 'char ro// zla ba'i lhag shin rdzongs kyi rgyal por shar nas/
42b2(rnying rgyud): rang snang bdud du song nas 'khor bar 'khyam mo// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ rang snang ngom shes na bskal par chos byas kyang sangs mi n+ya'o// rang snang ngo ma shes na shi ma thag tu chos nyid kyi bar dor/ gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i sgrar 'char ro// gshin
42b3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po sku che ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ 'bring po ri rab tsam pa/ tha ma nyung 'bru tsam pas/ ya sos mamachu mnan pa/ mig shel mig tu bzlog pa/ sgra spyi bor bcings pa/ gsus pa che la ne rtsa thA ba/ lag na khram shing thogs pas kha nas myong song
42b4(rnying rgyud): sgra spogs pa/ ma pa sdug pa/ khrag 'thung ba/ chu ser 'jib pa/ nus pa mur ba/ mgo lus 'bral ba/ snying 'don pa dang / de lta bus 'jig rten gyi khams 'ongs rong ngo // de'i tshe lhan cig gyes pa'i 'dres sdig pabras tshad bsags nas ni bu dang po
42b5(rnying rgyud): bgrang du yod do// lhan cig skyes pa'i lhas dge ba byas tshad bsags nas rde'u dkar po bgrang ngo // de'i dus su rang shin tu bred pa/ dngangs pa/ skrag pa 'dar ba byas nas ngas sdig pa'i rnam smin lar ma byas zer nas brdzun zer du 'ong ngo // der gshin rje chos
42b6(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal po ni re/ ngas las kyi me long la dri yis zer nas/ las kyi me long bstan pas/ dge sdigs thams cad me long nang nas bkra lam me gsal bar byang bas/ gshin rjes rke la thags pa btags nas drung ngo // de 'dreg snying 'don/ rgya ma gzeng /
42b7(rnying rgyud): thang ba phrag/ saT/ khrab 'thung / rus bcur kyad/ zhag ga khyer mi 'dud// sras dram bung bathams kya rang ngams// 'ang gadrubs pas shin tu krug bsngal chab lag sa // de nag srid pa'i bar de la dbang ba tshang ba/
43a1(rnying rgyud): lanasunan tu / na
43a2(rnying rgyud): ba nga / sa nga / sa
43a3(rnying rgyud): pa sa
43a4(rnying rgyud): na sa
43a5(rnying rgyud): na tu su pa
43b1(rnying rgyud): 'gang pa sa gsum / 'dug pan sapa la ma ba nag sgrugam sa sa na na/ das
43b2(rnying rgyud): dang gsum/ ngan srong ni gsum ste/ dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dradu 'gro dang gsum mo// dmyal ba la gsum ste/ tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad// grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad/ nyi tshe nye 'khor ba'i dmyal ba gnyis ste gsam mo// tsha ba'i dmyal ba rgyad pa/
43b3(rnying rgyud): gos dang / thig na gi dang / bzlas 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / nga 'dod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsa ba dang / man mang ba'o// sdug brdal la bzod pa'i brags med pa la yun ring por// yang sos la/ ri lug gi sa dong ba can nam/ seng ge'i
43b4(rnying rgyud): pa lta bu gnyis kyi bar du 'joms pa'o// thig nag la sto rgyab nas thig btab nal yog les 'dra'o// bsdus 'joms la/ lcags kyi zangs kyi nang du bcug nas/ nam mkha' nas lcags kyi bro chen gyis brdung ba'o// ngu 'bod ni/ lugs kyi khang sprom 'bar bar bcug nas/
43b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs thams cad nas las kyi rlung gis me thar ro// ngu 'bod chen po ni lus la chos ma reg pa tsam du sgeg pa'o// tsha ba ni lus la me 'bar ba'o// rab tu tsha ba ni/ glo snying la me 'bar ba'o// mnar med pal/ lus rengs pa me 'bar zhing phyogs thams cad nas theg pa'o/
43b6(rnying rgyud): rgyu na ring ba ni/ lcags kyi ri la lo brgya 'argyal/ bya'i gshog pa reg pa res drang ba la/ lugs kyi'i zad pa dang / yong sos kyi tshe zad pa'o// brang ba'i dmyal ba ni/ chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol ba n+dan dang / a u ber ba dang / kyi phud zer ba dang /
43b7(rnying rgyud): thim tham pa dang / badz+ra ltar gas pa dang / badz+ra ltar cher gas pa dang / u t+pal lta gas pa'o// du bung can la lugs kyi khang par bcug nas khang pa de tshag ma bzhin du yod ba la phyogs thams cad nas las kyi rlung gis bus pas/ rang gi lus la chu bur marje thong tsam
44a1(rnying rgyud): na ga // ga sa sus ma zhesasu
44a2(rnying rgyud): na pa'o// so mam pal/ so mamagal la zag nas skad tsas yang mi thon pa'o// bany+tsa lta rags pa la cu byur rgya ga mjugs pa'o// badra ltar me gas pa la/ su bla dgas pa pyir rtogags song ba'o// AN+Dal ltar skyes pa la/ yu la dertsa ban
44a3(rnying rgyud): tog bye ba dang 'dra bar/ thams cad par la gogs nus rgyu gyis kyis zungs bya mis 'brel ba'o// rgyun ring ba ni ti la sbyangs cher po gang la/ lo brgya brgyal te lajog mar lung la til zad pa'i tshen/ chu bud can gyi me zad pa'o// gzhan ma rnams gong ma gong
44a4(rnying rgyud): bas 'og sa gis 'gyur gyi tha ba'o// nyi 'khor sri la bzhi gang phyogs kyi s+ho nas semar srung kyi dus// ston pal tsha kyi myor bzed/ thab na phyogs kyi 'dam/ nga nang pam po ma'i nags mal la// me ma du'i shAs la/ grags
44a5(rnying rgyud): pa de zho tshe ba sum saM mus nas phyir byung bas sgo byams cad me yi sra bskor nas/ rlung gi sdug bsngal bas 'di dra shin sham nas/ me'i 'obs pa 'amongs pas/ lus thams cad dus par grol gyis 'gro'o// thal tshun gyi chu bor ba med ni/ thal tshan gyis zher/
44a6(rnying rgyud): paman chad rgyal gyis 'gro ba lagal ba'o// ro phyogs kyi 'ad 'ani/ 'dam chen po zlas mo man ldad gyi ngas kyis 'grob la ba na la bas/ srin bu lcags kyi mgukun gyis rkang rtsal gyis gtong ba'o// nags tshal la khri'i lo min/ tshad pas gzungs pa/ naga'i
44a7(rnying rgyud): 'ad drug pa zin du byin pas/ lo mthams cad 'bring song nas/ lus la 'dab ba'o// spun ring banib kyi ba la 'de thub bo// yi gsal ba ni/ phyi'i sgrib pa cad dang / nang gi sleb pa can dang / 'o/ nga can gyi sgrib pa can dang / sdo mthun gyi sle ba pa can no//
44b1(rnying rgyud): phyi'i bya na la/ baba' babyung thams cad nag zag tu mthong ba'o// rang gron du la sar sgrubs pas lan padzin no// ma sgrib pa bzhin/ kha khyab kyi mig cam la/ rma gsusung tsam lnga/ spro ba ri rab cam yod pas/ snyomi rnyed pado// sted bu na
44b2(rnying rgyud): bag tsam shong yang phan mi thogs pa'o// gzhan gyi nor la ser rtswa byas pa las byung ba yin no// sgo/ khung kyi rmib pa can ni// kha khab kyi mig tsam la zas par 'gro mi 'dod/ len re song ba de yang lcags kyi bu lum du song nas/ mar la mthon me bar du khong du sreg pa'o//
44b3(rnying rgyud): mchog gi dkor dang glad la 'bag pa las byung ngo // spyi mthun gyi sgrib pa ni/ zas mtshon ma thogs pas bsungs nas zar mi ster ba'o// ser sna dang phongs pa byas bcom las byung ba'o// rgyun ring ba ni mi'i lo lnga stong thub pa'o// dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal la gsum te
44b4(rnying rgyud): nying sha nying gis za ba'i sdug bsngal dang / gsad gcod kyi ldog bsngal dang / 'bol grod kyi sdug bsngal lo// nying ga nying gis za ba ni/ che ches chung chung bsad nas za ba'o// bsad gcod kyi sdug bsngal ni/ mabs lhag pa byas pa 'og tu bcug nas
44b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// 'khol gyod kyi sdug brdal ni/ bskul ba ko mthil tsam gyi steng du/ re ba bskrad nas khal bzhi bzhi tsam 'gel ba la sogs pa'o// kyun ring ba ni bar gyi bskal ba tsam thub po// ngan so gsum ni/ dud 'gro stong 'gyur gyis mang ngo // yi dwags de
44b6(rnying rgyud): pas stong 'gyur gyis mang ngo // de bas dmyal ba stor 'gyur gyis mang ngo // kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ dper na chu thams cad bur la 'gro bas mi log par/ rgya mtsho la mang la/ ri rtse la nyung ba bzhin du/ sems kyang chu dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs ngan so
44b7(rnying rgyud): mang bar grub po zhes gsungs so// man ngag snying gi dgongs pa rgyal ba'i bka'i rgyud las/ rang snang ngom shes pas/ 'khor ba ngan song du 'khyam pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye bcom
45a1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ma rig mun pas bsgribs nas su/ rang sdang bdud du 'gyur ba yis// ngan song gnas su 'khrul lugs ji ltar lags// 'khrul pa zlog na ci ltar brlob// ces zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
45a2(rnying rgyud): sprul pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ legs par nyon cig/ ngas bshad do// 'khor ba de 'khyams pa'i sems can gyi// 'khrul pa'i lam gyis dus nyid na// rtsal sdang sgo lnga 'od du mthong // mthong pas bag chags rab tu skyes// de nas 'dod cha
45a3(rnying rgyud): zhes su 'khrul// rig pa bzhi la lhan gyis song // rang spang mtshan nyid ma shes pas// de la zhe sdang rab tu kyis// des na zhe sdang zhes su 'khrul// gnyis su med par me shes pas// des na gti mug ces su 'khrul// de lang dang nga'o sbyim pa'i yul du
45a4(rnying rgyud): bzung // de nas nga rgyal zhes su 'khrul// nga rgyal cha las khong khro thung // 'gyu ba'i sgo la 'dod chags byung // mngal du bgrims pas mo ru 'khrul// gti mug sgo las gnyis kar bzung // mngal du 'grims pas ma ning 'khrul// pho mo ma ning de nas
45a5(rnying rgyud): chags pa skyes pas yi dwags dang // zhe sdang las ni dmyal ba dang // gti sug las ni byol song dang // khong khro thag dog lha min lha// drug lnga phyis pas 'gro drug 'khrul// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ dug lnga sgo lnga las byung ngo // sgo lnga sdang
45a6(rnying rgyud): ba ma 'gags pas// 'od la chags pas gzugs kyi phung por 'khrul// nyams su myong bas tshor ba'i phung por 'khrul// dkar dmar lnga ru phye bas 'du shes 'khrul// mngal du chud pas 'du byed phung por 'khrul// sgo lnga chags pas rnam shes
45a7(rnying rgyud): phung por 'khrul// de nas mngal nas 'grims pa'i tshe// rig pa rig gsal ma 'gags pas// spang ba sal gyi ma byung bas/ 'byung ba sngar ming thogs pas/ zhe sdang sgo las chags pa rnam shes phung por 'khrul lo// kha dog sna tshogs
45b1(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'od// thams cad 'dus pa'i rtags chen yin// 'dod chags sgo las sgra gcig byung // da ltar na ba'i rnam shes 'khrul// gti mug sgrol dri gcig byung // da lta sna yi rnam shes 'khrul// thams cad sgo las ro gcig zung // da lta le yi
45b2(rnying rgyud): shis 'khrul// lhun grub sgo las reg tu byung // da lta lus kyi rnam shes 'khrul// de yang ji ltar 'khrul zhe na// zag pa las sbrul du 'khrul ba// mtho yi yid las mir 'khrul ba/ sdig chu las ru ru 'khrul pa lta bur la rgyal lo// dag sa la du
45b3(rnying rgyud): TI ldang ba med kyang / rab rib can gyis sbrul du mthong ba'am/ la'i mtha yong la ming mgrub ste/ sems trog can gyis sla ru bzung ba'am/ smyig rgyal chu ru 'khrul ba ni// ri dwags kyi rgyal po dur bya ba de la/ mche ba rnam pa gsum dang ldan te/ gnyid ce
45b4(rnying rgyud): brjed pa che ba/ skom dang che ba'o// skom dang che bas rgya mtsho la chu 'thungs so// gnyid che bas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du rgyab gtad nyal lo// skom dang che bas gnyid sad pa kha skam/ brjed pache bas rgya mtsho drung na yod pa brjed/ mdun gyi sdig tu bsnyegs pa
45b5(rnying rgyud): zhomabrir shi'o/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ khyod ma yengs par nyon cig/ de 'khrul pa bzlog na/ zag bcas kyi srung po 'di/ mgar ba'i lag gis byis pa'i me long gis gtarnal 'bebs pa ltar/ zag pa med pa'i se shes/ bcom ldan 'das dpal sna ba
45b6(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas kyi/ thugs las rang byung ba'i rin po che/ shel gyi mchod rten khri 'phang lnga rang byung ste/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' thugs kyi spros pa chod do// de nas 'dzam bu gling yongs su mthong ste/ de nas ri ma la ya'i tshe la bebs so// dgra bcom pa
45b7(rnying rgyud): brgya'i thugs kyi spros pa tshad do// de nas ri bu rgod po'i rtse la babs so// paN+Di ta lnga brgya'i thugs kyi spros pachod do// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su 'thor te/ las can gyi gang zag/ rdo rje 'chang gi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams la/ thugs rje rang thung du 'gro ba'i
46a1(rnying rgyud): don ston pa/ rngan po rje man she 'dzim dang bral ba 'di bstan gyi/ don dmachos sgyu ma yin te/ dpa 'di ci 'ang ba bzhin zhes pa gyis shig/ zhal 'di la kyi nang med pa pa dan/ chos sul gyi nang med pa drug
46a2(rnying rgyud): par gyis shig/ 'di la mdun rgyab med pa bzhin du/ chos kyi skul mdun rgyab med par gyis shig/ 'di la steng 'og med pa bzhin/ chos kyi sprul steng 'og med par shes par gyis shig/ 'di la mtshan nyid lnga ldan du gsal ba bzhin du/ chos kyi sprul mtshan
46a3(rnying rgyud): nyid lnga ldan du shes par gyis shing // kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ phyi rabs kyi gang zag rnams la/ bar de bzhi'i gsang lam phye la ston cig/ 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ zag pa med pa'i ye shes bzhugs pa/ me long gsum gyis gtan la 'bebs te/ nang
46a4(rnying rgyud): gsal du 'char ro// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ rang bzhin gyi bar do dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bar do dang / rmi lam gyi bar do dang / chos nyid kyi bar de bzhi la ngo spod ngo do// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ rang bzhin gyi bar do la/ zab mo'i don bstan
46a5(rnying rgyud): nas/ dA phug ma 'phrad lta bu'i gdams ngag bstan te/ dper na gang zag bza' mi gnyis 'dus nas/ skyes pa de ni shi/ bud med de la lus la bu gcig skyes so// de skyes pa dang ma dang bral te/ phyi mes kyis gsos pas/ ma dang bral nas
46a6(rnying rgyud): shin tu nyon mongs so// dus lan cig yul deng lhad mo zhig yod pas/ mi thams cad ltad mo la chas so// mi thams cad rgyan 'dogs rta zhon byed pa khor yang chas so// ltang mo'i sar slebs pas mi thams cad ltad mo lha bza' ba ster ba za byed pas/
46a7(rnying rgyud): mi thams cad la pha ma 'dug pas/ kho la pha ma med de/ nga'i pha ma med do// nga'i pha ma zhig gang du song na snyam ste/ pha ma'i sdug bsngal shang ngo // de thos mabaza' ba ster ba yang med pas/ lam 'phrang gcig la bsdad do//
46b1(rnying rgyud): de'i ma de yang bu tshol ba la/ de ring mi thams cad tshogs pas nga'i bu de dang yang 'phrad dam snyam ste/ lam de la stod smad gnyis gshibs te 'jug go// de ru mi rgyus yod pa gcig byung ste/ des sbas pa dus de rid byed ma smad kyang 'jom 'dug byas te/
46b2(rnying rgyud): gyi ma smad bral ba'i lo rgyus bshad pas yid ches te/ ma dang bu ru 'phrad do// kye gsang ba'i bdag po dpe de bzhin du/ lhad mo yod pa dang 'dra ba'i phye chus na 'chi'i sdug bsngal la/ nar+tha shed rogs shing dang / khyim mchos ldag 'og shi ba dang / mthong ba'i
46b3(rnying rgyud): dus der/ chos min bcis kyang mi phan pas/ phra ma dang 'dra ba'i mis chus can dang 'dra ba'i bla mas rang la chos su ji ltar du yod pa de/ ngo spod rnam pa bzhis gtan la phab ste bstan pas/ dpe 'jo sprod pas ngo shes/ rtags la ngo sprad pa
46b4(rnying rgyud): yid ches/ don la ro smad pas zag chod/ tshig la ngo spang bas 'khor 'das kyi shan byed do/ dpe la shel rtags la rang chas/ don blon ma/ tshig rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal chems so// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ de ngo shes/ ra
46b5(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes sA shes thag chod do// man ngag sgying gi dgongs pa rgyal ba'i bka' las/ rang bzhin gyi bar do la zab mo'i don bstan nas/ dA phug ma dang phrad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ ting
46b6(rnying rgyud): nyams len gyi bar dro la/ ye shes ro yis 'dzin pa/ sgeg mo me long lta bu'i gdams dag ni dben chung sgeg mo lang tshol bab pa/ me long la blta zhing phyi ba dang byed do// las can gyi gang zag de yang / gdams ngag la yang dang yang du ngan pa
46b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'o// de yang dang yang du gsor byed pa/ de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang shas so// ting nge 'dzin gyi bar do bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / rmi lam gyi bar do la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ni/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ dper
47a1(rnying rgyud): su/ ma ma na na dums na/ na sas na
47a2(rnying rgyud): pa migacig/ bdas sa bla 'ab brtan pa labed da ban ma na/ de lam tha du pan pa'i mitheg tu can pa/ sa ba'i 'anag nyid bye dpe ngayin pa la/ yin pa dgas pa
47a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sring kyi gang bad pa byams/ chos da sbyin nas na pa pa'i zhing zhin/ 'a nas ba / na/ na ba/ la'argyang byungs \u0f7f/ du baphrul la la la // nga su
47a4(rnying rgyud): nimi sa sa po ga sa gdus su/ @
47a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa lte dang rdza'i tshul/ sa mi sbyong bteg pa lta bu/ nyi ma 'bum pas rtag pa'i bad+ma'i dbus rnyeg / r-i da pajos stong na'i ngos nas chos kyi dbyings kyi sa shas/ ye shes de'i rang gdangs 'ang kha dog mthing gar gsal lo// de'i 'das bu
47a6(rnying rgyud): gsug lnga brtan du shang ba'i bya/ bcos ldan 'das dpal rnam par da mdzang/ chom nyid mi 'byu ba rtags su/ mdog mang / na bye gongs pa ches nyid lce ba med pa'i tshong rje 'dus pa'i gas su/ zang chub mchog gi phyag \u0f7f/
47a7(rnying rgyud): sa 'gas ga pa ga la ngas/ thags sa mas 'dus pa/ rnams thas kyi rgyas sa da rgyal ga / tshogs pa sa
47b1(rnying rgyud): sbru la nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis mgos pa'i rtags su pad+ma'i gdan no// de'i steng du thabs shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i brda' ru/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs so// 'khor na tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i brda' dra/ rigs bzhi'i sangs rgya
47b2(rnying rgyud): kyis bskor te/ sku mdog dgongs pa brda' yis mtshon pa/ tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor du gsal lo// shar gyi padz+ra'i 'dab ma la/ rig pa rang bzhin gsal ba'i me long lta bu ye shes/ ye shes de'i rang gdengs/ 'od la dog dkar por gsal
47b3(rnying rgyud): lo// de'i 'bras bu gzugs brgyan du shar ba'i sku/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'/ chos kyi sku dri ma med pa'i brda' ru/ sku mdog dkar po/ sa yongs su rdzogs shing non pa'i brda' du/ sa gnon gyi phyag rgya/
47b4(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i ye shes las 'gyur ba med cing / sU lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i brda' du/ phyag mtshan rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsdams pa'o// thabs shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i brda' ru/ yum sangs rgyas sman dang gnyis su med pa'o//
47b5(rnying rgyud): skyil krung du bzhugs shing / mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'o// gdun ni chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i rtags su glang po che'i gad na no// de'i steng du nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis mgos pa'i brda' du/ pad+ma gdan dang nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs so//
47b6(rnying rgyud): de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yab kyi thabs 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi cha 'dzin pa'i sems dpa'i gnyis su shar/ de yang sa'i snying po g.yas na bzhugs/ byams pa'i ji g.yon du bzhugs so// yum sangs rgyas spyardo DI shes rab 'gyur ba med pa'i
47b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa/ sems ma gnyis su shar de/ lA s+ya zheg mo mdun na bzhugs so// buSh+pe margya ba na gzhugs so// tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor du rang gsal lo// spro'i bad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ rang rig pags la stong ga'i
48a1(rnying rgyud): med pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ ye shes de'i rang gdangs/ 'od kha dog ser po drugasal mo// de'i 'bras bu gzugs pa rgyan kyi phu dragasal ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rin chen 'brung na
48a2(rnying rgyud): gsal te/ de yang yon tan rin po che du mas rgyas pa'i rtags su/ sku mdog ser po// 'gro ba sems can la thugs rje 'byung ba'i rtags su/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya ban rig pa rang byung gi ye shes la/ yon tan rdzogs med du 'byung ba'i brda 'ju/
48a3(rnying rgyud): phyag mtshan nor bu rin po che bsnams pa'o// thabs shes rab 'du 'bral med pa mtshon pa'i brda' ru/ yum chu mA ma kI dang gnyis su med par bzhugs pa'o// gdA na ni 'khor ba'i chos nyid klong du thol ba 'am/ bskyod pa'i badz+ra 'du/ rtamachog
48a4(rnying rgyud): bsnol ba'i gdan no// skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags/ pad+ma nyi khwa'i gdan no// de yang yab kyi thabs 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi cha 'dzin pa/ sems dpa' gnyis su shar te/ kun tu bzang po'i g.yas na/ nam mkha'i snying po g.yonan
48a5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// yum gyi shes rab 'gyur ba med pa'i cha 'dzin pa/ sems ma gnyis su shar te/ mA le me tog gi phreng ba can mdun na/ d+hU pe ma rgyab na'o// tshom bu'i dkyil du rang gsal lo// nub kyi pad+ma la rigs pa'i shes rab 'gag pa med pa
48a6(rnying rgyud): sa sor rtogs pa'i ye shes/ ye shes de'i rang gdangs/ 'od kha tog dmar por gsalalo// de'i 'bras bu gzugs brtan du shar ba'i sku/ bcom ldan 'das dpal snang ba mtha' las sngags la te/ thugs rje 'gro ba'i don lachags pa'i brda' du/
48a7(rnying rgyud): dasas pa sa bye dad tsho nyid pa 'du su gag ga sa pa gas pan pa rnanas byung byas mags pa 'ang/ mas cadapa'
48b1(rnying rgyud): mings shes rab 'dra 'bral med pa'i brda'as/ yum mgos dka ma dang gnyis su med ga'o// gdan na sra ba don mang da pal mangs pa'i brda' du// ma brdol ba'i gdanano// da'i ltung nga 'thor ba tan mangs pa'i phyid kyis mags pa' bar du
48b2(rnying rgyud): bad+ma'i gradan no// thabs shes gnyis su med pa'i bar 'dra/ nyi zla'i gang po// de bang sra kyi 'i phreng / mtshan dang dpe thang kyis brgyan pa/ yab kyi babs 'gag pa med pa'i ba/ sems dpa' gnyis su shang te/ 'ja ma dpal g.yas na'o//
48b3(rnying rgyud): nas gzigs g.yon no // yus kyi shes rab 'gyur ba med pa'i ma 'dzin pa gnyis su shar te/ A ma~M kaM snga gas la 'bul ba'i lham mdunan/ gI ti mra'i mchod pa 'phrul brgya ba na // chom cu'i dkyil lader du rang gsal lo// byang gi brji 'dab ma
48b4(rnying rgyud): shes kyi thogs pa med ti rtsa bathu ba bye shes/ ye shes de'i gdang / 'di la dan ldang badrags la mo// de'i 'thas bu gzugs parnyad kyi phreng shi nga/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'don yo thabs/ phru mdog 'ang zhung gsala'o// grag+sas rjes skyems
48b5(rnying rgyud): can myo don la spobs pa'i brda'adra/ rin po che'i rgyan du mas brgyan po'o// mtshan dum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byed pa rang po brgyad cus bcan pa/ gdan ni sngon gyis mgos pa parji'i gdan dang / thabs shes rab 'dra 'bral med pa nyi sla'i gad 'o//
48b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i don rdzogs pa med pa mdzad pa'i brda' dra/ shang shang bsgrol pa'i gdun no// de yang la bdon yod grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i brda'/ sems dpa' gnyis su shar te/ rdzag na rdo rje g.yas na/ sgrib pa rnas sel ga yon na'o// yum ci shes
48b7(rnying rgyud): 'gag pa med pa'i cha 'dzin pa/ sems ma gnyis su ga te/ de yang gtim tha'i mchod pa 'bul ba mdun na/ gan na madro'i mchad pa 'dul pa rgyab 'o// tsam bu'i dkyil 'khor du rangagasal lo// rtsegs pa'i bdag po/ tshang rje
49a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa / gas/ na / na na ma
49a2(rnying rgyud): chags rna ma gdas/ zhags pa ma ston/ thags thog sa na/ zil bum thang chu // rjem khyen pa 'dra/ pa po byed pa da nga hU~M/ ga tu gsalalo// de'i babs shese bya 'ag sa
49a3(rnying rgyud): bzang po/ shes rab ma 'gags pas/ yum kun bzang mor gsal lo// chos srung stong rgyal zhi ba'i la tshogs su gsal lo// chos su rigs la N+Dal/ khra bo'i lha tshogs khrag 'thung lnga du rgya babyad du 'char ro// rtse gsang ba'i bdag //
49a4(rnying rgyud): dper na bum pa'i nang gi sku ltar ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs par 'char ro// mdzod wu las phyag rjor/ ljags las 'jam dpal/ mgrin pa spyan ras gzigs/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang las 'char te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
49a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes sku ste rang byung // ye shes mig can ji ma med// ye shes snang ba lngas me ba// skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// skad cig gtsug gis kye zag byed// gnyis med do gcig tshul chung dag bzhin/ larnga ro ro bzhin thams
49a6(rnying rgyud): gcig gis dang // rdzi thams cad dang rtswa snang ba thams cad dang spang / dpe na mi sngar 'dzis pa shin tu gzugs pa gnyis 'ad la/ de gnyis san ring 'dral bang / 'brang gcig la 'dom na/ shes brdzun no/ rje gas pa'i bdag po/
49a7(rnying rgyud): la dug pa da nas 'a / gag / su gyur/ ma /
49b1(rnying rgyud): ma thal gdangs pa/ gsal la 'byor ba/ rang bzhin bag pa/ nyas ba/ sos kwa'i tha kAl/ thig tu chub bzhin du mer mang du/ de ltar nyams su cang shing gas shing 'dris par gyis shog// rtsegs pa'i bdag sa/ tha~Mbs dun n+da
49b2(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi brda'o// dpe 'dra 'baphrul/ me long gsum thugs nyams su byung ngo // chos nyid kyi ba da bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ dbang po tha ma'i gang zag gcig/ b+he shi 'jigs
49b3(rnying rgyud): pa las sgrol ba lA/ ba'od gnyis lhag par bstan te/ zhes 'chi ba'i tshe/ lus kyi cha lugs d+he'i/ mdzes pa'i mdangs shar ro// sa tshul bris pas/ lus mi theg stobs shor/ chu me la thim pas/ ba lA skam/ me nang ladzi
49b4(rnying rgyud): pas/ lngas kyi drod shor/ rlung nam mkha' la thim pas/ shes pa rdib tu chad/ thib thib pa'i dus dang / tha ma gdams ngag can gcig gis/ gdams ngag btab nas byas na/ bai ma rig bral ba dang / sngar gyi gdams ngag gi gnad kyis/
49b5(rnying rgyud): dper na mi gzig gis/ rdzas kyi rnam pa gcig padu mdzod cig tu bzhag pas/ sa ni grod mun pa la len dgos na/ sgro na me bteg nas sbyin na/ mi rdzas dang 'brad de/ me med na mi 'phrad do// dpo de bzhin du/ shes brdib pa'i dus /
49b6(rnying rgyud): gsal btab na rang snang du thag chod do// de ni skye shi'i bar do la/ mi gsal bas gsal bar byed pa/ mun khung du sgron me btegs pa lta bu'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ti la ka gu r+b+ha a ti na Dan tra nA ma/ bod skad du
49b7(rnying rgyud): thig legs pa pa'i ba rje rgyud ces bya / dpal rdorje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis rjes pa'i dris gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po / mo'i 'bar ba'i rtsomo/ sril bul du brjod kyis brgyan pa'i gnas na
50a1(rnying rgyud): mong gi 'khor/ dga' rab rdo rje la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i 'khor/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// de ya tsha/ bcom ldan 'das brjod bral
50a2(rnying rgyud): pabana'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs don ched du// ting nge 'dzin la ma mnal bar// brda yi rim pa gsung du gsol// ces zhus so// de nas
50a3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das brjod bral gyi ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ blo ldan rnams kyi don ched du// zab mo'i brda' chung ngas bshad nyon// ces gsungs so// thig legasang ba'i brda' rgyud las/ rdzing gzhi'i le'u nye dang
50a4(rnying rgyud): po'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang / gzhi yi 'dul tshul brda ru gsung / zhes zhus pas/ ston pas gsungs pa/ sngon yul rang gsal bde ba can zhes bya ba na/ rgyal po kun sdang zhes bya ba la/
50a5(rnying rgyud): 'dings pa'i spyan med de/ rgya mtsho stan du bting / bgo ba'i gos med de/ nam mkha' gos su gon bza' ba'i zas med de/ 'byung bzhi zas su thos/ nyin mtshan med par rtse lung gi mig yinA pas/ mun ba rgyab tu bor/ sdang bakhongs par bcangs/ skyon
50a6(rnying rgyud): dang bral te rin po che'i spyan la bstim/ lus ngag gsum gyi rtsal che bas/ seng ge btson du 'azung / sdang ba gzhan du bskyab tu med pas/ nyi ma mtshan khung du sras/ thams cad pas dacing thos pas/ tha mi gcig kyang ma chag nas/ gcig stsa
50a7(rnying rgyud): bas/ gleng ba'i bla med de/ dgra zin med pas/ shin tu skyid kyang sdod ma dzugs skad do// thig le gsang ba'i brda' rgyud las/ gzhi mtshon pa'i brda' bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos
50b1(rnying rgyud): mapa/ mdum na cang gangab rgyags sasbya ba// gang bangs gnyis sags kyad// mnar 'dang 'di la spong 'bras bu/ stsags lato// snun pas bku'aphrul du rngon padas bca pa tu du
50b2(rnying rgyud): las/ rang shes mching ba'i/ kun gyi nang nas mdzes pa'i lhamo la/ yul ma lo can du shar nas/ de gnyis byor ba bkye bas/ rin po ma brtsegs pa'i ngo drung / 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po bzhi dang bcas bgreng te/ rdza zhing snying ba napa
50b3(rnying rgyud): dang / de yi btsun mo dang sras su bcas pa gyis skyes nas/ rmu yi wu ba gces pa mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ri mor mong ste/ kun tu sdang gi nyi ma dang chas nas bzhugs gad do// de nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas/ 'bangs don du gyis byas/ sprid kyi
50b4(rnying rgyud): dbrang bshig skad do// rgyal thebs 'bangs la bzhag/ rgyal po bzhi 'khor 'khor dang bcas pas dpung la gshegs med do// thig le gsang ba'i ba 'byud las/ longs bu'i snang ba brdar bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
50b5(rnying rgyud): nas smyon pas gsungs pa/ snros the'u kun thug thub la/ zhing thams cad byeb bya ba yod de/ nor bu can bya ba dang / glazha' chen bya ba dang / me lo can tha pa dang / gsum yid de/ 'u bzhi bdudu ha'i kanag pos/ sa po dang sme ga kun 'byed
50b6(rnying rgyud): sa pan btab/ rma mkhan mos shing bcus/ lus sbal bas/ 'bras byeng thal/ spyisha ldan du skyes so// mun pa'i mi drug longs spyod gad do// rig le gsang ba'i brda chud lam/ 'khrul ba'i brda' bstan pa'i 'a ga 'gis 'o//
50b7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye nyon pa ma 'chang / 'khrul snang ye shes thog kying // bzlog pathabs kyi brda' rnams gsung // zhes gsol to// ston pas bka' phul pa/ sngon yul ldan pa'i phying byeb na/ rdza mkhan sa
51a1(rnying rgyud): brgyang babs/ nam tshan po gas grub sa/ gangag byung naphanapal/ yul ma ma shes can d+ha/ san pa ba tugs mthon tupa yong bu bdug nas/ smyan pasan pa cha gnags byas/ na
