51a2(rnying rgyud): pa bzhi langs/ dug khong du song bar mkhyen nas/ nad pa rnams la sman rgyu gcig tu bsres nas btang bas/ nad sos thub par gyur to// thig le gsang ba'i brda' chud las/ ston pas gang zag gi blo drang sbyar nas/ theg pa rim pa dgu gsungs nga
51a3(rnying rgyud): don gnyis snga med par bstan pa'i le'u lte lnga pa'o// / de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ sngon rgya nag po'i yul/ ta shi nag po'i nagras tshal bya ba na/ mu stegs mun pa'i go cha can bya ba gcig gis/ ltad mo gcig byas pas/ mun
51a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i me drug gis thog chod nas yod pa la/ rgya dkar po'i yul nas/ srid kyi mi brgyad kyi rgyal po dang dgu byon nas/ mun pa'i mi drug gis khrom bskor ma nus par/ rgyal po 'khor bcas la bltas pas/ yid shor te rgya dkar po'i mi dgu po'i phyir 'brangs pas
51a5(rnying rgyud): yon tan ga ser lobs te/ rgya nag po'i spyod pa ni bor/ rgyad kar dang chos bskrun pas/ mu stegs mun pa'i go cha can yi mug nas lcibs so// mun pa'i mi drug la me long gcig bstan pas/ mar mi rI re shar skad do// thig le gsang ba'i brda' chud las/ 'gro
51a6(rnying rgyud): drag blo nga myur na sa theg pa rim pa dgu bstan pa rtogs pa ma sor skyes pa'i lets+tsha te dag pa'o// / de nas yang bkra' stsal pa/ sngon byung yul brjo bde pa'i stsal du/ shel gyi khye nyi ma'i sman gyis/ ngo mtshar ba'i sngamar gcig byas pas/ @
51a7(rnying rgyud): kyi te/ 'di man 'thas ma cig / sems cad cigasos / yul brgya rdzun sa/ phyogs bdur thogs su slos brjo gas/
51b1(rnying rgyud): de'i rtsa ba gser gyi seng ge 'brug gi sgra can la/ ral gri kha mangs kyi mche bskyes pa/ mig phyogs bcur blta zhing skad sgrogs pa/ gcan gzan phra mo kun srog gcod pa gcig yod skad/ shing de'i sbeng pa na mu tig gi phreng ba 'bral bu bcu drug tu bcas pas/ kun ci
51b2(rnying rgyud): du mdzes skad/ shing de'i khog pa nas bar snang gi nam mkha' la/ rin po che gser gyi nyi ma shar bas/ 'gro ba kun gyi snang ba byed skad/ shing de'i yal ga bzhi phyogs bzhir gyes pa'i rtsa ba na/ seng ge gcig gi kha na me long gcig thogs/ de'i nang na shel gyi bu 'od
51b3(rnying rgyud): kyis gang ba cig gsal cing 'dug skad/ yal ga gcig gi rtsa ba na/ g.yu yi lu ma'i nang na gser gyi nya mo mig med pa gcig 'dug/ de mi 'gul ba cig 'dug skad/ yal ga gcig gi rtsa ba na/ bya khrung gcig la srin po mgo dgu mig gcig pa
51b4(rnying rgyud): zhon nas/ lag pa bdun gyis 'gro ba kun gyi srog gcod pa/ spyi bo nas thog 'bebs pa gcig 'dug skad/ yal ga gcig gi rtsa ba na me long gcig gi nang na/ shel gyi khye'u zhal drug pa gcig la/ lha mo lngas bskor nas// sbyor ba gcig
51b5(rnying rgyud): 'dug skad do// ya la ga phra mo thams cad nas/ gser gyi bye chung skad snyan pa sna tshogs sgrog pa gcig 'dug skad/ de kun gyis mi mthong skye/ ti pa ra'i bu mar me'i ldan gyis mthong ngo // mthong nas ya mtshan gyi ldum ra de kun la sgrogs so
51b6(rnying rgyud): sgrogs pa thos nas ya mtshan gyes te/ kun de la blta skad do// thig le gsang ba'i brda' chu de las/ rtsa ba'i rgyud dang yal ga'i rgyud kyi don brda' ru bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ lha khang gcig gi nang na/ gtso bor
51b7(rnying rgyud): shel gyi lu kun tu zhal du bzhugs skad/ de'i thugs ka nas mar me gcig la 'od lnga shar nas/ 'od kun tu gsal ma nus par/ lha khang gi sgo na 'od bya bo tsam gcig kun la snang zhing 'dug skad/ de'i thugs ka nas mar me gcig la 'od lngar shar
52a1(rnying rgyud): bas na/ 'od kun tu gsal ma nus par/ lha khang gi sgo na 'od bya'o tsam gcig kun la snang zhing 'dug skad/ de la bltas pas lha khang gi gtso bo mthong skad/ der ya mtshan skyes nas gtso bo la bltas pas/
52a2(rnying rgyud): rlabs zugs pas pra ma dang bral bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa byas te/ gangs dkar shel gyi thag phrag tu song skad no/ theg le gsang ba'i brda' klud las/ don mi bdon pa mthong bas rang bzhin mi dgongs pa la gnas pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa //
52a3(rnying rgyud): yang bka' stsal pa/ khye'u mang me can bya ba la/ khye'u snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba/ mar me bzhi btang bas/ yul bzhi mun pa sel ba'i ngo sprod bzhi/ yul rnam dag pa d+hA'i tshal bya ba na/ lha mo pan ta sha na ma zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu gzhon nu sred byed ces
52a4(rnying rgyud): bya ba 'jug pa mthong ngo // der mar me gcig la bltas pas/ yul me long g.yang dag gsal bya ba na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po pad+ma'i spyan bya ba la/ rgyal po sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas bskor te/ grong drang srong mi byed par 'khor gyi tshig rgyu mi 'chad par byed pa
52a5(rnying rgyud): mthong skad do// mar me gcig la bltas pas/ snga phyi dus gcig dran te/ sa rnams dus gcig tu mthong skad/ gcig la bltas pas/ shel gyi khye'u mar me can labo rang gis mtshor ma mthong bar/ rin po che'i khang pa na/ rin po che'i se /
52a6(rnying rgyud): tu zhabs tog byed pa dang ma 'bral mar mthong skad do// thig legasang ba'i brda' rgyud las/ jo spong bzhi'i dgongs pa brdar bstun pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ sngon rirab kyi rtse mo/ rgya mtsho nyi ma'i sman
52a7(rnying rgyud): byab na/ mu'i rgyal po nor bu 'od ldan byab yod skad/ kho skyo nas ri ba ni rtse mo nas/ yang mar bltas pas/ nam dag pad+ma'i tshal byab na/ rin po che khang pa nyi zlas brgyan pa bya ba mthong skad/ der gyon pas/ sngar gyi gnas pas nyams dga' nas/ bltas
52b1(rnying rgyud): pas/ rlung can kyi grong khyer na/ blon po rkun byed bya ba 'dug pa mthong gad do// der byon de blon pos bskos pa khas grangs spyad/ rgyal blon gnas par bas blangs skad/ nga nas byon po tun byed kyis/ rgyal ba'i spyan sman thos dang tho thas nas/ sur byed kyi rta la zhor nas/ 'du
52b2(rnying rgyud): byed kyi 'phrang la phyin/ rtsod pa'i sgo gsum du byon nas/ rin po che sna lnga btsal/ rgyal po la phul bas/ mnyes pa dang tshim pa byung nas/ blon po yi mug rgyal pos le lo shor bas/ rgyal po thugs non pa'i blon po la cha ba bstsal/ rgyal blon bral bas mchod pa mcha
52b3(rnying rgyud): sa bya na
52b4(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ sngon yul sme sha'i grong khyer rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal na/ ri rab kyi khong seng rin po che'i gzhal med khang na/ rgyal po kun snang bya ba yod pas/ pho brang gi sgo bcad de gdan la bzhugs pas/ sgo bcad pa'i stobs kyis blon po btson du zin skad/
52b5(rnying rgyud): dmangs bya byed can cha ma la phebs skad/ gyis kyang blon po zin skad/ dmangs chab la bstsal nas gcig pur bzhugs kyang skyo ba med skad do// thig le gsang ba'i brda' rgyud las/ nyams su blang ba'i brda' ste le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
52b6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ sngon ri rab kyi khong seng na/ nyi zla 'dzes pa'i sgo bang bya ba gcig yod skad do// de 'phen par byed pa'i rlung gis bteg nas 'gro skad/ de yi nang na sgrom chen kun tu mi g.yo ba gcig bzhugs skad do// ji tsam du 'du 'dzirang
52b7(rnying rgyud): g.yengs pa byung yang / kho dgos pa las bkrugs kyang mi 'gro bar gnas skad/ thig le gsang ba'i brda' rgyud las/ dgongs pa la yengs ma yengs med par bstan pa'i brda'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/
53a1(rnying rgyud): rin po che las byas pa'i khang pa gcig na/ khye'u nam mkha'i snying ngo bya ba 'dug pas/ khang pa'i mthongs na/ sgo nas kho yi byad kyi mdangs shar nas/ kho la khang pa yod med med par 'dug pa la/ khang bzhig pas kyang gar yang la
53a2(rnying rgyud): bros par rang sa de na 'dug skad do// thig le gsang ba'i brda' rgyud las/ chos sru zangs thal gyi brda'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / ston pas bka' stsal pa/ sngon ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ gyer ling 'phrul gyi ta la/ gser gyi
53a3(rnying rgyud): spro gcig btsud nas/ tsher gyis 'gro ma shes par 'dug skad/ thig le gsar ba'i brda' rgyud las/ a nu man chad bzang rtog gis 'ching bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ sngon khye'u kun tu gsal gyis/ rang
53a4(rnying rgyud): gri byad kyis snang ba ma shes pas// gyer ling 'phrul gyi ta pho de/ sbrul dang rnga mong gis gdangs pas/ rang gi byad kyi rnam par shes pas/ dgrol mi dgos pa rang grol du song skad/ thig le gsang ba'i brda' chud las/ rdzogs chen rang grol du bstan pa'i le'u ste /
53a5(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'o// // de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ sngon yul yangs pa chen po/ pad+mo bde rtsal gyi grong khyer na/ rgyal po nor bu 'od ldan bya ba nor bu rin po che'i za ma tog yod skad/ de yi nang na rin po che phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa gcig yod skad/ de nas rgyal po zhabs
53a6(rnying rgyud): 'chag tu byon pas/ rgan mo ling thog bya ba dang phrad nas smras pa/ de yi bar du rkun mo mi lngas za ma tog khyer te/ sma sha'i grong khyer drug tu mun pa'i mi drug gis/ nor bu la bkur sti la sogs byas pas/ nor bu las dgos 'dod ma byung skad/ mun pa'i mi drug kyang yid byung skad/
53a7(rnying rgyud): gyis khye'u sdang ba dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bya ba'i sngam po mi gcig byung skad/ rgan mo su sto mar ring // sngon ji ltar brkus pa'i yo rgyus brjod pas/ rgyal po thugs cur skad nas rgan mo la chab bstsal/ rkun mo bran du bcang / mun pa'i mi drug kyang bsad/ sle sha'i grong khyer
53b1(rnying rgyud): drug com/ cha'adod nong bu mnyas kyang bang byud/ TIg la gas pa bad ba rgyad las/ 'khrul thags dang thol grags pa 'ban pa'i ya skye gapa'o// / de nas pa ga pas dka' salapa/ rdzanaH gas kyi khang med drang bral chen grwa
53b2(rnying rgyud): bu kun tu gzigs bya ba gnas pa la/ rin po che'i bum 'ani mar me'i snying po lnga yang / khos gcig tu ma mthong bar gcig pur gnas so// skad do// thig le gsang ba'i brda' rgyud las/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dgongs pa brda' bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
53b3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ skyon nam mkha' stong pa'i ngang las/ mar mye stong shar bas/ 'od 'dres nas snying por 'dres par so sor gsal te/ mar me' 'di 'di las gzhan med spyad do// thig le gsang ba'i brda 'chud las/ rang sdang la
53b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan snang med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud yongs su gtad pa 'di gsungs so// e ma ho gsang ba'i brda' chud 'di/ kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas// kun tu mi sgrib rang gsal pas/ rin
53b5(rnying rgyud): gter 'di rtag tu tshangs// zhes gsungs so// thig le gsang ba'i brda'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtud pa'i le Ta ste brgya dgu pa'o// thig+sa le gsang ba'i brda 'argyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ kA ya tri A lo ga tan
53b6(rnying rgyud): ma/ bod skad du/ skugasum gyi snang ba gsal bar rdo thod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das spang ba ston pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ du brjod kyi gnas/ 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid/ 'gag pa med
53b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'od kyi gzhal med khang zhes bya ba na/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de/ mkha' 'gro rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// chos spu'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gnas// 'khor la ngo skad ji ltar bgyi// 'ongs
54a1(rnying rgyud): sa smra/ na // / smra
54a2(rnying rgyud): na/ gal// sa che na/ shun smra la'/
54a3(rnying rgyud): sa rna pa / / du sa /
54a4(rnying rgyud): da sa/ ma na na pa s+ho// ba 'ang na sa dan / na da/
54a5(rnying rgyud): ga nga gos mo// man nyid god dang mad pa'i/ rang mdor sa nga 'ad gyur// dazung bahrIg sas myon// bcon mnu pa'i dab na na/ ga hA/ sa kyang gang pa'i 'a
54a6(rnying rgyud): gagis ma'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das cig/ gas rje rang ba nas dka' stsal pa/ phyogs lnga yi rang gdangs bcas// ci nga slong bas khyod gsalab// legs shing se dag bste// sa nyi rdzogs thil rjem
54a7(rnying rgyud): sa / sa pa na
54b1(rnying rgyud): so// rdo sno bzhi'i rgyud las/ longs sur thod pa'i le'u skye gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ su wa 'od sdang gi nang nas bka' stsal pa// bde gshegs lnga yi snang ba ni// rang rig mtshan nyid 'od du gnas// ga
54b2(rnying rgyud): la mi gnas ye shes dag pa'i spyan// mtha' dbus med pas 'od du gsal// 'gag med sbrul su dus dang gnas skabs sbyang // me mar 'od khyim me long ngos la bstan// brda' dang don du shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// ngo spyod bzhi yi rgyud las//
54b3(rnying rgyud): sbrul su ngo thod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas ston pa 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pas/ dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i don gsungs so// rang rig chos sku gsal la rtog pa med// ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid don dang ldan// sring
54b4(rnying rgyud): po su lA ye nas lhun gyis grub// de yi snang ba ye nas 'od drugasal// nyi ma'i snying po 'od dang zer du bcas// brda' dang ngag de snod ldan 'khor la bstan// ces gsungs so// ngo sprong bzhi yi chud las/ sku gsum 'du 'bral med par ngo smad pa'i
54b5(rnying rgyud): ste lnga pa'o// / kyi maho// gsang ba'i bdug po nges par zang // nyi zlas brgyan pa'i rin chen khang pa na// dang reg chos su mtsha na hr-id ye shes lnga// de yi nang na snying po sku lnga grub// de yi spyan gyis ri rab rtse la gsal// de
54b6(rnying rgyud): rnams rang ches yin gyisku gzhan du mtshol cig/ de yi brda bzhi don dang sbyar ba gces// shel dang 'dra 'brag mo long gzugs sdang du// hi ma'i dpe bzhin rgyud la nges pa bskyed// rjes kyi sku dang longs su srul gru dang // sku gsum 'du 'bral med da
54b7(rnying rgyud): dri'ang bzhi// spod pa'i tshul bzhi nges pas na// slod byed thabs kyang bzhing nges pas// chos thug zhi len thams cad 'byung // longs su'i blang ba de'i 'char// de yi gsung gi sdang po las// thugs rje 'byung bas spel pa'i sgra// de rnams
55a1(rnying rgyud): gtong thub ni// chos nyid gzhoyas ma dang / rtogs pa 'ashes ma ma dang // 'khrul pa las khyim mar 'das// mnA ting po'i gnas lags phyin// so 'khor 'das gnas lags yin// ma ni ma bcas kung zi brag /
55a2(rnying rgyud): ni gzhi las cir yang srid// ma ni phyogs lhung rgya chad med// mo ni rang byud kun gyi gzhi// ma ni spang srid nga las byung // chos nyid kun gzhi'i ma mo yin// ma ni chos kyi sku yin no// mo ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// ma mo kun gyi
55a3(rnying rgyud): yin no// 'khor 'das ma lus 'byung sprul sde// be nas ma shes ye shes yin// 'byung lnga phyi yi ma mo yin// sha khrag drod dbugs nang ma mo// rang sems kun srid gsang ba yin// kun rje las byed las ma mo// ri rab srid pa'i yum
55a4(rnying rgyud): drug nas// gang rgyu srin mo la sogs pa// gdul bya rten gyi ma mo yin// rtsal zhon nas khrag la chu// don snying yan lag dbang por brgyad// 'byung 'jug dngas snyigs las byed pas// rnam shes nang gi ma mo yin// rang sems rnam shes
55a5(rnying rgyud): rta zhon nas// yid rgyud 'gyu dran 'dzin chags kyis// chags sdang ye shes las byed pas// gsang ba sems kyi ma mo yin// ye shes ma mo dbyings kyi yum la rbad// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// ma zad dbyings kyis ye shes
55a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor// las kyi ma mo dgra la rbad// dgra bgegs bdun drud rtsa ba chad// marbu de bstan pa'i chos la gnod// ye shes ma mo gye ba med// las kyi ma mo 'gag pa med// ma mo'i rigs te bsam mi khyab// phyi nang gsang ba'i ma
55a7(rnying rgyud): nas// nges pa don gyi ma mo dang // dbyings kyi ye shes ma mo dang // phan gnod kyi yi ma mo dang // phan gnod nang gi ma mo dang // phan gnod gsang ba'i ma mo dang // srul ba dam tshig ma mo rnams// rtsa la gnas shing khrag la nu// rtsa
55b1(rnying rgyud): rlung ma mor zhal 'chos dang // sha gzag 'thung srog la gcod// bkrag mdangs 'phrog cing dbugs rngub pas// pho ha rbod gtong ma mor byas// zhes gsungs so// srugasung thugs kyi rgyud las// rgod gtong ma mo'i lebu nye gcig
55b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa thams cad dbang du bsdus nas/ de yi las la rnam gnyis gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// 'jig rten las la rnam gnyis te// 'jig rten mchod pa stong
55b3(rnying rgyud): srub pa ni// 'jig rten pho mo cho gsal ste// pha mes rgyud nas chags pa dang // slob dpon rgyud nas chags pa dang // rigs rgyud sngon nas chags pa dang // 'dug sa gnas shing chags pa dang // legs nyes zhal lces chags pa dang //
55b4(rnying rgyud): mgon skyabs stong grogs lha brgyad ni// phyogs su mchod cing bstan pa dang // lus dang grib bzhin 'grogs pa yin// shin tu nye bar bsten thabs la// khang bu bca' zhing rten btsugs la// tshul bzhin mchod cing dam bsres pas//
55b5(rnying rgyud): ji ltar bcol ba'i las byed de// 'jig rten mchod bstod srub pa yin// khye snying phul chags ltar 'khor// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ 'jig rten mchod pa stod sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// /
55b6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bstan pa'i ru gzugs pa'i phyir/ dregs pa thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ rdo rje 'od 'phros pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu lha dang klu dang gza' rgod dang /
55b7(rnying rgyud): dang / gshin rje dang / ma mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / btsan dang / srin po la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi ba spu dang / sgra thams cad langs/ snying ni 'dang / sems dang yid rnam shes stong pa ltar bsngangs te/ ska
56a1(rnying rgyud): sdom bkri drang laga'i chags// 'dus pa'i 'khor la mi gsung ba// nyid mi skrod mi thugs dmaH// de bas 'khor tshogs la 'di gsung // zhes gsol ba yang nas yang du btababs/ de nas snyan po rdo rje 'chung ba des/ gnas lugs
56a2(rnying rgyud): 'bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas lag na rdo rjes gsol pa kyai gyi ston pa 'gro ba'i mgon// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// gnas lugs nying po kun bral ba'o// gdams brtogs pa dag sung bar mdzod// ces yang yang nus
56a3(rnying rgyud): pas/ de nas rdo rje 'chang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyon cig/ yang dag don la ming med de// tshig la ma rkyen gyis ma mtshon na// ma bcos gnas lugs don mi rtogs
56a4(rnying rgyud): ming ga don med gnas lugs de/ ma bcos phyogs med rgya med par// gang gi sgo nas gtan la dbab// skang grag thams cad snying por bstan// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs rdo rje rtsab thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs baphu la na
56a5(rnying rgyud): ste dang po'o// / de nas rdo rje 'chang gi sprul pa rdo rje 'dzin pas/ yang rang gi stan las langs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye sngon pa rdo rje 'chang // rang byung snying po snang log 'khrul// mthu brta sa bag chags mthar gyin dag/ brgyad mar
56a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa las spyod rnams// gnas lugs grol bar bstan du gsol// zhes pas chos min rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig sprul pa rdo rje 'dzin// snying po spyi yi gnas lugs la// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dpe// bzhi skor gsum tshan gdams par bya// gyi gzhi'i
56a7(rnying rgyud): snying po spris yin// gnas lugs chen mo ci yang med// ngo bo gzhi yin dngos po min// nges tshig thams cad 'byung ba yin// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags srid pa'i gzhi// dbye ba rang rang 'dod gzhung re// ma nges lhun grub ka dag bzhin/ mthun dpe nor bu nam mkha'
56b1(rnying rgyud): sogs// phyogs res kun nas mtshon nas bstan// lnga ldan gsum lhan gcig las byung // spyi gzhig nas lugs snying po la// gtan la 'bebs byed gzhi yis dbab// gnas lugs snying po bcos pa med// ma bcos pa ru sring por bstan// gnas lugs se phyo
56b2(rnying rgyud): lung med// phyogs lung med pas snying por bstan// gnas lugs snying po n+da chad med// d+hI chad med pas snying por bskrun// gnas lugs snying por byung ba'o// rang las byung bas snying por bstan// bzhi ba skor gcig la gcig rdzogs pa rtsi// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu
56b3(rnying rgyud): bail+la/ sa gsung 'o// thugasung nas rdo rjeH bathams cad rdzog pa'i spyad lam/ sdig zhi riganas lugs mtshan pa'i 'a 'u gnyis pa'o// / lag rje 'ang gsos pa// ston pa 'gro ba'i mgo/ gdos pa mongs pa 'di rnams pa// snying ma
56b4(rnying rgyud): zhis sdig la// gsal la 'bebs pa'i byeng ba dka'// bzhitshan gsum chin 'khor la gsung // zhes thas pas ya ci nyon pas bka' stsal ba// ga cig ni 'dzin pa rjod// 'am ga su 'dus pa nyid rnams la// bzhinar gsum bsu ba yis bstan/
56b5(rnying rgyud): skyes la// ming dang mig gangs med bya bya nga cha g.yogs mtshan la ba / gnas su ma mi / rgyal sa mthung can gyi chen// thad pa mas brjo pamag/ dper danasas 'a 'jib na so// rgya seM byed pas bcis so// ba med ngo po'i
56b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzi na das nyi pa gyum// sprin nigang pa la/ ngan rkyen chags byud// su'i mdam thas 'thus par 'gyur// chos byed shegs na byung// yA shA rtags pa med pams// phyigashiganas thams dpa // 'thu tud
56b7(rnying rgyud): das 'dzin srung // dngos por myong ba'i 'bras bung 'gyur// las kyi 'bras bu mngon du spyang // mang 'khrul chags drang bar mtshams med// ti pog cin gyi ci yang med// gcig tu yin dkun gyi gzhi// kun gzhi chen por ma bcos par// bcos med dus bcos 'khrum pas 'dzor/
57a1(rnying rgyud): 56// gnas lugs chen po yongs la khyab// phyogs ldang med du skang po gagi// kun gzhig yang tu chad med// skyes phyogs med skyeng po nyid// kun ga zhig gan nas byung ba min// rang byu gnas lugs stong pa rang // yi ge 'bru 'azhi na la ldang/ lha sgrom rjo ba 'das
57a2(rnying rgyud): dang // chos min gzhi yi la chen baH// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ sdi gzhi snying po la bzhi skor du gtan la dbab pa zur tsam mtshon pa'i leSh+ma ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin sogs la
57a3(rnying rgyud): snying po ngo bo gcig nyid las// mtshon par byed pa'i rnam pa bzhis// mtha' bzhi'i dras thag gcad par bya// ma bcos pa dang phyogs lhung med// rgya ma chad par rang byung ngo // gcig la gcig rdzogs snying po'o// yi ge bzhi dang lha sgom bzhi// su gsum gnas lugs 'ja tshan gyis/
57a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi skong gsum 'dus gcig la rdzogs// gcig med yul med spro 'dogs gcod// ma bcos lta ba sku gsum ka/ phyogs med khyab pas bsgom pa kha// rang byung bden med 'bras bu na// 'gru ba dang grol chos min nga // gnas lugs grol bas chos las 'das// chos min chos
57a5(rnying rgyud): 'das chos kyi sku// thig le 'gyur med longs spyod chos las med// spang ba sna tshogs sbrul sku chos la min// ces dang / rdo rje 'dzin pas yang gsol pa// kye gyi ston pa 'gro ba'i mgon// bla med theg pa a ti la// dgag sgrub blang dor snyom s+ho// dgag bya bsdus bya mi to na// 'khru
57a6(rnying rgyud): gyi bor mi 'gyur ram// dgag sbub blang dor sngo badra// dgag bya bcos pa mi 'dug gam// ma bcos bsrub byar mi ga pa' ye// dor bla bcos pa dgag byal// ma bcos pa ni bsrub byar 'dug/ phyogs su ltung ba dor ba la// sa srung bani byung b+h+r-i // rgya chad med pa bsrub tu la// rgya chad med pa dag
57a7(rnying rgyud): byang 'dug/ rgya chad med pa blang byal// rgya chad pa ni dor byar 'dug/ rang byung ba ni bslab bya la// rang byung ma yin 'gogs pa yi// nang byung ba ni blang bya la// rang byung ma yin dor byar 'gyur// ces gsol pas/ rdo rje ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// tha med theg pa a ti la//
57b1(rnying rgyud): dgag za bsrub bya blang dor med// rang byung bya bar ci la 'gyur// rang rgyud skya bas de ma shas// rang chud skye bos de shes sam// rang rgyud skyabs phyogs tsam min// dgag srub bla dang snying po dang // zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thug rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs gi'i chud las/ yul na zhas tag
57b2(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // yang lag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // dgag sgrub blang dor snying po ni// ma bcos pa sogs ji ltar 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par nyon// lta ba'i gzhi la btsas pa med// rgol ba'i gzhi la sa
57b3(rnying rgyud): med// spyod pa'i gzhi la bcos pa med// 'bras bu'i gzhi la bcos pa med// lta ba'i gzhi la rgya chad med// sgom pa'i gzhi la rgya chad med// spyod pa'i gzhi la rgya chad med// 'bras bu'i gzhi la rgya chad med// lta ba rang byung gzhi ma rang // sgom pa rang byung gzhi ma rang // khyod
57b4(rnying rgyud): ra gyung gzhi ma rang // 'bras bu rang byung gzhim rang // nges med kun kyang rang byung yin// lta ba ma yengs rang byung ngo // sgom pa ma yengs rang byung ngo // spyod pa ma yengs rang byung ngo // 'bras bu ma yengs rang byung ngo // zhes gsungs so// yang rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad gsol//
57b5(rnying rgyud): kyi ston pa rdo rje 'chang // de ltar snying po ma bcos pa// bcos pa snying po yin ma yin// phyogs su ma lhung snying po na// phyogs lhung snying po yin ma yin// rgya chad med pa snying po na// rgya chad snying po yin ma yi na// rang byung snying po nges med na// gzhan byung snying po yin ma yin// zhes gsol
57b6(rnying rgyud): sa/ ston pa rdo rjes bka' stsal ba// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par nyon// ma bcos pa dang bcos pa gnyis// gnyis med tha snyad dbye ba med// snying po lta sgom spyod pa dang // 'bras bu la sogs bcos pa med/ phyogs su ma lhung lhung ba gnyis// gnyis med tha dad dbye ba med// snying po'i lha
57b7(rnying rgyud): sgom spyod pa dang // 'bras bu la so phyogs srung med// rta chad pa dang mchad gnyis// gnyis med thad da dbye ba med// snying po'i lha sgom grod pa dang // 'bras bu la so n+ya chad med// dang byung gzhan byung gnyis su med// snying po'i lha sgom byed pa dang // 'bras bu la sogs dang las byung // b+h+ring po ma bcos bro zhwa byung /
58a1(rnying rgyud): med// bya chad med pa'i dpung yin// ma bcos su gsum ka dang ni// khyog sum lung khyab ga pa// rgya chad med pa'i gA dang ni// dang las 'byung ba'i brnams pa'i// mtha' bzhi ngas bcad pani bskor bya/ zhes gsungs sa// sug sung gas rdo rgya thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las// mtha' bzhings bcang zhalan gyi se
58a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin sogs 'khor// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags sbyor sgrol gyis// spyi gzhi snying por bstan byas la// shes byed gzhi yis gtan la po ba// tho chen bzhi pos gzhi zung la// tho bran 'brel pas sgo 'dog bcad// gzhi lam 'bras bu bsdu sar dril// ma bcos pa yi gnas lugs
58a3(rnying rgyud): smyig zhi chu la gdams byas la// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags lam la gdams// 'bras bu sku gsum bsdus par gdams// phyogs lhung med pa'i gnas lugs la// lci gzhi nam mkha' gdams byas la// nyi zla gza' sprin lam du gdams// 'bras bu mtha' ni yangs par gdams// spyi gzhi rin po che gdams te
58a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod yon 'byung ba lam du gdams// rgya chad med pa 'bras bur gdams// spyigazhis la jo sbed la// dus bzhi la ma du spyad byas te// 'bras bu gser du shes par bya// de ltar shes bya bzhi skor la// gzhan dag rnams kyang de bzhin bskor// lha sgom spyod pa 'bras bu dang // sku gsum gnas lug thams cad kyang // de ltar khong du shes
58a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i yi go grangs tshad la/ 'brel ba krog kyis sgrub pa yin// thugs rje rtogs pa bzlog pas log// che chung ring thung 'thug po dang // yangs dang dog pa 'byung ba'i gnas// srog dang snying po la bzla'o// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ don thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u
58a6(rnying rgyud): de nas lag na rdo rjes yang // rtse kye 'gro mgon rdo rje 'chang // rtsa ba'i yi ge bstan pa dang // 'brel bkrog su gang sngang yin// thugs rje rtogs pa bzlog pa log/ che rdung ring thung 'brug po dang // yangs dog 'byung ba'i gnas rnams dang // srog snying la blo log gnon rjezas// blod man rmongs pas mi 'tshal bas//
58a7(rnying rgyud): sa bka' stsal 'tshal// 'gro ba'i mgon pos legs par khrol// ces zhus pa dang / ston pa rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// nyon cing rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// rtsa ba'i yi ge sum cu yin// thugs rje yas babs bstan pa ni// sku gsung khyab pargya ma chad// nga ni rang byung snying po la// gcod byed la ldan la
58b1(rnying rgyud): rabang brgya das lags nyid// gtan medas can mi dus lab// 'ad ma gags pas 'dag pas / ga pa gnas grags 'bar ba / gnas babyung pasas nyam nas/ ba nyam sa spyod 'dzid pa pa na/ nas sugs s+hong ba sa nas rungs// skabar kyang nga //
58b2(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das pa la// thugs rje gnas lugs shes rab shugs// 'grub med pas brtan pas sa// dashig med rgyal chen dag po ta// skye ma dmakha' 'byung rnying po a// rtsa ba'i yi ge bstan pa yin// 'dzin pa 'khyen byed gcod pa dang // 'brel ba/ khyab byed spyad pa dang // 'gro 'drong 'bod bde skabs su //
58b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis mtshan dang ldan// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs rdo rdo rje ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa bar yi ge la phrog gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // yang gcig ston pas bka' bral ba// hon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// rtogs pa go rim bzlog pa ni// a ni s+ye med yul sdang /
58b4(rnying rgyud): ha ni 'gag med 'phyas med// sa ni 'a// med shes rab ga/ li ni gnas lugs ra yis 'brel// ya ni 'das pa spu gsung la// 'a ni yi stong zas ni ba// de ni ma rig bag la 2// wa na grol ba zas ni bzung // tsa ni yul la nyams su myong // tsas ni 'khrul pa'i rtsa ba gsod// man srog snying mnyes
58b5(rnying rgyud): bas ni 'khor brdzun du rtogs// phas ni ye shes gnyis su med par rig/ nas ni kun la 'jug par mthong // da ni 'khor ba bzlog pa'i dus// zas ni ljang srid thig le phebs// tras ni sdang srid rdzun du phebs// nyas ni ye shes gnas lug shes// ngas ni yul mi gnyis ka 'joms// chas ni
58b6(rnying rgyud): sku gnyis dang ldan// rtsa ni sgo 'dog thams cad bcad// ngas ni rang byung ye shes rtogs// gas ni tshad med rgya chang med par ltung // khas ni phyogs lcang med par bsgom// kas ni sku gsum chos srur bltas// ma bcos ka dang khyab pas kha// rga med ga dang rang byung nga // go rim kun nas
58b7(rnying rgyud): d+ha badz+ra'o// gi bu log pas 'dzin pa log/ 'greng bu log pas mkhyen pa log/ na ro log pas spyod pa log/ ya ta log pas khyab pa log/ ra ta log na 'brel pa log/ zhabs kyu log na sdud pa log// ber ka ris leg 'go 'dren log/ de bzhin log pa'i don
59a1(rnying rgyud): ya rnan / gas ga sum / gas sa pa dul/ ga na pas ga pa na // smra nga mags lagasmras rgyan// rnam
59a2(rnying rgyud): a log kyi med dbyings nas lag/ rta log 'grag med spang ba med// sa log 'gyur med myang na med// sha lig shes pa'i sgrib pa med// la log gnas lugs maman sa med// ras ga tugs rjes gzigs yul med// yo 'o gzug sung dang ba med// ma ga stong pa'i chog tsam pa/
59a3(rnying rgyud): bad pa med// ga log bag chags gting nas med// wa log gnas lugs 'khongs med// dza log gzung ba'i yul snang med// tshe log rnams su srang rgya med// tsalog 'khor ba'i rtsa ba med// ma log 'khor ba'i bgyi gni 'a// ba log 'khor ba'i drug bsngal med/ yologs
59a4(rnying rgyud): sngags ga dgas sa med// bsog dag sa ma ga med// log 'jug sa sul snang 'a // de pag dus med par mtshams rnyed// log cig la bram snang med// gag tan la thebs pa da// nye 'og legs lenas meng // ra lag mi las bye 'dri byed za/
59a5(rnying rgyud): med lung nga med// tsa 'ogagacod pa ga du med// nga 'og 'byung gyu byed med// g.yog tu med yang me // ba 'og rlab tsu rdzogs ming med// yog sug sum bcos su med// sngon dkyis med ga dang nas med// ma skyes pas na 'jigs 'dral med// de la ga rgod du dral tsam med/
59a6(rnying rgyud): rnam pa yongs kyis med// ces gsungs sa// grags drugs don ci'i thams cad rdzogs pa'i chud las/ yig 'bral gzeng med chu meng kyi byed kyi 'o// nas stod pas bka' stsal ba// rdo rje gas nges pa rten// gal ta btags che po me// thugs pa da
59a7(rnying rgyud): padang / / khrel ma 'a// drugs sa dragasas rdzu su na// de nyid mi ga pa / sa sa sri du du// ma ma pa na// ga kyi la ga/ chos thang gsang dzus/
59b1(rnying rgyud): zla med chen po'o// snying po sems nyid 'gran zla med// ci phyir gnyis pa'i chos med phyir// ka la 'a ni btags pakun// ring po rgyun chad med pa yi// snying po'i don la sbyar bar bya// rang rang brtsegs pa 'brug po ste// sku la sku brtsegs chos nyid che// zab mo gsang sngags bla men dpagla/
59b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'dus gnyis med grol na 'jug/ hUM zhes bya ba thung ngu ste// skad cig gdams pas de nyid rtogs// gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po la// mtha' bzhi dras bcad gnyis med bstan// tshigs chu do na chen bstan pa chung // skad cig 'khor ba rgyun chad thung // kA la ka
59b3(rnying rgyud): brtsegs chos kyi sra// sku gsum brtsegs pa 'thug po la// thugs rje yas bab 'thug por shes// a la a btags ye shes dbyings// dbyings la ye shes skye med pas// rtog pa mas bzlog 'brug po yin// ka la 'i btags ring bde// thugs rje rgyun chad med pa yin//
59b4(rnying rgyud): gsung stong pa'i thugs rje yin// 'gro don 'brel pa yis bab min// a la 'a btags skyi med stong // skye med stong pa chos kyi dbyings// chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes// rtog pa mas bzlog ring ba yin// ka la ha btags chen po don// sgo gsum 'gag med rtsal chen ni
59b5(rnying rgyud): sku re 'gag med chos kyi sku// thugs rje yas bab 'gran zla med// a la ha btags skye 'gag med// skye 'gag med par ngon btags las// yul med ming med 'gran bla med// rtog pa mas bzlog chen po yin// hU~M zhes bya ba thung ngu la// snying po'i klong du thams cad 'dus// thubs rje
59b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i don gnyis 'dus// 'dus pa ma yin 'bral ba med// rgyu rkyen byed pas ma byas pas// des bstan ci yang ma yin par// de go shes rab chos pas so// skad cig thams cad bye brag byed// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thug rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ ring thung
59b7(rnying rgyud): dron bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa pa'o// rdo rje ston pas bka' stsal ba// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin so ga sun// yi ge'i tshogs rnams de dag la// pho dang mo dang mning ngo // ba'i tshom bdun dang phyed tshi ma gcig/ khog pa mgrin pa nan dang lce// so dang spyi bo sde dang mchu// yangs dang dog dang phrar
60a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ las 'byung // snang ba gang sdang mig 'a tshogs// thugs rjems bab kAn sa// mag pa 'bru lo ga sum rgya dngos// grogs gas sa pag la de yi grogs// logs log pa zhes bya ba// rtswa dang log pa ra/
60a2(rnying rgyud): yin te// rkyen gyis log pas chos kyi sku// dper narnga'am gas ra lta bu// de bzhin rgyam 'gyur bal// rkyen gyis 'gyur ba sreg pa bzhin// chos rnams kun gyi snying po 'di// gser dang mkha' bzhin med gyur bas// / bram med pa
60a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi dam pa don po mchog/ chos rnams thams cad yi ge s+t+waM// srog dang skyong por 'dus pa'o// srog ni gzugs te snang ba'o// btags pa min ta snying po ny-id// btsal pas mi nyid thug cha 'dra// tshil mkhan tshol cig rigs /
60a4(rnying rgyud): bas mdo btsal bas ci yang min// gnas lugs don la ma yongs shig/ ci yang ma yin thams cad dang / rang ngo shes lam yengs shig/ bden mun lin min matog bdag/ blo gtad tshol khro ma khyer cig/ ces gsungs so// skra ga
60a5(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo/ rngas pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ 'byung gnas log gnom bstod gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ nyan cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// 'brel ba 'brel par bachis
60a6(rnying rgyud): bstan// snying po po chen bzhi dang 'brel// thob na zhi dang kun tu 'brel// dper nang bamig mangs bzhin// lha sbom spyod pa 'bras bur 'brel// dbang dang dam chog sngags dang 'brel// dkyil 'khor lha la bsnyen skyab 'brel// theg
60a7(rnying rgyud): pasrid pa mtsho bas 'brel// 'byung ba nad dang sde ba kyang 'brel// sgyu ma lus dang man dag 'brel// rgyu la rdib mig yor dang // rmi lam chu zla sdig tu dang // srul pa sgra brtan mig sgron 'brel// srog dang snying pa bas dgasor 'brel//
60b1(rnying rgyud): bkra shis drung chud chos dang 'bral// dge bcu pa rol zin pa 'byal// sa la m+ba gzhi dang zla 'bras 'brel// thugs rje byin rlabs tshe 'phrul 'phrul// 'khar 'das dag jig gan dang 'bram// yod med rtag chad drug dang 'brel// gabus nas/
60b2(rnying rgyud): dben gcig dbyings shes 'brel// rtsa rlung thig le gsal stong 'brel// zhi gnas lhag mthong thams cad 'brel// zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod 'brel// 'brel pa 'brel bar log non gyis// tho chen tho bran yul mi bzla// bden
60b3(rnying rgyud): mnyam rdzun mnyam gnyis med bstan// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ tho chen kun 'brel mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
60b4(rnying rgyud): gsol to// kye kye 'gro mgon thugs rje can// 'brel pa'i ngo bo nges tshig dang // dbye ba dang ni mthun pa'i dpe// 'brel pa log non sgyu ma brgyad// srog dang snying po bsad gso yis// chung blangs bsungs pas phan gnod pas// sangs
60b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas bstan pa gzug pa'i phyir// mongs pas mi 'tshal rgyal bas gsungs// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rdo rje nyon// 'brel ba'i ngo bo gcig pa yin// nges tshig de 'brel rgyan chad med//
60b6(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa'i dbye ba rnam pa bzhi// bdag nyid rgya 'bras phan tshun dang // de las de byung 'brel pa'o// dper na dra ba mig mangs bzhin// gnas lcags snying po kun dang 'brel// sdang srid 'khor 'das 'brel par gcig/ dper na gser
60b7(rnying rgyud): nga bugs brtan 'dra// dza ba gse las 'gyur ba med// bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel ba yin// gnas grags nying po kun gyibya// sa bon gu 'bras bu'adra// sa bo na 'bras bu logs na med// pha gdung ba rus sogs pa na/
61a1(rnying rgyud): bdanapa 'i ming yang med// rdu pa grus pa'i gal pa sa// gnasusags da kyimatshan byed pa// gnas ma mags can ra// rlung du na ga gad dang // dbatugs spyo tags
61a2(rnying rgyud): rnams// hung dngan sing sring gnyen 'brel 'dra// phan tshu dag gi 'brel ba yin// gnas lugs snying po lalta te// 'brudra na 'dzin chags rang byung gu// dper rnam bu gnyis kyi tshul// de las de brang 'brel ba yin// dgog drug
61a3(rnying rgyud): srogapa 'phrul ba rnams// bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs yin pas// rig sngags zhes ni rab tu brjod// gnas lugs snying po gzhi gcig pas// ngo bo nyid ces 'brel pa che// 'khor 'dus zung ngu 'brel ba yin// gzungs sngags zhes
61a4(rnying rgyud): ni rab tu brjod// sangs rgyas snying po 'gro ba yin// rang la rang chas rang la gseng // rang ngo rang gis ma shes pas// gsang sngags zhes ni rab tu brjod// thams cad gnas lugs snying po dang // gnas lugs ma bcos phyogs wa
61a5(rnying rgyud): med // rgya tshad med de rang byung bas// snying po sngags zhes rab tu brjod// 'brel pa'i ngo bo gnas lugs b+h+rUM// 'brel pa'i nges tshig kun dang 'brel// dbye ba de bsnyen sngags bzhir// mthun dpe drab la sogs lnga// zhes ba
61a6(rnying rgyud): bu gsung thugs rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ 'brel pa pho nges tshig sngags dang sbyar ba'i le'u skye bcu gsum pa'o// / rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs/
61a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni// kyis snying po ci yang med// dang po 'thungs med de stong // stong pa nyid la bu mnga' mod// dper nanam mkha' phyogs mtha' med// spyis snying po ci yang sen// mtshan mar mi 'dzin bla na med// de la na/
61b1(rnying rgyud): bcel bdag/ smon pa med ces bla dgas tsam// rang byung rang spang gzhan spang mad// mtshan mar mi 'dzin yul snang ste// yul sdang yod du rang la med// mtshan ma med ces rab tu brjod// ces gsungs nas/ lag na rdo rje la bka'
61b2(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje sgyu ma'i chos brgyad po de dang po gang nas byung / bar du gang na gnas/ mtha' ma gar 'gro zhes gsungs so// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sgyu ma de dang po rten 'brel las byung / bar du mig dang dbang po 'khrul pa la
61b3(rnying rgyud): gnas/ tha ma kun rdzob bden par 'gro lags so// zhes gsol bas/ ston pas yang bka' stsal bas/ sgyu ma rten 'brel las ji ltar byung / bar du dbang po ji ltar 'khrul/ kun rdzob tu ni ci ltar bden// zhes gsungs so// badz+ra pA
61b4(rnying rgyud): Nicis gsol pa/ sgyu ma yang dang po rdzas dang sngags kyi rten 'brel las byung / bar du dbang po 'khrul pas ngo mtshor ba'o// mtha' ma kun rdzob yin pas gtan du mig nas lags so// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje 'dzin pardzas gang yin/ ngo mtshar gang
61b5(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob gang bden ces pas/ badz+ra pA Ni sa yang gsol pa/ rdzas ni 'byung bzhi'o/ ngo mtshar ni dbang po lnga la'o// kun rdzob ni 'khrul pa'o// zhes gsol bas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ badz+ra pA Ni 'byung ba bzhi gang las byung /
61b6(rnying rgyud): dbang po gang la 'dzin/ 'khrul ba bden nam zhes gsungs pas/ badz+ra pA Nis yang smras pa/ 'byung ba bzhi nam mkha' las byung / dbang po'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa bden/ 'khrul pa 'gro ba la bden lags/ zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje
61b7(rnying rgyud): 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nam mkha' gang las byung / mtshan nyid cir 'dzin/ zhes gsungs so// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye kye 'gro ba'i mgon po lags// ma dpogs ma 'chol ma rig na// byungs mi gda'
62a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan mas 'khrul/ kun rdzob ma bden don dam dgas// zhes gsol bas/ 'tsho mgon rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// lags so legs sa rigs kyi phra// dung po sku mabyangs med// bar
62a2(rnying rgyud): sgyum gnas sa med/ mtha' ma sgyu ma 'gros med// sgyu ma de la mthong snang med// dper na phru ma'i mkhan po dang // sgyu ma'i slob ma mtshan bu dang // 'dus pa'i khrom sogs mthong ba gnyis// mthong sdang tha dad 'dzin yul gnyis// stag dang
62a3(rnying rgyud): ge la mo sogs// rnam pa sna tshogs cir yang snang // sgyu ma mkhan la mthong ba med// sgyu ma'i slob bus sgyu mar shes// 'jigs dang bag tsha chags sdang shes// phal pa rnams la 'jigs skrag dang // chags sdang rol mo bden par
62a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// sgyu ma byed pa'i mkhan po la// yul mi gnyis ka grub pa med// sgyu ma'i slob bu de bstan shes// phal ba chags sdang dngos por mthong // dngos por 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i chos// 'khrul pa yin pas yod pa med// sgyu ma de ni smon
62a5(rnying rgyud): pa med// sgyu ma mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med// sgyu ma stong pa yin pas stong pa nyid// sgyu ma yin lags cing yang med// sgyu ma'i sdang lpags cir yang med/ gcig tu ma yin ci yang med// de bzhin 'gyu dran 'dzin chags pa'i// ci yang
62a6(rnying rgyud): ma yin ci yang yin// ma bcos snying po 'gyur ba ci yang min// dran pa ci yang ma yin ci yang mi rnga// snying po phyogs su ma lhung ci yang min// snying po rang byung ci yang med// dang po 'gyu ba 'byungs med// bar du 'gyu dran gnas sa med// mtha'
62a7(rnying rgyud): ma 'gru dran 'gros med// byungs med do gzhi yi dras thag chod// yul med med bral ci yang med// ces gsungs so// lug sung thugs kyi chud las/ sgo gnyis spyam dris la de 'bru dran gnas lugs ci yang ma len pa'i lang
62b1(rnying rgyud): bcu bzhi pa la// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyan cig badz+ra k+Shi sogs// dper nam tshan mo'i khrelam gnyid// mdza' bo ying sdug grogs dang bu// shin tu longs spyod rkyen ldan nas// lo mang 'dre/
62b2(rnying rgyud): spyong gyur la// bu gi nor brtag mya ngan byas// sad par lur na gnyis ka med// de bzhin ma rig gnyid log ste// snod bcud dgra gnyen chags snang dngos// bden pa'i don du 'jig rten 'di// dge sdig las spyad yin min gyi// shes rab
62b3(rnying rgyud): sang gnyis ka med// de bzhin sku ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma'i tshogs sprul yod pa med/ sgra brnyan sgeg rgyu gzugs brtan dang // mig yor chu zla sprul ba rnams// yod nas mi snang med pas snang // spang ba reng gris spyod ma yin// da
62b4(rnying rgyud): rnam shes tshogs drug ni// mi la mo sbrum sprul par ltos// mthong ngam mthong na lta ba'i gdeng // legs par ma thong rnga bsgom par bya// ma mthong bar du ci zhig bsgom// sgo mdo shes pa shin tu dka'/ goms dang 'dris pas spyod pa skyed//
62b5(rnying rgyud): sdig pas kun gang byed kyang // mi lam sgyu ma'i stod par shes// dus gsum 'bral med 'bras bur 'gyur// snying po chos sku mngon kur yin// lta ba'i gnas lugs ma rtogs par// bsgom par byed pa'i bran po rnams// dper na rgyas med
62b6(rnying rgyud): lam 'dren 'dra// de bas mkhas pas legs par ltos// sgyu ma phrog yin gang snang kun// gang brtags snying po ma yin no// sgyu ma'i gzugs dang sgyu mi'i sgra// snga ma'i dri dang sgyu ma'i ro// snga mar shes na su ma bsgom// rmi lam gzugs dang
62b7(rnying rgyud): tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed rnam par shes// rmil ma shes na rmi lam bsgom// de bzhin sprul pa sna tshogs brkyad // mthong ngam shes na bsgom par bya// ma bcos rang byung lta ba rtogs// phyogs lhung rje chad med par bsgom// 9
63a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// zug sang thugs rdo rdzartsa pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ snga ma'i lha bsgom bstan pa'i le'u ba so pag// de nas nyan pas bka' stsa pa// nyon ci rdo rje dag rdo lung /
63a2(rnying rgyud): de las srog snying grub pa ni// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// bsgrub par bya ba rnam pa brjod// 'jam pal sku yi sgrub pa dang // badz+ragasung gi sgrub pa dang // yang dag zug kyi rtsub pa dang // bdud ci yon tan grub pa dang // zur badzin pa
63a3(rnying rgyud): grub pa dang // ma mo thod gtong sgrub pa drug/ 'jig rten grub pa rnam pa gnyis// dmod pa drag sngags sgrub pa dang // 'jig rten mchod bstod grub pa'o// sgrub pa chen po re re la// brgyad brgyad dag tu shes par byos// skra dang gsung dang thugs
63a4(rnying rgyud): dang ni// yon tan phrin las rbod gtong drug/ drag sngags mchod bstod rnam pa brgyad// 'jam dpal sku yi grub pa ni// 'khor lo bzhi la rdzogs pa yin// gnas pa'i 'khor lo gnas lugs bzhi// srid pa'i 'khor lo 'brel po'i tsho gas// sprul
63a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo chud pa'i chos// gcod pa'i 'khor lo srog snying gnyis// gnas pa'i 'khor los gnas lugs bstan// sred pa'i 'khor los rnang lugs bstan// sprul pa'i 'khor los sprul lugs bstan// gcod pa'i 'khor los phrin las
63a6(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal sku yaM sgrub pa rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// gru gsung thugs kyi chud las/ sku'i grub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// pad+ma gsung gi sgrub pa
63a7(rnying rgyud): yang // rgya chad phyogs lhung med par bstan// rta skad mtha' mas spyod pa bsta ni// sngags dang dam tshig dbang du bslu// rta skad dang po gnas lugs te// yi ge 'bru bzhi shes par bya// ka Sha gang tshogs kyis bstan// thazan gnas
63b1(rnying rgyud): gdams par gyis// ta skad par mas ltab btag/ chom bu bani tshoms brtag pa gnyis// chos kyi sgom zla skad gsung // dang a sogs thogs kyi shes// taska mthung ma min las pa'i// srog dang snying thos skrag thogs te// trU gang dang /
63b2(rnying rgyud): pos bsngag par bya// rta skad gnyis pas dran du gzhug/ rta skad gsum pas dbang du bsdu// rta skad mtha' ma'i go rim mo// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ gsung gi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas
63b3(rnying rgyud): yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// yang dag thugs kyi sgrub pa yang // ru lu 'bru brgyad dgongs par 'dus// ru lu'i ngo bo chos nyid yin// ru lu'i 'phro 'du spro lugs dang // ru lu'i rnam par dbye go dang // ru lu'i
63b4(rnying rgyud): mthar rdzogs 'bras bu rdzogs// ru lu'i chos nyid gnas lugs te// dpal chen rang bzhin bstan par bya// rang bzhin ye nas bcos pa med// de la rgya chad phyogs lhung med// ma bcos pas na rang byung yin// rang bzhin ci yang yin par
63b5(rnying rgyud): shes// rwa ni chos nyid dbyings su gcig/ wA ni gnas lugs skye ba med// ru lu skye 'gag med pa yin// hU~M ni thams cad snying po la// b+h+yo ni ma mo'i b+ha gar shes// ru lu chos nyid don du sbyar// ru lu'i 'phro 'du bstan pa ni// ting
63b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gsum gyis khog phub la// sems dpa'i rang bzhin gas la byas la// ru lu lhags su spo ba dang // ru lu mtshon char spo ba'o// mchod sbyangs dregs pa tshar bcad yin// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i don zhes bya// ru lu dbyangs su
63b7(rnying rgyud): shes bya ste// dung de zing de sha rtsab// gar rtsa ba dang cang ka de// bang ka ste la sogs pa'i dbyangs// srod dang tho ngas dus drug blangs// nyams dag 'azil gyis gnon pa yin// ru lu lha yi rnam pa yin// mu Ta dkyil 'khor chen
64a1(rnying rgyud): po yin// ru lu zhen las rang bzhin yin// ru lu sman drang bstod pa yin// swa lu chos nyid de ltar yin// du la don rtogs blta ba yin// goms pa mthur phyin 'bras bu yin// snang ba thams cad
64a2(rnying rgyud): togs// grags pa thams cad gsung du shes// gnyis su med par rtogs pa thugs// dpal chen re ba mi byed de// ngan song gnas la dogs mi byed// las 'dzin khur 'grogs rang ngo shes// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thug
64a3(rnying rgyud): zud las/ ru lu 'bru brgyad kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lag na rdo rje sogs// bdud rtsi yon tan sgrub pa ni// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhir 'du te// chos nyid 'du
64a4(rnying rgyud): pa dang // lha sngags bdud rtsi bstan pa dang // dam rdzas bdud rtsi bstan pa dang // sman mchog bdud rtsi bstan pa'o// chos nyid bdud rtsi zhes bya ba// ma rig 'khrul pa bdud yin gyis// gnas lugs ye shes rig brtsi/
64a5(rnying rgyud): byas pa'i bdud rtsi yin// gnas lpags ma bcos rgya chad med// phyogs med rang byung su za ba// rigs drug nyon mongs bdud kyi ci// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong bdud// chos sgo brgyad khri ba'i stong rtsi// chos nyid bdud rtsi che mchog
64a6(rnying rgyud): yin// lha sngags bdud rtsi bstan pa ni// phung po rnam lnga bdud yin te// che mchog rigs lnga'i d+hi yis btang // dam pa rigs brgyas rtogs tshogs bsgyur// oM AHhUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M Sh+T+rI dz+ra/ lha sngags bdud rtsir shes par b+ha/
64a7(rnying rgyud): yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pas// don mchog bdud rtsi zhes bya'o// dam rdzas bdud rtsi bstan pa ni// dam rdzas rnams la skyon med de// rnam rtog bdud la rtog med ce// mnyam nyid yon tan che mchog rtsi// sman rnams bcu
64b1(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba// 'du bar gyur pa bdud rnams la// sman la sel med mkhas pas btung // nad kyi bdud la sman gyi rtse// bdud rtsi'i yon tan bsam me khyab// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ bdud rtsi'i le'u ste bgu dbu
64b2(rnying rgyud): bya'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// phur bu thal 'byin dgongs pa ni// chos nyid ye shes phur ba dang // gsang ba byang sems phur pa dang // tshad med sbal ba'i phur pa dang // mtshan
64b3(rnying rgyud): mardzas kyi phur pa bzhi// gdab pa'i yul dang gdab pa'i thabs// thebs pa'i tshad dang ma thebs skyon// thebs pa'i 'bras bu phung bu rdzogs// chos nyid ye shes phur ba de// yul ni chos kyi dbyings la gdab// gdab thabs shes bya bzhi mor
64b4(rnying rgyud): thebs tshad gzhi lam gnyis su med// ma thebs nyon mongs chud drug 'khor// 'bras bu yul med chos kyi sku// gsang ba byung sems phur pad// rtog tshogs yum gyi mkha' la gang ba// mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras rnams bskyed// de la phung pa mthongs
64b5(rnying rgyud): na// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed mi nus// 'bras bu mtshon pa'i longs su 'byung // tshad med sprul pa'i phur ba ni// rigs drug 'khor ba'i yul la gdab// ma btab 'khor badrug tu 'artsams// btab pas thugs rje thabs kyis zin// thugs
64b6(rnying rgyud): rje'i dpyang thag chad pa'i phyir// 'bras bu 'gro don sprul skur rdzogs// mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa ni// bstan dgra dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gdab// thebs tshad phrin las rnam bzhir brtag/ mthebs ma shes dgra bgegs der// 'bras bu spu lnga ye shes
64b7(rnying rgyud): yang dag dgra bgegs zhi ba'i phyir// phur pa phrin las rim par bstan// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ phur pa gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// ma go nga
65a1(rnying rgyud): gtor sgrub pa ni// chos nyid gzhal ma mo dang // rtogs pa ye shas ma mo dang // 'khrul pa las kyi ma mor 'dus// mni nying po'i gnas lpags yin// so ni 'khor 'das gnas lugs yin// mnam bcos kun gyig na/
65a2(rnying rgyud): ni gzhi las cir yang srid// mni phyogs lhung rje chang med// oM ni rang byung kun gyi gzhi// mni snang srid nga las byung // chos nyid kun gzhi'i ma mo yin// mni chos kyi sgra yin na// mon longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sra// ma mo kun gyi
65a3(rnying rgyud): yin no// 'khor 'das ma lus 'byung sbrul swa// ye nas ma shes ye shes yin// 'byung la gyi la ma ma yin// sha khrag drod dbugs nang ma mo// rang sems kun srid gsang ba yin// kun gyi las b+hed las ma ma// derab srid pa'i yum
65a4(rnying rgyud): drug nas// gang rgya srin mo la sogs pa// gdul bya rten gyi ma mo yin// cal zhon nas khrag la rgyu// don snying yan lag dbang por bcud// 'byung 'jug dngas rtogs las byed pas// rnam shes nang gi ma mo yin// rang sems rnam shes
65a5(rnying rgyud): tazhon nas// yid chud 'gyu dran 'dzin chags kyis// chags sdang ye shes las byed pas// gsang ba sems kyi ma mo yin// ye shes ma mo dbyings kyi yum la chad// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// ma zad dbyings kyis ye shes
65a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor// las kyi mA mo dgral zad// dgra bgegs bdun rgyad tsa ba chad// ma rbad bstan pa'i chos la gnod// ye shes ma mo sgrib med// las kyi ma mo 'gag pa med// ma mo'i rigs nye bsam ma khyab// bye nang gsang ba'i ma ma
65a7(rnying rgyud): nas// nges pa rnon gyi ma mo dang // dbyings kyi ye shes ma ma dang // phan gnod kyi la ma mo dang // phan gnod nang gi ma mo dang // phan gnod gsang ba'i ma mo dang // sprul pa dam tshig ma mo rnams// cal gnas shing khrag la rgya/
65b1(rnying rgyud): rlung ma mor zhal 'chos dang // shan zag 'thung srog la gcod// bkrag mdangs 'phrog cing dbugs rngub pas// pho nya zod gtong ma mor byas// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las// bod gtong ma mo'i le'u ste nyer gcig
65b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa thams cad dbang du bsdus nas/ de yi las la rnam gnyis gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// 'jig rten las la rnam gnyis te// 'jig rten mtsho dang rtsod
65b3(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa ni// 'jig rten pho mo tshogs la ste// pha mes rgyud nas chags pa dang // slob dpon rgyud nas chags pa dang // rigs rgyud sngon nas chags pa dang // 'dug sa gnas shing chags pa dang // legs nyes zhal lces chags pa dang //
65b4(rnying rgyud): mgon skyabs stong grogs lha brgyad ni// phyogs su mchod cing bstan pa dang // lus dang grib bzhin 'grogs pa yin// shin tu nye bar bsten thabs la// khang bu bca' zhing rten btsugs la// tshul bzhin mchod cing dam bsres pas//
65b5(rnying rgyud): de ltar bcol ba'i las byed de// 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa yin// khye snying phrul chags ltar 'khor// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// /
65b6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bstan pa'i ru gzugs pa'i phyir/ dregs pa thams cad dang nga du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ rdo rje 'od 'phros pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu lha dang klu dang gza' rgod dang / bdud
65b7(rnying rgyud): dang / gshin rje dang / ma mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / btsan dang / srin po la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi baspu dang / sgra thams cad langs/ snying ni 'dar/ sems dang yid rnam shes stong pa ster baspangs te/ skad ci
66a1(rnying rgyud): ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas 'dar zhing yid yid phyag dang bsnor ba byas te rang rang gi srog gi snying po mdongs gsol du phul ba las/ de dag kun kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bsdus so// de yang
66a2(rnying rgyud): na
66a3(rnying rgyud): mdangs 'phrog cad gcod ma rnams dang / gshin rjed dmar nag reg tshod nams/ btsan a gi ba bzhi sde brgyad dang / gnam lcags thog 'bebs la sogs rnams dang / gtsug na me 'bar la sogs gnod sbyin rnams dang / lang ka
66a4(rnying rgyud): mgrin sngon gdod dmar la sogs srin po rnams dang / srog bdag rgyal po dkar nag dang / dge bsnyen klu tsha la sogs pa thams cad dbang du bsdus te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing legs nyes kyi stangs 'byed du dbang bskur ro//
66a5(rnying rgyud): dam la gnas shing bstan pa bsrung bar gyis shig/ ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ dregs pa can dbang du bsdus te las khrims phog pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
66a6(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// dmod pa drag sngags sgrub pa la// srog dang snying po gnyis kyis bsgrub// srog ni gzugs la snying po min// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// srog dang sro
66b1(rnying rgyud): na na na / na// 'dus nga s+ho// dung gas nga dru/ blan ma /
66b2(rnying rgyud): nga // re re la yang bdun badran no// de bad dmong parla ga sngags bdun// rigs nas pa dang ming nas thod// gsang mtshan mamang dras bod pa dang // rang tugs grog nas thod pa bdun// gang bag phrab par shes pa /
66b3(rnying rgyud): lham bod ba bdun// rtob ming 'i dru la ni rigs// ke ga sang mtshan nyis macad// ani nga rtags srog nyid yin// sam yini dmachog so// de nams gcig tudril nas spyod// tshangs pa 'ab 'jugs d+hi // dang thug
66b4(rnying rgyud): rten 'phrul// delas 'das pa'i drug thogs med// rgyu'i rigs kyi bod ba brnyan// gan sadza pa mi yin te// shA dzAngs tshigs sa// rgyu zhes ni rigs nas sod// bul thab na ma 'ad do// bani
66b5(rnying rgyud): du ma // drin dza ngas sul byung/ nin kyi pa shA ba dad dun 'das skye / ngas nam cang rtenan/ da du nubasadam tshan // dbar da bas /
66b6(rnying rgyud): gang dzin// sam pani nagal// gcig kyang dushin la pa yin// gnang byin zlapa 'did dkar bo// sbyin pa bdud kyi te// dganas drangs na ming yin te// thams drangs na gas martson min// dranas pa
66b7(rnying rgyud): yun zla bya brjeg sa / byin nyim thor gyi/ sam paci / 'irnams paci kyi gro / mi rgyab du dbyang brgyag/ tu ni 'di byag// ma marung la /
67a1(rnying rgyud): rigs nas bod pa yin// ru du mtshang nas bod pa yin// trag ni rang rtags srog yan la// ma 'a dra ru gsang mtshan yin// sa mA yA ni dam tshig go// gnyis gsum jug ka dril bas bod// bzang gri bod pa badz+ra
67a2(rnying rgyud): po ni// tha mas drangs na ming du bos// du ru ye ya rigs su 'jug/ tsan tis drangs na mtshang yin no// badz+ra thibs ni gsang mtshan no// du tri dang rtags srog nying yin// sa ma ya ni dam tshig yin// gnyis sam drug sdeb dril ba yin//
67a3(rnying rgyud): rigs bdun ni 'di lta ste// grang gis drangs pa ming yin te// rlung rigs nas bod pa yin// b+ha ga song nas bod pa yin// badz+ra gsung mtshan dri srog spring // sa ma ya ni dam tshig go// sdeb nas kun tshad dril pa yin// ging gi bdun yang 'di
67a4(rnying rgyud): dag ste// ging ka ming la rA tsa rigs// shi ma ni mtshang la thi ni rtags// tsa pa gsang mtshan bod pa yin// sa ma ya ni dam tshig go// de rnams gcig tu dril bas 'od// the brang sa d+ha sa drangs na ming // tri'u mtshang la tri du rtags// badz+ra gas
67a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ya tri rigs// dam tshig dral ba bdun yin no// gshin rje'i bdun ni 'di rnams te// praM sti ming la dri sna ma tshang // ya me gsang mtshan ya ma rigs// yak+Sha rang rtags srog snying rigs// sa ma ya ni dam tshig la// gcig nas dug sdeb
67a6(rnying rgyud): dral ba yin// 'jig rten kun 'jug khyab 'jug gza'// ka ta sa drangs na ming nas bod// d+ha hu la ni mtshang yin no// tsa pa ti drangs gsang mtshan la// ya mas drangs na pha ma'i rigs// pa sharang rtags srog snying yin// sa ma ya ni dam chog
67a7(rnying rgyud): ming nas dam tshig bar du mtshang // dral nas bod zad las sbyor yin// dregs pas sgrub pa de bzhin byos// legs par ma shes rang srog phud// legs par rtogs shing mkhas par gyis// ming nas bod panal ma yin// mtshang ni
67b1(rnying rgyud): tshig nus pa ste// mi 'ong ba yi rang dbang med// gsang mtshan rgyal ba slob dpon dka'// bka' las mi 'da' 'ong bar 'gyur// dam tshig sngon gyi khas blangs yin// dam las mi 'da' 'ong bar 'gyur// srog nas bos pas rang gis rang //
67b2(rnying rgyud): bskul nas rang dbang med par 'ong // rigs ni pa yi tshe 'brang ste// nye bar 'ong nas las byed de// dril nas bod pas 'grub par byed// rkyang pa gnyis sdeb gsum du dril// bzhi tshang lnga dril drug ka dril// sham bu'i sngags dang bdud
67b3(rnying rgyud): ldan na// dmod mo'i las 'grub gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ drag sngags dmod pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// // de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs/
67b4(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa 'das dang 'jig rten la// srog snying gnyis kyi bsrub pa bya// srog ni skra gsal gzugs gsal yin// snying po dpa' bo 'bru lnga dang // ya ma nA ga tri la sogs// drag sngags mi mtshang bod pa ste// bsnyen pa bslab dang la
67b5(rnying rgyud): sngags yin// srog ni gsal ba gsum gyis 'phrog/ dang po yid la gsal bar bya// dngos po lta bur gsal bar bsam// gnyis pa dbang po'i yul la gsal// bltas shing dngos po lta bur mthong // dper na chu nang zla ba bzhin//
67b6(rnying rgyud): dngos med dngos por gsal ba'o// gsum pa lus kyi reg byar gsal// che chung ci yang dngos su snang // yul gsum gsal ba rab kyi tshad// 'jig rten pa yi tshad yin no// gdams ngag mung du gdab pa yin// dngos po'i bdud kyis
67b7(rnying rgyud): bslus pa ste// yul med gdams pa rab tu gces// gsal stong don rtogs dngos su 'khor// srog gi don po dgu dang ldan// mthong dang reg dang za ba dang // 'jis dang gtam dang gzugs pa dang // bsgo dang ldan dang las byed dngos// 'jig
68a1(rnying rgyud): na ldan gdan po sa// sems bla // 6 du rgyags da ldan byab// lan tang gnas na dungs myed dang // na sto sa na pan// na ngas na gzhi 'ang+yas//
68a2(rnying rgyud): na /
68a3(rnying rgyud): nor bu sprin chen 'chang ba 'dra// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ sgrub pa don po dbu kyi nang gsang ba gsum du thob pa cang bstun pa'i le'u d+hAr lnga pa'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal ba// nyon cig 'dus pa rdo rje'i 'khor//
68a4(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i lam byed pa// 'dang cig pa byu sa// da mangs nipa hrIH/ ma mo// de chos sa ni babyung pa ma/ la nyis drang pa'i ma// gal ga she rjong pa'i na/
68a5(rnying rgyud): lug kyi 'brug gdug pa'i lo// ma bu dgra thogs rang gshed btag/ rab 'bring po bzung ste// bzhin bsrub las gsum mkhas pas 'jug/ 'dod zad bsad gsum 'gru par byed// rgyal blon khams dang chu dus kyi// thebs ldog
68a6(rnying rgyud): lngas kun mkhas pas brtag/ shar wA nub byang skar skor bdun// gang chos nya stong lo gza' bsten// bzang ngan dus tshod mkhas pas brtag/ nga'i the'u chen yangs pa 'di// phan gnod las kun mdor bsdus bstan// 'gro drug phyi nang chu 'bras
68a7(rnying rgyud): ga pas lam sru / thomang baben nani nas so// nga'i med mi'i la 'ang ga to// dedagum ba ga pa pa ma'ad/ bas 'a// gas mas pa srungs/ 'bra' gro
68b1(rnying rgyud): nyir drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rigs 'khor// gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir// thams cad 'brel te 'dus pa yin// chu dang lung dang man ngag gsum// yi ge gsum
68b2(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa yin// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che// rdzong 'phrang gsum gyi mtha' la gtug/ rnal 'byor gsum gyis nyams su blang // lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu yin// bskyed pa'i rdzong dang bskyed pa'i 'phrad// rdzogs pa'i rdzong dang rdzog
68b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'phrang // rdzogs chen rdzong dang rdzogs chen 'phrang // yo ga gsum du rig par bya// bde gshegs snying po sems nyid do// ma bcos rang yan rgya phyogs med// 'khor 'das snang srid de las pa skyed// kun gzhi sems kyi rjod chen ma hA yin//
68b4(rnying rgyud): dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de ka rgyud// khams gsum rigs drug 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal rgyud// ye shes 'khrul pa'i 'phrang las bskyed pa'o// don dam ngo bo ma skyes kyang // kun rdzob lha yi dkyil 'khor du// rim gyis bskyed pa
68b5(rnying rgyud): ma hA yo ga yin// kun gzhi snying po sems la rdzogs// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzong // lung mchog ma bcos rang byung lung // rgya chad phyogs ltung med par rdzogs// spyi sa kun gzhi rdzong chen las// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags 'brang
68b6(rnying rgyud): rtog 'khrul// a nu yo ga'i lung zhes bya// snying po'i don la kun ka rdzogs// bcos dang ma bcos gnyis ka'i rdzong // phyogs su 'dod pa'i 'phreng las thar// bskyed dang rdzogs pa gnyis kA'i rdzong // gong 'og phyogs 'dod 'phrang las thang //
68b7(rnying rgyud): rang byung rdzogs chen 'gran med rdzong // be ltos grub pa'i 'phrang las thar// 'gran med rdzogs pa chen po yin// ye nas shes la bcos pa med// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ yo ga gsum gyi rdzogs 'phang
69a1(rnying rgyud): le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ nyan cig lag no rje 'dzin// gsang sngags 'bras bub+hU med 'di// lha sgod gnyis su shes par gyis// brjod da 'jog pa
69a2(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa rgyud kyi lta ba ni// thams cad shes rab gnyis med pa lta// su gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rnam pa lnga ru spyod// rdzogs pa lung gi lta ba ni// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med blta// kun bzang yab yum sras ltar spyod //
69a3(rnying rgyud): mnangag rdzogs chen lta ba ni// rang byung ye shes phyogs med pa ste// dgag srub srang blang med par spyod// thabs kyi rdong la shes rab 'phreng // lta ba'i rdzong la spyod pa'i 'phrang // sku gsung thugs kyi 'phyang la gzung // dbyings kyi rdzong la
69a4(rnying rgyud): sun su lta
69a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i g.yang sar lhung bar mchi// kun rdzob dus na don dam yin// thabs kyi nges na shes rab yin// bskyed pa'i dus na rdzogs pa yin// sku dang ye shes de ltar 'grub// lha yi dkyil 'khor dbyings su 'dod// yum dang sras kyi
69a6(rnying rgyud): dgra de 'brang // 'dod pa'i 'jang la 'jigs pa'i bdud// 'dod pa 'khor ba'i g.yang la lhung // dbyings dang rig pa'i ye shes so// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su meng // dbyings kyang rang las byung shes pas// ye shes yul med rang zung
69a7(rnying rgyud): rig/ yab yum sras kyi 'dod pa bral// lha spyod gnyis kyi mtha' las grol// rdzogs pa'i dus na rdzogs chen yin// spang srid sems su blta ba la// phyogs med phyogs pa lta gsang ba'i dag/ kha 'khyams nag 'khyams 'jigs pa'i 'brang //
69b1(rnying rgyud): thang mad rdo rje bu nga pa lhung // rang sems cargya chad phyogs lhung med// rang byung chos su le nas yin// lta ba'i rdzong la spyod pa'i 'phang // myor sgrol gyi nang gsang ba gsum// thabs kyi rlong dang shes rab rtor// rig pa dang byung gnyis med rjod/
69b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa rgyud kyi rdzong du shes// bsnyen bsgrub cho ga sgrub pa'i lam// byor sgrol nyams len spyod pa'i 'phrang // rgud kyi lugs su mkhas pas spyang // dbyings kyi rdzong dang ye shes rjod// lus gnyis sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin 'brang // sgra lus
69b3(rnying rgyud): 'pho shes rdong 'thung ni// rdzogs pa lung gi rjong 'phang ngo // gnas lugs pazhi sgor rdzogs pa'i rdong // chos can gcig la chos kun rdzong // mi yengs mnyam gzhag sgom pa'i 'phrang // cir spyad dang byung sprod pa'i 'phang // man
69b4(rnying rgyud): ngag rdzogs chen rjong 'phrang yin// gsang ba'i dgra gsum bsad pas 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi choms// 'gro drug g.yangs bcad pas 'di dka'i 'thung las grol// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ yog gsum
69b5(rnying rgyud): kyi lha spyod rdzong 'phang dubastan pa'i la 'u ste ter brgyad pa'o// / de nas par bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// spang ba 'tsho byed rgyal po ni// rnam cha la sa yi bdud rtsis bya// 'byung 'khrugs nang dang rkyen byed
69b6(rnying rgyud): bgegs// byang chub sgrub pa'i grogs chen yin// dge bshes rnal 'byor sngags 'chang nas// byis pa pho mo gtsang ma dang // wa spyang thun yang bgacig gtang // bdud cin ma lnga tshil chen gtang // khyi phig sha tshil phran yang gtang /
69b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems rnams tshogs tshad bsag/ bzang drug la sogs 'bras bu gsum// chos kyi sman gyis gtso bo bya// mar bag gro dang bsil sman dang // tsong zhi mu bir mo shags// gu gul rgya tshil ma gi ta// can danag pur la
70a1(rnying rgyud): la sogs te// thogs kyi ta ni bsag par bya// bdud cu dri chen khal gcig gam// ci 'byor ci mang legs bskams dang // bum pa brtsegs mar ldugs pa'i tshe// mararA khISh+Ta khabus btab byas la// dz+wal chen
70a2(rnying rgyud): bcud can rus pa gzhug/ shin tu dod nang bum pa gzhug/ sa mtshams bum pa brtsegs byas te// gsang sgo bum pa lnga mas bring // shin tu gdug pa'i shing brtsigs te// me bajug 'bar ba'i bor dag du// chu gtor kyad gtor phud
70a3(rnying rgyud): gtad la// bden pa bdar la mtshams bcad de// bum pa yi dam dkyil 'khor dmigs// dri chen lha tshogs khros par dmigs// lcags sam gtsub shing me bton la// gdug pa'i shing la sbar bar bya// bsnyen grub yi dam gzhung du
70a4(rnying rgyud): bsrang // gtor tshogs mchod pa ci ldan dbul// dri rlangs mi gtang kha srub bsdam// zhag gcig dag tu me mig cad// mi shi dngos grub tshul du blangs// rang bza' lha la mchod pa bya// bdud rtsi mar khu rin chen sdod// la 'am zla ba'i
70a5(rnying rgyud): zhag grangs su// gzhan la mi bstan gsang bar bya// dngos grub mi yal dam tshig yin// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyung las/ rdzas bsag cing bdud rtsir bzhu ba'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// / de nas pa
70a6(rnying rgyud): rdordo rje stan las langs nas/ gtso ba mdun du 'dug gdong du bltas nas mig mi 'dzub par bral ma ltar te gus par btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// tse s+ye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // bdud ci mar khu la naM// yon tan tsam 'byung ba lags// gro
70a7(rnying rgyud): suM gang dong sbyor bar bya// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa rjod// bdud rtsi mar khu bza' bar bya// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba dang // 'byung ba sgoms nas lus bde ste// 'gegs kyis mi
70b1(rnying rgyud): chu pa ma nang // ma rnams kyi gas gyur// nas pas sa nas na// gan dunas zugs namamangs nams sa sa dun/ sa na sa/ sa pas/
70b2(rnying rgyud): da// snang ci ba snya/ dan pa ga dga' jigs sa// bzang basbyin na po dang // ba pa ga drus byas // del bu ma ma ma ma nyi pa ta
70b3(rnying rgyud): 'i rgyab mthogs// kau nyid lta ba mas gsung sngags brgyas// khamathas 'angs pas chog pa ste// drag sul mi byags pa 'thod// yid dang gagis brtson 'bras bya// tshelo dpag tu med pazlab// bdud mchog 'du ces pa /
70b4(rnying rgyud): lo gcig zos pas lo brnag// longs spyo nor gyi bdag por 'gyur// lagasum thos na snyam bcwa thub// ming gcig nor la dang byed 'gyur// kho bzhi thos nam mo dang // mubar 'bro ma yis rdzogs byed de// mi ma rnams
70b5(rnying rgyud): dbang byed 'gyur// mo lnga thos na skyes pa 'dra// rgyal po rgyal srid ster bar 'gyur// lo drug la bdun thos pas ni// rog gi sbal dbang byed 'gyur// mi brgyad long bu 'di thosan// dug dang dug gis tshugs med dun
70b6(rnying rgyud): ngo brgyar pos ni mtshon dang ni// bsad pas mi mad tshal dbang // mi med ri dgas pa ldang bya/ mi nad mi gcing gnas pa yin// gzhung dang tshul du 'di bsgrubs na/ nges par che ba gi 'don jig// thos gsungs so//
70b7(rnying rgyud): yul rgyad las/ bcu gyis spyang badrang rin gyi'i bu byas ma thub gro// nas pang bzhi' bya pa/ nya kya rje na gyi// gsung ba nga 'bras pa'i mis// 'a thog cad bcung 'grabs// bdu byas
71a1(rnying rgyud): rtser gyur// gu grul tshul chen dpon dang // glatso bongs lhas byug bza'// gsang bdag bya khrung rta masbyin bsgom// yid ma bsnyen skabasngags bzlas gdab// zhag grangs bdun du thos bslab na// yang nam
71a2(rnying rgyud): nad las thar// bdud rtsi mar khu de nyid dang // tsong zigu gul gyi tshar gyur// sngags bzlas zos nagag pa thug// spangs 'bur nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi bzang drug sde rjes dang // shu dag dkar po k+Sha rtsi skyer// sngags bzlas zos na
71a3(rnying rgyud): rIm sA las thar// bdud rtsi sgog rgya gA rtsi drang // nyung dkar mi rus mA zi sbyar// zos pas 'bum bA dkar nag gi// nad rims las ni thar bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi a ru dang ni// zangs g.ya' a ba l+ya 'bum dang // zhi ma thig le dang sbyar rngos na//
71a4(rnying rgyud): mig gi nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi skyed pa'i mchis pa dang // ti rtse mu zi sbyar thugs na// ma yi nad las grol bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi srog pa rdog gcig ma// nyung 'bas mar khu nyung dkar sbyar// dug las grol bar byed pa yin// bdu
71a5(rnying rgyud): gu'i klad pa dang // ro tshan tshil khu ba dang // dom gyi mkhris pas dug nad sel// lo drug gyur ba'i dug las thar// bdud rtsi mkhris pa thang nung sbyar// za 'gug gang nar byug pas grol// 'o mar bdud rtsi mu zi byug/ shu ba'i nad las grol bar
71a6(rnying rgyud): byed// bdud rtsi srog g+ha byi tang ka/ gla ci sbyar na srin las grol// bdud rtsig dang pi pi ling // pho ba ris dang bu ram gyar// ku ku dA tsa'i pags pa gding // gtum mo me ye ting 'dzin bya// grang ba'i nad las thar bar byed// bdud rtsi tsan dan dkar po
71a7(rnying rgyud): dang // cu gang dkar po dri chu dang // kha ba'i sman dang lcar la gtang // tsha ba'i nad las thar bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi gu gul gyi tshil dang // ti cher gzho ba ko gzhol dang // khrag rul ba tsan dug la sogs kyar// spangs pa'i nad las grol bar byed//
71b1(rnying rgyud): du bye nas drug// ma gas na las sa bar byed// bdu tha ba gyur// 'bas seMn pas gro bar byed// bdudas masu pa dang // thungs gi skyed pa na// tha jigs stiganadal sa// bdu bye sa
71b2(rnying rgyud): bde bcud len shin tu bzang // 'dud rtsi'o ma gyang thos na// shin tu shwa madrangs dkar ba yin// bdud rtsi tsha sbu bu ram dang // gzemar myar na mkhal nad 'tsho// bdud rtsi mar khwa rba rta dang // ma bya'i sgo dang phyar bas na// rna ba'i na la pan
71b3(rnying rgyud): bar byed// bdud rtsi bya'i zas drang ni// a drang dang gtsor byung // l+r-ing gi nad las grol bar byed// bdud ci zag thun sbyang bas ni// mchin pa'i nad las thar bar byed// bdud rtsi kar sro lor gyur// glo yi nad las grol bar byed// bcwa
71b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad dang bas ni// rlung gi nad las thar bar byed// bdud rtsi dung bying kyi tshod spyang // bu 'i nad las grol bar byed // bdung rtsimed pa sgra chags myeng // mag seMn las zar bar byed// 'dud rtsi ma dang byung byas na// ba dz+ra
71b5(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa na// ban ci gling ka sogs// gzeng ba'i dngadu las grol bar byed // bdud kyi byang chub sems dung phyung // bdud ba le zhag dang byed// bdud ni ba tar myogag/ gang makyogs dngas sreg 'thob par byed// bdud rtsi ga pa rjen
71b6(rnying rgyud): 'i mig/ thos na mtshan mo mthong badzin// skyes gsungs so// phyug sra thugs kyi chud las/ bdud rtsi nas pa'i yon na sa le n+d+he so ga ma// / de na dom 'dzin pa yis// don 'chang la 'di sa smrags/ ban /
71b7(rnying rgyud): de ltar la byed sman gsungs nas// slong 'gro la na gnod las rnams sreng // rang gzed rnam pa phres khams// brtan pa bcung gyi gsung drugasopa// ces gsol bas// den yang gis bka' stsal pa// ni ci 'dzin sogs//
72a1(rnying rgyud): sleb la gapa' skar// dus chod mtshon chas srog la dbab// me chu shing dang sa sngags la// rang gshed dang la 'bab d+has bya// kung la phur pa shing gis gangab// glang lug 'brug dang khyi yi gshad// shA ra skar dug dang stan yos
72a2(rnying rgyud): lpag+sa// shang la nyi ma mi gad mar dang // rta sbrul lho skar drug dang spang // ji la zla ba lag pa des// byi phag byang skar drug la'o// khyi 'brug shar skar bzhi yis so// skag la pa ba sangs bya spel// nub skar drug dang gyur bar bya// kung la sgeg gi thod par bya// rtag la na
72a3(rnying rgyud): gi song bar bya// ji la 'u yi thod par bya// shang la ji yi thod par bya// bul krung gis thod par bya// gshed kyi zla ba bstan pa ni// dpyid ston rab stag spel keg/ ston dpying 'bring po bya yos ke ga/ dpyid ston tha ma 'brug gi ker// dbyar 'bring dgran 'bring bya rta'i ke /
72a4(rnying rgyud): dbyar dgun tha ma glang lug ke ga/ dbyar dgu na rab phag sbrul keg/ zhag ka ga dus tsheng mkhas pas brtag// rang gshed dus la bab dus bya// pho mo skor skor dgra grogs gshed// gza' rgod 'gyu rus phung bar nges// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ ngan skabs
72a5(rnying rgyud): gshed ma gtsug lag rtsis kyi bstan pa bzung ba'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir// so so'i bye bo lha mi nas// khams gsum 'gro ba rigs drug dang // log lha mu stegs rtag chad dang // nyan thos sde pa rang rgyal nas//
72a6(rnying rgyud): byang sems dbu ma sems tsam dang // kri ya u pa yo ga ste// ma hA a nu a ti rnams// theg chen rdo rje 'di dang 'brel// don rnams la shan mkhas pas dbye// dang po rab tu dga' ba nas// bcu pa bcu gsum sa lam yang // theg chen gnas lugs 'di dang 'brel// don 'brel don
72a7(rnying rgyud): la bci bar bya// gnas lugs snying po bzhi skor la// chos sku'i dgongs pa shes par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bya// de yi don la rnal 'byor brtson// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yin// gnas lugs don la yengs pa med// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa yin// gnas lugs ma
72b1(rnying rgyud): bcas phyogs lhung med// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yin// snying po'i don rtogs cir yang bzod// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin// de yi gdams pa 'khor la sbyin// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin// gnas lugs snying po bzhi skong shes// ye shes pha rol phyin pa yin// chos su'i snying po gnas
72b2(rnying rgyud): lugs so// smon lam pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// gnas lugs tho chen bzhi yis mtshon// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin// 'khor 'das rgya thos mya ngan 'das// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin// gsang sngags 'bras bu bla med 'dir// thams cad rgyun chad med par 'brel// rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba yin// de
72b3(rnying rgyud): lung 'khor 'dus pho mos blangs// lung mchog dgongs pa 'dus pa yin// tshegs med pa ru gsang ba shes// man ngag tshegs chung don chen yin// des ni rang dbang rang rig thob// dbang mchog rgyal po rang dbang yin// gnas lugs snying po bzhi skor yin// 'da' ba'i sa med dam tshig mchog/ snying po
72b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil la bzhi skor 'khor// dkyil 'khor 'phros pas dkyil 'khor mchog/ gnyis su med pa mchod pa'i mchog/ rnal mar rtogs pas rnal 'byor mchog/ kun la bsngags pas gsang sngags yin// kun gyi las rdzogs phrin las yin// mtshan nas brjod med bsgom pa yin// de ltar spyod pas spyad
72b5(rnying rgyud): pa yin// nang ngo rang shes lha dang mjal// chos sku 'bras bu lha yi mchog/ ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ thams cad 'brel ba rdzogs tshul gyi le'u ste so gsum pa'o// // de nas yang lag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol/ kye kye rdo rje chos kyi sku// rgyud chen 'di yid dpe ni gang // de la mtshan du ji
72b6(rnying rgyud): skad gzung // dus tshod gang du dar bar byed// ces gsol pas// rdo rje chos skus bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rig 'dzin rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje pho mo 'dus pa'i tshogs// nga yi rgyud chen kun yang sa 'dir// dper na nam mkha' ji bzhin te// phyogs bcu mi dmigs phyogs bcu'i gzhi// kha dog ma yin kha dog gzhi// dper rnga nam
72b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' chen po 'dra// dper na chu yi rgya mtsho 'dra// dper na rin chen gser dang 'dra// dper na nor bu rin chen 'dra// dper na mun pa nyi ma 'dra// dper na skye 'khrungs sa dang 'dra// dper nad pa mig mangs 'dra/ dper na rma byas dug dang 'dra// dper na ldan mkhas sman dang dra// dper na 'jim pa'i gzugs dang 'dra// dper na
73a1(rnying rgyud): sas rgyas sman du du// na rnamam ngas pa 'ang// de mdud pon thun pa da do// bdud dang du ci bu'in// snong shing ba/ payin/ ga pa da smra ba san// song bzeng thags su na// zhe la gong da dang dos phra// de 'azhis pa chen pan she
73a2(rnying rgyud): dir// kun ga zhi'i gnas lugs ston pas na// ting po phyeg zhi chud du zang // thams cadag yang bcos pa med// ma bcos pa 'i nyud du zang // gang gi tshogs su byung ba med// phyogs spang med pa'i chung du zang // gang yang / tshad med par brtan// ma ched med pa'i drud du byu// thams cad rang sa
73a3(rnying rgyud): sa na// rang byung chen po'i klud tu zung // thams cad 'di dang 'brel pa to// 'brel pa chen po'i drung du zung // srug sung thugs las 'ayud med pas// rdon chen po'i thang du zang // rtsa ba thams cad 'di la rdzogs// rtsa ba rtogs pa'i drung du zung // lha sgom pa spyod pa 'bras// yi ge 'bul rdo stod pas/
73a4(rnying rgyud): rjod chen po'i chung ngu thung // yi ge'i tshogs kyis thams cad 'grol// yi ge 'gros kyi rgyud du byung // rten de la brten gdams dag brten// rten 'brel chen po'i drung du byung // yul mi gnyis kyi blo 'dog gcod // 'brel ba log non chung ngu zung // bden mnyam rdzun mnyam rang med rton/
73a5(rnying rgyud): zad rgyan zad rgyud du krung // zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ dpe dang mtshan gyi lde'u ste so bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang ni gangams pa ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje'i 'khor// byang zhig gtad do rdo rje 'dzin// legs par chongs shig rigs kyi bya// nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu// chos la dar nub gsum
73a6(rnying rgyud): 'ong gi// dus kyi snyig snga ma las ngan byed// de dus dra si chud 'di 'byung // sems can bsod nams bri ba'i rtags// tshe thung nad mang longs spyod kyang // nyon mongs rags te nad 'khrug 'ong // kun lagaces pa'i rgyal khrims nyams// nga spyang nga sprin g.yo sku yis// de tshe rab tu byung ba kun// 'dul khrims g.yo
73a7(rnying rgyud): dang tham du byed// rje pa'i gnas brtan dmas dpon byed// dge slong sgom chen gram pa byed// dga' spyod byams sgo mdag la bstod// blags pa dam tshig mi bkra shing // phyi rol mu stegs spapa 'a byed// ngan sngags 'ab 'dig nang da me byed// gtso brgyad 'chang mna' la // dmangs sun rang dag 'do tsha thal/
73b1(rnying rgyud): ni khrel shor dag choms byed// man tshwa shor lus tshags stod// kun pa dkon mchog dkor la 'bags// byis brgan grod las la brtson// gnyen du btsas pas dgra ru 'ongs// bas na drug gi kha len byed// myur bsten pa ni bdud du 'babs// gdon duglu dang sa bdag srung // ini btsan dang rgya ros
73b2(rnying rgyud): 'dren/ nang du rims dang dug gis 'de bla// chos skor dgra tshad byed pa ste// a rabs lam 'phrang bsrung zhing 'tsho// khrims la bag tsam gnas pa'i tshe// nga yi rgyud kyis grol bar byed// rgyud chen nor bu nam mkha' 'di// nor bu nam mkha' 'di thos pas// thos pas dred pa'i gting 'khyags dang // bros zung
73b3(rnying rgyud): blo l+la ma rtogs mang dang // kha da kar gtid nag sreg gangs 'dra// gzhogs slod snying 'dod rdo gser chu// skyer tsher dar gyis gtums 'dra la// srog chags kun pa'i kha bzhin sdom// che rgyud dregs pas bcing ba bzhin// btsun pa btsad po slob dpon dang // rje dpon sngags kyi snod min gsod// bstan yang
73b4(rnying rgyud): bran med snod nga na gnyis// bu dang chung ma gnyis las sde// 'jig rten nur 'gyur 'bred sngon byed// ser rdzas gtod phod tshul la sdom// lha log mu stegs skyon can gzhi// dam med slob dpon mnyes mi byed// ru ma thugs sems can chung bzhin sdom// dad pa sgron med gsang brdu
73b5(rnying rgyud): bla ma rnam gnyis rtag tu 'khud// bla ma mnyes byed gtong phod che// srog lus bu smad nor mi 'phangs// laM lo g.yo med dam tshig brtson// tshe chen baphrag med theg chen blo// bag yangs spyod pa gsang ba thub// dbang po skyon med yan lag bde//
73b6(rnying rgyud): drang khams bzang nyams su len// gzhan gyis mi 'gyur gcig la gdams// kha gcig gting gcig byis pa'i spyod// de 'dra'i skal ldan bu yis spyod// ces gsungs so// de nas ston pa nyid mya ngan las 'das so// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'dus
