73b7(rnying rgyud): bdernam rjes su yi rang nas mngon par bstod do// sku gsung thugs rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i spyad las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste so lngapa'o// rdzogs so// / sh+tsan gyi slob dpon babu dang / bod ci dge slong nam mnga'i byeng pos brdzur cing gtan la rang pa'o// // rgyan bya/
74a1(rnying rgyud): ma / !rmu ga na/ rnams thal ma la/ bdagadas/ thos rnams da rdzogs cag cig thugagacig nas la 'ag/ gdag zhan na zug
74a2(rnying rgyud): brdal khyab chen po'i klong laphyag 'tshal lo// tadu chud thams cad kyi rgyal po/ 'dus pa lung thams cad kyi spyi 'brel/ gsang ba man dag thams cad kyi nges don/ theg pa thams cad kyi yang d+he/ bstan pa thams da m+b+hi 'byung gnas/
74a3(rnying rgyud): gsung rabs ma lus pa'i snying khu/ dgongs pa thams cad kyi zhe zhugs/ chos thams cad kyi me long / don tha ma cad kyi mjug sdud/ jo slod thams cad kyi mdod / des don thams cad kyi rgya mtsho// theg pa thams nad b+hI s+thi gud/ blta
74a4(rnying rgyud): bathams cad kyi yang rtse/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi yab/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi sgyum/ bstan pa thams cad kyi bu gcig pa/ tan+da 'bum phrag zug cu rtsa bzhi'i bcud/ gsang ba bas kyang yang gsang ba/ kun tu bzang ngo la 'khrul pa'i dag
74a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ gzhi'i 'jug tshul 'khor ba dong lugs su smyon pa/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi yang zhun/ man med pa'i thig le'i dgongs pa/ log par bya// ba rnams cad kyi gnyen po/ ma rig pa thams cad kyi sun bsel ba/ ye shes kyi snang ba/
74a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad sbyin pa/ nam tog tu tha thams cad gcod pa/ phyogs gcig tu tu chad pa med par ston pa/ sdang ba'i 'gag la gnyis su med pa shad zol du smyon pa/ ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa/ sbrang rmel cing yang snang ba/ yin tshul des
74a7(rnying rgyud): bded par sbron pa/ bran dang bral cing ci yang mgrangs pa/ mtha' bzhi mo gags su bzhi nga ze' ba/ nyams med babs pa'i gdeng du nyon pa/ 'dzin pa med pa bsgom pa'i gdeng du zhon pa/ thang ding med pa spyod pa'i di dang du rton pa/
74b1(rnying rgyud): thob med pa 'bras bu'i gdeng du ston pa/ dngos po thams cad rang grol du gtan la 'bebs par byed pa 'di nyid/ chos nyid grag stong du thos pa'i dus gcig na/ gnas 'og min chos kyi pho brang sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnam par dag pa rgya rkad gyogs srung tshad las
74b2(rnying rgyud): 'das pa/ rang byung 'od kyi gzhal yas khang / chos nyid kyi mkha'/ dbyings nyid kyi klong/ sems nyid kyi gnas 'byams klas pa na/ ston pa rig stong kun tu bzang po nyid/ ma bcos spos bral byang chub snying po'i ngang la rang shar te/ zhab phyag gi rnam
74b3(rnying rgyud): par bzhengs nas/ sngon du byung ba'i 'khor ni nyid kyi ngo bo chos kyi sku dang / nyid kyi rang bzhin longs khyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / nyid kyi thugs rje sprul pa'i sku dang / zhi khro'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dang / khyad par bu'i 'khor rdo rje'i rigs
74b4(rnying rgyud): dang / rin chen rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / las kyi rigs dang / bde gshegs rigs dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sa chu me chung nam mkha' dang / 'dod khams dang /
74b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / shin tu rnal 'byor dang / yongs su rnal 'byor/ rnal 'byor chen po dang / sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar ba dang / dag pa dang / ma
74b6(rnying rgyud): dge ba dang / sgo skur can dang / gyi pA'i 'khor gyi dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / mu stegs dang / mAr thug dang / rgyang 'phen dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang dri za dang bcas pa'o// gsung gi 'khor nI/ nyan thos dang / rang rgyal
74b7(rnying rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / kr-i ya dang / u pa dang / yo ga dang / ma hA dang / a nu dang / a ti dang / a ti chen po dang / rdul dang / mun pa dang / snying stobs dang / phyi'i rtag chad mu bzhi'o// thugs kyi 'khor ni/ gsal stong dang /
75a1(rnying rgyud): sdang stong dang / 'an stong dang / grag stong dang / reg sbyong dang bcas te/ nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / rnga bo dang / thugs rje dang / chos nyid kyi rdo rje 'dus ma byas pa rnams dang mi 'byed cing / 'gyed pa po mang thub/ mnyam da /
75a2(rnying rgyud): lhun grub klong yangs na thabs gcig tu gnyis su mod par bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rig stong kun tu bzang po de nyid 'khor shes rig sde tshogs pa rnams byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir/ 'khor thams cad kyi thugs la thim zhing / rang zung gi ye
75a3(rnying rgyud): shrIs gsal la/ mi snang ba dang / mi mdzad pa dang / mi 'phro ba dang / mi 'du ba dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / mi 'ong ba dang / mi 'gro ba dang / mi gnas pa dang / ltung de/ lhan ne/ lhag ge/ lha ma me/ thal le ba dang / dri ma med pa'i
75a4(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i tog dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo rnam par rol pa dang / glog gi phreng ba dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / 'od 'bar ba dang / phyag mchil
75a5(rnying rgyud): gyis gnon pa dang / 'bar chen sbom pa dang / chos nyid sna tshogs pa dang / rnam par bkod pa rnam snang rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ thams cad thig le nyag gcig la bkod nas bstan pa rin po che rnams/ thams cad ma/
75a6(rnying rgyud): mi 'byed/ yid la bdag tu med pa'i klong nas klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud 'di nyid/ brjod du med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / bltar med pa dang / cung zad med pa dang / mnyan du med pa dang / rang bzhin med pa dang / byin 'da' dang /
75a7(rnying rgyud): yul can ma yin pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / so ma dang / gnyug ma dang / lkug me dang / rnal ma dang / ma bzos pa'i ngang nas phub grub cing dang grag po'i tshig tu rang bar ro// sarba ma la a pa mal rta thim/ kairba A lo ke/ anan pa nis/
75b1(rnying rgyud): sngon ma ashA // / mAm/ // / nga gan sa myos// smras nga sa thas byung ba 'das na// ma spod su myed dag pa'o// / skang thab med pa'i rang sras s+ho// grub ma byung ba'i bla gnas/
75b2(rnying rgyud): mi grag grag stong tshul du ni// / thos ma myong ba'i chos nyid gtam// ye klong chen po'i don rnams kun// 'di yi yul du shar grol te// spros med spros pa'i rgyu med pas// mnyam yang chos kun ma 'dres par// thig le nyag gcig
75b3(rnying rgyud): ngas bshad nyon// e ma ho// lta ba rang byung ye shes ltos// dge sdig las 'das ngo mtshar che// gzhi ni ma bskyod khyab gdal che// lus ngag lta sgom phan gnod bral// dngos po gshis kyi 'dug tshul ltos// snang ba ma bsgyur
75b4(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar che// bde sdug dran pas ma ci shar yang // don la 'gyur med dngos po bral// stong pa ye shes kun 'byung ltos// dran pasam spyod pa sna tshogs kun// rol pa'i rtsal shar ngo mtshar che// skye 'gag gnyis kyi mtha' dang bral//
75b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid kun khyab ye shes ltos// skye med lhan skyes ngo mtshar che// skye 'gro kun gyi srog bcad kyang // dge sreg phan gnod gnyis dang bral// rang shes stong pa kun snang ltos// rang snang dang grol ngo mtshar che// cho 'phrul sna tshogs ci shar yang // /
75b6(rnying rgyud): thog ma'i gzhi las g.yos pa med// rig stong kun grol snang ba smos// rang gis rang rnyed do mtshar che// nyon mongs 'gyu dran ci shar kyang // rang shar rang grol bcos slad bral// rig rtong gsal dag ngo bor ltos// 'bad med 'bras thob po
75b7(rnying rgyud): mtshur che// gcig po de yi don shes pas// 'khor 'das gnyis med kun grol dag/ stong pa kun bzhag tshad la ltos// 'gro drug khams gsum ma lus pa// sku gsum rang snang ngo mtshar che// 'gro rnams sgom sbrul ma byas par// dus
76a1(rnying rgyud): gtsigasangs rgyas 'khar dang skyugs// skra gsum la rdzogasu 'bras bu ltos// dus gsum 'bras med do mnan na// phar phyin pas ga nga ma thas par // sgrib byang rdzogs/ gnyis ye nas rdzogs// dza
76a2(rnying rgyud): pa gcer bzhag kun mnyam ltos// thams cad rgyan shar ngo mtshar che// spang dang len pa'i chos rnams kun// nyon mongs gtan sbugs 'ching grol med// ye stong ka dag dang la ltos// sangs rgyas g.yongs ngo mtshar che// bya byed
76a3(rnying rgyud): yed pyod bsgom pa yis// ye grol ma shes lhung bar 'gyur// mi skyong stong pa dngos can ltos// med pa bdag 'dzin ngo mtshar che// snang srid 'khor 'das kun skyes kyang // smre med ngang dngas ka nas dag/ e ma ho// byung gnas med
76a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang rig la// 'gro 'ong med pa ngo mtshar che// kun tu 'jug byed yid drug la// btenas med de blo las 'das// thams cad sdud pa'i kun gzhi la// bzhags med de ngo mtshar che// 'khor 'khrul kun gzhi ma rig pa// 'gyur med ka dag
76a5(rnying rgyud): byang tsal bral// thams cad yul zhen nyon mongs la// gzhi rtsa med pa do mtshar che// phra dang rags pa'i dri ma la// chags pa med pa yi dag yin// e ma ho// gzhi rtsa med pa'i chos nyid 'di// ma btsal cog bzhag ngo mtshar che// @
76a6(rnying rgyud): 'ong med pa'i rig pa la// thug pa med pa ngo mtshar che// ma bkod gsal ba'i dag dbyings lnga// phyi dang nang med ngo mtshar che// rang snang dag pa'i 'od lnga la// 'char nub med pa ngo mtshar che// shar ba med pa'i sgron ma la// nub pa med pa ngo mtshar
76a7(rnying rgyud): che// cha phra spos med thig le la// wa lngas brgyan pa ngo mtshar che// mi 'gyur rig pa'i rang sbrul// 'gro 'ong med pa ngo mtshar che// sdang ba rang dag chen po la// mtha' med rgya che ngo mtshar che// dbyings dang rig pa rang 'brel la// 'gros pa med
76b1(rnying rgyud): na// brdzun pa sas// sa // spyod / narnam hAH/ gas su sa sa smra / rnamasamasas cag /
76b2(rnying rgyud): smra ba rang dag spyod pa la// dgag sgrub myed pa do mtshar ne// rang bzhin pas ma gtan bang mengal// bring rgod med pa mtshar che// gtad pa mngon sum bas byal// rang snang la rdzogs ngo mtshar che// ye yod 'bras bu dang thob la// dmigs
76b3(rnying rgyud): btud myed pa ma dz+dza n+te/ zlab tsam cog bzhin rgyas / ngas ca pa sa mang bzhin rtogs pa'i thub stsam / pang ma pa // bdal brdzun pa na dbyungs pa// mtha ma thug mod
76b4(rnying rgyud): mtshur che// spyong ba chen po'i shes rab la// gzhal du mi dpang mtshadaH// 'bras bu kun pazang stong nyid la// dngos po zad pa mtshar \u0f7f// dngas ma le shes zang thal la// gzung ba med pa mtshar ni// rang bzhin babs kyi snang ba la/
76b5(rnying rgyud): mthong ba med pa ngo mtshar che// gsang mchog nges pa'i tshig dekun// ston pa sras kyang gsungs pa med// rang byung chen po'i nam mkha' la// rang rtsal rig pa ma 'gags pa// spos med chos nyid dang skar ni// ma bstan rang byung thog mar
76b6(rnying rgyud): klag/ smyan chad myed par chos kun tshig/ rang gi sgra ni la nas zag/ rang brang ye shes tshig gis mnon// rang las dang byung shang grol bas// rang thung chen po'i tshig tu bzung // de skad du ston pa ga sbyong kun tu bzeng ba nyid rang phyir nga
76b7(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar ba'i tshe ba brjod de lha ma mer bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor rnams kyi nang nas/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sems dpa' rdorje zhes bya ba nyid kyi thugs kyi rtsal zer las rang byung ba nyid dang / 'khor rnams kyi rdo rje glus 'di skad du bsgral lo//
77a1(rnying rgyud): e mato// rgya na smyon pa kun b+hab dang // chos dbyings sgros bral grags slong nas// rang gsal ye shes mkhyen pa 'is// zhal nA ga rdzogs gang 'gro ba'obab// sangs tu ma po yang rje na// de
77a2(rnying rgyud): kun bzang klong chen rab 'ablams gson// de ltar ngo mtshar gad rgyangs de// kun gyis thos kyang rtogs dka' bas// yang gsang thig le chen po 'di// kun gyi spyi phrad klong chen mchog/ rgyas par gnang ba'i skabs phye// de skad
77a3(rnying rgyud): zhus pa las// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// e ma sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// klong chen dba' byams rgyud 'di la// gzhi 'khrul khyang tshul gang gnas pa// lam sgo yul gyi sdang yul dang // theg pa'i dbye rdzogs tshul dang /
77a4(rnying rgyud): mas slob mar dbang bskur dang // grol ba'i gdams dgalag khrid dang // lte sgom spyod pa bar ngo dang // nyams blangs rtags tshad grol tshul lo// 'di ni rgyas par bdagra gis ston// ma nor nges par yid la zung // chos spobasam
77a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// 'di du ma rdzogs gang yang med// theg pa kun gyi gyi phung yin// sbrul ldan 'khor rnams spo bar sems// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor rnams yid mgu ba dang bcas spro bar gyur cing shi tu ngo mdzar bar thar ro// ngag
77a6(rnying rgyud): bkun gyi rtsi hr-I / klung can dpa 'thams kyi klung las/ gang pa'i sgrub me the ba nga gling pa di yin da na// kun na rmA ka cam rdzas ran/ de nas ston pa ba bangal// sems dpa' nga 'd-i da
77a7(rnying rgyud): tso ha ston pagran chubabang // bsnyen pa 'di yi nga gzung gi// sangs rgyas sems can khyod mang 'das// mgri TIg pa'i gang dag // drimathab seM na ji ster gnas// ston pas bdag sa bshad dri gas so/
77b1(rnying rgyud): s+yAd ces ni gsol pa la// ston pa grag skyong tshig tu byon// gyahU~M/ sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// 'khor rnams yid rab tshim bya'i phyir// ma grub thog ma'i gang rol du// kum khyab ye shes gnas tshul ro// 'dzin pa med pa'i ston pangs//
77b2(rnying rgyud): spros med rang dag gzhal yas su// nyid dang dbyer med sdang 'khor la// mtshan ma ras med gsung gis ni// smos pa med pa'i tshig rnams kun// mi snang ba dang zad thugs las byung // ma gsungs gsung ba med par ni// marnam pa che
77b3(rnying rgyud): po'i ngang du bstan// rang gsal dag pa'i ston pa ngas// 'od lnga rnam dag gzhal yas nas// spos med gter chen gsung gis ni// sku lnga rigs kyi 'khor rnams la// dngos med dag pa'i chos rnams ni// ye shes 'dus pa'i thugs//
77b4(rnying rgyud): las phyung // rnam dag 'od zer ljags la bkram// rang byung yi ge thams cad du// ma gsungs rang byung chen por bstan// sbrul sku mngon zhen med pa yis// chos 'byung 'dus byas rang gnas nas// rigs drug las sad skal ldan
77b5(rnying rgyud): la// spos bcas gsung gi tshig gis ni// dbang po gang mos chos rnams kyang // dran pa rang gsal thugs nas ni// dbang po 'dod med ljags la bkram// theg pa grangs kyi chos su bstan// ngas bstan spros pa'i tshig rnams la//
77b6(rnying rgyud): don ci bka' la grangs mang ste// 'di kun mtshon par khyod la bstan// 'gyur ba med pa'i sems kyis zung // thog ma dag dag gsal stong byab// spyir yang rgya chang phyogs spang bral// kun gzhi le nas btsos bslang med// ze stong pa/
77b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gsal// thugs rje kun la sdang nus pa'i// gzhi 'ong khyim lta bu la// 'gyur ba med pas rdo rje 'dra// 'byung bzhi dmigs pa'i rkyen mi gnas// gzhi de ma bcos lhun grub yin// de yang ye shes chen po nyid/
78a1(rnying rgyud): thog ma'i ga dgags la sbyor la// rang bzhin nyid ni 'di lta bu// sus kyang ma byas rang gsal nyid// ye nyid nas ni rang bzhin khyab// rang thung ye shes rang la byung // mad pyang ba yi yul can nyid// sngar
78a2(rnying rgyud): 'das phyis byung de lta med// las dang bag chags ma rig med// yid dang 'khor ba shes rab med// myang 'das dag kyang yod ma myong // rig pa nyid kyang yod ma yin// ye shes su yang snang ba med// kye ma rig stong nyag gcig nyon//
78a3(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes srog med pas// dge sdig gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// rang dub ye shes bya byed bral// rig pa nyid kyi kun khyab la// brdal ba chen po zhes kyang bya// de bzhin nyid las mi 'gyur bas// 'gyur med ye shes
78a4(rnying rgyud): zhes kyang bya// skye nus grol ba'i gzhi yin pas// dus gsum dgongs pa zhes kyang bya// nges pa gcig tu mi gnas pas// bdag med chen po zhes kyang bya// mthong med rol pa mi 'gag pas// 'gag med chen po zhes kyang bya//
78a5(rnying rgyud): don la bdag med skad cig ma// brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam pa gnyis// skul pa 'gyed pa yin pas na// sprul pa chen po zhes kyang bya// dbyings rig gnyis las 'das pa yi// rang byung ye shes mi g.yo ba// snang ba'i rtog pa rang
78a6(rnying rgyud): chod pa'o// rang byung ye shes 'du 'bral med// sku dang ye shes mngon sdang nyid// rang byung ye shes snang mtha' bral// yul dang yul can kun las 'das// rang byung ye shes rtsis med pas// gzung 'dzin gnyis las 'das
78a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rang byung ye shes phyi nang med// skyon dang yon tan kun las 'das// rang byung ye shes 'khrul pa med// rang byung ye shes mtha' las 'das// rang byung ye shes 'gyu byed bral// rang thung chen po'i ye shes la// ston pa'i
78b1(rnying rgyud): snang ba ma spangs rdzogs// ngo bo snang stong gnyis med la// mnyam nyid skye 'gag gnyis su med// snang ba rig pa gnyis med pa// gnas lugs rang byung gnyis med pa// gnyis chos kun bral chen po'o// gnyis med mtha grol chen por gnas// gnyis med ji
78b2(rnying rgyud): le'ug gcig la// gshis nyid ma grub ngo bos stong // chos nyid kyi ni lhun grub bo// chos rnams thams cad rtsal ma 'gags// chos can lhun grub nyid du gnas// chos rnams ngo bo cir mi rtog/ gnyis med lhan grub chen por gnas/
78b3(rnying rgyud): de nyid sus kyang byas pa med// rang byung lhun grub gdod gnas sa// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kun// lhun grub ma yin chos gzhan med// lhun grub chen por ye nas gnas// chos rnams 'byung rung grub pa med// bden pa
78b4(rnying rgyud): rang rgud ye mi gnas// rgyun grub mtha' bral chen po'o// 'khor 'das rang rig lhun grub bo// dbyings chen rnam dag ye shes dag/ tha skad chos dag dngos po dag/ bden bkang ga yod med dag/ gnyis med rnal dag gnyis chos dag
78b5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin rnam dag dngos med dag/ mtha' dbus ka dag rnam dag che// ma spangs rnam dag gsal stong gnas// rang rig byang chub gnyis chos sangs// gnyis med ye shes ye rgyas nyid// yod pa ma yin med rgyas min// gshis la grub
78b6(rnying rgyud): med ye nas rgyas// rang bzhin chos sku gdangs gsal lo// gnyis med sbrul sku stong ji lta// rang gsa' ji snyed gnyis dbyer med// gsal stong mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// gshis la 'khrul pa ma gub stong // spangs pa phun sum tshogs
78b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// ngo bo gnyis su med pas na// rtogs pa phun sum tshogs par gnas// de ltar ye sangs ma rgyas na// bsgoms kyang sangs rgyas mi 'byung ngo // sa le sbram bu gser min na// btul bas gser du ga la 'gyur// de ltar ye
79a1(rnying rgyud): sangs la rgyas de// chom nyid kyi snar ba la// nga ba nyid kyi sgra sha twe// chos sgra thig le zhag gcig go// ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba nI// ye shas ldan grub chen por bzhugs// de yang gnas lugs 'di /
79a2(rnying rgyud): tshad med pa'i ye shes dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas dang // spos dang bral ba'i chos nyid dang // mtha' dang bral ba'i rig pa dang // dag pa chen po'i sdang ba dang // phyogs lhung med pa'i lta ba dang // spang thob med pa'i 'bras bu dang
79a3(rnying rgyud): yangs pa gsal ba mi 'gyur ba// zang thal ye shes ma 'gags pa// ma 'khrul ba yi chos nyid do// phyi yi rgya yang mar lA te// nang du 'od lnga ma 'gags pa// skra dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// ngo bo stod pa chos kyi sgra// ka dang /
79a4(rnying rgyud): chen po'i ye shes ni// ma rig la sogs rtog pa 'gag/ rang bzhin gsal ba lhun grub sgra// rang bzhin ye grub ye shes ni// gsal byed rang dngas nyid du gnas// dgongs pa yangs pa ye shes sgra// ye shes mkhyen pa'i rdzogs pa'i cha
79a5(rnying rgyud): shugs kyi sems can rnams la 'char// thugs rje kun khyab sprul pa'i sku// ye shes rol pa chos spu'i rtsal// 'gag med cho 'phrul cir yang snang // ngo bo ka dag ye shes la// ma rig pa zhes srid med pas// gcig dang gnyis kyi
79a6(rnying rgyud): grangs med pas// gang du'ang mo phye chos nyid la// ye shes tsam du grub pa med// rang bzhin lhan grub ye shes zhes// yul dang yon tan 'gag med pas// rol pa tsam du snang ba las// sna tshogs rdzogs pa'i gzhi ma'o//
79a7(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa yangs pa'i ye shes la// 'khrul zhes tsam du bdod du med// de bzhin ma 'khrul pa yang ci// de phyir 'khrul pa gdod nas dag/ ma rig pa nyid yod ma myong // rig pa tsam du grag pa med// rig ma rig gi tha snang
79b1(rnying rgyud): 'das// 'khrul ma 'khrul yang grag pa med// thugs des kun khyab ye shes pas// mi mdzadang sna tshogs shar ba'i sa// mdza ba ltar sdang nga ba rdzogs// chos sku snang ba'i dang bzhin las// le gas thugs rjem byin bcog pa/
79b2(rnying rgyud): ngang gis sems can rnams la shar// 'di med 'khor 'das sde chad pas// mkhyen pa rig cing gsal ba de// rtsal ldan rtsal phyir de mi 'breng // nga yi na nga la bdag gzung med// ngo bo nyid la 'khor 'das gsal// stobs dang shugs/
79b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'chang ba'i bdag/ bzhi ldan chos sku'i tshul du bzhugs// de ltar chos su ka dag ni// nam mkha'i dkyil ltar 'gyur zlog med// ri rab lta bu g.yo 'gul med// rgya mtsho lta bur kha gting med// gser dngul lta bur 'gyur
79b4(rnying rgyud): pa med// 'di nyid chos sku ka dag yin// de yi snying po ye shes ni// 'khor dang 'das pa mi gnas pa'i// chos nyid stong pa kun khyab pas// ye shes rang ngor gnas pa la// gsum dang bzhi ru dbyer med do// ka dag lhun grub gzhi
79b5(rnying rgyud): de la// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum// ye shes sgrib g.yog ye grol gnas// theg pa bsam yas gnas lugs nyid// ye shes gsum dang sgra bzhi'i klong // ye shes gsum gyis gzhi khyab ston// sku ni bzhi ldan dgongs pa
79b6(rnying rgyud): yang // ye shes zang thal nyid du gnas// zang thal de yi bklag mdangs yang // rang byung ye shes 'od sbyar shar// dper na nyi ma'i snying po 'dra// de yang chos sgyu ye shes la// mdun rgyub med par zang thal lo// ye shes lus can
79b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// ye shes lus de lus kyi mchod/ ye shes lus la sha zag med// spros bral ye shes ka dag ni// ngo bo nam dag snying po'i gzhi// de la tshig dang yi ge bral// brjod pas gtan la dbab tu med// sgro 'dogs tha
80a1(rnying rgyud): skad kun dang ngal// gzung 'dzin 'grub rnam rtog myed// sangs rgyas sems can la mgug// chos med chos kyi 'du shes med// gang myed ni med ci yang med// rin chen 'da' bar sku ru bzhugs// ya nas
80a2(rnying rgyud): spyan lags la 'grib med// gsal dngas zang thal chen por khyab// ye shes 'ong la mi nang med// ye gas la zang thal nyid du bzhugs// ye shes thugs la langs dog med// stong gsal mdangs lnga nyid du bzhugs// kho ka ma
80a3(rnying rgyud): rang gsal bas// shes shing reg pa'i cha rnams tshad// 'dzin pas gzung yul gang med phyir// rnam par rtog pa'i 'dzin chags med// 'od gsal 'das pa'i ye shes su// rnam dag b+hag ma chen por gnas// rang bzhin snang ba'i sgo
80a4(rnying rgyud): chen na// mtshan ma'i dmigs pa yi med de// don gyi tshul 'di ltar gnas// rang mdangs sbed bu dkar po'i cha// gting gsal chen po nyid du gnas// gting gsal ngo po'i bkrag bskyed pas// snang ba rang zang ser po'iche// mi mngon
80a5(rnying rgyud): gting nas rang ngo gsal// rang ngo chags med mdangs bsgred pas// rang gis bcings pa bral ba yis// chags pa rang zad dmar po'i cha// gting gsal ma 'dres chen por gnas// ma 'dres so so'i mtshan 'dzin pa// bya btsal
80a6(rnying rgyud): bskyod pa bral ba yis// mdzad pa med pa'i ljang gur ni// thog ma rnams kyi zer du yang // mi mngon gting nas gsal ba'i cha// gtang gsal khyab pa'i 'brel byed pa'i// 'gyur med rdzogs pa'i mthing ga ni// lo rdzogs byas pa med par
80a7(rnying rgyud): gnas// sku ni snang la mtshan nyid bral// yi nas rang dag chen po la// rdzogs chen rnams kyi rtse mor gnas// de yang dngos por ma grub pas// rtag pa zer zug can du med// rgya chad can du ma yin te// rang bzhin 'od gsal tshul du
80b1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// gdas banas mtshan ma dang dag phyir// gto gsal chen po'i gzhi mar gnas// khab dang grub pa nyid kyis snong // phyogs sa chad pa rjod par gnas// stong gas la yin pa gnyis mtha' nga // hashA tu gnyis kyi mtha' bas/
80b2(rnying rgyud): 'das// gsal byed snang ba'i chu ma 'grags// rig gzhan med cing rang sar dag/ rang bzhin gyi ni cha la bzhugs// ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba ni// ye shes kha dog lnga ldan te// rang bzhin bgrags mdangs li ra// gsal
80b3(rnying rgyud): lhun sdug cor re// nyi ma las ni 'od bzhin du// rang gis byas pa ma yin te// rang gi rang bzhin de ltar spang // ngo bo mi 'gyur slar bzhugs pa// sku gsum 'du bral med pa yi// thams cad 'char ba'i gzhir gnas te// mtshan
80b4(rnying rgyud): me risi kye zhal phrag med// rang bzhin gsal ba'i mdangs la yang // gzhon nu bum grwa'i tshul bzhugs te// kha dog ris bzung grub po med// thugs rje rig pa'i ye shes su// yun grub bzhugs cing mkhyen pa 'gags// ma
80b5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba gnyis gyur kyang // bya ba byed dang byed dngos med// gsung ni rang bzhin don gyi gsung // grag stong chos kyi sta ru gnas// ris myed shes bya'i babA las grub// 'di 'dra gtsug na mnges pas// sna tshogs snang ba gsung
80b6(rnying rgyud): gig zhi// thugs ni tog med dang la gnas// da dang bdag tu 'dzin pa med// dbang po lnga la rag ma lus// ma rig pa yi dri ma bral// nyon mongs pa yi yid ma skyes// 'khrul pa'i chog gis gnod pa bral// yid kyi rnam par
80b7(rnying rgyud): shes med// thams kyid dbyis gcig tha dang bral// le shes med cing skye yang med// 'di med 'dag rnams dang bral// rig pa sgras dag la yan// rnam par gos pa tshogs pacang drum// nan mongs ma skyes gnas // DU
81a1(rnying rgyud): ba ma smos yod pa med// dang po nas dag thog ma dag/ gdod ma nas dag dag chen po// ka zhes thog mar byung ba la// dag pa dri ma'i grangs mtha' zad// nga bo yi dag chen po la// rang bzhin rang dag
81a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje ni// shugs 'byung dag tu ye gnas so// ngo bo stong pa tha skad bral// rang bzhin ye gas la chu rkyen bral// thugs rje kun khyab cha shas bral// ngo bo ka dag brjod gzhi bral// rang bzhin lhun grub cir snang rdzogs/
81a3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje kun khyab rang shar ro// ngo bo stong pas rtag mtha' bral// rang bzhin gsal bas chad 'dzin bral// thugs rje khyab pas gnyis mtha' bral// ngo bo stong gsal dbyer med la// rang bzhin gsal stong dbyer med de/
81a4(rnying rgyud): thugs rje rig stong dbyer med do// ngo bo ka dag nam mkha' 'dra// rang bzhin rgya mtsho dngas pa 'dra// thugs rje nor bu dri med 'dra// ngo bo sku la rang bzhin 'od// thugs rje rig pa ye shes so// sgrib med ye shes gsum dang ldan//
81a5(rnying rgyud): bo ka dag ye shes dang // rang bzhin lhun grub ye shes dang // thugs rje rang snang ye shes gsum// 'bral med gcig ste phyogs med gnas// ngo bo ka dag ye shes ni// ma rig rtog pa kun dang bral// rang bzhin lhun grub ye shes ni//
81a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i tshig gi tha snyad bral// thugs rje rang snang ye shes ni// thams cad dbyings rig gcig tu gnas// ye shes rang la rang gnas phyir// gsum gyi tshul du dbyer med do// rnam grangs kun gyi mtha' las 'das// ji lta mkhyen pa'i ye/
81a7(rnying rgyud): shes dang // ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// rang gi dngos po'i gnas lugs dang // gdul bya kun gyi bsam pa mkhyen// rig pa'i ngo bo 'khrul ma myong // rang bzhin nyid la 'khrul mi gnas// thugs rje nyid ni 'khrul mi srid// khams
81b1(rnying rgyud): gsumag dag chen por gnas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i// ye shes chen mo gcig tu bzhugs// ye shes de yi yin las ni// b+ha wa dang ni ye shes la// 'od lnga zhing lnga phrin las lnga// rigs lngamam ldag 'i wa dang // lam lnga 'brang du
81b2(rnying rgyud): rang mdangs lnga// de sogs lnga tshan so wa ni// ye shes gcig gi ngo la rdzogs// chos sra'i klong nas thogs med shar// longs su'i ngos nas ma 'gags shar// mi mdzad sna tshogs 'char ba'i sgo// mdzad pa ltar sdang ngo bor rdzogs// thugs
81b3(rnying rgyud): rje sbal skur gnas pa'o// de yang gnas lcags 'di lta ste// rig pa'i ngo bo skye lngar bzhugs// sku ni snang la mtshan nyid bral// stong gsal 'dus pa'i ye shes mdangs// ngo bo ka nas dag pa'i cha// sku gsum gyi ni gzhi tsam las/
81b4(rnying rgyud): zhal phyag du ni grub pa med// kha mig rna ba yod pa na// gzugs can yid tsam gInyis song srid// gzigs can 'gro drug phal pa ste// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi'o// mtshan ma byung na ka dag min// stong gsal chen po'i sgra lnga'o//
81b5(rnying rgyud): sgra lnga'i snying po ye shes lnga// ye shes bklags mdangs 'od lngar shar// gzhi yi mtshan nyid ye shes lnga// sku lnga dbyen 'di lta ste// thig le nyag gcig skra dang gcig/ 'od zer mi 'gyur skya dang gnyis// rig pa kun bzang sbra dang
81b6(rnying rgyud): gsum// rig brtsal rdzogs sgra dang bzhi// rang bzhin lhan grub su dang lnga'o// zhing po ye shes rnam wA ni// chos spyi'i ngo bo dang sbyong bas// chos dbyings 'gyur med ye shes so// stong pa'i rang mdangs rang gsal bas// maM long lta
81b7(rnying rgyud): bu'i ye shes so// stong gsal me phye gnyis med pas// mnyam nyid chen po'i ye shes so// yon tan ma sor rang shar bas// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so// de dag gzhi la lhan grub pas// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// de yi bgrags
82a1(rnying rgyud): mdangs 'ad war shar// chos su mi 'gyur 'od zer mthing // rig pa dri med 'ad zar dkar// rig pa 'od ldan 'ad zer ser// reg pa bde gsal 'od zer dmar// rig pa 'gag med 'od zer ljang // 'dra
82a2(rnying rgyud): dag sdang tshul ni// 'phrul dngas shing gsal la 'tshor// rang bzhin bgrags mdangs mnyams pa// mos ka'i sdig spu lta bu ru// rgya mtshor gza' skar shar ba 'dra// bltas pas mi ngoms mtshan dper ldan// ye shes 'od dang kha dog
82a3(rnying rgyud): lnga// bco lnga dus gcig 'dus pa la// ka dag babs kyi sangs rgyas zar// de yi gnas tshul shes pa la// yi nas ji bzhin sangs rgyas zer// de yi mtshan nyid shes pa la// rang bzhin lga grub sangs rgyas zer// de'i rtogs rgyal
82a4(rnying rgyud): shes pa la// phyogs pa mngon gyur sangs rgyas zer// ngan nyid kyi snang ba la// ngo bo nyid kyi sku shing bas// ye nyid nas ni bud+d+ha'o// thams cad gzhil lha nu grub pas// sangs rgyas sgra lnga'i bdag nyid can// rtag chang gnyis kyi mtha' las
82a5(rnying rgyud): 'das// rang grol mtha' yi dri masangs// rgya med rkyen las 'das pa'o// lhan grub ri dang dgas las grol// ka dag yin gyir kun las grol// rang 'dzin med pas nyon mongs grol// gzung 'dzin med pas rnam shes grol// skye 'gag
82a6(rnying rgyud): med pas sgo wa grol// bcos bslang med pas rtog pa kro la// dri ma med pas 'byung ba'i grol// 'od gsal stong pa sgra lnga ban+dan// de tri gzhi gi bzhugs dz+wal yi// chos sku ye shes chen po ni// mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum dang ldan//
82a7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin phugs rje gsum// chos kyi sku yi mtshan nyid yin// mi 'jig lto dang gsal ba dang // bya ba thams cad rdzogs pa ni// chos kyi sku yi mtshan nyid yin// 'gyur med 'gag med khyab pa gsum// chos kyi sku yi nges tshig yin//
82b1(rnying rgyud): gas// rjes spyanamadus mnas// d+haban mad ngamanas med na na/ rgya ban panan// na nan du ga sa/ pa// sto /
82b2(rnying rgyud): kyi skye la ba sgrim pa yin// pi snyid med pa skyes zin lta rdzogs// chos kyi lta ba yin// rdzus med 'byung med blangs med/ sa k+Sh+ma k+sha li 'bras tha yin// bzlab med parngubs sbyin pa me / gzhan lam dzan/
82b3(rnying rgyud): gc-ig sung gnyis byung thams cad byung // tshos kyi sku yi yon tan len// 'gag med ga sal stong ngags stong// rgyas kyi hU~M yi spyang ba yin// phyi myed nang med dbyings su med// chos k+She swa yi rang rgyas yin// da nyi rtenas pa da/
82b4(rnying rgyud): yi dang nas yin// nang la rgya kel/ sa sgra yimakhyen pa yin// chos 'i ga shes de lta gnas// 'ongs mi shes smraHna// dbyen pasam kyis mi nga// dag pa
82b5(rnying rgyud): tshan dang ba byud ngo ba bar// yab sum pa ma lpags mA~M// myi srung gas pa'i rgya sun su yin// 'ad 'tsha med dza'i rtsa// 'di sa la ra gyul// ra // dag kyis rtags
82b6(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// gzhi lnga lam lnga 'bras bu lnga// gnas lnga yul ljang po lnga// gongs spyod rdzogs su'i bo yid// chos nyid dang la gnas byas yongs// gsal lam 'dres khyab pas / thabs shes gnyis su med pas langs/
82b7(rnying rgyud): byas sa ba dang po sas// 'di dam sung myong pos phyid// sum mi thong nga ma ma sa chud // gnas cing sprul ba byod sa spyod/ da na mthar gyis la bas kyad// ras ma 'gro
83a1(rnying rgyud): pas rdzogs// dmigs cad don la gdus pas rdzogs// phyogs spang 'a chu 'ong med pa rdzogs// tham pa med pas dang klung rdzogs// mazangs su ma mran dgas// gsus stong ma med rdzogs pasapa
83a2(rnying rgyud): rgyan dang cha lugs 'dzin pas pa// su dang thig les brgyan pas pa// 'od dang kha dog bklags pa// ma rig dug lnga dgabs pa// 'dzin pa rang sar dag pas sgra// kun sbrang thugs rdo shar bas sgra// ye shes klong nu gsal bas su// ma
83a3(rnying rgyud): 'gags skye ba med pas sra// yin pa bdag 'dzin med pas sra// lhun grub longs su'i bzhugs tshul lo// thugs rje sprul pa'i bzhugs tshul ni// bya ba rdzogs dang bya ba byed// phyi nang bya ba rdzogs pas te// bya ba rdzogs pa'i skul sla'o//
83a4(rnying rgyud): gang la gang 'dul tshul du ni// de la der ston mthun par snang // thugs rje'i nyi zer kun la khyab// 'gro ba yongs la snang nus pa// sprul pa sku yi bzhugs tshul lo// ye shes rang rtsal phyogs bcur khyab// sku gsum ngo bo gcig
83a5(rnying rgyud): gi ngang // ye shes gsum gyi rang bzhin can// rang gi ngo bo gcig tu gnas// ngo bo dus gsum 'gyur ba med// rang bzhin rtag tu 'grag pa med// thugs rje kun la rang snang ngo // ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin dang // thugs rje yi ni snang ba yang //
83a6(rnying rgyud): can rnams la snang ba'o// ngo bo gang du'ang ma grub pas// rang bzhin snang cha gsal bar snang // thugs rje'i cha la ye shes gnyis// bya dang byed pa med par shar// rang byung rang shar rang grol lo// rtogs dang ma togs sngon rol du//
83a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma phye// dngos po gshis kyi 'dug tshul de// gzhi yi gnas tshul de ltar ro// gzhi la mi mthun mang du bshad// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang // mthun dpe dag dang bzhi bzhis te// ngo bo thig le nyag gcig gi
83b1(rnying rgyud): nges tshig gzhi la N+Da la rdzogs pas// kun gyi kun gzhi zhes kyang bya// dbyen sgron can skyon med gnyis// gyon can drug dang brgyad kyis bstan// bsam las grub pa'i kun gzhi la// sna tshogs ngos nas lhun grung ga'i// 'gyur med cha nas
83b2(rnying rgyud): des gzhi// mi 'gyur cha nas des can gzhi// cir yang sgyur btu ba gzhi ma dang // thams cad 'byung phyir khas len gzhi// sna tshogs khra bor 'dod pa'i gzhi// sna tshogs sogs pa'i kun gzhi dang // sbyor bkun gyi kun gzhi'o// de ltar brgyad kyis
83b3(rnying rgyud): gyen yang // skyon med ka dag nyid du gnas// 'di ni ngo bo gcig tshul dang // brjod bzhi bral ba'i dang po ste// thams cad 'di las mi 'da' 'o// 'on kyang de nyid 'di lta ste// lhun grub nyid du gnas pa la// sna tshogs 'dus pa'i snying por sdang /
83b4(rnying rgyud): rgyu las 'bras bu grub ma grub// grub na go log skyon du 'gyur// nges pa med pa'i gzhi ma ni// 'gyu byed yid tsam rnam par snang // ming don gnyis su nges pa med// ma nges mo las chu 'byung skyon// ma nges pa de ngas can 'gyur// nges par rang
83b5(rnying rgyud): do kun gzhi de// dran byed phra ba med par snang // 'di ni rtogs dang ma rtogs gang // rtag chad gnyis kyi skyon du 'gyur// myur du btub pa'i kun gzhi ni// 'bad med blo yi rnam par snang // rtag dang mi rtag gang nas 'gyur// gnas lugs rgyur
83b6(rnying rgyud): du btub pa na// 'di yang nges med gzhi dang mtshungs// 'bras bu nyid kyang gyur zlog phyir// 'badud don med bem po yang // rigs can du zlog pa'i skyon// rtag pa ma yin ngo bos spong // mi rtag ma yin shes rig gsal// cir yang ngo bor
83b7(rnying rgyud): khas le na gzhi// gang snang rang gi ngo bor snang // yod med ma yin phyogs nas 'das// med na mo gsham bu skye'i skyon// yod na shes bya rgyab kyis phyogs// thams cad ngo bor grub pa'i phyir// thug pa med pa'i skyon du 'gyur// sna tshogs
84a1(rnying rgyud): zla bar 'dod pa'i gzhi// ngo bo kun tu gang ba'i phyir// sna tshogs so so'i tshul du ldang // sngang dang shes pa gang la 'dod// snang la 'dod na sems tha dang // shes la 'dod na 'gra byed de// kun gda'i steng nas 'gru
84a2(rnying rgyud): na// 'phang po don med 'bad mi lang // de lta bu yi skyon du 'gyur// ngo bo ma grub mtshon gzhi bral// rang bzhin rang grol spang blang bral// sna tshogs sogs dang sbyor ba'i gzhi// gnyis drug so so'i dbyings na gsal// de rnams phyogs
84a3(rnying rgyud): tsam bstan pa ste// sems can blo yi rim pa'o// skyon med ka dag gzhi ma yin// ye don dang po'i sangs rgyas de// 'khor dang 'das pa de mi gnas// mtshan nyid bzhugs tshul dbye ba dang // sku gsum ye shes gsum du ldan// ka dag
84a4(rnying rgyud): lhun grub kun khyab tu// snying po'i gzhi ma brjod bral gnas// spro 'dogs tha snyad gzung 'dzin med// sangs rgyas sems can chos sogs med// grol dang ma grol togs ma rtogs// ye thog mgon po mtha' bral gnas// nyag gcig rang gan
84a5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs tshul lo/ Thak+Shen \u0f7f/ thaM nAn/ ThiTaT b+ha rbad kA 'di tho/ gzhi gnas chos su dag pa la// rig rta la rdzogs lugs 'di ltar ro// chung dang rig pa nam mkha' gsum// bya ba kun grub ye shes ni// dbyer med gcig gi tshul du gnas// ye shes
84a6(rnying rgyud): chung gis g.yo bskyod med// reg pa dri med gcer bu la// ma rig pa yi srid ming med// gcig dang gnyis kyi grangs mtha' zang // ye shes chos nyid gdags gzhi bral// de la rtsal yon 'gag med pas// nam mkha' gsal stong bsnan 'bri med//
84a7(rnying rgyud): bya grub ye shes rang mdangs yin// ye shes lnga yi dang bcud de// 'od ldang khra bo lte ma snyem pa// rig pa'i ngo bo rol klong snang // gzhi la g.yo 'gul med pa ste// bya grub ye shes klong na gsal// shes pa bcud du 'dril ba de// rlung rig gnyis kyis
84b1(rnying rgyud): rbalam brgyad// rdzogs ldan chen por de bzhugs so// de yis gzhi yi dbye ba bshad// mthun pa'i dpe ni 'di ltar ro// stong pa yangs pa khyab pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur gnas pa'o// dri med gsal dag zang thal te// man shel dri med lta bur
84b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// gdod nas ma skyes gzhi rtsa med// dus gsum dus med stong par gnas// byungs med par chu yis stong // skyes med pa rkyen gyis stong // 'gag pa med pa ngo bos stong // dbyibs des med pa dngos pos stong // thog mtha' med de rang bzhin/
84b3(rnying rgyud): stong // dran 'gru med de mtshan nyid stong // phyi nang med pa gzung 'dzin stong // dngos po med pa rtag pas spyod// 'gag pa med pa chad pas stong // mtha' dbus phyogs med gnyis kas stong // nyes pa'i dri spang skyon gyis stong // nyes sgron ma spangs
84b4(rnying rgyud): gnyen pos stong // gdod nas ka dag bdag gis stong // ma 'gags rtsal rnams klong na gsal// rgya mtsho dngas ma mkha' lhur gnas// sangs rgyas sems can ston bstan pa// ma grub thog ma'i gong dag na// kun khyab ye shes gnas tshul dang //
84b5(rnying rgyud): ma spyi gzhi'i 'dug tshul lo// zhes gsungs nas ka dag gi slong na lhan ner bzhugs so// sa ma pa/ r+g+ha d+ha N+ya/ theg pa kun gyi gyi phud grong chen rab 'byams rgyung las/ ye thog ldi gzhi'i 'dug tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
84b6(rnying rgyud): nga/ na rje rngan \u0f7fde nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// kun bzlang nyid la 'di skad zhus// thog ma'i skyi gzhi'i sngon rol dang // kun khyab ye shes gnas lugs rnams// legs zab rgyas par gsungs nA yang // 'khrul med sdang tshu ti kyi /
84b7(rnying rgyud): rims gsum 'khor tshul gsung du gsol// de skad ces ni bskul ba'i lan// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje sogs// rang rtsal 'gag med 'khor rnams gson// ngas bstan tshig la nor ba med// ma 'khrul nor me
85a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ sems kyis byung // khyod sa 'di san sems la zhagaD+yan/ gong lta gzhi la 'khrul med kyang // 'khor 'das gnyis su la du ba na// gzhi'i slong nas lachu lugs bsta// gzhi dang gzhi nas drung bur
85a2(rnying rgyud): las// 'khor 'das gnyis su gyes pa ste// dge bsdu tsam byas med par// de nyid ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// sdig pa su tsam byas med par// khams gsum rigs drug dag tu 'khyams// de yang dang po yi ga nas ni// gzhi yi ye shes
85a3(rnying rgyud): rang rgyang dang // gzhi pi rig pa gcer bu dang // gzhi yi nam mkha' gsal stong dang // gzhi yi bya grub ye shes bzhi// dbyer med gcig gi rang bzhin te// rgya zho chags pa lta bur gnas// de la g.yo 'gul 'di ltar byung // ye she
85a4(rnying rgyud): rlung gis rig pa btegs// rig pas sgro mthong nam mkha' phye// bya grub rig cal ma 'gags te// g.yo 'am mi g.yo ba gtsam g.yo// 'bru 'o mi 'gyu ba ga tsam 'dra// gzhi la g.yo 'gul med mod kyang // rig pa'i rtsal las grA
85a5(rnying rgyud): 'gul byung // 'gru bde la yid ces zer// de yang lhan grub thugs rje'i rtsal// dang po gser gyi rlangs pa'am// bye'u chung gi kharlangs sam// bya grod rkyen med 'gul ba'am// rta rnga brgyar gshags cha tsam cig/ rig pa nyid/
85a6(rnying rgyud): kyang yid du 'grus// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma smig zer// dngos med snod phye bag la nyal// ngo bo gan gzhi las 'phags te// rang bzhin 'khrul ba'i byin phan nyid// gzhi yi ngas med rang rtsal tag/ de yang gsum yin kun tu btags
85a7(rnying rgyud): lhan cig gyis dang bdag can// kun gyi sgra ni gcig pa la// 'gapa sgo rgyab bzlog pa bzhin// rig pa de las mthong snang ni// tha rags rtog pa mang po gar// 'od kyi ma kha dog la wa ni// nam mkha' stong pa'i gling du kar// rig pa 'ag /
85b1(rnying rgyud): sus smra/ dam rnam padrug sa// ban tshol bar byed ba'i med// brtan pa 'dabs par byed pa'i spang ngas par 'jug par byed pa'i 'ang // 'amathang thams cad 'dzad du 'dang / sa spang ba zad pa'i yod na/
85b2(rnying rgyud): mongs pa can gyi yid// de 'grus 'od khyim rtag dbyang btang // 'od khyim pha ging yin no// pha gi nga las byung ngam ci// nga nyid pha gi yin nam ci// gnyis 'dzin rtog pas ngo bo bslang // ye shes nyid la si ma rig 'khrul// rang snang rang gis ma
85b3(rnying rgyud): TIg pas// las kyi rlung nyid kha dog gsal// lhan skyes ma rig ces su byung // skyes yul chos sku'i klong du skyes// su yis su nyid ma rig na// dpedu na me long dkyil 'khor la// bdag po rang gis bltas pa yis// rang gzugs yin par ma
85b4(rnying rgyud): rig ste// 'od byad yul snang mo sor babrang/ 'od byeng ba lta mkhan rtog pyong bzhi// rdzas la sgra myi med pa'i dge// don ninam mkha' spong pal// rig dang ma rig 'od snang drang // rig pa'i ye shes rtsa lnga nyid rnams// lA gyi med du lhan
85b5(rnying rgyud): gyis// chu bdag gcig pa'i lhan gyis ni// gnyis med rang mdangs ma shes pas// phyi nang so sor bzung bas bcings// grong pa gyi nang ji bzhin no// ma rig la ltos de bzhin te// ma 'khrul pa yang de bzhin du// rig pa nyid ni ma rig sa/
85b6(rnying rgyud): ma 'khrul bud+d+ha ma nur 'khrul// de yang yul dang yul can gnyis// ye shes gsal ba'i yul drug la// gnyis 'dzin sems de byung ba'o// dung la ser por mthong ba dang // gser la nag por mthong ba rnams// mig 'khrul min te dang 'khrul
85b7(rnying rgyud): yin// gzhi na gang yang byed med cing // nges med rtsal ngo ma shes pas// shes pa 'gyu dang yal ba dang // ched 'dzin dri mas rab tu spags// shes bya rang gi rgyang bcings so// dmigs 'dzin 'brel pa bcu gnyis su// 'khor ba'i ye thog nyid
86a1(rnying rgyud): dul sbrul// chos sug dag dri med la// nyon mongs can gyi yid kyis ni// khA nang bltas nas nga bdag bzung // rnam pa gcig rgya dang bdag 'khrul// yid kyi rnam zhes pa phyed bltas// zho wa l+ra la dzub rdes
86a2(rnying rgyud): 'brangs nas// rtog pas med pa med par bzung // dper na po yor ming bzung zhing // thag pa sprul dang smig kyu chu// sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa nyid// yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsrung // kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la//
86a3(rnying rgyud): yid kying bdag bslad// gnyis snang rtog pa'i cha las 'khrul// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum// dngos su yod kyang ma rig pas// chu gyen 'bras bu gsum du byung // rgya yi rkyen dang dmigs pa'i byin// bdag po'i rgyan dang mtshungs pa'i
86a4(rnying rgyud): rkyen ba ni 'dus pas 'khrul pa yin// zla yi rkyen ni chos nyid dang // dmigs pa'i rkyen ni 'od sdang nyid// bdag po'i rkyen ni rege pa nyid// de gsum dus sbom mtshungs pa'i rkyen// 'khrul pa de ma thag ces zer// 'khrul pa'i dus ni 'di ltar po/
86a5(rnying rgyud): rig dang ma rig gnyis 'dzin rnams// chos nyid yul la shar dus 'khrul// yid drug yul la 'jug dus 'khrul// nam tog bdag tu bzung dus 'khrul// snang ba logs su dpyad dus 'khrul// skem ma ris su phye dus 'khrul// rang rtsal gzhan
86a6(rnying rgyud): du bzung dus 'khrul// yid kyis sgro btags byed dus 'khrul// rang gzhan gnyis skye rtogs dus 'khrul// log rtog skad cig 'gyu dus 'khrul// gzung 'dzin bur la bltas dus 'khrul// yin min the tshom dus su 'khrul// rig pas 'tshol
86a7(rnying rgyud): gro blas dus 'khrul// min chos yin par bzung dus 'khrul// 'grub chung gi rta po la// sgrib g.yogs ma rig pa dang gcig/ yul gyen 'dzin byed g.yo ba dang // ro dogs yid kyi 'char sgo dang // bag chags brtas pa'i mthu dag ni/
86b1(rnying rgyud): dus gcig log par bltas dus 'khrul// 'khrul ba'i 'bras bu sdong bcud ni// ye shes pa dog 'byung ba lnga// gdod nas ye shes rtsal zhid du// 'du 'bral med par ma rig pas// 'od kyi ma kha dog lnga ldan la// brtag dpyad byas pas 'brung
86b2(rnying rgyud): lngar 'khrul// mkha' la rlung brten de la chu// 'bum phrag bcu gcig dag gis ni// zlum la 'dril ba nyid du'o// gzhi dag me long ye shes la// rtog dpyod btang bas chu ru 'khrul// gzhi dag mnyam nyid ye shes la// rtog dpyod btang bas
86b3(rnying rgyud): sa nor 'khrul// bzhi dag sor rtog ye shes la// rtog dpyod btang bas me ru 'khrul// gzhi dag bya grub ye shes la// rtog dpyod btang bas rlung du 'khrul// gzhi dag chos dbyings ye shes la// rtog dpyod btang bas nam mkhar 'khrul/
86b4(rnying rgyud): tog dpyod byas pas yul lngar bzung // ming med ming du song bltar// 'byung wa med bzhin rim gyis chags// gyi yi yul lnga'i dbang las ni// nang gi sems kyis dang bdag/ gnyis su bzung bas 'di lnga ni// gsal bar ma nus 'bru
86b5(rnying rgyud): bzhis bsgribs// ma rig pa de sems yin te// de las byung bas 'byung ba'o// rang mgo rang gi rgung pas gnan// rang gi gnya' lag rang gis bcings// sems kyi snang tshul gsum du shar// 'od gzugs sha gzugs rig gzugs
86b6(rnying rgyud): gsum// de las 'khor 'das gnyis su skyes// yul tu btugs pas sdang bar zhen// min pa'i chos la yin bzung zhing // brtag dpyad byas pas snod du lakhrul// de yang ri rab rgyal po ni// bang rim bzhi dang ldog chen bzhi// rol mtsho dang ni
86b7(rnying rgyud): ri rnams bdun// gling rnams dang ni 'khor yug chags// stong gsum la sogs khams rnams so// de la brten nas nang bcud kyi// 'khrul lugs dbyen 'di ltar ro// 'khrul gzhi ye shes lnga las byas// 'khrul rgya ma rig gnyis kyis byas/
87a1(rnying rgyud): 'khrul rkyen skad cig lnga yis byas// 'khrul pa 'bras bus yid kyis byas// ye shes ma rig yul du bzung // der 'dzin rlung sems 'dus pa las// 'byung ba lnga po'i sbubs su tshud// rlung sems yid du 'grus pa
87a2(rnying rgyud): las// shugs ldan sna tshogs rgya mtsho rlung // de la ye shes drod rlan zung // rgya mtsho chen po de nyid la// chan la phabs rtsi btab pa ltar// sa yi rnam pa snyoms par chags// de la dud rlangs lag dar tsam// de yi dngas ma 'od skor ni//
87a3(rnying rgyud): phub tsam pa gsum du byung // 'od gcig snang la rang bzhin med// de la brten pa'i 'khrul 'bras ni// yod min ci yang med pa dang // rnam shes cung zad med pa dang // gzugs med mu bzhi rab tu chags// 'od skor gnyis la mtho ris
87a4(rnying rgyud): kyi// gnas bcu dag ni rim gyis chags// gnas gtsang la sogs lus can ni// gong nas gong du theg pa'i tshul// 'og min lha dang lha min 'dod// mngon mtho de min gnas gsum ni// byol song yi dwags dmyal ba dang //
87a5(rnying rgyud): sems can de dag skye ba bzhi// de nas yid kyis rtog dpyod btang // yid kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa na// srid pa 'od kyi sgo nga mthong // de nyid mdzes par rab mthong nas// yid kyis sbyor ba byas pa las// mdzes pa'i chags sems
87a6(rnying rgyud): spyong 'phrum// ma ba blang jim rnam// / nang bu rje ma 'artan byasas// kyai lgang shi dbu ga 'grogs// nang sa 'dang thugs kyi byung dang // zhe wang sbrul gyi slong bad// gas bas na thabs gas rab// dengus pa pa'i da
87a7(rnying rgyud): med pas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod// sa la brten nas gzugs rnams byung // chu la brten nas klu rnams byung // me la brten nas dri rnams byung // rlung la brten nas po rnams byung // mkha' la brten nas reg rnams byung //
87b1(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i kha lo phyir bltas pas// 'dod yon lnga po yul lngar zhe na// nang du shes pa kha log pas// yul lnga brten pa'i sems 'dzin gyur// nyon mongs lnga gsum dug lnga shar// sa la brten nas gti mug byung // ma rig pa yi lcags kyi sa
87b2(rnying rgyud): bsdams// gti mug zhags pas ske nas bcings// chu la brten nas 'dod chags byung // 'dod chags tsha ba'i ro la chags// chung la brten nas phrag dog byung // phrag dog nyid kyi sgo mo 'khrigs// nam mkha' la brten nga rgyal byung //
87b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal dag gis mgo btums te// me la brten nas zhe sdang byung // zhe sdang me yi tshad pas gdung // khong khro la sogs dmag gis bskor// gzung 'dzin zhags pas rkang nas bsdams// snga phyi'i bag chags 'dam du bying // rnam smin
87b4(rnying rgyud): nyid dang lag spel lo// drug lnga'i rtsal kun rang rdzogs pas// las kyi mnu'i mtshams sbyar te// 'gro ba rigs drug dpag med smin// gcig nas gcig tu zo chu bzhin// bzang ngan rim par lus blangs te// de ltar 'jig rten gsum po
87b5(rnying rgyud): phung po lnga dang dbang po lnga// yan lag lnga dang don snying dang // yal lnga dang ni nyon mongs lnga// sems lnga yid lnga rtog pa lnga// gzung 'dzin 'khor ba nyid du grub// phung po khams dang skye mched lnga// gzung 'dzin dag gis bzung nas ni//
87b6(rnying rgyud): ba nyid du yun ring mnar// khams gsum pa yi khang pa ru// zhe sdang cha las bsad bcad byas// 'bras bus tsha grang dmyal ba byung // 'dod chags cha las ser phrag dong/ 'bras bu yi dwags bkres skom byung // gti mug cha las
87b7(rnying rgyud): rab thun rmongs// 'bras bus byol song glen lkugs byung // nga rgyal cha las nga bdag bzung // 'bras bus brel phongs mi ru byung // phrag dog cha las khong khro byas// 'bras bu lha ma yin du smin// 'gro ba rigs zug de dag la// ngar 'dzin so
88a1(rnying rgyud): sor byung ba yis// snang srid lha 'dre thams cad byung // lha med pa la lha ru mchod// 'dre med pa la 'dren bkar// ming med pa la ming du btags// rnam rtog 'dre ru bzung las byung // dmyal ba rnams la gshin
88a2(rnying rgyud): rje byung // yi dwags rnams la mo 'dre byung // pho 'dre thams cad zhor la byung // byol song rnams la gru gnyen byung // mi la gnod sbyin thams cad byung // lha la pA dang dbang mug dang // gza' dang skar ma thams cad byung // lha ma yin la
88a3(rnying rgyud): gza' srin zung // de sogs rigs drug gzung 'dzin bcings// ma rig nyid dang sbags pa'i phyir// shes bya nyid kyang dri mar snang // sems la dran pas ma pag med sha re// ngo bo nyid ni rtog pas sbags// gA yid drug 'drin cha ma 'gags pas//
88a4(rnying rgyud): chos sku nyid kyang bzung bas bcings// cha med rdul dang bcas pa'i phyir// 'od gsal nyid kyi bag la chags// rkyen bzhi'i dmigs pa ma dag phyir// snang ba nyid kyang du mar shar// snang ba de nyid yul sdang phyir// so so'i rigs su skye bar
88a5(rnying rgyud): gyur// yid sgrib ngar 'dzin shes pa rnams// skam glog lta bur wal wal shar// ngag sgrib yul du dpyod byed pa// smad char glog ltar dus mnyam shar// lus sgrib chags sdang 'khrug nyon mongs// nyon mongs dar 'dzin thog ser
88a6(rnying rgyud): wAr// dus gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtshor byed // dan song ljags kyus gtang nas bzung // rang gis rang bcings skyon mongs dpa// srin bu dag gi bcu sbyar// dmyal ba la sogs me chur snang // yi dwags rnams la bred dang sdigs// byol
88a7(rnying rgyud): song rnams la na bun ltar// mi rnams phung po khams dang ni// skye mchod 'byung ba lnga ru spang // de yang bde sdug btang snyoms so// lha min rnams la go mtshon te// wa rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan no// dper na myur 'gro'i 'khor lo bzhin// rgun
88b1(rnying rgyud): chags 'khor la yun ring gnas// de ltar snang ba sna tshogs rnams// thag pa la ni sbrul mthong bzhin// de ma yin la der bzung ste// phyi nang sdod bcud gnyis su chags// bcud kyi 'gro ba rigs drug la// cho tshad lus tshad longs spyong ngag//
88b2(rnying rgyud): sdug skye ba bzhi dag ste// gti mug dug gis brdzus te gres// nga rgyal dag gis skong la// zhe sdang dag gis rjod gsher la// 'dod chags dag gis mngal las kye// nad rigs bzhi pas rtsa bzhi dang // bgegs rigs spyang phyag brgyang
88b3(rnying rgyud): dang // nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyas// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su phyes// 'khrul pa'i 'dra dpe bstan pa ni// kun gzhi'i rnam shes khyim dang mtshungs// gzung 'dzin nor rnams sogs par byed// nyon mongs yid ni chang
88b4(rnying rgyud): ma 'dra// bdag 'dzin dbye ba 'dzin par byed// yid kyi rnam shes khyo dang 'dra// sgrol zhugs te las rnams sogs// sgo bzhi'i rnam shes bu dang 'dra// kun la ris dang bdag bzung byed// lus ni rnam shes mna' ma 'dra// gzung 'dzin
88b5(rnying rgyud): chags sdang rab tu spyod// de yis rlung drug 'khor lo bskor// sems dpa' rdo rje rab tu nyon// ye shes gsum gyi gnas lugs la// lhun grub thugs rje'i 'khrul tshul bshad// phyi rabs rnams la khyod kyis ston// ces gsungs te yang
88b6(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i klong du lhan nar bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ zlog ma'i kun gzhi skye med las rgyal 'gag med du 'khrul tshul rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / sa ma ya/ rgya rgyaH/
88b7(rnying rgyud): rka\u0f89\u0fa4 tin 'a da// nra gra mag ma rgya / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// sun pa zang nyid la 'di skad gsol// kye rang byung rol pa kun tu bzang // ma bcos mi 'gur kun kyang che// 'khrul tshul legs par gsungs na yang // sems can
89a1(rnying rgyud): na/ nams la sangs rgyas gaN+DI/ sa banan brtul bstan dugasal// de skad gsol bas thugs dgangs nas// ston pa 'dzum pa'i mdangs rdzu // rkang thal brjod pa mi med pa'i// rdzog gi ba 'dad du
89a2(rnying rgyud): mig ni mthong byed med pa yis// dmigs gtad med pa'i yul zin nas// lus med bsam bral thugs las ni// ma grub yangs pa'i mgur nas drangs// smrar med mi sdang ljags las kyang // spros med mi mdzad tshul du babs// ye med
89a3(rnying rgyud): stong zhal dag gis// 'gro dang 'od med dbugs las byung // mi sgrib dngos med tshoms la bkram// brjod cing bshad pa'i rten med par// ma gsungs thos pa'i tshul du shar// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje sogs// rig mdangs rig pa'i
89a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams gson// sems can khams gsum gnas pa la// sangs rgyas dang ni byang sems nyid// kun la khyab tshul 'di ltar ro// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying pongs// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad la// til la mar gyis khyab
89a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gnas// thams cad khyab pa'i rang byung nga // rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying po ste// rtsol ba 'dun pas dag 'gyur 'grogs// chos nyid snying po nyid kyis// 'khor dang 'das pa kun la khyab// e ma ho// rang byung rtsol bra' klong chen nga //
89a6(rnying rgyud): kun la lhun grub ye khyab cing // sems can sangs rgyas 'khor myang 'das// rgyu gcig klong chen nga yis khyab// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang // bdag gzhan gnyis dang 'jig rten theg/ rigs drug rtswa ltebs rtag chad dang // lam skas
89a7(rnying rgyud): theg pa rim pa dgu// kun kyang nga yi klong na thim// sems gcig kun gyis chos dbyings khyab// khyab pas rtsa ba'i don 'di gcig/ gcig pas sems can sangs rgyas grol// grol bas chos kun dbyings su gcig/ dpe 'bras don snyam
89b1(rnying rgyud): ldang bar dag/ spos med blo slar zlos pa'i blor// kun gyi snying po byang chub sems// dper na nam mkha' stong pa yis// klong na yod pa'i 'byung chen sogs// snong brgyad kun khyab ji bzhin no// yang dag sangs rgyas dgongs pa ni// sems
89b2(rnying rgyud): can kun gyi rang rgyud la// sku dang ye shes tshul du gnas// snang stong dbyings ni yul che bas// thams cad rig pa dri med kyis// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan tshul// til 'bru' ma ni nyung 'phrul// mar nyid ye nas lhun grub bzhin// sems
89b3(rnying rgyud): can lus sems 'di nyid la// de bzhin pa yi sa bon ni// mthun cing 'od dang bcas par snang // sangs rgyas sku gsum nyid la 'phro// 'dus ni sems can lus la 'dus// gnas ni ldan grub sangs rgyas gnas// bskyed ni
89b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin lhun grub bskyed// bde gshegs snying pa kun bzang nga// snying po med pa'i kun 'byung nga // bstan pa med pa'i ye khyab // ston pa med pa'i yongs khyab pa// 'khor 'das med pa'i rang grol nga // kun khyab nga las chos
89b5(rnying rgyud): rnams 'byung // 'byung ba lnga dang dug lnga kun// lam gyi snang bzhi ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi mes su che// chos nyid ma skyes chos nyid dngos// gzugs med skye ba'i cho 'phrul gzugs// thugs rje lhun grub stong snang khyab/
89b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i khams gsam+b+ha de dzAm che// rang byung rgya rkyen med pa khyab// rgol sgrub la 'das 'gag med khyab// yenas thog med ser bu'i rlung // zos su thig le nyag gcig khyab// 'gu byed ltar snang sems 'di nyid// rig pa'i
89b7(rnying rgyud): shes budz+nyAs khyab// rig pa'i stong po khyab rung nyid// chu yis yongs khyab ji bzhin no// chu yi rang bzhin gcig nyid la// rkyen gyis chu rigs mi gcig bzhin// thig le chen po'i kun khyab la// snang tshul bgrangs lang mthong tshul
90a1(rnying rgyud): med// sems can sangs rgyas snying po can// nyi ma dang ni 'od zer bzhin// theg le che las ma 'das par// skye 'gro la sogs cir yang zung // sems su mnyam la bzang ngan thung // sku gsum 'bras bu
90a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin kyang // rgyu ni sa kun la khyab pa ni// gla ba phol rtsi bzhin no// chos nyid byang chub dgongs pa de// dgongs tshegs rnam pa gsum dag gis// nam mkha' bzhin du kun khyab nas// kun byas kun bskyed sa bon bzhin// nga med pa yi
90a3(rnying rgyud): sngon rol na// chos rnams 'byung ba'i lte ba chad// nga med pa yi sngon rol na// 'khor 'das 'byung ba'i lte ba chad// nga med pa yi sngon rol na// chos kun byed pa'i rgyal po med// nga yis ma khyab gzhan dag na// ston bstan 'khor zhes bya ma
90a4(rnying rgyud): grub// nga yis ma khyab gzhan dag na// sbyang gzhi skyong byed yongs ma grub// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// lnga 'am ye shes bzhi yis khyab// 'dod pa'i khams kyang kun bzang nga// gzugs med khams kyang kun tu bzang //
90a5(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi khams kyang kun tu bzang pong // ngas khyab thams cad bde gshegs snying po 'am// kun gyi thig le sa bon tshul du'o// khams gsum rgyud drug sems can la// rang byung nges med ngas ma bshad// sangs rgyas
90a6(rnying rgyud): sems can mes po nga // nga ni rang byung ye shes te// da ni chos kun snying po yin// da ni kun gnas rtsa ba bzhin// sring po dang byung ye shes ngas// snang ba dang ni srid pa dang // snod dang bcud kyis bsdus pa dang // dus gsum sangs rgyas
90a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang // khams gsum rgyud drug sems can dang // de bzhin du ni thams cad la// ma lus khyab de'ub chub po// de ni kun khyab gnas lugs te// rang rig ye shes lus la gnas// til 'phrul ni mar bzhin du// lus kyi
90b1(rnying rgyud): bklags dang gzi mdangs ni// ye shes rlan gyis khyab pa'o// 'gro ba'i lhas la klu lnga dang // ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang // 'od lnga rlung lnga shes rab lnga// ye nas gnas pa'i rtags nyid du// ma dag rang ngo ma shes drus// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga/
90b2(rnying rgyud): dbang po lnga dang 'dod yon lnga// nyon mongs phyog lnga la sog 'dzin// phung po sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag/ 'gro ba'i lus 'di bud+d+ha'i sku// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// rigs dang rigs kyi bdag por grol// nyon mongs lnga ni ye shes lha// yul lnga la
90b3(rnying rgyud): ni 'od lnga'i sku// phung po lnga la sangs rgyas lnga// 'byung ba lnga la yum lngar rtogs// srid pa gsum nyid sangs rgyas zhing // gnyis med blta ba'i rang lhas yin// de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po rnams// rang rang lus la rdzogs pa ste/
90b4(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas rnam par rang lus la// ye rdzogs sgrub rten mchod rdzas dang // dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa ste// rang rig sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye rdzogs thig le nyag gcig dang // rgya chang phyogs lhung kun dang bral// dkyil 'khor
90b5(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas phung po yin// des na srid gsum dkyil 'khor che// des ni rang lus gangos bcas nyid// rang bzhin yun grub sangs rgyas bstan// sku dang ye shes rig pa la// ye nas rdzogs pa'i rnam dbye yang // ye shes lnga dang sku lnga ste/
90b6(rnying rgyud): rlung lnga shes pa'i rtsal kyang lnga// 'od la kha dog rnam pa lnga// shes rab lnga dang rigs lnga dang // sdang yul de nyid rig parare snang // snang mdzad ma btsal ye nas gnas// rtog 'gags rig pa rdo rje sems// mi 'gyur mi bgyod rtsol mi dgos//
90b7(rnying rgyud): rang rig ye shes nyams 'phel rgyas// rin chen yon tan ye nas gnas// 'od kyis zhing khams mtha' yas snang // snying mtha' ma btsal ye nas gnas// rig pa bud+d+ha'i sa bon tshul// nyams blangs don grub rang grol bas// don grub rang la
91a1(rnying rgyud): ye nas gnas// rig pa rgyas spyi'i don dang gas la// me long ye shes ye nas gnas// rig pa la mnyam s+thA ma mnam// rkyen nyid gdam sbubs tshad la babs// mnyam nyid ye shes ye nas gnas// rig zas nga /
91a2(rnying rgyud): rtog dpyod btang // sor rtogs ye shes ye nas gnas// rig pa ye grol 'bad rtsol bral// bya grub ye shes ye nas gnas// rig pa de rnams tha mi dang // chos dbyings nyag gcig thig ler gcig/ chos dbyings ye shes le nas gnas//
91a3(rnying rgyud): rig pa drod phebs me dang mnyam// 'khor dang 'das pa'i srog 'dzin pa// ye shes sgron mdangs snyigs dang // don dam kun rdzob dbang po'i yul// kha dog 'byed pa dngas snyigs drung // 'khor 'das kun khyab khyab byed rlung // 'khor srog gcod
91a4(rnying rgyud): cing byung 'das 'phen// snying rje med pa'i rgyung du gnas// sngar 'das thul du rig pa gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa ye nas gnas// mtho ris ngan song gang la yang // bzang ngan med pa rdo rje'i rigs// de la 'khor 'das yon tan rdzogs/
91a5(rnying rgyud): rin po che yi rigs su gnas// de la 'khor ba'i skyon mgos// pad+ma'i rigs su ye nas gnas// de nyid las snang kun dngos pas// sangs rgyas dus na las kyi rigs// rig pa ngo bo kaM dag la// las dang nyon mongs dri med pas// / 'a dog dka
91a6(rnying rgyud): por ye nas gnas// yon tan rang rdzogs ser po ste// dbang bzhi yi rdzogs dmar po la// rtsol ba las 'das ljang gung grub// sna tshogs 'gyur med mthing ba'o// 'khor 'das ma lus kun 'byung bas// 'gyed par byed pa'i shes rab ste//
91a7(rnying rgyud): de zhing rig las ma 'das dang // srung bar byed pa'i zhes rab 'o// 'khor 'das kun gyi srog kyang gcod// sgrol bar byed pa'i shes ringab po// thams cad ngo bar de byung bas// khyad par byed pa'i zhes rab po// rlung gis ye shes mkha' stso
91b1(rnying rgyud): pas// bskyod par byed pa'i shes rab po// rig pa nyid las ma 'das pas// rang byung ye shes rang gnas so// gsal la rtog pa ye med de// blo lnga'i rnam shes yid ma bskrad// med cing mi bden ye shes so// kun gzhi'i rnam shes
91b2(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs kyi// yid kyis bdag tu ma bzung ste// rang bzhin mtshan nyid chos kyi dbyings// yid gnyis rtog pa kun dang bral// chos klu thig le nyag gcig go// ye nas rang byung rang khyab pas// rang byung gi ni ye shes so// ye nas
91b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med sangs rgyas pas// rdo rje 'chang ngam bud+ha'o// su dang 'od dang ye shes gsum// brtsegs sa ma gcig ste ma 'dres gnas// ngo bo srul rang bzhin longs// thugs rje sprul pa'i su ru'o// 'od mdangs rang shar ye shes rtsa la/
91b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun kyang // ye rdzogs rang gi lus la gnas// chos longs sprul dang sde snod gsum// thig dgu byang 'das dkar chos rnams// lus dang sems la ye nas rdzogs// gzhan du btsal bas rked mi 'gyur//
91b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor nyid kyi lus la tshang // sa ni sha ste dngos po can// chu ni khrag ste sdud par byed// mi ni rbong ste lus kun smin// rlung ni dbugs te lus gzugs 'dzin// nam mkha' sems te lus mdangs 'dzin// nyi zla mig ste gsal bar byed//
91b6(rnying rgyud): sems nyid do las chos rnams kun// ye nas lhun grub tshul du gnas// lus dang sems la tshang ba'i phyir// phyi rol snang ba nyid las grub// de yang thog ma'i ye shes gsum// ka dgra gzhi yi steng na tshang // de ltar rtogs par gyur pa na/
91b7(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar khams gsum 'khor ba yang // sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang med// don de nges par rtogs 'dod de// des ni nim mkha' lta bur ba ste// don ni chos nyid skye ba med// rtags ni sems nyid 'gag pa med// nga yis ma bsgrubs
92a1(rnying rgyud): thab pas// gas la pa'i lags gzhal sasu byu// rang thung byed las gzhan sa bzhugs// rgyan pa lnga dang khams gsas na pas// ngas phyugs gnas canang ga// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams canarnams
92a2(rnying rgyud): mis byed la bstan pa yin// nges pa gcig la bden pa gnyis// nib rnangs la ga banan no// rkyeni skye gru thugs rje las// 'bras tha 'ams gsum sems can// / khams gsumasems can/ byas nus// 'das sa
92a3(rnying rgyud): susmra/ sa /
92a4(rnying rgyud): ga kyi ga na
92a5(rnying rgyud): pa// sam ya/ nam+b+haH/ me rje ma kyi m-i b+h+ya[] naH/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// dran pa dang nyid la 'di ga gsal// kyai yang dag don rtogs kun tu 'azung // ba slong
92a6(rnying rgyud): khyab klong chen 'byams// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// sa bon khyab tshul gsung na yang // gnas pa'i sa ni gang na gnas// dngas dang snyigs pa gang laganas// brten pa'i sa ni gang lab gyi// gnas pa
92b1(rnying rgyud): shes de lta bu// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pas thugs dgongs nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// kye ho// gnyis med gsal ba'i gzhal yas na// dpag med dmigs med dkyil 'khor shar//
92b2(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur ye shes ston pa ngas// theg pa spyi dang rang min pa// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs 'khor rnams la// sgra brjod bral ba'i bstan pa bshad// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// ma 'khrul dag pa'i blo yis zung // a ho/ tsit+ta/ ro ma/
92b3(rnying rgyud): go ro/ thuH/ dz+nyA na/ ru pa/ hA gA l+ya/ b+hak+Sho// snang srid ye khyab kun bzang la// rig pa'i snying po rang shar byung // kun la 'jug cing gsal bar 'char// gnas ni tsit+ta'i dkyilan gnas// gsal ni dbang po'i sgo la gsal// khyan/
92b4(rnying rgyud): snang srid kun la khyab// byung ni phyi rol rkyen du byung // bstan du mtshan ma'i dngos po med// mthong du dmigs yul yid dpyod bral// shes su tshig brjod kun las 'das// ming 'dogs ma grub mngon sum ma// 'byung ba'i dngas stsogs
92b5(rnying rgyud): 'byed pa la// phyi dang nang dang bar dang gsum// sa rdo ri brag snyigs ma ste// dngas martsi shing nags tshal dang // 'bru sna rtsi thog dngas ma'o// gling bzhi gling phran snyigs ma la// ri rgyal ri bdun dngas ma'o// chu yi dngas ma zla chu shal/
92b6(rnying rgyud): mI yi dngas ma ny+dzi me shel// rdo yi dngas ma gulu rin chen// sa yi dang sa ma gser la sogs// rlung gi dang sa ma rang sgra nye// kun 'dus dngas ma 'ja' gza' skar// nang gi dngas snyigs dbye ba la// sha rus su lpags snyigs ma s+t+waM//
92b7(rnying rgyud): yid dadus ma ga ti ka/ shel dkar spyad pa snying na gnas// khrag dang chu ser snyigs ma yin// dri yi dngas ma khrag thigs ni// mthe bong tsam gcig snying na gnas// lus drod 'di nyid snyigs ma yin// de yi dngas ma rang drod ni// nyi'o
93a1(rnying rgyud): tsam gcig snying du gnas// 'grub dbugs ni snyigs ma yin// de yi dang sa ma dbugs nyid ni// rta rnga tsam gcig snying na gnas// byang khog tu thubs stong pa snyigs// dngas ma thig le khwa yi mig/ stong gas pa ting
93a2(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil na gnas// gsang ba'i dngas snyigs dbye ba ni// ye shes rnam lnga dang sa ma la// phyir shar 'od lnga snyigs ma'o// don lnga spu lnga ye shes lnga// 'od wa kha dog lnga dang ldan// dbyer med snying gi dkyil du gnas// de yang rgyas par
93a3(rnying rgyud): bshad pa na// rin chen zur brgyad gzhal yas dang // 'gyu byed rtsa yi gzhal yas dang // dung khang b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas dang // lta byed mig gi gzhal yas khang // gzhal yas chen po de bzhin// gsang sngags kun gyi gsang chen nyid//
93a4(rnying rgyud): chos sku ngo bo bcu drug tshul// dbyer med gcig gi tshul du bzhugs// gnyis med ye rdzogs chos sku dang // ye nas rang byung chos sku dang // dus gsum sgrib med chos sku dang // spang len mi mnga' chos sku dang // rang byung 'gyur med chos su
93a5(rnying rgyud): dang // ma rig pa yi chos sku dang // sbyor ba med pa'i chos sku dang // gzhon nu bum sku'i chos su dang // rgya che rab 'byams chos sku dang // mi rtag sdug bsngal chos sku dang // stong pa rig can chos sku dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos sku dang // don
93a6(rnying rgyud): dam kun rdzob chos sku dang // spyang 'grong med pa'i chos sku dang // dag pa gsum grol chos sku dang // thabs shes gzungs kyi chos su'o// sha ni pra byed rdo rje dbyings// skye 'jig med par sangs rgyas gnas// khrag ni rin chen gter gyi dbyings//
93a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad lhung byed bu d+ha'i gnas// drod ni me dag sreg pa'i dbyings// gzung dadzin sreg pa'i b+hud+hA'i gnas// drung dbugs yang zhing g.yo ba'i dbyings// kun tu spyod byed bud+d+ha'i gnas// sems nyid rig pa gcer bu'i dbyings// ma bkri
93b1(rnying rgyud): min bram gnas// sus kyi t+ta napacwa// 'dus pa thar bcad gzhal sas 'a// donan dang gsus na// dab ga gda' du// gangs kyi kun sa drug gzhugs// susu gas kyis nan // dgapas nas 'as/
93b2(rnying rgyud): snang // yab kyi cha 'dzin thabs kyi sgra// yum gyi cha 'dzin shes rab su// 'od dang 'od zer zhi ba'i mdangs// gnas pa'i 'od zer tsed+ha gnas// rig pa dngos med chos srul// nyon mongs pa yi dri ma med// ye shes sul mdun rgyub med// thugs
93b3(rnying rgyud): rje'i rtsal la gri bkol med// rin chen gsang ba'i sbubs nyid ni// rang bzhin rnam dgang nyid la// rang bzhin shes rtogs 'khor dang bcas// 'du 'bral med de dbyer mi phyed// gzigs snang gsum ni mi 'gag ste// ye shes snang ba 'od lngar
93b4(rnying rgyud): gsal// rang la tshwar bltas chos sku'i yul// rang gi byang khog stod na gnas// ye shes yul ni rang gi byang // phyir bltas rig yul dbyings nyid la// sgron ma'i yul ni nam mkha'a'o// ye shes yul ni me shol yin// 'od yul rang gi rig pa
93b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro// sangs rgyas rab chos kyi zhu// rang gi snying gi dkyil na bzhugs// spya ni nang gsal bum phral// 'od ni bu ma nang mer me bzhin// ye shes ma bya'i sgong 'dra// swa lA ye shes chos kyi hA// rig
93b6(rnying rgyud): 'od lus ye gdod nas// yul dag snang ba ma 'gags gnas// sangs rgyas rang chas sku ye shes// 'od dang rlig pa zang thal du// ye nas rang chas tsi t+tar gnas// 'od dang 'od khyim tshul du snang // chos sku mi 'gyur ye shes snying // ye
93b7(rnying rgyud): shes g+ha spu sbyang ngog// 'ad du byung zhing zer drugs so// dag pa'i spang baphyogs brgyad ga// nub pa med par gyister gnas// mtshan med yul med grub pa med// rig pa'i nga po 'gyur ba med// thugs rjed dri med dri ma med// 'gag pa
94a1(rnying rgyud): ma 'gags thogs med pa// ma 'gags 'od gsal yul la khyab// mtha' med yul can rgyu chad med// ye shes snang ba ma 'gags par// yul la sems 'dzin ma zhugs par// ye shes rtog bral chen por
94a2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// snying dkyil chos sku stong pa la// ye shes zhing khams kha dog byed// gsal ba 'chor te 'od du 'gro// sru ni mi g.yo zhal phyag rdzogs// yab yum tshem bu lnga ldan de// 'gyur med ye nas phyogs ris med// dge pa chen
94a3(rnying rgyud): grong de na la skyil// brten pa byang khog stod na gsal// bzhugs ni tsit+ta'i dkyil na bzhugs// gsal ba nam mkha'i dang du gsal// sangs rgyas sran zag pa bral// gsang chen gser gyi ma N+Dal la// gamu yi me tog legs 'gram /
94a4(rnying rgyud): nyi gnyis kyi dkyil na ba khrug so// dz+nyAn dag tha ma'i gsung gis zhes// bar+d+ha sa mA ti/ rom hA/ ka la b+hiH/ rten noH/ prang+ga bang+ge/ ma hA \u0f7f/ hrIH/ am la/ s+yA lpAk+kang / !oM mo ma ums sA 'dzunan ma
94a5(rnying rgyud): NaN+De 'aHgaHmAn hrIHde bcu/ mr-ihrI \u0f7f\u0f7fe mA ra gi snyid dkyil na// thig de nyag gcig kun 'azung ba// waM ldan dzad kyi tshul du gnas// sems can dun n+daHtI'i dkyi // chos dbyings lo zhes mdzang ga'i rdzag// ye nas ngos
94a6(rnying rgyud): bral bar gnas// sems can kun gyi tsom+b+hi'i dkyil// ma long ye shes dkar po'i thub// yenas ngos bzung bral bar gnas// sems can kuni bya // dkyil// mnyam nyid ye shes ser po'i zug// le rnas ngos bzung thal bar gnas// sems
94a7(rnying rgyud): can dun gyi kyai d+ha'i dkyil// sor rtog ye shes dmar po'i phub// ye nas ngos dpung bral bar gnas// sems can kun gyi tshet+ta'i dkyil// kye rtsub mi gas ljang gu'i phub// ye nas ngos bzung bral bar gnas// sems can du ni byi ste'i dkyil
94b1(rnying rgyud): ku tu rna nan smra tu rgyu du na na tu sman rma na du na tu/
