95a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa 'khor la bka' stsal cig/ zhes pa ston pa nyid kyis gas na// nyan cig reg mdangs 'kha rnams can// a ma rig pa'i ya shas // sems can kun gyi tsaN+Dal// gang ltar gnas pa'i rang rtsal nyid// drang
95a2(rnying rgyud): sbyang na ngan tho bo'i sra// yangab dang yum du rnam par mngon// blo dang rngo ma'i tshul 'tshong zhing // ye shes rdzu wa dag dang ldan// gsal 'tshong gzi brjid rab tu 'bar// bum pa'i sgra dang bram nang gi// mar mi'i rtsal zer 'anga' 'ad gnas// longs spyod
95a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa bu mi yu'o// rang gi mag mi drud 'ang yin// rtsi yul chom bu dag dang bcas// banas ni 'angs byed na ba'i zla// rdza bcwa rgya brgyad gled nang bklags// brten pa rang gi mgol brten// gsal ba dngas ma legs kyi// sgo kyai tha ma'i thugs
95a4(rnying rgyud): midzod kyis// me long dkyil 'khor mngon sum 'char// dung khang klad rgya'i nang dag na// khro bo'i sgra ni shin tu jom// thugs rje 'dzin byed lcags kur bcas// spu ni nyung 'bru phul thag tsam// sna tshogs gcer grol dgu khri'i grangs// klang nang 'od
95a5(rnying rgyud): lngas gang nas yod// cha dra mdzes pa gsapa 'tsher 'jug/ nya ma mdzes pa'i 'od zer 'pho// zlum bras 'tshod snang rab tu gnas// rang gi shes rig 'i 'di// ngos bsrung ma gub stong sangs nyid// chos kyi dbyings kyang por grub// stong stong byar/
95a6(rnying rgyud): drim chad pa// dbo ma 'gag sa gsal ba 'di// me 'ong lta bu'i ye shes grub// spyong dang gsal ba na mi dang // rang rig shes rngan ma 'gags pa// dbyer med mnyam nyid ye shes grub// rang gi shes rab so so dang char// ma 'gags rang pol thal
95a7(rnying rgyud): 'i 'di// ma mar rtogs pa'i ye shes grub// rang rang ga nga la'ang 'gag thogs med// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes srung // stong gsal 'dus pa chos sku'i mdangs// zhal phyag rdzogs pa bum sku'i tshul// dung khang klad pa'i gzhal yas na// longs
95b1(rnying rgyud): skyong rdugs pa'i sgra rnams bzhugs// dper nabum nang mar ma ltar// b+ha ga khrag khrig 'bum dang bcas// shar phyogs gcig su bgrangs mi lang // 'ad zer bya ba 'bum dang brnyas// blta bas ma b+ha gsal 'tshor 'gro// mamos shing 'od dang /
95b2(rnying rgyud): phung po la// brten pa mgo ste gnas dung khang // snying mig klad par rtsa 'brel nas// gsal ba mig dang me long gsal// chu ba gzhungs pa'i nang la rgyu// 'thung ba gsang ba'i sgo ru 'byung // rig pa ye shes grubs nyid de// thul pa'i tarmA thA
95b3(rnying rgyud): lnga 'byung // ye shes 'khor ni ko rI brgyad// phra men ma brgyad sgom bzhi// dbang phyug rtsa brgyad lnga bcu brgyad// stong zhing bdag med mdzes ther 'phro// rtog med 'od lnga'i lus can du// ye shes nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar// reg bya'i rje
95b4(rnying rgyud): ma dag dang bral// tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod// 'phrul gyi bang mdzod sgo phyes la// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum// blta bas mi skyo mthong bar 'gyur// ma 'gags nam mkha'i khams la ltos// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa nyag
95b5(rnying rgyud): gcig yin// rang rig mthong ba ma 'gags gsal// longs spyod rdzogs skur de yis bshad// rang gi shes rab phyogs med shar// shes rab nyid kyi sku yin no// ma bris pa yi dkyil 'khor na// rang bzhin 'od gsal srog med phra//
95b6(rnying rgyud): dung khang klad pa'i srubs dag na// rig pa ma 'gags zad thal ba// ye shes kha mig can gyi sku// gsal ba shes rab kun tu khyab// longs spyod rdzogs pa mdangs kyi sku// gdul bya kun snang thugs rje brdal// 'od kyi kha mig sprul pa'i
95b7(rnying rgyud): sku// yang sbrul khrag khrig bye ba rnams// zer gyi kha mig sna tshogs sku// e ma rdos bcas phung po'i lus kyis stong // 'gyu byed yid kyi lus kyis stong // dmigs bcas ting 'dzin lus kyis stong // dpyod byed shes rab 'od lus dag/
96a1(rnying rgyud): 'di yis don kun go bar gyis/ bud+ha/ samA ti/ ma la/ ma la/ many+dza/ tsar+d+ha/ ro mat+ta/ ka la/ praH/ kA ya/ gar tsan/ bAH/ kA ya/ dzidz+nyAn/ paN+DiH/ ra maH/ b+hit+ta/ ka la/ hraH/ ma thar+dz+dzaHda/
96a2(rnying rgyud): a ma la/ b+hid+ha/ dz+nyA na/ a bud+ha/ sa mA n+ti/ kra tra na/ ku hr-i da ya/ d+harma kA ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ ngo slod 'bru tshogs gnad du dril/ n+ya/ tsAHN+ya.uHb+hiH/ dz+nyA ni tsit+ta/ gau ro tsan/ ka la ha/ b+huH/ ri rab chen po'i rtsa la/ nor bu rin po mdzod 'dir
96a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i man ngag/ sems dpa' rdo rjes go bar gyis// e ma sgron ma 'di ltar ro// shes rab rang byung sgron ma zhes// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang // rang bzhin mtshan nyid gnas pa'i sa// 'char ba'i sgo dang shar pa'i yul// goms dang dgongs chong mthu
96a4(rnying rgyud): rnams// phyir shar sgo ni dbang po lnga// khyad par kha dang sna la 'char// skyed byed rtsa nas tsit+tar 'khor// ro ma rkyang ma kun 'dar ma// shel sdug log pa stong pa'i nang // gsal ba dang shes chen por bsngags// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bor
96a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi 'dus pa'i ye gdangs su// ye nas lus kyi cha la gnas// thos dang bsam dang sgom pa dang // kun 'byed rang rig shes rab rnams// 'di nyid ngo bor ye nas bzhugs// gdams ldan bla ma'i bdud rtsi 'thung // zhes gsungs nas/ kun
96a6(rnying rgyud): sngar chos nyid kyi rol par lhan ner bzhugs so// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye ho rang byung kun tu bzang // klong chen rtsol bral thugs rje can// klad pa dung khang gzhal yas na// kun sngar khro bo dpag med rnams// ye nas
96a7(rnying rgyud): gnas par gsungs lags kyang // sngar gsungs rnams la 'brel med pa'i// lta byed mig gi gzhal yas de// bzhugs pa gang bzhugs rten 'brel gang // 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces pa ston pa nyid kyis gsan// nyon cig
96b1(rnying rgyud): rig rang rtsal 'khor// sems can kun gyi miganyid la// thugs rje smon ma 'di ltar ro// nyi zer byin smon 'ad ltar// sman 'od gting la thug pa med// rig yul dbyings la sngon yul mkha'// srul sku'i bzhugs gnas skal tshigs pa/
96b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes zang thal mig gi dkyil// thugs rje sbrul sku ye nas bzhugs// brten ni chu bur mig la brten// bzhugs kyang a 'bras dkyil na'o// gsal la mthong ba ma 'gags pa// gsal 'grib med pa rang lha bstan// dpe'u res
96b3(rnying rgyud): ngag gis ngo sprad do// snying nas mig tu rtsa dkar 'brel// rang rig mthong ba ma 'gags te// chos sku snang ba'i bar dag na// ye shes ngo bo zang thal 'khyil// de ngos bzung la mkha' la gtad// rang rig ye shes lhag par 'char//
96b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rang gi snying bzhugs pa// sha khrag lus kyis ma zums te// chu bur mig tu zang thal nas// mthong ba 'gag med chen por bzhugs// brten pa dbang po mig la brten// bzhugs pa mig 'bras b+ha shu'i dkyil// skyon med
96b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' la mngon sum ltos/ bud+d+ha/ dz+nyA na/ k+Sha ya tsak+Shu/ rang byung brag phug gnyis pon// thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur// mngon sum bzhugs pa nga la dris// gnas snying lus brten skur shar te// 'od lus zad thal mig la sprin/
96b6(rnying rgyud): ro ma/ tsak+Shu/ kA la/ pa ni/ b+hu ti/ rgya mtsho'i gting du nor bu sbas// rin chen ri rab rtse la thon// 'od zer nyi zla'i mkha' la 'phro// skad cig dang por b+hud+ha'o// lung ldan bla ma'i thugs las ltos// ri rab chen po'i rtse ye na// kun
96b7(rnying rgyud): gsal grong khyer mi rgod lnga// dz+nyAn pa ny+tsa ka la ha tsak+Shu/ lung bstan bla ma'i thugs la zhog/ mthong ba ma 'gags zang thal sku// dus kyis ma bsgribs zang thal sru// skye shi med pazang thal sku// lus lngas ma bsgribs zang thal sru// mdun
97a1(rnying rgyud): mya med pa rang g+sa// dug zugs pakri bas la na// b+hanang med pa blang phyus // sral gas gnyis pa ba lan// gyis ma bsgrubs pa sa// phyogs can ldan pang bral bu// /
97a2(rnying rgyud): tshul du shes par gyis// e maho// rgyang zhags chu yi skyon ma nyid// skye byedas bon tshul du gnas// nga bo ngas tshig dbye ba dang // mtshan nyid bzhugs tshol gnasas dang // kyai byed 'char sgo mthun dpe tshang// 'di rnams legs padu med la
97a3(rnying rgyud): zung // ngo bo sdang ba gnyis ka krung // rgyud ni rig su mthong ba ste// gzugs sogs 'dod yon lnga sogs rnams// 'di yis 'ching bas zhags pa yin// snang ba rang sar bzhag nas ni// bdag 'dzin bral bas chu zhes bya// smon ni rang gi snga
97a4(rnying rgyud): bar gsal// gong nas gong du 'phel ba'o// dbyings rig 'dres pas ma zhes bya// dbyen kyang zhags su sgron dang // ye shes 'dus pa'i kyang zhugs dang // dbang po 'dus pa'i kyang zhags so// mtshan nyid 'char byed 'gag med pas// dbang po'i
97a5(rnying rgyud): dngas ma mig ces b+ha// 'byed pa pad+ma'i spyan du'o// 'di yi gnas ni mig yin te// mthong byed 'gug pa med pa yis// yul rnams 'dzin par byed pa'o// klad pa drang khang dkar po nas// g.yas su 'khyil brtsa gsum po'i// ba men rA 'dra'i
97a6(rnying rgyud): yi dbyibs// rtsa yi nang na 'di nyid gnas// 'char ba'i sgo ni tsany+dza ra// skyed byed mngal du rang zhugs tshe// dus kun gyi ni thog ma ru// lte ba'i rtsa mdud gru gsum du// pha ma'i rgya rkyen dngas ma yis// mig gi dngas ma nyid du chags// pha ma'i rgyu rkyen
97a7(rnying rgyud): cha gnyis las// dkar nag 'dres pa de bzhin no// mthun dpe 'dzin byed lpags kyu yis// gang snang snga nas 'dzin pa bzhin// 'khor 'das sna gnyis 'di yis 'dzin// blon mas sul gzung rig par snar// lu gu mud mthong tshad yin no//
97b1(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs nas dmigs med ka dag ga dang du stan nar bzhugs so// 3naH/ canaH/ bzhin/ de nas sems dpa' rnga rdzams// 'di skad rang sras sbyin pa babral// seM ho Ta brtsal mad pa dbas// zlogs gzhal yas gsungs la da/
97b2(rnying rgyud): kyang // sngar gsungs tshig la 'brel med pa'i// 'gyu byed rtsa yi gzhal yas na// bzhugs pa gang bzhugs gang la brten// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces pa gsan te bka' stsal ba// nyon cig rig mdangs sprul 'khor rnams/
97b3(rnying rgyud): 'gru byed rtsa yi dra ba na// ye shes sku bzhi'i skyon pang // rang bzhin thig le'i tshul bzhugs te// sems can kun gyi lus zung 'dzin// rang bzhin 'od kyi gong bu bzhin// cha rnams nang na thig le'i sgra// tshe tshad nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// chung cha
97b4(rnying rgyud): rta rnga bzur gshags tsam// gsal tshad nyi zla sgron me 'dra// gsal la 'tsher te gzi brjid 'bar// 'gro dang 'od dang gnas sarba// ye shes mkha' 'gro bye ba 'bum// sa ya grangs 'das brjod mi lang // nyud 'bru'i lus la spyan phul zag/ chu dang /
97b5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i khyang par nyid/ 'phog nas rlung gi 'phar rkyen no// thig le'i yul ni rang gi las// thig le'i pho brang 'khor lo wa// thig le'i gzhung lam gzhungs nyid// thig le'i grong khyer b+he ta lI// brten paskal ba'i tshogs la brten// gsal ba
97b6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul gyi bang mdzod nyid// bla mas sgo phye dbyings la gsal// sprul pa'i grong khyer dgu khri 'bum// thig le rung byung gzugs la brten// rtsa rnams kun gyi nang na bzhugs// thon pa gsang ba'i sgo la thon// gsal ba rdo rje'i mi tog nyid// pad+ma'i
97b7(rnying rgyud): bathun nu'i 'og bcug pas// rang gi lus ngag mid gsum la// mngon sum rtags 'char gas la nyams myong // hU~MH\u0f89\u0fa4\u0f7fkaH ma pa pa u 6\u0f7f/ rgyal ma ri po dbyings 'bras za// bdegs la nyams myong gdams pa rnams// tshad ldan bla pa'i thugs
98a1(rnying rgyud): mdzod bus// em ho sems dpa' rdo rje ljon// thig sa stong pa'i sgron ma zhes// chos rnams kun gyi yid ches pa// 'di nyid don rnams yid la nang // dbangs tshig dbye ba dang // mtshan nyid dgongs pa gnas pa
98a2(rnying rgyud): dang // 'char sgo rang bzhin yul snang ba// tshad dang yon tan thabs mthun dpe// 'di rnams rtsa ba blo la zhog/ ngo bo nyag gcig cha phra ste// stong pa'i mu yang rang gsal ba// mi rtog spos bral zlum po'o// thig ni mi 'gyur drang po la// de ni 'jal
98a3(rnying rgyud): ba chen po yin// stong pa dngos yul zhen blo dgag/ sgron mas 'od lngar rang snang ste// rang rig dang ngo gsal mdangs ldan// nges pa'i tshi ga yin the tshom sel// dbye ba lnga yin 'di ltar ro// gzhi gnas dang gi thig le dang // kun rdzob rgya yi thig le
98a4(rnying rgyud): dang // don dam spros med thig le dang // rang byung 'bras bu'i thig le dang // mi 'gyur thig le stong pa'o// rang gnas dgongs pa gcig yin te// tha snyad grangs zad 'dzin zhen bral// mtshan nyid dngos po rang stong ste// ma bsgoms par yang mtshams
98a5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i// thig le zla bral nyid du'o// ka ti gser gyi rtsa chen te// dar dkar snal ltar 'phra la 'dril// shel spug can bzhi'i nang na ni// rang gnas sus kyang byas med par// ye nas mnyam pa chen por gnas// res ni rlung gi rta la zhon//
98a6(rnying rgyud): lus dang rtsa yi nang dag na// sems can kun gyi lus rten du// thog ma nyid nas gnas pa'o// 'char byed ma bsgribs sems can mig/ tsak+Shu zhes pa'i sgo nas thon// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du snang // kun gyi mig nas 'char ba
98a7(rnying rgyud): yin// rang bzhin 'bas kyis gnas pa la// ye gdangs rang bcas rang gsal te// sus kyang ma byas rang bzhin no// 'char yul bar snang stong pa la// byung gnas 'gro gsum bral ba yi// bde stong mi tog zag med dang // rang byung /
98b1(rnying rgyud): drug su 'dud ma stong// rnam ma bsasas tha' med// 'a ba bur da na// ngas par cang dung 'gyur// ma sring kyad du dang nas // mas pasus 'bar ba ga gan// da san smras dang sa bya// sum da ca dang
98b2(rnying rgyud): mi mtheb gang // 'od lnga 'dus pa'i zlum po rtse// zad pa med par snang ba yin// thabs kyi man dag mtheb mdzub kyis// tsa ny+tsa'i lug dang 'gram btsir byas// mngon du snang ste yid zas so// mthun dpen bya'i mdongs 'dra ste// dza
98b3(rnying rgyud): mig bzhin du gnas// 'di la rang bzhin dbang thob nas// rtsol med nyid du rang grol lo// zhes gsungs nas kun bzang yangs pa lhun 'byams chen por lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phung klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgud las/
98b4(rnying rgyud): thog ma'i sangs rgyas sgra dang thig ler gnas pa'i sa/ zhab rgyas gsal bar gasrungs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / sA mA ya/ Ats+tshaH/ gan sadra tha jig da nyid mamanyam tsaH/ yaH/ de nas sems dpa' rdorje yis/
98b5(rnying rgyud): pa nyid la 'di skad gsam// kye sprul pa'i sku mchog kun tu bzung // skye med chos las kun 'byung ngo ba// sems can rnams kyi ba zang bzhir// spyan ma bzhi dang sangs rgyas rba// gnas bzlas par gsungs na yang // lam ni gang margyas
98b6(rnying rgyud): lags// ston pas 'khor la bzhin sdom cig/ rtsis pa ston pas gsan cing dgongs// dgyes pa'i mdangs phyung tshig 'di gsungs// kye tsa sems dpa' rdo rje nyod// rang byung rig pa'i ngabo nyid// lam ni rtsa la chu ba ste// ral
98b7(rnying rgyud): tsa yi 'khar ma'o// srugasum mi rdzogs chags ni// rim rgyang ma kun 'ad ma// cagasum rang gi sras grangs yin// dbums 'khring sa bzhibarnyan // 'di lag yas g.yon dbyas dag nas// kun rje 'don dmi dbye na
99a1(rnying rgyud): lus dang yan lag bskyed pa dang // smon ma nyid kyang 'dir smin te// tsit+tar sku rnams smin byas nas// rtsa rnams thig ler smin par byed// lus kyi rgyu mdud 'kho lo ba ni/
99a2(rnying rgyud): lus dang yan lag bskyed pa dang // sgron ma nyid kyang 'dir smin te// tsit+tar gru rnams smin byas nas// rtsa rnams thig ler smin par byed// lus kyi rgyu mdud 'khor lo bzhi// dra ba bzhin du 'bral med kyang /
99a3(rnying rgyud): drang por lus kyig pa'i tshul// rtsa gsum sku gsum srid byed de// nus pa spyi gtsug stod la 'thon// dbang po'i dgongs pa ma mor byed// rlung sems 'dres nas rtsal brten// nyi zhe stong zug drug bcwa rtse// gyen du tha sa lams gau
99a4(rnying rgyud): byed// byed byed na rten bzhi dganas// 'gyu 'phrul 'jig dang yang shing ba da/ l+r-i kyi drung byas shes rig gus la// shes rab rnams kyi bor rgya// do rgyad kun 'dar shel sdug dang // log stong gas la shes chen par gnas// gsul sa
99a5(rnying rgyud): gsal rnams rlung gi rkyen// rtse nang gsum nas thig le thung // don de ma thig le g.yon nas byung // sun rdzob thig le g.yas nas byung // dbus nas rang bzhin cithig la'o// rig pa ye shes thig le'i tshul// kun rdzob rgya yis yul gru 'grub//
99a6(rnying rgyud): pha ma'i khri khrag zigs pa dag/ rta nas rtswa zhing phung po brten// gnas pas lus kyi gzi mdangs bskyed// don dam 'ad kyi thig ma ni// nyung 'brutsa ma la rang gas la zhum// rlung gis bkyang dus 'gyu ba ste// zag med rtag tshang mtha' ma
99a7(rnying rgyud): 'das// rang bzhin dro bo ka dgul// gzhi nas ye shes gsum lte bu// stong pazang thal gas la ba dang // rig pa byang ba la gsum du gnas// dbus kyi ca nas rgyal mo byed// ces gsungs nas sna tshog gcir grol chen por lhan nir bzhugs
99a8(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya/ rgyan
99a9(rnying rgyud): theg kun gyi spyi phreng klong chen rab 'thams kyi rgyud las/ lam gang nas rgyu thur tsam bstan pa'i seM'u ste drug pa'o// / sa ma sa/ rgyas kyi/ dan/ grus rbaHgan (\u0f7frkye naH/ de nas sems dpa'
99b1(rnying rgyud): yis// ston pa nyid la yang gsol pa// kye ma bcos klong yangs kun tu bzang // ye shes sems dpa' bdag med dpal// lam gyi rgyu tshul gsungs na yang // 'khor la po rgyad la sogs pa'i// rtsa rnams de ltar yod pa ni// rtsa yi mtshan
99b2(rnying rgyud): nyid go ba la// lus kyi mtshan nyid mgo zhing // lus kyi mtshan nyid ma shes na// gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yongs mi go// gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma gon// 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid yongs mi shes// phyi rabs rnams kyis mi go bas// chags tshul
99b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshul bka' stsol cing // 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams spro nyan 'tshal// zhes pa ston pas gas na dgongs te// 'khor la thugs rjes snang zhing gzigs// gsang chen nges pa'i tshig 'di kun// gnyis med ye shes thugs klod nas// mi 'gyur
99b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bum par dril// thun mong ma yin ljags la bkram// skye med klong nas 'gag med du// brjod med tshig 'di rang grags gsungs// mA At+pa la \u0f89\u0fa4 wA baHnyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// lhun grub ye shes rig pa 'di/
99b5(rnying rgyud): brten pa lus kyi gnas lugs ni// rang dbang can du 'khor ba dang // rang dbang med par 'khor tshul gnyis// rang dbang can gyi 'khor tshul ni// 'od zer mthing ga phyi ru rngon// ljang gu nang du log pa ste// ye shes khor gsal chen por
99b6(rnying rgyud): nas// de ni chos sku lhun grub yin// rang bzhin thugs rje skye ba med// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i 'khor lugs so// rang bzhin 'gro don byed pas na// sprul pa sru yi 'khor lugs so// me tog la sogs brdzus skyes te// dag
99b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i mnga' du dran bzhin 'jug/ de rnams rang dbang can yin no// rang dbang med pa'i 'khor tshul ni// dge ba can ni yang la 'khor// sdig pa can ni mar la 'khor// sdig pa can gyi mar 'khor ni// rlung dang rnam shes yul snang 'di//
100a1(rnying rgyud): las kyi dbang gis gzugs snang shar// dbang po kun ldan phyogs med du// zas dang gos dang sbubs gnas 'tshol// bar ma dor ni yid kyi gzugs// shes pa yang yang phyang phyod can// stod gsum se gol gcig la
100a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor// sdug bsngal tshor ba mang po myong // de la skye ba rnam bzhi ste// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes// brdzus skyes skye dang bzhi yin no// ma yi mngal du 'di lta ste// bar de'i rnam shes 'khyam po rnams// sngon gyi las ngan dbang dag gis//
100a3(rnying rgyud): dbyar gyi sha la sbrang phung ltar// la la'i srog chag ltar du snang // pha ma'i 'dod sred rten 'brel 'jom// bsod nams mthun cing las 'brel ldan// chu rkyen phun tshogs mngal du 'jug/ 'jug sgo dag dang ma dag gnyis// lnga 'dus mtshan ma sbyor
100a4(rnying rgyud): ba la// nyon mongs lnga dang yid drug dang // ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid do// ye shes rang ngo ma shes te// der 'dzin dri mas 'byung ba 'dus// de las lus grub rga shi'i bar// 'khor bar 'khyams shing 'byung ba 'dus// chos nyid bar do ngo ma shes//
100a5(rnying rgyud): der 'dzin dug lnga rug gsum rgyas// yul drug dag gi 'dzin pa yis// pho mo sbyor ba byed pa la// der 'dzin skyes pa'i ye shes rtsal// rig pa yid du 'gyu ba de// pha ma'i bde ba sra snyam dus// bar do'i rnam par shes pa de// bshar lam lus
100a6(rnying rgyud): nas mngal du ni// yi ge a yi tshul du thim// chu la chu bzhag tshul du song // mngal gyi rgyas 'dzum byung tshor 'gags// bde ba chen po'i ngang du gnas// sems yid lha khang khyim tshud bsam// rnam shes rlung dang rgyu rkyen bzhi// thag dang 'o
100a7(rnying rgyud): ma 'dres ltar song // zhag ni bdun phrag dang po la// srub byed rlung gis rab bsrubs te// nyi zla ga'u'i tshul de dag/ mer mer zho rlon lta bur gyur// nyung 'bru brgya yi tshad tsam chags// 'byung ba lnga yi byed las so// bdun phrag gnyis
100b1(rnying rgyud): par nur nur po// zho dang khrag 'dres tshul du 'gyur// 'byung ba bzhi yi yi ge dang // rang bzhin yi ge bzhi bcu ni// rta lnga bcu cha tsam du chags// thig le nyung 'bru'i cha tsam mo// 'byung bas yi byed las yin// bdun phrag gsum la ma yi
100b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed// gor gor po ni zho bzhin chags// rang bzhin yi ge tsa yi tshul// rnam pa brgyad du snang bar 'gyur// thig le nyung 'bru'i bcu cha tsam// bdun phrag bzhi la rlung gis gtor// ta ra tar dngul chu lta bur snang // yungs 'bru phyed
100b3(rnying rgyud): tshad du nges// rtsa rnams rags pa rab tu bskyed// bdun phrag lnga la chu yis bsdus// mkhrang 'gyur ston pa nyung 'bru tsam// de dus rtsa 'dab bcu drug chags// rtsa yi rtse mor thig le ni// nya yi mig tsam gcig tu chags// de la brten
100b4(rnying rgyud): nas lte ba yi// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhi ma chags// bdun phrag drug tu me rlung gis// smin byas nyung 'bru gnyis cha tsam// khyab 'jug nya yi tshul du chags// rtsa dkar rtse la thig le ni// nya mig tsam pa shar ba'o// de la brten te snying
100b5(rnying rgyud): ru// chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhi ma chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bdun pa la// 'byung ba bzhi char 'dus pa yis// nyung 'bru gsum gyi cha tsam bskyed// mer med rus sbal lta bu ste// chu yis bshig cing sa yis mnan// me yis sdud cing
100b6(rnying rgyud): gis gtor// yang gcig 'byung bzhi 'dus pa yis// nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi ge dang // lte ba dag nas bskyed pa yi// ro ma rkyang ma kun 'dad ma// rta rnga tsam yang yang chad nas// snying gar 'khril nas mgrin pa du// longs spyod 'khor lo'i
100b7(rnying rgyud): tshul du chags// de nas rtsa gsum rtse mo la// thig le nya mig tsam du 'gyur// brten nas spyi bo'i bde chen chags// de la brten nas mig gnyis chags// 'byung ba'i dngas ma ye gsal bzhi// snying gi dkyil du 'gyur med bzhugs//
101a1(rnying rgyud): zhag ni bdun tshon brgya dpal// chus bsdus sran ma bcu cha tsam// dedus snying gi dang sa ma lnga// rgya chen lnga ru phyir shar te// nang gdon snyed rnam lnga chags// thig le'i dngas ma snyigs ma chags// snying rtsa yang
101a2(rnying rgyud): kye chags so// de la gyes nas mgo bo chags// rtsa chen bzhi ni snying du 'dus// mcher ba'i rtsa las mchu chags te// de la brten nas lus chags so// de nas lag pa g.yas pa chags// de nas mkhal rtsa g.yon pa chags// mkhal
101a3(rnying rgyud): yar song snyan gnyis chags// de nas rkang pa g.yas pa chags// de nas mchin rtsa mchin pa chags// mchin rtsa yir song mig gnyis chags// de nas lag pa g.yon pa chags// rlung gi mdangs la glo ba chags// glo rtsa yar song sna gnyis
101a4(rnying rgyud): chags// de nas rkang pa g.yon pa chags// de nas smad kyi nang khrol chags// lus kyang rus sbal mkhyed gang ba'o// zhag ni lnga bcud drug ste// bdun tshan brgyad du lus rnams bskyed// 'khor lo bzhi yi rtsa 'dab dang // rang bzhin yi ge
101a5(rnying rgyud): spyan dang bcas// lus kyi sha rus thams cad ni// cha rnams tshang bar chags pa'o// zhag ni bdun phrag dgu pa la// 'khor lo bzhi la rtsa chen brgyad// rnam shes rmi lam lta bur chags// 'byung ba sa yis sra bar byas// zhag ni bdun phrag
101a6(rnying rgyud): bcu pa la// lus la srin bu'i grong khyer dang // phyi rol sha lpags par rnams kun// rtsa yi dra ba dra phyed kyis// thams cad 'brel ba'i rnam par chags// gong gi de dag thams cad kun// rim gyis bskyed cing rim gyis chags// gal te pha ma
101a7(rnying rgyud): gyon can nam// dbang po mtshang lus skyon zhugs// de la chags lugs 'khrug pa'o// 'khor lo bzhi la spyan gnyis gnyis// thabs shes tshul du spyan brgyad chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu gcig la// ma la mig glo'i nad byung ste// mgo
101b1(rnying rgyud): na stug zo dang ga 'gag/ rtsa rnams ro thag lta bur chags// gzug kyang rus sbal lta bu ste// mtho grang tsam du rags par chags// 'byung ba bzhi ba 'dus pa yis// rlung gis phye zhing chu yis bsdus// sa yis bzung zhing me yis smin//
101b2(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor lo bzhi la sogs// lus kyi rten 'brel thams cad tshang // zhag ni bdun tshan bcu gnyis la// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo yi// rtsa mdung thams cad rdzogs par chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu gsum la// las kyi rlung
101b3(rnying rgyud): yang 'jug par byed// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu bzhi la// pa yi sa bon rus pa chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bco lnga la// ma yi sa bon sha rnams pa skyed// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu drug la// sha rus dngas ma rkang mar chags// zhag ni
101b4(rnying rgyud): bdun phrag bcu bdun la// pags pa spris ma thams cad chags// zhag ni bdun tshan bco brgyad la// lus kyi yan lag gsal bar dod// zhag ni bdun tshan bcu dgu la// nya sul thams cad sprul ltar 'khril// zhag ni bdun
101b5(rnying rgyud): phrag nyi shu la// rtsa rnams dra ba'i tshul du g.yogs// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gcig la// me khams snying ni za bo tsam// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gnyis la// lcags khams glo ba gangs ri chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gsum la/
101b6(rnying rgyud): shing khams mchin pa nags ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer bzhi la// mcher pas khams lpags ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer ldan// ku ya dar gyi yol ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer zug la// klad pa zho phor
101b7(rnying rgyud): lta bur chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer 'dun la// rgyu mi 'dom pa gsum du chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nye brgyad la// chu mkhrugs deng tshe bu dang // yan lag rags par chags pa'o// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer dgu la// pho ba rang gi
102a1(rnying rgyud): nyim ga// 'gu gags sa// sa// zhag dunanas zug la// ma dag shAng / ba ga ga sa// rgyabaskal pa
102a2(rnying rgyud): mu phe bas snyomasal phan// zas kyi dngas ma par myong // kyais phral pa'i'i ming mo nas// skye ba byed rlung gis dengs phyogs kyi// dngas mame khams pas na// mdzes par rig kyang gang chags// phyogs ma dkun rgyal khrums/
102a3(rnying rgyud): khyer ba gang ni tho bar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag so gsum la// rlung mkhris padag na gas mags ni// khams kyi nus pa sbed par byed// brtan pas yi khams kyis ni// lus grangs thams cad gso bar byed// klang pa cu yis
102a4(rnying rgyud): spyas grangs spang // g.yob rlung gis lus khong snyoms// drob me yis sras rnams smin// zhag ni bdun phrag so bzhi la// khams kyi dngas ma 'char bde// snying ni me yaM khams yin pas// degyes pa las lce chags te// rim kyang byed
102a5(rnying rgyud): tshor bar byed// glo ba lhags kyi khams yin pas// dngas ma rnapa rnam gnyis kyis// sgra yi don ni tshor bar byed// mchin pa shing // khams yin pas/ dang sa ma ma ga gnyis gzugs brnyan 'char// mcher pas yaM khams yin pas/
102a6(rnying rgyud): dngas ma sa yis dri rnams tshod// mAb la ma d+ha li khams parnapas// drangs ma rdo rje patra yis// bde ba thams cad myong bar byed// bdun phrag de nas wa pa// r+Na yul ma rnams dad par byed// bdun phrag de nas drug la// rlung dang rnam zhes
102a7(rnying rgyud): nga ba bye/ bdun pa pad nam bdun pa// dang phrag bying drag babya/ 'du zhi dum babyed pa// sro kyi pa sarnangs skye par bya// bdud ci nga 'a dbus// rnam gas tu bya bya 'byung / bdun cig ni na/
102b1(rnying rgyud): la// skyabs kyi thams cad dran// de ltar bdun phrag bzhi bcu la// zla ba dgu dang zhag po brgyad// sI na zla dgra brtul// mngal du bcog pa'i 'du shes shar// 'phul byed drung gis mngal bdas// mgo mjug log nas kyar la 'dzin/
102b2(rnying rgyud): de nyer mngal gyi rgya dang bral// sngar gyi bag chags srab tu song // gyis kyi nyer len ngo ma 'phrod// shes pa sngar bas mi gsal zhing // rtsa rlung kun gyi stobs ma skyes// khams kyi dngas snyigs mgye bas// nad gdon ma mthun phyogs rnams snga
102b3(rnying rgyud): de nas khams kyi zas zos pas// rangs mas khams kyi nus pa bskyed// snyigs mas lus kyi stobs bskyed nas// rim gyis lus rnams skyed par 'gyur// de ltar rdzogs ldan mi lus la// rus du ma skam brgya drug cu yod// shal spar tshad
102b4(rnying rgyud): bcu yod// khrag ni rang gi snyim pa drung // rtsa ni nyi khri chig stong yod// nya sul chen po drug yod do// klad pa rang gi snyim pa gang // rgyu me dang 'dom gsum yod de// sgra ni brgyad khri bzhi stong yod// ba spu bye ba gcig yod do// so ni sum cu soganyis
102b5(rnying rgyud): yod// sgal tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod// rtsib ma bcu drug la sogs te// 'dom gang gru bzhi lus la rdzogs// rang lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di// sbubs nas thon te sprul pa'i sku// 'byung ba lnga las lus grub ste// thabs shes
102b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis ni 'du 'bral med// bdun tshan rnams ni rtags tshad de// zla ba dgu ni theg dbu ste// zla ngo bcu ni sa rnams bgrod// sgyu ma lus kyi chags gnas lugs// 'khrul med khyod kyi blo la zhog/ ces gsungs nas cog bzhag dang dngas kyi
102b7(rnying rgyud): dngal lhan nor bzhugs so// rdeg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ lus kyi grub tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / sa ma ya/ rtsa rgya rgya/ greb bla k+saraH/ Ta \u0f89\u0fa4 a/ 1b+h+yaN+ya N+ya/ TaT ga tar+sa
103a1(rnying rgyud): zab rgya/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang gsol pa// kye dang po'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzung // ye grol brjod pa bral ba'i mchog/ lus kyi chags lugs gsungs na yang // rtsa ya~M gnas grags
103a2(rnying rgyud): pas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa/ rig mdangs 'khor rnams nyon// spyi na rtsa ni bas ma mi khyab// hril gyis bstan na 'di ltar ro// ma rig gnyis sngar 'dzin pa yis// ye shes rtsal yang
103a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung bzhir 'dus// 'byung bzhi las kyi lus su grub// lus dang mnyam du rtsa rnams grub// rtsa dang dus mnyam thig lder grub// de lub spu dang ye shes phub// thams cad dbyer med ldan grub yin// de yang lus chags dus mtshungs su/
103a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung bzhi'i lus kyi rtsa rnams grub// spyir ni ba spu'i grangs dang mnyam// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis 'dus// bzhi brgya bdun cu rtsa gnyis skye// de yang bsdus pas 'dus pa'o// de bsdus 'khor lo bzhi ru 'dus// lte bar phyed byeng drug
103a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi// snying gar dran pa sum cu gnyis// ro 'dus brgyang gnyis bcu drug gnas// rnam bkod sum brgya drug tu gnas// sred na 'khor lo bzhi pa la// rtsa yi grangs ma bshad pa ni// bzhi brgya bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// de ni bsdus pa'i grang
103a6(rnying rgyud): can no// 'khor la bzhi pa de yi dbus// rtsa gsum drang po dag bar gnas// shes lhag can ni zhod la ste// oM A hU~M gsum yang rtsanang gnas// dag pa su gsum 'cha gzhi byed// ci gzhan 'byung wa'i rkyen yin no// ro ma rdza li dang sems
103a7(rnying rgyud): bskyed// byung mas ye dang sams bskyed// kun 'dar ma ni rlung gis bskyed// ro mos skye ba'i g.yonangs nas// byang sems dbabs pa'i rten gni byed// rgyang mas snying gcig yon nas// mgrin pa'i rtsa nas gnyis su gyes// ci zung banyis
103b1(rnying rgyud): nas 'bon nas ni// dar lgad pa men d+ha 'dra ye// rtsa ni mig gi 'bras la zag/ ye shes snang ba 'chang ba'i lam// kun 'dud ma ni dbus na gnas// tso mo gsum nI yar song bas// g.yas gsan na pa gnyis la zug/ dbus mtshangs pa'i
103b2(rnying rgyud): gnas su zug/ rang bzhin gri ge 'od dang bcas// rlung lnga ye shes rnam lnga dang // thig le 'od 'bar tshul du gnas/ de ni rtsa spyi'i rnam bshad yin// de ni so so'i rtsa gnas bshad// dang po srid byed 'khor lo yis// srid pa chags pa
103b3(rnying rgyud): gzhi ma byed// bde ba chen po'i rnal du 'jog/ mi 'gyur thems su gsum gyis 'jug/ lus mi 'gyur ba rtsa yi thams// ngag mi 'gyur ba yi ge'i thems// yid mi 'gyur ba rlung gi thems// rtse yid rlung rdo lus ngag yid// de rnam
103b4(rnying rgyud): padag nas bskyed// rtsa 'de ba drug cu rtsa bzhin// rang bzhin yi ge de dang mthun// 'od kyi gad bu rang bzhin sku// kun tu bzang poso gnyis dang // kun tu bzang mo so gnyis rnams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// de la thams cad skyed dbyed
103b5(rnying rgyud): zer // blon ma'i spyan dang 'byung bzhi'i spyan// sa dang ya yis mtshan nas gnas// khyad par lus rdzogs smin pa'i rtsa// grangs can nyi shu rtsa brgyad de// thig le'i lhan rtsabacu drug yod// sgron ma'i rtsa ni bcu gnyis yod// kun la yi ge re re
103b6(rnying rgyud): gnas// lte bar 'byung ba'i sa bon ni// yab yum sa bon hrIHdang ni// yi ge su ser tshul du gnas// dbu ma ro ma chung ma gsum// dkyil drang ka ba'i tshul du gnas// lte bar rtsa 'dab drug rngu bzhi// ljon shing yal ga gyes 'drar gnas/
103b7(rnying rgyud): dran byeng 'khor lo lte ba nas// sor brgyad yar bcad snying ga nas// rtse rnams lal gsum cu gnyis// rang bzhin yi ge 'od thrig tshul// 'khor lo lte bar khams dkar po// yab yu ma yi ge ma dang hU~M// 'od kyi gong bu'i tshul du gnas/
104a1(rnying rgyud): 6\u0f7f/ \u0f7f yig 'dre ldag a ru gnas/ \u0f7fkha ma taHthAHmasas b+hag sa na \u0f7f/ de rnams kun bzung yab sa ma yin// ro 'dus mgrin pa'i rtswa lag na// rtsa 'dab bcu drug yig re// dbus sum lag rang
104a2(rnying rgyud): ni// yab yum yi ge ri dang rtsa// 'od kyi gong bu'i tshul du ga nas// rtsa yig rnams ni 'di ltar ro// ra rAHli lAHe AHa AHa aMHa aHa AH/ rtse mo rnams bkod rtsa yig ni// rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu yod// de bsdus sum
104a3(rnying rgyud): rtsa gnyis te// rang bzhin yi ge re re ste// dbus su yA ge ya ljang dang // yab yum yi ge ha dang ra// 'od kyi gong bu tshul du gu nas// rtsa yig rnams ni 'di ltar ro// pa yAHpheM lIHmi mIHba b+haHbahrIHnya lAHnye sbyiHkha kha rdzag tshachodad+haHwa[]
104a4(rnying rgyud): sa swAHna nAHa a AH/ rtsa 'dab thams cad gdugs rtsibs lter// rtsa yi gtso bo gsum las gyes// nus pa skye gtsug 'dzom pa yis// dbang po sgo lnga dag la don// byed las so sor byed pa yin// 'khor lo bzhi la mi the ba'i// gsang bas
104a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba myong bar byed// rnam par bkod pa'i 'khor lo ni// rtsa 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// lte ba'i rtsa mdud thig le la// 'byung bzhi'i dngas ma khu khrag ldang // yi ge ya dang sa ru gnas// rlung gi dngas ma yaM gnas so// de ltar rang lus 'di nyid
104a6(rnying rgyud): la// rtsa dang yi ge'i gnas su rdzogs// zhes gsungs nas/ blo sgom yid dpyod dang bral nas/ mngon sum gcer grol du lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ rtswa'i gnas
104a7(rnying rgyud): tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// \u0f7fgi rnemA N+Da gAHnaT rdza sa pan ShArgya rgya rgyaHda lad r+yaH// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol ba// mi g.yo 'gyur med kun tu bzang // blang dor bya bral rtsol med pas// rtsa yi gnas
104b1(rnying rgyud): srogs gsungs napang // gaslobargyang gi gnas sugs das// myong bas rnams kyis mgangs// skyon pas byung pa bka' gyu cig/ mu 'bral dag la ga sal na// sapa rgyan bsags na gang ta// zhal ma das 'a
104b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzum bstan nas// zhus pa'i lan du 'a stsal ba// a masems dpa' rdo rjerdzal// ye shes rlung gis ma khyab med/ de larna ma grangs mang na yang // las rlung shes rgya gnyis sa// ma thus rlung rnasems dang // mam
104b3(rnying rgyud): rlung dag dang 'dres// rlung sems kyis sa med pasaH// kun 'dus drung gros pas byed// ga sram da nas r+the// snying bzha brgyas rlung ste// macu gnyis kyang tsam mo// tshig stong drug brgya \u0f7f// byed pa dang sanig
104b4(rnying rgyud): yin// seMn na byur drug shang giN+DI phrin// snang srid thams cad rdung la brten// chung ni sems cad byed pas so// dgas pa'i rjes stongs ldan pas ni// sa la rlung gis khyab pa // rdul rlung gis khyab pa'i phyir// 'bab pa'i rtsal thugs
104b5(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'o// chung gis mo la khya pa'i phyir// ribar pa'i nus rdul ldan pa'o// rlung la rlung gis kya pas ni// 'gro ba'i rtsal thugs ldan pa'o// maba' lajung gos khyab pa'i phyir// bkrag mdangs yon tan kun 'thung 'char// spyir na
104b6(rnying rgyud): rlung ga pa gsuMs// thu dade bshad kyang gcig tu 'dus// dag pa med na sems 'argyang // seM sa 'di bri na chung me 'byung // sems ga ci byang nas le shes zlab// ye shes rdul las gag med 'ang // rtse rlung theg pa ga pasams//
104b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzim da kyi'i ma na na // mnas kyi seM bathang pa yis// ming byed cing dris badzizhin// phrin / na kyi mes pas sa pa// sag sa sa rgyags thung bas 'dun// yang dag
105a1(rnying rgyud): D+yanra/ !// thams cad dag pa rlung gcal// dbyer med rag cag ngo zhes na// rang sems dag pa'ang phung grol// mkha' la sprin deng sa ji bzhin no// zag brgyas lus kyang ma sdang bar// ya shes klung du tshang /
105a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes rtsal gyi lus nyid la// rlung gnas spyi dang bye brag gnyis// bsam 'das bshad kyang lnga ru 'dus// 'degs byed rlung ni 'od dkar tshul// snying nas mcher rtsa'i nad la thon// lus kun khyab par de gnas so// lha tshigs
105a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi la khyab par gnas// sha rus pags pa'i stobs rnams bskyed// bkrags dang gzi mdangs skyed pa'i rlung // 'od ser tshul du snying nang nas// phyir thon mkhal rtsa'i nang nas ni// mgo mjug lus khyab sprind thag nas// khrag dang chu
105a4(rnying rgyud): ser bkrag mdangs skyed// me mnyam drod dang 'beb pa'i rlung // snying nang 'od dmar tshul du gnas// mchin rtsa'i nang nas phar thon nas// lus kyi mgo mjug kun khyab ste// pho ba'i nang na lhag par gnas// zas rnams 'ju zhing lus
105a5(rnying rgyud): bskyed// dngas snyigs 'byed byed rlung ljang gu// 'od dang bcas pa snying nang gnas// glo ba'i nang song lus kun khyab// khyad par kha sna gnyis la gnas// zas rnams rangs snyigs gnyis byas nas// dang sa mas phung khams khyed
105a6(rnying rgyud): par byed// snyigs ma dri chen dri chung phye// bshang ba'i lam na sa phyir dor ro// snying rje med pa las rlung ni// mthing ga'i 'od can snying nang gnas// rig pa dag dang gnyis med pa// de ni sreg pa'i rtsal zhugs// dbyer med gcig
105a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// bye brag 'khor lo rlung gnas ni// dang po lte ba skyed byed du// rlung gi dbyibs ni 'od ma'i gzhu// chad zung 'od kyi gong bu ltar// rab tu rgyas te thig les brgyan// spyan gyi rnam pa srog 'dzin rlung // snying rje'i rlung ni chang zung 'og
105b1(rnying rgyud): byi'u leb ma'i tshig ltar gnas// dra yi g.yas su me mnyam drung // bye ba'i ba rlung lta thung gnas// g.yon du khyab byad lnga ba 'dra// gzhu chu dkyil na dngas snyigs rlung // lpags chags sun gyi rnam par gnas// srid pa lte ba'i chung
105b2(rnying rgyud): dran pa 'dus pa'i rlung lnga ni// tsit+ta rin chen bur brgyang tshul// dbus su srog 'dzin drung zhes pa// thig le sran gang lta bung gnas// de maM 'og tu las kyi rlung // chan grub tshul dru gnas pa'o// de cer thig le lu li N+Da la// sun la khyab par gan
105b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de yi g.yas su dngas sdigs rlung // sku yis gang ba'i thig le gnas// de yi g.yon du khyab byed rlung // dzig le yab yum tshul du gnas// ma mnyam rlung gi thig le dang // thig phran tshul du gnas pa'o// shar drung dkar tI 'a
105b4(rnying rgyud): par byed// lho rlung ser te rab tu thim// ye shes lnga ldan khra bo ste// byang rlung ldang la rab tu g.yo// nub drung 'bar te rab tu dmar// dran pa tsit+ta'i gnas tshul lo// mgrin pa ro 'dus drung lnga bshad// ci spyang lce 'dra'i rlung gzugs te/
105b5(rnying rgyud): le spyan mig dgu brtsegs pa// srog 'dzin pa pi rlung zhes so// de 'og las rlung nya mig star // phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi thig les bkyen// sgra tsho na brgyangs 'drag po med gnas// g.yas su me dang mnyam par rgyu// bika le lnga brtsegs
105b6(rnying rgyud): dang phyir 'dra// g.yon du dngas rtsigs 'byed pa'i rma // thig le zug phran spangs pa 'dra// gong du kun tu khyab byed rlung // thig le dra ba ris su gnas// rtse mo rnam bkod rlung rdza ni// 'khor mo rtsibs wa mu khyung lnga// lto bar srog 'ang na rlung zhes
105b7(rnying rgyud): pa// thig le zhal gsum phyag drug gnas// las kyi rlung ni l-i 'og/ thig le zhal gsum phyeg drug pa// madrung nang du bzhugs par gnas// phyogs mtshams brgyad du thig le brgyad// re brag 'then 'drar gnas pa'o// 'khor lo
106a1(rnying rgyud): cabs nag yas dgal// bag yem bya'i mdod pang druganas// g.yon pa dngas rtags ca pa d+d+ha// thogs nyamags tha gnas// par rgyas nag las ga nas// bran rbA pa par byang ba drang // /
106a2(rnying rgyud): laza 'ag gur gyi ma gnas// stag ma'i rlung rnams kyi bas mtshan la// sreg rgya ga rgyang tshul du gnas// sa rlung seng po lci ba gnas// dran par chu drung dkar po gnas// de 'dus me rlung dmar ba gnas// sa sod rlung gi rlung gi nas sa/
106a3(rnying rgyud): de ltar skyed byed cu bzhinas// 'argya dung 'grel dud 'phrig pa dang // yang g.yo bskyod pa'i bdag sbyin du// lnga zhing lus kyi rlung ngang bcas// gsal tig mdangs dang brnyas pa'o// zhes gsungs nas rang gas la ston gyis ma bsgribs pa
106a4(rnying rgyud): gting gsal chen po ting 'dzin la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phung klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ g.yo ba rlung gi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa 'o// / na3 Ta g+hu khragan/ maza la Ta dz+ranany+dzaHrgya
106a5(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// / Na swa N+ye nam bgyur// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol ba// kyai bdi stong bdag nyid kun tu bzeng // rig stong dpyir med ye shes dpal// rlung gi gnas lugs gsungs na yang // thig le'i gnas lugs mi gsungs pas
106a6(rnying rgyud): bkod pa thig le'i gnas lcags de// ston pa rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces pa ston pas gsinA cing dgongs// 'di srad 'khor la btu 'astsal pa/ ha~M/ ye shes rang rgyal lus 'di nyid// cha yi dra ba thig les khyab// thig le reg

106b1(rnying rgyud): rjong thig le de dag ni// 'byung ba lnga yi dngas ma yin// yum chen sde lnga dngos yin te// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi srog yin no// de la ye shes thig le gnas// don dam kun rdzob thig la gnyis// dbyed med gcig gi rang bzhin rgyu/
106b2(rnying rgyud): klad pa rkang mar rus pa rnams// rtsa dang chu rgyus zhag tshil bu// pha yi thig le dkar pos bskyed// sha khrag chu ser spu lpags rnams// ma yi theg le dmar pos bskyed// de nas lus kyi rtsal rdzogs te// kha mig rna ba can du byon// kye brag
106b3(rnying rgyud): thig le'i gnas lugs ni// khyad par 'khor lo bzhi yi dbus// pha ma'i thig le nyung 'bu tsam// dngul chu rgya skyegs tshul du gnas// kha dog lnga ldan ye shes gzugs// yig 'bru spu yi tshul du'o// ba spu'i bu ga tshun chad kyi// k+Sheng
106b4(rnying rgyud): can grangs med pas ma 'das pa// pha ma gnyis kyi thig les khyab// thig le ye shes rig pa'i rtsal// 'byung ba lnga 'dus dngos ma yin// 'das ma 'das kyi srog yin no// sgra dang thog le gnyis su med// rang lus kun la khyab par
106b5(rnying rgyud): gnas// ngo spod ma yengs 'di yid zhog/ phyi ltar 'byung ba lnga yin te// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' 'o// nang ltar yum chen lnga yin te// mA ma kI dang sangs rgyas lhan// gos dkar chos dbyings dam tshig sgrol// gsang ba ltar na mkha' 'gro
106b6(rnying rgyud): lnga// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rin chen dang // pad+ma las dang chos dbyings so// yang gsang ltar na ye shes lnga// me long mnyam nyid sor rtog dang // byi thub chos dbyings ye shes so// phyi ltar 'khor lo lnga yin te// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang /
106b7(rnying rgyud): lte ba gsang gnas bde byed do// nang ltar thig le lnga yin te// gzhig nas thig le kun rdzob kyu// dond ma spros mod rang byung 'bras// mi 'gyur thig le rang gsal lo// gsang ba ltar na yi ge wa// ma dang ha ran sa'o// yang gas
107a1(rnying rgyud): ltar na ba dog wa// dkar dmangs ldang mthing ga'i mdog/ su wA wAr yang kun grub ste// mngon par byang chub chos longs sprul// ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin no// phyag rgya rnam pa lnga yin te// rdzogs pa chen po'i phyag
107a2(rnying rgyud): rgya dang // chos nyid don gyi phyag rgya dang // dam tshig 'phro 'du'i phyag rgya dang // gnyis med las kyi phyag rgya dang // phrin las kun grub phyag rgya'o// phyi ltar phung po lnga yin te// gzugs phung rnam shes tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed phung
107a3(rnying rgyud): po'o// nang ltar nyon mongs dug lnga ste// gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod phrag dog/ nang ltar phrin las lnga yin te// zhi rgyas dbang drag thams cad dag/ de ltar yin pa'i yon tan gyis// rgyu yi thig le ma spangs sbubs// bde dang gsal
107a4(rnying rgyud): dang mi rtog dang // rtsol bral kun khyab 'di yi khyad// thig le rang byung rang gnas pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i ngo bo yin// rang gsal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// rang grol rin chen mapa' 'gro yin// gsal 'tsher pad+ma mkha' 'gro ste// zlum
107a5(rnying rgyud): po las kyi mkha' 'gro'o// chu yi thig le slang gyur na// gsang sngags dam tshig kun nyams nas// bskal pa 'bum khrir na rag khyod// de phyir thig le ma nyams bsrung // thig le srub pa'i rdzas la gnag/ sgyu ma'i thig le nyams gyur na/
107a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro 'bum sdes du skad 'don// mi mthun rkyen dang bar chad 'byung // thig le ma nyams bsrung gyur na// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// dbang du 'du bar the tshom med// 'khor 'das kun gyi srog yin te// de phyir thig le mnyams
107a7(rnying rgyud): par// mtshan ldan ma la bde ba bsrul// rtsa btsal byin gyis brlab pa dang // sbyor dang phab bzlog 'dren 'grems dang // bcu drug phyed phyed thig le sbyang // phung po khams dang skye mched kun// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bsgom//
107b1(rnying rgyud): dang ba 'dang yan thams cad kun// phyi ru mi 'bral nang du 'bul// sbrul skya chags pa'i yul dang bral// 'dzin pa med par spyod pa'o// de ltar mi shes bran po rnams// yi dam gyi nas sgom pa dang // ya shas rtsa ru 'dzul ba dang // tha
107b2(rnying rgyud): le spong dang shes rab bral// tshogs mchod 'dod yon phyi ru 'bul// blta bsgom spyod gsum phyi nas 'chol// sangs rgyas gzhan nas re ba rnams// bskal ba zhing gi rdul snyed kyang // bye ba dbu khri'i srid mthar yang // bsod nams bsags
107b3(rnying rgyud): kyang nga ga la grol/ ci phyir ye shes rang gsal 'di// rang la rang chas yod pa'i phyir// zhi khro deges brgya rang las grub// mkha' 'gro sde lnga rang las grub// dpa' bo sde lnga rang las bu ba// rig pa'i rtsal zhugs ma 'gags pas// thabs
107b4(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin pho ru snang // shes rab rang bzhin mo ru sdang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// snang stong gnyis med chos kyi sku// zung 'jug spos dang bral gyur te// rtsa rlung thig le bde chen sku// zhi khro rigs brgya mkha' 'gro grub//
107b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i sa la gnas// lta ba chos nyid lce med la// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang shar// gang ltar brtag pa de ltar snang // sgom pa rang gsal 'dzin med la// ma bcos bzhag na bde ba che// skrod pa rang snang nges med la// ma 'gags
107b6(rnying rgyud): dranges kyi rol pa shar// gang ltar byas pa de ltar grol// lta spyod zung 'brel bde stong la// sa lam gcig chod stan gcig ste// yon tan thams cad de la tshang // snang srid thams cad chos skya'i zhing // ji ltar byas kyang bde ba che// ma bcos
107b7(rnying rgyud): kun grol mnyam pa nyid// rang lus rgyal ba'i da la ru// spu dang ye shes thig le rlung // sku gsum dpal rang ches gnas// de phyir rang la rang longs spyod// mkha' 'gro'i srog sngags dam pa rnams// rang la ye nas mi gnas na/
108a1(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs byung 'grub pa dag la 'gyur// rang la gnas pa rang gas la gdag// dpyir rgya rlung bde snong srung // lhag med sangs mas than mang 'grub// chos gsungs nasag dag pa bral chen po'i dngal tan
108a2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi lung klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las// thig le'i gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / Nak+Shany+dzaHr+tha m+pathA b+ha k+Shak+SharmAH\u0f89\u0fa4\u0f85Ta kra Na sa na/ rkas ru b+h+ya/ ma rdzog na rgya 6\u0f7fsems dpang rdo rjes yang
108a3(rnying rgyud): gsol pa// kye ye shes gsum ldan kun tu bzang // thugs rjes kun khyab rol pa'i rje/ thig le'i gnas lugs gsungs na yang // rig pa ye shes gnas lugs sam// sku mdog lha grangs ji lta bu// bzhugs rtsal ma
108a4(rnying rgyud): ston pas rig mdangs 'khor la gsungs/ zhes pa ston bsags na dgongs te// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// dag pa ye shes gnas lugs ni// gong du rgyas par bshad na yang // bzhugs tshul zhal phyag bshad kyis nyen// myos spa ya
108a5(rnying rgyud): shes chen po de// tsit+ta rin chen zur brgyad du// sa bon yi ge'i tshul mdangs can// rtsa rnams dngas ma kun 'dus pa// rgya mtsho gser gyi nyi ma can// ye shes tshul du chos skur bzhugs// mtshan ma'i lus sam zhal phyag med// rang gi snying
108a6(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil dag na// seng chen bsnol ba'i khri steng na// rig pa kun tu bzang po mthing // yid byed kun tu bzang mo 'di// dkar gsal tshul du ye nas bzhugs// de mdangs snang mdzad yab yum dkar// 'khor lo bsdams shing seng steng 'gying /
108a7(rnying rgyud): shar du rdo rje mi baspyod mthing // sangs rgyas spyan dang gnyis su med// sa snying byams pa mi tri la// lA s+ya ma dang mA les bskor// shar phyogs tshom bu dug tu bzhugs// ri na 'byung yab yum rta mchog gdan// nam snying kun tu bzang po dang /
108b1(rnying rgyud): sa na/ na tu na na
108b2(rnying rgyud): sdang sprul// mug dor sleb rnam par sel/ A mo kaM dang ga ma// chom bu'i sradrug byang du bzugs// shar gror nam rgyal lcags kyu gnyis// slong gshin rje zhags pa me// nub skor tam grin lcags thog ma// byang skor bdud rtsi rdul
108b3(rnying rgyud): gyi gnyis// skye ba rab sa myin sram da dkar// ldag par mya mun thogs ca ldang // rdog cing shAg pa phreng bye da // gsang bar byol skyong thub pa mabyung / lte bar pa 'ang dngadabar po dang // rkang mad+hil A ba nag po bzhugs// de ltar ban
108b4(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis rnams/ chos ye shes zang thal lo// ri bo rang bzhin thug sa ldan// sring ba ye shes skyong po can// gsal ba 'od kyi snying po rten/ rang du gu pa'i snying po can// slob g.yogs med par zang thal ma/ phyogs
108b5(rnying rgyud): mtshams med par khyab gdal le// gsal 'grib med par dang sa sang gi// ho lkog med par rngon cer ra// stong gsal khyab pa chen por bzhugs// de yang wa ldan cheran po ste// stong pa po shes skye dzinA// yang dgas chung sangs rgyas/
108b6(rnying rgyud): thig le nyag gcig pu ru bzhugs// thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur// 'od zer snying po'i sku ru bzhugs/ rang byung rig pa'i snying po can// rig stong lha ni grub chen por bzhugs// 'gag 'grib med de zang thal lde// ye shes chen po
108b7(rnying rgyud): dang bzhin du// rang bzhin lhan grub spu ru bzhugs// chos su rnamadag chos dbyings su// gzugs su'i zhing khams yongs su rgyas// me 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa ste// rgya mtsho dgaza' skar shar ba 'dra// sos ka'i sdig skya zang ba'am

109a7(rnying rgyud): nga ba brgyad/ phyogs kyang byeng bar bag pa ni/ 'di la zhes 'jug pa nga// kyang 'o// gsalab pa gags sa par gyung // gang ga yang bzlam pa ni// mang can pa zhes 'dug pa'i
109b1(rnying rgyud): da ltar 'char tshul ngo shes pa// dka' thub tshad med mi dgos te// thams cad lhun gyis grub pa ste// bya grub ye shes 'jug pa'i lam/ bsgom bya sgom byed nyid dang bral// thams cad dang grol lhun grub rtsal/ ma bsgoms 'khor 'das
109b2(rnying rgyud): rang srog chod// chos dbyings ye shes 'jug lam mo// de ni lam dang sbyar pa'o// 'bras bu ltar du bshad pa na// de ltar 'byung wa'i dngas ma de// ye shes rig pa zhes kyang bya// gyi ltar 'byung lnga nang phung po// gsang ba dngas ma wa ru
109b3(rnying rgyud): yang gsang ltar na yi ge lnga// bla med ltar na mkha' 'gro lnga// du ma sna tshog phye khyur kyang // rig pa'i ye shes nyid la rdzogs// thams cad ye shes rang yin pas// rang byung ye shes rig pa'o// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// snying po ye
109b4(rnying rgyud): shes gsum phye na// rig pa rtog med chos kyi sku// rig pa 'gag med longs sku ste// cir snang sprul pa'i sku yang yin// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kun// lus sems gnyis la tshang ba'o// sku gsum ye shes
109b5(rnying rgyud): gsum dang ldan// khyad par rin chen zur brgyad kyi// sru dang ye shes 'od dang gsum// sgra ni mi 'gyur mi g.yo ba// zhi ba'i sku ni nyung 'bru tsam// mtshan dpe'i tshad ni phul thag tsam// sna tshogs gcer grol nyid du lte// theb
109b6(rnying rgyud): shes gnyis med yab yum tshul// yab kyi cha 'dzin sems dpa' brgyad // yum gyi cha 'dzin sems ma brgyad// sgo ba yab yum thub pa drug/ kun bzang rigs lnga yab yum bcu// bzhi ba tu zhe gnyis bu ma sku'i tshul// lnga ldan
109b7(rnying rgyud): tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// de rtsa la klad pa dung khang du// khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad bzhugs// b+hud+d+ha he ru spug nag pa// dbu gsum phyag drug yum dang 'khril// rang gi klad pa'i dkyil na bzhugs// badz+ra he ru mthing nag pa/
110a1(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug yum dang 'khril/ rang gi klad pa'i shar na bzhugs// rat+na he ru ser nag pa// dbu gsum phyag drug yum dang 'khril// rang gi klad pa' lhon bzhugs// nub na pad+ma ta ru ka/ dmar nag zhwang
110a2(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag zug pa// yum dang gnyis med 'khril nas bzhugs// byang na karma he ru ljang // zhal gsum phyag drug yum dang 'khril// kun kyang phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin// gsal 'tsher gce dgrol nyid du bzhugs// shar na ko rI
110a3(rnying rgyud): dkar mo ste// lho na tsau rI ser mo dang // nub na phra mo dmar mo dang // byung nA be tA nag mo dang // shar lho buk+ka dmar ser dang // lho nub lhas ma ljang nag dang // nub byang tsan+ta ser skya dang // byang shar sla shwa mthing rdeg pa// khrag 'thung yab yum
110a4(rnying rgyud): bcu la bskor// klad nad mngon sum nyid du bzhugs// de yi phyi rol 'khor rtsibs la// shar na si d+ha spug nag dang // lho na b+ha lnga stag mgo dmar// nub na sra la wa mgo nag/ byang na shA na srung mgo mthing // shar lhor gr-id+ha rgod mgo dang //
110a5(rnying rgyud): lho nub kang ka dmar nag pa// nub byung kha khwa b+ha mgo nag/ gyang shar hu lu bug mgo mthing // yul gyi phra men brgyad po das/ khrug 'thung rnams la bskor nas bzhugs// shar sgor rje mgo ljags kyu dkar/ lho skor phag mgo zhags
110a6(rnying rgyud): pa ser// nub na seng mgo phyogs sgrog dmar// byang sgor sbrul mgo dril bu ljang // de ltar klad pa'i dkyil na gnas// drag po'i lha tshogs sum cu bzhugs// phyi rol dbang phyug nyer brgyad ni// byang shar nas bzung 'di bzhin no// srin mo
110a7(rnying rgyud): lcug nag gapag mgo dang // tshangs pa srul mgo ser mo dang // lha chen dkar ldeng gzig mgo dang // rtog 'dod sre mgo sngon mo dang // dga' ba ser mo la wang mdo// gzhon nu drod mgo dmar mo dang // bcu byin dom mgo dkar mo dang // zhing
110b1(rnying rgyud): dmadu mo chu srin mamo// bdu rtse du mar mo sdig pa'i mgo// zla bad mad mo la phyi mgo/ btsan wa mgo sdang nag dang // srin ma stag mag mang ma dang // zlab ljang drug bya rgod drug// dga' ba dmar mo pamago// stobs rkyen dmar ma chu
110b2(rnying rgyud): ge mgo// srin mo khyim ga ser mo dang // 'dod pad mar mo bye 'ad mno// nor srung ldang mu sha pa'i mgo// rlung ma sgron mo skyed mgo nga // mi ma dmar mo sbyin gyi mgo// pheg ma nag mo lag gi chag/ rdo rje dmang mo wa yi mAgo//
110b3(rnying rgyud): rmad chen mgo// chu lha ljon mo yul gyi mgo// sgom bzhin 'di lta ste// rdo rje dkar mo ku b+hag shar// rdo rje ser mor mgo lha// rdo rje dmar mo seng mgo nub// rdo rje ldang nag sbrul mgo byung // dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad de// he n+de drag po'i
110b4(rnying rgyud): lce tshogs las// rang byung lu yo rdul du shar// su ji nyung 'bru tsam pa la// mkhyen dpyod ma 'ag bla thugs rje'i spyan// phul thag tsam gzigs kyi nang med// zang thal gcer grol chen por bzhugs// chu rkyen las 'das ye shes ni// dang
110b5(rnying rgyud): malnga pa rang bzhin te// ye shes rabar zang bralalo// rgyug med ye shes kyang ci'o// 'od kyi mtshan nyid dngos po zil// 'thung rje'i dang sa ma kha dag wa// ma 'dres dang gas pa nyid du ste// spel po zhes 'dri du byung // dge pa'i bu'i ma
110b6(rnying rgyud): sgra'ang // ye shes bu ma nang mar me 'dra// 'od zer mar mo'i 'od dang 'dra// gnas tshul 'od kyi gong bur bzhugs// sku dang ye shes 'od dang gsum// gsum po rtsegs tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rang rig ye shes sprad na// 'tshogs snang
110b7(rnying rgyud): ngag skye ma'i byung ma babyung // dgas 'ad 'byung bas na chen byung // drug sardzas na nga dang 'tha' das// shes kyi dang thub da pang thu / dreg gas ma rjid pan rgya// mi 'byung ston pa
111a1(rnying rgyud): yon tan kun mang da rten dgas// 'khyor gyon mgos pad+ma'i dogs// \u0f7fla zhugs ldan las thodags// smras pa mthu' zlal dbyings ma shes// snang ba kunags la ba nga // shA nga kun na
111a2(rnying rgyud): pa nyid// snang stong thabs shes so sor shar// sor rtog ye shes rang ngo shes// chos rnams 'bad med rtsol ba bral// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// rang rig 'od ldalngar ldan grub bo// yul lnga dag dang sbyar ba na// snang bzhim kru bigs pa
111a3(rnying rgyud): 'gags// ye shes snang stong gzugs kyi yul// sgra rnams ma 'gags rna bas thos// thos pa'i mtshan nyid grag stong dang // skra grag rang stong rna ba'i yul// sna yi yul du dri sna tshogs// gang ltar snang ba rang bzhin stong // dring
111a4(rnying rgyud): stod pa sna yi yul// gyi yi yul du ro sna tshogs// gang lter bro yang bzung yul stong // ro snang stong pa lce yi yul// lus la reg bya gang snang yang // 'dzin byed shes pa rang bzhin stong // sems la bde sdig gang shar yang // rang shar
