111b1(rnying rgyud): rgyang yang yin// rig pas 'khor ba'i srog bcad nas// myang 'das sa ru stsal bas na// snying rje med pa'i las rlung ngo // dngas mA la dang snar ba na// stong gsal dang gnas nam mkha'i dngas// rig cal 'bru ba rung ga dngas// rang bzhin bas
111b2(rnying rgyud): dro me yi dngas// nyon mongs dri dag chu yi dngas// rig mdangs kha dog lnga dang ldan// 'byung bas yi dngas ma yin// gsang ba thig le'i yig 'bru rnams// mkha' 'gro yab yum do spyad na// klad pa drung khang gzhal yas khang // rtse mo
111b3(rnying rgyud): par bkod pa na// rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu yi// lte ba rtse mdud dbus dgu na// 'byung ba chu yi dngas ma mchog/ phra ma'i chu gub thig le dkar// ye shes rang 'od lnga dang ldan// yi gi he dang ra ru gnas// de yang ldan grub bum pa'i khru/
111b4(rnying rgyud): dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon thod khrag/ rdo rje dpa' bor yi tshul// dkar gsal 'khril khyod ldan par gnas// rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cul// thig le yig 'bu ha ra las// rdo rje DA ki yab yum ni// phyag
111b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan kha dog gtso mo dadra // sum bcu drug cu 'od srur gnas// mgrin pa ro 'dus 'khor lo na// rtsa 'dab bcu drug rtsa bdun na// 'thung bas yi dngas ma mchog/ pha ma'i khu khrag las grub pa// thig le yi ge daM dang rtsa// ye shes/ bdog
111b6(rnying rgyud): lnga lda rnyed// rang bzhin ra ny+dza nA ki dngos// phab yum phyags pas ri chen la// g.yon bzod pa zhabs brgyang bskum// ser gas pa ri na chen gdan la bzhugs// rtsa 'dab bcu drug ring \u0f7f// gtso bo yab yum 'dra bar gnas// snying ga rda pa
111b7(rnying rgyud): rnam pa kod na// rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis te// lte ba'i rin chen bur brgyad na// pha ma'i thig le ye shes mdog/ mthing ga ye shes rang 'od wa// ma dang hU~Mg tshul du gnas// rang bzhin bum spa zhal phyag tshul// kun bzang yab yum 'khril
112a1(rnying rgyud): sbyor bzhugs// dus rgyan zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum ste// rdzu 'dab sum cu so gnyis la// ma d+h+ye thig le yig 'brus brgyan// gtso mo 'dra bas gang bar gnas// lte bskyed byed drug rgya bzhi//
112a2(rnying rgyud): mdud dbus kyi lte ba la/ 'byung gzhi'i dang sa ma pha ma'i chu// kha dog lnga ldan thig le dmar// yi ge hri ni 'od kyi sku// bad+hU DA ki 'khril sbyor can// brkyang bskum pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// rtsa mdud drug cu rtsa bzhi la// dzaMg pa hri ni
112a3(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi sgra// gtso mo 'dra bas gang bar gnas// gsang gnas bde ba myong byed na// rtsa 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi// lte ba'i rtsa mdud dbus nyid na// pha ma'i khu khrag thig le ljang // ye shes rang mdangs lnga ldan pa// sa yi yi ge 'od
112a4(rnying rgyud): sku// las kyi D+D+ha k+ki yab phram ldang // ral gri thod pa g.yas g.yon bsnams// rgyams gdan la 'khrol sbyor bzhugs// Na 'ad ba nyer brgyad thig le ni// sa y-i rnam pa gtso ma 'dra// thams cad gang bar gnas pa'o// bzhi bcu bdun cu
112a5(rnying rgyud): rtsa gnyis la// DA ki zhal sbyor bsam mi khyab// grangs las 'das pa'i rtsa nang na// thig le yi ge brgyad tshul la// DA ki ya ba yum brjod med gnas// kun gyi ngo spod zhib rgyas rnams// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// sems dpa' rtsal
112a6(rnying rgyud): kyis ma 'ongs ston// ces gsungs nas/ rdzogs rim thig le nyag gcig klong du lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi yang rtse klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ sku dang ye shes zhal phyag rdzogs par rang lus dkyil 'khor ye rdzogs su bzhugs
112a7(rnying rgyud): tshul sprod bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / sa ma ya/ maN+ya r+tha/ sra gag/ paba'i da na##\u0f7f/ bsu rgyaHsems dpa' da rjes yang gsol pa/ kyai sru bubam bcos kun tu bzang // ye grol 'gag med
112b1(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i bdag/ dag pa ye shes bzhugs tshul rnams// legs par ston pas gsungs na yang // ma dag nyon mongs gnas tshul rnams// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ the snyan bskul ba ston pas gsan// gro ho sems dpa'i
112b2(rnying rgyud): rdorje nyan// ma dag nyon mongs zhes pa 'di// rlung chen glo ba'i grong khyer na// ma rig pa dang sems dang yid// rnam pa gsum du gnas pa ste// ma rig pa zhes 'thom pa des// rang rig gshis la sgrib par byed// sems kyis ye shes nyid la sgrib/
112b3(rnying rgyud): yid kyis tshig snang ngo la sgrib// de las nyon mongs bag chags dang // kun gzhi nyid dang 'dzin rtog byung // gzung 'dzin lam sgo lnga ru byung // nyon mongs sdug bsngal lnga la spyod// gcig la mthong snang brjod 'das byung // gnas lugs rang rtogs
112b4(rnying rgyud): ma shes pas// gti mug mun pa lta bur 'thibs// ma grub cha la med bzhin du// sems can rang chas zhe sdang byung // rang gzhan sgrib med nga rgyal te// brag ri lta bur shin tu mtho// bde ba'i don sgrib 'dod chags rgyas// rang kha me lce bzhin/
112b5(rnying rgyud): du 'bar// gzhan la phrag dog 'gran sems skyes// de la brten nas nyon mongs ni// brgya khri dang ni bzhi stong byung // bag chags 'jug po'i sbubs su 'bums// sngar zhen bag chags mi las 'dra// phyis 'byung bag chags rgyu 'bras 'dra//
112b6(rnying rgyud): de lta'i bag chags gar sbyin 'dra// las rnams thams cad mtshams sbyor zhing // 'go ba bla ste 'gog par dka'// phung khams 'di la brten byas nas// nyon mongs du ma'i rten gnas byed// sgo lnga'i lamadod snang yul bzung // khams gsum
112b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor bar 'khor zhing 'khyams// gzung 'dzin thag pas dam du bsdams// the cha ma dbang gis rgya 'bras log/ gangs dkar nag por mthong dang mtshungs// zhes gsungs nas/ 'khrul yul gnyis med rig stong chen por lhan nar bzhugs so//
113a1(rnying rgyud): theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ mdag nyon mongs kyi gnas tshul bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa la// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya d+hA/ sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa/ gya/ kun khyab dgongs
113a2(rnying rgyud): la kun tu bzang // rang shar 'dzin grol lhan grub la// gnas lugs de ltar yin pa na// ye shes gting gsal chen po de// lam mchog gang la zhugs pa yin// rig mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ston pas gsan nas lan gsungs pa//
113a3(rnying rgyud): a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// snying nang gnas pa'i ye shes de// spyi lam rtsa bzhi yin pa ste// khyad par ka ti shel bug can// rtsa ni dar dkar srud dang 'dra// khrag dang chu ser de la med// snying gi rtse nas mar zug nas// sgal 'dab g.yas nas yang
113a4(rnying rgyud): gyes te// rtse'u chung g.yas g.yon gnyis nas ya re// sgra 'dabi ga yes nas klad par zug/ klad rgya'i nang nas mig la 'brel// rtsa sna rgyal mo gnyis la zug/ rgyal mo rgyang zhags chu sgron no// dar dkar spyad pa lta bu ste// snying nang ye shes la
113a5(rnying rgyud): zhugs 'char// ye shes de yi rang 'od ni// tsak+Shu zhes pa'i sgo la thon// gnyis kyi cha 'dzin snang ba ston// kun la yod pa'i ye shes de// me long dkyil 'khor dngas pa la// gang bstan rkyen de 'ong ba bzhin// rnam dag stong pa'i nam mkha'
113a6(rnying rgyud): la// don gyi snying po chom bu lnga// ma bskyed yi rdzogs snod kyis gsal// spang bar nus pa 'bru byed drung // ro rgyang gnyis po rlung gi lam// kun 'dar ma ni byang chub lam// shel bug can gyi sgron ma'i lam// 'od dang zer du rab snang ste/
113a7(rnying rgyud): dper na nya yi mig gis ni// gser gyi brag rgyud cha phra ba// bzo bo mkhas pas legs brgyus sbyar// mu tig 'greng ltar yul la thon// de ni dag pa'i ye shes lam// bdag gis yang dag bstan pa'o// ma dag 'khor ba'i rtsa lam ni//
113b1(rnying rgyud): thugags bslus pa'i sems can la// nyan mangs ma rig gas zes// btan ni gzugs phung lus la brten// blo snying gnyis kyi par shad na// mug tu dmar pa thub ni// mag sdug tsam pa gcig go nang // rig pa ma yin gzhi yis khyab/
113b2(rnying rgyud): sems zhes bya ba chags sdang can// yid ces bya ba rtog pa can// gsum du 'dus pa'i ma rig pa// dug lnga dug gsum bcas pa rgyu// na de sbrul tshigs g.yon pa nas// rtse'u chung g.yas g.yon dag nas rgya// dbugs zhes rlung gi rtal
113b3(rnying rgyud): zhon// sgo ni kha dang d+hA ru rgyu// de las nyes pa sna tshogs 'char// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chung rdo byed// rtags ni mtshan mo glo sprid dus// 'od zer dmar po 'phro ba 'dra// ma dag lam gyi 'jug spong bshad// ces gsungs nas/ rang shar/
113b4(rnying rgyud): rang grol gyi ngang du bcos med lhag par lhan nar bzhugs so// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ lam gang la chu ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / sa ma ya/ na na/ krAn d+hA dz+dza/
113b5(rnying rgyud): glu \u0f7fb+h+yab+h+yaHsems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye dang ba sangs rgyas kun tu 'acing // yin grags 'gag med thugs rje can// lam gyi rgyu tshul gsungs na dang // ye shes 'char ba'i sgo gang lags// ston pa
113b6(rnying rgyud): gyis bka' stsol cig/ rtsis pa ston bsags na dgongs te// a he sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// ye shes 'char ba'i sgo nyid ni// lus bcud dngas mthun 'dus pa'i// tsany+tsa zhes pa'i sgo la gsal// 'khor dang srung 'das snang ba ston// da
113b7(rnying rgyud): srung ngas nang 'dra ba// rtsab 'phral 'byeb// a 'bras dkyil du thug pa des// nam mtha' dngas pa'i dbyings su pa te// ye shes srung ba lkug par 'char// thig la stong pa'i blon ma dang // dag par byings kyi sngon ma dang // shes dbar
114a1(rnying rgyud): zung sprin nyid dang // rgyang zhags rgyam sgron ma rnams// 'dis ni mngan sum mthong ba ste// dag gtan la dbab tu rung // yid dpyod mun lugs chog dang brug+sa// myig gnyis d+hA zhags rgya sran yin// gzugs sogs pa/
114a2(rnying rgyud): banyid du srung // don rnams sdang ste rig par byed// shes rab rang byung smon ma nyid// theg pa kun gyi the tshom gcod// rang snang 'dzin de chos rnams srud// bag chags 'brel rdzun 'di yis gcod// dbyings kyi dngas ma 'di yis spang // chos nyid
114a3(rnying rgyud): mngon sum sdang ba mthong // thig le stong pa'i smon ma nyid// 'khor 'das bsre ba'i mtsham sbyor byed// tsak+Shu la bten 'ja' 'od 'char// rlung gis bgrags mdangs gzi mdangs bskyed// bsgyur cing ye shes snang ba ston// 'dis ni las kun byed
114a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dge pa dbyings kyi sgron ma yis// rnal 'byor nyams kyis bon 'debs// 'od snang zhing khams nyid du 'char// glon ma'i mtshan rtags med bshad kyang // mngon sum mthong ba 'di nyid de// snang ba kun gyi 'char byed sgo// rkyen gyis ma
114a5(rnying rgyud): bsgribs rgyal mo che// mig gi dkyil 'khor sgo dganas// ts+tsho ma'am ni shel mdangs lngar// rang 'od rang chas nyid du 'char// chos kyi mtshan nyid ye shes lnga// kha dog ma 'dres mtshan nyid ldan// sku dang ye shes sdang ba ni// rang bzhin snang ba ma
114a6(rnying rgyud): dgags shar// rig pa'i rang sku lha khang 'dra// sgron ma bzhi ni mthongs kha 'dra// rang rig ye shes mar me 'dra// sgron ma bzhi ni 'od zer 'dra// bzhi yang gnyis 'dus gnyis kyang dbyings// kyang zhags sgo gyi gzugs rnams 'dzin// shes rab
114a7(rnying rgyud): dz+hal gyis don du khrims// thog les dbyings dang gnyis med 'dres// 'od sdang goms pas rim gyis 'char// tsek+Shu ye shes 'char ba'i sgo// 'di las gzhan zhig yong ma yin// ces gsungs nas/ bsal lam 'gags rkyen gyis ma
114b1(rnying rgyud): bsgribs gting gsal du nyan ner bzhugs sa// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud krung can rab 'byams kyi chud las/ ye shes 'gyur ba'i sgo bstan pa'i la sa bachu bzhipa la/ sa ma pa/ d+ha rbaH/ rtabangs thags su kya du 'og/
114b2(rnying rgyud): \u0f7frgyu rgya gya/ gaT t+yaHsems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa/ kye/ bya ba tsal bral ba'i kun tu bzang // brdal ba chen po dbyings rig dpal// sgo la shar ba'i ye shes de// yul ni gang du snang ba lags// de skad ston pas gsan dgongs nas/
114b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mdangs phyung lan 'di gsungs// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// yul ni ye shes rlon ma de// stong nyid dbyings kyi nam mkha' la// rig mdangs 'od phung nam mkha'i khams// kun zab bag chags dbugs la brten// ye shes
114b4(rnying rgyud): rig pa dbyings la sgor// bdag kyi na gzhan gyen 'byung ba'i rkyen// gsum bral dus gsum lug par 'jur// khyad par nam mkha' gsal dngas la// dbyang ma smin dang dgran chung dpyid// chung dang bsir bu khwa rlangs med// 'dzin pa med
114b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bar snang la// ye shes lnga yi dang mdangs 'gyur// zhe 'dod med pa'i sgron ma ni// dag pa dbyings kyi sgron ma la// thig le stang pa'i sgron ma shar// gnyis man gcig gi dang mdangs las// zhig le sku dang ye shes nyid// 'khrul
114b6(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i zhing khams ni// ra ba rang bzhin gnyis med pa// gang gas pa 'gagapa med pan// rdzogs ldan rjes rtswa'i snang ba mthong // sgrib pyid bral ba'i mkhar bltas pas// dbyings kyinang du lug rgyud// rnam par bzhugs shing mi tha' 'a
114b7(rnying rgyud): kyi spyang 'angs// bral thal sgyum gzugs coMs+ho// rigs gsal batshal longs spyog// 'di 'gyur med pa ma / nas pa #// 'di sa se mos mthang pa ga// thog sa'i 'an
115a1(rnying rgyud): dang // skal bdag ni mnyam pa'o// zhab nga byung lags ka// thal ba man \u0f7f// smraba' ba can ma dngas pa// rnam pa dbyangs parang bang // dzardza lug tu dang mar cha// snang ba gsas
115a2(rnying rgyud): pangos gzung med// sdod pa sngon ma gnyis ldan spyod// srang thang bral ba ngomacher na// gcer bu zung thal du phyag thub thal// 'bras bu sru ga sum dang ngo rdzogs// yid dbyang ga dag mtshar // chos za dang po'i sangs rgyas sa// phyi dbyings
115a3(rnying rgyud): pa rten/ sa 'di da/ sa na sa /
115a4(rnying rgyud): srab rgyud// dzaT rgyal mo'i sgra la zan// rig stong mngan sum bden pa de// rkyen thal gling du spyan grub 'jug// 'khar 'das sus cung byas med pa'o// gsal dag 'gyur med rang dbyings la// phyi nang med pang mtshar tshe// gsal stong rgya tsho
115a5(rnying rgyud): zung med// skye 'gag med pa'i som nyid// rig pa dbyings la lhag par gdal// gzer mthong rang gsal ngo mtshar che// ye stong kun gyi 'thung gnas la// rig pa kA dag 'od zer 'bar// kun la yod pa'i 'od po che// dkyil 'khor s+pha r+tha dngas
115a6(rnying rgyud): pa la// rang mya dngas 'od zeng shar ba kar// rnam dag sbyong pa'i nam tha ba ma// don gyi nying pa ma 'dres pa// gams pa'i stobs kyis brtsas na// oM pra mA med kyi'i nyid// ma sa rdzogs pa'i tshu ladrags la// 'ad phung nam ma
115a7(rnying rgyud): dang gyus/ gcags sa gas par ga sa na 'a bye ba'i rigs// na pa mabyed// rung sanam po madra caga'o// la du mas sa 'dun na drang /
115b1(rnying rgyud): khyod ma yin par// mngon sum rang thog phebs pa'o// ci phyir mngon sum zhes pa de// sgo dang yul dang rig pa gsum// 'du 'bral med par snang ba'o// chos nyid mngon sum snang ba 'di// mthong ba tsam gyis shes pa dang // shes pa tsam gyis
115b2(rnying rgyud): gas pa dang // rtogs pa tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur// grol ba tsam gyis phyir mi zlog/ ce sku gsungs nas/ sus kyang ma byas mngon sum gyi snang ba rang grol du lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/
115b3(rnying rgyud): yul 'char sgo bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya// ni kra bar+b+he sId/ ga nama?r+tharbata tha/ TabA Na Ta na.aT TiniHbklany+dzargya rgya rgyaHde nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang zhus pa// kye ho/ kun byed rgyal po kun
115b4(rnying rgyud): bzang // ma nor don ston chos kyi dbyings// 'di ltar 'khor 'das chos rnams la// theg pa'i dbye ba du tsam yod// ston pas 'khor la bshad du gsol// ces pa ston pas gsan nas ni// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// kye ho rdo
115b5(rnying rgyud): rje sems dpa' rtsal// sa lam tshig chod kun bzing ngas// ye shes rnam gsum bstan pa dang // gdul bya ma dag drang ba'i phyir// ston pa rnam pa gsum du byung // gnas kyang rnam pa gsum yin te// 'dul zhing rnam pa gsum du bshad// 'khor
115b6(rnying rgyud): yang rnam pa gsum yin te// bstan pa dag kyang rnam pa gsum// bco lnga'i tshul du gnas pa yin// chos sku'i ston pa rig stong dang // chos sku'i gnas ni 'og min nyid// chos sku'i 'dul zhing nam mkha'i khams// chos su'i 'khor ni rig pa'i
115b7(rnying rgyud): mdangs// chos sku'i bstan pa rnam pa bzhi// ma hA a nu/ a ti dang / a ti chen po rnam bzhi'o// longs sku'i ston pa gangs chen mtsho// longs sku'i gnas ni khang bu brtsegs// longs sku'i 'dul zhing snang ba rnams// bdod pa'i longs spyod
116a1(rnying rgyud): khyab tshad yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor ni 'di lta ste// mos spyod bzhi yi sa las rab 'das nas// dang po rang tu dga' ba'i sa gnon te// sa bcu chos kyi sprin la gnas rnams yin// 'dul zhing sdang 'gas
116a2(rnying rgyud): bas khyab tshad de// bstan pa kr-i ya u pa yo ga'o// sbrul skya'i gnas ni nges med bya rgod ri// ston pa rabs bdun shA ka thub la sogs pa// 'dul zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i 'dzam gling ste// 'khor ni lha mi mu stegs bltan gso rnams// dbang po
116a3(rnying rgyud): nga sa/ sa chung na// / sa mas gas/ sa nyi ci/
116a4(rnying rgyud): lus can 'khrul pa'i sems can la// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas pa yin// gnyen po brgyad khri bzhi stong chos kyang bshad// chos sgo bsam 'das de snyed kyang // sde snod gsum gyis 'dul ba yin// 'dod chag gnyen por 'dul ba dang //
116a5(rnying rgyud): gti mug gnyen por mdo sde dang // zhe sdang gnyen por mngon pa rnams// kun kyang nyi khri chig stong ste// dug gsum cha snyoms sde snod gsum// cha snyoms nyi khri chig stong gsungs// 'dul ba'i sdang ngo tha dad pas// yod ni gcig las med pa la//
116a6(rnying rgyud): grur ni theg pa dgu ru byung // mthong ni spang ba dgu ru mthong // de yis gang byas las 'bras kun// rdzogs chen nga yi so nam yin// theg brgyad dman pa so so yi// grub ma tras phyogs tsam ma gtogs pa// nga nyid rdzogs par ga la mthong // dpe
116a7(rnying rgyud): nad mus long glang bltas 'dra// yin ni chos nyid nga yin te// krung ni theg pa so sor byung // 'dus ni skye 'gag med par 'dus// bsgribs nas sdom pad ma tshig bsrung // gnang dkag gcig la mi tshe zad// dmyal khams bco brgyad de la chag
116b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen gang zhig rgyu 'bras lci// mu stegs chad pa logs na med// spos la dga' ba'i gang zag la// smos pa can gyi chos kyis 'dul// nyan thos rang rgyal byang sems gsum// gang zag dbang po dman la bshad// kra ya u pa yog gsum/
116b2(rnying rgyud): gang zag dbang po 'bring la bshad// ma hA a nu a ti gsum// gang zag dbang po rab la bshad// gang zag yang rab thod rgal la// a tI yang rab thod rgal bstan// de kun blo yi rim par sbyar// nges par yang dag tshig chod la// sa lam
116b3(rnying rgyud): po rtsol sgrub rnams// spang blang dbye ba med par gang la// sems kyis byas pa'i theg pa dgra// nyams len yod med kha bzung nas// theg dman kun gyis 'di mig/ dper na rgya khab mig dag tu// ras yug btsud bzhin brtul zhing spangs//
116b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen dgu ka nyams su len// dam tshig bsrung med rtogs gyur kyang // chos sdung bcu yi tshon thag 'then// mdo rgyud bka' yi phul thag khrol// mnang ga lung gi lam du khyer// slob pa gsum gyi srog shing 'dzugs// ma yengs mi
116b5(rnying rgyud): ldan rtogs pa'i rgyun// mu stegs pa'ang khyad mi gsod// sangs rgyas kucu kyang bud me bgyur// rang bzhin ston pa gsum gyi chos// rlung lhung mthong man sngags mtshan nyid// ming ga la thom tshig thog phyir babyung // ma gnas bcings ma tha
116b6(rnying rgyud): nga// chos nyid chen po'i sgra grogs yin// theg brgyad rang rang phyogs la zhen// yun ring bskal pa bye bakhrid// ka dag chos nyi dang mi mthong // slar yang lus ngag yid phud nas// ngan 'grong nyen yang cung zad tshe// tshogs thob gnas skabs
116b7(rnying rgyud): ga / kyi rgya bru / bra sa bye// rgyas pa sa nga// nga rdzus pa jug rje nga sa/
117a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma mar pa'abags// nasu na nag pa cad mi gas// kha wA skang la dran/ da/ na nas nga 'dzin rgyud la bsten// dalas gang 'ug bab ma thab// rdzum kyar nas lags pang \u0f7f//
117a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin shug drud la 'phel// maspangs thong yang sang ya dang // rim pa dag dang m-i sto // babyed pa'i rdzogs nanang ma rtogs// 'ching ba sa 'am bathar 'ad pa// chagazugs sunamangs ma thug/ man ma khyod pa
117a3(rnying rgyud): pa me rnam pa gsum spyod de// bzud pa'i sa dang slo pa // rdza pa'i sa dang gsum du sas// byed pa'i sadus sa skyed// khyad pa sadus mas gyud 'acu// rdzab pa'i sa ba dag// 'azhin spa pas du na
117a4(rnying rgyud): rang nga dag pa sam ste// dani bzla b+had cing midag slong / rdzogs rten rgyu 'thos la pa jig tsam// ngan ma thung krung bas mthas/ khyad par nyidul tsam pa med// dges te'i rtsa lab gyi dang / dges la ma pa
117a5(rnying rgyud): na// babring ngus grang sa dang mi nas// bla pa mi thub bsrung thabs mad/ rtog pa'i gang d+ma yang rtogs pazlan// 'khrul ba'i snang du yang 'khrul bskrun// gas zag snyed du 'brang zhags pazlam// rdzogs rgan bsrang bya ban las 'a
117a6(rnying rgyud): can rgyu g+sa/ phyogs kyi lam dang byer la skye nga// mthang na rnas ma dang mdza sbyin sa/ nga mjugs can 'amam ma thol// yidi nas nam tha pa me// rnga shA'i skal ba 'byegs
117a7(rnying rgyud): sa da du myang ma byed// bla bras po ma gyi ma chub dang/ 'di ya bye // dul ci sabyen panam pagam// sad drisamam sa na// dbyer das gdas tu gyu/ nga'athas sa
117b1(rnying rgyud): ngape rang sems the tshom 'khrul// chos nyid rab rda byed dang // 'khor bar dgas pa che ba dang // sangs cas gzhan nas ras 'khrul// dgu du mthong zhing rang ma shes// spang mtsha tshal lta bur 'khrul// rtsolang ba thad 'chang ba yis// grang med
117b2(rnying rgyud): 'dam bying lta bur 'khrul// 'bad pa re ba'i stobs kyis 'khrul// nang la sman log song bzhin 'khrul// de ma yin la der bzung bas// smig sgra chu ru mthong bzhin 'khrul// med par yod pa'i blo skyes pa// grogs po thag ring shi bzhin 'khrul//
117b3(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs log par song ba ni// bu chung lu gri rtse bzhin 'khrul// rang thung ye shes mtshan nyid med// bzang ngan phyogs char bltan 'khrul// bdag ma yin la bdag tu 'dzin// sems 'dzin lha sgom yod na 'khrul// 'od la gzhapa yas khang mthong ba//
117b4(rnying rgyud): phye ma lte ba dang mar me bzhin// dngos grub re stobs bslus pa yis// gle'u khron par chud pa bzhin// rang byung ye shes bdag med la// gang zag dbang pos bdag tu bzung // sdang ngor gang 'thad de bstan pas// de kun nga yi thugs rjer 'khrul//
117b5(rnying rgyud): klong chen don gyis go bar gyis// rgyas po chen po bsam yas kyang // dgu ru nges par dbye ba'o// zhes gsungs so// theg pa spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las// rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / sa ma ya/
117b6(rnying rgyud): rgya rgya rgyu/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang zhus pa// a ho/ kun rdzogs chen po kun tu bzang // khyab gdal chen po 'ub chub dpal// dbye ba zur tsam gsungs na yang // dang po lha mi lha log gi// grub mtha'
117b7(rnying rgyud): gang yin rdzogs tshul gang // ma spangs rgyan tshul gang ltar lags// ston pas rig mdangs 'khor la gsungs// de skad gsol pa ston pas gsan// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams gson// nga yi theg pa rim dgu yang // bshad lugs
118a1(rnying rgyud): 'khar dung kyang 'das sa// 'khor bkad la grub satha' na// sA las bsgyur dang ma bsgyud ro// ma bsgyu ba pa rnam pa gnyis// rgyal ba nyid dang rlung 'banag// dz+ha bras ngas shes pad// thal ba nyid du bzhag pa yin/
118a2(rnying rgyud): drashas kyi mchung ngu bzhag/ tshe 'di'i bza sran pan pa skrag// rgyang 'phen pa zhes bshad pa yin// zas bskur la ma log ma logau yin// log pa su stegs mur thug gnyis// ri bo ngas tshig dbye bar// nga bo logs pa'i shes rab kyis/
118a3(rnying rgyud): ci log la zhen pa'o// nges tshig lbu ba ngan la mu// smad pa ngan la stegs pa'o// dbye ba sum brgya drug cu dang // 'jig tshogs ri bo drug cu dang // grangs can dag dang nyer lnga dang // phyi yi bdag 'dzin nyi shu dang // bye brag bdag 'dzin bcwa
118a4(rnying rgyud): dag dang // tir thi ke drug sbyar lnga bzhi// bskrun rtag chad gnyis su 'dra// bgrang tshul dus gcig phung ba'o// grub mtha' chad pa 'di lta ste// rgya chad 'bras chang nam mkha' 'dra// thams cad phral ba nyid du 'ang // rtag pa sems nyid thig le'i
118a5(rnying rgyud): tshul// dkar dngas sum 'dril snying nang na// ya~M nas mi 'gyur yod par blta// 'bras bu dbang phrag 'khor du ste// de lta 'dod gzhung so sor yod// e ma sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// grub mtha' thams cad gang zag zlo// dngos po'i gshes la
118a6(rnying rgyud): de mA nye// sgrib pas gol bas sdug btsir kyang // shes rab mi ldan phung bar nges// ma rig ma rtogs log lam mo// gyi nang rtag chad yin min rnams// mi 'gal dbyings kyi dang du lhung // rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i bdag nyid grub// der zhen rtog
118a7(rnying rgyud): mi mang 'bras// sems nyid thang do dang 'dzin med// mu glegs chad ba rdzogs ches rgyan// ma spangs slong grol dang na bad// mi lce 'gag med sa tshogs 'char// sum bcu drug su rdzogs che can// slong chen ma spangs rang bral dang /
118b1(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan gnyis smang 'khor ba dang // rigs drug mu stegs rtag chad rnams// rgyu gcig nga yi klong na 'phyo// kun gyi bdag nyid rdzogs chen rgyan// ma spangs ye grol phya ma brdal dang // klong na gsal bas gdags gzhi med// gzhi la mi
118b2(rnying rgyud): gnas rang shes bde// mu stegs bdud chen lta ba de// gang zag nyid kyis log par brtag/ dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs dang // rtag chad gnyis su nga mi gnas// mtha' bzhi mu bzhi rang grol dang // ma spangs ye grol klong na chub/
118b3(rnying rgyud): rig pa phyogs med kun 'byams la// rtag chad gnyis zhen phyogs 'dzin bdud// a ho/ a ti chen pa ngas bkrol nas// rtag chad rang shar rang sar grol// mu stegs ma sbyangs ma bcings par// rdzogs chen mdzes pa'i rgyan du'o// gcig
118b4(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs na mang po dka'// rig pa g.yo ba rgyu rkyen bral// ma skyes skye med chos kyi dbyings// nam mkha'i dbyings nas ma bcos klong // khams gsum sku gsum rang bzhin grol// ma chang ma rtag byed pa med// ma yal ma zhi smos pa med//
118b5(rnying rgyud): rig pa ma bsgribs gsal ma yal// mkha' la rang bung snang srid gang // 'bras bu lhan grub sku gsum klong // rtag pa shar grol ma spangs rgyan// chad pa ma spangs ye stong rgyan// bsgrim lhod med pa'i rig pa bde// ma bcos rdul du kun
118b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bde// skye 'jig mtha' med bye bral klong chen dang // gser gling lta bu dbye bsal med pa'i klong // 'ja' tshon lta bu thams cad bkra ba'i klong // phyi nang med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i klong // phyogs ris med pa bu chung lta bu'i klong // rtag
118b7(rnying rgyud): tshad med pa bar snang lta bu'i klong // 'pho 'gyur med pa ri rgyal lta bu'i klong // kha gting med pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i klong // rab 'byams nga yi klong na kun kyang 'phyo// rig pa dang dngas mthang bzhi ma spangs kyang // 'khor 'das rgyu 'bras tha snyad
119a1(rnying rgyud): nga ye rol// 'gro ba rigs drug ste gnas bzhi po yang // chos dbyings dang du rtse zhing nga du grol// snang ba rgya lan rig pa rang dag bde// mtha' yi su med ga las shugs latshad// g.yangs med pa'i rig pa gcar
119a2(rnying rgyud): bul// rtsol ba med par sku gsum lhun rdzogs pas// mtshan nyid ma 'gags sna tshogs cir yang shar// dbang pos cer mthong mngon sum chos dbyings grol// ji ltar lta ba log yang nga nyid rang // mu stegs dang grol rdzogs chen rgyan du che//
119a3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs te/ chos nyid kyi ngang nas theg dgu 'ub chub ste lhan ner bzhugs so// mu stegs lha log ma spangs rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ na/ glun pa tre dza ni/ bklad ke rdo rjeHsems dpa' rdo rjes
119a4(rnying rgyud): yang zhus pa// kye ha phyogs ris med pa'i kun babang klong // sdang 'gag bral ba'i yangs pa can// nyan thos dbye ba grub mtha' yang // ma spangs rdzogs tshul gang ltar lags// ston pas lin du bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo
119a5(rnying rgyud): rtsal// nyan thos theg pa 'di lta ste// ngo bo nges tshig dbye bsdu'o// ngo bo chos kyi bdag lha yis// rang gi zhi bde sgrub pa'o// nges tshig rang don nyan cing thos// dbyen bzhi ste nyan thos pa// sprul pa rang rgyud zhi bkrod dang // grub mtha' dag la
119a6(rnying rgyud): mthar 'dzin no// bskrun mdo sde bye zug gnyis// mr-i yi 'jug sgo bden pa bzhi// mdo sde ba yi lta ba ni// kha thon thos bsam sgo gsum dang // shes rab rnam gsum mthar phyin pas// sa bcu'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod// the gag pa yi
119a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod gzhung ni// phung po khams dang lce mched la// g.yag nga ne 'u seng tshul du 'dod// rang gi blo yis bltas gyur na// rdul dang rdul phran bzhin du 'dod// de yi rnam pa cha gzhigs nas// stong pa nyid du khros sgom mo// nyan thos spyi yi sgom
119b1(rnying rgyud): pa ni// bden pa bzhi nyid bsgoms pa las// 'bras zla bzhi nyid 'dod pa // 'gog ba kun 'thung ldang bar 'dod// thams pa'i bstan la 'bras bu zab// 'gog tu pa rdzun du zhugs pa ste// rab tu dga' nas bdun tshun zab// dun chung
119b2(rnying rgyud): bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni// lan cig phyir mi ldog pa ste// sa brgyad man chad thob pa'o// lam bsgoms sa bcu mthar byin te// nyen thos gnyis la gcod byed do// oM ho sems dpa' rdorje rgyal// nyan thos stor dgag mdo
119b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs cha bdag bzung gzig gis bcings// ye klong nga yi don la bsgribs// lha dgongs ma log klong 'byams // de yis gtan la phebs pa dka'// nga nyid brtag dka' brjod mtha' bral// dpe dang gtan tshigs tsam gyis brjod
119b4(rnying rgyud): mi nus// brjod med don nyid klong bajal dang na brdul// nyan thos sde gnyis ma spangs ga la yin// nga ye rol pa tsam du 'gag pa med// phyogs ris med pa'i lta ba yangs pa'i klong // ma 'gags shar ba'i rang byung ye shes nyid// chung
119b5(rnying rgyud): rkyen bral spang 'gag med pa'i sku// rtogs pa'i klong chen rab 'byams don rtogs na// skad cig ye grol ka dgang rang nyid// chos can dkar nag spos pa'i mtshan ma bral// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs nam mkha'i gza' skar bzhin// nyon
119b6(rnying rgyud): mongs ma spangs nga yi klong na rgya// chos rnams kun gyi zla bang la 'dus// rgyud drug sems can nga yi rang bzhin yin// snang ba thams cad ma spangs pa yi chan// 'di ltar spang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la// kun kyang spong 'geg pade
119b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis spong mi byed// 'jug sgo bden bzhi ma spangs nga yi rgyan// nga yis bstan pa'i sku gsum bstan pa la// laM las spong ba'i yul du mthong // la las dgag dpal las sgrub// la las sbyang dang la las dgag/ la las stong dang
120a1(rnying rgyud): sa rna/ na sa na/ man nga nga / ma mas // ba nas na
120a2(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal bral// so ma dang tshul ma bcos pa// mthong ba'i rtsol bzhin grangs te// thams cad nga yi lam stegs yin// dper na shing sdong rtse mo lnga// rtsab mgrub rang sar rdzogs// gcig la mthong yul dbu nan/
120a3(rnying rgyud): chen nga la nyan thos rdzogs// dper na rdul khar rtse mo la// 'ogazog ma grub rang sar rdzogs// nyan thos bden pa'i bye thag pa// ma grangs dang grol at+te'i can// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// 'di bar ma bslab sa ri sar rjo/
120a4(rnying rgyud): mun pa ma spangs rang sar grol// a ti klong chen ba de yan la// nyan zas ma bslabs rang sngar rdzogs// thong 'gags ma grangs rang sar grol// gling lam btsas rngom med pa'i klong // sdang srid chos skur brda la ba'i klong // ngas
120a5(rnying rgyud): tshig bsrung ma rnams bral ba'i slong // 'bras bu srang thob med byung // dper na na mam kha'i khams nyid su// thod brgyad ma bslabs rang snang rdzogs// mtha' brgyad ma spangs rang snar po'o// a ti brdal khyab chen po la// nyan rdzasas
120a6(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs dang bla' klong // sa bzum bsgrubs yi nas nan// phyir myi nga zil khri tho ba yin// sprul pa'i rdzu 'phrul po gling yis// nam tog kun lanag pa lta// mi snang la dang gzhim du nyid// ma gags cu bas mkha' smin pa'am
120a7(rnying rgyud): \u0f7fba rim btab pa bzhin// nga mardzogs shing ngam zim// grong che nang yis bgag pa med// nyams len ma 'bras pa dag gas pa// gang byas yangs par grol ba yid// ji ltar chos su'i zhing 'angs kyang // skye med pas
120b1(rnying rgyud): skyong na yangs// rang bzhin dag pa'i zhing khams kyang // rang gsal nga yi klong na yangs// thugs rje sbrul phra'i zhing khams kyang // klong khyab 'gags med klong na yangs// mi gnas rig pa'i klong du 'das// ji ltar sa lam brtsis pa
120b2(rnying rgyud): chos// rtsol bas lhag bsngal chos min gyi// chos rnams mi zad yongs rdzogs pa// a ting yi sbubs na rdzogs// nyan thos spong 'geg bskal par sbyangs// snying po rig pa thob dus med// cer mthong rang grol ba nyid la/
120b3(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i srang 'geg 'ub chub bo// 'bras bu ston la rag lus pa'i// nyan thos 'dus byas lta ba ni// ngan pas rang bcings ma khrol bar// yul sems se gol gcig tsam kyang // ma bral rtog pa 'gags par 'dod// a ti
120b4(rnying rgyud): kun rdzogs brdal yangs nga// ye nas yul sems gnyis mi 'gag/ yul sems gnyis su nga mi zhen// yul sems gnyis su nga mi gnas// bral bar gyur kyang dbyer mi phyed// phyogs 'dzin mdud pas bcings pa'i nyan thos ni//
120b5(rnying rgyud): ti klong chen nga yas bkrol bas na// yod med gnyis su mnyam pa'i mnyam nyid la// yul sems gnyis kar ma 'gags rang shar bas// yul sems gnyis kar ma zhen rang grol cing // ji ltar byas kyang rang shar rang grol klong // a ti
120b6(rnying rgyud): chen po ma bsrubs ye grub ste// nyan thos ma spangs rdzogs chen spyi phung rgyan// ji ltar sbyang bgrod byas kyang rig pa'i klong // ji ltar spong 'gag bcings kyang rang grol klong // nyan thos rang grol ye rdzogs rgyan du ho// zhes gsungs nas//
120b7(rnying rgyud): sar+b+ba Tu ye bzod rang lugs rang rnal gyi ngang la ldan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi gyi lung klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ nyan thos rdzogs tshul gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / sa ma ya/ gya rgya gya/ gamag blang / gyi/ dan
121a1(rnying rgyud): gan 66// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// a ma/ mnyam ny-id gcig kun tu bzang // nga mtshar rmad byung kyi dpal mas// rab rgyal thog pa gsung drags la// san pas lan du bka' stsal
121a2(rnying rgyud): pa// kye ho gzhon nu sems dpa' rtsal// rang rgyal 'jug sgo rten 'brel te// bcu gnyis nyid kyi grub mtha' la// gang zag bdag tu med pa la// chos kyi bdag tu yod par blta// tshul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu spang // sgom
121a3(rnying rgyud): ni mi rtog chos nyid sgom// phyi nang rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnams// goms nas mtha' du phyin pa dang // 'bras bu mthar phyin tshad du 'dod// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rgal// nga ni klong chen yangs pa ste// zla ba mkha' las ma 'phags
121a4(rnying rgyud): par// chu nang kun tu khyab pa ltar// nyan thos rang rgyal khas len gnyis// sdug bsngal kun 'thung 'gog pa lam// rten 'brel bcu gnyis lugs zlog rnams// rang las byung ba'i sdang ba la// ldong 'gegs spang bas skrag cing bcing //
121a5(rnying rgyud): dri yis klong yangs gtan mi phebs// sems dang chos la dbyer med pas// thams cad rang grol a ti dang // blang dor med pas gtan la phebs// lo ka chos brgyad dbang mi gtong // nyan rang a ti nga yi rgyan// sdom padam tshig bsrung
121a6(rnying rgyud): mtshams bral// rten 'brel bcu gnyis nga yi can// mi 'gyur 'gyur med chags med lam// ye nas ma bslad rab 'byams klong // dus gdus ji ltar lkug gi ltag// ji ltar me yi rang bzhin la// zab ma bsgrubs rang sar rdzog/
121a7(rnying rgyud): grang bam spangs rang sar grol// brdal khyab ngal tshig chod de// sa bcum pasgrubs ye nas non// nyan thos ma spangs rang sar grol// 'das pa'i gling la rang bzhin med// ma 'ongs klong chen 'od du gsal// nga lha'i klong chen gzhi ma
121b1(rnying rgyud): thub// brjod mtha' mu yas spos dang bral// rang rgyal gang lnga dang yi rgyan// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med mnyam// mnyam pas gong 'og rim pa med// ye rdzogs thig le chen po yin// slob dpon med par rang rtsal gnas//
121b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal bdud chen lta ba ni// lbu ba rang gis rang nyid bcings// rang bzhin med pa'i yul stong la// shes pa gtad nas 'dzin char 'dod// bcu gnyis don la 'jug zlog byed// klong chen khyab gang la e ting // ye nus rten 'brel bcu
121b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis te// ma 'gags ma zhen mi gnas pas// mtha' ma spang bar rang grol lo// yod par 'dzin la phyogs cha 'dod// a ti yod med mnyam pa la// 'jug zlog dang shang rang grol bas// rang rgyal ma spangs a ti ma bsgrubs pas/
121b4(rnying rgyud): srang rmang med pa rdzogs can gyen du'o// zhes gsungs nas/ blo'i bzhag thabs ji bzhin pa'i ngang du wAn ned bzhugs so// sa ma ya/ n+ya N+ya rtsa/ theg pa kun gyi gyi phung klong chen rab 'byams kyi chud las/ rang rgal ma grangs rdzogs pa
121b5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste brgya dgu pa la// na rgya ma pa dag / dgan g+ho cu na/ yang gcig sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang gsol ba// kye kun gyi gyi gzugs rgyal ba'i gtso// ye nas sangs rgyas bdag nyid dpal// byang chub
121b6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' brab mtha' rnams// rig mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces pa ston pas gas na dgongs te// oM ho sams dpa' rdo rje nyon// byang chub sems dpa'i thag pa ni// 'jug spro don dam kun rdzob gnyis// sdom pa brjod
121b7(rnying rgyud): rgyartsa ma srung // snang bzed kyi la shes bsgos// las ni sa las spang bar 'dzad// 'bras bu drang skye bzad pa dang // rtse mo 'jig rten ces mchags// sa bcu rim gyis thab 'dzid de// do na byang chub sems bregs// a ha sems

122b2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye 'gyur med chen po kun tu bzang // mtshan ma yongs grol so ma'i ngang // longs su'i bstan pa sde gsum gyi// kr-i ya'i dbye ba bstan du gsol// ston pas bka' stsal sems dpa' nyon// kr-i
122b3(rnying rgyud): ya'i theg pa 'di lta ste// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu'o// lta ba yod min med pa min// gcig min tha mi dad par 'dod// sgom pa lha drug bdag bskyed nas// mdun bskyed rje khol tshul du sems// spyod pa gza' skar dus bzang la//
122b4(rnying rgyud): khrus dang gtsang sbra dkar gsum spyod// 'bras bu mi tshe bdun nyid kyis// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas par 'dod// spang ba nya sha sgog btsong dang // chang dang bud med spangs byas nas// ting nge 'dzin la zhen che'o// a ha~M sems dpa'
122b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje nyon// la dgu lung dgu brgal byas kyang // dag pa gtsang sbas nga mi mthong // rang gsal kun 'byung a ting // gzhan du ltos med brdal khyab dang // sangs rgyas pha yul theg pa'i dur// yongs bsrungs dag par nga la rdzogs//
122b6(rnying rgyud): mi sdug mi snyan nga yi rol// spangs bsgyur bskyed pas sbyangs shing bsdams// klong chen nga yi sbubs su grol// spangs pa kun kyang klong na bde// kr-i ya ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// ji ltar skar tshogs sprin rlung rnams// ma spangs
122b7(rnying rgyud): dol rtsal nam mkha'i rgyan// ji ltar theg pa'i grangs mang yang // sha chang sgog btsong gtsang sbra rnams// a ting yi rol rtsal rgyan// chu bran rgya mtshor 'dus nas ni// chu sna 'di yin dbyer mi phyed// a ti klong chen brdal ba la/
123a1(rnying rgyud): 6zag pa 'ang yan rdzogs mi 'byed// thos brtag zla ska ngal thim// phyogs zhan dmigs 'dzin sdom pa lA// ches zad ka dag chen por sgrol// 'di yin 'di sbyin med pas ba // gr-I ya sangs na gas can
123a2(rnying rgyud): gaM ya rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na// dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs te// gzung 'dzin pazlas pas ngag tu // a ti chen po'i bdag nAM// gzung 'di ni ye ga rang rig dpal// gzung 'dzi 'das pa rtogs chen yid// de lta
123a3(rnying rgyud): rten / rnam // bdu / gam pa thA ba gcang 'anam sa ba rgyun// gsanas shA na
123a4(rnying rgyud): rtsal// kri ya gdos 'dzin brdal ba'i rdul// ma rig ye shes rig pa'i rtsal// 'chang skyo 'khrul rtog nga yi rtsal// sdang rig yid sems nga yi rtsal// 'khrul lugs thams cad klong gi rtsal// gzugs dang yan lag klong gi rgyal// grib mtha'
123a5(rnying rgyud): kun dang lha sgom spyod// 'gyu tshad rig tshad rtags tshad dang // dgrag nyen phyogs rim kha dog dang // zag pa dgu dang bcu gcig sogs// klong yangs ngang nas N+Dal du shur// de la zhen na mdud pas bcings// ma bac+doMs rang grol a ti yang /
123a6(rnying rgyud): mkha'i grong rnam dag chos dbyings su// gzhi rlung rig pa'i nga bor thim// rtsal rnams zer gyi slong du thim// stong gsal 'od 'byung thong du bim// zhen pa ma spangs klong du thim// rig pa klang sdang shar grol dang // rang bzhin rdo bo'i klong yangs yin/
123a7(rnying rgyud): ma rig 'cha 'phrul snang tshogs// gang shing thog tu rang bzhin pol// ba theg pa'i se na// gling gi grom yangs pa'i rgyas// skyed thug gson ga shin yin med dang// nga dgas dang rtag cad dang // dag tshang
123b1(rnying rgyud): 'bru tshad dang // bus ma dzad sdang rkyong shar tshad dang // dug/ lnga drug kaskyam bag chags sam// rnam rtog sa nu brtags grub mtha' dang // mtshon byed rgyu btsal dgag sbub rnams// gang bur gyes pa'i thog tu grol// stong pa kun 'byuthung stong pa
123b2(rnying rgyud): rgyan// thol byung rig pa rig par grol// wal byung dran rtog rig par grol// dper na sbrul gyi mdung pa bzhin// 'ching mkhan grol mkhan gA la yod// rnga ma'i mdud pa rang sol bzhin// kri ya ma spangs rang grol rgyan// thams cad ka dag
123b3(rnying rgyud): klong du grol// stong dang snang ba dbyer mi phyed// mkha' la 'ja'atshon thim pa ltar// sdang rig stong gsalnga dbyer mi phyed// kha char mtsho la thim pa 'dra// nyan thos a ti dbyer mi phyed// chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa 'dra// rang rgyal byang sems
123b4(rnying rgyud): te gsum// mar dang mir ni bsnol ba ltar// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje dang // dug gsum sku gsum dbyir mi phyed// khrag dang chu gnyis bsres pa ltar// ma rig ye shes dbyer mi byed// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul gA la yod// rtogs dang /
123b5(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs ga la yod// sangs rgyas sems can ga la yod// the tshom can gyi grub mtha' kun// oM d+hi rgyos zad ka dag klong // sangs rgyas gzhan nus myi ro rdzogs// 'khrul rmongs theg rlung tshig gis bsnams// a ti dron gyi thog tu thal/
123b6(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i phyogs zhen zlos btags yin// ma spangs ma 'dre sna dang na bde// blos btags tha snyad rol par mdzes// mtshan ma'i spyod pa gzi bla mor che// kri ya ma spangs rdzogs rkyen rgyan// blo yi yul la nges pa med// blo yul mtha
123b7(rnying rgyud): sangs mi skye// oM ti martogs gang zagal// ldan brgyad kyi ste/ sgom rnams// drang ba'i don du bshang btsam// gnas skabs tsam sa bde 'bras yin// 'od sbyar spongs thabs zla sna chags// ming sngon sangs rgyas nam zhag pas/
124a1(rnying rgyud): bslabs pa'i bad+has ngas nas// / thang can kun ga sa// gnas drug sa nga du ga byung // ma shA shA / nga bye ba rgya san// nga na
124a2(rnying rgyud): kAsang chen bka' 'di sus gobya// kun bzang ring las gzhan mi 'da'o// nyan thos thug pa rdal gan 'byung bar// da gtan 'bebs pa'i chos min no// sdug bsngal bde chen ka dag pa// gling chen nga yis gtan la phebs// rdong 'gas
124a3(rnying rgyud): mol phran tshang bzhag/ kri yA mi rtag sdug bsngal zer// ngagatan de yis phebs pa yin// dbyer med ldan grub ro la pa na// klong chen nga yis nges par 'bebs// sgrung ba kye med rang sar gro lwa// a ti klong chen nam mkha' la// theg dbu \u0f7f
124a4(rnying rgyud): rtsal sdong bdud tsam// thang byor de dogs bral nas ni// dgra la nyams mangs gtan la phebs// b+ha bla ga tsor byed kri sa ste// dgu phyi man+ta' bAzhi'i mdud pas bskam ste// snang ba drug pa rigs gsam+b+ha nya// gzugs rnams 'jam dpal sa
124a5(rnying rgyud): sman ris// ngan rtog cig rdor nyid du bste// bdug dang yon padag d+has ting 'dzin// dag pa gsum gyi mdungad pas bskums// zhe bo lnga gong 'og rdul dub ste// ma tid ba nga ni gnyis mi dgag/ mi gnas mi zhen chur ma chad// ma
124a6(rnying rgyud): gyam pardal yin pa la// bzang ngan sta phyogs 'dzin bdud// sa t+ti bzang nga nardal ba'o// gnyis ka rAng sher rang grol bas// a ti ma bsgra byas kyi yAm spangs par// dgag srub bral ba rdzogs chen can du mdzes// zhes gsungs nas/ tshogs
124a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gi me rjen pa kun ne gzugs so// thag tsun gyi ste bur kyong chen pa'i thams kyi byung 'di/ gros ma grang sa rdzogs pa'i 'dzun gcig sa/ sa ma sa~M/ 66\u0f7f/ tha'amag/ bdun she kyi ga dang#
124b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' ra rdzas yang gsol ba// u pa'i bub mtha' dbye ba rnams// a d+hir rdzogs rgyal gsung du gsal// ston pas lan du bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i labar dz+nyAn nga yis bshad// swab yal bzhi yin te// lha brji 'dzin rdzong dpa
124b2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu dag dang bzhi nyid do// lta ba yo gdag dang mthun// don dam skye 'gag med par 'dod// tIng 'dzin yog dog dang mthun// mngon par byang chub lnga nyid do// skrod pa kri yang ga dang mthuran// bza' dus khrus gtsang gtso bor byed//
124b3(rnying rgyud): du mi cho lnga bdun rgyas// rigs lnga rdo rje 'chang su thob// up+sa re dogs theg pa yin// a haM nyan cig sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// rdzogs chen ye brdul gting mtha' med pa la// sa lam chog d+hod lta spyod brtson 'bras rnams// ma
124b4(rnying rgyud): ma bsrubs ye grol ngang du rdzogs// u ba ya ni theg pa spod srub bsgoms// a ti re dogs sbyang thob rang sar grol// gzhi shar rang grol dbyings kyi dang na bde// u pa ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyar// a tri mA bslebs dug lnga rgyan
124b5(rnying rgyud): mdzes// yangs so tshwa'i reg pa mkha' mnyam thugs// spang thob med do thig le nyag gcig klong // rang sar grol lo rtogs dang ma rtogs med// gnyis su med par grol ba'i chos nyid de// theg 'og rnams la mi srid srid pa'i chos//
124b6(rnying rgyud): rna phrug brag la 'dzegs pa'i bde blag de// srog chags gzhan la mi sring kho la srid// rig pa byar med klong du grol ba de// theg dman rtsol srub can la me srid de// rnal 'byor mkha' mnyam bya bral glid na bde// ye sangs rgyas pa'i rig pa yu
124b7(rnying rgyud): med de// 'khor bar 'khyams par mi srid me klong brdal// yul can rdzas blo 'dod pa'i ub de// mkha' la nga krol rten med klong dri rdzogs// thig le nyag gcig grwa zur med pa la// gnyis su snang / mi srid srid pa'i byas// gcig dang tha dang /
124b8(rnying rgyud): krosus
125a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i sems// gcig tu zol lo bya bral klong du grol// rang byung ye shes rgya rkyen med pa la// dug lnga 'chang ba mi srid srid pa'i babs// de la spyong 'geg byed pa'i u pa do// rang b+ha rang grol ye shes
125a2(rnying rgyud): srubs su grol// spun grub phyogs med mtha' dang bral ba la// phyogs lhung rgya chad mi srid srid pa'i babs// phyogs lnga'i mtha' la zhen pa'i u pa de// phyogs med grol lo ldan grub klong du grol// mngon mtshan med pa'i reg pa 'gag med la/
125a3(rnying rgyud): spang ba 'char bar mi srid srid pa'i babs// snang ba rtag chad the tshom u pa de// rang sar grol lo nges med klong du grol// gzugs sogs snang ba snang thog rang sar grol// dbye bsal med do lhun grub klong du grol// 'du 'bral med pa thig
125a4(rnying rgyud): la'i klong du grol// cir yar 'char ro nges med klong du grol// sma ru grag go thos pa rang sar grol// dran rtog thams cad de ru rang sar grol// snang grag mthong thos sgo lnga rang sar grol// rang zhal rang gis mthong bas yul gzhan med//
125a5(rnying rgyud): dag pa gsum dang lha drug gtsang sbra sogs// gnyis su med do yul sems mnyam par grol// bcu gcig rdo rje 'chang sogs sa theg kun// ma bsrubs tshig chod a ti nga yi rgyan// mnyam nyid gcig la cir yang 'byung ba'i dbyings/
125a6(rnying rgyud): yon tan thams cad skyed par byed pa'i gzhi// thams cad bya byed med par grol ba'i klong // u pa ya zhes mdud can lta ba de// spyod pa kri ya ltar 'dod 'og rjes 'breng // lta ba yo ga'i rjes 'jug god la snyeg/ gong 'og gnyis la
125a7(rnying rgyud): zhags pas bsdams// gong 'og gcig tu shes kyang mnyam pa'i rig pa la// gnyis 'dzin kha brag lta ba gyogs 'dzin bdud// a ti mtho dman med pa'i chos nyid la// lta spyod gong 'og gnyis ka ma 'gags te// gnyis ka
125b1(rnying rgyud): na naH// ma sa nas na/ sa pa sas// tha ga gas su ca na rnam 'a // sug
125b2(rnying rgyud): da sa// yang deg du pa rgya ngas mamar mi myod// ni Sh+T+ra rnam// sma nA byu gdas dun/ 'a pa kyi / sa
125b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// mtha'aphe gang ba'i 'dra 'dzin 'drin pa ltung // thug pa'i mtha myed pan pa'i rgya mi paso// rgan gyi ring sam gying ming rtsi dus pa // myi ban mang na byeng/ la tu 'byed pas nang nyi 'dri da mdu
125b4(rnying rgyud): 'ad da 'gra bgras thogs cem/ nga'i byi nan na su mtham pa gang dang mamyong // dag nyi mi than pa ngas cad pa// dab sdus par maman do// slo ba'i mdung shing byung ba dag le byang// mim
125b5(rnying rgyud): du dag kyang ba rnam du 'di bangs pas myi dru/ mam ma mthang ri cing byed pa// nyid nims me 'i mas/ du sus 'jung / dang pa
125b6(rnying rgyud): 'i nga de/ sa kya ga ga ga nas kyi ming ga bzlang/ ga nga/
125b7(rnying rgyud): tshigs na pa tu gangan byim rje pa rgyas pargyal thugs kyir rdzob/ yangs kyis rgya mthob kyi bying / mi mjugs mi sa/ ga gra pa rje ba
126a1(rnying rgyud): dgrang mamong las shang// ngas gsum sangs rgyas sa spyod kyis s+hon// zas gas sas// rdorlom pa nga gnang du ldan na bzhugasas// zagag kun ma krung tshor ba 'byams so cad byas/ ba ma sangs/
126a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i le'u stertsa gnyis pa'o// / sa mA ya/ ##\u0f7f/ ma mgatan pag dang / rgyasems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol po// tshu la me ltos kun tu bzang // rkyen dang ye bral klong brdal dpal// loga'i grub mtha' bshad
126a3(rnying rgyud): du gsol// ston pas lan du bka' stsal pa// em sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// loga'i grub mtha' 'di lta ste// lha sgom gyod pa 'bras bu'o// lta ba 'od gsal stong nyid las// rdo rje dbyings su sangs rgyas 'dod// sgom pa mngon byang
126a4(rnying rgyud): bskyed// ye shes spyan drangs mchod bskyod bzlas// spun grogs tshul du bsgom pa'o// spyod pa yon tan lnga longs spyod// 'bras bu mi tshe lnga gsum gyis// 'thug po bkod pa thob par 'dod// yo ga nyid kyi grub mtha' 'o// AN taH
126a5(rnying rgyud): e ma ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// ma rtogs theg pa 'og ma pas// gzhan du rtog cing rtsol bas bskrad// yul sems bden gnyis dgag sgrub mkhan// mi mthun spang zhing gcig phyir 'bring // yog ting 'dzin gsum rtsol nas// blang dor
126a6(rnying rgyud): byas nas 'bras bu re// a ti chen po klong chen nga // thams cad chos nyid brdal ba la// dam bca' spong len la sogs kyi// ting 'dzin 'phro 'dug la yod// dam yang bda' ba chen por bca'// gtan tshigs chos nyid phyogs med la//
126a7(rnying rgyud): rig pa mkha' yan lhun grub pas// 'di la spang chu ci yang med// blang bar bya ba yod ma yin// slang blang med pas yog rdzogs// gang ma spangs pa'i kun grol dbyings// sa lam bgrod pa'i thabs chen po// dbyings su sbyor ba'i rdzu
126b1(rnying rgyud): 'phrul can// sngon gyi rgyal bgrangs med kyang // klong rmenang las mngon sangs rgyas// mabyon slad kyi sangs rgyas kyang // spyod chen da las mngon sangs rgyas// da lha'i rgyal bgrangs mang kyang // klong zen nga yi srubs na brdal// nga ni rgyal ba kun
126b2(rnying rgyud): gyi mes// nga ni theg pa kun gyi ngur// 'khor 'das kun gyi yab chen po// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam po che// 'khor ba'i chu bo sgrol ba'i zla// nyon mongs rgya mtsho skam pa'i me// ji tsam theg pa'i rnam grangs kyang // nga yi skyong las yongs ma
126b3(rnying rgyud): 'das// ji tsams lam gnas nas kyang // nga yi klong las gar ma phyin// theg dgu ma 'dres so sor bkra// yog ma spangs a ti'i rgyun// a ti ma bskyabs lhan 'byams bde// bzod med rtsol bral rig pa'i klong // byar med lhan
126b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyi med no// a ti mnyam pa'i chos nyid du// 'khor 'das ma sbyangs lhun grub pas// spyir chi ba chen po dbyer med pas// phyir cheb pa 'di gzhan na mod// rang snang dbyer med brdal ba che// gcig la kun rdzogs a ti la// na
126b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' lta bu'i rig pa shar// gang yang gnyis med klong na bde// a ho// ye grol chen po lta bgyogs med klong // gser snying lta bu dbye bsal med pa'i dang // ye klong chen po sgom pa phyogs med klong // byed rlung lta bung thams cad dbyings
126b6(rnying rgyud): pu TIgs// gang shar chen pa spyod pa phyogs med klong // chu klong lta bu dal ba'i klong na 'babs// ye grub chen po 'thus bu phyogs med stong // yul ljongs lta bu ma 'dres gcig tugs la// dper na 'dzam gling kyi baphrag brgyan// 'dod
126b7(rnying rgyud): yon rnam sprul bsam mi khyab pa nyid// de tsam che yang gling las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos slar yang 'jam gling rgyan du che// thig le nyeg gcig a ti chen po la// theg dmanam spangs yo ga'i rtsod 'bras rnams// gser dngul 'phra man bsras
127a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnas san// gtsug las ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa nan// sun kyab rtson pa sa nga men rdzogs// bshe pas mi ga zugs ma na slad// des stong dang nas gang / byas kyang bad// da

127a3(rnying rgyud): mra ya/ rgyu n+ya D+ha/ a~M// dgaganag nas/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol ba// kye ho// yongs rdzogs lhag med kun bzang je// chos su'i bstan pa chen po'o// ma hA grub mtha' rdzogs rgyal ti// ston pa'i thags kyi grong nas khrol/
127a4(rnying rgyud): zhes sras ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kun nyon cig/ ma hA'i theg pa 'di ltar ro// nga bongs chog dbye ba dang // lha sgom spod dang 'bras zan// nga bo skyed pa'i gzhi yin no// ma ni chos nyid ha dag pa// yog rgya
127a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa skye// nges pa'i tshig tu yid la brang // dbye na sgrub pa gtso che dang // sa la ma gtso cher 'dod pa dang // rnam grol gtso ma ma hA'o// sgrub pa gtso cher 'dod pa ni// 'jam dpal su dang padz+ra gsung // yang dag gyur pa nya ma grin dang // rmon/
127a6(rnying rgyud): tan bdud rtsom mo dang // rig 'dzin dmod pa mchod pa stod sogs// phra mo'i sgrub pa grangs med do// sa la ma gtsor ston rdzu 'phrul te// rnam grol gtsor sgron mad rtogs so// lta ba lha dang gzhal las dang // rig pa spos bral nyid du /
127a7(rnying rgyud): zlum ba ten 'dzin rnam pa gsum// gleng bathabs kyis dbyed na// byad byas dang mi grang // dang tha~Mng sde dang shes rgyas+ho// bskyab rtsa snga la spyod pa'o// dam chogs pag yid gsum bsrung // 'bras pa 'di'am par dog// mig mamam byid
127b1(rnying rgyud): chenas// gyi ma nges par thob pa ste// 'di rnams sgrub pa gtso cher 'dus// ma hA'i grub mtha' de ltar ro// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// a ti klong chen rab 'byams pa nyid la// ma hA sgrub pa kyang rdzogs tshul 'di lta ste// kun gzhi ye shod
127b2(rnying rgyud): snying po khyab gdal dang // ma bcos spros med chos nyid ka dag la// su yi lha rnams ma bslabs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma grangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// 'khor 'das sdang stong dbyer mang grong du 'byams// rang som sa dri med rnam dag
127b3(rnying rgyud): bcang // snang stong grag stong dran stong so ma'i klong // gsung gi lha rnams ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// chos sku sems su yang dag gnas lugs te// rang bzhin spros thal rnal 'byor sku gsum rdzogs/
127b4(rnying rgyud): ma bkag rang byung ma 'dres rang bzhin thol// thugs rje lha rnams ma bslabs ye nas rdzogs// ma snga ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// ma rig rnam rtog nyon mongs dug mtsho'i nang // rang nyung rig pa'i rtse bcung thig les gzhom// ma
127b5(rnying rgyud): mi gnas 'dod yon rnam dgra brdal// bdud rtsi'i lha rnams ma bsrubs ye nas rdzogs// me hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// de bdag phyogs chu gzung 'dzin li t+pa la// ra 'jig ye shes phrar pa thang thal btang // rtog pa thal byang gcer ba cog
127b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag spangs// phrer pa'i lha rnams ma bsrubs ye nas rdzogs// mahA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i gyen// ma gcig kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i dbyings// snying po rig pa'i ye shes ji lta ji snyed mkhyen// ma nor ma bcos kun khyab ye shes thong //
127b7(rnying rgyud): ma mo'i lha rnams ma bslabs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// thabs shes kun ldan ye stong bdag nyid rig/ mi nom mi yengs rig pa dbyings na 'gro// brjod med lug rgyad g.yo med rang grol klong // rig 'dzin
128a1(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa gcig las med pa na// sangs kyis kun gyi rig pa ni// sems can kun gyi rang yul yin// 'od lnga'i mu khyud zlum par gnas// sems can kun gying po ni// 'gyur med su yang ba yin// sangs/
128a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas sems can thams cad la// rang rang thugs la dkyil 'khor tshang // nga nyid gcig pu dkyil 'khor lha// rang nyid rdo rje rkyen dang bral// nga ni dpa' bo gcig pu nyid// da ni byas pa thams cad byed// gsang sngags rgyal po tshi ga las 'das//

128a4(rnying rgyud): zil gyis gnon// de bzhin rdzogs chen a ti yo ga ni// sna tshogs don can ston cing theg dman zil gyis gnon// seng ge dar skad 'don pas sder chags thams cad skrag/ rdzogs chen dar skad ston pas theg dman thams cad brgyal// kun dang

129b6(rnying rgyud): blazang po'i yul// gnyis su med pa'i pa chen por blta// gnyis dang sdug bsngal mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// gnyis med pade chen yid dpyod re ba'i bdud// a ti rgya chad med pa'i chos nyid la// gnyis kar rang shir gnyis kar ring grol bas/

130a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod na rtag pa'i mtha'// med par 'dod na chad pa'i mtha'// rtag chad gnyis kyi mdud pa de// rnal 'byor 'ching bar byed pa'i sgrog/ de yi mdud pa ngang gis 'grol// a nu la sogs lam gzhan gyis// bkrol bas khrol ba ma yin te// zhan pa'i

130a6(rnying rgyud): snang chos sku'i klong na bde// chos sgyu 'pho 'gyur med pa la// 'khor 'das chos kun ci bder bzhugs// de la nges pa med pa'i phyir// byed spyod cir yang ma 'gags pas// nga yi klor na ci bder spyod// spyod yul gang yin ma 'gags pas//

130b1(rnying rgyud): kyang rig pa'i klod// sa le sbam bzhin 'gyur ba med// gcig shes kun grol ti la nyid// thag dgu ma spangs nga yi rtsal// a ti mra bsrubs nga yi rol// mthong man brjod bral nga yi rgyan// ces gsungs nas/ kun rdzogs rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i rang la
130b2(rnying rgyud): spyan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi gyi phung khrong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ oM num skangs rdzogs tshul gyi le'u ste nyar lnga pa'o// / sa ma ya/ rgya rgya che/ a na pra/ bzhin gsos dzes rdoHbanany+dzaHrmA n+ya N+yaHde nas sems da
130b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang gsol pa// e ma ho// rtag gcig zung thal kun tu bzang // med pa phul ba spun grub che// a ti'i grub mtha' bdag la ston// ces gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// rdzog
130b4(rnying rgyud): chen a ti'i grub mtha' ni// lha sgom sprod pa 'bras bu'o// lta ba snang srid 'khor 'das kyi// chos rnams thig l-i nyag gcig sgra// rang byung bya btsal med par 'dod// sgom pa kun khyab nam mkha' la// cer yang 'char ba'i nor bu ltar//
130b5(rnying rgyud): snang bzhin ma grub nges pa med// bcom smad med pa se le sbram// rang gsal chen por 'dod pa yin// myod pa spyad chu mang po ste// 'bras bu tshe gcig lus gcig la// ka dag zang pa'i sar grol 'ad// sems sde klong sde mun dag
130b6(rnying rgyud): migs// rang nga grub mtha' tshugs rjes bcing sa// thig brgyang rnams cad byung bsrung nas// nga ni rtsol 'phrul la zer// rdzogs zhe na yis sangs man+te// lta ba sgom med bstan pas zos// sgom pa sa rnam bstan pas zos// spyod pa
130b7(rnying rgyud): lpang thang med pas chos// dab tsog bsrung batshams dpes thos// la ma la kyil 'grong 'i de bas thos// chos tid gang yang yin pas rnaMs// don lang sbyar gnas gyur kyang // theg dman thams cad skrag cing rgyal bar byed// ga gas
131a1(rnying rgyud): bad sa byu// la yang da na/ na gra mas pag // da rdzog ma da sa/ zhes ma zlag sa/ mad kyang byams
131a2(rnying rgyud): dman rnams la kha yin ci ng+ge// kyai 'bras byal bar 'dzag pa na// khams gsum sems can pas dpa byas// theg pa grang srad sdig pa ni// yang dag pa la blo btugs yin// gang la gang 'tshams snyan byed pa// dbang po rim par ky-i na
131a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs// mtho dman med par dus ma gsungs// theg dgu smras kyi gdang bzhin brten// sgong 'geg rtog bsgyur bden gnyis spyod// gtsang lnga ting 'dzin byin rlab byed// rtsol srub dam tshig ye shes bsre// sgrub bsnyen phrin las
131a4(rnying rgyud): bstod bkral// kun la 'bras bu re re dang // bden pa mthong tshul yon tan yod// rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i kha lta ste// tshod pa'i rtsa la cung tsam rtogs// nyams len med ces tha ma la rjod// nyams len ma 'dres drod tshad thob// a te chen po nyid
131a5(rnying rgyud): la// nyan rang theg pa so thar dang // nyams len kun kyang ma spangs yang // chen po la bkag pa med// klong yangs nga la gnas pa med// gang yang ma spangs yangs par brdal// ma bcos mkha' 'dra kun la shar// mtho dman phyogs dris
131a6(rnying rgyud): dal byed// 'dod sde'i chos chen ma zad na// bste mtho yang sangs mi g+ha// chen po nga yis gtan la 'debs// 'khor ba rba nas du yis bzlog/ theg pa 'og mas gong ma 'degs// rtsabs rtse mo 'degs bzhin na// maral mar bstan
131a7(rnying rgyud): bsal med// sangs rgyas sems can logs na mod// rdzogs pa chen po'i lha sgom spyod// dam tshigs la mtshol grub med// de yis ka dge sgrub la phebs// sgyu 'bras zhib kyang 'gal ba med// byar med klong du gang yang god// rtsol
131b1(rnying rgyud): grub mi 'ad bya mi dgos// rdzogs chen rgya 'bras med par 'khrul// nan chos nyid mkha' dang 'gral// ji bzhin ces nyid don mi 'byor// chos nyid mi mol don dang 'gam// oM maH/ thog dgra yi rdzogs 'dras te// sdug bsngal rdzan+d+ha
131b2(rnying rgyud): spang mi dgos// nyan thos ma spangs rdzogs pa che// ma rig rten 'brel dbang po 'gegs// stong nyid chos su kye 'jig bral// rang rgyal ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// rang nyung rnam dag chos nyid kyang // lung bskur dmigs pa phul mi dgos// sems
131b3(rnying rgyud): tsam ma sbyangs rdzogs chen rgyan// kri ya gtsang sbra bI dor grub// ye nas dag pas bya ba bral// kri ya ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// u pa yo ga cho ga rtsol sbub spyod// ye nas yun grub bya mi dgos// A yog ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// ma hA a
131b4(rnying rgyud): nu ting 'dzin gsum// dag pa sgom bsgrub ye grub yin// ma hA a nu rdzogs chen rgyan// sems sde klong sde man ngag sogs// kun kyang mtho dman med pa la// theg 'og khyad bsad rang che brjod// de yis 'di la gtan mi phebs// rdzogs pa chen
131b5(rnying rgyud): po'i lha sgo ma spyod// chen po nga nyid mnyam nyid dang // mtho dman dbye ba'i gdags gzhi bral// rtsol med rgyu 'bras zhib mos 'bebs// kun gyi yang rtse chen po nga// dgu ka ma spangs nyams su len// phyogs zhen rgya mdud sdom pa len// lta ba'i
131b6(rnying rgyud): yang rje thod rgal 'gro// gshis ni skye med thig le yin// rtsal ni 'gag med rol pa yin// ngo bo gnyis med rang grol yin// e ma ho/ gcig la kun rdzogs ma spangs rang sar grol// sangs rgyas su dang sems can nyon mongs lus// ji ltar ska
131b7(rnying rgyud): ba thams cad rig pa'i rgyan// nyon mongs dug lnga ye shes bdud rtsi ste// 'khor ba'i g.yang sa byang chub lam du dngas// dug gsum sku gsum klong du gtan sngags te// skye shi rtsad gcod khams gsum yongs su grol// gzung 'dzin gnyis dang
132a1(rnying rgyud): basbe can na// nyid pa da 'dzin nyid pa nyid lda pas// rdzabacang chu ba dag par thang dam pa// rang byung rig pa lenas surba // rnam gas ma nus pa rnams gang de sa// skyon dgas bcug na
132a2(rnying rgyud): ji snyed kyang // byang chub sems nyid de yi yon tan te// rang rig ma rtogs chos rnams logs na med// sems nyid klong du ma grol chos med pas// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i mkha' la mdud pa bor// phyogs su btsal ba sems kyi mdud pa ste//
132a3(rnying rgyud): ti lta ba phyogs ris med pa la// bltas kyang skyon med rang byung rol pa yin// ma bltas skyon med mtshan ma rang sar grol// gnyis med lta ba rang byung rol pa yis// lta ba bzang ngan 'byed pa'i mdud pa por// nga yi sgom pa dmigs gtad med pa
132a4(rnying rgyud): la// bsgoms kyang skyon med rang byung rol pa yin// ma bsgoms skyon med mtshan ma rang sar grol// rang grol gnyis med rang byung spyod pa yis// spyod pa ched du btsal ba'i mdud pa bkrol// klong chen 'bras bu spang thob med pa la// bslabs kyang
132a5(rnying rgyud): sngon med rang byung rig pa yin// ma bslabs skyon med mtshan ma rang sar grol// gnyis med rang grol rang byung 'bras bu yin// 'bras bu gzhan 'dod de ba'i mdud pa bkrol// klong chen bsrang mtshams bral ba'i dam tshig la// bsrungs kyang smon
132a6(rnying rgyud): med rang byung rol pa yin// ma bsrungs skyon med mtshan ma rang sar grol// rang grol gnyis med rang byud dam tshig gis// srung nyams spyod yon 'byed pa'i mdud pa bkrol// a ti'i phrin las bya btsal med pa la// btsal kyang spyod med rang byung
132a7(rnying rgyud): rol pa yin// ma btsal skyon med mtshan ma rang sar grol// rang grol gnyis med rang byung phrin las kyi// phyogs su 'byed par 'dod pa'i mdud pa bkrol// a ti sa lam sbyang bgrod med pa la// sbyang bgrod byas pas skyon med rol
132b1(rnying rgyud): shar// ma bgrod ma sbyangs spyan med rangs grol// gnyis med rang grol rang blangs lam gyis// mthad man gang dag 'dzin pa'i mdung pa bkral// kAng can mdzad bkrol mtha' yi mnags la bas// 'gro ba rigs drugasangs rgyas stod /
132b2(rnying rgyud): gsal// phyogs mtshams snying 'og thams cad rgyar mnyam pas// ya tha sangs rgyas med de rang dra gsapa// ma tha myal ba med de rang du dag/ 'grodrug sdug bsngal mdzad pa der bgrol nas// byang chub sems la bdag gzhan ma
132b3(rnying rgyud): dman med// mtho dman med pa'i mnyam nyid rig pa'i mkhar// kun la khyab pas gdal ba chen po'i rdzong// gnyis sa med pa mi 'gyur rdo rje'i 'obs// rdo rje'i mkhar rdzong theg pa'i spyi phud yin// yaM nas de yi grong du rang grol bas//
132b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod 'bru cir yang 'char ba'i yon tan yin// ye klong brdal ba de mjo ba la// skye shi 'pho 'gyur med pas 'bras bu'o// rgyang dang gdams dgra thams cad nga yi thong // gcig tshogs kun rdzogs skyon ston mtha' dag rdzogs// rdzogs
132b5(rnying rgyud): brten pa sa ti kun gyi phrad// dbyings rig ti lar gang pa dbye bas la med// sa dang las dang theg pa'i bye zag san// mA 'dres yongs rdzogs breg le gcig gi rgyan// thig le gcig la dpe bas la nga gis bral// me 'gyur brtan pa slong
132b6(rnying rgyud): na bde bar bzhugs// tha thal za dag ba yan grang na 'ad// kun kyang rogacig mnyam pa'i dbyings sa grol// skye med rol pa thub rgya pa chen po e// thegangs ma 'dres ma thangs rdzogs pas te// gong na gzhan med ste dpal chen por theg/
132b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das thams cad brdal ba chen po'i glang // nyid las ti shar rol pa 'thams pas chen// rtsol ba bya bral te la'i skabs na rab// ka dag zad pa med dpyad thal bas 'byams// theg dgra zil gnon yangs dog med par// zhes
133a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs nas// mau ga / sa sang na zugasas// thog parnyan pa sa nga klung can rab thams kyi nad las/ at+taHgas rgyal gyi lanasan drug pa // sam sa/ ma can/ gzunag

133a3(rnying rgyud): la cig/ zhus pa'i lan du 'di skad gsungs// a ti chen po'i grong brdal la// gtad med zang bal lta ba dang // dmigs gtad zhen med sgom pa dang // blang dor med pa'i sdang pa dang // 'bras bur dgra med par zad// bzhi yis
133a4(rnying rgyud): bsdams te bstan pa la// lte ba gtad med nyid lag snga ma// mnyam nyid 'dzin grol phyogs med pa// 'khor 'das chos kun gying snang me// sdang steng chos nyid dbye ba med// chos can ma yin chos nyid gcig/ legs nas 'byung ba'i rim med//
133a5(rnying rgyud): yod min med min 'dzin pa gral// bden dran padang gnyis chos dag/ thos rnams rang byung ba shar grong // chos med gtad med nyid lda nga// snang na dang sdang rang stong ngo // sdang dang stong pa ye nas mnyam// chos can chos nyid mnyam par/

134b3(rnying rgyud): zil mnan nam// glang chen rta mchog dud 'gro zil gnon ltar// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen nga nyid kyis// 'khor 'das theg dgu sbubs su zil gyis mnan// rang byung rang la thim pa'i sku gsum rig pa'i don// skye med dbyings la sgom med chen po
134b4(rnying rgyud): bsgom bya sgom byed yin min gnyis dang bral// 'dzin pa med par rang grol te// sbal dang rnga ma'i mdud pa bzhin// rang grol rang sangs chen po'o// de bzhin phyogs cha yid 'don rnams// rang grol rang sangs chen pa'o// a ti chen po nga nyid la/

135a1(rnying rgyud): chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ a ti chen po'i grub mtha ste/ rtswa btsun pa'o// sam+b+ha ya/ grasa?sa?/ c-ig ste/ the na/ Tag kyi ma srid/ gat+ta \u0f7f/ sras tu/ zab bya/ gtang /

135a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lan nyid du// ston pas rang byung 'di skad gsungs// kye ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// spyir na bla ma'i mtshan nyid ni// phun sum tshogs pa 'di ltar ro// klong chen bka' babs sgrub chud zin// dbang rnams yongs rdzogs dam tshig gnas//

135b3(rnying rgyud): kun po nyi ma mag sngar byed// gdams dgra med zar zhog tu ston// dpung snying po'i don la chom// 'gro don te ring phyogs na byed// yul dang bsran pa'i chos mi shes// de yang bzang bzang 'dra yang ngan pa ste// de 'dra'i mo gtsang dum ba la/

136a1(rnying rgyud): de nyon// slob ma dam tshig ldan gyur pa// spyod rjen ston yul snod dag yin// grong chen 'di ni thun mong min// thig pa kun gyi yang rtse yin// theg pa'i bcud mchog bdud rtsi 'di// gar bung sdong du blag par// sdad \u0f7fga
136a2(rnying rgyud): bcud 'bo don mi 'grub// dmyal bar ltung bas snod brtag go// dang po snod kyi mtshan nyid ni// dang pa che zhing chos la mos// brtson 'grus che zhing slab la brtson// shes rab che bas tshig don go// 'dzin chags chung zhing tshe 'di spong // ludud che zhing
136a3(rnying rgyud): ma mchod// blo che gsang sngags myong ba shod// g.yeng ba chung bas chos la gnas// dam tshig dag sung nyes skyon med// srub la brtson zhing spug sran che// da dang nga snying rjes 'gro la phan// gtong phod che bas rtsa gsum mnyes// chud dul nyon mongs

136b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro chos bdag thams cad kyis// 'phral la bar chad mi rung 'jug/ tshe 'dir shis dkon ngan song gnas// kun gyis skrod ci 'dama' sar 'babs// de yi kha rlangs grib ma phog/ mkha' 'gro 'khrug cing ngu bar 'gyur// snod ngan stabs rtswa
136b2(rnying rgyud): shin tu brtag/ me thigs gcig gis yul mkhar lud// sbal pa sras ma ji bzhin no// brtag pa sna tshogs sgo nas bya// mi nor srog sogs 'bral nas blta// mi nor rin chen gus ldan 'bul// phongs med 'bul la don rgyud bstan//
136b3(rnying rgyud): de yis don grub dgos pa yod// ces gsungs nas/ sna tshogs gcer grol gyi ngang la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa'i yang rtse klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ slob ma snod ldan mi ldan partag pa'i le'u ste rtsa dgu pa'o// // sa
136b4(rnying rgyud): ma ya/ rgya rgya chu/ A gra/ Ta zugs Ti po/ zheHgcid rgyarkan Ti dran rgyaHsems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// de lta bu yi klong chen de// bsten zhing rtsol ba'i gnas mchog gang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsan dgongs bka'
136b5(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// kye ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// grong chen nyams len gnas mchog ni// lung stong mi skad med pa'i sa// dge sbyor 'phel ba'i dgos pa'o// ri rtse shes pa shin tu gsal// dur khrod s+ya shas shin tu che// shin tu dben sar nyams sdang
136b6(rnying rgyud): 'phel// dngas shing mtho bas dbyings rig gsal// bkra shis gangs rgyud ri 'dab bzang // gnams pad 'khor kha sbyor 'dra// sngar yang grub thob rkyen thub pa// mi rgod med cing 'bru sogs med// rgyab ri mtho la byang ri mdud// g.yas pa dar dkar
136b7(rnying rgyud): yol lta bu// g.yon pa phyogs nas myong ba 'dra// mdun na rin chen spangs pa 'dra// mda' ni phyag rgya bsnol ba 'dra// tsha grang skams shing gzhi bdag 'jam// nyi ma rtag cing so thabs// nyi ring ran cing rab tu btsan// slad bkye ba spel
137a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ thung 'dra// nags sam mas chang tshi du// klung min ston pa'i sa gnas so// yan tan dge sdang dang gis 'bal// mabar thug dbyings ga brtan pa zag// de las lags pa'i gnas nyid ni// shar rim po bco
137a2(rnying rgyud): gnod// nub ri ha ra na bkra mi shis// mdun ri mdud tshugs bar tshod mang // tsha grang ma snyoms nad ru 'jug/ gzhi bdag rtsub pas bar chod 'ong // mi rgod rgya bas sems mi phebs// 'bru tshegs dkon na khams 'dus modado// gzhan yang
137a3(rnying rgyud): dgra sna tshogs la// rten 'brel babs kyis bcos shing spangs// yon tan ldan pa'i sna cha chu// srub khang che 'breng rkyang ba gsum// sems can b+h+yo dang sbar la brtsig// yang dag rten 'brel ka dag kyang // gnas skabs rten 'brel zhib par brang /
137a4(rnying rgyud): zad pa mthong ba'i grogs su 'gyur// de rnams 'jo ma dus slob ma yis// yon ni gser dngul 'bru span me// gus pas phras la snyan pa yis// lo bdun lnga'am gsum nyid nas// klong chen 'di zhu'i zhu ba ni// lnga bdun pa

137b2(rnying rgyud): rdzas thams cad tshang bar bsags// zas kyi yo byad 'dab tu bsham// dam bcas srid tshogs dgos pa yod// mchod rdzas ma rul ma ting ba// mdangs dang ldan pas rtswa gsum dgyes// bskad rdzas ma nor ma khyag cing // ma nyams ma rnying

137b5(rnying rgyud): med rigs bzang zhing // bcu drug lo lon gsang thub pa// mtshan ldan reg na bde ba 'phel// nad bzlog re skong 'bras bu thob// khyad par grogs kyi mtshan nyid kyang // dam tshig gcad zhing nyes ltung med// dag sdang che bas kun dang mthun//

138b2(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i rgyud rnams ni// phun sum tshogs pa wa ldan yin// bshang thabs pani yis gang 'tshams ston// a ho// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas nyid ni// chos dbyings spos dang bral ba ste// mtshan nyid mgrub tshig mtha' zang // dz+nyAn pa
138b3(rnying rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa ni// ma spos mi smyos yid tshig thal// zhal phyag nyid du ma grub bo// 'khor ni chos nyid rol par shar// rang grol rang byung gsal ba'o// bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa ni// don ldan rang byung rang shar ba// rtswa rkyen gang gis

138b7(rnying rgyud): gnas mchog tshun su mchags pa ni// rang sras 'ang mi ga ban yin// myong na can gzhas las khang // carnams 'dus pa 'ing ma// dus gsum bad gshegs thams cad can// 'di la brten nas
139a1(rnying rgyud): snyan pa phran sa ma chags pa ni// rang gis reg pa'i rgyal bste// 'khor 'das rgyas rnams thams cad kun// mkhyen pa'i bdag par bzhugs pa'o// zhal bar thun sum rdzogs pa ni// rnam par gas pa'i tshogs

142a1(rnying rgyud): dag 'dangs yang thas pa// mang 'gag ma kun bzang // dab ga das pado sbyar na// nyams son spyad pa gatharnams// dog sadangs 'kho lta shA/ 'gras sog/ gsas dgas nas pa/
142a2(rnying rgyud): pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// ma yengs 'khrul med blol zung // skal bzang thar pa 'dod pa'i mi// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas nyid du// chos dang mthun pa'i grogs dang 'grogs// sems spang bdun po sngon du gtad// dkon
142a3(rnying rgyud): mchog skyabs song sems bskyed la// 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid mi rtag bsam// 'gro la snying rje byang sems bsgom// bsod nams tshogs bsags sdig pa sbyang // de la dgos ched rnam pa gnyis// gnas skabs tshe 'dir glo zlog cig/
142a4(rnying rgyud): byas chos su 'gro ba dang // mthar bug rang dang gzhan gyi don// rgya chen 'grub pa'i dgos pa yod// de yang lus ngag yid gsum la// dang po lus kyi sngon 'gro ni// rigs drug spyod pa sna tshogs lud// rdo rje spel krung dang bcas te// lus
142a5(rnying rgyud): sbyangs sems la phan pa'o// lus kyi zhen log sdig pa 'dag/ ngag gi sngon 'gro rigs drug gi// spa dang ni khro 'byung ba'i sgra/ rnam pa sna tshogs brjod par bya// ngag gis hUM zhes brjod pa la// rgyas gdab pa dang rtsal nyid spang // gnyen
142a6(rnying rgyud): btsal lam du zhugs par bya// de ltar dag spangs sems la phan// ngag gi zhen log dag sgrib 'dab/ sems kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni// dus gsum bla rtog sna tshogs dang // dug lnga dug gsum lha'i dkyil 'khor// rigs drug sdug bsngal
142a7(rnying rgyud): sgrol blang // 'dus pa thams cad mi rtag par// kun kyang 'jig pa'i cho 'phral bsgom// de rnams bsgom pa'i mkhan po ni// sems la thug gam ma thug brtag/ sems su thug na dge sdig gang che brtag/ de nas sems 'di gang dang 'dra//
142b1(rnying rgyud): 'drad ba mang du bskur bar ga// de nas sas pa// srid pasum pa// nga grang yin pagakyar bcad // nganas sems kyi blangs brgyag// marnang mas kyi su dad zug/ 'angs skyes sa gnas su lnga'o// banodas sa cad pa dang da/
142b2(rnying rgyud): nas sems kyi 'akris btsal// ma rnyed stsal pa'i sgra dang 'phrad// de skar sems kyis dngas byas pas// zhen lag par chad zhi ba dang // sgrib pa skad cig gol sa med// chos kyi sra grol gnyis med 'ad // dI nas rnaMl rung bab pa 'a
142b3(rnying rgyud): lus kyi rdardul 'bebs mi 'gul bas// phung khams rgyas pa'i dgos pa yod// ngag gi rnal 'bebs mi smra zhing // brjod med 'jar ba'i dgas pa yod// sems kyi rnal phebs 'phra 'du bcad// zhe na 'don grol ba'i dgos pa yod// mdzar
142b4(rnying rgyud): thug dgas pa lus dal bas// stsal pa'i sba la reg pa yin// ngag dal longs sur reg pa yin// sems dal chos slar reg pa yin// thun mong 'byung ba mi 'khrug cing // mthar thag lus ngag yid gsum gyi// 'dzin pa rang dag dgos pa'o//
142b5(rnying rgyud): de nas sor 'dub bya ba ni// nang tshong can gyi gdan stengs sra// rkang pa rdo rje'i skyil krung bcang // phag pa gnyis po mnyam gzhag bsnol// lus po mdang skrag bzhin du bsrang // dpung pa rgod gshog bzhin du gargyangs// mjeng pa / zhu mo
142b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du bang // lus la gzug pa gcings sur bskud// mig dang ste rtse sems rtse bkun// de skar tsan 'thu chags par bya// theg pakun gyi gyi wang klong cher dang 'byams kyi gyad las/ sngon 'gro'i le ga so lnga pa'o//
142b7(rnying rgyud): sa me yai// klo N+ra gro na dang / sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye'o// thag chod chen po kun tu bzang // sngon bya'i rim po gsungs na yang // nyams pan dngos gzhi gsung dragasol// zhus pa ri lan du dkang stsal pa/
143a1(rnying rgyud): gan mang du dun nan / nga / sa ku gas du du sunasasu
143a2(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa yul can lam rnams la// skom dang bsgom bya'i thabs rnams bstan// rig pa rang sdang blo rnams la// brtag pa'i babs rnams gcig tu bstan// de kun snom tshig rnam gnyis kyis// rim pa bye brag gnyis phye nas/
143a3(rnying rgyud): skyes bu rnams kyi blo la 'jug/ 'di kun sdang ba rang nges so// dmigs pa yul can blo rnams la// khregs chod gdams pa bstan pa ni// rim pa bye brag 'di lta bu// khrigs chod nyid du nyams su blang // chos nyid 'bad rtsol dang bral
143a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i// lus sems bya thal dang du bzhag/ chos nyid rang thog nga spang bas// rnam rtog ye shes chen por 'char// chos nyid rang sar grol ba yis// sdang ba nyid la dgag srub med// lus sems bya bral chos nyid ni// bya ba med pas/
143a5(rnying rgyud): ye grol yin// bla byed spangs pas bde ba rnyed// grol ba rang byung gzhan las min// bru ba bral ba gzhir gzhag go// 'khor 'das bya byed nam bral tshe// rdzogs chen nyid las gzhan min no// a ho// byang chub sems la btsal du ye
143a6(rnying rgyud): nas med// ji bzhin dang la ma bcos gang dgar thong // bdag gzhan yul can ye nas med pas na// mnyam pa ris med rig pa gang dgar thong // rtag tu de dang 'du 'bral med pas na// gnyis su yul med ris med gang dgar thang //
143a7(rnying rgyud): bye bral lhun rdzogs 'di las gzhan med pas// gzhi gzhag brdal ba'i spu de kha yan thong // mtshan nyid ma 'gags sna tshogs cir yang 'char// dbang po gcir mthong cir snang chos nyid gsal// snang ba rgya yan rig pa gang dgar bde//
143b1(rnying rgyud): ma bcos rnal 'dug rig pa khong klong bde// shes pa bag yangs byar med skyes bu bzhin// grim lhod med par lus sems gang dgar bzhag/ sus kyang ma bcos rang gis rang nyid gsal// rtsol slab med par chos nyid bde gdal bas// ye nas yin
143b2(rnying rgyud): pas bcos su ga pa yod// gcig pur ma bcos glong na rang krol bde// gtad med phyogs bral nges par 'dzin pa med// 'dzin med rang shar kun bzang rol pa yin// tshogs drug zi lag non snang ba rgya yis gdab// gyi nang 'dra 'gro byar med chen po'i
143b3(rnying rgyud): klong // cing yang ma yin cir yang yin pa'i phyir// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bya bral chos// 'khor 'das theg pa kun la dbang bskur bas// byar med lhag pas thams cad zil gyis gnon// mtha' du gyur pa'i yul gzhan logs na med// thar med
143b4(rnying rgyud): gcig gis grong las gar ma g.yos// bya bral kun tu bzang po'i sa nyid pa// 'khor ba kun bzang mya ngan 'das pa bzang // kun bzang klong na 'khor 'das ye nas med// snang ba kun bzang stong pa kun tu bzang // kun bzang klong na sdang stong ye nas med//
143b5(rnying rgyud): skye shi kun bzang bde spug kun tu bzang // kun bzang klong na bde sdug skye shi med// bdag gzhan kun bzang rtag chad kun tu bzang // kun bzang klong na bdag gzhan rtag chad med// da ching grol med pas dga' sgrub ye nas bral// gtad med rdzogs tha
143b6(rnying rgyud): chen po 'di yin te// lce med 'gag med bya bral lhan rdzogs dang // thog babs shugs kyur gcar phog yan pa ste// klong rdol rang shar 'phro drug gtan pa bcom// snang ba sems su ye nas ngo smad pas// stang ba snang ba'i steng du grol ba nyid// sems
143b7(rnying rgyud): nyid stong ste/ dngas medang smad pas// shes pa 'grub 'bru dang shar thog grol// stong pa chos sug dgang sprad pas// sdang shes gnyis med chos su gdal bar grol// gcig shes pas ni kun grol chen po'i phyir// grol ba de dang de nyid steng drakrol//
144a1(rnying rgyud): grol ba dang kyang ma togs gzhan na min// dbang po'i sgornams thams cad ma bcas par// tag gis bzhag las rang bzhin grol ba'i gnang // de las ma bsku byar med brtsas pa 'ad// rnamam ja ma phrag pa 'ad /
144a2(rnying rgyud): 'da' kha yan klong du gnas pa nyid// ma yengs ma 'dzin dang du rang sar zhog/ dbang po'i sgo rnams dgag par mi bya zhing // lus ngag bya ba spyad par ga la bya// gnyid sogs spang zhing blang phyag la yod// dbyings pa dbyings shar dbyings kyi slad du zil/
144a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' la grol lo mnyam pa nyid du grol// dbyings su grol lo bzang ngan med par grol// klong du grol lo mtho dman med par grol// gcig tu grol lo s+ye shi med par grol// gcig gi dbyings su 'bad med rtsol med krol// mi gnas rang dag ma
144a4(rnying rgyud): spangs rang sar grol// mi mnyam grol yang mnyam pa'i dbyings su grol// grol ba'i dus na rang grol rang sa zin// krol dang ma grol dbyings na ye med pas// ji ltar srel yang rangs rang la krol// kun kyang ro gcig mnyam pa'i dbyings su grol//
144a5(rnying rgyud): lugs zlog med par dbyings su grol ba'o// chos nyid slong bu grol lo dbye bsal med// rtsol ba med par grol lo sgrub tu med// nges pa med par grol lo gza' gtad med// lhun gyis grub par grol lo phyogs ris med// mtshan ma thams cad rang
144a6(rnying rgyud): sar grol ba'i phyir// byang chub sems la grol dang ma grol med// nam mkha'i slong na de ltar byas kyang grol// lhun grub klong la gang ltar byas kyang grol// kun kyang 'draro gzhan med ye nas srol// srang blang med de rang sar rang shar rtsol//
144a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs gcig phyogs med 'dod pa kha gting med// mnyam dang mi mnyam tsam gyi mtha' las gral// rgyu rkyen gnyis la ye nas mi gnas shing // 'bras ze re dang dogs pa med pa'i phyir// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi mtha' las rang grol lo//
144b1(rnying rgyud): bzang ngan med par lhan rdzogs bde bar gnas// mthong man med par mnyam pa'i dbyings su grol// mdor na lus ngag yid gsum rang so la// yid byed rnyog pa phyir ma 'phros// dbang po'i chags drug yul rnams la// shes shing dpyad pa'i yul ma
