168a5(rnying rgyud): gar sleb la sogs rigs drug 'od// so so'i dmigs pa snang ba'o// sa mtshams skye gnas par do ni// la la skyes nas 'chi rkyen gyi// nad kyis btab pa tshun chad do// 'chi kha'i bar dond thebs nas// nang dbugs chad pa tshun chad do//
168a6(rnying rgyud): nyi bar dod dbugs chad nas// ltu bsnang ba shang ba'o// sri pa bar de'i phamatshams na// phrad bu'i snang ba yongs jim nas// gang la rje dang spyod dad do// snang legs gdams pa'i garang bzhing du'o// rang bzhin gyi gnas
168a7(rnying rgyud): gag dpar bya// che po ma yi ba dngal// bladabyas pa rnams 'gas pa nga ba dang / // thed par bas dpa/ mas tshamadzad zhid cigs
168b1(rnying rgyud): dang ma phye gnas par dayi// shas bya'i zas zag bcad pa la// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i tham brten// zas pas kyim sgo 'jogs pa car // 'asgom pas nang ga 'dogs bcad// shas rdzas yu gyi zas pag pacang // 'dus pas sems bas pad
168b2(rnying rgyud): snang sems gnyis me dgras thag bcad// gsang bar khrigs tshod gtan pa dab be// yang gsang pod nal gtan 'angang ba// rtags tshad gdang dang ldan par rtse// zhes gsungs nas sbyin der bzhugs pa// theg pa'i phyi phreng chung chen rab 'byam rgya
168b3(rnying rgyud): les/ bar gyur rnam pa nang bdun pa dang / shi bar di'i gdan pa bstan pa'i pha'u ste na bdun pa // sa ya/ rba ci/ sems dpe' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ta ldan pa kun tu bzung // lce gnas cir dang ltar na/
168b4(rnying rgyud): bar de ji ltar 'char// ston byas lan du bka' phral pa// a ho sems dpa'i rdo nyon// 'tshokham yi bar do pa// dang po 'ching brtag cing bas+thA// ma zlogs gdams pa gsal yang gdag// 'aN+Di rtags kyi nang gas gsum ste// kyi
168b5(rnying rgyud): lhas mtshan ma ni// mu mthun chogs rnams thog tu 'byung // dbang po mi gsang tshig paze// nar dang longs spyo god pa dang // rang sams byed khyod rmi lam 'khrig/ dge sbyor mi nus 'dug mi tshugs// rmi la mngan zhing tha~Mng sbyangs 'gyur// gdams
168b6(rnying rgyud): dag myigs la tshig \u0f7f/ da 'gyu dang chags dgas// pang chad grags pa'i rtag pa yin no// nang dung byung ba'i tha 'gyur ba pa// dkyi na gi rgyagazugs ga/ gzug la na ga migasal dang // 'dag snga chags yan lagan/
168b7(rnying rgyud): ga da dbang dang shi gzugs// yan lagang rdzams pa 'dog la// bar cang kya na nang gtogs// gas pa sems la 'barab ste// zhum pa rim ma 'ing 'gro'am// rdzas myong gzugs kyi yang ston // mngonags su 'phrul nus mdzinams/

169a2(rnying rgyud): dang mchog la grib// rnal 'phyar don gnyis 'grub ma 'gyur// des na zab mo'i gdams pa 'di // gces par gyis la yid la zung // de ltar gyi nang gsang ba yi// 'chi ltas byung na bslab ni// gyi yi 'chi ltas byung nas su// bar chad yin par
169a3(rnying rgyud): da smras/ ga sa ga
169a4(rnying rgyud): nang ltar myang na ba phrab na// thag ras sa ma shing thun pa// dbyung ba rdza ming bar pon// cibs pa'i snab su khyad pacas// sa d+has rlung nam mkha' yi// rang rangs po par rjod// mu thAng a li kA las bkod// de rtad 'khor lo rdzabris pa/

169a6(rnying rgyud): chags skye mar gyung // thams ri dgas bzhin du zlos// mchog la brtan pa ma thab da // chos nyi dngang las 'gyur mor+tha// cir sdang rang gis mas yin pas// ring du dag bcad yang spangs// sems pa bltas pas grub pa mang //
169b1(rnying rgyud): 'khrul ba zhig pa yin// 'khrul pa zhig na sangs rgyas yin// skad cag da yis grol bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i 'chi ba bslu ba 'das// bdud las rgyal nas brgya'o// dus la bab stem bzlog na// skyes bu'i lus la nang btab nas// rtags
169b2(rnying rgyud): la byung ba de// 'chi ba'i dus ni nges pa yin// sa ni sa la thim pa na// lus ni lci zhing zas mi len// langs 'dug 'gro ba'i stobs kun zad// chu ni chu la thim pa'i tshe// kha chu sna chu 'dzag par byed// de bzhin me la mo thim pas// Sha sna dag ni
169b3(rnying rgyud): rab tu skam// lus kyi mtha' yi drod rnams 'tsher// de bzhin rlung la rlung thim pas// dbugs ni ngar ngar yan lag g.yob// mig kyang gyen la bzlog pa'o// rtags 'di su la byung pa de// 'di la mi gnas pha rol tu// nges pa ru ni 'gro bas na// de
169b4(rnying rgyud): tshe bla ma'i gdams ngag rnams// rang gi rgyud la 'dris par bya// don 'di rnams kyis gsal yang gdab// gal te de dag mi gsal na// rang gi bla ma bzhugs na rab// bla ma med na rdo rje'i spun// lta spyod mthun cing dam gtsang bas// shes pa gas pa
169b5(rnying rgyud): yang gdab par bya// gal te gyi dbugs chad na ni// rlung sbyang 'pho ba'i gnad byas te// gdams pa btab pas nges par thebs// gdams pa'i gnad ni 'di ltar gdab// phung po seng ge'i nyal lugs bcos// reg pa nyid ni mig la gtad//
169b6(rnying rgyud): yid dang shes pa par snang la// dbyings dang rig pa mi 'gyur gtad// sa la hri ge sang de bzhag/ sgra rnams thams cad rang gi sgra// 'od zer thams cad rang gi 'od// snang ba thams cad rang snang ngo // gsal stong 'dzin pa med pa'o// dbyings dang
169b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa ma 'gyur na// me bar de med par 'gyur// gal te dbyings nyid ma gsal na// rnams par ra 'a'od srung rnams// yang yang skya bar kha gtad bshad// btags grol byung dang gdams pa rnams// nai bar spu bu brtag la bshad//
170a1(rnying rgyud): rnyib tan thob par 'gyur// ces gsungs so// zag pa'i lce phud srung can rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ 'dzi brtag pa bsla ba dang / 'chi ba bar da bstan pa la wa// zha brgyad pa la// / sam ya/ maNama?/ rbam thaT/ ches naHsems dpa'
170a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ho 'chi kha'i bar do de ltar na// chos nyid par rdo ji ltar lags// ston pas gsan nas bka' stsal pa// kye ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// chos nyid par do zhes bya ba// de dus rlung gis rnam shes la// thim pas nang dbugs 'chang bar 'gyur/
170a3(rnying rgyud): shes nam mkha' la thim pas// lus dang sems kyi 'brel pa chad// dbugs ni bar snang khams su yal// lus po bam po nga lings kyis 'gro// rig pa me stag yal ba ltar// 'od gsal chos nyid sa ru sleb// nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim pas// phyi yis rdo ri brag
170a4(rnying rgyud): 'gag/ nang du 'od gsal chos nyid 'char// sngar gyi lus kyi bag chags kyis// rdos bcas lus 'di mi snad kyang // yod do snyam pa'i shes pa 'azung // steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus kun// bar mtshams med pa 'od lde'i zhing // phyi nas bltas pas nang yang
170a5(rnying rgyud): gsal// nang nas bltas pas phyi yang gsal// lte ma lte ma bzhin nam mer mer bzhin// mnan na nem nem byed pa snyam// btegs na 'phar par snyam pa dang // shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang // kha dog lnga ru gsal ba dang // 'phra ba 'gul ba 'grig pa dang // gsal
170a6(rnying rgyud): lhan sdug gzi brjid 'phro// rgya che khog yangs dbangs mtho ba// rtse mo yangs pa zhes bya ste// byas pa med par rab byung bzhugs// de tshe dus gnad gsum yin te// 'jug pa shes pa'i gnad dang ni// grol ba lus kyi gnad dag dang // mthar phyin rang ngo shes pa'i gnad
170a7(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa la yang dus gnyis te// rig pa 'od la 'jug pa dang // 'od ni rig par 'jug pa'o// rig pa 'od la par 'dug pa// gang gi 'od snang de dag ni// sku yi snang bar 'char ba ste// dpag med grangs las 'das pa la// sems dpa' dang ni sems mar bcas//
170b1(rnying rgyud): bdang yum kyim 'dzin capa// ma khyung 'ad tha' rabs bskor// snang ba thams cad su ma rdzur// dkyir gi steng gnas// 'a ba shin tu 'bri gcig/ lhas kun dang 'bral bar ldang // da la rang gsus pas byin// rang snang yin par nas kya na// ngangan du
170b2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa'o// bas mamatan dag la gnas pa dang // 'ad nyid dag pa'i tshur 'dug pa// yang na ga nyid nang nas// 'od rartson slad bsgril ba gtsug/ chos bu ni tshogs grags ki 'brel// de dus cho bu'i tshogs dmas// ya 'a ba //
170b3(rnying rgyud): zer rig pa la// tshur lo 'jug pa zhes bya'o// de nas grol ba lus kyi gnad// 'di yi dus na lung po lnga// bdag tu 'dzin pa dang dengs pas// lus ni longs spyod rdzogs gru dgrol// 'byung ba'i 'dzes bcas rang dengs pas// 'od gsas bde chen slong du mo'i// nyon mongs phra rang
170b4(rnying rgyud): rang grol bas// 'od gas la rig pachos phrer shid// rig pa ma la hA the mgrol// 'di dus ye shes bzhi sgor gyi// snang ba rang gi snying las 'char// dka ser dmar dang mthing ga'i 'od// snang thu brgyang ba lta bu'i khar// thig le zer dang ldan pa ni// me pho bsrung
170b5(rnying rgyud): nyar// shin tu gsal lang chor ba la// rang bzhin thig le lnga lnga yis// 'od snang bzhi ka'i steng du brgyan// de ni ye shes bzhi sbyor te// rdo rje sems dpa'akhor seng la ma// rig pa'i snga brag ces bya'o// de tshe'i char lugs brgyad 'char te// de yang rang rig ye shes padra/
170b6(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo ltar du ga bas nA// 'khor 'das gnyis bcomachud// rang 'ang dri shang bas na// blang ba thams cad na nagasa'o// rang sh+laug ltang gang bas na// shes pa 'i dzan rtsir mgor// rang rig la nas ltar rkar bas// snang ba rnams cad rang bal nyid// rang ga
170b7(rnying rgyud): med lta bang sa// rang gags brtse gcigaganas// rang ga mdzang grol ltar bas// me ba ni gang la yang miganas// sa dga' bar ba'i lta ra// l+r-i pa byad grangs sa 'gagasas// dag pa le gas lta pa ra// chom nyid ma dang za //
171a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i yul snang kun// zhi ba dang ni khro bo'i sgra// che ba rnam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// rlung ba nyung dkar 'bru gru tsam// 'bring ba rnams ni ri rab tsam// rang gi snying dang klad pa nas// thon nas da ltar 'char bar 'gyur// mang 'ang dpag tu med pa ste// mgo ban da
171a2(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs thogs// nod ni nyi ma 'brim shar tsam// sma ni 'brug stong ldir btsam// zer ni mtshon chag zi btsam// sku yis skrag cing sgra/ yis sngangs// zed gyis snang ba yang bar byed// rang gi phyogs su rngub pa snyam// de la 'jigs par ma byed par// rang lding yi na
171a3(rnying rgyud): e// rang rig yin par theg tshod cig/ mthu gnyis pa ma 'dzom cig/ nr-i rtag mab+ha theg tshad kyis// de ltar shar lugs brgyad byur dus// skad cig ma ni dang nga la// mngon par shes badrug phrag drug/ shin \u0f7fgas la bar 'char ba'o// rkad cig ma ni gnyis pa pe// rjes
171a4(rnying rgyud): dran pa drug 'char te// lha dang bla ma phye gnas dang // gdams ngag lta ba rjes su dran// 'di dus mi brjed gzungs rnams kyang // rang gi rgyud la skye bar 'gyur// skad cig ma ni gsum pa la// grol ba'i dri ma lugs brgyad 'byung ste// thugs rje thugs rje la thim ste// nyi ma chub pa'i
171a5(rnying rgyud): zer thag ltar// gzigs snang kun las 'das pa'o// ye shes ye shes la thim pas// ma bang bu tshud lta bu ste// chos nyid ma dang rig pa bya// lhun grub sbubs su 'jom pa'o// 'od ni 'od la thim pa ste// 'ja' tshon nam mkhar yal ba ltar// 'od snang lnga yang nam mkha' 'dus/
171a6(rnying rgyud): sku ni sgur brim bum sku 'dra// shes bya nang du gsal bas na// mtshan ma zhal phyag can du med// rang de rnam par dag pa'o// gnyis med gnyis med la ni ma ste// tshul chu bo thim pa ltar// gtad pa'i yul mi rang sangs nyid// mtha' grol mtha' grol la thim pas// nam mkha'
171a7(rnying rgyud): mkhar thim pa ltar// gtad pa'i yul med ka nas dag/ mdag dag par thim pas te// bla yi tshon thag bsdus pa ltar// thig le nyag gcig da du rdzogs// dag pa ye shes chen po ni// ngo bo'i phu la thim pas te// seng ge gangs la zin pa ltar// ya pa rtog pa kun dang bral//
171b1(rnying rgyud): spun grub ka dag rang grol lo// dbang ba dag ga bye brag gis// rab ni skad cig gsum la grol// 'brang na skad rtag nyer gcig gam// zhag po lnga la grol bar 'gyur// tha ma sprul sgyul zhing khams su// bar dme byar sangs rgyar// rdzas nyid bar da' 'char chung na
171b2(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs nas lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa'i skyi gud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ chos nyid bar de'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o// // sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ thob rje dang/ rang na roHgne lnga dzagasaHsems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// bye ho ston pa kun tu bzang /
171b3(rnying rgyud): nyid par de de ltar na// srid pa bar de ji lta bu// ston pas gsan nas bka' stsal pa// oM ha sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// tha med theg mchog 'dir zhugs nas// brtson 'grus tha ma gcig yin kyang // sring ba'i pang dor skang tsam las// rmi la ma sa dpa ltar gyur nas// 'di nas
171b4(rnying rgyud): sprul lu'i zhing khams su// dbugs dbyung skye ba gcig gis thogs// de nas mthar byin grol bar 'gyur// chos sgra 'di nyid ma mthong ba'i// gang zhig 'gro ba phal ba rnams// gong gi chos nyi dbang ngo la// gdams pa'i gnad me dang ma shes// 'od la 'jigs shing zer la
171b5(rnying rgyud): dngangs// kun la rtog pa zos pa yis// dbang po mar la kha 'khyal nas// srid pa'i bar do nyid du tshud// sngon byung srid pa'i sha gzugs can// dbang po kun tshang thogs med rgyu// rang lus med kyang yod snyam 'char// bya gro rlung gis khyer ba bzhin// phyad gyod yang yung kun
171b6(rnying rgyud): 'jug/ rigs drug gar lce las la spyod// de la khyad par nyi shu ste/ gzugs dang / skye mched dang / 'od dang / skye gnas/ mgo dang / tshe tshad/ mngon shes/ snang ba/ khyod lam/ ming dang / rdzu 'phrul/ las/ kha dog/ 'khor tshul/ nges tshig dang / dge sdang // gar gtogs/
171b7(rnying rgyud): ma'i las/ nyon mongs pa/ dpe dang nyi shu'o// de dus las dbang rjes su 'breng // chos nyid ma mthong ma rig cing // rang sdang dgra ru langs pa rnams// 'khor ba mngal gyi sgor tshud nas// pa dang ma yi rgya chen las// mer med nung phung por gyur nas// zla dgu ngo bahu la sogs
172a1(rnying rgyud): nas// lus rdzogs ma yi mngal nas thon// de ltar gzugs ni tha dad par// 'khor ba nyid du 'khor ba'o// de yang 'khor grags 'di lta rtsa// dga' ldan cod ldan myong ldan dang // sdug bsngal bgras ldan sdug bsngal cha// rnam pa drag
172a2(rnying rgyud): gam khams gsum du// ma rig 'khrul pa'i las dbang gis// res 'jog dag tu 'khor bar 'gyur// de dag rjes su 'dzin pa'i phyir// btags grol gdams pa gces par zung // zhes gsungs nas lhan nir bzhugs so// theg pa'i lci phung klong chen rab 'byams
172a3(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyud las/ srid pa bar do'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya// sris rba ro ba ren keHsa man+taHrgya rgya rgyaHsems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ho ston pa kun tu bzang // bar dor 'khrul gyis dogs pa yi// sems can rjes su gzung ba'i
172a4(rnying rgyud): gyir// btags grol gdams pa gzung zhes pa// sngon chad ma gsungs gang ltang lags// thugs rje can gyis bka' stsol cig/ ston pas lan du bka' stsal pa// kye ho rig mdangs 'khor rnams nyon// btags pas grol ba'i gdams pa 'di// 'on
172a5(rnying rgyud): dbang po ma tshar cing // rgan gzhon pho mo dge sdig med// bag chags bzang ngan med pa ru// 'di nyid bcangs pas sangs rgya'o// rnga ma dbugs la sleb kyang grol// sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin sras gcig yin// e ma 'di 'dzin skal ba che// 'di ni rang rgyang
172a6(rnying rgyud): chen po'o// de yi 'dri zabs bstan pa ni// gser gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa// lte bar sku gsung thugs yig bri// oM AHhU~M/ radrug dag la yi ge drug/ deru yig drug bkod par bya// a Sha ha sha sa ma/ 'khor ba dang sngags yig drug yin// yi ge drug gi don
172a7(rnying rgyud): rtogs na// gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud chen khrol// yig drug don gnas mya ngan 'da'// thams cad yi ge drug pa rdzogs// yig drug rigs drug dong nas srug/ 'bru gsum gru gsum rangasar grol// chos nyid rang sme dag pa'i tshig/ btags grol
172b1(rnying rgyud): tshig ba nyar drug 'di// rigs drug klong grol zhes su grags// e ma ka ra ka raM/ masta b+ha li b+ha li/ sa mi ta su ru su tsa/ kun d+ha la ma su ma su/ e ka la su li b+ha sa ta ye/ tsakra ra b+hu li ta l+ya yAM/ b+he ti sa na d+ha g+hu la yAM/ sa ka ri 'dra kaki ni/ ma ta ra b+ha ta na/ par li ha sa na/ ma
172b2(rnying rgyud): khar ke la na// d+hu ra taM/ me ka tsa ra ta ma ba/ su N+ya g+ha ta ra/ e pa sha nan pha ran b+hi ti/ sa g+hu ra la sa/ ma smin sa su te ta ya sa/ g+hu ra g+hu ra pa ga kher na laM na ra na ra I tha ra ba ta laM/ sir na sir na/ d+he sa b+he sa ra sa pa laM/ b+hur+d+ha shud+d+ha b+hud tshi sha baM kyi laM/ sA sa/ ri rI/ li lI/ i I/
172b3(rnying rgyud): mA mA/ ri rI/ swA hA/ kun bzang yab kyi dgongs pa'o// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rig pa nyid// gzhi med rtsa bral nyid du grol// cho ga par nyer brgyad rdo rje'i sgra// rang byur rang shar nyid du grag/ mas+t+ra b+ha li/ sa mi ta su ru su ru/ kuN+Da li kun+ta li/ I ka ri la b+ha ta ye/ tsata /
172b4(rnying rgyud): lita l+ya ye/ sa maMn+ta tsaH/ su b+hA ye/ d+hi san b+ha thu yI/ ke ri d+ha ga na/ rta ka ma ha d+ho ri/ ta na d+ha ra ba'i te/ sa na khar d+ha ke lan/ sa b+hu da ra ta/ e tsa ra sa taM/ tras su N+ya/ b+ha t+ta ra a/ ma na sa ra b+hi ho/ ting g+hu ra la/ ma skr-i nas bu ti la/ ta la g+h+r-i ra dA pa na kha bar d-i paM/ ma nga
172b5(rnying rgyud): ra laM/ i tha pa tha la/ si ra s+thA sir pA/ b+he sa ra sa sa laM/ bkai l-i/ saM sa/ ri rI/ lil+lI/ i I/ ma mA/ ra rA/ kun bzang yum gyi dgongs pa'o// Sha a ha sha sa ma/ thig le klong drug pa'o// tsheg bar brgyad pa rdo rje'i sgra/ a A/ i I/ u u/ rI n+di/ l-i lAM/
172b6(rnying rgyud): e i/ o o/ aM A/ yab yu ma gnyis med dgongs pa'o// tsheg par brgya dang rdo rje'i p+la/ ka kha ge g+ha da/ tsa tsha dza dz+hanya/ Ta Sha Da D+ha Na/ ta thad d+ha na/ pa pa ba b+h+ra ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaHphye 'gag gnyis med dgongs pa'o// chog par bcu gnyis rdo rje'i lnga/
172b7(rnying rgyud): oM ye d+hanA he tu pra b+ha wA he tun+ten+da D+hathA ga to h+ya la data te ShA mo na ro ta e waM bA dI ma hA tra ma Na ye swA hA/ bstan pa mi 'gyur dgongs pa'o// rig stong gnyis med dgongs pa ni// thig le rtsa lnga 'di nyid do// dbang por zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// karma ragra g+hi hiti/ phung po bzhin pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ b+ha garan
173a1(rnying rgyud): dag // tham btsunadapa rnag pa // thug ma sa sa mas pasu 'a gyur// ram pagams paH// b+h+ya gnasasu dpang byo/ nga sa/ phyogs dus pa // togs ga
173a2(rnying rgyud): byon dang gzhug pa'i myi/ aik+She rak+Sha ga / 'khrul ba'i rang rgyad grangs pad gyir// ya~M ri mra rbas g+hu li/ rigs drug rim gyis bskal ba'i phyi// ya mi dar rlung pa la swA/ 'khor ba dong nas 'don pa'i phyir// mam go lo sa maH/ chos can bur drug zug pa'i phyir/
173a3(rnying rgyud): sa su / na
173a4(rnying rgyud): phyir// badzas rkyen ma// sa la mangs gcig pacad pa'i phyir// d+hI na sa d+har dA ma yi// 'did byed rta/ byangs brgyad kya// seMrbA 'i// phu ga sem sa mdu na byor// sems ga ga N+DI// snang ba mang nas mablang ba'i phyir// rapas mamaH/
173a5(rnying rgyud): yI zhen pa thag bzad sbyir// dasdig pa la kA lis// bas na gtan chen po'i sa gnan gyir// nya cha ba yang sa autaM// phrin las mtha' sbyin pa'i phyir// kam maM ka a r+thas// sangs rgyas mdon zhen rlog pa'i khyer// sa twa ma ya karbaH/ rgyal sras rnams kyi gnas btsal
173a6(rnying rgyud): gir// ngal khA pa kI li sa/ rig tor gnyis su med pa yis// dbyings nas rang byung rdzog tu grags// kun bzang yang yum gnyis med kyi// dgongs parang kyang rang ga nyid// ri res grol bar nus paH// chos nyid rang shar rang grol ta// thig le hi buHlAb/
173a7(rnying rgyud): gas grol jig la chen po zags// rgyud kyi meng nyid dmas ste// yang gas tha med nying pa brgyad// yangs sa labs rigs kyi// gang zag labaci pa 'byong ba// da ma la ba tsam na// khyil po lamasa' rnam nyid de// rigs sug 'gros
173b1(rnying rgyud): bcad pa dang // 'bar ba dang nas sngags pa dang // 'phrul snang gzhil bzlog pa dang // ya shes rang mdangs ston pa dang // rang rig rang gsal grol bar phyir// bstan pa gang la babs pa yis// ran chen 'azhu ba'i thabs kyi// rab gnas mchor ba stad chags 'ab
173b2(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur chung ba klag phu la gdags// chos nyid par da rig la bar nges// gzhan gyi don chen bya 'dod na// mtshan ma byung ba'i dus dag tu// phyogs mthun kye yis 'di bklags na// zhes kyang rang gzhan thams cad grol// de nyid 'das tshe gdung bsregs na/
173b3(rnying rgyud): 'da' zer mo 'od du pa'i rtags// nam mkha' dngas shing blang med dam// yang na 'ja' 'od nam lnga 'jigs// de la gdung rigs lnga 'am gcig/ sba la sogs pa nges par 'byung// sangs rgyas spyi lnga ye shes lnga// g+ha 'di bzungs shing bklags pa
173b4(rnying rgyud): gdang tshad mang nyung ngas brjod// 'ami dus dpags la slebs kyang tshig/ khams gsu ma 'khor bar gal la thams// sems dpa' rdo rje ca la khyad kyis// ma 'phrul gzung la gzhan la gyur// 'khor 'dong grags thong pol po// des gsungs nas ldan
173b5(rnying rgyud): thugs pa// rtag pa'i rnyed kyad na kyi nad dam/ brtags thal ma thang thal ci da kyi pas ste gcig pa/ sa sa/ #/ ra sadam+'ur+k+ka/ nas sams dpang ma
173b6(rnying rgyud): pa 'du // dgas pa// tsiha~M// yang grol ka ga sun ci babang // brtags grol gdags pa de ltar na// galas pa na pa gang yin pa// bdag sa gsa' khor la bka' tshal cig/ de sa ston pas kang yul pa// yaho ga mad sa 'khor nings nyon/
173b7(rnying rgyud): na
174a1(rnying rgyud): bzung ba nye rbartsa lnga yang // ye shes rtswa bus war grol// chos nyid snang ba dang lpags la// bam po rnams kyang rang grol la// 'bad bas golab ma yin tu// ma nyid nas na grol bar gnas// ltabs ma bltar rgyas nyi dag pa// skom pas
174a2(rnying rgyud): nga chos can thob// rkyod byas pa brgyar snang bathob// 'bras zas ma bcings ri'i lugs zlob// ngobos su rba rgyas te grol// rang bzhin 'od du rgyas te spel// thugs rje zer du byas te grol// su gsung 'dzin pa rang sangs nas// rdzo dza nyid kyika dbul/
174a3(rnying rgyud): rangs zin nas chos zad de// gdong mang ka dag tid la// 'khrul med tsam du brjod pa med// de bzhin ma 'khrul ba yang ce// de ltar 'khrul ba gdod nas dag/ gzhi rnang chen po tad pa// ma rig pa zhes ming ba ngas// 'khrul pa gab par yod pa man//
174a4(rnying rgyud): ming dun grags pas// zlos brtag dpral pag la yod// thams cad rang grol chen po'o// gnad kyis grol bas 'bad stsol zad// ye nas grol bas bsgyur mi dgos// dang pol yin pas snying po med// gcer grol yin pas mthong bar yal// yongs su grol bas
174a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin dag/ dus kyis grol bas bsgom mi dgos// rang bzhin grol bas ma bcos gsal// zol po zhes pa tha snyad do// rtogs dang ma rtogs su yi chos// de mgrol zhes su la dmigs// khams gsum 'jug dag la srid// srid mthang bral ba 'chos nyid do//
174a6(rnying rgyud): blo la yin pas khyad par 'phags// ngang grol yin pas yul rkyen zad// gcer gro ba yin pas rang sar dang // mtha' grol yin pas chu bzhi 'gags// gcig grol yin pas du ma stong// thams cad grol bas gcig tu 'dus// rkyen rnams rkyen gyis grol bas na/
174a7(rnying rgyud): danags pa'i chos la de 'i gnas// phul rnams yul gyis thal bas na// tha snyad chog lang mi rtog/ sems nyid sems kyis grol ba la// mtshon byed gral ba rang miganas// drims drim pa drung bzhin// de bzhin dag pas dag pa 'dra// 'dod chags nyid la
174b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags rgyun// rigs mi mthun pas grol mi 'gyur// de phyir gzhi gnas rig pa la// gzhi la ma 'bras bu thams cad rdzogs// rang rig nyid kyis rang rig grol// yul snang nyid kyis yul snang grol// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la
174b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// nyon mongs ji ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtogs papo// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po sangs rgyas rgya med pa// yi shes mig gcig dri ma med// thams cad rig pa'i ngang du rdzogs// mngon sum thabs la gang goms pa// 'di ni lces bus mang
174b3(rnying rgyud): 'phangs bzhin// tshur la zlog par ga la 'gyur// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// lhag ma med par sangs rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// rtags dang mtshan mar 'tshang rgya'o// don la thams cad rig par rdzogs// sna tshogs rig pa'i rtsa la yin phyir// rig
174b4(rnying rgyud): pa nyid du grol// rig stong ngo bo chos kyi sku// de la snang ba ma 'gags gsal// gsal stong rjen pa sangs rgyas yin// byang med pas 'bul ba sangs// 'od lnga gsal bas ye shes rgyas// rtog pa med pas nyon mongs sangs// tog med rig pa mkha' la rgyas// 'dzin pa med pas zhen pa
174b5(rnying rgyud): sangs// dmigs gtud bral bas su gsum rgyas// zhen pa med pas rnam rtog sangs// 'dzin pa'i yul med 'od lnga rgyas// chags pa med pas ma rig sangs// don ldan rang snang 'bras bu rgyas// de phyir rang rig sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med// dkyi nga
174b6(rnying rgyud): lha dang dam tshig dang // cho ga phrin las la sogs dang // sku gsum bu lnga la sogs pa// bskal ba zhing gi rdul snyed rnams// rig pa ye shes dang du rdzogs// rdzogs zhes tshig gi bla dgas tsam// a ho sems dbang rdo rje nyon// dri med rdzogs chen brda' khyab rje// mkha' nanyanam rdo rje'i phu la phyed/
174b7(rnying rgyud): stong pa yang dag lus su rdzogs// sems sogs 'dzin pa'i chos las grol// skye med yang dgago ba nyid// ma bgyid rig pa mkha' lags la// phye med sdong du yang dag 'dus// 'gag med klong du de bzhin gshegs// rnam dag sun ldan mngon sangs rgyas// stong pa stong pa'i yul lag nas//
175a1(rnying rgyud): dag pas dgang ded kyil 'ang rnyed// e ma dang snang dge mdangs nyon// ra ba'i chas rnams stong bar rdzogs// rang bzhin chos rnams gas pa 'ang rdzogs// thugs rdu'i tshas rnams ma 'grags rdzogs// skyugasar rang ngagagazhag la// rang tha rang ngag pa
175a2(rnying rgyud): ska ba yin gyir yul rnams rdzogs// rang dag yin gyi ras la ma rdzogs// rang rig yin gyir shes bya rdzogs// rang bya ba yin gyir 'bras bu rdzogs// rang sangs yin gyir sku rten rdzogs// rang rtogs yin phyir chos nyid rdzogs// rang gnas yin cir byung lung rtogs// ra rtseg
175a3(rnying rgyud): gyi dus gcig rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po'i ngo bo la// rang rdzogs rang grol rang sar brdal// don rnams skye med dbyings su rdzogs// chos rnams brjod pa'i cho ga dang bral// yi ge med pa'i rigs par rdzogs// lung rnams bstan du med par rdzogs// ma na ngag brjod pa bral bar rdzogs/
175a4(rnying rgyud): grub pa bya byed med par rdzogs// smod pa ma bcos gnas lugs rdzogs// sgom pa rang gsal 'dzin med rdzogs// lta ba ma 'gags zang zi la rdzogs// 'bras bu tshig chod chen por rdzogs// thams cad mi gnas klong du rdzogs// gzhi ni ye shes gsum du rdzogs// pham ni sgra wa ye she
175a5(rnying rgyud): 'brag bu phyir mi rtog par rdzogs// ye shes snang nga ma 'dres rdzogs// rig pa bdag 'dzin drang bar rdzogs// thams cad klong na yangs pa'o// zhes gsungs nas lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi gyi phreng klong chen rab 'byams kyi rkyen las/ mthar thug 'bras bu grobs chen po bstan pa'i le
175a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa go// / sa ma ya/ rgya rgyaH/ 9 nogag ga wenaHsems dbang rdo rje yang gsol pa// kye ho ston pa kun du bzang // khyad kyi che ba gang lha ngags// de skad thugs bskul bka' yul pa// a ho sems dpa' de rjes nyon// rgyad chen ltar klong yangs // gsang sngags kun na
175a7(rnying rgyud): gsang chud chen mo zhes su grags// rdzogs chen kun gyi phrag yin pas// srog rgyad chen mo zhes su grags// tis kyi yi rgyud yin pas// skye byad chen mo nos su grags// dgongs kun gyi don khrelabs// dgongs don chen mo chud ces grags// brda chos kun gyi rgo byed pas// 'di byung chen mo na su
175b1(rnying rgyud): grags// tshig dang yi ge ris su gsal// stan brgyad chen mo zhes su grags// theg pa ma lus kun 'byed bas// gsal bar byed pa'i ma long yin// rab zab rgyam glong yangs mtshan// blta ba'i mo long dgongs pa yin// sdug bsngal lha mtsho skams pas te// skal ldan 'brel tshad chos mu grol/
175b2(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i yang snying a ti zer// dgongs pa ma lus khrol ba'i klong// nam mkha' lta bur yangs pa'i chud// mngon sum rang gnad gcar log tu// sangs rgyas ston pa'i rgyud chen pa// a ho sams dpa' rdon rtsal// bla med cad 'di ma shes par// nyams su len 'dod theg pa rnams//
175b3(rnying rgyud): lam la zhugs pa'am// mun khung nang du mdzub g.yugs 'dra// rgyud 'di shin tu dkon pa ste// sngar 'das rgyal bas 'di ma gsungs// da lta'i rgyal bas gsungs pa de// skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag gis// rgyad 'di mthong bas bsnyen bskyab zin// tshig 'di thos pas rang sar grol// lung 'di
175b4(rnying rgyud): snang bas gtan la phengs// don 'di bltas pas 'dzin chags bral// lta ba kun gyi mthar thug che// de yi phyir na gsang rgyud 'di// 'dzin 'a chang skyes bu skal ba che// rang rig rtsal gyi dbang pob ste// byung 'di reg pa tsam gyis ni// kun pa mang de dang skal ba mnyam// rgyan du gus par byed pa dang /
175b5(rnying rgyud): bor la sogs 'chang ba na// tshe 'dir thun mong dngos grub thob// sprul pa'i sku ru nges par 'gyur// phyi ma par do med par grol// 'di nyid mchod cing bstod pa na// dus gsum bde gshegs mchod pa dang // bsod nams yon tan ma tshungs pa'o// rgyud 'di su yis bklag pa'i mes// lta ba'i don kun se
175b6(rnying rgyud): 'char// dngos grub rnam gnyis char ltar 'bab// 'di nyid su yis bris pa de// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung la rol// tshe 'dir gdung dang ring bsrel 'byung // gyi me sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur// rgyud 'di gang na gnas pa na// mkha' 'gro chos skyong sprin ltar 'dra// lha dang lha mos mchod par byed// de nye bu yi rgyad
175b7(rnying rgyud): chenang de// sems dbang rdorje khyod la gtad// gdul bya re la gsungs pa'i chos// khyod kyis kun latshim par ston// gsang sngags nang na ches gsang ba// a ti chen po 'di nyid ni// theg dman snod la bsten mo gyi// snod dang bstan la gdan phan long // 'das pa'i yon tan dge bkun// ma 'ongs
176a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i 'pheb 'breb brjod// da lta gdams pa cha ba yis// da yi rgyal tshag khyod kyis gyis// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud 'di// bstan padam pa khyod la gtad// khyod ning yi snying por byung // nga yi rang bzhin 'di zung zhig/ khyod kyis smra ba'i se ge gyis// sangs rgyas
176a2(rnying rgyud): mes khyod kyis kyis// khyod kyis sems can pha ma gyis// bstan pa'i snying po rgyud mchog 'di// nyan thos la sogs theg dman la// rlung phyogs tsam yang ma brjod cig/ tshig 'di thos nas dadangs skrag brgyal// gsang sngags skyi la yid phyung nas// rnam phrin dmyal ba mnar med lung //
176a3(rnying rgyud): bstan cing thos pa'i glags med do// blta ba'i rgyal po don gyi snying // man dag kun gyi rtsa ba 'di// ser sna che la dad ba chung // rnabs zos na bzhed pa dbang // lag tu thob na zong du che// don du mi bsgom tshig tu red// brel med thabs kyis 'dod pa la// yul khams ster yang mi sbyin no//
176a4(rnying rgyud): thos med shes chung tho tso mkhan// man ngag gdeng du ma gyur par// nga che slob dponas 'dzin pa// skad pa bye phrug rum pa 'dra// de la rgyud 'di'i skal ba med// dam tshig nyams dang rdzun po che// slob dpon bka' bzhin gcig mi byed// gzhogs dom byed cing rang che 'byin// d+hamargu zhing chos
176a5(rnying rgyud): rnams bslu// byi lam nor chung mtshad rnams rdzogs// ngang chung man ngag sA 'tshogs byed// bzhed pa mtho ris byang chub bzhed// gshegs pa na rag dmyal bar gshegs// de 'dra'i slob ma snod ngan la// theg pa'i bcud 'di shin tu gsang // nyi zla thang la lhung gyur yang // skad cig tsam
176a6(rnying rgyud): yang ma bstan cig/ dam nyams po la byang chub med// sdig po che la mtho ris med// ser sna can la man ngag med// 'dzin chags can la thar lam med// shes pa'i sgo dog thos pa chung // nga rgyal kha 'dor khengs pa dang // sgom sgrub 'dza' gad dbang du gtor// lta ba med
176a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i ras tshod mkhan// dam tshig nyams pa'i gzu lums mkhan// spyod pa rtsid pa'i the tso mkhan// kha yang gtid thung do dga' mkhan// man dag med pa'i btsan sbyor mkhan// snying rje med pa'i btsan sgrol mkhan// thar lam nub cing dam gzhun shor//
176b1(rnying rgyud): gdanas cad 'di bstan na// tha tubabadabang bskam ma// ka nga dbyam par byung // dngas kyang 'dringam par drung // ban pa'i thalan 'du gyur // nga ba dad pa pan rdzun 'ag/ dam ltar 'dza byung
176b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma da ngag gzhing du spyod/ mtshan te ngang tshul bzang la shes// yongs la 'phrug yangs dag pa med// rang gos ngas nas gzhan mo thod// dal cing spong ba nyid chags pa// gam byed log can rnang por srung // dem la ga nas kau
176b3(rnying rgyud): nyams len pacan// bka' ba den thang bying don dang mthun// don nadu mchog 'ang marjod// rdzurngan tha pa dang nyon yo// gcig las sa mangs kun legs pa// zhes gsungs nas chos rkye kyis thong yang sa gang pa'i chen po'i nga nyan na grag so/
176b4(rnying rgyud): rang 'as sgrub pa'i 'khor sems dpa' rdo rjeng nyid ston pa'i thugs kang bi ma ste/ ston pa nyid kyang mi snang bar gyu // sngagasung grags ci ba rnams kyang / rang snang pa yid ches/ zad pa chen po'i ser 'dza // ka dag rang ser rin nas/ khams gsu po
176b5(rnying rgyud): grol/ ler ba dang nas zhugs sa// theg bdun gyi yangs sa/ blang can dpa byams kyi chud papa/ mdug dan yangs sa btid pa'i 'a bcug surang // / snyam pa/ saH/ gsanas gzungag sa
176b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzi/ thed pa snyen gyi kyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi chud/ 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las/ rdul du blang ba rdzogs so// / dpal ldan chags kyi srang ma dang / gtang bdag ma ni de na ga ngas/ bka' 'di phungs shig

177b4(rnying rgyud): thug phrad dang // tshol ba rjes med dmigs rjes med// gtod phur ngag gi man dag gis// gcod byed don gyi 'khor lo bskor// gdams ngage sdong chen bgyad pa la// yal g.yo 'dang du mar smin// dper na 'dzam bu rdo k+Sha bzhin// 'bras bu
177b5(rnying rgyud): pa du ma 'byung // de bzhin man ngag re re yis// 'gro ba'i rang rgyad grol ba'i lam// dper na gser 'gyur ci bzhin du// dug rnga ye shes chen por 'gyur// sdug bsngal bde ba'i klong du 'gyur// deng gyur de gsal bdag gis ni// man ngag skad kyis bshad pa'i
177b6(rnying rgyud): don// klong dgub ma po hrI l+le nas// gdams ngag brgya dang brgyad chu banyis// mi rba rgyag mtshan don 'thob nas/ gsang ba'i den gcod 'jar lo bskor// re res 'gro ba'i rang skyid 'grol// rig pa'i mdzod 'dzin du khyag pa// phreng dpung ma tho tiT+Ti nas
177b7(rnying rgyud): ming gdam sa dag bcug nyis nyon// rig pa cadag co nga po nga bskor// gro ba'i rdzu sgom/ nadan cag rnam la// thang dbung ma nyinyi nas// zang mi gdams na mam/ 'a byedas bar ma bgyur
178a1(rnying rgyud): 'an 'a nga ga// rgyu can thos pa rtsol ma la// rlung dgrangs bcananas// gdams dag bdudu macan gyis// bas pagatan dag ca ma ma bkas/ ras na 'a du nga dang
178a2(rnying rgyud): sgom theg pa'i da mi gsel la// klong dgra ba ma po nyi rmi nas// gdams ngag dbu 'acu cha brgyad cis// tshad ma rgyad gcod 'khor lo bskor// ri ras 'gro ba'i rang chud 'gro ba// byang sems klong gi rtsa ba la// slong dgu ma'o d+hi'i nas// khab mo'i gdam

178b2(rnying rgyud): kun gyi rtsa ba la// klong dgub ma po hi khri nas// zab mo'i gdams ngag nyi shu yis// bdag 'dzin cad gcod 'khor lo bskor// spyi bcings don gyi che ba la// klong dgu ba ma po hi khri nas// gdams ngag nyi shurtsa gnyis kyis// rtag chad cang gcod khor lo
178b3(rnying rgyud): bskor// ma rig 'khrul pa tshar gcod cing // yang dag don la dgod pa'i phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i rtsa ba la// sdong chen brgyad kyi 'khor lo bskor// bdun brgyad rtsa bdun sprul pa 'gyed// bdag gzhan zhen pa rang sa dgrol// rig pa rtsal gyi gyi sdong po la//

181b3(rnying rgyud): yun tu bslab na mthong ba sprin/ yid// gang yang mi 'gag de med de mi 'byung bar kun 'byung snying po 'di// su skyong su 'dod su bsgoms su bsnyen de la de mi gnas// rtsal po phu gu le nas rgyal bzhin 'di yang gnas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyis

181b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i klong 'di gnyen po yin// theg pa kun las rtsal sbyangs 'bras bu'i lam 'dod kyang // ye nas sgron ma yangs pa'i snying po 'di ma mthong na ni// rgya mtsho'i chu klung mthong yung / ma grir shi ba bzhin// snying po 'di ni zla zla me long yin te ma bstan gsal//
181b6(rnying rgyud): ltar snang yang de la g.yos pa med par gnas// dper ni rgyal mtshan mthon po rgyal rtags yin bzhin du// theg mchog 'di ni theg pa'i snying po yin// dper na myu gu med par sdong khrung yod mod bzhin// ye nas med pa mi skye mi 'byung bde ba'i klong // chos 'di
181b7(rnying rgyud): nathong ba rgyuni sangs rgyas yod mi 'byung // dper na myu gu sde'u nyid 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ltar// mi skye mo co la bsrub med snying po 'di nyid ni// rgyal ba rnams kyi myu gu nyid de sangs rgyas 'bras// bya med klong las nyams pa med pa cho ga'i mchog/ gang yang mi
182a1(rnying rgyud): tha ma nas pa sgo sa // dgas su seM 'a sa ga nga sa // na gas su son// sa pa ma gas myu babyung pan sa pa ga// gang sung na sun
182a2(rnying rgyud): mthar byin med// ye nas phyag rgya snying po mchog 'di rgya ste 'bras bu yin// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa kun rdzogs ye shes rgya na// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs dri med yangs pa'i klung // drang srong ba sbom 'dod pa yis 'di mi mthong // 'di mthong mnyam pa'idun
182a3(rnying rgyud): 'azhugs srid pa na de las med// rab tu mthong ba dka' phyir n+ya bran tsa ma dzA tshol ba bzhin// gcig gi snying po 'di la rtog gas theg par byed// theg par bye ba 'di nyid yin te 'di med par ni la ma mi rnyed// la me rnyed pa zla'ang 'khrul po'i lam rings glang po rngab rlung 'ang /
182a4(rnying rgyud): thog gu yal 'dab 'byung ba nyid ni rtsa ba'i skyabs// de med par ni de 'byung mi srid phyir// chos kyi snying po 'di ni mchog gi rtsa ba yin pas so// sku gcig shin tu bsgoms pas 'di las nyams// gnyis bsgoms pas ni rtog mtha' mang ste rnam grangs pa// 'di 'dod mangs pa
182a5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa dag la rten pa de la byang chub med// lam rings la ma la des bskyod pas ni mthor stsa lam mi rnyed de gol// de yis sangs rgyas mdzad mi srid de byang chub ba ting nas med// 'di 'dod pa la 'di mi gnas te rtog pa'i spyong // rtog pa can la dron ma snang ste sdug bsngal \u0f7f/
182a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul 'khor snyoms 'jug ye nas med de blang ngor med// byang chub chub kyis phyogs pas 'di rnyed 'di mo ldang // byang chub 'dod bde la ye nas 'di mi gnang // sa bgrang byis pa'i spyod yul sa yi mchog mi nyid// gnyis 'dzin pa la yangs pa'i snying po med de rtag pa'i rgya//
182a7(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod de/ stong gsum 'jig rten ye nas bsgral mi dgos// pa mnyam ye sangs rgyas zas bskal du gdod nas dag/ mchog gi snying po phyag rgya chen po'i su// sems ni rdo rje nyid cing
182b1(rnying rgyud): gzhi tu mad// thang chubs mang tud dunan ma d+hA gang yang 'byung // namam pa gas tas gan sung man// glags la lta blan rnam par grol ba'i sra// thams cad bskyed pa'am nga lta dpag bas ma shing // ma lus lus pa med pa mchog ga yul// ye thab las du /
182b2(rnying rgyud): bgro grags mang// 'jug lta srung spyod 'bras bu thob par yongs mi dod// 'dod pa de nyid rdzogs pa chen po 'di'i sgrib chen yin// sbyang gzhi btsab pas rnyed pa'i yul mod de// ye nas phyir mi dgos pas khams gsum ye sangs rgyas// tshig gi spyod yul dbang po ro
182b3(rnying rgyud): me rung // bsgom zhes 'di la gdags su med pa yin// bsgom du dngos po med de tshig tsam mtshon du med// dbyings med ye shes gsog ste ngag gi sgru ba sgrib// ci yang med pa ma yin med pa'i snying po yod// ci yang dmigs yin dmigs pa'i snying po yod// mi bta
182b4(rnying rgyud): ri 'drar mi bsgom pa snying po yin// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying po med pa las ji ltar rdzogs zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos thams cad spyan gyis rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du 'arjod pa
182b5(rnying rgyud): ched du brjod do// kun 'byung rang rig byang chub sems nyid 'di// gzhan nas ma btsal gang na ye nas med// brjod pa'i tha snyad med pas byang chub ste// nam mkhang nor bu 'di la kun rdzogs te// phyir yang snang phyir dkyil 'khor ji ltar snang yang 'di la rdzogs// gzugs med snying
182b6(rnying rgyud): ga rgyas na snang yang 'ad la rdzogs byung yi sa sa rgyas mthas g+sa// 'a pa ga da sa pa rjod// na pa d-i nga mtshan med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi na gyis ma rdzogs byu ma
182b7(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings su rdzogs// chos rnams thams cad thig le'i klong 'dir rdzogs// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid kyi thugs pa rdzogs// lta ba khyung chen myang ngan 'das pa mi// mchog gi snying po 'di lam lus rdzogs// de phyir rdzogs pa chen po zhes bya ste// 'di las yon tan
183a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i gzugs brnyan no// sgrib pa gol sa nyid ni rnying bar 'ongs ma gsungs// ku rdzogs 'di ma mthong bar rgyal ba 'byung ma sred// de nas bcom ldan 'das ladza rje 'dzin pas/ rdzogs pa'i snying po 'de bsam par byab ci mchis nas gsol bas/ gnas brtsom
183a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// mi bsam mi g.yeng mi bsgom mi dmigs par// de bzhin snying po 'di la dmigs sgra yong min pas// 'dzin pas mi gzung de bzhin rang bzhin bzhag// bsam pa rtogs yin gyi
183a3(rnying rgyud): ci yang bsam mi khyab// grub pa'i mtha' mi spyod pa bsam pa'i mchog/ yul dang dbang por mi 'byed lhag par bzhag/ dbang po yul la yan pa btul mi bya// yul la ma gzhig ye nas de bzhin nyid// ji bzhin yul la de bzhin mi 'byed pa nyid mchog/ kun bzangs yangs pa'i mkha' der
183a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad lam gyis rdzogs// khru byug dus bsrung nam bla dgos bsrub ltar// gzhan gyis ji ltar ring rgyud srungs te gzhung bstegs kyang // dgos don rdzogs chen ma grub par du byang chub med// de kyir rnal 'byor don la 'jug pa rnams kyis kyang // 'di la mi bsgom mi btsal rang sa de bzhin/
183a5(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ phyag rgya sku ru bsgom pa gol sa yin// rgyu 'bras gnyis su 'byed pa 'khrul pa'i lam// bden pa gnyis med de bas ming yang med// dge sdig gnyis med sdig pa byas pa mchog/ sbyor ba'i yul med snang srid ye sangs rgyas// gang yang mi skye mi 'gag cir yang dgengs su med//
183a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i yul du khyen pas de bzhin nyid// cis kyang bsgob med pas nam mkha'i klong // de bzhin gyi nar ma bcos de nyid rang bzhin bzhag/ bde ba chen por rgyud las/ gsang ba'i ma nangag gi snying po rdzogs pa chen po nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'jon pas
183a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lta ba zhes byang ji ltar lags/ zhes gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// lta ba'i klong nyid 'di la sus kyang dpyad du med// song ba'i bsam gtan pa nyid lta bas ta mas/
183b1(rnying rgyud): yaM zhes spyi thugs pa la lha mi mda'// rnam rtog bdud yi na rdo rje 'chang ba nyid// khyung chen mkha' rlabs gcod ltar khyad par che// mi ldog ye shes mchogs 'di yang dag/ ye shes phrags 'di kun gyi 'gro khung ste// mi gnas gnas med mi rtog yangs pa'i lam// gang bdag tan
183b2(rnying rgyud): la 'di gnas ma yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos mchog tu dges pa'i mnyam nyid ces bya ba ji ltar lags zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kun gyi gsang mchog dgyes pas na//
183b3(rnying rgyud): duny-i rtag tu bzhugs// de ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig tu rab tu che ba'i sku// thams cad ma lus mchog gi bla// kun sbyor mnyam yin dag pa ste// ngo bo nyid kyi mthur ldan pas// chags med chags dang bral ba'ang min// sangs rgyas ma lus mnyam sbyor phyir// dang
183b4(rnying rgyud): yang ni mi dmigs so// kun rdzob gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po nyid// rtog pa nyid du rnam par bzhugs// byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs mchog/ bzhugs bsam bdud las rgyal la sogs// kun tu sku dang theg kun dang //
183b5(rnying rgyud): la sogs te rtsibs gnas// rin chen ral gri brla dang // rdo rje gan te 'khor lo ste// ut+pal spos tog me mar dri// sreg shing me long la sogs la// ngo mtshar sgyu 'phrul phyag rgya ni// 'khor lo las ni sna tshogs 'byung // de nyid 'dod chags 'dod tshogs bral// 'jig rten gsum
183b6(rnying rgyud): dang khams gsum dang // dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang // rnam par grol dang ma grol dang // mnyam dang mi mnyam la sogs pa// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bskor// rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i// dkyil 'khor me lus bsam yas dang // 'gro ba dag ni ma lus bud//
183b7(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings dang mi mnyam pa'i// dam pa rgya mchog ma lus phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad ma ma sbyor ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// byang chub sems nyid rdo rje lte// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// dpa' bo mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas dkyil
184a1(rnying rgyud): ma / sa na su bya// na / sa / mnan ma su can
184a2(rnying rgyud): ma pa'o// des 'dzin pa sa gas pa// bcom ldan pa 'bangs can pas// zugs ni na mdzon// sags 'i bas/ ga yang bsathams par sduchags par kyang khyo dzin pa snyoms par thu na/ 'di de dag dang / chog
184a3(rnying rgyud): ngang sa dza la// datogs pa pa ste byed pa/ 'ang ga marnams dag pa dang // bdun nas mam nas med min// sems pa tu ga mtha' bsamams pas// yang sangs tha ci yang 'phrul// nam 'ang ba dan ci bye nga dpa// na pas rji bye
184a4(rnying rgyud): gsung mi thogs pa bab// ra 'bros gzhan gyi zag pas gol// dun kyi mar 'di byung // dral bas des gang bra gnis bye yang // bsags dupa 'i da namang 'jur/ tan thal la gyi/ gas bang rdzo gang ba //
184a5(rnying rgyud): na// nga gsumang ba kun pathas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyar ba'i// mgon po smrab med dag pa me// dza bathul dkyil 'kho ldan gyis sug// brtan 'byung kyi la du rtag pa nyid// yang dag yon tan canaH// blag nyis btang ma ngos smi
184a6(rnying rgyud): bar mi byer/ byisi pa'i ma yin/ da byung ba shes bas nad pas/ grol nas thal pa'i lam pa skye/ bde ni da pas/ gsung ba sa gi shertogs pa nyid ces 'a lam ba ga
184a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das tha pabang bas sems dpa dkyil ba stan pa'i ting nga 'dzin pa snyams par thugs nas/ cad du med pa dkyang du da// gas pa'i jig 'du min pas// ye gas yang dgas pa 'ang // bcas dran
184b1(rnying rgyud): sems can thos med ma skyes pa// kye mi skye yi gros spangs pa'i// 'byung dang 'byung gyur rab sbyor ba// mchog tu rtag par sbyor ba'o// rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag/ 'od 'byung nam mkha' 'dra ba yi// rgyal mtshan 'bar ba btsugs pa ste// 'od ldan nyi mes dbang bskur ba'o//
184b2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi longs spyod dag pa 'byung // kha 'byed pad+ma dmar po'i mchog/ 'dod chags de nyid gsang ba'i mchog/ thams cad gsal byed bdud rtsi'i sku// kun bsgyur dbang phyug yang dag ldan// de bzhin gshegs tshul khu tshur bstan// sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs che// dge ba'i phas
184b3(rnying rgyud): chen khyad par skad// kun 'byung thig le mchog nyid 'dzin// ma byung mi phye'i snying po la// sgro btags chos kunag pa yod// ye nas byar med bya las 'das// rig dang ye shes rnga snyad pas// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i mnang ga rigs
184b4(rnying rgyud): so so yang tha snyad yin/ mi 'gyur ba'i rigs su 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u skye lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das bsrung ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// dam tshig nyid dang spyod pa dang // lha chags pa dang phrin las dang /
184b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang ni bsti na skyes// rdzas tshan lnga dang nyon mongs lAM// thabs chen nyid kyi dam tshig pa// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis cu// bre med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mig cad// yang dag la ma du zhugs la dga'// gsang ba'i don byer smra mi bya// yan pa ga da
184b6(rnying rgyud): lnga gnyis ts+tsha// lnga gnyis phrag gri re re la'ang // mkhas pas bcu phrag gnyis gnyis dbye// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la yang // shes rab stobs dang ldan pa yis// bcu phrag gsum gsu ma ra re la'ang // rmongs pa ma yin gsal bar byed// dam tshig nor bu rin po che// sa ga zhi
184b7(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho grub// phyal ba gcig pu stong pa rdzogs// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// chub pa ga nas pa bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// rgyan ci log tu rnam brtags kyang // mdor bsdus dam pa ma lus pas// grol ba rang byung gzhan las min//
185a1(rnying rgyud): bdapa can pa ma pas/ gsupa'i man gradam rtog ma las par bstan pa'i la gyi ga pal// danas pacom ldan 'das can tu ba rang brgyan kyis pakang myang pa tab 'anganas snyams par thugs nas/ rlud byu ngad pa 'ang kyad du da//
185a2(rnying rgyud): gshegs rgyal ba'i sgra nyid la// dpag med grib tu mi rung gyir// gyon gyis bgo na med pa ste// 'dod chags zho sdang gti mug can// nga rgyal phrag dog kun spyod pas// bla med theg pa'i mchog nyid la// mchog tu gyur pa'i sgrub byed pa// rdo nyid mchog de blan med// rigs pan
185a3(rnying rgyud): gdopa pa sme sha can// theg dman ltab log pa dang // ma rabs rmugs zhugs pa la logs// gsang ba'i don du sgrub pa rnams// theg mchog 'di las 'grub par gsungs// mtshams med lnga dang dam med dang // rkun po cho me rkun dam ga dpung dpon// sdig pa'i 'chor
185a4(rnying rgyud): bsgyur ba dang // bla med theg pa chen po yi// theg mchog 'di la bsgrub par bya// srog gcod dga' dang g.yems pa dang // gzhan gyis mabyin blangs pa dang // brdzun dang sgra dang brnab sems dang // rtag tu 'dod pa spyod pa rnams// bla med pag pa'i snong du bsngags// ma grin bu ma
185a5(rnying rgyud): byed cing // gshang gcizas su za ba dang // dge slong bsam gtan dadrug skur zhing // lha khang mdo sde sreg byed de// dam pa'i chos kyang 'dzin par byed// skal ldan skyes bu de nyid dang // yang dag sangs rgyas dbyer med de// tshogs chen gnyis dang rdzogs par rol// shan pa
185a6(rnying rgyud): thogs shing // 'gro drug gnas su dag byed pa// thar lam dpa' bo byang chub sku// sangs kyis kun gyi gshegs shul bde// tog me mnyam nyid chos kyi skye// gzung bas mi zin nu blang na// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis// a li ka li zab tu bstan// ma maH
185a7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba// chos bdag spyod pa rnam par dag/ gtsang rje med par kun za zhing // snying rje med par kun gsod de// mthong ba'i yul rnams sbyor byed na// de nyid theg pa'i mchog ces bya// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag bla na med pa'i theg pa spyod pa'i le
185b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang / danas bcom ldan 'das kun zang pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la thu ba dang ga gang gcas mdzad nas rgal po yin pa nga 'dzin pa snyoms dar zhugs nas/ chad du bdod pa 'di cad du brjod do// mdzag gsum sa gsum dgel kharang la// na sus
185b2(rnying rgyud): mi bya// 'dod yon lnga pos mchod bya zhing // bdag las dkyil 'khor med shes te// dkyil 'khor bdag ngo bdag nyid la// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas gshang gci yi// lus bslus za zhing mched byed pa// des ni rigs rnams kun ma nyes te// lha mo rnams kyang tsham 'gyur ting //
185b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba'i phyir// nges med stong gsar snod rnyeng du/ gshang gci mi gtsang khu khrag rnams// snod ldan mkhas pas rab bkang ste// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor chen po la// nyin nub reng dbral bar bya// lnga ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes grar nas// rigs
185b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ma lus 'grub// bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong // dpag tshad 'bum pargya'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bskyed khros bsdus bkod gsal byas nas// mchod pa la sogs sar ngang sdod// mangs pade mchod pa phul byas la// byin gyis mi brlab mi mnyes te// grub pa 'a
185b5(rnying rgyud): dbyin mi 'gyur// thabs mkhas pa yis bdag mchod pas// 'brur brgyad dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang // kun 'grub dngos grub chen po yin// bdag mtsho dkyil 'khor ldad par yang // dkyil 'khor khrog nyer cha lugs kyi// jo bdag chen por lugs bzang nas// yi ge mngan
185b6(rnying rgyud): gyur na yang // zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba min// bde ba chen po'i byung bas/ gsang 'a'i man ngag bdag nyid la bdag nyid kyis mchod na/ dkyil khor spyan mchod pa yin bzhin/ mi rtog pas mchod pa'i le'u ste btud po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das don dam pa'i da
185b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin ma snyems par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de nas gsang 'dzin rgyal po yis// gsang ba'i don 'di gzung bya'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das la gsol btab ste// dam pa bshad par zhu gsol pas// dbang phyug dam pa kun bdag gis// sna tshogs
186a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsum du bsgom// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// phugasung thugs la longs spyod do// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i// rdo rje mi 'gyur brtan pa'i sar// bla me shes rab gcig tu mtshungs// pa shing thar pa ma sbya byang
186a2(rnying rgyud): spong bas sems cad thams cad gsod// khams gsum 'gul ba kun bsad nas// mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu// rigs mchog rgyal po rdo rje'i skye// ngo bo nyid gtsang gos pa med// kun rdzogs byang chub spyong mdzad pa'i// rlabs chen sangs rgyas kun mi chad// gti mug
186a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor rab bsgoms nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor der// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sogs// zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod chags dang // brag dog la sogs dkyil 'khor la'ang // rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rdzogs// dam pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga nyid du// dpa 'dod
186a4(rnying rgyud): bslar na bskur nas dang // rig 'dzin sangs rgyas mchog 'dod pas// lnga pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di las 'byung // de dag thams cang nye bar bsrung // mi byed phragasung thugs ldan pa'i// 'dod chags la so gas dkyil 'khor 'di// ribs kyir mchog yang dag ste// gsang sngags
186a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// bdag med ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsang ba'i don bsgrubs pas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'arlab bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams bsgom// dkon mchog gsum po gang mchod pas// rdza ba'i dkyil 'khor ba rten bya na// mchog gsum
186a6(rnying rgyud): 'grub cing snying po yang // brten pas ye shes thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di la blod man pa// lta ba log pa'i 'du shes can// ngan phyugs rba zhing sangs rgyas spong // sngags kyi sgo dang du spyod pa// de ni lta ba'i don mkhas te// sngags kyi spyod pas sbyor ba'i mchog/ nam mkhas kun
186a7(rnying rgyud): gyi rjes 'gro ste// chos kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'ang // nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khongs su 'dra// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma spangs pa// dkyil 'khor chen po yi sangs rgyas// rnal 'byor de pyod skal pa bzang // bdag dang gzhan don mi byed pas// sgyu ma srun du ba yul la rol// rang
186b1(rnying rgyud): dkyis 'khor rab la rdzogs// mi len mi 'dod nam mkha'i dang // rnam par mi rtog dkyil 'khor las// kun rdzob sgyu ma rol pa yi// gti mug dkyil 'khor bstan pa mtshar// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag don dam pa'i de kho na nyid las/ nyon mongs rnam par
186b2(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos/ dngos grub phud pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor med// dngos
186b3(rnying rgyud): mchog gi/ snying po ni// bcom ldan 'das tI rbo yi sku// sr-i thal rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gsang sngags snying po kun bsdus pa// 'gro lnga la yangs bdud bzhir ldan// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// rang sa nyid na mi dmigs te// gang na'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid// skye gsung
186b4(rnying rgyud): thugs te rdo rje'i khru// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' klas par// sangs rgyas rgyal bas btsal dka' bas// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor hUM du kun 'dus phyir// tsit+ta hU~M Ta rnam par bsgom// dang gzugs hUM ru rab tu brtags// hU~M gi dkyil 'khor nga
186b5(rnying rgyud): bdog rnams la 'phro bsabs ma// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal ba'i ga// s+thi de ma thag/ sku gsung sngags kyi rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo hU~M de dbang phyug mchog/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// skun mas snying ro rdu la 'dus// yo ge mchog tu gyu ra da hUM// phung
186b6(rnying rgyud): dbus na 'od 'bar te// zhig pas rdo rje rtse lpags la// thal ba'i snying po rdo rje de// rdo rje che mchog rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje snying po brtan pa la// 'khor lo la sogs 'dus pa ste// hrI bzhi dkyil 'khor ngo mthong mede// zhig pas sangs rgyas byang chub lam// 'di ni dngos
186b7(rnying rgyud): chen te// 'das dang rtsa 'ongs da ltar dang // 'byung bar ma nges sangs rgyas la'ang // gsang ba mnyam skyor dngos grub ni// yi ge zhig tshul 'di las med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed de// dngos grung don chen 'di las med// rdzogs ldan dbang po'i phyir mkhan gyis// dbang
187a1(rnying rgyud): na no mi ga ga zhan bad+hA kun ga sanas/ dzin pa ma rnags papa/ gas banas ma gas pa// dran gas sto su pa na// ma padang phra ga la/ 'am ba tha mngo
187a2(rnying rgyud): 'oso grub rnyed dka' ba// shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub// ming tsam gzhan pa brten 'dra yang // mngon sum bde ba rang las 'byung // bde ba chen po'i chud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag mtshan ma'i dngos bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i dngos
187a3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das bsgom du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du bzod pa 'di ched du brjod de// sangs rgyas byang chub gang bsrub pa// yi ge med pa'i rnam blta// snying po med pa'i gsung ba bteg
187a4(rnying rgyud): chub tshul mchog bde chen te// ye shes rdo rje sprul pa ni// sangs rgyas rgya zas mi byed pa'i// yi ge med pa'i chos las byung// de gyi skyes su sprul pa nyid// sku yi ma lugs ngas mi gnas// snang med don pa dang ga mi lang // chos kyi 'khor po dam pa ni// sal
187a5(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa rtogs tshul du// snang med snying po mchog gi su// yi ge med pa'i rgyud las grags// sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin dang // ho na rdo rje kun gyi thugs// ye shes la can snying por steng // gsang 'di mongs pa yi// 'byang sa kun cing mthu dang // yangs
187a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'dra ste// cing yang mi dmigs gti mug dang // ngus bani'i sangs rgyas ma lus kyis// bskal pa gsum du btsal gyir kyang // sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// lugasang thugs ldan lus da ces// snang med 'o ngas sa bas mdzegs/ @
187a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpas kyang // sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog/ dmigs med nam mkha' lta bu'i dbus// sangs rgyas dkyil 'dzor dam pa nyid// dmigs sa med parnyed nas rjen// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpang yi// gagongs pa ming bya dang tang snyom par
187b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi snying po me sems shing // phyag rgya'i mchod pa mi 'dzin te// yi ge rnga sa la ma chags nas// mchog gsum dri ma med pa'i mgon// bsam gtan nyid du 'dus bsam pa// snang mdzad ye shes pA la sogs// sangs rgyas nam 'kha'i khams mnyam pa//
187b2(rnying rgyud): nus mchog gi gnas su bsgom// lugs ma la sogs phyag rgyal// rnam par grol ba'i lam la gnas// gzhi des rgyal ba'i lam rnyed na// thams cad phyag kyi ringo bor gnas// ye shes dbar ba'i gzhal med 'ang // gdan dang mchod par bcas pa nyid// ra
187b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po la// ye nas rdzogs te ngo bo ba gnas// mnyam pa'i snying po ngo bo de// bstan du yod pa ma yin pa// bzhin 'byung gyul mi gnas te// me long dag pa nyid la gnas// kun sbyor gsum gyi snying po la// mtshon du med pas rgyal ba'i lam// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil 'a
187b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od su// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te// mi dmigs btang snyoms mnyam bzhag na// sangs rgyas yang dag mchod dang 'dra// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid la// ma btsa' bzhag dang rlom pa yin// de dang der ni rnam btsal na// de las de bzhin don ni
187b5(rnying rgyud): khrung // yang dag sangs rgyas la ma ring 'gyur// nang dang phyi rol don nyid la// chags med gnas pa med pa yis// de la gang 'gog zar lam mchog/ rdo ni mi byed gsum bsgom pa// rdo rje sems dbang tid du 'du// de la reg na tshwa phrin gyis// gleng dzin mi gtor tshul dug nas/
187b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin po'i byad pas/ gsang ba'i mnang ga dngos po 'di lta bu zhig bsgom du yod ces bstan par ma gsungs pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byang du med pa'i ting nge dadzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// byang chub sem
187b7(rnying rgyud): sku// bka' ye 'khor lo rab ba skor bas// srug sum sku ni ma yin te// gang yang mi phyed de je'i sku// dbye ba mthar grangs spros bdag med// bla ming tshig las 'das pa na// rang gingo bo brtan du med// 'dzidam me dang pa' ba'i mthob pa// sangs rgyas sa la spyang med dgos// da
188a1(rnying rgyud): mdas nyid kyis dag/ dejitheg pablan med// ma byas pa la mas rnams la// dang sa por bstan par ma gsungs to// thab ba rnams kyis bzung par bstan// es rgyas rnams mal ldan pa/ nga ban// byang chub sems dpa sa ra
188a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// shes rab bla med mchog gis// sngags kyi rgyad pa mchog spyod rnams// chos mchog mi g.yo ba nyes 'dod na// 'dod pa ma lus brten pa ni// chags pa'i ye shes 'dod la rjod// sa rnams kyang ba mthar na nas// de la me long na zla bzhin// drang ba nyid la
188a3(rnying rgyud): 'phel 'grib myed// sangs rgyas myong ba thab byas cang // 'dod pa'i yon tan brkyen par 'grag// gzugs la cags med chags rgal nas// rang ba sngal dgas par bya// pa nyid byung med pa gang ngas// bskal pa gad+ha byi skang kyi// 'bri bsam gyi se me pa /
188a4(rnying rgyud): zhing dang grub pa blor byed pa// thugs kyi bdag po rnapa 'byor pas// byang chub mchog zla bsgo maHsa te// da cig yad kyis kun bsad na// thal ba rmel ba'i mas smrang+yas// ngan bad thapangs na// dan dpa yang dag zang rta she// dAng dang ma snar tsal thal ngas
188a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad rang bzhin med par 'i// lham mig yo la sogs thal// rtog pas bzang ba'i sa lus 'das// ltung zas dbyer zed mnyam pa'i rtsa// rta dang mthil ma po phyogs tan// rang rig ti la thunagapa pa sa// rang rig da yang 'di 'ang zhes// gzhan la brtan du med pa
188a6(rnying rgyud): da// rang ba tu byung rang bzhin pa ga// man+ta dang pa las 'das pa gyum// N+Das rgyarnal// b+ha dang she ga pa b+ha snying ngogs med pa dasol// na na pas dadang // bang 'ad sgru pa la ba
188a7(rnying rgyud): nga // bcwam zhi dajig pa'i rgyal mdangs// pasam ga tan lung la gnas pa min// nga nas me drug shes me 'o// ched mganan kyis 'angs su me // gcig pa thang po gnas dang // rangs rgyas na mas / sa kya rgyad /
188b1(rnying rgyud): shA nas par // yunas pa na 'ang mas// na po dganas// na pa pa chud pa// das rtag sog su pas/ pa lags rlo na/ nam thong na pam ngas pas// das 'a sa
188b2(rnying rgyud): mchog tugs pa'i tshis nyid do// rlu ba dgazhan la thos kyi 'gyur// don nyi sa dbang po mi byeng // das tshu ma med/ da bu pas pa 'o/ gas di// di byen pa med pa do// gas
188b3(rnying rgyud): sa pa 'das gangs tu dang ma pa brten pa'i ba gyi // che mdzod/ des che pa 'arnam pa 'o// bstan pa zhung rje zhen pom bta pa // bam ldan pa sa pan nyin du'i byung
188b4(rnying rgyud): mas par rdzogs nas/ rjod pa'i dri mang du mdzod/ ya kyipa pa rgyas nying// gsu mangs byed pa// don shes lam na sangs kyi/ kyi 'dzi par blta pa gsung drugs byed pa

189b2(rnying rgyud): pa rnam pa bzhi pa yang // gcig la bzhi bzhi da bye bar bya// rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbye ba med pas bstan pa'i mchog/ kun gyis rdzogs pas nye bsnyen po// thams cad sbyar ba bslab pa nAM// thang dor med pas bgrub pa'i mchog/

189b4(rnying rgyud): sems bde ba dang // bsnyen pa slab la sogs dkyil 'khor yang // de ni der sgrib gyen chen yin// byang chub yan lag kun gyi'o// cha lugs bgrom pas sgra zla bzhin// ma chags ma gos 'byung 'gyur yang // bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul 'dra/

194b2(rnying rgyud): med ngang du thag chod pas// nyon mongs gnyen pos bcos su med// gangos pa can ci chos min pas// ji bzhin de bzhin gnas pa yin// nga med bdag med rgyal ba'i mchog/ kun rdzobargya 'bras rnam par dag/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste// thams
194b3(rnying rgyud): ma lus bde gnas so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// dbyings dang shes rab tha snyang gcig/ ye shes 'byung 'jug sems yin pas/
194b4(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom gyis te// nyon mongs las lnga sgo bkag nas// rang rig rnam tog sang ba yis// lam lnga ldang ba nam rtog yin// rtog dang me rtog gnyi ga med// gnyis med de nyid yang dag lam// theg pa bsam yas ma lus pa// de bzhin nyid
194b5(rnying rgyud): hrIs ma brjed pang // rnam par rtog pa mtha' yas pas// blo yi rig pa'ang de bzhin te// so sor 'tshams par kun legs la// bla med rdo rje theg mchog nyid// thams cad rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir// rgya mtsho'i glong du chu 'bab bzhin// a mtsho'i cha yi na
194b6(rnying rgyud): nyid// mu bsdus rang bzhin 'dus bzhin no// ngo bo nyid 'di theg pa'i mchog/ skyematsho mad+ma rin po che// rdo rje 'am par ma gu nyid de// ji bzhin nyid las ma g.yos par// srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od bzhin du// bde

195b1(rnying rgyud): tharas rbang kyang // rtog pa'i mtshon ma so sor snang // yang nad mchog lta bur 'dus// dmachog lta ba'i don rtogs na// sgra dang ye shes bsam ma khyab// rang rag ye shes don togs na// rgya na med pa'i g.yung drung thob// 'dod chags na sdang gti mug kyang //

195b3(rnying rgyud): mi gnas pa'o// nam mkha' rtog pa sgyu med cing // rtog pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra// mi chags nam mkha' bskyo bral las// rang don chen mo nam mkha' byung // bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i mnang ga lta bar ngang mtshig gi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
195b4(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor nam 'i gnyid kyi don ba rkang du gsol// zhes gsol ba tab pas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis gdon pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin

200a1(rnying rgyud): dka' thab dka' ba spyad mi dgos// sa dang rtsol bas btsal mi dgos// 'ad na ye shes bla med pa// bgrang zhing 'jug chags bya ma dgos// 'dun tha med kyi las 'das// ba.ad dang bsgrub pa bu ma ga /
200a2(rnying rgyud): don ma phye bde ba'i klong // mchod pa rgyal ba mchod du med// 'di ni rgya la mchog rdzogs pa'i sgo// legs ma tshon par bya mi dgos// 'di ni rang bzhin gsal ba'i 'od// bskyod dang bkur dang 'bur mi dgas// 'dzin sang pa bgyibs la/

200a4(rnying rgyud): mtsho'i klong bzhin thams cad 'dus// gang yang dngos yod ma yin te// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang // snang ba nyid na gang yang min// theg pa sna tshogs kun spyod kyang // dngos med de nyid yang dag nyid// dpa' bos mi tshugs 'bras bu'i mchog
