200a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dbang phyug dang // zhing khams rgyal ba ma lus kun// rdzogs pa chen po rdzogs chen po// bsam 'das brjod med mchog gi lam// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi brgya// grub pa mchog gi tha snyad la// sgo dang sbar dang rnam pa ye nas rgyal
200a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i rnam dag sde// rgyas sa rgyas so khams gsum yi sangs rgyas// brjod du rdzirjed du man tan dbang phyug 'di// brjod pa'i tha skad las 'das brjod du med// sgom pa nyid ni rtag pa'i rtog pa ste// me bsgos me btsal rang rig nyir gyi sku/
200b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin de bzhin de bzhin gyi mthar gzhag/ gzhag du gzhag du'ang gzhag pa med pas na// gzhag tu med pa'i gzhag sar gzhag la gzhag/ gzhag pa gzhag pa'i dngos po rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs// 'di zhes bstan du sangs rgyas nyid kyis
200b2(rnying rgyud): med// bde pa chen po de rgyud las/ gsang ba ma na ngag ltar med pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ji ltar lags pa bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas
200b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde dbang kun tu bzang pos/ ji bzhin nyid sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho sna tshogs kun tu ngo bo nyid// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// rang bzhin
200b4(rnying rgyud): dbyer me gdod nas mi phyed cing / ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin// dus gsum srid gsum mnyam pa'i snying po nyid// ye nas kun bzang shes rab mchog gi dbyings// dbye bsal med phyir bzang ngan glang dor med// bdag dang gzhan du med byed
200b5(rnying rgyud): snying po ye shes nyid// snying po ma mthong shes rab ma sbyangs pas// gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba// bdag nyid gzhan du tshol bas mangs mi bya// de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing // las
200b6(rnying rgyud): du 'dod pas la ma la bgrod 'gyur ba// bzod pas 'dod sar phyin par mi nus te// don nyid skrag ma lus kyang mi mthong ba// shes shing bsgrub rgyu ci yin gang gis shes// bya byed las 'phags kyi nar 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la spyod pa byang
200b7(rnying rgyud): grub spyong par 'gyur// rtog dpyod blo yi mtshan ma ma spangs par// dran med mi spong 'khor rgyu mi 'byed do// dngas snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la// 'di zhes don la mtshon du med pa'i phyir// blo yi rig pas don la su myong ba//
201a1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i sprin la mngon gzugs gyod pa yin// nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na// sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par mi srid do// rnam par dag pa'i g.yung ngur sangs rgyas la// thams cad ye nas mnyam
201a2(rnying rgyud): gnas rnam dag cing // mi rtog sa ler gnas na rtogs mdzad pa// bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir// ma bkag pa las rgyu zhig 'gyur med pa'i// shes rab bla med rgyal ba ma bcos lam// dpyang med dpyod bral bdag 'dzin thabs
201a3(rnying rgyud): stobs bral// mkhyen gnas ji bzhin bdag nyid chen po 'di// skyes kyang 'di 'dra bstan par gsungs ma yin// ji bzhin pa nyid byang chub yang dag lam// blang dor med pa'i skyes mchog bla med pa// mi g.yo 'du 'bre la med pa'i shes rang gzungs//
201a4(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i ye shes yid bzhin nor bu gter// bstan par dka' zhing don du pheb mi rung // me long gzugs brtan tshul du sus snang ba// dam pa nyid ni 'di 'dra bstan du med// gti mug tshul du shin tu gsal rig med// lcags kyi rlom bu theb kyis btab pa bzhin//
201a5(rnying rgyud): nor gzungs dam pa khyad par bstan pa dka'// gyi nang mi sgrib gsal ba'i snying po 'di// thams cad ma nor lta ba ji bzhin nyid// 'khor ba ma spangs sdug bsngal byang chub lam// lha dang blta bar bya spyod yul las 'das// ye shes sgron ma 'dzin 'khrul
201a6(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa// thugs rje chen po rol pa'i ye shes 'gyi// bsgom dang bsrub dang bsam dang brjod las 'das// ji bzhin pa nyid sangs rgyas sangs rgyas pas// ji bzhin pa de de bzhin de bzhin blo// brtan zhing mi 'gyur dam tshig chen po yin// ye
201a7(rnying rgyud): nas yangs pa'i snying po sgron ma 'bar// ngo mtshar rmad byung rol pa chen po 'di// bye bral nam mkha' ji bzhin ye nas yin// ci yang mi dmigs gti mug rang nyid las// rang rig ye shes 'bar bde ma thugs// ji bzhin pa des sems ni mtshungs pa'i lam// /
201b1(rnying rgyud): 'grob kun gyi rang bzhin bzhin myed// migs bsad pas 'khrul ba mir// sman nyid sman ma tshogs pa ji bzhin te// rang rag ya shes ma 'gyur ba ba la// tsa nang gnyis nam gnas bzhin nyid// 'di zhes bstan pa dka' bas par na'ang nad// ba
201b2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ga ji bzhin pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du rjod do// ye shes dbang rdzogs rang bzhin
201b3(rnying rgyud): tshal po nyid// dbang byed 'khor lo mnyam gnas chags med gzhi// rang rig rnam gsal ye shes dbang bskur dang // de bzhin nyid la rang rig de bzhin gnas// de bzhin nyid de bsam yas 'du 'gro nyid// pra ya~M lha ste sna tshogs dbang bslar sku// srid
201b4(rnying rgyud): gsum dbang bgyur rang rig rgyal po des// rang gi snying po ma lus mchog gnas byed// gang yang bskul bar bya med las 'das dang // de ni ye shes snying po mnyam dbyings klong // kun 'dus rol pa mdzad pa dbang gi mchog/ dbang rdzogs gti mug ji bzhin bya zab
201b5(rnying rgyud): lam// sangs rgyas dkyis 'khor ma lus rgyal ba'i sgra// sgra lnga ye shes lnga dang dbang lnga chas// 'du shes 'du mi byed pa mchog gi mchog/ dbang gi 'du mi byed pa mchog gi dbang // sna tshogs dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dkyil 'khor mchog/ mchog gsum
201b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par gnas pa dbang mchogs/ 'das dang mkhyen lha ma ngas kyi// bsnyad mang yang yaM nas mi gnas te// kye dang 'gag pa med par rnam brtags ni// 'di na dus gsum chen po sbyor ba'i sgrasku// gdod nas mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med// gcigs
201b7(rnying rgyud): du ma med pas phyogs su thal// tshogs kyi can rnams ma tshang bar bkram pa'i dbang // sun rdzogs rang bzhin gnas pas 'drim pa'ang med// spyan gyis gnas pas mi bsdo ma bas mazhing // gdong nas dag pas brdung sa yin pa'agyur// 'du mtshad
202a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis khyad par mchog tu yang // rang bzhin ldan gyis grub pas dbang gi dang // sku gsum ya shes byu bas dbang yang rdzogs// lhag pa'i bsam pas dbang lnga gzung ba med// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man na dbang
202a2(rnying rgyud): skabs kyi le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po nyid la/ rdo rje chos rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ bsam zhing brjod du med pa'i don bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pas/ bcom ldan 'das kun ta dazang po sa ma du
202a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// bsam 'das brjod med dang la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa'i ston pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// kun gyis lam bsngags dpe med la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi snying por gyur pa dza
202a4(rnying rgyud): nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// bya bral mkhyen ldan klong la phyag 'tshal lo// ji bzhin ye nas mkhyen ldan sul phyag 'tshal lo// sa la rnam grol tshul khrims la sogs kun// spyod pa mchog gyur pade gshegs rnams kyi yum// kun mtshungs rnam grol mchog de
202a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid// phra zhing shes dka' kun gyis lam ste mi rtog rtog las 'das// de med mi 'gyud de phyir rnam grol mchog gi lam// mi dmigs mi gnas spos med pas ma kun dang // tshig gis mi phebs dbyings dang kha dog dbang po'i spyod yul min//
202a6(rnying rgyud): bstan cing brtag par dka' ba brjod du dul tsam med// 'di zhes bstan pa'i lam med gcig med du ma med// tshad mas gzhigs nas don gyis 'grub par zla ba nyid// khyad par grol zhing ngo mi da min lags bral na// sngon gyis drang srong bskam mkhan bskum pa
202a7(rnying rgyud): nyid du gang 'dod pa// rba sgram chags lam gyend kyis zin pa yin// sbed pa'i mtha' la don gyi lung med 'a khrul pa yin// chog gi mthang srud lam du 'dod cing mthong ba yis// de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs sdig tu sgeg pa 'dra// shes rabazab mas tha med
202b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas tshol ba rab tu sra// gzhan nas ma yin de nyid yin te mchog tu 'dod// yang dag byang chub lam ni tshig gis mtshon du med// yang dag nyid du mthong na 'khrul pa ste// dag dad ma dag gnyis med mtshungs pa'i lam// rnam pa cing yang mi 'byed ye
202b2(rnying rgyud): shes gti mug dang // ngang gis mi g.yo mi bskyod ting 'dzin rgyal por gnas// 'di ltar mthong zhes mthong ba'i dmigs med mngon sum mthong ba'i mig/ de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i lhan zhes de la bya// mtha' dang dbus med yangs pa'i rang bzhin zhes/
202b3(rnying rgyud): mi len mi spong mnyam pa'i rgyal po 'thob// sems dang bag chags gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs// 'dzin pas ldang zhing brtags pa'i chos kun la// mi 'dod mi spang rang byung de nyid de// rnam pa cing yang mi dgos thabs kyis de la rol// kun dang mi
202b4(rnying rgyud): mthun yongs kyis spong ba'i chos// nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams med lnga po yis// rnam dag lam der zhugs pas mnyam pa'i rgyal po 'thob// bud med la sogs kun kyang spang mi byed// nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams med lnga po yi// lo rgyud don nyid tshad ma'i
202b5(rnying rgyud): glogrong bzhag nas// ting 'dzin gsum po brtags shing grub pa'i mtha' spyod pa// rtsol bral lung las gol te 'khrul pa yin// bya bral lhan rdzogs bde ba'i yul la gnas// ye shes rang byung che ba'i snying po nyid// mi dmigs mi g.yo bsnyad pa kun dang thal
202b6(rnying rgyud): bya bral zin pa'i lung la kun tu ji bzhin gnas// ma skyes mi 'gag nam mkha' lta bu'i dang // 'di zhes bstan du med de thig le gcig gi sgra// sgo zhing bsdub med de thang lam dam pa nyid// mi tog rtog pa med de shes rab thabs bral bas// mtha' med dbus
202b7(rnying rgyud): med snying por gdags pa'ang med// mkha' bzhin ma bcos slabs ma yul las 'das// tshad ma'i don chen dpe bral rgyal ba yi// yang dag byang chub klong de 'di zhes bstan par dka'// kun tu bzang po nges pa'i bde chen pos// de nyid de bzhin de ltar bzhag
203a1(rnying rgyud): nas ni// de la mi col btsal du med pa'i phyir// bde gshegs yum de kun gyi rgyal ba'i 'od// skal ldan yi ges ma mtshan tha snyad bral ba de// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi su las 'das mi srid// ji ltar spyad pa kramata
203a2(rnying rgyud): po'i ngang yin rgyal ba nyid// bsgom zhing bsgrub tu med pa rtog pa bla med pa// tshig la mi chags rna bar thos mi 'chang ba byang chub lam// gang la'ang mi brten mngon sum lta ba med pas spyod pa'i mchog/ don dam thig le dbyings kyi ming dang bral bas pa rnam du
203a3(rnying rgyud): med// drang srong bsgom mkhan chags pa'i lam rdo myed cing zhen pa gol ba'i lam// dgon pa dben bzung tshig la 'byams klas med pa 'khrul nad sel// sman pa'i rgyal po mchog chen de ni khyad par lam la mkhas// 'di yis nad sel rmongs dang g.yeng ba lam du
203a4(rnying rgyud): 'jug cing gso// gso mdzad sman pa byang chub sems dpa' bde mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag gi skabs bsam 'das brjod du med pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
203a5(rnying rgyud): gyis bsam du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// skye med byang chub sems ni sna tshogs gzhi// 'di zhes mtshon du med pa sangs rgyas sra'o// grub pa'i mtha' la spyod pa med pa lam gyi mchog/ bsam pa gang
203a6(rnying rgyud): yang yod pa min dgongs te// byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas rang gi sems// sde tshogs glog bzhin snang yang de bzhin gyi nang bzhag/ bsgom zhing bsams te bsam pa'i yul la gzhag/ bde gshegs rang rig dang byung rang zhing zhog/ gang yang mi byed de bzhin
203a7(rnying rgyud): snying po la// ci yang mi sems de bzhin bsam par bya// bsam pa'i snying ba gang yang med pa de// yul las mi btsal gzhan nas btsal mi bya// rang rig snying po rang rig klong nas btsal// rang rig de yang nges par gnas btsal nas// gnas pa de yang grung
203b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshi ga las 'das// grub pa 'di zhes bstan du med// bsam zhing mi bsam de bzhin bsam par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mchog tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ tshe dadu brjod pa 'di chad du brjod do// yad kyis 'jog
203b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung na// de ni bla med snying po yis// bstan du med pa'i chos nyid la// 'da' bar mi mdzad pa yi klong // yang dag snying po mchog gi lam// shes rab thabs kyis gzung du med// phyag rgya mi 'phro sra pas 'das// ye nas phyag rgya mi snang bas// dang
203b3(rnying rgyud): dgongs su gsol mod 'dod pa min// mi dgongs pa nyid dgongs pa'i mchog/ nye bar rtsol min las 'das pa'i// byang chub med pa'i thabs chen ni// bsam yas rgyal po stang dmyal gnyis// drang zhing dam par mi 'gyur ba'i// su mi snying la 'od 'bar ba'i
203b4(rnying rgyud): de la chos kyi snying po yod// 'phags lam mi ring lhang de'i lam// 'phags pa rnams kyi khongs na gnas// lung bstan mi 'byung ba stan du med// yang dag sangs rgyas de dkyil du// sprul pa po yang bzo sangs rgyas// e ma ho tha snyad rdul tsam med pas
203b5(rnying rgyud): sgo skur med// nyan cing dmigs bya'i yul med pas// bslab par bya ba yod ma yin// byang chub sems la gting dpag med// ji snyed brjod pa'i yul las 'das// ming du gdags pa'i rten med pas// sgo phugs ma 'khrul dam pa'i mchog/ bde chen
203b6(rnying rgyud): rnam gnyis bsgrub mi dgos// yi ges mtshon du rdul tsam med// e ma ho sems kyi spyod yul 'di// brtag par dka' la yod pa min// drang srong rnams kyis bsam du'ang med// ma bas dzas thig le spro med pas// byang chub yin zhes bsam mi rung //
203b7(rnying rgyud): ye nas mnyam gnas snying po'i mchog/ sa le bar yang bsam du med// khron pa'i chu klung mi g.yo ltar// gzhan gyis g.yo min lta ba la// 'di zhes lta bar mi byed na// des ni mchog gi snying po thob// 'thob pa nyid kyang 'dod mi zhi// lnga po 'bar ba
204a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dgas/ sazhes cigasags pa sa smran// byas pa pa ma nga smrab pa// sa mtha ba pa 'ad/ sa byad d+hangs susu spyod// bsam pa ma 'asus panasas pa // ga ba
204a2(rnying rgyud): 'das// de kyi sems pasangs rgyas med/ nang nas ma gsos bcal ba'i gnas med do// bde ba chen po'i byung las/ gsang ba'i sanang gags ma gang da ma med pa la du ma nye sa pa'o// / de nas pamam ldan 'das mis thams ci
204a3(rnying rgyud): du na pa snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa di ched du mdzadang// emamam pa des bzod pa'i byings kyang chub lam mi nyid// mig ya rang bzhin gnas pa'i ldan chen mazas na// drug gsum dadakyis 'tshe ba'i blag yang med// dazla to
204a4(rnying rgyud): lam la dogs smra ba pa'i rgyun// btsal nas byang chub 'dod pa gni/ pa'i mchog ni bsam brjod pal dang bral// byang chub khrul pa yangam rmos la na// de lta'i sril can sangs rgyas mdzong ba min// byang chub 'dad pa spyon pas sangs rgyas med/
204a5(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa de gshegs cir yang mi dmigs pas// sangs byas snyan pas ming du brgyags pas nang // kun rdzob tshig tu spyod pa rtog pa'i smyan// nang dang phyi ram zos rnams rnyed pa yang // ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs zhes bya ba'ang 'gal// ston pas bsten
204a6(rnying rgyud): pas byang chub lam mi rnyed // ming dmigs mi gnas skye 'gag med pa'i don// brjod cing bsam du med pas gsang du med// gal te snyan pas gsungs pas byung chub lam nyed na// ston pa'i smyon pa ma par brgyud pas mnga'// sangs byas sangs rgyas
204a7(rnying rgyud): bsal pas rngab mi sred// tsal ba'i dang spangs yi nas bya bral med// grol ba'i nad kyis zin pas 'khrul pas snying po'i gegs// nam mkha' lta bur rang bzhin med pa la// gza' skang lta bu'i tshig tshogs byung // zad med mi zad zad mthanga' med pa /
204b1(rnying rgyud): snying mang lda na cing yang snang ba la// 'dul ba mad skar gdags pa le nas nang// TIg pa'i ngos pa byab gtang nas myong // sangs nas yab yum mos mdams kyang med// dkan ma chag mang cing dbang pa'i spyod sa la man// gzugs mang nas spang ba shadapa
204b2(rnying rgyud): me kyang gting / ma myong cha zab yin ba ltas rgyags kyis// bshad par snga dir theg sa bsam mtsha/ chos mas pa shad pa pas dang ltar snang // gad na ya nga sha pas thabar du bral pa'i tha// sangs cas gzhan nga tha bya na pa
204b3(rnying rgyud): dka tha sdug bsngal 'dil snang pa dgas// tshogs pasags byung la skas pa'i rnas pa'i bya // yang sas kyis sun ma chen gyi byas// zung ba nga da pajig tad pa so// 'du med dngags bsnams sa ma
204b4(rnying rgyud): bzod pa'i lam dang bral// gsungs dang ma gsungs mas dang dmigs dang sbrang // senas ltos pa chos min ldan gyis rdzogs// 'di zhes bstan du gang yang 'brel ba med// bsten pas go bar bya men gsung tshig min// kyai zhing 'gro ba'i chas min gAs
204b5(rnying rgyud): pur snang // gcig pu de yang bsam yas rtsa ba'i cha// snying po'i rang bzhin 'byung ba ches suM gzhan na med// mngon sam kun tu mi rtog yangs pa'i snying po la// gzung ba'i yul med sems kyi gnas kyang med// chos sgra kun tu khyab pas bstan pa'i chas
204b6(rnying rgyud): med de// drang byung mi dmigs skal la de bzhin gnas pa'i glir// rdul zan gcig las g.yengs shing lcags bcu kun dang bral// gr-ing tu du ma phyogs dring min dus bzhi nyid kyang med// ngo mtshar mthong ba'i yul med mthong ba'i mig/ rnam pa'i rnam pa med
204b7(rnying rgyud): pas snying po'i yul yang med// sra meng su yang yan lag med pa'i sra// mtha' lamatshan du med kyi dbyings la bri ba med// chos 'di la mnyan pag bstan par dka' ste sgra yang med// rang bzhin che ba'i yul 'di kun tu ji bzhin sung// sang pa'i byung bya/
205a1(rnying rgyud): nasun / smra
205a2(rnying rgyud): da sa sa sa gas
205a3(rnying rgyud): sa na sa/
205a4(rnying rgyud): nyam byams nig mi mangs pa yid/ gang ma 'i mi brten gas 'dabs// rgyal baspangs mas nyid dang das sun/ ca 'ang sa tam mchog ga ting ba da/ mag kyi chog ba ya/ zang de dpasas byed kyini
205a5(rnying rgyud): pa da / ga sa / pas tud smra/ sa /
205a6(rnying rgyud): mab 'i migasathas sa ma samathal sa/ kyi ma byu/ na pa rgyu
205a7(rnying rgyud): na
205b1(rnying rgyud): bris/ chos thams cad la nges pa dang / dmigasas med par dkangs nas/ mazlog spang ba'i 'khang po 'dag spangs so// da yang da ltar gsungs pa yin zhen/ snyun pu dpan byasmras/ 'khang dus gnas// rang byung
205b2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings su la bzlas pas// rang byung ngo bo mngon du ltung ba la// phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga po yang // rang la rdzogs shing dang la tshang bar ston// rang la dmigs su med pa dbyings su la zla yin// ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags// nam
205b3(rnying rgyud): rangal ji ltar tshang par ston// rang la dmigs su med pas la bzla gyi mi phyir// zhes zhus so// kye sems dpa' chen po dgongs shig/ mig gi dbang po ston pa'i ngo bor byung // lce yi dbang po bstan pa'i ngo bor byung // rna ba'i dbang po 'khor gyi ngo bor gyung // sna yi
205b4(rnying rgyud): dbang po dus kyi ngo bor byung // lus kyi dbang po gnas kyi ngo bor byung // ji ltar byung ba'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ni// mig gi dbang pos gzugs rnams cing yang ston// kun byed rgyal po'i sku ru bstan pa yin// de las gzhan pa'i ston pa dmigs su med// de
205b5(rnying rgyud): las ston pa rang la tshang zhes gsungs// skyes na sbrang sred tshig dang ye gar brjod// sgra rnams bsgrags pa ston pa'i gsungs yin pas// bstan pa'i chos zhes kun la grags pa yin// rnabs sgra rnams ji ltar gsan pa yang // kun byed rgyal po'i lba bsgrags
205b6(rnying rgyud): gsan pa las// de las gzhan pa'i skani thos pa med// de thos 'khor gyi dam par byung ba yin// dri rnams sna tshogs ji ltar byung ba yang // sna yi dbang po gcig las ma 'das pas// dbyer med dus gsum gcig tu bstan pa yin// mig dang rna balnga dang lho la sogs
205b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad lus la gnas pas gnas su bstan// lus gnas pa la kun kyang gnas pa las// lus mi gnas ma mu yang gnas pa med// de bas lus 'di gnas su bstan pa yin// kye sems dpa' chen po de dgongs shig/ thams cad dang la ye nas btsal bas na/
206a1(rnying rgyud): tan pa gzhan tan pa byangs// gdung srung ba dang dgas cung bcan pa// sangs su du smras pas 'dzin / thugags sa byang bstan pa gzugs mazang yang / dang nag pa sa
206a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa la gzhanang rtog sa zed// dus dang gnas dang 'a khod la sogs pa yang // gzhan du mato bla dang du bstan par zad // bden cig gzhan la rtog pa sa byed cig/ sgono ba'irnam yin pa rang pa lang // 'kho yang bkrol sa rdol 'i nga /
206a3(rnying rgyud): dngad mos bkur sti can la dmigs ma byed// dus kyang dus bzung 'di zhes dmigs pa byed// yi nas dbyang med dus su tshogs pa yid// gnas kyang thag pa gzhan pa ma gos shig/ ye nas gnas pas gzhan gyi rang bzhid yin// dbas dang la rdzogs
206a4(rnying rgyud): pa bstan pa yin// dang la dmigs su med pa la bzlas yin// kye sems dpa' chen po ji ltar dgongs// ston pa la sogs chos lnga sdang ba yang // sems la bsgom par bya ba yod ma yin// bsgoms na gong ltar bsgoms kyang lam zlos// rangal
206a5(rnying rgyud): rang gis dmyigs pa med pas na/ mi bas pa zhes kyang bzhag pa gangs mas/ bya nams klung gams gang nas lta ba nam// mu bizhis shAng gis gang matsam panis// dengs brams dang sa pa sim spyad de// ces grang bshArnam sa 'angs pas
206a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan du 'os ma yin// lces lhas na pas thos pas zos pa'i shes rab yin// na thos yid kyis bsams pas bsam pa'i shes rab yin// yid la dmigs su med pas bsgom pa'i shes rab yin// shes rab rnam gsum sems kyi rang bzhin la/
206a7(rnying rgyud): sems la 'dri gas parjing du yangs yin// mas du stan gyis de lags na du med// de 'di med byebasas patsun dang tham// gis zung su mardzogs pal rang dum brjo rje ma byung ban// de nas su bsla sangs tshig la 'tha ba'i dgangs pa
206b1(rnying rgyud): 'dragasangasas// kye sems dpa' chen po dgangs shang // sems nyid nga ba mngon du phyung ba sa// snang srid lta ba'i cho 'phrul sha ba la// yang 'dzag sems kyis skam par ma byed cig/ rang byung sgom pardzogs par ma bsgoms na// bskams
206b2(rnying rgyud): sa sinAb sgom gyis mi lang shing // bsgoms dang ma bsgoms yon tan mnyam pa la// 'ogam pa bzhin dmigs pa'i bsgom pa yis// gang bsgoms col ba'i nad kyis zin pa las// chos nyid don du 'gyur ba ga cig kyang med// ma bsgoms
206b3(rnying rgyud): na du so pa'i rgya med pas// bsgom dang mi bsgom dgongs pa ma len cing // gnas pa gzhi che 'byung brgya phyug pas// sna tshogs mi 'char gang yang med pa yin// ci byang rang shar chos nyid ngo bor snang // gang zag blo yis de la ji ltar bsgom// 'di yin
206b4(rnying rgyud): nges pa med pas bsgom du yod ma yin// bsgom du med par 'jog pa'i bdag po yang // rdul tsam yod par kun byed ngas ma gsungs// de bas cis med phyogs las 'das pa la// sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu snyam yul ma tshol zhig/ rtogs dang mi rtogs blo
206b5(rnying rgyud): yul las 'das// bsgom dang mi bsgom dmigs pa'i cha dang bral// sna tshogs snang zhing bdag po ma nges pas// nor dang mnor sems dpa' ma dgongs shig/ gang la dgongs par bya ba'i sems 'di zhes// sems dpa' rdo rjes gzhan la lung ma bstan/
206b6(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa 'di zhes gzhan la lung bstan na// 'khor rnams dgongs pa'i yul la dmigs pa yis// blo chos 'dzin pa'i mtha' las ma grol bas// de bas dgongs su med pa'i dgongs pa ston// kye sems dpa' chen po dang gongs shig/ skye med rang
206b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gzhan du ma ba sgoms shig/ rang la blta ba'i yul med lta ba'i la yang zlos// dam tshig rang yin gzhan du ma bsungs shig/ bsungs pas dang byung chos la phrag dog byas// rang byang chos rnams ci byung tse shar yang // phrag
207a1(rnying rgyud): dag mad par dang sa dang gnaganas// bang ngas du pa'i dam ga nan pas ma// ba ga spyod mangs med par la yang na/ gdugs mtshams padum ma las su da
207a2(rnying rgyud): tags nas// bram pamed pa'i gang dang wa kyar ngas/ tha kyang nga sangs cig la bzlas pa/ chang yanas gdang tshigs su 'azungs kyang / dgas 'didas pa sems dang thabs dpa
207a3(rnying rgyud): sa ngas bas sa mcho g.yul las 'das// nyams du ma mas mo yis thang ba med// mamams med bsrang ma tshams kyis gang kur smras dngas// de d+ha dgongs shing dgongs pa'i dul med na// ngas ga dun gyi pa sri thos
207a4(rnying rgyud): gsadum cing das tshigs dang me dpang ma ban pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas snang chub kyi sems sa byed rgyal sa/ sgo shi mas 'das pa'i dgongs pa'i di gsungs so// sesam sa dpa chen po dgangs shig/ de gi med pa
207a5(rnying rgyud): chub sems 'din// kun lagadus nyenganges par dgangs par dka'// lus ni 'byung ba bzhi la dang bzhi te// gnas ma bye 'dzin pa snyen// mi 'gyur ba rang bzhin bskyed pa yin// khrag ni myi ma ba 'dzin pa 'ad/ dran ning phung po'i
207a6(rnying rgyud): nub sbyang // rjo ma mang 'a 'dudu pa ste// myi 'thum sbyin pa rang bzhin bsnun po da dbus sa nung ga bu 'dzin po na nga gas pa'i dri zhin rdzun pa yin/ byu na' su byung baban pa yang /
207a7(rnying rgyud): rang shes 'anapas na// lus la su 'jug yid pa yangs mi gsangs// sems ni na ma mama'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'is/ deyang dmigs me dang bzhin su pan// dran kyi thos dang zhin byed rgya// sems phyi
207b1(rnying rgyud): yod par ngas ma gsungs// nga la lus 'dim thos gang zag gis// sus tu kya gas byed pas gzung byas nus// 'byung ba'i dang grang kyi 'jig byung ba la// bya zhi la na zhes myang na 'byung ba yin// byung chub sems la su sha yang mameng// dang
207b2(rnying rgyud): nanam mkha' skye 'chi med pa bzhin// de bzhin sems la skye 'chi med pa yin// 'byung bas chu me rlung bzhi po pang // s+ye shi'i tha snyad ye nas med pa bzhin// de bzhin lus la s+t+waM shi yod ma yin// kye sems dpa' chen po dgongs sheg
207b3(rnying rgyud): las lcag pa'i chos la ma rtogs shig/ brtags dasnying po'i don la sgrib pa yin// lus dag rtsol ba dang du ma len cig/ blangs dacol ba'i nad kyis grol ba yin// golas sgrib pa rang sa ma 'dzin cig/ gang gis rang sa gzung ba de mam na/
207b4(rnying rgyud): brag snying po'i don lal mo nos// lasgros chos su gsungs pa de la ni// bdag dang gzhan du grub pa gnyis med pas// rtsis med ces las 'das par nga yis bstan// rang la ldan gyis grub pas bsgrub me dgos// dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pas
207b5(rnying rgyud): bsgom me dgos// mtshon pa'i chog las 'das pas shes mi dgos// yid kyis byas pas kun dang bral bas na// gsungs pa'i yid kyis de la bsam du med// rtse med rtsen las byung ba ma yin pas// bsod nams tshogs kun nges
207b6(rnying rgyud): bar bsag tu med// ye nas nga yis byas pas chos yin pas// 'bras bu dras la ltos pa'i ri bca' mi dgos// rig stong rtsa ba ye nus med pa la// shi nas skye ba'i dgongs bsam ma byed cig/ rang gi sems 'di phye
207b7(rnying rgyud): ba med sems nas// pha rol mi 'byung ste ma sems ma 'cha' zhig/ thos dang bsam dang dgongs pa'i chos rnams ni// bris chos rtsed mo tsam du dgongs mdzad la// dmigs med phyogs bral phyogs las 'das par
208a1(rnying rgyud): mdzod// phyogs cha bral ba'i gang zag su yang rung // 'khor bar mi gnas mya ngan 'das mig yo// lus sems gnyis med dran pa'i rgyu 'phrul ni// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i shes rgyad 'chad par ngas/
208a2(rnying rgyud): 'chi la bzla' ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas logs na med par la bzla' ba 'di gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po de dgongs shig/ sangs rgyas zhes ni ming du
208a3(rnying rgyud): btags pa ni// sku gsum ston pas drang ba'i lung bstan yin// mi shes byis pa lta bu'i 'bri bsol yin// sems nyid lce med dbyings la chos skye gnas// bsrubs pas nam zhig thob par brod pa bskyed// sems kyi rang bzhin cing
208a4(rnying rgyud): yang sdang ba la// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bas ma bsgoms pas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i su ru bstan pa yang // de bzhin nyid du nam zhig 'gyur ro zhes// de bstan de yang dang ba'i lung bstan yin// nges par 'byung ba smin pa'i shAg
208a5(rnying rgyud): thub la// sprul pa'i sku yin tshogs rdzogs las byung zhes// de bzhin nyid du tshogs la 'god pa yang // ma rtogs byis pa lta bu'i drang lung yin// sems dpa' de ltar dgongs par ma byed cig/ chos su thig le sems las 'das pa yin// re zhig
208a6(rnying rgyud): tsam du mtshon par gsungs pa la// bsrub par bya ba'i dngos po ye nas med// kun gyi gzhi yin grub pa rdul tsam med// ming du btags pa tsam kyang nor ba la// zhe 'dod dmigs pa bcug na shin tu nor// chos su gti mug
208a7(rnying rgyud): chen po la zlos shig/ 'jig rten chags 'jig 'byung ba'i longs spyod rang bzhin las// rnam sdang lhag par bsgrubs pas 'grub pa med// kun kyang rnam sdang rang bzhin longs spyod yin// sems dpa' del
208b1(rnying rgyud): ba blangasas mas ga/ rnam snang ba du btags par ngangs nangs/ ngos pa dag zhan du bsgrubs na shin d+hanang // rlud med skal par mgyung mi nas mang // gnas ga za ba las dang na dza ston// sprul pa 'a
208b2(rnying rgyud): par sems dpas rtogs par rigs// kun kyang sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma yin na// shug rtsub mi bzhugs 'gro na sa yis sbed// de bas sbal bar mthur gcig kyang med// skul pa shAka theb ngas par brjod pas dang /
208b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po dang gongs shig/ phyogs cha zhen pa'i mtha' las ma grol na// zhe 'dod pa sgrub pa'i khor ba'i gtid do yin// phyogs 'dod nges pa med pa'i don la dgongs// snang ba ma res ston pa'i dbyangs na 'byams
208b4(rnying rgyud): snying ba gyogs bzlog snang ba dngas 'dzin// sems dpa' dzadzad la ji ltar dgongs/ chos kwa'i mchag ni kati mug chan pas gsangs// d+hus+yA gam+b+ham sangs rgyas na dag gnas na 'byams// deH pa khams coM brgyad kyi med bcanas zin/
208b5(rnying rgyud): yi dwags pa las skem bdud rtsi'i klang dbyed// ngan lcags mthong na wArnams bdud rtsi gsol// mnad medang myal ba'i tshal dpag med kyang // sa gol gtogs pa tsam gyi srin la rdzogs/ stong gsum chen po'i grong yangs khog pa na/
208b6(rnying rgyud): sems can phra mo 'gyur ldog byas pa med// bskal par bsgoms pa'i bsgom chen gnas ngan len// dug wa grogs su rnyed pa'i shes yul spangs nas// bsgom chen rnams la snying rje lhag par bskyed// rtag
208b7(rnying rgyud): thams pa bsgoms pas thim bdud kyi 'khor// zhe sdang lhag par skyes pas mtshan ma rang sar grol// oM ma ho kho ba la lta bu'i dgangs pa 'di// sems dpa' rdo rje ni dgongs legs sam// sangs rgyas lags
209a1(rnying rgyud): na
209a2(rnying rgyud): nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos/
209a3(rnying rgyud): tu byed byas pa'i chos lam dgongs shig/
209a4(rnying rgyud): sems la gong 'og med pas rgyu 'bras med/
209b1(rnying rgyud): tang 'dzin dam gsum bsgom pa'i yan lagags// thabs dang shes rab gnyis mang ngan ba ltas nas// rdo rje 'chang ke 'bras bu sgrub pa yang // mu 'brus gnyis su med pa'i lta ba min// thabs dang shas rab tang 'dzin rnam gsum yang // ma yang tha
209b2(rnying rgyud): ya dbyer med pas// gnyis med tu 'bras 'das par la thos shig/ bskyed pa ana? yoga'i dgongs pa ni// dbyings ni sbrul yigs 'bras bur 'dod// yul sems bsam pa'i mtha' dang mthal bas// mu 'bras gnyis sa med pa'i ltang min// dmya
209b3(rnying rgyud): shes thig leng dbyer med pas// bdag med thig le'i ngang du la zlos shig/ a ti'i chos pa phyogs cha ma mchis pas// phyogs med gang ltar spyad kyang 'gal ba med// 'dod yon lnga la spyad kyang byang chub lam// gal med yal bar bsdad kyang yengs pa med// sa
209b4(rnying rgyud): byas bslab pa med kyang sre me dbyangs// kye sems dpa' chen po de dgongs shig/ gang la 'dris par ma byed khengs par bzhugs// sman gyi sgrib gnas skye med chos pa yang // sems dpying rjes 'dris par mabyed cig/ 'dris na gang la 'dris kyang la ma thos
209b5(rnying rgyud): mthan chis ni 'dres pa kun las 'das// bye med ces la'ang 'dres par mi byed na// dngos po'i chos kun 'dris par sna b+h+yos// glang gi 'dris med srog dang bral bas chog/ 'dris med pagachags bral bas sangs rgyasas la gnas// ha rkyen med par la
209b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma stsal ba'o// de nas rgyung nub gyi sems pa byung rtsal bas/ bcosas mang par gabasku ba'i dgangs pa 'di gsungs so// chom nyid dbyings su dang bzhin byung byed pas// 'das dang ma 'das dastir spangs kyis kyis
209b7(rnying rgyud): sngar yang ma btsos da lta 'chos pa med// rjes kyang 'chas par ma 'gyur bcas me da byings// mig sa gzugs su shing ba'i snang ba yang // maung yang ched du gzung ba med pa'i ngang// ma gzung sbeng btso shang dkud byed su/
210a1(rnying rgyud): na bar sA ru grag pa'i chos rnams kyang // snyan dang mi snyan byung tshor ji byung yang // ma bcos mi bcos bcos pa med par bzhag/ rang la lhun gyis gnas pas bathos mi dgos// bcos na bcos pas
210a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i la mi zlos// dri dang ro dang reg bya la sogs pa// gang la bcos par mi bya mi bcos par yang min// gang la gnyen po ma zhugs bcos med mchog/ bsam pa ci skyes dang byung ye shes la// de las lhag pa 'dod na rtsol ba
210a3(rnying rgyud): nang // rang shar 'dod med chos kyi la bzlas na// 'di la 'dod par mi bya dor mi bya// phyi mar 'dod par mi bya dus gsum 'dod dang bral// 'dod dang bral na bcos med dbyings na gnas// chos kyi dbyings la snga phyi 'gyur ba med// gang
210a4(rnying rgyud): zag blo yis de la bcos su med// 'khor bas lus ngag yid ni bcos pa la// la bza' ba ni rang byung shar bas bzlas// lus la ma bcos su yi la bzlal yin// ngag ma bcos pa gsung gi la bzla' yin// dran pa ma bcos thugs kyi la bzla' yin/
210a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'dod bral sangs rgyas la bzla' yin// dngos po sang med stong pa'i la bza' yin// mug bsngal dor med bde ba'i la bza' yin/ chos nyid yul las 'das pa lta bu'i la bzla yin// dmigs su rdul tsam med pas bsgom pa'i yang tha
210a6(rnying rgyud): yin// lus ngag rtsol ba med pas spyod pa'i la bzla' yin// sangs la rgyu ba med pas 'bras bu la bza' yin// gzhan du btsal du med pas lam gyi la bzla' yin// bcos su med par sems dpas dgongs par gyis// bcas su med
210a7(rnying rgyud): pangal bza' ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos/ dgongs pa nam mkha' ltar kun la khyab pa 'di gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po de dgongs shig/ chos nyid byang
210b1(rnying rgyud): rgya gsums nan ma mkha' 'dra// namamakha' kun khyab bdag tu mngan pa snyed// chos nyid byang chu sems ca kun kyi dang bzhin te// bdag dang bdu rtaga' ba dul tsam na// nang ma'ab dngan rgyags su khyab gnas// 'ab nga
210b2(rnying rgyud): nyid dbyer mi byed// lnga tshogs ji ltar shar yang nam mkha'i dang du rdzogs// dran rtog pa de dang sdug bsngal chos rnams kyang // sem nyid kyi med dbyings su ma rdzogs med// sangs kyis rang pa rdzogs pas sangs zags// sangs
210b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod srub med pas la bzla dang du bzla// 'khor ba dang la rdzogs pas ltung ba'i g.yang sa med// bde sdug sems su rdzogs pas la bzla dang du bzla// gnyis med rang la rdzogs pas tha dad 'du shes bral// nyag gcig sems su rdzogs pas la bzla dang du badz+ra//
210b4(rnying rgyud): theg pa rang dardzogs pas grab mtha' kha 'dzin bral// lha sgom sems su rdzogs pas la bzla rang du ban+d+ha// gyi sems dpa' chen po de dgongs shig/ rnam mkhang mtha' dbas dmigs su ma mchis pas// don la dmigs su med par la zlas shog/ nAm
210b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' kun la gtsang sde ma mchis pas// gtsang sde med pa nga sems dpas la zlos shig/ nAm mkha'i dang la nyin mtshan ma mchis pas// nyin mtshan gsal 'gro ba med par la zlos shig/ nam mkha' dag la skye 'chi ma mchis pas// lce shing 'du shes med par la thos
210b6(rnying rgyud): shig/ nam mkha' dag la sangs rgyas ma mchis pas// sangs rgyas 'du shes med par la zlos shig/ nam mkha' dag la sems can ma mchis pas// sems can 'du shes med ba la zlos shig/ nam mkhang dag la de dgas ma mchis pas// de dgas 'du shes med par la zlos shig/ nam
210b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' dag la mthong ma'am mchis pas// mtha dpa' gnyis su med pa la zlas shig/ nam ma pa' dag la rtsis gang ba ma mchis pas// cis gdab 'du shes med pang la zlos shig/ nam mkha' dag la zhes rtog ma mchis pas// shes tog 'du shes med par la zlos shig/
211a1(rnying rgyud): nam sa 'a phrul nas sams pa mchis pas// gang lag+sa nas sems sa dbang pa nga // ma sa gangs pa dngangs sa medapa // kun dang ba dgongs pablangs pa yod// gang dgan kun nga bral bar da
211a2(rnying rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi lcem dgongs yin// 'khor ba skang du med pa'i dgongs pa ni// myang 'das gzhanan med pa'i ldem dgongs yin// byang chub sgrub tu med pa'i dgongs pa ni// skye mad rang la gnas pa ldem dgang su min// rjen snang dgrag tu myed pa
211a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa ni// de nyid dang grol yin pa'i ldem dgongs yin// rtog med bsgom du med pa'i dgongs pa ni// chos nyid 'du 'bral med pa'i lte ba dgongs so// tshogs gnyis bsag tu med pa'i dgongs pa ni// chos nyid rta rkyen med pa'i ldem dgongs so//
211a4(rnying rgyud): yang nges pa med pa'i dgongs pa ni// 'dzin med chos sku yin pa'i ldem dgongs yin// kye sems dpa' chen po de nyon cig/ nges med phyogs log dgongs pa ma lon na// ji ltar bsgoms kyang 'ching lA ma bsgoms na yang 'ching // ldem dgongs bstan
211a5(rnying rgyud): yang dgongs pa zhe bzhag na// ldem po nyid kyis sems dpa' 'ching bar 'gyur// dzi mi dgongs kyi rtogs pa ma shar na// 'khor bu'i sgrogs las grol bar mi 'gyur ro// dgangs pa nam mkha' ltar la bzla ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / byang chub sa/
211a6(rnying rgyud): dpa' kun byed rgyal pos/ rgya mtsho lta bu'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po de nyon cig/ chos nyid rgya mtsho lta bur gting dpag dka' ba'i chos// sus kyang 'di la dgongs pa rdul tsam med pa ste// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu la kha gting da
211a7(rnying rgyud): chu yod mo yin// de bzhin thos nyid byang chub sems la sgo phrag med// rba dang rlabs dang chu bur rgya mtsho chen por gcig/ de bzhin 'khor dang myang 'das rtog dang mi tog yang // chos dbyings klong na dbyer med gcig tu rdzogs pa yin// phyogs bzhi mtshams
211b1(rnying rgyud): brgyad chu bran thams cad 'byung ba yang // rgya mtsho nyid las byung zhing rgya mtsho nyid du 'du ba ltar// brgya khri bzhi stong chos rnams thams cad 'byung ba yang // chos nyid dbyings las byung zhing chos nyid dbyings su gcig/ rgya mtsho'i 'jing la gtso 'gul ye nas med pa pa
211b2(rnying rgyud): 'a don sa dusnga gsu ma 'ab dang 'byung ba med/ wa dang rlabs la dgag pa me pa bzhin// sbyin dang yi tan 'i gag ci yang 'char bang ngas/ gang yang gyi med byed sA las mang das dgangs mdzang la// rtogs sems rtan bya legs par gyu
211b3(rnying rgyud): ga/ kye ma 'khor dang myang 'das dbyer med dbyings su stor// stang stong dbyerd med rtsa bral phyogs las 'das pa yin// srog dang ma bral 'byung ba rang rang rang sa 'dzin// skye med byang chub sems la dmigs pa nyid dang dral// zhe 'did dogs mthang na nges pa
211b4(rnying rgyud): med par grol// sems nan nyid ni ye nas sangs nas dgongs pa 'dzin// chos nyid byang chub sems ni rang bzhin gyi med de// 'byung ba ldi grol bas par dro'i 'du shes bral// zlog gcig byang chub sems la kun kyang gnas pa yin// rang byung ye shes rtogs
211b5(rnying rgyud): la ring ba nam yang med// ma rig 'khrul pa rnams kyang skye med dbyings la 'byams// zug rngu byung ba chos nyid rang mtshor// mi srid srid par shar ba sems dpas ji ltar dgongs// chos nyid don gyi gnas lugs skye med bde chen de// yongs la rdzogs par shes nas
211b6(rnying rgyud): smon pa su la 'bul// rgya mtsho'i chu yis tshul smon pa med pa bzhin// byang chub sems kyis sems la smon du med pa yin// smon pa gzhan du 'bul na rang gi don rtogs min// de bzhin dogs pa byed pa'ang de dang mtshungs pa yin// yul lnga dmigs pa
211b7(rnying rgyud): na re dogs nam yang 'byung // sems kyi rang bzhin skye med yin par dgongs nas ni// ro dogs dmigs pa rdul tsam med par shi bas chog/ kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin nyid du de 'gyur ro// bdag dang bcas pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i rgyu ma mchis// bdag
212a1(rnying rgyud): med phragasung thugs kyi 'gronan rdzogs par byed// rtag dang zad pa'i ces ga dang blo yes ma len cig/ spos sbyangs thams cad dogs 'thar ltang 'theng ba na// rtogs pa'i sems la ba cad bya nyis pa
212a2(rnying rgyud): ma ma lam me di pes lhag pa med// dbang ba 'gags ni dang 'dzin snang ba rgal bar 'gyur// sams nyid byang chub sems la 'pho 'gyur lenas med// sems dpa' chen gis de ltar dgongs pa song mdzodan cag/ chos nyid kyim mo rtang pa
212a3(rnying rgyud): le'u sde brgyad pa'o// / byang chub sems kun byed na la po se/ khung chen rtsal rdzogs lta bu'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po dadagongs shig/ khyed chen rtsal rdzogs mkha' la ying bas stob med// sems
212a4(rnying rgyud): skyo med pa nas cal rdzogs kya 'phrul// mo sbo me bsdu rang bzhin pa nag pas spun gyis grub// myang na 'das pa'i spo 'khor ba las mi ngardze// yon tan sems bu mnyam pa'i zlos su rtso ma dgas// dal 'byor chos pa ma smin pa tog brjos pra/
212a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' ched po de dgongs shig/ khung phug gronga'i rjelas grol bas ma dang mnyam// cal dang gno rdo ma mtha' la dbang ltar ltar// byang chung sems kyi sbyin rnam pa gsum yidzin// gang mtshan 'dzin pa'i gyad nga lus rgyad// bdag tu dzid pa
212a6(rnying rgyud): chab ba yongs su zin pa gsum/ rnal 'byor rgya ru gsungs par yes spras// snang ba nges med dbang po 'gags pas sbyang bkrol// 'byung bko rang sar dengs pas rnal 'gyur sam// yul med dran pa 'gags pas bdag 'angan
212a7(rnying rgyud): grol// snang ba nges med rtogs pas gang ba'i slong rgya chag/ 'byung ba rangs zin pas lus kyi sgong rgyam ga/ dmigs pa rdul tsam med pas bdag 'dzin spong tha chag/ slong nam gsum chag/ pas gnas lags ma bu mjas// gnas lugs pa
212b1(rnying rgyud): nas snang srid kha lo sgyur bar byed// bsgyur yang bdag 'dzin mi gnas rgyal gyi 'char lugs yin// de ni kun bzang sku yi ngo bor la bzla yin// ma bu dbyer med kun la gnas pa yin// dpe ni nyi zla kha sbyor dgongs pas bstan pa yin// nyi mas
212b2(rnying rgyud): la zla ba bu yi tshul du byung ba yin// de bzhin skye med ma la ye shes bya yi tshul du bstan pa yin// skye med nyi ma'i klong du zla ba lta bu'i ye shes zil gyis mnan// nyi ma phye na zla ba gsal dang mi gsal cis gdang medo// skye med dbyings na gnas pa
212b3(rnying rgyud): rtogs dang ma rtogs med// zla ba gsal la nyi ma nye ba ma yin de dgongs sam// 'du shes gsal la skye med nye ba ma yin ring // skye med ye shes nyid kyis ye shes rgyang du 'phang // 'du shes dran pa'i chos la dgongs pa ma len zhig/ 'du byed pa
212b4(rnying rgyud): yi chos la 'du shes ma 'jug cing // byang chub sems kyi rol myong bar ma byed cig/ dmigs su med pa'i chos la dmigs pa ma 'jug cig/ bla dgas tsam gyi chos la rtsol bas ma bsgrubs shing // chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin chen po la// /
212b5(rnying rgyud): nges med rtsol bral sngon nas kun la khyab par shar// nga lung zos pas nges med dgongs pa da lta shar// phung po bor bas zhi ba mchog la phyin par 'gyur// lta ba khyad chen ldings pa'i dgongs pa la bza' ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// /
212b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kun byed rgyal pos/ khams gsum yongs grol gyi dgongs pa 'di gsungs so// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams su bstan pa yang // chos nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo bor byung ba yin// gzugs med//
212b7(rnying rgyud): khams la gzung du ma mchis ngo bos stong // 'dzin med chos kyi phu ru ye nas bzhugs pa yin// 'dod pa'i khams ni longs spyod sru ru bzhugs pa yin// nyid kyis nyid la longs spyod sems dpas dgongs lags sam// sems kyi

213a2(rnying rgyud): 'dug
213a3(rnying rgyud): sa nas /

213a5(rnying rgyud): mas phye ma'i gnyer lus byed// de bas srid gsum nam dag mtshan ma rang sar dag/ bye dogs mi byed kun bka' lag nas// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gtan nas pachang
213a6(rnying rgyud): naldan
213a7(rnying rgyud): gyu lo shes shar dang med na/
213a8(rnying rgyud): gton cig/ chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin thos pa bcad pa ni/ byang chub sems ni blolas bsam pa min// bsams zhing brtags pa'i chos ni rig byed ye shes pan/
213b1(rnying rgyud): bsams shing bsgoms pa'i chos la re ma 'jog/ chos rnams kun gyi zag ni byang chub sems su bcad// ma bltas ma bsgoms bsam nga med pas zag chod na// de la rang byung ye shes shar bas zag der bcad// chos mu dpa gang
213b2(rnying rgyud): par sems dpas blo zag chod// 'dod lon longs su yin par sems dpas blo thab chod// sems sprul smra yin par sems dpas blo zag chod// snang ba rang sems yin par sems dpas blo zag chod// sems la gnyis su med
213b3(rnying rgyud): pa bag chags spang du med// yul med rang gsal yin par sems dpas blo zag chod// thig le nyag gcig sems kyi rang bzhin len mod byung // nyag gcig cir yang 'byung bas spang dang bsrub mi byed// kun kyang yon tan mnyam par
213b4(rnying rgyud): sems dpas blo zag chod// da ltar snang ba'i sku lus 'di kun sems dpas ji ltar dgongs// 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul tsam du sems dpas dgongs mdzod la// sems ni bla mod nam mkha' lta bur blo zag chod// kye sems dpa' chen po
213b5(rnying rgyud): de dgongs shig/ rtsa rgyad le'u lnga bcu rtsa bdun gsungs pa yang // rang byung ye shes tshig tu bstan pa'i mdo lung yin// sems las rang byung ye shes gcig tu la zlos shig/ gyi ma le'u bcu dang gnyis su gsungs pa yang // rang
213b6(rnying rgyud): byung ye shes bsam pas brtags pa yin// de yang rang byung gcig tu sems dpas la zlos shig/ phyi ma'i phyi ma le'u bcu dang lnga ru gsungs pa yang // rang byung ye shes rnal du 'jog par dgongs pa yin// sems dpa' rang byung
213b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes gcig tu la klos shig/ zos pas ston pa'i sde mig dang // bsams pas grol ba'i lde mig dang // bsgoms pas 'byin pa'i lde mig gis// nges par gtan la phab pas ni// sems dpas legs par thag chod cig
214a1(rnying rgyud): nim sa dpa can po dag dusas+ho// rdzogs par 'am ma mamadza 'a gan pa na// skyel sta bya dang tshus da/ thanan skal btsun pa 'ad gsungs shog/ dam
214a2(rnying rgyud): gsang sdom chung sbyar gdungs pa dang // srin por ka sha 'dre bdung mthu do ma dang // rtag tu phyod kha lugs sa'i glang nan la// rdzogs ldan 'di 'dra'i dgongs pa mi bstan no// rgyad chen la rmogasang ba'i 'khor mo zhes bya ba/ dgangs pa
214a3(rnying rgyud): skrod nas shar ba'i mun sel rdzogs so// / 'di thos sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// 'di bsgoms sangs rgyas dgongs bzod// 'di bsgoms sangs kyis dgongs la gnas// e ma ho// bsam dgongs
214a4(rnying rgyud): med par la bzla ba'o// wI// rgya gar skad du/ tsA ra sha Ar thA/ bod skad du/ d+hU btsan dam pa/ rtogs pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems kyi rje btsun dam// ston pa'i thugs la bton te bshad// sngon gyis
214a5(rnying rgyud): bgod med gdod nas dag/ ma btsal bzhag ni sgom pa'i mchog/ 'gro kun gnas pa'i byang chub sems// mi 'gyur rje btsun chos kyi sku// ngang gnas mi nub rdo rje'o// snang dang mi snang gnyis med de// bde chen yongs
214a6(rnying rgyud): rnyog rje btsan su// ya mtshan mkha' la rigs pa'i thugs// skabs ma yul lus shin tu 'das// dmigs med don rtogs chos kyi rje// snang ba'i yul las gang gnas kyang // rje btsan srul g.yos pa med//
214a7(rnying rgyud): gi 'phrul rtog pa rnams// rje btsan don la nyams te dman// phyi nang gnyis ka bde chen po/ rde ba can rtogs pa'i rang rig sems// 'khor ba myang 'das gnyis med de// ji ltar bzlas pas byang chub sems// la sangs
214b1(rnying rgyud): byas pas mab sas// dza ba can dam pa rnags so// / rdzug pa dang / sarbAsata/ spyod dang / kun 'das/ sa srung thos la phyug 'tshal la/ gas na nga
214b2(rnying rgyud): 'dus// nam mkha' dper bstan byang chub sems// rig pa rang la rdzogs pas na// kun 'dus rgyal po nga smras so// lta ba'i glong tshogs a ti la// zes brgyad kyi so'i don brjod nas// kum pas 'dzas
214b3(rnying rgyud): lam yengs brjod med bzhag/ ma lus sangs rgyas sems su 'dus// rtsab bral ba'i sems nyid de// sus kyang ma byas yenas gnas// mi 'gyur ldan gyis grub bya yi// yang dag chos nyid dbyings kyi rba// stsal pag ma las pa'i sem
214b4(rnying rgyud): chen 'du 'bral med pa'i sems// 'bras bu dang la rdzogs pas sra// snang srid thams cad ye sangs rgyas// bdag dang bral bas 'khor ba chod// dpal ldan su gsum rang byung ba do// sangs rgyas ma lus dbyings su gcig/ skye med dod la thabs kyis 'dus// @
214b5(rnying rgyud): dang du 'gro bas na// thams cad thugs rje thabs kyis btul// gcig la med pa'i rin chen 'di// gzung 'dzin zad pas mnyam pa'i rgyal// ye shes rol pas gcig tu gsal// snying rje med pas gsod pa dang // lta ba med pas za ba ni// 'gro drug ye nas sangs rgyas te// thamasacad lhag ma med pa
214b6(rnying rgyud): bskal// ji ltar snang ba kun tu khyab// ye nas gcig gi ngang du 'dus// byas na 'ching ba'i lam yin la// ma bsgrubs 'du 'bral med par bstan// ye nas yin pa'i bde chen de// gnas la chags pa med pas na// 'dus lam ma h+yam snang 'di// kun la khyan pas
214b7(rnying rgyud): bsdu med// gang yang ma 'gags so sor gsal// ma lus 'dus pa'i rgyan du che// rag ma lus pa'i rgyamadud de// gzhan gyis bcos su ye med pas// sprul pa'i rgya mdze thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med pa'i dang dugazhag/ sus kyang ma byas nyid la 'dus// sun mdus rdzogs
215a1(rnying rgyud): sa nga/ t+tA/ bad d+ha/ rnamasags ltam du ra// sa sa smras na rgyad sa// dun /
215a2(rnying rgyud): brgyam pas rnyed mi 'gyur// thig le brdal pa'i dring byung bte// rig par sa su med// sbyin gru btsal drug dod nas med// snying ba'i snying po gnyis med mdzan// yinas rnyed nga dang bral// de tshig na gas la la drug parjod/
215a3(rnying rgyud): donon ma thos med yang dag dbyings// btsal du 'a drebam rnam chog 'das// de bzhin mong dmyur byas na// rdus dag don ma mkhas pa yin// gdod nas sa gyis gsal ba'i thong // don ma / khrim myos kyisra// mangs spyod padi ci rgya
215a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes rol pas stsal ba'i sku// thugs rje byang chub sems dpa'i lam// mgayos rtog med chos lam// rang bzhin gnas pas bde ba'i rdzong // khams gsum munas pa sgron ma'i mchad// bde chen rang byung thugs rje gas la//
215a5(rnying rgyud): khams gsum sgron ma rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra sAtwa sa ma ya/ khe ma hA de hA puSh+TiM ga ra ta na hA/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' tshe bram ze rgyas pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la
215a6(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal mo// 'di sgrung ba shad pa'i dus na/ 'og min gyi bAnas/ chos nyid kyi man/ dbyings nyid kyi spyong / sems nyid kyi gnas/ ye shes sleb pa mi mnga' ba'i gzhal las ni nyid kyi rang bzhin dang/ nyid kyang po /
215a7(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes sprul pa'i 'am 'a du s+ho/ rang bzhin gyi kho byos kyi skyes bya ba dang/ rabanyin gyi 'thor mongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya ba dang / drug rtson pa'i 'khor sprul ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba dang / bams dpa' ma sogs pa byed pa dang /
215b1(rnying rgyud): la khor rnams da ngas ga tu brdzun sa/ dan pa 'tho na 'das na byas thams cad bslus nam thag sa med pagacig tu bzugs sa// dedas rdo sems dpa'i nyid kyi rang bzhin ga 'i chen pogatu tu 'thugs pa sa stsa /
215b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po pa dga' ba 'i sems kyis dang 'a'i mdengs phyung nas 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos rdo rje sems dpa' la sbas pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' skyes no// dkar gyi'i sems kyir ma
215b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i mdangus mye ye ma'o// nga las byung ba yesa'o// khyed 'drud dga' ba 'ima'o// zhes gsungs pas/ rdo rje sems dbas zhus pa/ smon pa'i smyon pa kun tu bzang po phyags// smyon pa nyid thang theg pa smos pa mo'o// 'khor rnams
215b4(rnying rgyud): kun kyang 'izhi'i spros pa skyed// bskrun pa kun kyang byeg le sa pa 'o// rdzu nas kyi thezhi ba sgos pa med// thams ca kun pa TIg gro rlos men no// ston pa'i ston pa pa ci zhig ston par mdzag/ 'am du 'khor ba'i 'a
