241b6(rnying rgyud): pa de nyid chos kyi dbyings so// lta ba thams cad la mkhas par bya'o// bslab pa thams cad rnams bslab pa/ gang yin de bslab pa ma yin te/ gang la bslab pa med pa ni// mkhas pa nga yis bslab pa yin// byang chub 'dod pa de la byang chub med//
241b7(rnying rgyud): sa dang rnam thar byang chub mchog la ring // 'di 'dra'i chos nyid gang gis rig gyur pa// des ni byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba las rtsa ba dang bral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// /
242a1(rnying rgyud): de nas sab cu mnan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la lkugs nas/ yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// pha rom phyin bcu ldan gyis rdzogs pa li// byang chub sems 'di rgyung du byung // rmad byung byang chub sems cad/
242a2(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas chos thams cad kyi mdzod yin no// zad mi shes pa'i mdzod yin no// bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
242a3(rnying rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'di yin no// chos thams cad kyi chos nyid 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o// byang chub kyi sems ni thams cad mkhye nub thob pa ste mkhyen to// sangs rgyas ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa ste ye shes so//
242a4(rnying rgyud): lus sas rgya babacom la ba tu da pas sems las pan gyu mtsham sa / ngagalas pa rgya sa brgyad pasam las nas spyod pa// phul bar rigs bzhin du/ so pa 'dog me par
242a5(rnying rgyud): thugs su chud do// yang nges don 'di bka' stsal to// rdo rje sems dpa' yi dam lha med pas// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gzhan la brten mi dgos// byang chub rnyed dka' rgyal ba nga yi sku// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs dka' ba//
242a6(rnying rgyud): rang rig chen po rtogs dka' nga yi dbyings// sangs rgyas gzhan na yod pa ma yin no// yang gsungs pa/ da mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i ye shes dang // che ba'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i chos kun thugs su chud pas khams gsum las rnam
242a7(rnying rgyud): par rgyal pa'i byang chub sems rmad du byung ba nyid yin no// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba'i de mchog brgyad ni/ pa nas ma skyes pa dang / ye nas ma byung ba dang / ye nas mi gnas pa dang / ye nas stong pa dang / med pa dang / phyal ba dang /
242b1(rnying rgyud): sa das sa// dam rna sa rgyu/ 'du/ bas la na nga// na da
242b2(rnying rgyud): rnabs pas / ga pa rdzog ts+l-i das // byu ga da sa ga gas d+hA ga mu
242b3(rnying rgyud): gyis gnas pa'o// rlung du byung ba'i da chog rte du rtsa spyod do// bsrung ba med pa gsum thugs su chud de/ drugs las mi mkhyen pa med cing / thams cad thugs su chung pas 'asrung du med pa dang / gsung las thams cad ma rdzogs pa med
242b4(rnying rgyud): shA 'thung du med pa dang / sbalas thams cad ldan gyis rdzogs pas gzhan gyi longs spyod la thogs pa de pas bsrung du med pa'o/ de'i phyir bsrung ba med pa'i sgra gsung dugs/ mkhyen pa med pas thams cad chub/ thams cad du
242b5(rnying rgyud): med pa dang // snang ba thams cad rdzogs pas na// sku lnga ldan rdzogs bsrung du med// ces gsungs so// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba las srung du med pa'i dam tshig gi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / le'u 'dis mtshas
242b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i man ngag gi le'u ston te/ de nas sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag dang bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis sngon ma mthong ba ngo mtshar che ba'i gsang ba chen po chos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par
242b7(rnying rgyud): dad yang mi mthun pa/ gsang sngags kyi chos gang dang yang mi mnyam pa/ gsang ba gang dang yang ma 'dres pa/ theg pa gang dang yang thun mong min pa'i chos nyid ming med par/ sangs rgyas med par sems can ming med par/ rol pa'i
243a1(rnying rgyud): darnas pa la gtogs pa drug bsngab sa yung ba dpa/ skrag sung thugs bye du 'khor ba'i chos kyi khor ba thong shi ba na ma na na rnams du nga pa dang / rgyas
243a2(rnying rgyud): las sa gtogs par/ dmyal ba ming yang med pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa las ma gtogs par/ marig pa srid yang med pa'i chos dang / don mnar bar thugs su chung ba'i chos thugs byang chub sems ga 'o/ tron 'ji gsang ba ca dang grong
243a3(rnying rgyud): man gardzogs par dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang / bdag ga don du byang chub sems cad dbyung ba'i don rdzogs par gsungs te/ rgyu ga gis mkhyen par 'thur/ de ga gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kun reg rgyas kyinas bka' brel
243a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi thogs dang gtu med pa rnams yang dag par bsags pas mgrin to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ tshad med pa yang dag pa'i thabs rdzogs pa'i thugs su chud
243a5(rnying rgyud): dris gyin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mi mnam pa dang sa rnas pa'i sngon pa gyi rlobs dang ldan pas thugs su chud de mkhyen no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab tshad med pa bsngags pa sa thugs su chud del byen to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
243a6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa tshad med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni skye bo tshad med pa rnams ni sdod du gyur par mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rgod ji lta ba bzhin du ston par mdzad pa dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang / ji skar 'dul ba na
243a7(rnying rgyud): sems can nams ci don mdzad pa dang // mos 'ji lta ba bzhin du sems cananams gyid na mdad pa yin pas/ thugs su chung des kye tshang snod dang byar nas gsungs pa yin no// sems dpa' chen po/ gsung shi dang brib nyid do// sgor brgya chub sems ni lus dag yi gsum tho mo ma'in pa
243b1(rnying rgyud): mi dad pa/ gnyis su med par rig la rig par byed pa ni sbyor ba'o// grol ba ni lus dang ngag dang sems dbyer med pa ni rdo rje'o// rdo rje ni gang na yang mi gnas pa dang / chos thams cad gang na yang mi gnas pa nyid du gyur pa nyid sgom pa'o// /
243b2(rnying rgyud): po rmad du byung ba'i gsang ba'i rgyud du gyur pas gsang ba chen po'i bum sde las/ rdo rje sems dpa' rig par bstan pa/ gsang ba thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog/ rmad du byung ba'i man ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / le'u 'di
243b3(rnying rgyud): rmad du byung ba'i don skyon thams cad nyams pa bskang ba'i don bstan te/ rdo rje sems dpas ston pa la zhus pa/ chos chen po rmad du gyung pa'i thugs rje chen po ji lta bu/ kun rig chos kyi rje ston pas bka' stsal pa/ stong ri gnam lcags thog chen gyis/
243b4(rnying rgyud): skyon gyi gangs ri'i rtse nas bcom// bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhu nas bskyil// tI 'dzin 'bum phrag yangs pas 'di// 'dis ni nyams pa med pa'o// yang rdo rje sems dpas ston pa la zhus pa/ thugs gsang ba'i rgyun 'di gang las gsungs pa/ ri rab sum
243b5(rnying rgyud): cu phrag dgu'i bskal ba zhing gi rdul snyed kun zhes zhus pas/ ston pa kun rig chos kyi rjes bka' stsal pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun dang / rmad du byung ba'i don kun gcig ste// ri rab sum cu phrag dgu yang // rmad byung byang chub sems
243b6(rnying rgyud): 'di yis// sgom pa rdo rjes rtse mar brlag/ ces gsungs so// de'i phyir byang chub rmad du byung ba'i sku ni/ stong spyi phud ces bya'o// gsung ni ye shes mkha' la rol zhes bya'o// thugs ni nam mkha'i spang po la rdo rje'i bzang gi dra zhes bya'o// de yang rmang du byung ba'i sku ni/
243b7(rnying rgyud): snying po byang chub na bzhugs pa'i sku zhes bya'o// rmad du byung ba'i gsung ni snying po byang chub na bzhugs pa las/ dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa zhes bya'o// rmad du byung ba'i thugs ni mtshan nyid ye shes mi zad pa'i blo smos kyi thugs te/ ye shes zhugs te thugs kyi mchog
244a1(rnying rgyud): ces bka' stsal te/ de yang thugs gsang ba nyid kyi rgyud las/ nam mkha'i sku las rmad du byung // nam mkha'i gsung gi la ma ston pa// nam mkha'i thugs ni thugs kyi mchog/ nang byung nam mkha' gnas/
244a2(rnying rgyud): kyi mchog/ ces 'byung ste/ de ltar nam mkha'i sku gsung thugs bshad nas sa'i sku gsung thugs bshad pa ni/ sa'i sku ni ri rab sum cu phrag dgu yin la/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed 'byung ba de kun rmad du byung ba'i sa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po/ sa'i 'jig
244a3(rnying rgyud): rten yang ri rab sum cu phrag drug la/ ri rab 'bum yod de/ de'i bskal pa zhing gi rdul sked gcig gi tshad la ni/ byang chub sems rmad du byung ba'i tshad dpag tu med pa ni ri rab dang gling rnams dngas gzhi dang snang zhing srid pa rnams kyi nang na/ sdang zhing srid pa'i skye 'pho
244a4(rnying rgyud): rnams dang / de kun zos kyang dadungangam zos zhes de lta bu la bya'o// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba'i nyams pa bskang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas rmang du byung ba'i sra las me'i 'od du 'bar te/ 'dod chags 'od du 'bar/ zhe
244a5(rnying rgyud): 'od du 'bar/ de rgyal 'od du 'bar// phrag dog 'od du 'bar/ gti mug 'od du 'bar/ de bzhin du phung po lnga nyid sku lnga ste/ 'od du 'bar ba de yang / byang chub kyi sems/ rmad du byung ba'i sku lnga ste/ bdag nyid las 'od du 'bar ma'o//
244a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du rnam par shes pa lnga les kya 'od du 'byur te/ mi ga dang / na ba dang / dang / skye dang / sengs las rjod de pa sam// de bzhin kyi'i yul las nga yo du bar nga / sa nam mkha' las 'od 'bar ra/
244a7(rnying rgyud): dekun pas cang 'byung ba'i byang chub sems ring rig pa'i rgyal po 'di las byung ba/ 'od chen po ye shes kyi 'od cha zhing gsal bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams can pa nga'i rig pa'i 'od las byung shing gsa' bzhis bya'o// de las 'khar ba'i mun nag
244b1(rnying rgyud): ma / sa sa 'an sazla nga na na/ ga
244b2(rnying rgyud): bde 'chog// dus gsum 'jig rten gsum las 'das// srang na 'dag gis de la bya'o// phreng stong po byang grub na bzhugs pa'i dus/ rdo rje sems dpa' ba gzigs nas/ chos cad du byung ba byang chub sems ngad nga byung ba zhes d+ha/
244b3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ston cing bzhugs pa 'im sa sgra med pa'i lcang po can gyi po zang / bde ba chen po'i shing khams na/ 'phags pa nyan nas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sogs pa/ rtsol pa dang bcos pa'i sdug pa
244b4(rnying rgyud): mtshanas/ gnas sadun tshwa sa tshur shing tshul baming yang mi brjod do// theg pa rjen pa gsung sngags than med pa dan ston cing / rigs pa'i sangs rgyam dang / zas gsum dri bde bar gshegs pa pa de dag thams cad dang / dgong sapa
244b5(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi thig se gas la zhing dag bya'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems ma gnyis su med par sbyor bas/ rgyal ba dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyam tshorgyal ba med pa'i don gyipa skyel ste/ leshes kyi spang ba chen po yang dag pa'ang rig pa nyid pas
244b6(rnying rgyud): 'drar bar ston pa ni/ zla ba'i da dgyur ro// de latshig gi dan la rnal pa gsur ste/ ga sung la don pa par bstan pa dang / 'bras bu sku gsung zugs su bstan pa dang / tshig sdeb phyir legs par bstan pa'o// deng tshig gdon yang /
244b7(rnying rgyud): rgyab sems med byung nga 'dzin bcom ldan 'das dpal pa ma thugs kyi dgongs pa pades bying nas/ chus gsus kyi bde bar gshegs pa nas kyidon thugs kyi gas pa la yon byed 'a pa pas steb shad pa gshenan /
245a1(rnying rgyud): thas pasgrag sa thugs su bstan pa na// denas par byu ga pa da ba grags/ 'gyur ba 'i dbas pa da nabyas so// bas sabyasas sa sgra byung // rgyun tul chu sam d+ma snang gas byung /
245a2(rnying rgyud): snying po byang chub su// sku tshogs 'byung bas ye shes chos nyid ste// zhes 'byung ba la sogs pas/ sngags che ba'i yon tan byed par dbyung ste/ dpag pas bde gshegs chos dbyings su// chos kyi bu de ye shes kyi 'od 'byung ba'o// de ltar 'od
245a3(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten khams ma lus pa kun la khyab ste/ stong pa chen por bshad pa'o// rmad du byung ba sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// de ni ye shes kyi 'od de/ des byang chub
245a4(rnying rgyud): byung ba mthong bar byed pas/ rmang du byung ba'i 'od ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas/ yang kun rig chos kyi rjel zhus pa// chos kyi sku dang ye shes las/ 'od 'byung ba na ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gzung
245a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo dag tu byas nas/ chos kyi skur ston pa/ rmad du byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems chos kyi spyi'i/ ye shes kyi 'od de de tsam mo// de bzhin ye shes 'od kyang bsam mi khyab// sred gsum rnam
245a6(rnying rgyud): mkha'i khams pas 'od phud gsal// bskal ba'i zhing gi rab 'byams ji tsam gyi// sems can kun la thugs rje'i 'od de tsam// spyod dang mi spyod g.yo dang mi g.yo zhes bka' stsal to// blo dang ye shes rig pa'i 'od kyang rmad du byung ba'o// de snyed
245a7(rnying rgyud): du sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'byung ba ni che'o// rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi 'od 'byung ba ni shin tu gsal lo// de'i phyir nam mkha' dang nyi zla'i 'od 'dra ba ma yin pas/ 'od ni kun dang thun mong min zhes bka' stsal to// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba las/
245b1(rnying rgyud): da kyi ldang par kyi le Ta N+DI bu bdun pa'o// / le'u 'dis 'khor ba'i pham bstan te/ de nas rdo rnamams dpas byas pa/ 'khor ba'i 'am ma gang lags ston papan na rnas paka'ajal ba/ 'dod pags kyis nam
245b2(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang gis nigs dpar bya// zag dog gis ni dbye bar bya// nga rgyal gyis ni brdeg par bya// gti mug chos sul ma ston te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // ngargyal phrag dog 'di rnams kun// ma rig dug gsum rtsu ba ste// rigan
245b3(rnying rgyud): chub lam yin no// rin chen dpal dang chags med 'grub// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par snang // byang chub sems rmad du byung ba las/ 'khor ba'i lam lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // le'u 'dis 'khor ba'i lam lnga nyid rigs
245b4(rnying rgyud): dang yum lnga'i dbyings su bstan te/ yang rdo rje sems dpas tshig gi le'u gong ma la bstan te zhus pa las/ kun rig chos kyi rje la ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ma byin len pa sa yin te// mi tshangs stod pa chu yin no// brdzun du lba ba chung yin te/
245b5(rnying rgyud): gsod par byed pa me yin no// thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings su bstan// zhes bka' stsal to// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba las/ 'khor ba'i lam lnga nyid rigs lnga dang yum lha'i dbyings su yinas gnas pa'i don du lam lta yang da ltar bstan
245b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// // le'u 'dis 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras nyid ye nas dag pa'i rgyu ma chags pa'i zhing du gnas par lung bstan te/ dug gsum rtsa ba bcad pas khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras med// srog med gsod par byed pa he ru ka
245b7(rnying rgyud): chags med 'dzin dang bral bas bcing med dur khrod chen po brgyad// mi 'jug mi 'byung yul med dbang pos stong // rtsi nang blo zugs med pas rgya che yangs pa nyid// sku gsung thugs dang bral bas che ba'i mchog/ sngags dang phyag rgyab lang
246a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa smra/ yus sa nan dun sa/
246a2(rnying rgyud): 'a na bang yadang mang dusasu 'as mamams cad nas pa dag pa sa sa kyi/ sa rnam kyis na 'dus smra na pas 'das sa pas na de mas dan 'in
246a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i don nigs te thugs su chud nas/ 'gro ba yang tshom nyid la 'khor ba yang gyur na las 'das te/ gnyis su med pa don toganas sa bas to ma g.yo ng+gA'i tsha du bzhugs pa las sa

246a5(rnying rgyud): nas ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin du gnas par bstan te/ de yang chos nyid byang chub chen po'i rang bzhin gnas pa las dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pas/ yog thams cad kyi don ahrI yo gar 'dus par ston sa nyi so
246a6(rnying rgyud): don ni byang chub sems rmad du byung bar 'dus par ston to// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba las/ log thams cad a ti yo gar 'dus pa'i le'u ste sum cu so gnyis pa'o// / le'u 'dis chos thams cad ye nas sangs chos par bstan
246a7(rnying rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings na mi dmigs pa'i rgyal po la/ blo 'og dang phyogs cha med par bzhugs kyang / ye shes kyi thugs rje chen pos sprul pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa cer yang mdzad par ston pa ni/ thams cad dag

247a1(rnying rgyud): de pa dag shin/ mas sems kyi sems rang bzhin pardzun pa dug blang chub sems te/ pa gapa la chen po bstan pa dang / kya chub sems kyi sa drug bstan pa dang / byang chub sems kyu 'thus sad na pas pad
247a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa dang / byang chub sems stong pa chen po'i ye shes mi 'gyur pa'i bdag nyid du bstan pa dang / byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i ye shes ye nas sangs rgyas te/ rtag pa chen po'i g.yung drung du bstan
247a3(rnying rgyud): dang / byang chub sems mthar thug med pa dang brgyad do// de yang dbyen byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa la yang don gnyis te/ snang zhing srid pa'i chos thams cad pe nas ma bcos par sangs rgyas par bstan pa dang / de ltar rig cing rtogs
247a4(rnying rgyud): na'abras bu gzhan nas btsal du med par bstan pa'o// byang chub sems kyi nges tshig bstan pa la yang don gsum ste/ lung nges pa dang / man ngag gsang ba 'di spros pa med pa'i byang chub sems su bstan pa dang / dpe dang tshig la 'das pas gzung 'dzin gyi
247a5(rnying rgyud): yul dang bral bar bstan pa dang / byang chub sems las ma gtogs pa'i chos 'jig rten gzhan nas btsal du med par bstan pa'o// byang chub sems kyi 'bras kyi don bstan pa la bzhi ste/ thams cad 'thung ba'i rgyu/ yum kun du bzang mas
247a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings/ grong yadra ba'i thig ler 'bras bu byang chub sems kun tu bzang por shar por bstan pa dang / mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rig pa rang las 'char bar bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'gag dang bral ba'i ngang las kyang / thugs rje thabs
247a7(rnying rgyud): mkhas pa'i bye zag tu tshogs su bstan pa dang / phung po dpa bams sre mched lha'i sku phyag kyi chen por bsgoms pas/ dus gsum du 'dus ma byas pa'i snying pos shes kyi rig pa 'i dkyil du 'char bar bstan pa'o// byang chub sems mthar drug
247b1(rnying rgyud): ba med pa ltar bstan pa la yang do b+h+yat+te/ thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas/ rigs sgra'i sangs rgyas kyi su mdog dang / bzhugs bral bstan pa dang / dbyings dang sogs pasas \u0f7fsa rba'aM dngas po dang thAl te// rig du na
247b2(rnying rgyud): thags pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhin pa dang / shes pa dang shes kyi rtogs pas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ma 'dres par thugs su chud par bstan pa dang / nam mkha' ltar klan la khyab kyi dogs dpa khor ba'i chos med par snyan pa dang / rang reg pa
247b3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rtogs pa'i 'bras bu dus gsum du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'o// byang chub sems khyab gang la chen por bstan pa la yang drug ste/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du ni don rtogs pas/ na ra ha sa'i dbyings bgrod par bstan pa dang /
247b4(rnying rgyud): 'du 'bral med pa'i don bya btsal dang bral bar bstan pa dang / lung gi sha zang rtse nas man ngag gi dbyings bgrod par bstan pa dang / dam tshig sgom pa la gnas shing sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu thob par bstan pa dang / rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs kyi
247b5(rnying rgyud): gter byang chub sems rmad rubyung ba yin par bstan pa dang / rgyu 'bras chos thams cad ji ltar bstan pa yang / sems mi skye ba las skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar bstan pa'o// byang chub kyi sems mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa la yang don gsum
247b6(rnying rgyud): ye nas sangs rgyas te mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings na/ mi dmigs pa'i rgyal po phyogs med par bzhugs kyang / thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa ji ltar mdzad par bstan pa dang / thams cad dag pa'i zhing du sgrol zhing yum gyi
247b7(rnying rgyud): lhums su sbyor bas/ khams gsum las 'das pa chen por bstan pa dang mi 'pho mi 'gyur mi 'khor mi gnas pas/ sems rin po che kun tu bzang po'i ngang las g.yos pa med par bstan pa'o// byang chub sems stong pa chen po ral bzlas pa
248a1(rnying rgyud): la yang don nam pa gnyis te/ bde ba'i slong na sru'i 'od la bzhugs shing / gsung gi 'od zer la rol par bstan pa dang / kun rig chos kyi rgyal pos yum 'dod pa'i dbang mo dang gnyis su med par bstan pa'o/
248a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub le nas sangs rgyas te/ rtag pa'i g.yung drung du bstan pa la don bdun te/ zhing bcu yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bstan pa dang / snang srid thams cad thugs rje chen po'i ngang du bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'i chos thams cad byang chub sems su
248a3(rnying rgyud): nasu
248a4(rnying rgyud): kun nas bsdus pa'i thig le rtag chad kyi mtha' las 'das par bstan pa'o// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba las/ man ngag gi dgos ched bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// // le'u 'dis byang chub sems rmad du byung ba'i nges
248a5(rnying rgyud): tshig bstan te/ de yang byang ba ni sgrib pa dang bag chags ye nas byang ba ste/ shil skrong lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar/ dus gsum dang khams gsum dang / srid pa gsum dus gcig tu mkhyen pa ma 'gags pas/ dngas shing dag la
248a6(rnying rgyud): grasal pos don nges pa yin la/ chub pa ni tI la 'bru mar gyis khyab pa dang 'dra bar thams cad kyi bcud du 'gyur te/ lhun gyis gnas pa'i chos nyid kun mi snying po'o// su dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas chub la/ sems ni rtog pa'i
248a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes su gyur pas/ kun gzhi gsang ba'i dbyings nas ma bslad pa'i don btsal du med pa ni nor bu rin po che/ rang bzhin dang kha dog tu gsal ba ni sems skye ba med pa yin la/ bde ba ni dus gsum cig car rdzogs te/ chos kyi dbyings
248b1(rnying rgyud): yongs su dag pa dang / dkyim partsodan pa rgyad rtsoms su bzhugs pas da pa na/ tshan banagatan cigang dgagasapa cos mo dang // rnams stsa la sa sas rgyabyanas da/ rgyun 'phru to lanas sanas/ sa nga cad/
248b2(rnying rgyud): la ragra malas te/ gdan la bzar med pa yin no// thugasu la yang don gsum te/ kun la 'jug pa dang / yid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rig pa'i ye shes so// sbal yang don gsum te/ grong 'angs pa'i sa badra dang/ kun tu de pa'i bu dang /
248b3(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems rdo rje'o// gsung la yang gsum ste/ nges pa'i tshig dang / brjod par bya ba dang / thams cad du spros pa'o// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba 'dis khams gsum dbang du bsdus te/ thams cad kyi srog 'dzin pa'i phyir/ yum ldan tu/
248b4(rnying rgyud): bzang mo'i b+ha ga rgya mtsho'i dbyings su thim la sku gsung thugs lhun gyis grub ste/ bya btsal las 'das nas rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang du gyur nas/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po rang la mchod pa'i phyir/ kun tu bzang po'i mkha' bde ba chen por bsdus so// de gnyis
248b5(rnying rgyud): u med pa las sems rin po che bye ba med pa'i don byin ci ma log pa'i tshi ga dang yi ge mtshon pa las 'das pa'i/ rang bzhin dang kha dog cir yang ston cing / 'gyur ba med pa'i dbyings bde ba chen po'i grong yangs pa na/ rtag pa chen po g.yung drung gi skur bzhugs
248b6(rnying rgyud): so// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba las/ nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o// le'u 'dis byang chub sems rmad du byung ba'i yon tan bstan te/ byang chub sems bsgom pa'i don bstan pa/ gzhung las kyang khams
248b7(rnying rgyud): gsum rin chen rnyed pa'i mi zhes 'gyur ba ni/ dper na byang chub sems rmad du byung ba'i don rtogs pa ni/ mchod dang mching du nor bu ri/ nor che ba lang be DUr+ya lug shig tsam zhig gi 'od kyis/ ri de ril kyang nor bu'i ri de kun bai DUN+yer mngon no// de dang 'dra bar
249a1(rnying rgyud): thabasaturgyun mags/ gyu // sadu su mang / zad pa gsu rgyu / spyan/
249a2(rnying rgyud): yang 'byung ba lta bu zhes pa'o// byang chub sems ca dadu bralas/ rmad du byung ba'i yon tan dang kyi sgom pa'i lung bstan pa'i liT skye sum cu brgyad pa'o// / le'u 'dis byang chub sems kyi man dag bstan te/ byangang las rnam par dag
249a3(rnying rgyud): zin pas byang don thams cad dbyings su gcig ste/ ma btsal bar dbyings su med pas rkub 'o// thig le chen pos kun la khyab ste/ gcig pas sems kun tu bzang po'i ngang du gsal te/ mi 'gyed pas bde/ rgya gyen kun dang bral te ngag gzhan las
249a4(rnying rgyud): lus pa chen po/ rags par snang ba'i rtsol ba mi bsam ste/ bya ba byed pa med pas byung / mi dmigs pa'i dngal mi g.yo ba'i dran pa kun dang bral bas chung / skye ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yid gzhan ngam yengs pa'i man sems/ dran pa rnal du phang
249a5(rnying rgyud): pa la gnyen po gzhan med pas pa de dbang dang dngos grub kyi rag gang du yang ma lus te/ lam gyis bsgrub mi dgos pas dgongs pa lhun gyis grub pa chen po/ byang chub sems chad du byung ba las/ byang chub sems man ngag tu bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa 'gu
249a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / da ni le'u 'dis slob ma snod bzang po'i slob ma la/ lobA par bya ba'i gtan tshegs bstan te/ byang chub sems ni kun tu bzang po yang yin no// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te rigs lnga yang yin no// rigs kyi yul rnam
249a7(rnying rgyud): byang yin no// byang chub sems dab dang sems ma peng yin no// sku gsung thugs kyang yin no// chu 'byung ba chen po lnga yang yin no// rgya lang ben no// 'bras bu yang yin no// rdo rje yang yin no// ye shes kyang yin no// chom nyid kyang yin
249b1(rnying rgyud): chos mye byengs kyang zin to// chos kyisra bde bachen po pang yi no// chos can yang yin no// 'khor ba yang yin no// myang napas 'das pa pang ben no// gnyis tha pang med pa yang ldan no// rgyu bras kyang bad do// nam par rna sad ba yi //
249b2(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i ye shes kyang yin no// sems dpa' bcu yang yin no// de'i phyir sna tshogs kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems/ de nyid ma skyes rgyal ba yum gyi mkha'// yang yum dbyer med pa ni gru gsung thugs// zhes lung gi rgyal pos gcidra pa'i man ngag bstan pa'i
249b3(rnying rgyud): ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / le'u 'dis rmad du byung ba'i slob ma dang / spyod kyi skyon dang yon tan bstan te/ de yang bzhung las/ theg pa dam nul zhugs pa dang // dang gis blo 'pha dmar ba dang // thos pa nyung ba bro sbram dang / bslad pa'i cho ga gis 'chal ba
249b4(rnying rgyud): sbas ngan dad pa chung ba dang // pho bre ng+ge chal rang phyogs can// bcad kyang brag med ser snas bcings// de la rmad phyung don mi bshad// bshad kyang blo rgyud mi khrol bas// bla med theg rgyal rdzogs pa'i lung // a ti yog 'di mi bshad// byang chub sems rmad du ltung ba las/ slob pa rjo
249b5(rnying rgyud): pa la mi bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// / da ni le'u 'dis slob ma snod bzang po'i slob du la lobs par bya ba'i gtan tshig dbu las thun mong ma yin pa'i don brgyad kyis bstan te/ de yang gzhung las/ glang pos theg tshang khur bskur na// dud
249b6(rnying rgyud): dang stobs mi mnyam// rtsal stobs de lang thun mo min// gangs kyi seng ge gdangs byung na// sder chags phal dang gdangs mi mnyam// gdangs skad 'di yang thun pong yin// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs mthong na// rtse bran phal dang rlabs mi mnyam// rdza glang
249b7(rnying rgyud): thun mong min// ri rab srun po'i rtser byin na// ri phran phal dang 'pha mi mnyam// rtse rgya ba 'di yang thun mong min// mkha' gsal ti zla'i 'od mthong na// gza' skar ral dang 'od mi mnyam// 'od 'di kun dang thun mong men// khyad chen nam 'phang gcod mthong
250a1(rnying rgyud): na// 'dab chags pa la dang thugs mi mnyam// rtsal shugs 'di par thun mong man// rdorje theg pa'i gting mthong na// theg gzhan pa la dang gting mi mnyam// gting dpag 'di yang thun mong med// shes rgyang myong ba ba
250a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // thos pa chung ba'i sgo sgyum gnyis// 'gro ba'i don la don mi mnyam// don mardzog 'di yang thun mo min// zhes gsungs sa// chos chen po mad du byung ba las/ slob ma sdod pa dang po la phobs par bya ba'i yon tan hud mong ma yin pa'i le'u rkyen
250a3(rnying rgyud): shes rgyal po zhes dngos grub rang byung dbang bskur ba 'argyud/ rig pa'i rgyal po kun gsal ba'i// dran pa thams cad ting 'don mchog/ bya byed ye shes sur gsal po'o// ma lus dgro don rdo rjer zla ba// 'dod pa nor bya gtsug gi chan// rig pa'i gtechen
250a4(rnying rgyud): 'char la mos// bstan pa gsum gnyis mtha' can gyi// dus su rgyad drag mos rlung bas// tshig gcig don kun rdzogs pa'i bdag/ lung gsungagacig 'dus spyad pa li// dbu dum sbas pa sems ni gter// long pa u wa pra sha kas// 'jug cing
250a5(rnying rgyud): spyad pa'i nyams med pas// smon pa marjes chags rnal 'byom la// chog 'brel rkyen gyis mi rtogs kyang // 'phrul mi mthong sbed dgu bzhin// rtag med mthong ba'i mam // bram med dun kyims can btag// bzang ba rdeg par 'ang bangs
250b1(rnying rgyud): bsgral// chog gi lam chad pa shes smon la 'di// ma hA da pas rigs su bltas pa bzhin// rdo rjemams chog lam gyi sde mig ste// 'phrul gyi rgyud pa'i rnam pa mchad par// dbang po ma 'dzin rtsirtsa gsum gnas// dbu mthong nas 'ang ma thong lding du bcas
250b2(rnying rgyud): lag na rdo rje mngon du dbang bskur te// dus mtha' nyid kyi rgyal ba'i sa la bkod// 'phrul mig rgyud pa'i rdo rje zam pa yin// rang byung lhun rdzogs chen po la// 'dod pa'i don kun re ba med// thams cad ra ro sems dag pa la// gnas kyi maN+Dal skyed
250b3(rnying rgyud): med// rang byung ye shes 'od gsal la// rtsol ba'i lta ba rtogs las 'das// thams cad cig pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// bsam brjod bral ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ mi 'gyur mchog gi dngos grub ste// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//
250b4(rnying rgyud): mas ma lus thams cad kun// rtogs te rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// thams cad bdag nyid rang dbang las// bskur ba'i cha gnyis mi rtogs kyang // brda don sgrol ba'i man ngag sbyin// re dogs bral ba'i sems la bstan// 'byung 'jug med
250b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems la brim// dran pa sems kyi man ngag sbyin// rtog pa rlung gi dran spyod cing // mtshan ma'i spros pas 'tshol ba las// bde ba thig le'i man ngag sbyin// sems kyi rnam grangs gang dang gang // de dang de yi rjes mthun par// rdo rje zam
250b6(rnying rgyud): pa ma chad par// bla ma rin chen srog 'gyur des// de de'i sgo nas gter kha dbye// de nyid sgo kun phye ba yin// dbyig gi rdzas dang phrad pa yin// dper na lha yi nor bu la// maN+Dal rtsegs pa'i sgo bzhi yod// gang nas phye yang de nyid thob par 'gyur//
250b7(rnying rgyud): 'di ni thabs rgyal rin chen te// rtsal dang bral ba'i dngos grub yin// rgya 'bras med pa'i mthar phyin yin// sngags tshig bral ba'i nus mthu yin// tha skad dpral ba'i don mtshon yin// las gzhi bral ba'i don grub yin// 'ching bral ston pas lbab
251a1(rnying rgyud): 6byin// 'da'ab med pas dmachog yin// rnyog 'dzin spungs pas sangs rgyas yin// thams cad rol bas 'khor ba'ang ste// theg pa'i rim pa ma lus dang // rgyal pa'i thugs bcud nongs yan// rnam
251a2(rnying rgyud): dad kun gyi bdag/ 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// rmugs kyi mi nag pa'i dam pa'i thabs// gcig tu 'dus pa'i bde chen yin// 'di la zos bzung yang dag med// ting 'dzin sems kyi rim rtsal med// lus dang ngag gi rgya btsal med/
251a3(rnying rgyud): gang pa dmigs kyang rnam 'brer med// gzhan du snang yang gnyis sdang bral// kye 'jig 'thung yang 'ug ga bral med// gnas dang bral yang rten pa med// yul du snang yang 'gag pa med// longs spyod ldan yang chags pa med// thal bar
251a4(rnying rgyud): ba mchog dang ldan// 'di ni rdo rje lam mchog ste// skal ldan 'bad pa med par grol// rgyal thabs sems kyi rin chen dbang // spyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang zhes bya// sems nyid rin chen dbang gcig gis// bskur med rdzogs par sbyin byas pas/
251a5(rnying rgyud): ba phrag rgya'i dbang thob ste// zhing khams gnyis pa bde longs spyod// ban ma chags lnga yi sbyor ba yi// 'dod pa mos pa'i dngos grub stsol// spang len bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// re dogs 'bras bu dngos dang bcas// 'thob pa rang las ma yinan
251a6(rnying rgyud): gros parang byung gzhan las min// 'dod la mos pa rgyu rten can// bka' rtags tshig gi dbang bsur ni// nga rgyal 'dzin pa'i dbang thob ste// dgra bcoms la 'jug par nus// 'dzin drug bral ba'i ye shes la// bden bzhi gsal ba'i dbang byin zhing //
251a7(rnying rgyud): rten pa las kyi rlung bzung ste// chugs ra 'bab pa'i thig pa'am// rlung gri bskyod pa'i smig rgya'am// rgya mtsho chul chu'i chos// bkrus shing ti la mar sbyar ba la// zhag drug gnyis gyur sum 'gyur gyi// bden pa gtan la regs 'gyur te// bden pa bzhi la
251b1(rnying rgyud): ngam mas kyang // yun dang cas pa dasazhan sa// thug pasngal na pa rgyan pa bya// yod brtan 'dzin pa bzlog pa yin// stong ba'i dang ma thad gad yin// bdag med dmigs dang thal bsas// ram tho kha tha thal ba // zab gsasu thung dran ma
251b2(rnying rgyud): zag bzad nas dbugs kyi dgang // dbugs dang skye ba sems su bcas// lo gcig par gyi 'dres par dgang // dbugs kyi 'gyu ba'ang de nas zad// sems ci 'dzin pa de nas nyams// dus dang 'brel nas rkyen dbang bsur// byang chub sems dpa' blo can gyis
251b3(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i sdom pa dam mnos te// bden gnyis rtogs pas lam bstan te// sems can rgyud kyi mtshan togs nas// gi gnas 'brel ba'i gnas drug sbyar// lhag mthong gsal ba'i skabs gsum bgrod// zhi gnas brtan pa'i gnas rnyed nas/
251b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rnam gnyis zung du stel// stong pa'i nam mkha' de nyid bya// zla ba gcig gi rten 'gyur nas// de nyid stong par nag par bya// de nyid stong pa'i rlung chen la// phal ched dbugs chen 'byin pa ste// bskal ba du ma'ang gnas pa srid// sngon lam stobs drag
251b5(rnying rgyud): myur du 'grub// sru byin ldan pa'i phyag brgyang nas// phyag gi gdugs kyis pa nas ni// zhi gnas rten pa'i dbyings las bslang // mtshan ma thabs kyis brtan byas te// mtshon pa su'i rgyan ldan byas// bde gshegs rnyed khams kun tu bsgrags//
251b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bum pa na bza' dang // rang rtags phyag rgya'i dbang bsdu te// rig pa mchog ge dbang rnams bskur// 'dod la mos pa'i tshig yin pas// nga rgyal bde ba'i mtshan ma mthong // rgyal po phye la rtags can lnga// b+ha dang yi ge mngon 'dod pa'i// stong nyid
251b7(rnying rgyud): napa 'byor martson mtshan// dngas po gnyis kyi ltabs kying // bde ba chen po srog dang bral// bka' rtags dgu dang bco lnga yis// lus sems rtogs pa'i ngartsal skyed// ting 'dzin sems kyi smon pa 'dis// dngos po sman dang sngags sbyar gyis/
252a1(rnying rgyud): hA/ 'ad kun na gsus ma bya ba bstan// dan dang da pa mamathun pang // ma po la pa drung dad// nabs kyi bdan par dbang bzla bas// gzhang ma'i lag na dpa// dpal 'byung ldagand dzadang // dang
252a2(rnying rgyud): rdo sprul// rigs gsum sa pani rigs pa dang // de bzhin rigs gcig rigs sna dang // 'ad 'irlung srab te// tho dang mthun pa'i brtan basbyin// batshan man pa phyi tshig dang // bcwo gyis mi dzin// da
252a3(rnying rgyud): 'dul de bzhin no// 'di rgyud pa yi sbyor bste// dngos 'dzin rtog pa spang bar bya// b+ha ra Ni sI'i bsil khang du// gtsang ma'i lag na rdo rje yis// lag mthil gtsang ma'i dris byugs nas// rigs gsum stobs kyi dkyil 'khor bris// dam
252a4(rnying rgyud): gsum la dag par bstan// 'phrul gyi le long dgu bkram ste// dmigs pas dngos po'i rtog pa spang // lha yi mngon tags lag tu gtad// gang ba'i sa la nges bkod de// de yang bcos ma'i sbyor ba yin// rin chen ldan grub rtsegs pa'i 'ang /
252a5(rnying rgyud): ri bo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la// dpal 'byung lag na rdo rje yis// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor sngon du byung // dam pa lngal sngon du bstan// lha brag rdo rje'i rdzong phug tu// gtsang ma'i rig 'dzin gral la 'khod/
252a6(rnying rgyud): yang bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// ting 'dzin smon pa'i sbyor ba ste// dbang rtags sbyor bsang rgyal srin// mnyam nyid lta ba'i cho ga 'dzin cing // spyod paskam pa'i cho ga las 'das// dam tshig ldan pa'i lam gzhi can// lha dang dag pa dang
252a7(rnying rgyud): pa yis// sbyor ba'i dam tshig bstan pa yin// zhing bcas bsgral ba'i gnas rnams ni// lha ru myur dang gtso bos bsgral// bdag gi ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bsgral bas spyod pa'i dam par 'dod// phyi ba'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin rnams// rim pa rje//
252b1(rnying rgyud): sa da gan / rtsolas bya / sa rdzun pa// na /
252b2(rnying rgyud): zhi dedags bdag pa// la bu khyod pag pa 'an// banyan pa byung 'a gcor ba 'a te// ma da na pa // sa nyid tshig pa gnas/ ga
252b3(rnying rgyud): da pa tshu la gnas// rlung nga mthun pa don pa zhugs te// sum duH ba ma N+Da la gnas// tsam b.rang sku la zung du// mchong rjeng gtsug sa ma tog dang // rdorjebyas ba me tog dang / la ba kyi ma ga shes
252b4(rnying rgyud): pamadon ga s+ho // dbyis pas mig te 'as pa las// sadangs kyi bas te kyil 'asdong yang // snod dang thangs pa sa par gyur// dngang rgan pa'i mas pacan/ na pa'i blo bdes 'byangs de// de bri ba rgya dang / bababyin la
252b5(rnying rgyud): mu gas nas b+hA sa// gzugs pa shA sgri 'asngor ma ga // ye shes zugs pa can mdzod ga ba// bram pa'i nga byen ma rdzogs la nas 'aspyod// dedas par byag cab gyis// gad
252b6(rnying rgyud): ga ba 'i/ da 'ang rtab pa thos pas ma kyi// stsol ba'i sa rkyen bad 'ibyis byen nas/ glus d+ha de le zhes sras pa to thus// denas nab po 'byas/ tshul dang thun pa'i thos brgyad// gsu
252b7(rnying rgyud): la 'i bu chod// gagang pa'i gzugs partan dpel ma bar du// mtshon par gzugs parnyan der bzhug so// gsung ba nang derig na du// nges par lung brkyen ming phyin to// bcu kye spyod pa thams cad byas/ mdog ra byung ba'i spo
253a1(rnying rgyud): rnyed nas// dngu'i mi chen thog tu brtson// lha mo 'bar ba'i khal bzhag/ rol pa rtse dgu spyong pa bstan// kha na mtho'i las rnams la// bag med sems nyid rol bar bya// bde ba myu gu'i rig 'dod te// don dam bdan parnags
253a2(rnying rgyud): pa pin// stong nyid bde ba'i mnang gasbyin// rol pa'i kar bcu gnyis bstan// sbyar ba'i man dug rnam gsum bstan// bkrag dang mche dang bsdams pa dang // gzung dang spad dang bcing ba dang // spad dang gar gyi phyag rgya dang // gnyis bzhi ldan pa'i thabs chen
253a3(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i bden pa mngon du bstan/ nga byede nyid myal la gnas// rtags kyi spong bar byin gyis rlobs/ kyes dgra 'dzin da tho te// 'di bamed pa'i tshadang rjod// sras kyi bu tho nya bzhagal// bum pa'i bang thogartsi bas bcad dbar// sang
253a4(rnying rgyud): gsum gnas chen po// sprul pa brgya byin gnas sgyur te// brgya byin bu mo grags chen po// AN+Dal kun gyi gzungs chen te/ bde bar mchod nas nye bar bzhag/ gzugs brtan gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de// chags pa bde ba'i sa bon zhing // 'dod pa'i yul du gdab par bya// gnyis
253a5(rnying rgyud): med ye shes klong du 'char// 'dod chags sreg pa'i me yin te// rdo rje rlung gi snying po bskul// dbyings phyag 'khor lo me yi bsro// thig le rdzogs pa phyed nas bsul// rtsa mdud dang sam ma rgyas 'gyur na// ji ltar 'dod pa bde ba 'byung // ye shes 'dres
253a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i thig le can// dbugs chub bsdu ba'i man ngag sbyin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin yin// ting 'dzin 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// sems dpa'i bstan pa lung pog te// gnas med dkyil 'khor dam par bzhugs// de nyid dkyil 'khor dang thugs
253a7(rnying rgyud): nas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lags la du// don grub las kyi dbang bskur te// rgyal tshab gyes bu'i sar bzhag nas// 'bum phrag gsum gyi bstan pa bsgrags// chos kyi 'khor lo gsum gsungs te// bcos ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rnam
253b1(rnying rgyud): na rgyu na tuman tu na na na
253b2(rnying rgyud): du ldan du
254a1(rnying rgyud): ban mchags pang sa skyed pa sas// chags pa g.yon gyi la ma tho da// byed chen la ma dadu thal lo// mamaga'akho la ba ga pa'i khang// 'dag na ga gagling sa// gsong mo phrag zugs na/ da nga
254a2(rnying rgyud): sten/ rin chen 'bar ba gsal byed kyi// phyogs mtshams rgyas pa'i grwar zhug ste// yi ga med pa'i 'bru gsum stim// rnab rgyad lung gi gter chen ba krol// phyogs mtshams bcas pa'i 'khor lo bcas// rin can 'phrul ni mo yong brtan/
254a3(rnying rgyud): ba med pa'i rig pa skyed// rang bzhin gsal ba'i 'od la zhugs// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan// spyi thugs tshangs pa'i dbang bskur te// bde chen sa la bkod pa'o// bcos ma'i sbyor ba la brten nas// rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs par bya//
254a4(rnying rgyud): 'dra' bag lha'i lus bzhin du// rtags kyi de nyid don mtshon bya// bcos ma'i dbang bskur nyags kyi brda'// mtshon nas rtags ni spang bar bya// rnal ma'i dbang bskur chen po 'di// bral ba'i rnal 'byor gang dag ni// gang zhig mig dang bral ba yin
254a5(rnying rgyud): 'di nyams rnal 'byor lama'i tshol pa// rgya mtsho 'ding la stegs bcas nas// nam mkha'i dngos por lhag pa 'dra// bde ba chen po man ngag 'di// dmus long mdun nas gzugs snang zhing // skal ngan las kyis sgribs pa la// srog lus thal
254a6(rnying rgyud): yang khar dbyed min// blo ngan dad pa chung ba dang // dang gi blo 'phangs dma' ba dang // thos pa chung ba'i blo sbra ma dang // theg pa dman la zhugs pa dang // rang rkyen ngan pas dregs pa dang // ngar 'dzin dregs pas gtsor 'chel dang // 'jig rten bya ba'i
254a7(rnying rgyud): rgyar sgru da // thabs kyi chung chen 'jog pa da // banam chags ngan pas 'dzin pa dang // snod kyi drim mdag pas// bsgrub byung ma par mi sems dang // bram thob tu mi 'dzin dang // byama'i spyod pa nyams pa rnams// sreb banan byung nabar sdu
254b1(rnying rgyud): bdun// thogasus mal yang las kyis thal// mtshoman gsor gyi thog gzhizung// ma 'gyur zhan pa'i sems skyes bcang // gal ta bcas par bya ldan// da ga na gdan ba sa// chud par rigs srabs pa 'o// du ston
254b2(rnying rgyud): 'di las byung // dam can rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// bos pa bzhin du 'dus gyur nas// sha khrag la sogs dngos su za// dam shod gling gi dung khrod bzhin// mkha' 'gron nyan kun gyis sdud// des na zab pa chen man ngag 'di// rjes su mnyan
254b3(rnying rgyud): dam bcas bzu // rin che na gter gyi snying po 'di// kun bzang rgyal ba thams cad kyis// gsang ba'i bdag po bka' bsgob// gsang 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sral cu rtsa gsum bram tshogs te// srog shing rdo rje rtsi dgu 'bar// gser gyi 'khor
254b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar la bzhag/ gsang ba'i ting 'dzin padag por bsgrags// dga' ra ba rdo rje bdag nyid kyang // de ba bzang skyong bu thu'o// kun dga' snying po bya ba yin// lag na rdo rje gsang bdag gis// 'khor lo 'bang ba'i lte bar bzhag/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang
254b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyud// klong dgu bam po nyi khrig spangs// skye thugs tshangs pa'i dbang bskur nas// dus mtha' nyid kyis la bkod// 'dzam gling 'jing du rgyal thebs mas// sems rgyad rig pa'i thong cog can// rgyal gyi rigs can dra ma'i phral// cha
254b6(rnying rgyud): da na ko sha'i gling // phyag tu gsang ba'i gnas rab bcas// lung gsum rgyud pa'i rtsa ba'i don// dgu gsum sbas pa'i man ngag 'di// sems la glen zhing bde la 'god// yid la bcangs shing lus la bcangs// bka' yi bde chen ma mthong ba/
254b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud pa'i lung la brten// lus ngag sems kyi bya ba tsal gyis// ban mtshogs 'dod pa'i mu'o byed// bde chen grogs dang bral mthong nas// gsal bar gnas su dbugs chen phyung // 'phrul le ga rngorje zam par de// bka'
255a1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi nyid khwa 'ad/ ngang pas 'o ma bsdus pa'am/ 'jog pas rin chen phyung ba ste// rgya mtsho gang gi/ kha zab bzhin// bka' yi bdud rtsa bsdus pa yin// rma thugs tshangs pa da
255a2(rnying rgyud): gyis rgyal ba'i rim par bstan// rjes su mthun pa'i bzhi dang bcas// 'jug pa rgya yi rim pa dang // sman pa'i chad par kun spangs pa'i// kun rdzogs tshangs pa'i dbang bstan dang // brda don 'gro la ba'i rim pa meng// zhugs pa rtol rnga da man
255a3(rnying rgyud): sbyin// 'phrul gyi me long dgu bskor bzhin// rgyal bas dngos grub man ngag sbyin// gsal byed rin chen ratha' bar bstan// mi 'gyur bstan pa'i dbang bskur lnga// dran pa rkyen gyi man ngag byin// dran rtog rlung gis skyed byed pas// g.yo
255a4(rnying rgyud): 'don rlung gi man ngag sbyin// sems nyid mi bstan spros 'tshal bas// bde ba thig le'i man ngag phyin// bde chen dang byang byin rlabs pas// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i spyod pa bstan// brtan nas mi 'gyur lhun gyis tshe// bde chen rig pas bslab
255a5(rnying rgyud): par bya// dang po'i yan lag bstan byas pa// gnas dang slob dpon dkyil 'khor dang // slob ma dag dang 'jug rnams dang // dus dang 'jug pa'i yon tan no// gnas ni rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// gzhi yi gnas dang rten pa'i gnas// thams
255a6(rnying rgyud): cad rang rig sems nyid de// rgyu gnyis bral ba'i dngos gzhi nyid// bde gshegs grul ba ma lus dang // rgya drug sangs rgyas thams cad ci// bzhugs gnas rmad 'byung khyad par can// tshod dang bral ba'i rin chen khang // mi 'gyur rdo rje'i rgyu
255a7(rnying rgyud): las byung // rang byung ye shes gzhal pas khang // gnas nyid gnas la gnas pa med// de las dbyung zhing de ru 'dus// de nyid de le rang bzhin gnas// byang chub sems nyid bde chen po// rmad 'byung thig le'i gnas zhes bya'o// tan gnas/
255b1(rnying rgyud): dpang bstan byag// don grub rdo rta rigs can 'di// dang bab pa'i gzhi yin pas// ye shes rgya las byung ba yi// za ma tog gi rgyal mtshan nam// dpal phug na rje'i rgyal mtshan nam// b.raN+Da sti'i bsil khang dam// don grub rin che na sul mang bas
255b2(rnying rgyud): ga ko shi gling thugasam// don sgrub papa? shis khang bu'ang rung // ye shes stobs dang rig pa'i byin rlabs dang // bde ba'i gnas su bdud ni bcud spel na// rnal 'byor tshe 'dzin rig pa'i bye rlabs stong // des ni stegs ma'i rgyu can dang ba ste// rkyen pa
255b3(rnying rgyud): byor yin na rten bzhir gzung // dkyil 'khor rang 'byung ye shes te// ma bcos dngos gzhi dkyil 'khor gsum// thams cad ye shes rang rig gsal// mkha' ltar khyab pa'i bde chen po// ye shes dpag med yon tan gsal// snying po len pas @
255b4(rnying rgyud): rang la rdzogs pas lhun gyis grub// yon tan rdzogs pas yon tan rdzogs// thig ler 'dus pas gtso yi rgyan// snod bcud 'dus pas thig le che// 'bar ba dpag med gzhal yas khang // gdod nas grub pas rab gnas rgyas// ngo bo gsal bar
255b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung 'jug med// bdag nyid gsal bas myed pa med// rgya dbyibs bral bas yongs su rdzogs// yon tan ldan grub gru bzhi yin// rang rig ye shes chen po la// ma lus kun 'dus zlag ma yin// mtshan ma'i bag chags ma lus 'joms//
255b6(rnying rgyud): gsum drag po'i gzhal yas yin// 'dzin tod thal bas rang gis zhi// zhi ba chen po'i gzhal yas yin// ye shes 'bar bskum me ba// dngos po 'joms pa'i ji chen yin// lhan ne lhang de 'od rje chu// gnyis med thig le'i rang bzhin can/
255b7(rnying rgyud): ma lnga chen po// 'di ni rang bzhin rnal ma yi// dkyil 'khor chen po 'dod yin te// khro dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i// gnas pa'i dkyil du lus bdag pa// las rnams ma lus kun bsgrubs pa'i// rnal ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// zhugs pa med
256a1(rnying rgyud): bar dngas gru' du'o// nam mal myong ba das cwam// dang ga'i sems dpang na 'gyur bas/ bangs sems su ma stan// rgyal byub+hAg lags / sa ga gsag
256a2(rnying rgyud): sus hU~M rang bzhin can// mA du 'das pa'i bdag nyid can// m+b+ha was gcig rdzogs 'khor lo yin// bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// kun rgan chos su chen po yin// mjas srong rdzogs pam 'dres thaMd // tshogs drug sbal pa
256a3(rnying rgyud): rgya chen po// bcu mchags sa nyid rigs lnga yin// nam shes gcig ba dag rigs gcig nyid// shes pa'i bye zag rnams mtha' las// rgyal ba rdul lteng 'jig rten sgrol// cishA rin chen dkyil 'khor ni// 'og min gnas rkyen su mthe' pas/
256a4(rnying rgyud): sgra skad ma lus rnams mang yang // mi bzad gyen gyi 'khor lo'i gsung // gzung mchog sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dra rtog sems kyi rgyu ba kun// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo thugs// snod bcud ye shes dkyil 'khor yin// sems
256a5(rnying rgyud): tid ba 'byams dkyil 'khor yin// dus gsum khams gsum bdag nyid can// bems chags rlag ga mardzun tud na// nu drug gazlas pa'i sems can yin// cha drugs bdag nyed ni// seMN+Da'akhor ba ri po rje// zag pa zad pa
256a6(rnying rgyud): mdzan nyid do// gsang 'dus pa'i ga sa gag/ rtsa bzhi'i ba bas phyin// shes lnga mo bdag nyid pa brgya cig pa'i rang bzhin/ khyad pa dbyung ba lam dang la// tsal rnams pad pa'i thog pa las// des
256a7(rnying rgyud): pas su byag / khrizhi nyi sa gan na na ma
256b1(rnying rgyud): kyi big zung a yi rang bzhin// de dang 'brel ba'i thig le brgyad// rang 'byung ye shes bde ba bcud// thig le 'khyil pa'i tshul du gnas// rtsa brgyad 'khor ba'i rtse 'khor lo// gnye mo 'khril ba'i tshul bzhin te// dbang po dngas ma'i bcud dang
256b2(rnying rgyud): 'brel// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor brjod las 'das// mtshan dang dpe byad rang bzhin rdzogs// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gzugs khams te// dbus kyi thig le sgron ma'i kha// spyi bo gtad nas 'khyil pa'i gzugs// thig le bzhi dang la pa
256b3(rnying rgyud): 'brel// spos 'dzin bde ba'i sgyu mas gang // mkhas pas bde ba spyad par bya// rtsa bzhi 'brel pa'i thig le brgyad// bsam gtan bzhi yi sde pa can// phyi rol 'khor lo 'dab brgyad can// thig le bcu drug de dang 'brel// dang po nyid ni 'dre
256b4(rnying rgyud): ma yis// bzhi dang bcu ni 'dod pa yi// thun mong bde ba nyid yin no// gnyis ni rig pa'i rdzing gi 'gram// 'dus pa'i mdud 'chad me yi 'gram// thig le gnyis ni sgo med yin// rgyud rnams kun gyi thun mong gi// bde ba myong bar bya ba yin
256b5(rnying rgyud): g.yas g.yon 'dus pa'i thig le mchog/ longs spyod 'dud pa'i rtsi yis zin// chos kyi thig le dang po'i bajud// gnyis su 'khyil zhing 'dzag pa'i rtse// thig le 'khyil ba bzhi gnas te// bde ba chen pos 'gengs dang 'dzag/ 'khor
256b6(rnying rgyud): bzlog dang rtswa gsum rgyas// rang byung bde ba rgyas par bsre// rlung dang ye shes dngas ma'i bcud// 'dres pa rdo rje nyi ma'i tshul// 'khyil nas bde ba'i ros gang na// khams gsul ye shes chen po ste// ji bzhin rlung bus phebs pa yin/
256b7(rnying rgyud): bar gcod rkyen dang bral ba yin// longs spyod 'khor lo 'dod pa'i khams// bde ba chen po'i gzugs med pa// dngos po med pa'i snying po can// bde ba 'byung ba gu li tshogs// longs spyod bde ba'i thig le can// rnam dag chos su'i rang
257a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ bzhin yin// rang rig pa ba can po la// rtswa drug yongs spyod kun sa la sogs// mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyag sang zugs// ma lus rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te// rang gi myong ba'i ting 'dzin pa// sman du
257a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i yid sgron yin// zla la sbyor brtag pa ste// btsas ma'i thabs kyis sbyor ba yis// de bzhin dngos la mi 'jug par// bcos ma'i brnyan ma mngon byed na// don du dmigs nas 'jug zed kyang // dper na sde'u dang ke/ 'bag bzhin
257a3(rnying rgyud): dayis de'i don mi 'grub// bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor spang bar bya// des na rangab 'byung dkyil 'khor 'di// ji bzhin mngon sum kho na pas// 'di la de bzhin nan tan gyi// bkra gsal gzugs dang brjod thal swa// dngos bral rang bzhin med pa
257a4(rnying rgyud): hUM/ ma'athin me byings kying // rnatshogs dbyings nyid thag slong // bran 'dub 'di nyid dkyil 'khor ga/ bang bachen pa gcig gi rtso// yi shes su mtha med pa 'dug/ 'drin dang shi du kyil ma /
257a5(rnying rgyud): le slob dpon rnam gnyis te// badz+re don stsol ba'i slob dpon yin// shes rab mchog ldan ting nge 'dzin thob pa// dman pa'i blo spangs kyang par kun shes can// bstan pa'i bzud byung theg pa'i 'thog pa// bde gshegs sras dang ldan pa
257a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dang // razag las shing mi rtog byug rdeb// nang gi dri ma spangs pas 'jig rten chos brgyad spangs// smon lam ma nor dag pas bka' mis mnga' bdag can// shes rab dang ldan brtson 'grus khang par 'phags/
