260b2(rnying rgyud): dba'o// tas mdapa 'i snangan// rab myong ba zhi tshul med pa/ dang can pa'ang 'tshar// lus dbral ba'i mig gyin// chos gam par gyi 'byung 'gyur//
260b3(rnying rgyud): dacig pas nya ma rdzogs yin// tha' med pa'i sa shes ni// spyad dang pral bas bzhin can/ de'i srid par me rung ste// bdag pa 'on ta rdzogs pa dang // med tshab bres pa bzhin// ma sal pa ba chen por gas pa//
260b4(rnying rgyud): rdul pags// / phra da la yi gas shegs // na pan// rlomapa gag kyang thugs pan/ ma chogs man
260b5(rnying rgyud): gas/ na sa/ la pa 'ag
260b6(rnying rgyud): na mi ma / pa sa / sa
260b7(rnying rgyud): shis gtsigs kau/ de mthong gtsa ma med// bla med par drungs su babs// rang shes gas la bang smra byed// gang ya yin pa grolas med// rnam ni ma rgyab shes sul// bad par gshegs pa la gas sum/
261a1(rnying rgyud): 'dun na ldan ma// thabar kyis mnyes pa'i ma jugs nas// ba dzin can na mtshan pa \u0f7f// 'de smra ma na sas// // g+sa g+sa / tug dang da//
261a2(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i rgyun te// ngan rtog 'dod pa'i bag chags ni// rang 'byung bad pa chen mor 'byung // rang rgyas 'dod rgyal chen por 'byung // nam tog ye shes nga nyid la// ma bcos bde ba'i thig lder shar// rdo rje sa tog thabs kyi ci// rgya byed
261a3(rnying rgyud): kar bya bzhin no// rang 'byung dkyil 'khor lus la dgod// rlung dang be dradrung bde ba'i khams// 'khor lo ldani rim dang rim// snrubs dang drag pa'i thabs kyis kyang // bde ba'i lag gi 'ang byed kyis/ de ni rim bzhin bde ba dbang // rgod ma'i
261a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// sbar zhing rtsa gsum gyen du brlabs// 'bar ba mya gra drang shing zhig/ nyid khu'i bde ba'i rdzong du dbab// bde ba chen po'i bcud rlabs pas// tsit+ta rmas shing 'khor lo dbab// rin chen rdzing gi pad ma rgyas// hung ngu a la'ang ba tsam 'o/
261a5(rnying rgyud): lus 'dar dmigs ma 'dzum zhing 'bar// sems kyi dmigs pa sur gyur pa// sems nyid tshor ba badre te// bde ba rang 'byung gong du dbab// gtsug tor sbyar ba rdo rje yis// de ba rang tsa'ang ma dpal puSh+Ta dang // bde bye bsan du bo d+ha dang // u bar
261a6(rnying rgyud): ga a mA// de ga a men tsan tra lngas// tshig dbang nos nas tha ma'i lus// rgyal ba ngal lnga'i rigs su byas// mngon sum bde ba'i dbang 'di nos// rgyal ba'i phyag rgya mngon du btab// tshul ba nyid kyi rol pa mdzad// de bzhin tha ma'i skal
261a7(rnying rgyud): hr-i dgag/ thog ma men chen rtse ga bang bskur// thams cad dang 'byung thugs su dbang // de nas pa de ba'i thabs sbyin to// la shes bde pa'i 'khor ba las// ri la gyis las ni spang byab// kar ni mi bstan chos las// gsungs pa 'deb tus
261b1(rnying rgyud): chos// brtsaphrag gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// de la sogs pa'i ma lus chas// mgadang sras dang man lag nams// bad pa'i gatsham po rim pas rig// gnas dang mthun pa'i stod pa pa// bad ba chen po nga thugs bya na// bdan na
261b2(rnying rgyud): rgal ba thams ca kyi// rang ni byed pa ma nyid// rgyal dang bral ba'i rdzo gsum pa// thams ca la shes padapar dbag// mdum rtogasu la'i mnang gasbyin// mabyed thun gang rgyang rgyas pa des// mtshunga'i ba rol bca/
261b3(rnying rgyud): bzod dang bde ba bcug/ ba dang oMn ko sngar byas nas// bde bar dod pa sum lag gis// ye shes rgyal po reg par bya// mig po skrag cing srin ma langs// mig dmar de bzhin mdog dmar te// be shes rim pa spong bar bya// b+ha ba'i
261b4(rnying rgyud): yan lag snga ma bzhin// rtswa mdud lag gi bzung bya ste/ ka ra'i chos kyang rim par bya// rtsa mgro lag gis gnan byas te// 'phra ral bcad cing rgyab dpral// myu su kha ni shin tu rtse// sdang dang bsu sdang ba dang // rtsa pi zil pa 'dog
261b5(rnying rgyud): bde ba// rang khrus mchog gi za kar 'byung // de nas bde ba'i rim pa bzhin// legs pa'i sems kyi 'gro par bya// 'dab bzhi lte ba'i ye shes gnas// mgyi na de bas gang 'gyur zhing // med khugs pari bas g.yos 'gyur te/
261b6(rnying rgyud): chen ye shes rji rgyas te// 'dod dang bsam gtan bde ba 'ang 'byung // 'khyil pa'i thig le bzhi sgo nas// 'jig rten spong ba'i bde ba'ang 'gyur// rdo rtsa khams sa'i bcud// bde ba'i ma nu'i rtsa sgo gsum// 'phel ba zla ba'i gzugs can
261b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis// rgya tshad ba rgyas par bya// legs gnyis kyi khrig gor gsum// 'phel brnamam can lung // can gra dang drug gling // 'a rgyad pas kyi myong ba pas// zadapa bas dang gam byas// rgyal bzhin du langag par 'gyur/
262a1(rnying rgyud): oM bsgyur ba sdug dang dasapa// 'dod sanathal ba'i yan lag la byas/ ra'i sbyor ba'i dmigs sa byas// sug dang des // zag pa 'phrul bu 'arjod da da// dang pos srid dma' 'byor// la sa pa da
262a2(rnying rgyud): por 'gyur// g.yo dang 'bar ba la sogs byung // shes bsgras brgyamar 'gyur// kun+na rtog pa nyams par gyur// gang ga tad du migs pa'i yul de rin// rdzas la chung gi 'phen pa zhugs// rdzing gis las rnasasu 'dod pa 'jug//
262a3(rnying rgyud): lam gnas// ye shes chen po 'byung ba yin// lus ni brjid cing smin par bya// rdul phran zil ba chung gis bskyod// gnas gsum bde ba'i bstim gnas su// thig le rdo rje'i gzugs su chags// spos kyang bde ba'i gnas su bkra// rdo rje rgyal po thabs
262a4(rnying rgyud): chen yin// rdo rje yis ni gzhi ba bye zhing // 'bar bas mi dril gyiH// lag gi sbyor ba'i sra na// rigam ste ro rdo rje'i// pad ma khad pe rjes mthun par// 'phred rgyo su t+palatAM kos b+ha// a kar bya spong du rba ke/ tra 'jug 'bras kyi
262a5(rnying rgyud): snying po dang // re li mar dang de bzhin bya// sgong gnyis kyi sbyar bya ste// lag gi sbyor na na phur bya'o// rtse gsum 'dod pa'i dbus su gzung // de bzhin g.yas g.yon thug par bya// na yid bzhon la rab tu bya// sran nam bzhib pas sdum par bya//
262a6(rnying rgyud): te bde bar 'byung 'gyur na// rin chen rdzing du mchu btsugs te// rngubs shing 'phrang bas brlab bya na// des na de tsam 'grub par 'gyur// 'dar dang rtsal ba la sogs te// mthun pa'i rtogs rnams byung gyur na// 'khril dang 'dod pa'i tha krid bya
262a7(rnying rgyud): dang 'byung bde ba mngon sum bya'o// thabs kyi pha rol phyin par bya// thabs kyi phyag rgya chen por bstan// bcud chen 'dres pa rlung gi bsdu// thig le 'khyil pa sgo gyen// stod slad rgyas par rlung bsdus te// bems po chung gis 'phen sdud bya// g.yong
262b1(rnying rgyud): rAs tsab thas/ 'dung ga rgya bar bya// darda 'dod padrugasu dru// dra mas pazlas sa pas sogs dadu// zag tho gsum ngang sargyan byab// dadan ldan smras dpa// da stsog sa gas pas
262b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes rang 'bar gyi// thib 'i rdorje 'i byung min// ye shes sras rdo rje gzugs// thams cad ye shes lus can yin// bdes chen por spyan grub pa'o// 'dod rgyal thabs kyi rim pa yang // tham sa de nga gyung ye shes nas/
262b3(rnying rgyud): dang shes pa gang nas/ sa cad dbang bskur gyi// rang ma rdzogs pa ldan bya sbyin// banas rags 'dod sa mos pa dang // snod bu' tham ma bye sems nyid pa// thams cad sems nyid theg bya ba// rig pa'i na du bad//
262b4(rnying rgyud): bar ga can pa te// denyid ma lus kyi na dngos pa// spyang min med pa'i sa te// mi ces spyan lub da du byud// dus mtha'i grod ched nyid kyig/ 'a ga dang ni dang 'jig rten dru/ da shi din pas
262b5(rnying rgyud): rnams la bstan ma lus pa'i// nang kun ma lu sa rgyas gcig rdzogs// de ni skye byugs sangs pa'i rung // yon nyi 'i rigs kun pa dang // ma pa'i sems kyi sum mthong // tshang lan myong// 'a 'byung ba zhe
262b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// paM bcom pad pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di// rlos mad ga mam par la // bde chen pa'i 'ashes te// snul ba rgyan gyims pa yul// rdorje phrul gyi zab pa ni// 'di ni keng banag par za // sangs rgyasas su 'du
262b7(rnying rgyud): thams su jog ma thag / dus ni sargyal b.rigs da kyis/ khebs gzung mi su mdo'i da ma'i rgo pa ba'am pa kyi man/ las grasas pa
263a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad ye shes rol pa yi// bde ba chen por sbyar byed pa// ye shes ral pa'i thig ler brim to// de nyid babs rgyal rtogs pa yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor lam dug khrug/ bde ba chen po'i rol pa bya// rang byung rdzogs
263a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba'i ye shes mngon du zhugs// rig pa'i rgyal por bde bar shar// ye shes klong du dmigs pa srol// ma bcos rang snang ldan grub pa'o// bkra gsal su yi dkyil 'khor du// rang rig bde ba chen por 'khyil// chags
263a3(rnying rgyud): med ye shes brjod dang bral// tshig gi lam chad dgra gnyen tshul// brtag bral ma chags rdo rje'i gsung // rnam dag ye shes dkyil 'khor du// rnam dag ye shes gsung du 'khril// dngos bral rang bzhin med pa'i dri// rtog 'dzin bral ba'i chags med pa
263a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan dkyil 'khor mkha' 'dra bar// 'dzin med ye shes klong du 'khyil// mu kha bde ba chen po'i dbyings// 'dzin med longs spyod rnam dag pa'i// ma lus srub byed thig le yi// yon tan rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i ye shes thig ler 'khyil/
263a5(rnying rgyud): thim// gang snang rang rig ye shes nyid// ma bcos mkha' mnyam dkyil 'khor du// chags med thig le'i dbang bskur te// gsang ba'i ye shes rmad po che// spyod yul ma lus thams cad kun// ye shes chen po'i ngos gang ba// rnam pa sna tshogs ye shes
263a6(rnying rgyud): nyid// ye shes lnga yi bde ba rgyas// mi 'gyur rdo rje tshangs pa'i dbang // kun rdzogs bde ba chen por thim// thams cad ye shes mnyam nyid la// phyogs gcig bde ba 'dod pa'o// phyogs su ltos pas grub pa med// rnam pa'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin rlung //
263b1(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen por lhun grub pa// thams cad rgyas pa'i dbang chen te// ye shes rol pa'i phyag rgya can// rang lus ma bcos de bzhin nyid// rgyal ba'i sku ru lhun grub pa// phyag rgya su yi dbang chen yin// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i lus rnams dang // ye shes sprul pa
263b2(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho'i sku// ma lus rang bzhin lhan grub pa// sku mchog rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dbang // mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi// sgra skad rab 'bring ma lus pa// ma lus lhun grub rdo rje'i gsung // gsung gi phyag rgya chen po dbang // dran rtog ma lug rdo rje'i
263b3(rnying rgyud): sems// thugs kyi ye shes mkha' mnyam pa// lhun grub bde ba chen po'i thugs// spyi rmugs ye shes rgyal po'i dbang // rang rig ye shes rgyun mi 'chad// bde ba chen po mi 'phral gzungs// rang lus ye shes rin po che// ma lus bde chen lnga rgyas
263b4(rnying rgyud): btab// rnam pa ma lus mchog ldan pa'i// ye shes stong pa chen po'i go// ye shes 'khyil pa rdo rje bum// bde ba chen po'i chos gdab// ma lus dag pas chu yi mchog/ gsang ba'i ye shes dkyil 'khor che// ma lus 'dus pas bcud kyi bdag/
263b5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i ye shes bde chen po// ma lus kun 'dus rig pa'i dbang // rang 'byung rgyal po'i ming gi mtshon// thams cad rang 'byung ba tsal gyi thob// bsrung bas thob pa'i dbang rnams bral// bskur med gzhan nas ma yin te// bob med ma sus mngon lnga/
263b6(rnying rgyud): thob// mi 'gyu rdo rje tshangs pa'i dbang // kun rdzogs bde ba chen por nim to// dus gAsgra ma N+Dal ba thams cad ci// thugs la badrug pa'i mun dag zung // rnams cad brten pa rang la rdzogs// spyan thub 'di min mi rtog pa// ma bcos de nyid bde ba'i grong //
263b7(rnying rgyud): ldan sub dang byung sa shes mkha' thab pa// ma bkag rig pa rim par la rdzogs// rang 'byung chog pa'i bde chen po// yod tad spun grub rdzogs pa'i thong // zlos med cig me chen por shad// me tog ye shes ma lus gsal// 'dzin rtag thal ba'i chags
264a1(rnying rgyud): sa// sa // dgas // sa na // sa sa dgags e/ gzhan // rnas na
264a2(rnying rgyud): po'o// rang rig rnam pa ye shes su// bad gang don du gsal banyid// tog med ye shes rol pa ste// rnam dag phra ma'i ye shes thong // rang rig ye shes lha ma'i dang // rang 'byung tu mang mdzin dugasil// sman pa'i sums bcos pa// 'di su ma
264a3(rnying rgyud): gsal// rang sems spyan grub rin pa 'i// rang rig mapa' khyab rdo rje'i rtsa// sgyu ma'i ye shes sprul pa'i sra// gsal byed khams gsum gzugs brtan 'chang // mahA rak+Sha at+ta k+Shas// 'bru gas ma ldan pa'i sngags dang bcas// rdo rje rin chen dbugs su
264a4(rnying rgyud): gzu// bar chod rlung yang dathal bar bya// bco lnga tho rangs dus su bstan// 'phrul dzig rig pa'i rang gis bsdeb// brda don thal ba'i rgyal bu bzhin// nong gus nas brde bkrol te// 'khor lo bzhi la dbang byed cing // stobs brgyad mthu yi bdag por bsra pa//
264a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin skal ldan rigs kyi bu// rang snang brda don mo la thob nas// rang gi mtshan nyid ma bcos pa// sngon du bstan pa'i man ngag phyir// khams gsum mngon du gsal ba yi// lha ma'i ye shes lhun grub pa// 'phrul gyi ye shes bstan bya zhing // chak+Sha pad
264a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes klong du gzhug/ thabs kyi ye shes mngon sum du// skad cig dus mtha' lhun gyis phub// lhun grub bde chen tshang pa'i gsung // thams cad rdzogs pa'i bde chen mo// rang 'byung kun grub rdo rje ste// rdo rje gsum lus kun gyi dngos// 'dul pa thig/
264a7(rnying rgyud): le dgu yi bdag/ snying po la 'dus rdo rje rgyal// brda chen drug pasam rig pa brgya// kun grol bde ba'i lam la gzugs// lung gsum brgyad pa'i 'od can 'di// lnga dang dgu dang gsum gyi 'od// ma lus bzhir 'gyur dngos med pa// brjod pazhi bskad
264b1(rnying rgyud): bdang dag nyid// mig na ma tog rtsub thas// rnam mtha' dus padagang pa bzhin// bral kyang ma smras sems cig ter// 'anam na 'angs thod rgyal pa'i tham// nyid mangs slod gtar tha ba cad// mad pa'i rangs snod nga migs / zhabadams
264b2(rnying rgyud): gzhas mas dad pa'i gnas// gsang ba'i gnas che nag nas pa'i bdag/ chu dang thal ba'i dngos gzhi can// ngo mtshar chad 'thung de zhid bcad // ma lus 'das pa'i rin po ci// brjod byam lus kun 'dus pa'o// rgyal ba bsan pa gan gyig // dwags
264b3(rnying rgyud): bye bdud 'dus de nyid mam// spyod yul bral ba'i rang rig nyid// bde gshegs rgyal ba sran gyi thugs// ngas gni thas pa'i rang gnyid // bdag shegs rgyal bkud kyi zugs// ma lus 'gros pa pa kyi// dag pa med pas 'dus ma byas// bstan pa kun 'das thig le'i brgyang / rig ma
264b4(rnying rgyud): ngangags pa sa nas slong// phel dbrib za pas nam mapa'i dbyings// sdug bsngal med pas pade slong 'akyil// spang du med pas spang da la// deb med pas dgas pa ra car// shes rgyad bcad pa yul dang bral/ brkam chags pa zal dang 'byung bas// 'khor ba rnam dag ye/
264b5(rnying rgyud): shes rdzom byed kyi tang yo ma spangs pas/ 'bras sa gzhan 'dang sngal dang thal// ngag dang me dge pa gas sa// mnyamardzogs can pa'i byig pa da// gtsang dang rtsonang brtag dang // bams padam sum pashes pa// rtsod pa dbadag
264b6(rnying rgyud): ngas da med// pa gag da/ / la ga // da kyar da// du yang ldan tha da pa// na gags mi sa
264b7(rnying rgyud): dpa cig no// gtsug mir gas la ra sa brtson// gdeng du ba bas nas tham pa'i mtshig/ stong por chub pas na kyil 'khor yir// rang mardzogs dadabang bsur min// de nyid nyams pa da pa'i mtshag/ bde mchogasag la 'bar ba'i thong // me ldog bad
265a1(rnying rgyud): skyong gyuras// de nisgrub pa'i dngos grubs // mi 'da' ba med mchog te// phyag rgya sgrub pajam sa dang// malus bris shing cag 'gyur bas// bdam ldan pa macad pa yin// rang 'ardzogs pas thal ba yin// tha ma
265a2(rnying rgyud): pas ye nas dag/ rtag tu mchod pas rol pa'i gnas// gnyis med gyur pas mdzes pa'i rgyan// ma chus rdzogs pa 'orin po che// zad thung ngo mtshar dkyil 'khor rtse// ku na rdzogs po brang snying po der// tha ma ri dachen srog 'gyur des// thams cad rtogs pa'i
265a3(rnying rgyud): ldan na// dbang phyug rgyal pos zhugs pa yin// b+h+ra ma dang ldan pas rab gnas yin// rang nyid gsal bas spyan drangs yin// 'dzin dang bralan dri ma dag/ mos dang ldanan smon lam 'phangs// chags dang bralan tha ma mnyes// dgra nam sbas pa'i thig ledre/
265a4(rnying rgyud): gding chu bstan na de nyid mchog/ bsrung mtshams ma yin ston mtshams kyi// dam tshig 'di yang cang 'byung gi// tha mo da pa tshig byed par can// bzung ba med pa'i rnam pa can// rtogs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la// dngosas grub par ma dgos te// rnga chog
265a5(rnying rgyud): gis brjod par bya// rang sngags gling gi ri med po// rgya mdzad lnga bzhi sgo dang bcas// khrol na gtar khyil bdag po mdzad// longs stod gter la rol pa bzhin// rdo rdo cog gi madra thol na// byang chub gter gyi mnga' bdag mdzod// de nyid tshol nadamigs rtseb/
265a6(rnying rgyud): 'di ce rdzogs na dkyil 'khor mthong // thabs kyis zi na mnga' bdag ste// rdo rje rgyal ba zad pa yin// bde gshegs nyid dang skal ba mnyam// byang chub rdo ma'i rigs nges pan// mthar gyin ting 'dzin rim pa'i sa// ma bzod dman la lugs pa'am// bug ma /
265a7(rnying rgyud): shes par ma sbyar ba'i// kAn mang blo cag pa ta rigasapa// sgrol ba'i batha dang dmatshig bstan// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par babyed// sum khyab le shes 'bar ba'i sgra// chos dang mangs spyod sprul pa dang // khrod pa zhipa'i dkyil 'khor dang // 'dus pa'i ye shes lum med//
265b1(rnying rgyud): gas bas cad la ma nadutha// ba dang thad pa 'das na sus/ par ba batho ma rnams par bya'o bya// mangs pa bdag pa'i bangan sudags dag dugaltungs ci tugs// rnam ni rung dngas zags bya/ dadag
265b2(rnying rgyud): thobapas// sman grub mnya ma rdzogs nyid la rol// rang gas la bde ba'i longs spod bskub// mchags spyod pa'i shes rtogs// rang sems drub pa'i sgribs dang ni// nem tog bral ba'i thang chu ba stims// nyid 'gyur ba de pa'i grongs sdod kyis// 'byung ba /
265b3(rnying rgyud): la smin grub pas// rnam ma 'do nas su sang / don ngachal ba yi// gcis myed do tshim par ro// rngang tsog gi las nas so// de rtog phra ba'i tshig gis dman// bshang gci thub la sogs te// tog dang 'dra po'i dab// sa sa
265b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi// dngas pa'i ma nethags cad la// blang rtsib le'i mdang // bzang drug sa pog dkar po dang // tshad do'i ba bcas// chu yis gtor te bos 'gyur na// ci che chags gling gnod mi nus// dug pa'i sngags kyis btab pa bzang // de'i jib pa /
265b5(rnying rgyud): 'jugangs// sems nyid dam rtag pal bas pa// dus gsum lus ngag mi 'jug ste// 'dug pa'i thun mtshams dus kyis bya'o// rjes su mthun pa'i las byas te// rang tig cu thab rdo nga'i ga/ skra brjod pa na mtho 'ams// 'di togang dang rdzi
265b6(rnying rgyud): ga slas sdang // ma lus ye shes rdo 'i dra// ma las sbal gyi don med// de de 'dzod dpag yangs kyi// rdo rje ngag/ spyong pa ca'o// rdo rje lus kyi spyod pa ni// e ma ho nya ma rdzogs thig le mu li badz+rad// legs med rdo lus ci las// pha
265b7(rnying rgyud): las le gnyis medan// thabs cad legs rang rin cas// ga byed rtag med nga dra gang // thams cad skul sman dubapas// mchags 'dzin medang gis bcade// dper namig 'phrul sprul ni// de yis deng dgod pa didi// de la rgyag thams cad
266a1(rnying rgyud): dus / na // du gsas thaM du// sa nga/ /
266a2(rnying rgyud): mazag ca dacing bre gro thal// rnams kyang ba ba'i rgyal bar// gang bag rnal ma'i don thog pa// 'ad dang ldan pa'i babs chen gyi// bad sa nga ba 'tshal med pa// thabs kyis ma tshig gis min// zhid cas po'i rang 'das/
266a3(rnying rgyud): med pas rang 'byung yin// de ni yul thal ye shes so// rang 'byung ye shes kun gyi bdag/ lung bcu rdzogs pa'i thig le can// rang yul rtog pa'i ye shes te// de bzhin ye shes bdag bzhi can// mu rkyen nga la bas dngos grub med// sa kun dang mkha
266a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin can// lus dang bral bas yan lag med// dngos gzhi bcad pas rtags dang thal// kun spangs kun gyi dngos gzhi can// rtog pa'i gsal chung ye shes rgyas// bde chen shar ba'i ye shes rlung // de nyid de ldan de grub ste// g.yo ba med par kun khyab
266a5(rnying rgyud): shar ba med par kun tu gsa'o// 'dzin na lamags pa bzhin// rjud pa'i thal ba'i rang rig de// rgyal rtsal 'di mabasasrang mo// dag pa'i ngagasal pa bur gakyi'o// smras pa ma bkag zag yar spyod// ma ba sa ldan pa pazed po
266a6(rnying rgyud): ma skyes sems kyi thig le la/ rtsol sgrub thal ba'i ting 'dzin gsal// bya ba med pa'i don kun rdzogs// khyu 'bras rdo rje'i ngang la bsdus// thams cad rang sems da pa'i phyir// 'dzin rtog spros pa thams cad zhe// byad rtsol rig pa'i rang gis 'thung // tsas
266a7(rnying rgyud): thal ba'i sa sa/ ma nga sa nga / khya pas rgyam pa gas/ ma ga pa nga/ pa adang sas/ chu rdzugs thos da
266b1(rnying rgyud): gcig 'dus mams can ci dag/ rnam par rtag pa'i bathal// dras gsum thus pa'i rang ga nyid// thal dang thal pas byud po byu// nab rtog sa tshan pa stod pa// nga ba bya gyu dgasas// gnas thar thal sa nga ca 'ad
266b2(rnying rgyud): da da thams cadas spangs papa// 'jig rte sa dang ga tu pa'i// sems kyi rig pas pas 'as// rtsub pa'i lamamachog can sa da// 'ad pa'i yus ba can ngas pan// tshal rdzab brgya gas kyi// las ldan mams gnas /
266b3(rnying rgyud): 'drodo krol byed pa sgra rkyen bral// thang dor mos 'did rtsol dka' ba'i// mthar sbyin che ba'i 'bras 'dod ba// rmongs pa'i dgod nam mkhar la// gser gyi thems kas 'tshal dang 'dra// sdug bsngal las thol 'dod sams kyis// 'dod pa'i log lnga sti 'breg tan/
266b4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni ni nA che nas tor gyi dngos// don gcig rnam pa kun sems bdag/ 'grol med ldan srab rnam grol lam// phan rdzogs ji bzhin 'bras bu'i mchog/ khyu 'bras dbyer med mig le 'ingag/ bya med lha rdzogs sems kyi gat+tar// dpe byad mdzan chen rgyan rtogs
266b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan tsan phyag rgya dri ma med// dran rtog mi 'gyur gsal ba'i thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya can// 'dod sogs ting 'dzin bde ba'i ro// yan lag ting 'dzin ste bla da ga ca / rtog bde ba gcig tu dgyis ma lus kun grub dbye bcan// mi tog ye zhes 'de ba'i sug/ dpag cid ting
266b6(rnying rgyud): dzid 'brum thag to// skal ldan dang po nyid nas rdzogs/ chu drug 'gro ba ma lus pa 'i// lus snang rnam pa 'i rnyed pa// gzugs snang dgra pas bsus pa saH// thams cad la khyil pa'i ye shes su// tshad las 'das pa'i bu rdzogs te// sa lus 'dus pa su yi bcud/
266b7(rnying rgyud): grags stong 'dzin pa chags thel gsung // nu drug sba skad la thogs te// rab 'bring yi ge brjod pa rnams// ma lus kyi med rdo rje'i gsung // rbad 'thung sru grub chen po nyid// mi tog pana'ang ma thams cad go// thams cad stod pa'i rig pa'o// / sgyu ma cu zla 'de rje/
267a1(rnying rgyud): nga // brtagasapas kyi lags rnyed// babs dang thang can bral// rnam pa thosags thabs tho pa// rgyal ba'idag ga bzang ba sa bya'o// rnam pa' gzhas 'du da // bang dang skangs mthang babyed// chang/
267a2(rnying rgyud): gas na grub pa med// 'di dang bral na tog pa'i bdag/ mtshan ma'i mdud pa grol mi 'gyur// de nas sbrul ldan rigs can des// bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa'i// mi tog ye shes lhun grub pa// bde ba'i rol pas bslab pa kye// chung dang rtog pa bslad pa
267a3(rnying rgyud): yis// chun dang bcas pa'i ye shes te// bde chen ye shes chung la du dbab// rlung ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// rig pa'i chung dang bems po'o// bems po la ni rnam gsum ste// srog 'dzin shes pa'i rten nyid dang // lus zungs bcud dang 'dres pa dang //
267a4(rnying rgyud): snyigs ma lus kyi las byed pa// gyen du chu dang bur du rgyu ba'o// rig pa'i chung ni gcig yin te// bye thag brgyang dang dpag med pa'i// chung ni gcig gi 'phen pa yin// rten pa las rlung zin kyar na// kun kyang rig pa zin pa yin// bde ba'i rol pa la
267a5(rnying rgyud): shes su// 'bad rtsol bral ba'i bde chen las// lhun grub thabs la rten pas grub// ye shes rang rig chen po ste// nga gi mi ldog thabs kyi mchog/ skal ldan ye shes rgyal po des// bar pa'i thun mtshams bcu gnyis kyis// ye shes rig
267a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phur pas thebs// rtog pa gzhon pa'i chung dang 'phrang// 'dod pa dmigs pa'i yul dang 'phrad// mthar gyin dus mtshams gcig gis kyang // ye shes thig le'i dngos grub thob// bde ba chen por sbyar ba'i thabs// 'di ni thar pa'i lam
267a7(rnying rgyud): mchog ste// rgya 'bras med pa'i mthar gyir ni// dang po rig pa'i drung ga zur ste// tin dang mtshan kyi thu gnyis la// khri gag sbyong drug pargya d+ha// ma pa'i budapam pa pa ju nan // dra da ba pa'i yid te/ gas pabacwa le gcig
267b1(rnying rgyud): yin// dngas ma'i 'pho ba bstan par bya// 'di nyid rim pa 'di yin te// ye shes 'da' tshon lta bu rad// bdeb chen po'i ye shas te// bams gsum rang 'byung chen po ste// mi g.yo thig le dag byas te// rngubs pas rgyal bzung ba lar/
267b2(rnying rgyud): spros pa de nyid bshos pa ltar// ye shes thung gis stong par bya// a badz+ra 'das nas wang gi bar// g.yo ma rang byang thig le bya// de nas thig la'i rtags 'byung ste// khams snyoms rang lus padang rgyas// nyams dang thal nas mkha' la 'dug
267b3(rnying rgyud): tshor ba bde ba chen por kye// grub gsal zhing bye brag shes// de nas bde ba 'phro ba yi// ye shes rlung la rngub par bya// de nyid thabs kyi ye shes dgub// dper na rigs pa gyen rlung // kun 'dar phra ba'i rlung bzhin du// gsang ba'i pakra'i lto ba nas// nas
267b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i lto ba nas// shin tu phra zhing ngal ba yi// ye shes rlung gi lhun grub pa// bde ba chen po'i rgya ba bya// rlung ni thun phyed phyed dag tu// stobs kyis sdang bar nus 'gyur na// de nas chu ba med pa bslab// lus bsrang bde ba'i bag yangs kyis//
267b5(rnying rgyud): oM dang hUM du sbyar byas te// gsang bar lte bar dmigs bya ste// rngub dang 'byung ba'i rim gyis te// gnas pa'i bde ba rgyas par bzung // lus zungs dbugs bcud nyid du bsre// de la mthun pa'i rtags 'byung ste// reg pas lus zungs rgyas 'gyur te//
267b6(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po'i ye shes kye// nas sgo dang dbang po'i lam// kun tu spyod nus 'jug ldang med// 'pho ba med pa'i dgag pa'ang 'grub// dbang po'i lam nas rang rig tu// ye shes chen po'i 'dres nas 'bar// de nyid stobs kyi ma lus 'dres// bskal
267b7(rnying rgyud): pa du ma'i dbugs kyang bsrung // gnod pa med par gdams pa'ang 'grub// 'di ni thabs chen gang ba'i las// bde ba chen por rgyas thabs pas// rol pa'i klong du phebs pa yin// de nas bdag nyid rang 'byung gi// bde ba chen po'i thig lcer gasgral//
268a1(rnying rgyud): rang gi mtshan nyid ma bcos pa'i// bde ba'i dkyil 'khor rang lus gsal// rang byung bde ba'i phur pas thebs// phyogs bcum lus thams cad kun// ye shes chen po'i 'od kyis khyab// ye shes su yi 'od la grags//
268a2(rnying rgyud): dang byung gsung gi zer la rol// lhun grub bde ba chen po'i thugs// mi 'gyur ye shes chung ngu phebs// de nas bde chen 'khor lo bskor// rang byung ye shes rnam pa'i lus// rang gi mtshan nyid ma bcos pa// bde ba chen por sku gsum thag leng shang
268a3(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen por rang rig nyid du 'grub// ma btsal rdzogs pa'i ye shes sku// bkrag gsal bde ba chen po'i gzugs// rang rig sgyu ma'i ye shes gsal// chags med cir yang ma rtog pa// thams cad rang bung ye shes sku// 'gyur med ma bkag mo
268a4(rnying rgyud): du shar// de nyid mthun pa'i las cig la// mthun pa'i dmigs pa bsgom par bya// de bzhin dngos po ma lus pa// dran pa'i thag pa gdag bya ste// rang byung bden pa'i lung phog ste// spyod yul zhing lha'i phyag rgyas btab// gang 'dod de de'i lung gsang
268a5(rnying rgyud): byas// gang zhig gang dang ldan 'gyur ba// de yang de des smin par 'gyur// de nyid de yi phyag rgya can// de ni de med dgrol bar 'gyur// 'di ni de de'i thabs chen yin// pad+ma can gyi gser gling khang // gzugs brnyan mthong yang skrag cing 'thong // dran
268a6(rnying rgyud): las sdug bsngal drag po bskyed// dga' ba'i gling dang 'khrug pa'i gling // gnas pa bde dang zhe sdang bskyed// dad pa'i skal ldan smin par bya'o// jug gam mthun mtshams bcu gnyis la// man ngag 'bad pa'i rtsol bas bsrub// de nas rang byung bde chen te//
268a7(rnying rgyud): spyod yul thams cad ma 'da' la// thams cad ye shes rnam par gsal// khyab gdal chen po'i ngang la rdzogs// ye shes rig pa'i klong du gdag// mkha' ltar khyab pas mu mtha' med// kye 'gro rdo rje'i sa chu chub// ma bcos thig le mngon sangs rgyas
268b1(rnying rgyud): ra byung skyong ba rda dza'i sku// yon tad ldan grub rdo rje'i rgyan// bkod pa med par dang rdzogs pa// khams gsum bde ba ni yongs spyod dang // rin chen spyan grub byung chu bzhi // skal ba'i dgangs pa sems kyi gter// ma lus 'das pa'i thog le cad
268b2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje rgyal po kund med// log rtog dngos po tha dad pa// lhan grub padeb klong na gsal// ma 'dres gsang ba'i bde chen po// gang dang gang gi gang rnams ni// de de de nyid de de ru// de nyid de la de der snar//
268b3(rnying rgyud): nyid de yi rang bzhin pas// de rtag de la lhun gyis grub// ma lus rnam dag lhun grub pa// rig pa dang 'byung 'ang de rdzogs par// dang po'i thun mtshams bcu gnyis te// gdon mi za bar bcu yis 'grub// zla byed zla ba lnga yi zhag/ rnam pa mtshan nyid
268b4(rnying rgyud): dod rnams la// rgyab bral ba'i mngon sum la// rim gyis cig char goms par bya// spang len 'dzin rtog re dogs dang // bde spyod gtsang sme zlog srid pa// grub mthas log rtog 'dod rtsol pa// grags pa'i tha snyad g.yo ba'o// rang 'byung rgyal
268b5(rnying rgyud): bos thogs med par// lhod pa rgya mtshor ci bder myad// gang ltar spyod pa rdzogs longs spyod// lus ngag bya ba na lus pa// yul dang gdul bya blo yi rim// nyams par mi 'gyur thabs kyis spyad// rang byung spyod pa'i rgyal por bya// khung
268b6(rnying rgyud): chen nam mkhar 'phur ba bzhin// chags med nya ma'a'i sems med cing // gnas med gnas par mi b+ha'o// rig pa rang 'byung mkha' ltar khyab// kye med lus ni rdo rje'i sku// bde ba'i thabs kyis bsrub par bya// bems po'i rlung nyid lung bstan
268b7(rnying rgyud): ba// phung dang rjengs pa'i rlung de nyid// lus bzungs rlung la bstim par gyi// dngas ma'i lus gzungs bsrud du 'dres// mi shigs rlung dang gcig tu gyur// za ba'i khams dang bral gyur nas// thun mtshams zas la rten pas ni// thig le 'khyal ba'i
269a1(rnying rgyud): gcangs// thogag sa btsud dpa nas thug+sa/ da dang gad rgya'i sapa// thug gnyis pa nga du/ N+Dal 'khri gzugs sa 'gyur// man du gdang //
269a2(rnying rgyud): bcud // yongs su 'khyil par rang 'bar gzugs// sdigs ma bral na stobs dang ldan// rang byung bde ba chen po'i zas// mi 'gyur bde ba yun gyi tshe// thob nas rang 'byung ldang grub tu// skad cig de la 'grub par bya// 'di na
269a3(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyis// nges par 'grub ste gzhan du na// zla ba bzhi yis gdon mi za// 'di ni ngo mtshar ya mtshan kye// rmad byung thabs kyi 'phrul chen yin// bde gshegs ma lus dgongs pa yi// rgyal ba rnams ni kun gyi bcud// rdo rje zam pa rnam
269a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa kun gyi nyid khu 'di// bka' yi rgyal por phyung ba ste// rgyud kyi rgyal po lung gi mdo// man ngag sems kyi tshad 'dzin pa// bstan pa'i 'khor lo 'dus pa'i gtso// rgyal ba mngon du ston pa yi// ngo mtshar 'phral gyi lde mig yin// dza
269a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang bral ba yi// skal ngan rnams ni mun par lhung // bskal pa bye ba mtha' klas par// btsal kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'di na dngos grub ya mtshan gyi// mngon sum 'phrul gyi lde mig ste// dus mtha'i skad cig de nyid la// gang yin de
269a6(rnying rgyud): sngon du ston// rang byung nyag gcig mngon sum las// 'di las gzhan pa'i shes pa med// man ngag bstan pas rgyal ba'i gral du 'jod// 'di ni tshig dang bral bas te// phun mtshams gsum dang ldan pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub// gzhan
269a7(rnying rgyud): du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// nges par gdon mi za par 'grub// gnas ni brag dang tshul bzhag/ srog dang bral ba'i kha bzhin sdom// 'di gnas ldan pa'i sems can ni// khams gsum byugs kyang gcig ldan min// 'di ni srid bzhin dpal
269b1(rnying rgyud): dregs pa'i chos brgyad gtsor bzhag nas// nyams pa'i sems kyis 'chil 'gyur na// 'di la rdo rje dmyal gnas su// nges 'khyur the tshom med par nges// nges na bstan pa'i bka' dang bsun// bka' yi bcud 'dus thugs kyi nying la 'di/
269b2(rnying rgyud): lag na rdo rjes rna brgyad sems la bstim// rdo rje'i zam pa bstan nas 'phrul gyi lung bcu phoT// lung bstan skal ldan rnams kyi sems la thim// rna brgyad kyi grags tshangs pa dbang gi rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA
269b3(rnying rgyud): d+harma bo d+hi tsit+ta bin+du sa mu dra na sha A brta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems/ thig le rgya mtshoganas la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig/
269b4(rnying rgyud): go tshe/ sbyin napas cho 'phrul chen por kun sten pa// bcom ldan rgyal ba kun gyi snying po mchog/ yon tan ma 'gags rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhi// rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan dang dbyer med pas// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi rnam 'phrul kun ston byed// gas
269b5(rnying rgyud): ba gsang mchog gzhan las 'phags pa'i gnas// don nyid sgrib med yon tan kun snang ba// ye shes khang bzangs rab tu brgyan pa'i tshogs// thugs rje kyang sems rnam dag dkyil 'khor gnas// ngo bo gnyis med rang las rnam 'phrul zhing // yoH
269b6(rnying rgyud): tan zhin las kyu 'atsal rdzogs pa'i chos// phyogs dus ma 'gags rab tu bkod pa'i khams// zhi dang khro tshogs phul pa yang sprul bcas// gnas skabs gzhan khyed na dad so so pa'i// rgyas pa'i snying po mi gnyis rdzogs byed pa// dad brtson
269b7(rnying rgyud): shes bye rtsegacig 'dus pa'i tshogs// rang gi chas sun gnas rnams ston par byed// babs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gun gyis bstod// rigs kyi cal bamang pos mdzes par bcan// theg 'chog gsang ba'i chung chen gdas 'jug pa'i// ngang /
270a1(rnying rgyud): rgyus bras kyi zhing thams na ma snru gas// 'didag tu rgyun kyil kho bzhin par// ltung ba susogs sde brgyad 'das pa dag/ de smrems lags sa ga gas bcad //
270a2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i don ston 'gyur// bde gshegs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes gnas// dngos tshogs rgyan gyis chos rnams ma 'dres par// rab tu rnam dag grol bar byed pa yi// de nyid sangs rgyas theg pa ni mchog tu 'gyur// rang gi ye shes yang dag
270a3(rnying rgyud): char rgyas shing // ston pa'i byin rlabs bden gnyis zung du 'jug/ rigs tshogs dkyil 'khor kun la yang dag brjod// phyag rgya'i tshogs bcas gtso bo srung bar byed// rang dang gzhan gyi phyogs rnams so sor gzigs// de bzhin de yi gnas kun ma
270a4(rnying rgyud): da pas// bcom ldan snying po ye shes yang dag bskul// rigs rnams kun gyi bdag po rdo rje sems// rang gi gdan las chos rnams snang bar byed// rigs kyi bde gshegs rnams dang thabs cig tu// dgongs pa'i don gyis yang dag gsol
270a5(rnying rgyud): gdab cing // phyag rgya gsang sngags tshogs rnams rgya chen por// sri zhu gus pa'i tshul gyis 'dud par 'gyur// stong gsum 'jig rten khams rnams ma 'dres par// g.yang chen phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs nyid// rigs dang rigs kyi 'khor
270a6(rnying rgyud): los sgyur rnams las// 'khor 'das gnyis med don kun gsal byed pas// rang bzhin gyin rlabs sprul pa'i tshul gyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar ston// de tshe 'jig rten khams mang g.yo gyur zhing // cho 'phrul bkod pa'i ngo
270a7(rnying rgyud): mtshar rmad du byung // bde dang sdug bsngal chos su 'jug pa'i chos// de dag rang gi don thob bde bar gnas// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bya ba mtha' yas kyis// zhing khams mtha' yas rab tu gsal byed cing // de dag theg pa so so'i chos rnams kyis// de dag
270b1(rnying rgyud): grol byed gsang ba'idon par stod// nga mchar dus gsum phyogs rnams kun bslus pa'i// rju gi snying po 'di dag spyod las 'das// thams cad yang dag don las mongs 'gyur te// es ji ltar spyod pa'i mtha' dal ba'i// em jo ma mar dang ga /
270b2(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing rmongs// e ma rgyal ba mdzad pa sna tshogs ston// e ma ho dgongs pa'i don nyid 'di lta bu// e ma chos rnams kun gyi gnas 'khrug 'gyur// e ma rgya dang 'bras bu ji ltar 'brel// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor lhun rdzogs dag/ ston
270b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i don kun rgya cher bstan du gsol// de tshe 'khor gyi byang sems blo ldan tshogs// rang gi sems rtsal chos kyi dbyings sbyor zhing // phra ba'i gnas kun brtags pa'i gnas la 'jug/ ngo mtshar tshogs rmongs thams cad dmas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas/
270b4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi dkyil 'khor ji lta bu// brjod pa'i gsang sngags tshig rnam 'brel pa'i don// byin rlabs thugs kyi 'od zer sna tshogs pas// 'jig rten 'di dag ngo mtshar rmad du byung // zhing khams kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya cher rnams// zam mo gsang tshig bden
270b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'jug pas thongs// the tshom tog pa'i dri ma kun bas la mdzod// rigs kyi bde bar gshegs pa kun cig rdo// gnyis med shes rab yum dang kyor mdzad de// rgyal ba'i 'khor tshogs rang rig sprul par bcas// zhing khams dag pa'i gnas rnams
270b6(rnying rgyud): srung mdzad pa'o// bcom ldan lha yi lha mchog dgongs su gsol// de tshe rigs kyi bde gshegs thams cad rtse// gnyis tshogs gnyis med kun tu ston byed cing // dang po mchog las bskul bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa kun
270b7(rnying rgyud): gzhi// ye shes bas ma las mi 'dres chos rnams ston// thabs kyi rtse brag 'pho gnas ji lta bar// gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen pos// rang bzhi sdang ba'i don kun bstan du gsol// rgyal ba mnyam nying bde gshegs pan gyi sku// dgongs pa/
271a1(rnying rgyud): na sa // du sa / dkyi nga sa /
271a2(rnying rgyud): nga chum mas/ thig sa kyi ma gnas la 'jug pa'i drud laste/ bstan pa'i gang kyang mdzad pa'i tshul de'i skyed po'o// de das la ba gyig // rigs rgyarnal ba sangs rgyas sbyi// ra shi dngal
271a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad cing // gnyis med spong bas gtso mchog bskul// mchog bltas mchog tu gyur pa yin// rtse mo rgyud 'di ji lta Ta// byang chub sems kyi che ba dang // rang bzhin ji ltar gnas pa nyid// chos rnams kun gyi gzhir bya zhing // lam khyad de la
271a4(rnying rgyud): 'thad pa gang // dza bo spobs ma las 'das pa// lta ba rnam dag dz+wal ji lta bar// skom pa po la gdams pa dang // spyod padon nyid mi lte bar// mtshon byed dbye las yang dag 'das// de dag ma gris dpe gang yin// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nge/
271a5(rnying rgyud): shes dang // lhaska ma 'brel ba tshul ji ltar// 'thad pa gtan tshogs dang bcas pas// khyad par dka' don sgrub par byed// sta ba kun tu bzang po nyid// stod pa la sogs rgyud 'jug pa// pa 'arjes yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshogs// thabs
271a6(rnying rgyud): la mkhas pas yul ji ltar// zag pa'i rim pa sna tshogs kun// rang gi 'bras pa ji ltar 'grub// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la// col bcas bya ba mi byed dam// thig la chen po ldan grub tu// chos rnams ma badz+ra la rdzogs pa nyid// na
271a7(rnying rgyud): las de byar phub pan gyis// nga ba gcig pa ji ltar 'byung // chos nyid dbyings dang dbyings nam dag/ ye shes kun tu bsang ba'i tshogs// lun gyis grub pa'i don ji ltar// thig ma chen por dang rdzogs pa// mi 'jigs gzung ba rnaMm thal 'i//
271b1(rnying rgyud): b+hathal chos pan ji ltar rdzogs// rgyud che dgas pa 'dir 'dug pa'i// bstan pa'i sgo rnams ji wahA// de yi batshad don las rnams dang // lam tha theg pa rdzogs pa'i don// thabs kyi phyag tu san me tshul// dam pa rnams kyis brtag da
271b2(rnying rgyud): ma// dman 'jug yol ba bzung ba'i gnas// thams cad thams cad las byungs// dus 'dir bstan pa'i gnas chen yin// zhes rlo mas mthar pa'i sprin sa rtseg nag gsang pa'i gsal ba btab pa'o// rdzogs pa chen sa chos nyid byu
271b3(rnying rgyud): kyi sems thig le rgya mtshog nas la 'jug pa'i rgyud las zhus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod byas shing // phyogs rnams dbang bskur rang gi gsang lpags ston// zhing khams mtha' klus mchog gi
271b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor// myang nganan slong nam rtog dri ba sel// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi 'khor lo dang // phyogs rnams kun tu gzigs shing dgongs ma da// rang gi gsang bzhun med pa'i tshal// ston pa 'jig rten slod mar gyur ba kun gyis rab bdags
271b5(rnying rgyud): pa// chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon du nyid// rnam dag byang chub sems kyi rang bzhi gnyis med gro pa // rgyazhal bde ba'i sgo bu coMpa ji zhini btang rdzoms gnas/ rgyal khri ma me la sogs rtsod pa rgya mtsho gzhir
271b6(rnying rgyud): sbar ba// tha da snyed la mthol lam du bshad pa yang / bde gshegs yum du gyur cing ku kyi mdzu pa'i lam/ de gang pa 'byung kyir de ni rnal rtor 'chog gi lam/ 'gro zhing zhes dka' bran gyi lam s+t+rai mi n+do ga tog las 'das/
271b7(rnying rgyud): gnas med rtsigs sgros med pas ma dang bral// tshig gis mi thogs dge bas dang // dag dbang ba'i rjod yul med// brtad zhi rtag sang dka' la brjod du du la tsam med// don gyimang grong rnams kyi lam du med// sngon gyi ngang srong rnams kyi la ma shang
272a1(rnying rgyud): 'a// das gu las su/ sasu na /
272a2(rnying rgyud): sa 'a ma/ smra nyid 'du / ga das gas ji gas cir ba dzud gag
272a3(rnying rgyud): thogs pa gsul ba sa semasas pa ban ga/ shos jug sa dang gagi ti 'dzin rtsal ba grangs/ nga mtshubs pa zad rjod de nyid ba pa'i mig dbyer bzlas par masbed pa'i dra 'i padag de
272a4(rnying rgyud): gris la gdas de nyid 'das// laba' dang dbyam med langs pa'i rang bad te/ pi 'ad mi myong banyam pa'i rgyal bar gnas/ sems da byug pags gnyis me 'jis sh-i stsanas// 'dzin pas brtag pa rnye da batsho pa
272a5(rnying rgyud): dngag can du zung bas mi 'dang byung sa// rnam bster yang 'i dgangs thapas kyis la la// ban dung mam thur yangs kyis gang pa com dag byas/ nyid yongs sa dang pa tha 'd-i ma sa nyid byed/
272a6(rnying rgyud): drug las thugs pas mnyas pa'i rdul btsug/ 'an med la sogs pa la mang da ste/ 'thus da/ ma byor bzhab da/ ti 'dzid ga a tug rnams thab 'a' shes/ la la dang ma
272a7(rnying rgyud): te 'phrul pa yin// byathal gyur rdzogs pade ba'i tshul la gnas// ye shes rang byung che ba'i phreng ba nyid/ mi gsol 'gyur bskad pa ban dang thal/ yin pa'i bdud kyis tshol ba'i sdug bsngam 'dzamam
272a8(rnying rgyud): bya ba la phul lagan tu
272b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin gnas// ma bcom mtshan ma'i rtog tshogs mtha' rnams kun dang bral// bin pa'i ma 'gags yon tan dus gsum 'bri ba med// ma spangs nyes tshogs rtog pa'i yul rnams dag // sgrib med kyi nang kun tu ye shes chen po'i gnas/
272b2(rnying rgyud): stsol srub mtha' 'das sangs rgyas kun tu bzang // ye nas rnam bkang lhun gyis grub pa'i chos// de dag de rgyud rang gi rnam dag ston// thig le chen por chos rnams spros pa med// de dag byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// rang bzhin po
272b3(rnying rgyud): po yul kun gsal bar ston// thams cad byed dang bya ba'i chos rgyud las// lce 'gag rnam brtags rang bzhin don gyis bral// yul dang yul can mtshan ma'i tha snyad de// bsam rtog kun las 'das pa'i ye shes nyid// ces gsung
272b4(rnying rgyud): so// rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems/ theg le rgya mtsho gnas la 'jug pa'i rgyud las/ de kho na nyid kyi don gtan la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas 'khor gyi bde gshegs rnams// ston pa
272b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pas tshim gyur zhing // dga' mgu yi rang bstod byas te// rgyud mchog snying po bzung bar byed// de tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// mang po 'dus pa thams cad kun// the tshom rtog pa'i dra bas bsribs// don kun
272b6(rnying rgyud): smang yang gsol ba 'bes// bcom ldan snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rgya chen theg pa'i tshul rnams kyis// 'pho rnams khams dang skye mched tshogs// dbang po'i bye zab tshim 'gyur te// rang gi 'bras bu rdzogs par smra
272b7(rnying rgyud): de las dzaM snyan pa'i don gsang pa'i// rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa'i mchog/ rigs rnams ye shes chen por 'gyur// de nyid tshul rnams ji lta // blo gros zhen pa'i 'gro ba dang // ma 'ongs dus su 'jug 'gyur cing // 'di
273a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs phral la thob pa rnams// thabs kyi thag rgyags pa'i gos// shes rab ye shes 'brel 'tshogs/ ra ba nyid pa 'du ga padzad// ngam 'dir rgyas pa'i tshul byas na// das gadrang
273a2(rnying rgyud): las ni gsang ba'i don// khyod kyi thugs rje brtse ba can// rjes 'jug 'khor rnams gzung bar mdzod// de ltar yang dang yang dag tu// gsos btab phyag 'tshal bstod byed cing // gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyung// don kun chos so byed pa/
273a3(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin chos kyi don las byung // de nyid rgyas par gsol 'debs so// de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa gtso// rang byung bde gshegs rigs rnams dang // dkyil 'khor chen po'i longs spyod cing // rgyud 'di sad tu rgyas par ston// zhang
273a4(rnying rgyud): khams bsam gyis mi khyab par// snod bcud ye shes rang snang ba// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor nyid kyi gzugs// ji snyed rab tu brtag byas pa// de rnams rang las gzhan du min// 'jig rten sgron ma dam pa yis// rang gi bstan pa
273a5(rnying rgyud): gsal byas te// de dag gnas 'jug tog gral yang // thabs kyi phyag rgya gzhir spang ba'o// dus rnams kun tu nga yi dbyings// ye shes che las gzhan mi 'gyod// de dag ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// theg kun rgyud chen 'di las
273a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung // sangs rgyas zhing khams bsam yas su// sangs rgyas kun sogs dkyil 'khor che// ye nas ma bcos byang chub sems// rang bzhin ngo bo snang ba nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // kyang thugs mis la jug
273a7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal zhing // rang bzhin mi gnyis bzung byed do// mchod pastod 'dud cing che ba brjod// chos rnams ma lus rnam brtags na// / kha dog med cing dbyibs dang bral// de bzhin gzugs bces chos rnams dang // zhen rtog mthang las rnang
273b1(rnying rgyud): pol zhing // phyi rol 'byung sogs khams rnams dang // yul kun rang gi gnas kyis steng // de 'dzin shes pa dang ldan pa'i// 'gro rnams phung po khams ngag dang // skye mazed chos kun mtha' dag dang // dus kun du ni mgub phyir/
273b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis ma gzigs pas// der bcas chos rnams thams cad kun// rang gi ngo bos rnam par dben// 'gro rnams zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// tha skad mtshan ma sna tshogs dgongs// theg pa'i dbye ba grangs med pashar// rang kyang
273b3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rnam 'phrul gyis// thams cad ngo bo gcig par gnas// de dag rtog pa las bzlog cing // dbyings kyi rang gnas ma sbas pas// don kun gsal ba mtshan ma'i mo// yon tan sdang ba'i gzhir gyur pa'o// de las kyi rol
273b4(rnying rgyud): dag dang // 'byung dang 'byung las spar pa'i tshogs// gnyis 'dzin blo las rtog byed kyang // rang bzhin mi gnyis ye shes che// de skar chos can mya ngan 'das// byang chub snying po rgyan gyur pas// 'jam dpal gzhon nu
273b5(rnying rgyud): brtag pa'i yul las 'das pa'o// 'di don mnyam pa chen po'i chos// rnam dag byang chub sems ni sgom 'dod pas// der gnas de las 'da' med pas// de nyid yang dag grol ba'i mchog/ de ltar yul sems gnyis med pa'o// byang chu
273b6(rnying rgyud): sems 'dri rnam dag nyid// zung du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis ni// bde ba'i ye shes zag med gnas// de las de gyes nga nyid chog// de dag de yi tha skad las// rtog pa'i rgyan da rtog pas stong // dus rnams kun tu mi gyur pas// nom pa
273b7(rnying rgyud): po'i tha dad do// chos nyid ji bzhin 'di gsal bar// ma bcos bde ba'i ye shes gnas// bya thal bde ba'i grong nyid du// ma bcos ji bzhin btang snyoms nyid// ces gsungs mo// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub ci sems/ thig le rtsa mchog nas
274a1(rnying rgyud): la 'jug pa'i rgyud las/ chos nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems kun gyis// sdom pa gnyis med rgya chen por// thams cad chos kying de bzhin nyid// kun tra bzang ba chos rnams par/
274a2(rnying rgyud): sadugasas sa sa
274a3(rnying rgyud): rtags dang rnam hArtags pa'o// las kyi bya bas ji skyed par// so so'i theg pa sna tshogs pas// don mthun snod kyi rim pa bzhin// lus kyi sdom pa rnam gsum dang // ngag gi sdom pa rnam gsum dang // yid kyi sdom pa rnam gsu
274a4(rnying rgyud): dang // rnam grol theg pa kun gyi gzhi// ma bcos khyad par las byung ba'i// sgo gsum mngon par 'du byed pa// 'di yis rab tu grol byed cing // theg pa kun gyi rtsa bar bsngags// so so thar pa'i sdom pa dang // byang sems tshul khrims
274a5(rnying rgyud): rgya chena'o// ma lus kun myor yul du gnas// de dag theg pa'i khyad par mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs mdzad do// spyod pa thabs bcas gsang ba'i tshul// de ltar pha rol gyi sdom pa// sngags kyi theg pa grangs med rnams// @
274a6(rnying rgyud): pa so sor snang ba'i tshul// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ lam du bskrad pa thams cad la// don kun thog mar byung bas ni// de ltar ma 'ongs tshogs grol byed// dus gsum rgyal ba bde gshegs kyi// yul gyur kun gyis mtshungs pa yi//
274a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba rmad du phyung ba'i rgyud// de dag rgyu 'bras kun gyi gzhi// thams cad don kun ston byed pas// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rol pa dang // lha mo'i tshogs bcas lus kun spyod// de med mi 'byung de phyir ni// rnam par grol ba mchog ga lam// chos
274b1(rnying rgyud): na // pa / ma sa / nan s+ho// ga na//
274b2(rnying rgyud): rang gi chos kun rnam par bsgribs// de las gzhan du slong byed cing // skye bo'i tshogs rnams rab tu 'ching // zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems/ thig le rgya mtsho gnas la 'jug pa'i rgyud las/ dbyings kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
274b3(rnying rgyud): de nas chos dbyings rnam dag las// rigs bcas dkyil 'khor kun bzhings te// ma bcos byang chub sems nyid sku// thabs dang shes rab 'brel bar gnas// 'di dag gnyis med zung 'jug pa'i// rang bzhin bstan pa'i don gsal mdzad/
274b4(rnying rgyud): kun sbabs ma las 'das pa// rang bzhin gdod nas sangs rgyas gnas// lta ba spa bas ma las 'das phyir// de dag mtha' las rnam par grol// kun tu bzang po gsang ba nyid// de nyid nges pa gsum gyi tshul// rang bzhin phra zhing rtags dka' bas/
274b5(rnying rgyud): ba rnams kyi dgongs pa nyid// mi rtog rtog pa'i yul las 'das// mi gnyis rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med// zhig nas lhag mthong mngon shes sogs// yon tan ma 'gags kun snang ba// thog med rang gi byin rlabs shugs// mi gnas mi dmigs spos thal
274b6(rnying rgyud): zhing // so so'i mtshan ma kun spyod yul// thams cad ye shes snang ba'i rgyan// de dag rang gi byin rlabs che// bsam bya bas ma bya'i rtog tshogs rnams// nor bu 'od kyi snang ba bzhin// dpe bcas mtshon pa'i sgo rnams kun// de dag rab tu rgyas pa nyid// byang chub sems
274b7(rnying rgyud): nyid bde ba'i rgya// dkyil 'khor rigs rnams kun gyi gnas// dus gsum 'gag med ye shes che// kha dog dbyibs rgyan gsal ba nyid// tshig gis mi phebs dbyibs dang bya// kha dog dbang po khyod yul min// kun snang gcig tu rnam bral ba/
275a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid de dag yul kun dang // phyogs dus phyogs rnams bstan pa'i sgo// tha snyad tshig las 'das pa'o// 'di ltar bstan cing brtag dka' la// brjod bya rdul tsam gang la zhig/ de dag mtshan nyid gzung dka' ba
275a2(rnying rgyud): zung 'jug rgyal ba kun gyi yum// 'di dag sgom byed rnal 'byor pas// sngon gyi drang srong chen po ltar// lam kun rnam par mngon byed pa// de nyid yul gyis 'ching 'brur zhing // sgom chags rtsol rtsal dang bcas pa'i// las kyi dad chen 'khrul pa'i chu// de dag mtha' ba
275a3(rnying rgyud): na na
275a4(rnying rgyud): spyod pas don kun 'tshe byed cing // ston pa'i lung bcas tshig gi rgyun// mtha' rnams kun gyi las spyod pas// lam kun 'phrul zhing grol ba'i gnas// de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brengs pas// de dwags smig rgya steg pa 'dra// gal te de dag la gnas nas// don mdun gsang ba
275a5(rnying rgyud): skyo zhing // de dag mtha' rnams 'gag 'gyur te// g.yer men brtson 'grus chen por spyod// mtshon du med pa'i chos rnams kun// bgrod med yang dag lam du 'jug/ de dag mthar bcas mtshon byed pa// don mthun gsang ba'i gnas ma yin// 'di ltar 'khor dang mya ngan 'ad
275a6(rnying rgyud): phyi nang da la sogs gnyis kyi chos// ngag dang ma dag bstan pa kun// tshig nyid tsam ste 'khrul pa'i gnas// thams cad mnyam nyid zung 'jug pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rgya 'bras rgyan chags rnam dag cing // byang chub sems nyid bde ba'i gzhi
275a7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i don spyod pas// 'di dag dgag sdub med pa'i tshul// sangs rgyas theg pa bsam yas mod// gnyis 'dzin 'khrul pa'i gnyen po ste// yang dag la ma nyid ma 'khrul par// bstan pa theg pa'i tshul rnams bral// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa

276a2(rnying rgyud): ka'i rgyun las 'byung ba yi// khams gsum ye shes kun spyod pas// phung po'i chos rnams dag par byed// rnam shes dbang po yul gyi tshogs// der gnas der gsal de nyid 'das// ye shes chen po thig le yis// don kun gsang ba rton byed pa'o//

276a6(rnying rgyud): bcur rgya yongs ma chad pas// mtha' dbus kun tu bzang po'i sku// rol pa sna tshogs cer yang snang // dmigs pa'i rnam pa las 'das pa'o// 'di las spang yul bla dab dag/ dgag sbub dor ba'i gnas med pas// dus kun mnyam pa'i rgyal po yis// thams
276a7(rnying rgyud): bad chos tshogs mnyam par sbyor// sems dang bag chags gcig min cing // de bzhin gnyis su'ang gzung med pas// tha dad min la tha dad pa'i// sna tshogs chos kun 'byung ba'i gzhi// de dag 'don pas rnam brtags nas// snang ba'i chos rnams la spyod cing //
276b1(rnying rgyud): gyu sa/ dog s+ho// sadun tag gas// da kun 'ad cam// grag bams tshag brgyad pa'i // na gyun // gcig padu nang byed dus// ngacan canan ma
276b2(rnying rgyud): don ma / ma nga/ pa stsa// ba zlog pa bangan pa sras 'thas ga 'i ma rigs pas// babs bag rgyags / #
276b3(rnying rgyud): mi// rnam 'byor ba tung brel ba'i 'thas// spyan sa nga cu grang bam grol// 'di ga dkyil 'khor chen po ga ni// dang na chos pa rtog/ sems gasngal// dbang byab/ min pa ma thar drug ces// bye 'dzin 'ching bas bcangs padag/ dang/
276b4(rnying rgyud): mtha tha mas sgral pa'i ba // yang dag le gas la ga 'gyur// gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnam gyis te// thams cad pa du yang med par gyun// sngo ban gyim thong byung rdzo// b+hur ba cas theg pas ya dag gol// dang ba dam par grol ba'i mam
276b5(rnying rgyud): kyigs nga tug// ma thag dang srab babs pa'o// nga ba smras nga bar 'gyun// bkun hU~M/ 'ad kyi rdzo // / ngas pa pa rnam pa sto pa'i bzlas/ dadag cas byas tshul bar
276b6(rnying rgyud): byung // de rten ma par byungs byas ngas/ rnams da rdzu / rtogs la gas byungs pa'i// dngam pamams cad co ci gos// nam dag la ma dang rtags pas na// dpan ngag gan nams da// mnyam pa'i thal
276b7(rnying rgyud): rgyag rgyagasang rgyal sngags pa'i ma ma// bas dang shes rab che ldan // deganas sa can la pa'i nga // mas la thab rkye // shes m-igs rgyag da// de nga drung chul dziH// do nags pa /

277a2(rnying rgyud): rnams mthar thug rtogs pa'i gzhi// sdug bsngal kun dbyung 'gog lam dang // de dag mtha' rnams grol byed pa'i// rab tu spyod la gnas kun brgyan// mtha' bral yul rnam kun spyod pas// rang gi yang dag mngon sum rgyas// ma rig 'du byed sdug
277a3(rnying rgyud): mtshoganas la 'jug pa'i rgyud las// kun tu bzang po'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rgyal ba kun gyi gsang // ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rang snang ba// 'di dag 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i phyir// kun tu 'a
277a4(rnying rgyud): po'i sku gsung thugs// de bzhin nyid bcas rab tu ston// ji snyed sems can thams cad kyi// zhen rtog snang 'dzin mtha' yas pas// phyogs rnams kun tu rtog pa'i rgyun// sna tshogs yul bcas rnam par 'dzin// thog mtha' med pa'i dbyings//
277a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ye shes gnas 'jug pas// rgyu 'bras theg pa sna tshogs kyi// don kun so sor snang ba yin// blo bur 'khrul pas brtags pa yi// lo rgyus snga ma la brten te// rtsol ba brgyad bcas bya ba'i sgos// bde ba chen po'i gnas kun sgrib
277a6(rnying rgyud): rang gi lta ba ting 'dzin dang // spyod pas dang lam rim dag/ kun tu brtags pa'i 'khor los te// de las de bzhin nyid mi skye// rtsol bral lus gol ba'i phyir// 'khrul pa'i ngo bos brtags pa'o// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin la// byi nang

277b3(rnying rgyud): theg pa tu myed pa'o// dum rnams ca mig mo nang / de ba na byur bamed pa'i chos// ba rtog pa pas 'das pa'i// dang byung byang dubasams \u0f7f// jin byas pan drung bo ngadabyang zhig/ dren pas dem tha rnam par dag // brda ci che dang na na//

277b5(rnying rgyud): dus rnams can pa snyen// nas gsu smras// gas byu rgya mas/ theg sa cho su ngag pa na pas/ stan ce dru ba pa mi byed pa / zhes
277b6(rnying rgyud): da tshigs rnams pargod pa'as// phyogs rnams da da// da ga le gis ston pa nga nga // byang chubasamapa dang chogs rnams kyis// do b+h+yas gas nga byu parda shig// de namal shes dab pa med// bas dang brang thuthos
277b7(rnying rgyud): sa// gsang ba'i spyad na / rnas pas rgya ba gang 'dis// ba po da sa sa da/ 'a spyod pa sa sa sus 'o ston tu
278a1(rnying rgyud): bzang sA la gsol 'debs shing // byang chub sems kyi mchod par rol// de dag bstan pa'i don bzhin du// mthar phyi rab tu rdzogs par mdzad// yongs kyi chos rnams thams cad ni// thig le chen po ba 'dzin nyid/
278a2(rnying rgyud): zab cing rgya che grangs med mod// rgya mtsho chen po'i rang bzhin te// yon tan tshogs rdzogs sgrib pa med// spro ba med cing bsdu ba med// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// dngos med mtshan ma cir mi gnas// de ltar don kun gnas 'jug pa'i// mi gnyis ting
278a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin yul las 'das// theg pa sna tshogs ston pa'i gzhi// gsang ba'i mtha' rnams ma 'gags pa'o// rnam par mi rtog pasam gtan ni// nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas pas// rtog pa'i spabs ma yul las 'das// zhes gsungs so// de nas rigs
278a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/ phyogs thams cad mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ spyi bos blangs so// thams cad ston pa bla na med// thams cad theg pa bla na med// gsang sngags phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du// ma lus chos rnams kun skyong zhing //
278a5(rnying rgyud): rigs kun mngon par rdzogs pa dag / bcom ldan snying po khyod las byung // ye shes chen po kun spyod pas// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi mchog/ ces pa dang / rgyal ba kun gyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la dbang bskur zhing / bstan pa'i snying
278a6(rnying rgyud): dam pa 'di rjes su gdams so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems/ thig le rgya mtsho gnas la 'jug pa'i rlud las/ yongs su bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems/ thig le rgya mchog na
278a7(rnying rgyud): la 'jug pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / zu gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / ga lu sbas lus shing gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ u pa de sha sarba sU tra/ shri ma hA su kha na maH/ bod skad du/ man/

278b7(rnying rgyud): rgya ni ga / sems pa pa cung 'ad // de sems dpa' yid par gas// mal pe zhes byung bas na// rin ze 'byung ldan yin pa gas// sems kyis kyi ma / byang ba rlom
279a1(rnying rgyud): rtogs// bya ba cal med par byub pas na// nan mo grub pa yin par rtogs// zhes gsol to// yang gsungs pa/ ngal byang chub sems gcig ni// sangs rgyas sA la'i rang bzhin pa// na rdudu chung sa rtogs grang ma/
279a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ glegasang ba'i bdag po lags/ nyid kyi byang chub sems nyid ni// sangs rgyas su lnga'i rang bzhin pas// de don bdag gis rtogs gyur te// gzung 'dzin pa yi byang chub sems// de'i chos spu yin par rtogs// gapal
279a3(rnying rgyud): tog pa med pa ni// longs spod rdzogs su yin par rtogs// sems la dbang thob pasgyur nus pa// de ni sbrul su yin par rtogs// rang rig mngon du gung ba ni// mngon par byang chub su rtogs// sems la nyes skyon med pa ni// dardza' bu bur
279a4(rnying rgyud): rtogs// zhes gsol to// yang gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' rdo rje nyon cig/ nga la byang chub sems gcig ni// nyon mongs dug lnga'i rang bzhin pa// de don khyod kyis rtogs gyur tam// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// nyid kyi byang chub sems
279a5(rnying rgyud): gcig ni// nyon mongs drug lnga'i rang bzhin pa// de don bdag gis rtogs gyur te// 'dod pa srid gsum sangs rgyas 'dod// chags pa chos nyid dang la chags// sems ni 'dod chags yin par rtogs// zhe ba byang chub don la zhe// sdang ba 'kho
279a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos la sdang // sems ni zhe sdang yin par rtogs// gtib chos nyid don la gti// mug pa 'khor ba'i chos la mug/ sems ni gti mug yin par rtogs// nga ni byang chub sems yin la// rgyal ni theg pa kun las rgyal// sems ni
279a7(rnying rgyud): ngargyal yin par rtogs// phrag ni chos nyid dbyings kyi dag/ dog pa mtshan mthun pa dog// sems ni thag dog yin par rtogs// zhes gsol to// yang gsungs pa/ nga yi byang chub sems 'di ni// / 'dog drug gi rang bzhin te/
279b1(rnying rgyud): ma sa/ su 'angs ga slo // nga na grums pa // 'a nga nod // dod dgasas r+b+ba/ rgyu pa smro/ ma /
279b2(rnying rgyud): chub sems ni dkar por rtogs// che ba'i ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems ni ser por rtogs// thugs rje kun la khyab pa'i phyir// byang chub sems ni dmar por rtogs// gang la'ang thogs pa med pa'i phyir// byang chub sems ni ljang gur
279b3(rnying rgyud): rtogs// gzhan gyis bsgyur du med pa'i phyir// byang chub sems ni nag por rtogs// sna tshogs cir yang snang ba'i phyir// byang chub sems me khor rtogs// zhes gsol to// yang gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' rkyen po ny-id cig/ @
279b4(rnying rgyud): ye byang chub sems gcig ni// 'dod spyod wa yi rang bzhin pas// dedon khyod kyis rtogs gyur tas// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa/ rtsigasang ba'i bdag po lugs/ nyid kyi byang chub sems gcig ni// 'di sdo ste pa rang bzhi pa//

279b6(rnying rgyud): sems nyid ro tshogs// ji phyogs thams cad sems lnga po// des na sems nyid drin rtogs// reg tshogs thams cad sems la reg/ des na sems nyid dgra ga togs// zhes gsol to// yang gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' rdo rje rton
279b7(rnying rgyud): cig/ yi byang chub sems gcig ni// 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin la// da spyod kyis rtogs gyur tapa// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ phyogasang pa'i bdag po lags// nyid kyi byang chub sems gcig ni// 'byung ba wa la ring na/

280a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes ni// 'byung chen lnga yi skur phyung nas// tshig dang yi ger mi ston to// rang gi ngo bos chos ston to// bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog/ mi rtog mnyam pa'i chos ston to// zhes gsol to// yang gsungs pa/ kye rdo rje sems dpa' nyon

280a7(rnying rgyud): de nyid zhen pas bzung ba ni// de ni 'dod pa'i khams su rtogs// zhes gsol to// yang gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' rdo rje nyon cig/ nga yi byang chub sems gcig ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin pa// de don khyod kyis rtogs

283b3(rnying rgyud): nga las 'gyur ba med// rgyu nyid gser du gcig pa la// bzo yi las kyis bsgyur byas te// sru gzugs chen po byas pa'i tshe// gser yang bzo yi rdzas su snang // chol zangs dri snod byas pa'i tshe// gser yang ngan pa'i rdzas su snang // de bzhin pos

284a1(rnying rgyud): le stag gcig chos kyi su// byin rlabs yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje sa gsang ba'i bdag po la 'dis ces gsol to// ste gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rdzogs dra rnan pa

284a4(rnying rgyud): las med pa'i phyir// dor du rung ba yod ma yin// rdzogs pa chen po'i chos nyid la// spang ba gang yang med pa'i phyir// dor du rung ba yod ma yin// gnyis med ye shes kho na la// mtshan mchi yang mi snang phyir// blang du drang ba yod ma yin//

284b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs// bsam dbang phyogs nus ma 'dres pa// dngos dbang phyogs nas yongs su rdzogs// 'khrul dbang phyog nas ma 'dres pa// gnyis med phyogs su yongs su rdzogs// brgyad kyi lta sbyong ma 'dres pa// u ti po gar yongs su rdzog du
284b2(rnying rgyud): yang gsol pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags/ skye bcings rgyal po zhes bgyi ba// de don bdag la bstan du gsol/ gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// lam gyi spri ni grongs kyis bcings// chu ba na sprin rgya mchos bcings/
284b3(rnying rgyud): bdun spri ni ri bos bcings// 'byung bzhi'i spri ni nam mkhas bcings// theg pa'i spri ni a tis bcings// su gsum sbyi ni gsang chen skra yis bcings// ye shes kun gyi sti dag ni// rang byung ye shes chen pos btsongs// sdang sring cho
284b4(rnying rgyud): spri dag ni// chos nyid byang chub sems kyis bcings// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags/ gang zag dag gi bsam dbang dang // chos nyid dag gi dngos dbang gnyis// de don bdag la bstan du
