284b6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad krol grub// dngos dbang de las zlog pa'o// re zhig grol bsgo/ ma byan// yin tshul nges pa med pa'i phyir// snang tshul cir yang sdang ba yin// chu chad phyogs spyang med pa yin// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yin// nga 'thal gyim
284b7(rnying rgyud): slong ba yin// ldan ldog gnyis dang bcas pa yin// de la dbye ba med pa yin// sgo srur kun dang bral ba yin// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags/ phyogs cha can gyi lta ba la// de la bstan par/
285a1(rnying rgyud): bgyi mi bgyid// bde gshegs gsang ba'i bdag po yis// phyogs cha can du gsungs pade// nges don lags sam dgongs bshang lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag
285a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa/ phyogs gcig spangs na phyogs gcig bla// phyogs la chags pas phyogs thug mtha'// phyogs ris med pa'i lta ba la// phyogs cha can du gzung ba de// lta ba ngan te lding ba yin// de la gag na par mi bya'o// khyad
285a3(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ bsregs bcad brdung ba'i gser bzhin du// yongs su brtags te yi bka'// blang bar ShA yi gus phyir min// nga yi bka' ni dgongs pa can// yod mtha' dkrol phyir med 'tha' bstan/
285a4(rnying rgyud): med mtha' dgrol phyir yod ces bstan// gnyis med dkrol phyir zhag gcig bstan// spos dgrol phyer na brjod med bstan// brjod med 'grol phyi kha 'byam bstan// lta ba 'phrul gyi kha 'byam 'di// ji ltar nam mkha'i mdzang ba
285a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin// gang ltar sgor yang dog pa med// ji ltar 'dam gyi phur rapa bzhin// gang ltar bsgral yang stsal du btub// pags partson pa'i mtha' bzhin du// gang ltar 'ther yang 'dred du btub// ji ltar ston pa'i tshig bzhin du/
285a6(rnying rgyud): grang ltar skyes kyang rang dbang che// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ lce gsang ba'i bdag po legs/ chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs// sprul pa'i sku dang rnam pa gsum// gcig pa legs sa mtha dad lags// chos
285a7(rnying rgyud): kyi su dang chos dbyings sam// gcig pa lags sa mtha dang lags// chos kyi sku dang ye shes gnyis// gcig pa lags samatha dad lags/ rang byung ye shes ched po dang // marig pa yi 'khrul pa gnyis// gcig pa
285b1(rnying rgyud): lags sa mtha dad lags// chos can mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang // chos nyid don gyi ngo bo gnyis// gcig pa lags sa ma tha dad lags// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can dang // dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis/
285b2(rnying rgyud): gcig pa lags sa ma tha dad lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ bas ma dbang 'khrul ba'i phyogs nas mi gcig tha dang kyang // gnyis med dngos dbang phyogs su khas cad dbyed
285b3(rnying rgyud): med gcig/ ces gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye na ma mkha'i dgongs pa nyid ji ltar lags/ byang chub sems kyi bzhugs tshul ni/ gsung ba'i bdug bros bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ dbang
285b4(rnying rgyud): po'i rol gang gsal pa// rang gsal de la ma rtogs pa// de bzhin nam mkha'i dgongs par bshad// yul dang dbang po mi 'byed cing // chos nyid do yis mi 'dzin na// de bzhin nam mkha'i dgongs par bshad// rig pa nang
285b5(rnying rgyud): nas migayo zhing // de bzhin nang du mi col na// de ni nam mkha'i dgongs par bshad// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// byang chub sems su zhug tsam na// thams cad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid bu// chos rnams kun gyi snying por bzhus/
285b6(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sA rba bzhugs tsam na// gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral bar bzhugs// longs stong rdzogs srur bzhugs tsam na// 'dod pa'i phun sum tshogs par bzhugs// sprul pa'i sku ru bzhugs tsaman// gang la gang dgos de sA la/
285b7(rnying rgyud): zhes// dgongs pa phun sum tshogs par bzhugs// rang byung ye shes bzhugs tsaman// gang yang chags pa med par bzhugs// gsal lagasan rtog/ med par bzhugs// 'khrul pa'i sgo bzhugs tsam na/
286a1(rnying rgyud): ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// bden 'dzin blo yis gzung nas bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ sa gsang ba'i bdag po lags/ rang byung ye shes zhes bgyi ba// sa dang
286a2(rnying rgyud): yi rnam pa rnams// de don bdag la bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ rang byung chu chen med par ni// ye shes sgrib pa med pa yin// rang byung le gas chen po la// ting 'dzin pag chags mi sogs 'di// rtsol snga
286a3(rnying rgyud): dradagra las mi 'byung bas// rang byung las kyi dbang mi 'gyur// yul 'byung byas 'gyur ye shes de// yul las 'byung zhing gnas 'gyur bas// de la rang byung ming ma btags// sa dang swa yi rim pa dang // bsdus rgyas gsu
286a4(rnying rgyud): gyi rim par bstan// kun tu 'od dang pad+ma can// 'khor lo tshogs chen bslus pa'i tshul// kun tu 'od dang rdo rje 'dzin// stug po bkod dang rdo rje 'chang // dbyer med rang bzhin lhun grub pa// de ni 'bring du bstan pa yin// brgyad dang da
286a5(rnying rgyud): dang bco lnga ni// chas par bstan pa'i sa yin te// rang dang skabs su shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ ci gsang ba'i bdag po lags// chos gan cib sems gcig li// de do na gang lags bstan dugs
286a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes dang // sems can lus dang bag chags dang // sdang srid chos dang 'brung chen la// rtsab byang chub sems su gcig// spros pa med pa'i don du gcig/ myar gcig pas 'phru
286a7(rnying rgyud): byu gcig/ dpe cugacig pas don dugacig/ rtags dang gtan tshigs mthun par gcig/ ces gsungs so// yeng gsol pa/ rtsegs ba'i bdag po lags// pU dang ye shes don dam bden// gang gi tshogs nas chags pa
286b1(rnying rgyud): logs// sangs rgyas sems can sdang srid ces// gang zhig phyogs nas grags pa lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gas pa'i bdag pos gsungs pa// s+thA dang gzhas dan du bdan// sangs rgyas sems cad du ma sa//
286b2(rnying rgyud): bas ma dbang phyogs nas grags shing snang // dngos dbang phyogs nas dem bden// zhes gsungs so// lta ba thams cad kyi gnad man ngag thams cad kyi sdom// tan+ta thams cad kyib cung gung nas don bsdus pa/ bang mdzod 'ardul gyi l-I wa~M gces bya
286b3(rnying rgyud): ba/ gsang ba'i bdag pos sems dpa' rdo rje la gdams ngag rim par phog pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra sa twa ma hA a kA sha pra d+d+hi na maM/ yo gi ni tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' cha rgyas
286b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i chud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid/ sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin/ bde ba'i
286b5(rnying rgyud): mchom/ brtan mongam pa bdeb mchog gi badral rnam par bzugs so// nga'i byin rnabs las byung ba'i mangs kyad par mdad pa'i longs spyod ci nga btsun modas pa'i bag zham las 'ang brtags pa/ dbyibs dang ngangag tu
286b6(rnying rgyud): med pa na// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang / rdo rje dkon mchog dpal dang / rdo rje tshe mtha' yas pa dang // rdo rje grub pa gdon mi za ba dang / btsun mo dam pa yangs pa'i spyan dang / mi bskyod ma dang / rin rtse
286b7(rnying rgyud): mdag/ tshe dpag med pa dang / grub pa gdon mi ze pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po po/ phyag rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / byams pa dang / 'dam pa'i dbyangs dang /
287a1(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / gan bzang ba dang / btsun ma dam pa skyug mo dang / thung bas dang / dbyangs pa dang / gar byed pa dang / bdag thos ma dang / matag ma dang / yar mye ma dang / drim
287a2(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i sgo srung gshin rje gshed po dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / pad+ma mthar byed dang / bdud rtsi zab sbyor dang / btsun mo dam pa gshin rje gshed mo dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / pad+ma mthar byed ma dang / bdud rtsi zab sbyor ma dang / de dag
287a3(rnying rgyud): sogs pa 'khor rnams dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de yang dper na til 'bru bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs pa ste/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spang bar byas/ gang bar byas/ khyab par byas nas lhan de ltang nge ba'i
287a4(rnying rgyud): lta ba bzhin tu gnas par gyur to// de nas longs spyod par mdzad pa'i longs spyod chen po'i byin gyi rlabs las/ thub pa chen po rnams stong gsum gyi stong chen po rnams su byung bar gyur te/ de dag gi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos//
287a5(rnying rgyud): rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos so// shig shig/ rab tu shig sheg/ kun tu shig shig go// chem chem/ rab tu tshem chem mo// 'ur bur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// de nas mtha' dang dbus mnyam par gyur nas/
287a6(rnying rgyud): sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad do// de yang skyon lam gyi dbang gis sgra sna tshogs pa dang / gsung sna tshogs pa dang / thugs sna tshogs pas 'dul bar mdzad de/ sus 'dul ba la mi'i cha byad du byung nas/ bltams pa dang /
287a7(rnying rgyud): rab tu byung ba dang / dka' chub mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa dang / gzhani yang seng ge'i cha byad dang / glang po che'i cha byad la sogs pas 'dul bar mdzad do// gsung gis 'dul ba ni/ lha la wa'i
287b1(rnying rgyud): skang dang / kul bu'i slad du 'dul bar mang dang // thugs kyis 'dul ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi byer dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs 'dul bar mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam la pa' che bcas pa'i rgyud las
287b2(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi'i le'u sde dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod par mdzad pa'i longs spyod chen po/ rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor gyi rab su zhal 'dzum pa mdzod de mi snang
287b3(rnying rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la mgrinA gcig tu 'di skar gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sra gsung
287b4(rnying rgyud): sa/ ma ga
287b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sdang mdzad la sogs pas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas yang dag par
287b6(rnying rgyud): mchod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ bdag cag rnams gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bsrung bar mdzad de/ mtshaja ma med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor dus
287b7(rnying rgyud): skyes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ci bdag po yongs su mnyes pas khyab par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma'o/ rgyud 'di rtogs dka' bas// de dag thams cad
288a1(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa// legs so legs so byang chub che// legs so legs so gus pas skyon// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dga' ba'i spyan rgyas pas yang nas yang du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
288a2(rnying rgyud): gsol to// e ma ho/ sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// e ma ho// sangs rgyas gsungs pa legs// e maho// byang chub chen po'i mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// e ma ho sems can thams cad de// byang chub
288a3(rnying rgyud): sems can byang chub bsgrub pa'i thabs// yang dag shin tu rnal 'byor 'di// myur du ma med 'dod pa'i phyir// nyon cig nga yis bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ zil gyis gnon pa
288a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor rnams gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcug nas/ dbang bsrung bar mdzad do// de nas gdod chos 'chad do// kun gyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// kun gyis bsgrub par byab de// thabs
288a5(rnying rgyud): su ye shes bskyed pa las// phyogs su bltas pas mthong ba med// de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni// sus kyang mazong bar mi nus te// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs pas// rang byung ye shes gnas med sdang // de nyid phyir na rang bzhin med//
288a6(rnying rgyud): med pas med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung // yod dang med pa gnyis med pas// tog med dbu ma zhes byang // rang bzhin de nyid khon lo// brjod pa'i rang bzhin ci yang med// dbang po'i thal dri gang gyur ba// de dag cang ma ma yin no// chos rnams
288b1(rnying rgyud): na gyi chos nyid ni// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// d+hAg dang chad pa'ang yod min te// tha dad ma yin don gcig min// 'ong ba med cing 'gro med pa// smyos pa nye ba bzhi ba'o// dam pa'i don la dngos med de// mig dang rnabasA dang lce// lus dang /
288b2(rnying rgyud): yid la sogs pa yi// dbang po rnams kyis mthong min te// mthong ba blo yis bslad pa yin// yang dag ma rtogs 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das la rlom sems byed// yang dag rtogs na 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das la rloms sems med//
288b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// g.yo dang mi g.yo rnam par dag/ gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam dag nas// phra rgyas 'gag cing skye ba med// brjod med rnam par mi rtog pa// yi ge med pa'i gsung mchog ste// sgra yig rnam par spangs nas ni//
288b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa// dru na pa na pa las// khyad par ga gling ba ba sa
288b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid ni chags med de// ma skyes mi gnas mi dmigs shing // mi rtog pa de dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i chud las/ chos nyid mi 'gyur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// /
288b6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen pos/ nyid kyi che ba dpung bar bzhed nas/ sku dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid 'di lta bu gsungs so// kun la khyab pa'i rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma
288b7(rnying rgyud): gzigs te// mngon sum mi gnas kun du khyab// kun tu 'od do 'dus ma byas// rtag pa de nyid rdo rje'i sku// kA ya dag pa'i rgyal mchog ste// chos nyid su zhes bshad pa yin// de rtogs gsal bar byed pa ni// rang byung ye shes chen
289a1(rnying rgyud): bste// ban gzhil sogs gyur pa'o// rlabs kyi ma pas 'byung ba ste// parda kun te 'dus smras so// mi rtag mdon byang rgyab ba'i bya// gardzabasags pa'i dun mag// / stong pa ga byer na
289a2(rnying rgyud): pas// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub// gnyis su med pa chos kyi sku'o// byin gyis rlabs las byung ba yi// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na// kun rdzob don du sems bskyed nas// sdang ba mi 'gog pa yi thabs// sngags
289a3(rnying rgyud): ngang phyag rgyas rab brtan pas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor shar// longs spyod sru nges rten 'brel mchog/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen te// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan par gnas// rgyun gyis rtag pa bsod nams sku// ye shes rnams dang
289a4(rnying rgyud): yang dag ldan// mgon po bdag nyid chen pos ni// rdo rje 'khor lo bskor ba na// ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed// rig pa'i skyes bu chen po las// smon lam las ni rten 'brel bas// 'jig
289a5(rnying rgyud): rten khams ni thams cad du// sprul pa'i sku ni snang bar byed// ye shes rnams dang yang dag ldan// mi rtag de nyid 'dus byas pas// bltams nas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// log par rtog pa thams cad la// thugs rje'i zhing du 'brel pas/
289a6(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis// 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams smin par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu'i bdag nyid spu dang ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
289a7(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ bsgrub par bya ba'i don gyi thabs sru dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di rnams gsungs so// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// kho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan
289b1(rnying rgyud): med pa yin rigs rgyud min// kha dog ma yi na dbyibs ma yin// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyu yin te// med pa ma yin med pa yi// 'bras bu 'byung bas snying po yod// kun la khyab pa'i dbyings nyid las// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod me lang/
289b2(rnying rgyud): chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sku dang // bsam yas sprul sku sna tshogs pa'i// rnam par 'phro ba'ang spros pa med// rnam dag sku ston ma yin te// srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la// ji ltar 'dul ba'i sku yang ston// stong nyid dbyings las g.yos
289b3(rnying rgyud): pa med// gyes brjod pas/ sru'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yang mi snang bar gyur te/ de nas yang gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gsungs so// brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid las// 'dul ba'i dbang gis ji snyed pa// rtog 'dul sgra skad de lteng 'phro//
289b4(rnying rgyud): theg gcig theg gnyis theg dang gsum// theg pa lnga dang bsam mi khyab// theg pa mtha' dag ngas bstan te// dbus mtha' rnam par bkag pa'o// gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu 'gro// thams cad gsung
289b5(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ brgyad khri bzhi stong mtha' yas pa// gsang ba'i dbyings su thim mdzad do// zhes brjod pas/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad/ chos kyi dbyings su thim nas migasal bar gyur to// de nas thugs kyi
289b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya las// phyag rgya chen po rnam 'phros te// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// rin chen rigs la sogs pa yi// phyag rgya chen po 'od du 'bar// u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/
289b7(rnying rgyud): brgyal man ni re 'ga'a'o// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang // rang sdang ba yi rig pa ste// gzhan na yod pa ma yin no// zhes brjod pas/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mi dmigs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
290a1(rnying rgyud): cad kyi rang bzhin nam ma kha' cha rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i rnyed las/ klu dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi kyil 'khor ma rtog par bstan pa'i lte ltaba'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nams dang
290a2(rnying rgyud): mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ phyag btsal nas/ 'dun pas mgrin gcig tu/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po mchog
290a3(rnying rgyud): ma 'ongs rnams kyi don slad du// thabs kyi mchog tu gang gyur pa// gzu po chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ shin tu sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin
290a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la gsang ba dam pa 'di lta bu gsungs so// gang zhig bsgrub par 'dod pa ni// thos bsam bsgom la rab gnas shing // shes rab can du gang gyur pa// snying rje'i mthu las byung ba la// byang chub sems dang yang dag
290a5(rnying rgyud): ldan// gtor dang tshul khrims la sogs pa// spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur te// dbang skur cho ga phun sum ldan// rnal 'byor chud ni thams cad las// thabs kyi rim par gang gyur pa// rin chen rigs su gang ldan pas// bla ma'i kha nas
290a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs par bya// yang dag bsrub par 'dod pa la// ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan ldan// mang du thos shing shes rab ldan// 'khor gyi 'jigs bral slob med// seng ge zugs rje rab ldan pas// dam pa'i don nyid mnor bslab//
290a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// theg pa'i mchog ste bla na med// mchog tu gyur pa bsgrub par bya// yang dag mthong bas rtogs 'gyur na// rang bzhin med par cing yang sdang // rang bzhin med pa'i don de ni// blun po tog gi'i spyod
290b1(rnying rgyud): na// shA du / na na na// na rdzu na// ma gapas ldan / sa sa/
290b2(rnying rgyud): nga pa / nga ba ma ma dgaN+DI/ bang ba sa pa pa/ skyed da rdzogs pa gang rdzun / 'ab bapas da pan ma pa
290b3(rnying rgyud): pazhem pa dus sa/ smran pa da / // pa ga s+ho/ ma / ya
290b4(rnying rgyud): sa // na sa / sa su nga /
290b5(rnying rgyud): sugasasmra sa
290b6(rnying rgyud): 'o// no migs da ga// gas ga babs la bad+hA lan 'ju/ sa byar kyi rdzug thams// byang ba n+d+ha ma mirna ma 'thabs/ 'ang cing rtags tha mangs pa bas/ nges pa sa pas me papa
290b7(rnying rgyud): la c-i ga gcu// ya ni chu da pa'o// canan me la/ 'dra byeng slob tu 'byungs pas// dbang po la gragasas pa bdun// rje me nyid dungs srung na// thugs kyil zhes thab da // yang
291a1(rnying rgyud): ma/ med ma thong // de zhin nyid pasma zhin ga gas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams da la// dri med 'di las gzhan yadas// 'das da k+Sha b+h+yas sa// 'di skyes na/ kyis grub par 'gyur// dang na
291a2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sngags kyi snying po kun bsdus pa// oM dz+haiMs+t+ra a~M hA ste// gnas ma dag su rnam bgod nas// 'od zer lcags kyus drangs nas su// ye shes rnams kyis gzugs su bsgyur// dkyil 'khor la nyid kyil 'khor tsam//
291a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bya'i khyil 'khor la// ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa thul// mnyes nas thob pa'i tshul 'chang ba// yon mi zad ga ter gyur te// tshe nga ba de bsun su mthogs// mongs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song myong // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
291a4(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes thob par 'gyur// shes rab gsum la spangs pa yis// ye shes myu gu skyed par byed// sa thob 'jigs pa lnga dang bral// 'khor ba las ni mya ngan 'das// sgrib pa mtha' dag gcod byed pa// dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyis// da lta nyid
291a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'gyur// ye nas gnas pa'i de bzhin ni// rgyal bas mdzad pa ma yin la// 'gro bas byas pa ma yin te// ye nas sangs rgyas chen po'o// de bzhin nyid de 'dus ma byas// rang byung yin te kun ngo'o// med pa ma yin med pa yod//
291a6(rnying rgyud): yod pa min te dngos yod min// bya med bya dang rnam par bral// spun grub bde ba'i ngang du gnas// de bzhin pa zhes mi tog kyang // gzhag tu med pa'i dang la bzhag// de yang rnal 'byor rgyud rnams dang // bla ma'i kha nas shes par bya// blam
291a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dam pa 'di nyid gang bsgrub pas// bla ma mnyis na grub pa'i mchog/ thog mar bla ma mnyes byas te// dbang bskur ba yang thob byas te// sku gsung thugs kyigasang ba rnams// ldan par byas te sngags bsrub
291b1(rnying rgyud): par// gle tung 'a pa'i dgo dang // rnam pa'i mchog rnams ldan pa dang / zham pa rdzogs d+hAgang dang / u pa ra 'amed pa yi// nyams dag grangs sa pas pa bta // shin tu spangs song gams bgyur byas// bdag /
291b2(rnying rgyud): dgu yis ni// byang chub thob par gdon mi za// kun tu 'od kyi sa la gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i le'u
291b3(rnying rgyud): ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po de yang / shin tu sbyor ba'i ting nge 'don la sgoms par grags te/ sgrub pa'i thabs thig lce'i rnal 'byor byab 'dreg sangs so//
291b4(rnying rgyud): nyams ni dga' ba dang // shin tu gsang ba'i brag phug tu// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas su// gsang ba dam pa 'di bsgom mo// gsang ba dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// gzhal yas brtsegs pa bsgoms nas ni// rang gi dkyil 'khor bsgom
291b5(rnying rgyud): par bya// yan lag bzhi dang rab ldan zhing // dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bskyed bya ste// tsakra bzhi dang gang sbyor bas// phyag rgya bzhi po rnam par bsgom// de nyid gsum dang rab ldan te// shes rab ma pi rjes 'brangs nas// sbyor ba'i chog rnakhas
291b6(rnying rgyud): pan bslab// sbyor ba'i cho ga las byung ba'i// yang dag dri med dbus su ba ste/ shenam pa'i dmachog ste// migs la gsal ba'i bdag nyid cag// dkyil 'khor bun kyi bdag nyid yin// yon tan kun gyi trer 'gyur te// brjod
291b7(rnying rgyud): rab 'grub par byed// gsang ba dbyings kyi dbus dag su// bskyed pa'am rdzogs pa dgang 'dod pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms te// thugs ka'i gsung gi phyag rgya las// rdo rje rgyob mang 'bros te// ye shes ri khor por
292a1(rnying rgyud): bskal nas// mchod rten na mo gsung du sgyum// rdo rnga'i lag zung yul gyi mkhar// chos su byang chub sems su gnas// de nyid bzung bas bzung ba ni// rin rjen 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// gzung rjepo dang/

292a3(rnying rgyud): shes rab gyur pa ye shes so// don dam mthong bar 'du ba ni// 'drim mthong bar da mI mthong // 'di yi sna ye shes bskyed pa ste// de yis don dam rnam par mthong // darjes bcom ldan 'das de bzhi ga shegs patham skye \u0f7fnga bye bdag pa
292a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang thabs zab mo 'di lta bu gsungs so// nam mkha'i dbyings nas 'byung ba yi// rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// yungs kar phra mo'i 'bu tsam ste// phyi nang gsum gyi lnga rtser ni// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu
292a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom// rang snang ba yi ting 'dzin te// gzugs partad sgram smra brtan dang // sdig rgyul sogs rnam pa can// srung dang mi snang dbyer med de// smod dang med pa 'dra dbyer meng par// snang du 'dra yang zadad do// don dang rtags lags
292a6(rnying rgyud): pa rnams// snang ba tha dad gnyis su snang // yang dag yang dag ma yin pas// bsam pa'i dbang gis der 'gyur to// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi// brda' zhes rnam par bstan pa yin// gang zhig rtse gcig ma gyur pas// mtha'
292a7(rnying rgyud): ma skyes ting 'dzin bsgom// dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pas// chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas// ye nas stong pa'i rang bzhin no// stong pa'i rang bzhin mtshan ma med// de bas smon pa des bral lo// rnam
292b1(rnying rgyud): pa thar pagasum dang rba// rgyags med pazhi yi lam gnas 'ju// stong ba snyid dunam ngas nas// rang blang ye zhes rang gis 'gyur// 'bras pa ga tu 'ongs thog// yon tananamam pa'i mthu 'du banyam// tshabs tsha yon pa mam// yan na
292b2(rnying rgyud): cer yang ba sngag med// yon tan chen po'i bsam gtad di// bsam gtan ljid pas pas ma med// mabs mam spangs chos nyid las// 'ang dod chen po rnam mkha' 'byung // kun 'od byes thob nas// zhing khams bcad yul ba y-i/
292b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor mams cad 'byung bar chu // dkyi la yo dgasams cang chu// re gzung med pa la// 'ang la na ba tu yang // thogs yod brjod pa lang // seM yang rgyan kyi 'khor lo yin// de bzhin ga shegs pagams ca la bani
292b4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' chergyas pa'i rgyud las/ rig pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i leng se bdun pa'o// / de nas bcwol ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos shi nal 'artsor 'di lta bu gsungs so// ye shes rnam par grol ba
292b5(rnying rgyud): mun gyis gnas pa'i bde chen te// dge dang sdig las rnam par grol// sangs rgyas byang chub snying po 'di// lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs// 'gyur ba mi yin drang por gnas// dpag cing mtshon du med pa'i phyir// byang chub nyid la byang chub med//
292b6(rnying rgyud): gang la bsod nams sdig med na// de la byang chub rab tu gsasungs// e ma ho gin n+ya ro mtshwar che// gzugs med gzugs sgra 'byung ba med// 'di ma mthong bar gzhan mi mthong // snying po 'di lam lus rdzogs// de myur rdzogs chen zhes bya ste/
292b7(rnying rgyud): rAng byung ye shes btsal med pas// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston// nyon mongs pa 'di byang chub la mo// cir yang mi dmigs gti mug ste// marig pa nyid ye shes gsal// rig pa'i ye shes gang ldan pas// yi ge med pa'i don la blta/

293b1(rnying rgyud): rnam par bral ba ni/ kunan gyi mapa' la mdud pa 'drod// zhes brjod do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa can pade/ mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yang thabs zab mo 'di lta bu gsungs so// dngo sa po med pa rkyong rgya ba/

293b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis the tshom med pa na// nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub// 'di la mi bya ci yang med// mi bza' ba ni yongs med ni// smra bar mi bya cung zad med// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // bza' btung thams cang ris med bya// dbang po g.yo ba na
293b6(rnying rgyud): sbyar// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// lus sems khog slod kyi nar bzhags/ lus sems tshad mar gang 'jog pa// de la 'dzin pa'i phung ba dam// dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po des/ nyid

296a2(rnying rgyud): shes gzugs bsgyur ba// thabs kyi rim pas 'byung ba'o// thabs las thabs chung thabs bsam yas// 'brel pa bdun gyi rim pa yis// sku dang ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur// thabs dang brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin// de lta bu yi ngang du 'byung // don dam bla med ba pa pA'i thas

296b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab rnam bzhir snang // dngos po'i dbang gis kun tu 'od// bsam pas tha dad du mar snang // rnam grangs don dam zhes bya ste// rim pa rim pas 'jug pa'o// shin tu rnal 'byor 'di nyid ni// gzhan la brtan pa ma yin te// lam gyi nang nas nye lam ste// thabs kyi ma

296b3(rnying rgyud): rgyu che kun tu bzang // laSh+Tar ba ma yin drang por gnas// rnal 'byor lta ba de zhes bya// bar du sgom pa'i thabs gsungs pa// ting nge 'dzin dang spod pa'o// ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni// gsang ba'i don la 'jug pa skye// spyod pa dngos su gsungs pa ni// me dang bu mo snying mo/

296b7(rnying rgyud): gsum rdzogs par bya ste/ thabs zab mo 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin gnas pa'i de bzhin nyid// ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid de// sa la mi bgrod srung du med// lhun rdzogs rang byung gcig pur gnas// dpa' bo dngos po thams cad za// stong pa nyid ci rang bzhin las/
297a1(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin du mnyam gzhag pa// lus kyi chos kyi rang bzhin la// klad pa dang ni klad rgyas dang // skra dang spu dang sen mo dang // sha dang pags pa tshim bu dang // rgyu ma gnye ma la sogs pa// mi mi gtsang ba'i rang bzhin

297a3(rnying rgyud): skya dang tha snyad dang // yi ge'i skad dang brda' la sogs// gdags bya dang ni 'dogs byed dang // gdags pa'i tshig la sogs pa yi// dngos po gang yang ma rnyed de// 'ga' yang mthong ba med pa ni// de nyid mthong ba chen po yin// tshig pas

297b1(rnying rgyud): sa nas rgyanadu rnyeb gagags pa gongs sa mas 'das tu / na pa/ gag rtso mi dgis na nyam pa dang shAm dran tu pa rgyad //

297b3(rnying rgyud): dIdang 'dre'i nyid do// gyu nom pa'o// blan med pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas pa bdag nyid chen po sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang pa la/ rdzogs pa chen po slob par 'dod byas/ shid tu rnal /
297b4(rnying rgyud): kyi don 'di bsgom par bya'o// de bus na chos thams cad ni rang gis rang mi shes te/ gzugs kyis gzugs mi shes so// sku yis sgra mi shes so// de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang gyi mched la sogs pa rnams cad dang

297b6(rnying rgyud): mthong ba na/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa'o// bye bar gshegs pa'o// mi gnas pa'i mya dran las 'das pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i spyan rgyas
297b7(rnying rgyud): par gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka'
298a1(rnying rgyud): thal to// g.yo dang mig sa dngos po can// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te// sred dang zhi ba dbyer mad TI// thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// dang po gnas khang nyams
298a2(rnying rgyud): dga' bar// yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// 'du 'dzi thams cad spangs nas su// lus kyi bca' ba rnam ldan bya// lus ngag lteng ka bzhin gnas pa// sems kyang lteng chu bzhin du gnas// gzugs la
298a3(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i dngos po rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa ste// dngos po'i mtha' ni med ces bya// gang yang rang bzhin med btogs na// thams cad chos kyi phyag rgya yis// lta ba'i rgya ni btab byas la// de nas
298a4(rnying rgyud): gzhi yi snying po bsgom// spyod pas gang yang thogs med cing // ting nge 'dzin du ma ny+dza ma gzhag na// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sems la dmigs pa bdag med par// sa les lebs ma byas lnga// rang bzhin
298a5(rnying rgyud): kyis ni 'od gsal te// stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid ste// 'jig rten pa yi lam du ni// rjes su dpags pa'i shes pa ste// shes pa gsum po gyur pa ni// bsam med dran med sgyu ma'ang med// ting 'dzin tshul
298a6(rnying rgyud): khrims shes rab po// de nyid mos pas spyod pa'i sa// sa yi rim pa tha dad ste// sa rnams yongs su bkod pa yang // stong nyid ye shes bskyed pa ste// ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa yin// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las//
298a7(rnying rgyud): sa nas sa 'phar mngon byang chub// de dang de yi rim pa yis// kun tu btags pa'i ma rig dang // lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// sgrib pa gnyis ni zhes bya ste// byang nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa yi// lu lnga ye
298b1(rnying rgyud): sman ma nanapa// dan da dutha par 'argyan rnam par 'dzid// gagags sas s+yab na rgyas sa/ sbyi pastad pa byang rnab cag ga
298b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham sA d+ha kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma to sangs rgyas rnams
298b3(rnying rgyud): sem sa ni gang yin pa// don dam ci yang med pa las// kus rdo bdag tu bshad pa mdzod// ces brjod pas/ de bzhin nyid kyi doni lnga rol ci gyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag thos/ de bzhin
298b4(rnying rgyud): gAshegs pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// baN+Di ga gan gyi rang bzhin zhib la// rtogs su bltas pas grub med de// rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa dang // gnyen po'am yang nag tan tshigs kyis// shin+da
298b5(rnying rgyud): zhib bar brtag bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag pos/ gta tshigs kyi sgo nas bslab pa'i dbu ma'i brtags pa 'di gsungs so// / kha cig g.yo dang mi g.yo kun// dam pa nyid du rang bzhin da
298b6(rnying rgyud): rlung bzhin med lngas ci yang snang // bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang / chu med pa las rkyen bral gyir// nam mkha'i ma tod bzhin du// nam yang skye bar myi 'gyur ro// gang zhig rdzogs chen 'dod pa
298b7(rnying rgyud): yisa?// ting nge 'dzin du mnyam gzhazha na// spyod pa ma bas ldan pa la// gsang badzid nyid bskam pa \u0f7f// langs nas phyi rol su la rnams la// mthing sa nyid du shes pa // don dang
299a1(rnying rgyud): sems bskyed nas// mtshan med mtshan ma rnams bsgoms pas// chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyu 'grub// zheng dang thugs rjes 'brel pa'o// yang dag tig dang dum yi// rA
299a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin med de gzugs brnyan bzhin// dngos po gang dang gang la yang // mtshan ma yod pa ma yin no// rang bzhin rang bzhin med mthong ba// ngo bo nyid du gnas pa yin// mu bzhi skye ba rnam bral phyir// rang bzhin
299a3(rnying rgyud): med de skye med badz+ra// drang por 'dug la yang dag ltos// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// rten cing 'brel bar gang byung ba// rang bzhin med pas gzugs brtan 'dra// sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' spangs te/
299a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba sgyu ma bzhin du snang // ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pas// skye dang 'gag par mi 'gyur te// mthong bras chos nyid de bzhin gshegs// rten cing 'brel 'byung zab mo'i don// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/
299a5(rnying rgyud): srid gsum rang bzhin med mthong na// khams gsum 'gro rnams sngon du 'gyur// gsang ba zab mo'i don nyid la// 'dzin pa med pa med pa yis// yod pa med par shes 'dug na// de lta nyid dus gsum
299a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// bya med bya dang rnam par bral// khams gsum las 'das rin po che// yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// zad mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur// mi rtog gsang bar kun dadus phyir//
299a7(rnying rgyud): rtog pa thams cad dag pa yin// gzung dang 'dzin pa las byung ste// phra chus thams cad gang yin pa// lhun gyis gnas pas bkag pa yin// 'di ni a dang mdzes pa'i te// te las yan
299b1(rnying rgyud): lag spros pa bzhin// 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul las// sangs rgyas ga stang gi zab mo 'byung // srog dang rtsol ba las byung ba'i// spro dang bsdu ba de bzhin te// dbugs ni phra mo nyid du bya// de nas
299b2(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa rab tu 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka
299b3(rnying rgyud): la / shi rnal 'byor gyi na / nam mkha' du mnyam paste/ sangs rgyas kyi myang yul/ nyan thos kyi sogs pa dad thun mong ma lagasapa/ chog chags pa nyid
299b4(rnying rgyud): las// byed rnams kyang ma sbag dadangs par ma byed cig/ spyod yul 'di las 'da' bar dka'o// de bzhin nyid dang kun la gnas su zin kyang / shes rab dang snying rjer mi ldan zhing / skal ba med pa
299b5(rnying rgyud): rnams 'jug par ma byed cig/ de ni nyams par gyur te/ zab mo'i don mi rtogs gnas med pa yin te/ dper na de pa~M pu tra bzhin no// de bas na rigs gang yin pa mtshan ma las yongs su gzung ba zhes brjod
299b6(rnying rgyud): pas/ thams cad rang rang gi gnas ga la bar 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don du/ rtsol ba dang bral ba'i thabs
300a1(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// thams cad lta bas bkag nas su/ snying rje'i mthu las byung ba yi// byang chub sems ldan gsang sngags pas// snang ba dgag pa ma yin te// dbang
300a2(rnying rgyud): yul la yin par bzhag/ bltas pas ma mthong ci yang med// dngos kun snyam 'drar gas na// ma mthong mthong ba'i rnam pa can// mamyal ldan bub ji bzhin gnas// rang byung kun masnyen gyis thAH// de bzhin bzhes
300a3(rnying rgyud): sot+tog kyang // rnam par snang mdzad kun tu bzung // rnam par ma tog kun 'dris myi/ tshang ba bcoman ci gag d+hA/ na sa la ba'i nad rdzad ba d+ha/ lhan gyis gnas pas bzhag pa yin// bskams
300a4(rnying rgyud): pus tsa lnga ba'i nad yin te/ rgyal sems bde bar rang las 'byu/ snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni/ brtsal pa med pa'i btsal bas 'grug/ gyi rlu pa mo dang mig yo can// byang chub nying po nyid yin pas/
300a5(rnying rgyud): tshul ba'i bas me pa sbya byings mi bskyod/ ma batshul bkagan pasgom pa ston// dedang rnanam drilas de basbyin 'gyur/ na snying par byasan/ de bas de byung mtshar // phung po
300a6(rnying rgyud): nyid sangs rnas ga// 'byung ba la nyid rigs kyi yum/ dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// byang chub sems da khro ba'i tshogs// nyon mongs lnga po byung chub lam// thams can kun tu bzang po'i zhing /
300a7(rnying rgyud): rgya nyid las gzhan maldan// rnams nyid du batshal / phrin rnam ma man/ dpa 'din le gang 'jug pas// gas pas sa nyi sa// ga ma nyid dmigs pa ma// gad

300b2(rnying rgyud): na

301a1(rnying rgyud): sa yongs gagags sus phyug / dngas // na/
301a2(rnying rgyud): dbyung gi na// thabs kyi ma pa du mya nga gyur// log pa tog pa'i bdag nyid // byed pa pa'i sog // rdzur 'dod ma pa dri ri dbang // nya badrug kyicha gnyis / rdzo pa yid ti don
301a3(rnying rgyud): sa ma dang / sa la
301a4(rnying rgyud): rdzas sgra 'dod te// dul las thub pa'i dzi ga nyid do// del ming byung chos bdug nyid// don dam pa mi bye / gzung dang rkyen rnam spangasanas// shes nga bar 'dod pa dang// rgya nyid phyogs
301a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas mi 'bub cid/ gcig dum mayinano// kun brtags pa'i bdag nyid // yang da na na ba yin// gzhan pa shengab rnyed/ yongs su grub pa zhes byang // don dam bden dun
301a6(rnying rgyud): ba'o// stong ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni// chos bdag med phyim nyam nyid pas// rang sems bzod na po sa skyes pa/ rang bzhin can ni dran rdzob// / don dam stong pa nyid yin pas/ rang bzhin

301b1(rnying rgyud): dag na sa // smra/
301b2(rnying rgyud): de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang pa dpa pa dri ma med// yon

301b4(rnying rgyud): du
301b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi/ bzhin nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i rgyung lam
301b6(rnying rgyud): bden pa gnyis so sor bstan+da pa'i lo brdugasum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/
302a1(rnying rgyud): na na / na gyu/ / na sus/ sa
302a2(rnying rgyud): shin na gas/ sa/ su ngas ga sa/
302a3(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo// / srog dang mkhyen ldan pa dang // dadu chub pa dgu lags/ ba das sa sa pa ci// rgya shes pa / sngags rmugs ga ba rnams pa ba ljong gas pa
302a4(rnying rgyud): bcom/ de na'abs kyi mthag/ mthun pas ti dzin 'as/ de yang dang bzhin maldan ma do// gnyis slo nyis ma yin no// mi 'gyu bad dri ma da// rnams tha bdan med nga// da
302a5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa na babang po zong nas kyi na 'azugs cad du brjod pa 'di med du 'dzin/ rigs kyi thag la las yin la nga byed thos pa med pa'i tshul du thos padang mthong bamed pa
302a6(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis mthong ba la sogs 'i rtogs shiga'adi de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca kyi gas ba'i don zab mo yog med pa'i rgyu rgyas r+b+ba // 'di mngon rna ma rnam las shes par bya/ sa su thang thas la gan /
302a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnamam pa' sems pa'i byu na/ napa gyur gyidon pasdus pa'i ba 'ad seM pan gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag bachen po la 'angon nams
302b1(rnying rgyud): man gra c-ig tu bstod pa/ thams cadasu yi bangs po mchog/ mtshan dang ba byang rdzogs par rdzag/ shin rnal 'byor don 'jung ba// thams cad b+ha stong phyug 'tshala'o// thams cadag sang gi 'dag /
302b2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i gsung mchog ste// gsang bzab mo'i don 'chang ba// thams cad gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ ye shes lA yi bdag nyid can// rdzogs pa chen po'i don 'anadu ba/
302b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// zhes 'arjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid mnyes par gyur te/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bos nas/ khyod kyis shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don 'di/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs
302b4(rnying rgyud): can gyi 'gro ba rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig ces gsungs pas/ phyag ni rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes brjod do// de nas chos kyi rgyal tshab chen por dbang bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
302b5(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don la zhugs te mi snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' che cas pa'i rgyud las/ bdag po mnyes pa dang yongs su
302b6(rnying rgyud): gzung ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba ste/ man dag gi snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rlung las/ rdzogs pa'i yang rdzogs pa/ zang mo'i
302b7(rnying rgyud): yang zab mo// shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don mthar thug pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang / bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ phyis skad gsar bcad kyis bcos pa'o//
303a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gang skad // bdag dang/ thung chub sems su marjod pa dol kyi nAd las/ mtha'i mun ma la chen po zhes b+ha ba/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pa byu / bcom ldan ladama'ang bdag
303a2(rnying rgyud): bca 'tshal ga// di nga gigs cos pa sa ma ldan las gamid kyi gnasas/ sangs sa kyi rnam pa ga sa nas ga/ mthu ma'i munamam can rim khri khasrungs nga/
303a3(rnying rgyud): dad pa byed ga// ma gags rjen su 'grus na pa byud meng pa dris/ spyod na sa / pa la pa ga pa'i sa/ mi gnas pa'i segs can po brnyen pa dang / 'du gnyis par byung gi sa shes man
303a4(rnying rgyud): de bang bsnyed pa dang / 'ag sum pa rdorjesam pa dang rtogs phyes na byang ba 'i rten pa dang / 'ju ba zhi'i byung na tha sems dpa' sa su dge pa bstan pa dang / lus pas skyenas kyi chen pastan pa/ semamacan med pa
303a5(rnying rgyud): spring ba chen po sa nas 'phags// 'byung ba chen po'i ston dus ni// rnam ma pa' chen po sa nas 'phags// nam mkhye' rten pa'i sngon rol na// chos nyid rnam dag gang yangs nas// chen po la nyid rnam par dang// chen pa
303a6(rnying rgyud): cig su / ba na / nga myong pa rnyegs dang // miganas mye na dum pas/ bdag ma gras thus sa ldan ma sogs/
303a7(rnying rgyud): skyem ci / 'dus ma byas pas rnam ma khang lta bu thos bzhin du mi gnas pacol pa med pa byung rtsi/ rdob myang ba gsar gyi zung ma lta ba/ gsal ba mi g.yo ba mang ma lta spong // yid bzhin du mi 'jigs pa 'das
303b1(rnying rgyud): sus ma 'gags pa/ mamangagangs sa sa gang pas drun/ nas byang chub sems san na gsal mtha can nas sa da pang/ rang bzhin ma pa dag pa'i zlum thurnam pa'i ga 'arlob bsta pa mngan ngas
303b2(rnying rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang zhus pa/ i maho dang byung bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mthongs nas gsal ba'i nyi ma shar nas/ 'dzam tha gling kun tu bde byed phun sum tshogs pa/ dbyer med nam dgra dbyings kyi zhang
303b3(rnying rgyud): nas// rang byung ye shes 'gag med 'od du shar// bu gnyis pa snang gzugs su'i 'od gsal ba// dpag med snying po b+ha lnga ya ma brda// chos su rdal ma 'grags pas cir yang sA ler mkhyen// gzhan gyis ma byas rang byung
303b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu thos thams cad ni rang byung gi rig pa las byung zhing / rang rig pa shes pas rang rig pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// rang byung ye shes zhes bya ba'i don ni/ bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mthang
303b5(rnying rgyud): ngas// dang byung ye shes mau t+t+ra/ chos kyi waM// thubral sman rdzogs bde pa'i yul la glenas// mra bcos chos su byang chub sems// snang med brjod bral skabasas su la las 'das// bye med cings nas skye ba'i srang bstan pa
303b6(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes bdag med snying po'i sgra// sku dang rkyen gyis m-i gnas mya na 'das// snying po spyan grub shes rab rang byung ste// ye shes tshogs rdzogs sbrul sku'i mthar byin pa// mkha' la gzha' tshon 'dra ste rang bzhin rnam par dge/ ma
303b7(rnying rgyud): 'ag med rig pa'i ye shes gas la// shes rab mthar byin na rgyad rnam par dag// rig pa'i rgyal gsung gi sgra sgrogs pa// ba byung ma 'gags phyogs bcub // thabs mkhas thugs rje'i stobs kyi mkhyen mnga' ba/
304a1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rang byung dbyings kyi pho brang gzhal yas na// thugs rje'i sbrul su sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga// byams pa'i chos ston sangs rgyas rnam pa bzhi// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa
304a2(rnying rgyud): ste// 'gro ba rnams la sbrul skur 'thon// thugs kyi dpal be'u yid bzhin zur brgyad nas// sangs rgyas byams pa mi mnyam mgon po rang byung sku// dbu yi gtsug tor 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad nas// sangs rgyas 'jam dpal dri med snying po rang byung rtswa/
304a3(rnying rgyud): mdzod kyu'i byu ga ye shes gsang lam nas// sangs rgyas bde ldan mgron po lhun gzigs rang byung sku// shangs kyi rlung sbo ma gsung gi brda' sgo nas// sangs rgyas phyag na rdo rje rang byung ste// ljags kyi pad mo 'dab brjid ge sar nas// sangs rgyas/
304a4(rnying rgyud): bye ba rnam gzigs mkhyen par dbyung sku// phyag g.yas 'khor lo rin chen zur brgyad nas// sangs rgyas gtsug tor dri med rang sangs rgyas// phyag g.yon pad+ma 'dab brgyad ge sar nas// sangs rgyas byams pa kun gzigs rang byung sku// zhabs
304a5(rnying rgyud): g.yas rdo rje rgya gram gdan steng nas// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po rang byung sku// zhabs g.yon ut+pal gdams pa'i gdan steng nas// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rang byung sku// rtogs pa'i ye shes chos la dbang bskur bas// rang byung
304a6(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes yin// sdong po yal ga me tog 'bras bu'i tshul// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// thugs rje sprul su shes rab rang byung su// byams pa'i chos skyon gang yang cis 'dul ba// mos pa rgyan gyi de
304a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po yin// bdag nyid chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// sku gcig kun tu khyab pas nyag gcig kun tu thags// zhes rdo rje sems dpa' la thugs rje rang byung du shar bar bstan pa'o// zhes byang chub sems rma bya mjing bsnol mtha'i
304b1(rnying rgyud): mun sel gyi rgyud las/ rang byung ga ya shes shang ba'i le'u sa gnyis pa 'o// / mngon du rtogs pa'i sangs rdzus rang byung gi ye shes/ ye shes chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos dag dngos mad dang byung bad ba chen po 'di/
304b2(rnying rgyud): skye ba med pas skye sdang tshul// rtse snang nyid ni kye 'gag med// 'gag med rnam dag ye shes su// dang por skye bar byed pa'i gzhi// dngos med mi gnas mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas kun gyi mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'byung gnas
304b3(rnying rgyud): te// rang byung ye shes rtog med gsal// gzugs su mnyam pa ma 'dres pas// nam mkha'i ri mo'i tshul du snang // snang med ye shes gsal ba ste// brjod med spos bral klong du shar// rgyu rkyen rtog med ye shes kA sa la/
304b4(rnying rgyud): de las 'khrul pa'i rkyen bzhi shar// ma rig bdag tu rtog pa'i blos// nam mkha' sprin gyi tshul bzhin du// thun mong 'khrul pa'i snang ba shar// skye ba med las bzhir sdang tshul// rang byung ye shes bdag med sku/ nyi ma'i snying po
304b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gsal// pad+ma kha 'bu'i tshul bzhin du// rang byung lce shes rang gsal bas// thog ma'i sangs rgyas nyag gcig skye// rdo rje sems dpa' su gsum rdzogs// u dum wA ra'i me tog las// snying po rang byung gzung
304b6(rnying rgyud): s+thA sha raM// chos nyid drug pa'i snang ba la// ring byung gzugs sgyu'i d+mo bsal ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid cang // skad cig de las mngon sangs rgyas// mthong ma myong ba'i yul mthong bas// chos nyid ma dang zang pa
304b7(rnying rgyud): yinas// len ma myong ba'i lus blangs pas// ye shes rang sa zin pa yin// shes ma myong ba'i gtam shes pas// rang bang mngon du gyur pa yin// rgyu lus sgyu ma'i sbrul thim// sbubs ma brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin/
305a1(rnying rgyud): rdo d+ha ting 'dzin thog// mi gnas pa shes padag med mya ngan 'das// 'bras bu sgra gnyis mi snang mthur gyen na// 'dzin nas lam gnas mya ngan 'dus// rnam tshul nag med papa
305a2(rnying rgyud): dbying me bem// 'du 'bral med mas khyod dag nas/ bdag med chen pa T+TA m-i thA bas/ bad ba rkyen thal mi ba Sh+T+rIH// sngags mal rgyan mapa rkyen kyi ma rdzogs// gzugs skye banyis
305a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' las 'das// zhes gsungs so// kye rdo rje sams dpa' nyon cig/ ngas ma 'ongs pa'i sngon ros nas/ grwazhi snang chen por de ltar gnas so// rang byung du blang ba'i dus su de ska ngas shes so// mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'grota/ de bzhin
305a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs po thams cad la de ltar snang gis/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de ltar byos shig/ ces gdams nas/ dbu'i thor gtsug dang / mdzod sgra'i bu ga dang / shangs kyi rlung sbom dang / ljags kyi pad mo dang / thugs kyi dpal be'u dang /
305a5(rnying rgyud): dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams dang / bsti'i bu gnas/ 'od zer bya ba drug stong gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sru bsdam gyis mi khyab pa 'dzin te/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// zhes bka' stsal nus/ ri mo ri 'bar ba'i tsam la
305a6(rnying rgyud): mo 'od zer can gyi klong du mya ngan las 'das so// de dang gnyis su med par sangs rgyas so// zhes byang chub sems rma bya mjing bskol mtha'i mun sel gyi rgyud las/ rdo rje sems dpa' sngon du gyur pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste
305a7(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas rjes su 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos/ kye kye/ mkhyen rab kyi bdag po/ de ltar mkhyen pa mnga' ba/ mkhyen pa gzigs pa/ mkhyen pa thabs dang ldan pa/ mkhyen rab kyi bdag
305b1(rnying rgyud): po 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo// kye thugs rje chen po bdag gis sems can gyi don du/ rtogs pa mngon du gyur par bya ba'i thabs bstan du gsol/ ces zhus so// kye kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyan cag/ rdzogs bcu ngas gsum
305b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / snying po byang chub la mngon par zhugs par gnas so// shes kyang gzhi phyi mo rang bzhin rnam par dag pa man shel gyi sku lta bu/ sna tshogs phyogs 'dzin med pa rang gnas pa/ chos thams cad kyi mtha' la gnas pa
305b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin rtog med gsal ba/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni shes bzhin du mi gnas pa/ yul las 'das pa/ yul med pa'i yul su lus 'das pa/ su med pa'i sku/ grangs las 'das pa/ grangs med pa'i grangs shes rab lang
305b4(rnying rgyud): 'das pa/ shes rab med pa'i shes rab/ ye shes khyab gdal chen po spu ru med pa'i chos nyid/ dngos med kyang chung chen po rang rig byang chub snying po'i tshogs/ mtshon pa mya ngan las 'das pa/ mtshon du med do// zhes pa'i tshig gis
305b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan te/ mtshon byed chos su bzhag nas/ snying po byang chub la mngon par zhugs par gnas so// de yang mtshon byed kyi rtogs pas shes bya las bzhag nas/ de'i sku mngon par bsten pa'i dus su/ rtogs pa'i don mngon sum
305b6(rnying rgyud): gtan la phab nas/ shes bya la nyams pa med pa'i rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas don nges pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mngon sum gzigs te/ mdzod pang khyer nas rgyud dag pa'i rdo
305b7(rnying rgyud): rje 'ching chen po dang / gnyis su med par mya ngan 'das so// zhes byang chub sems rma bya mjing bsnol mtha'i mun sel gyi rgyud las/ rjes su 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa mngon du gyur par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
306a1(rnying rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang zhus bA/ bcom ldan 'das myi pAta mA ma gon pos sangs rdzas dang rdza ma mnyam pas/ bu'i skal ba bas rgya kyis sna thub pa dang / gsungs panyam pas
306a2(rnying rgyud): gsung gi sprug pa bsam gyis mi byab pa dang / thugs mi mnyam pas thugs kyi sprul ga bas ga kyis mi zab pa dang / chom nyid mi mnyam pas mos sgrib mas cad las bol bar bstan pa dang / zlogapa mi nyam pas rtogs pa med cig ma la mig
306a3(rnying rgyud): mthar smin pa'o// zhes zhus te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phul pa/ rigs kyi bu zhu bzlas pa de legs so// shes rab kyi mtha' tshong pa rtogs pa'i mtha' dza dz+dza/ shos rab la nyam ba dang brag tshab me ra/
306a4(rnying rgyud): mthar byin pa'i ye ges skye ba la rag ma lus so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ thugs rje phul ba'i swa pra shar ba'i dus su/ rang byung gi ye shes chen po lnga zhes rgya ste/ sangs rgyas mar mye mdzad do/ gi gazlog tha rin po che zhes
306a5(rnying rgyud): pas/ 'dzam bu gling byi ba phrag brgyar thugs rje srul pa'i su bye ba zag brdar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs khyad par can gzhan las 'phags pas/ 'phags pa rnam mkha'i snying po zhes grags te che ba'o// a ti yo ga rdzogs pa chen po
306a6(rnying rgyud): rnams cad zil gyis mnan ceng / bdud dang mu stegs thams cad dbang du bsdus pas/ 'phags pa gtsug tong can dri ma med pa zhes thags so// sangs rgyas kyi che // 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la/ bzang ngan dang kyi
306a7(rnying rgyud): mid ming byed cing / don mnyam pa chen por la gazla ba'i dus su/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes grags te tsho bang // yang dag pa pordzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ tshad meng pa bzhi dang / phrid las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas/ ji lta rtsams pa'i
306b1(rnying rgyud): rlos pa ngas rgyas thams pa pagi zung bas/ zang na ba sems byang thams pa stan gzugs nas blags dang // zhes byang chub sams cam mang bskol ma'i ma skye rgyang las/ byas bya med pa'i theg pa bstan pa'i nang nas/ drang
306b2(rnying rgyud): dge pa'i rdorje 'chang chen po dang / sprul pa'i sangs rgyas re nges mdzad pas/ so so'i dzin bstan tshul ci le'u ste lnga pa la// / rma tha mjing bsnol mtha'i mun sel ces bya ba rdzogs so//
306b3(rnying rgyud): rU kar skad du/ dr-i thAsarba rA dzas man te thang+ga sad mthur matan/ bod skad du/ lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang dab la rang gnas pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po sems kyi rang bzhin gung yin pa de la phyag 'tshal lo//
306b4(rnying rgyud): 'di skad go zhing rtogs nas shes pa'i dus gcig na/ sangs rgyas dang sems can dang ji ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad kun tu bzang po che ba'i 'khor du sangs ma rgyas pa med pa la/ de nas thams cad nyid las mi gzhan pa'i kun tu bzang po'i 'khor du gyur pas
306b5(rnying rgyud): skad du nyid la gleng bslang ngo // de nas ston pa kun tu bzang po sems kun tu bzang po la zhugs nas chos nyid kun tu bzung po la lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po/ kun tu bzang po che ba dang la gnas pa'i chung 'di bka' stsal te// rnal 'byor gang zhig rtogs 'dod
306b6(rnying rgyud): pas// kun tu bzang po'i rgyud 'di nyin// 'di dag shes par su 'dod pa// nges par ldeng 'di bstan par bya'o// de nas yang de nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams sems kyi spyod yul las// thams cad mang
306b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas nyid du bstan// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin las// rnal 'byor kun gyi dbang phyug rgya// gsang ba'i gsang chen nges pa'i don// nyid kyi thug las phyung ba 'di// sdod ldan rnams la bstan du gsol// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang po
307a1(rnying rgyud): yis// 'jigs pa la yang 'i chos sdug bsngal mardzogs kyis bcad nas nyam zhug pa nyid/ dga' byed zer pa myengan las 'das pa'i chos byeng ba chen po ldan gyis thub sna phung ba mngapa 'byer/
307a2(rnying rgyud): bzung po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgrongs pa gcig te 'dril ba'i don/ kun tu bzang po nam lnga dang / cheb bcu drug dang / rang gnas chen po dngur bka // de la kun tu bzung po ma ngag pa
307a3(rnying rgyud): gas pa da nas kyiste/ das pa ga pa / de nga/ sa ba
307a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin kun tu bzang po dang lnga'o// de la lhub kun tu bzang po 'di bka' phrul to// thams cad kun tu bzang po la// 'khor ba'i chos dang mya ngan 'das// rnam rtog nyid kyang ye shes pas// log rtog zhe sdang ga la yod// phyogs
307a5(rnying rgyud): ris med pa chos nyid klong // gyi nang gnyis med ye shes dang // bzang ngan che chung med par mnyam/ sre shi 'gyur med byang chub sems// 'khor ba'i log rtog mtshan ma'i chos// mkha' la 'ja'atshon sdang bzhin 'das//
307a6(rnying rgyud): A kro re bo// gnyis su 'dzin pas gol bas na// dbyer med mnyam pa nyid du gsungs// chos rnams thams cad thog ma nas// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma btsal rje// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la// btsal zhing bsgrub par bya ba med// @
307a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin mongs kyis dag pa la// 'khor ba btsal yang mi rnyed pas// ma bcos ye nas ngag pa la// ma btsal gnas pas sangs rgyas yin// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin // rgyu dang 'bras bur btags pas gom// ye nas gnyis ma
307b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub la// don gnyis ni bcal du med// sangs rgyas sems can lasags pa// thams cad sams las gzhan ma yin// bdenan nyid yin bcos su med// ma btsal ma bsrubs ye nas dag/ rgya nyid dag pa' mangs casnga la// d+hA
307b2(rnying rgyud): med pa sus shes pa// lta ba kun tu bzang po yin// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba kun tu bzang po'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas spyod pa kun tu bzang po 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di
307b3(rnying rgyud): kyi dang nang du bzung bas nor// rgyu dang 'bras bur brtags pas 'khor// longs spyod thar pa bde ba med// chags dang ma chags la sogs pa// bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis med pas// gcig ste phyogs ris med pa la// de bzhin
307b4(rnying rgyud): gang spyod bde ba che// mtshan nyid 'du byed phyogs cha la// yod med chags pas 'ching ba'i rgyu// byar med lhan rdzogs 'bras bu nyid// go ba'i ngang las bde ba che// 'jig rten 'khor ba'i chos can la// rtaka Na dmatshan mang brtags
307b5(rnying rgyud): pas nor// de nyid bdag med gzhan med par// gnyis med spyad pas bde ba che// dge dang mi dge las rnams kun// ma chags gnyis med thabs kyis spyod// gang la rol pas yon tan snang // rgyu rkyen rten 'brel ltos pa yin// 'dod/
307b6(rnying rgyud): spyod yon tan rnam pa lnga// thabs dang shes rab la sogs kyang // smad na skye med rtogs pa gsal// ma skyed na yang nyes med rdzogs// yod med rtag chad thams cad ni// ma skyes rang bzhin dang la med// bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis 'dzin
307b7(rnying rgyud): tha da med de byang chub sems// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos// skyon dang yon tan thams cad ni// bcing grol med par gang spyod pa// spyod pa kun tu bzar po'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i byed las/ spyod pa /
308a1(rnying rgyud): tu bzang pa mi padz+ra ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas phrin las kun tu bzang po 'di gsungs so// kun pa dngas par snang ba yin// snong brgyad rnas m+b+ha snang bcan// chos nyid mgyes rang bzhin la//
308a2(rnying rgyud): tshig tu btags pas 'gal// cir sdang kun tu bzang po la// de gnyis sems su rol pa yis// ji ltar mdzes pa 'gal ba med// phrin las bya btsal med pa'o// dge ba dang ni sdig pa'i las// las kyi bye brag thams cad la// sems
308a3(rnying rgyud): yin gnyis med lhun grub pas// byang chub sems kyi phrin las pa// rtog dang mi rtog las 'das pa// sangs rgyas mdzad dang khyad par che// cir yang med la cing spyod pa// bde ba chen po'i mdzad spyod yin// kun gzhi ma byung ma skyes pa//
308a4(rnying rgyud): slol la sogs cing spyad pa// gang yang spang len med pa ni// blang dor med pas phrin las bzang // phrin las kun tu bzang po yin// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ phrin las kun tu bzang po'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// /
308a5(rnying rgyud): de nas dam tshig kun tu bzang po 'di bka' stsal to// nga dang bdag dang phyogs dang ris// mi mthun skyon gyi bye brag kyang // kun tu bzang por dbyer med pa// legs nyes rtog pas bsrung du med// mtha' dbus med pa'i klong brdal bas// chos nyid
308a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po la// mnyam pa'i klong la sa 'gyur ba med// 'thab rtsod ma bskyed 'chal pa yin// chags pa'i bde dang nyon mongs dgra// gnyis su med de rang gi sems// sems kyis sems la dper med la// bdag nyid sangs rgyas
308a7(rnying rgyud): gcig pu khyod// bden pa'i lha dang bar gcod bdud// gnyis su med de rtog las 'das// res su btsal yang mi rnyed pas// lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig yin// kun tu bzang po byang chub sems// mi 'gyur 'dung ba med pa la//
308b1(rnying rgyud): ma yangs phyogs ris med srung ba// dam chog kun tu bzang po yin// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ dam chog kun tu bzang po'i ladra ste bzhi pa// / de nas rang bzhin kun tu bzang po gsungs /
308b2(rnying rgyud): sems kyi chos nyid rang bzhin 'di// ma skyes ye nas sangs rgyas te// kun la brdal zhing snang ba 'di// rgyal bas mdzad cing bcos pa med// bzang dang ngan pa thams cad dang // gcod ske che chung la sogs pa// rang bzhin dbyer med
308b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems// mkhas pas bcos shing bcol du med// bzang ngan che chung gcod sme med// gyon dang yon tan dug dang rtsi// 'dzin rtog byis pa'i spyod 'dra ba// rang bzhin yongs kyis dngos po med// de bzhin chos rnams rang bzhi
308b4(rnying rgyud): dang // kun gzhi kun tu bzang po la// rgyu 'bras bde sdug btsal mi rnyed// rang bzhin kun tu bzang po yin// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin kun tu bzang po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas
308b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad ces go zhing rtogs nas shes pa'i dus gcig na/ ston pa kun tu bzang pos sems kun tu bzang po la bzhugs nas/ chos kun tu bzang po
308b6(rnying rgyud): che ba lta rang gnas pa'i rgyud 'di dag bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor gang zhig rtogs 'dod pas// kun tu bzang po'i rgyud 'di nyon// don rtogs ldan pa'i skyes bu gang // 'di dag shes par su 'dod pa// nges par lung 'di bstan par bya'o//
308b7(rnying rgyud): de la kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud 'di rtogs par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ nges par che ba bcu drug po 'di yid la zung zhig/ de la che ba bcu drug po gang zhe na/ sems ye nas che ba dang / chos nyid ye nas che ba dang / 'byung ba ye nas che ba
309a1(rnying rgyud): smra sa na
309a2(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa ye nas che ba dang / thabs ye nas che ba dang / shes rab ye nas che ba dang / ljon gyi rgyu yi nas che ba dang / yon tan gyi rgyu ye nas che ba dang / sangs rgyas ye nas che ba dang / sems can ye nas che ba dang / rtog pa ye nas
309a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ nges par che ba bcu drug gi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas sems ye nas che ba 'di bka' stsal to// kun tu bzang po nga yi sems// rgya chen rol pa kun bstan pa// gti mug
309a4(rnying rgyud): chen po nga yi sems// gti mug gong na sangs rgyas med// gti mug chen po'i ye shes kyi// byung tshor rtog pa can bral nas// dmigs med shes rab pha rol phyin// che ba'i rgyal por gti mug shar// sangs rgyas rje btsan dam pa yin//
309a5(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags med pa'i rngon rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// 'dod chags chen po nga yi sems// zhe sdang med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// zhe sdang chen po nga yi sems// nga rgyal med pa'i sngon rol na//
309a6(rnying rgyud): sangs ches bya ba'i ming yang med// nga rgyal chen po nga yi sems// phrag dog med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// phrag dog chen po nga yi sems// nyon mongs nga las ma byung ba'i// gzhan nas sangs rgyas yongs
309a7(rnying rgyud): med pas// sems kyi rgyal po drug lnga la// kun bzang ye shes rgyal por spyod// thabs kyi 'bras bu sems che bas// rgyal ba thabs su sems la bsngags// nga med bdag dang bral ba yi// kun gzhi sems kyi rgyal po la// thang
309b1(rnying rgyud): pa 'bras bu ngan 'char bas// 'phags la ma nges par sangs rgyas te// bdag nyid chen po rgyal ba'i bka'// mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa med// dmigs pa la yang dmigs pa med// dmigs med sems kyi ngas pA la/
309b2(rnying rgyud): yang dag gsang mdzod gsum du bstan// 'byung ba'i bla ma zla ma che// thams cad 'byung ba'i ston pa mchog/ snang ba kun la rab gnas pa// nga nyid thabs kyi longs spyod de// gang la'ang chags pa'i rgyu med pas// zin chags
309b3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i ye shes la// thabs kyi byugs rjes 'brel pa myong // chos rnams thams cad sems las byung // sems kyis bstan pa'i lung la nyon// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nga yi sems// phyi nang sdong bcung nga yi sems//
309b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs dang sdang ba nga yi sems// phyi dang nang yang nga yi sems// mtho res ngan song nga yi sems// sems kyi sangs rgyas kun bzang la// sprul pa phyogs bcu sangs rgyas nyon// nga lang bstan rgya med na// 'dzin rtog chos 'di su yi
309b5(rnying rgyud): chos// bdag la phyogs dang ris med na// phyi dang nang 'di su yi chos// don la rgyu 'bras yongs med na// bzang dang ngan pa mu yi chos// brdzes pa med pa'i sems med na// kha dog lnga po gang nas 'byung // bzang dran che chungasu las
309b6(rnying rgyud): byung // tshor ba bde sdug gang gis smras// phyogs dang sa mtshams su la yod// 'khrul pa'i sems 'di yongs re la thul// rmongs pa'i blo yi yongs re 'khrul// rtogs pa'i blo 'di yongs re nyen// ji ltar sdang ba'i chos rnams la/
309b7(rnying rgyud): bdag gi sems kyis dbang bsgyur nas// bdag pas drag pa gang na yod// sangs rgyas sems can sems yin na// sems pas che ba gang na yod// 'dzin rtog 'das pa'i chos nyid ni// sems kyi cheng de la yod// spang len med pa'i 'bras
310a1(rnying rgyud): ni// sems kyi che ba la gnas la// 'di la rgyu yis patsal med pa// 'di la rgyu 'bras srung du med// nam mkha' bzhin rtsa le gsal lu// 'dzi rtog bcos pa'i chu ci yod// chos dang sangs las
310a2(rnying rgyud): 'dod na// sems kyi chi ba 'di la btsal// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ sems ye nas tsho ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas chos nyid ye nas che ba 'di bka' stsal to// kun te bzang po yi
310a3(rnying rgyud): rgya chero rol pa bstan pa ni// ji ltar snang ba yi chos// rang bzhin med pa'i sngon rol na// chos nyid bya ba'i ming yang med// gang zag rnal 'byor su yong ba// chos nyid 'bras bu su 'dong pa// rang bzhin med pas btsal bar zla// sems
310a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin yin pa la// de la rtog pa cher bskyed na// chos nyid che ba bya ba yin// yang dag nges pa'i chos nyid la// chos nyid che bas mu mtha' med// chos nyid che bas bzang ngan med// chos nyid che bas mtha' dbus med// chos nyid che bas kyi rna
310a5(rnying rgyud): med// tshwas nyid che bas steng 'og mung// chos nyid che byas phyogs ris med// chos nyid che bas wang len myed// chos nyid chu byas yod med med// med pa'ang ma yin khyab par bar la// khyab par bajal kyang \u0f7fsa su med// 2
310a6(rnying rgyud): 'dra'i mtshan nyid gang shes pa// de ni chos nyid che ba ste// chos nyid med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs kyis sems can ming yang med// chos nyid che ba'i byin brlabs las// ji ltar snang ba de ltar snang // gang ltar yin pa de ltar yin// yang dang
310a7(rnying rgyud): par yang bka' stsal to// de dag la sogs chos rnams la// chos rnams la yang chos rnams med// rang bzhin che tha gang 'dzin pa// 'dzin pa de la chos med de// chos kyi 'bras bu de la med// chos kyi 'bras bu gang yin pa// rig pa'i don ni//
310b1(rnying rgyud): sa pas+ho// Na ba'i lcags yod ma yin// che ba'i che bar bdag dun// su mtshig thabs kyi rgyal por phyog// thams pang thung ba lnga yis bzed// 'byung ba ma pa 'dod rtogs na// thams cad ba'i rgyal ba 'grub// maba'i rgyung bral
310b2(rnying rgyud): cir yang ston// bdag nyid thabs kyi byin bangs las// 'byung ba'i tshe phrul na tshogs kyis// ma rig tog pa'i yi tog la// ngadang bdag tu 'byed pa bcom// phyogs dang ris su bskyab mas la// mtshan ma 'di tshig gnas pa krol/
310b3(rnying rgyud): yang gas drings pa'i lamajugags/ thA ra pa'i lam zhes de la gsungs// gang ni ga ma gyis don yod pas// tron dang kyi mar mabyung zhing // rdzogs dang rjes su mthe byar// 'dzin chags 'angon tog gyon spangs na// den chos nyid che bzhes nang // gzhan
310b4(rnying rgyud): yang chos nyid che ba ni// rnal 'byor gang zhig togs 'dod na// rgya cheng shes rab phyogs brdal nas// chos nyid ye nas che ba 'aM// lewa di las btsal bar bya'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ chos nyid pa nas che ba'i 'du
310b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa'o// de nas yang 'byung ba ye nas che ba 'di bka' rgyal to// nam mkhahA ye nas che ba dang // sa gAkhri ye nus che ba dang // me chu ye nam che ba dang // rlung nyid ye nas che ba dang // 'byung ba med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs
310b6(rnying rgyud): semasna can ming yang med// bzung ba lta yi sangs rgyas yin// snangs rgyas kun gyi rje bcan yin// 'byung ba po ma yi dbyings// mA la sbas pas sangs rgyas sras// 'byung ba lnga po rigs kyi yum// de la bdag rol thabs ci ya //
310b7(rnying rgyud): la dris dun rgyas/ bsungs rgya rgyas rgya ba mig sa/ rgya'i ma ga / lung ba gnas da mam 'ang/ byang chu mi gno'o// byang yo myong brgyag/
311a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i stsal ba chung yin no// 'byung ba'i mthan tud rtog pa med// byung ba'i dang bzhin 'dus mas// 'byung ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pas/ 'byung ba'i mnatan gzhing rtogs/ 'byung ba 'dzin la 'thung /
311a2(rnying rgyud): med// chos nyid dang las kun 'byung bas// thams cad 'byung bas 'byung ba'o// 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dngos med pas// des na 'byung ba stong pa'o// 'byung ba shes rab pha rol sbyin// 'byung ba lnga yi 'phro 'dra yis// chos kyi dadri
311a3(rnying rgyud): rol bstan// stong pa'i don rtogs 'byung ba la// nges pa'i rig pas gsal brtags na// thabs dang ldan pa'i byin brlabs kyis// yang dag thub par bstan par zad// don la'ang de las bstan du med// rtogs pa'i che ba chen po las// /
311a4(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs sbyor ba'i las byed na// che ba'i ye shes yod ma yin// che ba'i che bar bdag snang ba// che mchog thabs kyi rgyal por snang // thams cad 'byung ba nga yis bskyed// 'byung ba chen po'i don rtogs na// thams cad che ba'i rgyal por
311a5(rnying rgyud): 'grub// tsho ba'i rdzu 'phrul cing yang ston// bdag nyid thabs kyi byin brlabs las// 'byung balnga yi cho 'phral gyis// mari ga rtog pa'i yid tog bsal// nga drang bdag tu 'byeng ba bcom// phyogs dang ris su blta ba bcom// mtshan
311a6(rnying rgyud): ma'i 'dzin rtog gnas pa dgrol// yang gsung nges po'i lam du gzhag/ thar pa'i lam zhes de la gsungs// gang zhes ma skyes don 'dod pas// 'byung ba ye nas che ba yi// le'u 'di las ni btsal bar bya// kun tu bzang po
311a7(rnying rgyud): ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las// 'byung ba pe nas che ba'i le'u ste dbu pa'o// / de nas ye shes le nas che ba 'di skad bka' stsal to// ye shes rgyal po gang 'dod pa// rang gi sems las btsal bar gyis/
311b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro kun tu med byung chub pa// rnyog pa'i rgyud la rang rigapa// de ni ye shes che ba'o// skyong gsum yi 'jams don shes shing // brtul ba chen por rdzogs med na// ye shes che ba'i dam pa ste// bzang ngan med par don gas pa
311b2(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i 'don shes te// chos nyid ye nas ma bcos pa// don de shes pa ye shes yin// sems nyid ye nas ma bcos pa// don de shes pa ye shes yin// nam mkha' ye nas ma bcos pa// don de shes pa ye shes
311b3(rnying rgyud): bges sa na / gang rnam / rtogs pa'i na ma smra// pamyang ba ra// banas pags sbyi da/ rdzun pa gas rkyen su/ dbang sa
311b4(rnying rgyud): danas// ni ba ga / ga sa/ sa nga mi na lags pa gyu/
311b5(rnying rgyud): shes yongs mi bden// rig pa'i ye shes bsgom pa min// ci ste bsgoms yin gyur na// rig pa'i ye shes longs mi bden// rig pa'i ye shes nang shar na// bcol ba med pa lhun gyis grub// rang byung ye shes don rtogs ni//
311b6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa med pa yongs su thub// bdag nyid ye shes don rtogs na// chos rnams thams cad bdag la gus la// yangs so bde'o ye shes mchog/ gsal la dag pas dri ma med// gnyis su med pas rtog pa spangs// sangs rgyas sems
311b7(rnying rgyud): can sa son// ye shes chen pos yongs ma zin// phyogs bcusangs rgyas thams cad padra// sa shes chen po 'di dag dpags// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i ya// sangs rgyas sras po dam pa te// ha ga gcig lab pas
312a1(rnying rgyud): rtags pa// gaN+DIsas snang bar bstan pa min// mnyam pa'i don dang ma ldan na// mi mnyam byung ba'i chos ci dgas// zlog pa'i zla brag bas ma yas kyang // ye shes rtogs na gcig las med/
312a2(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings gcig las med pa la// ye shes rtogs pa ma bzhag par// mang por 'byed pa snying rirje// so sor rtog pa nyon mongs// phyogs char 'dzin pa yongs re sdug/ len cing bye brag me ba yang // ye ges mgos
312a3(rnying rgyud): pa tsam// don la 'byed pacur chung // nges pa gcig po'i tshig 'di nyon// kun tu bzang po che ba la dang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes ye nas che ba'i len ste bcu pa'o// / de nas sku ye nam che ba 'di skad nas bka'
312a4(rnying rgyud): sbal to// rang bzhin spros pa med pa la// g.yos pa med pa'i ye shes gzhag/ gnyis su med pa'i thabs shes pas// de ni chos sgra dang po'o// thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i ngang // mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje ste// gnyen po ces kyang
312a5(rnying rgyud): rmugs pa/ mas ca can ldan la sa// de kye+e ga sa / ga bya snying mngon ma ma nga / nyam pa gang gi ma rgyags pa// legs pa'i lags nga ba// mngon ma chubs bstan pas/
312a6(rnying rgyud): med chos la longs spyod cing // ma spangs ye shes longs spyod rgyan// thams cad che ba'i rol pa la// longs spyod rdzogs sku mthar phyin pa'o// gnyis med sems kyi sprul pa la// yongs su ma khyab gcig kyang med// don dam
312a7(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi sprul pa 'char// sprul pa'i sku ste kun khyab pa'o// sru yi bla ste kun grub pa// su yi bdag nyid kye shi med// rol pas sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyan// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// 'pho 'gyur med pa mu yi mchog
312b1(rnying rgyud): gtum/ she la gzhan// rang bzhin med pa rgya ma mchog/ spya gsum sto gi 'angs rtenan// tag nad mang pa sgra yi mchog/ bra mchog ni ma drug pA la// / sems rgya lags mapar ldan pas// rig pa'i thos brtul du/
312b2(rnying rgyud): gyis// stong gsum lha yi dbang du sdud// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// mi g.yo byang chub mchog gi rgya// rnam par snang mdzad nga yi lus// zla ba dri med dag pa'i lus// stong gsum kun snang khyab pa'i dbyings// mtha' las
312b3(rnying rgyud): thug med ji bzhin du// shes rab thabs la de ltar snang // man ngag rgya mtsho chen po 'di// yongs la bstan pa'i shes rab ste// chos su bdag pos skya bcom na// dkyil 'khor 'phro 'dra nyon mongs// yongs la shar ba'i don byung na//
312b4(rnying rgyud): rtog pa'i rlung skom snying re rje// mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la mnos// rang sems med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba rtog pa yin// kun tu bzang po bdag la 'dri// sangs rgyas gnas pa bdag la mdzad// byang chub dam pa 'dir
312b5(rnying rgyud): pas// bzod cig 'khor ba sbyar du dbyung // 'jig rten nyon mongs gleng thag chod// ma rig rmongs pa smos ci dgos// man ngag rgyal po 'di bstan pas// blta ba dman pa'i ming yang med// thams cad kun tu bdag yin pas//
312b6(rnying rgyud): sru yi rgyal pos dngos grub 'byin// mthang dbus che chung med par thob// bzod cing sngon gyi sangs rgyas yin// chos rnams thams cad khong nas shar// 'phags pa'i 'phags pas 'phags par bsngags// phyogs bcu'i sarba
312b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas thugs ngan sangs// de tshe las byung ma zos la// bdag sems ngal tshig ma chad do// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ sku ye nas che ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas sku gsung

313a3(rnying rgyud): shang sems dpa'i thugs kyi mchog/ de yang ta lA ldanang yi thugs// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// yon tan dkyil 'khor bas ma yas cang // rin rjen zur brgyad yon tan mchoH// da yid skal ldan pa'i rirma

313a5(rnying rgyud): sems yin te// sku yi dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// chos ting byang chub sems la yod// gsung gi dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// chos nyid byang chub sems la yod// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// chos nyid byang chub
313a6(rnying rgyud): la yod// sngon tan rjel 'a khor yang dag pa// chos nyid byang chub sems la yod// zin las dkyil 'khor yang dag pa/ chos nyid byang chub sems la yod// de yi mtshan nyid gang shes pa// yang dag ngas par nyan pa sa /
313a7(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin gyi ba med// sems kyi mtshan nyid dngos po med// sems kyi 'bras bum bcas pa// sems kyi sku ni sangs rgyas 'o// sems kyi gsung ni brtags pa yin// sems kyi thugs nigob ste// sem pa gyis tan

313b7(rnying rgyud): yang byang chub kyi sems yin pas ma rig pa yang dag pa'o// rmongs pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems yin pas rmongs pa yang dag pang // 'brul pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems yin pas 'khrul pa yang dag na'o// bskrad pa thams
314a1(rnying rgyud): nang chub kyi sems yin pas babyu pa yang dgapas// nyes pa thams dang nga chub ci snyoms yin pas nyas pa yang dag s+ho// drug sa yang byung chub byamams ldan pas drug lngayang dag pas// lu pa da/
314a2(rnying rgyud): song yang byang chub kyi sems yin pas 'khor ba dngan song yang dag pa'o// de ltar na skyon thams cad kying byang chub kyi sems yin pas sgron thams cad yang dag pa'o// rig pa yang dbyang chub kyi sems so// ye shes kyang nga byang chub kyi sems so//
314a3(rnying rgyud): yon tan kyang nga byang chub kyi sems so// legs pa thams cad kyang nga byang chub kyi sems so// sangs rgyas kyang nga byang chub kyi sems so// sems can yang nga byang chub kyi sems so// mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang nga byang chub kyi se
314a4(rnying rgyud): so// skyon dang yon tan med pa'i sngon rol na/ sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med de// ma rig pa nyid rig pa yin par shes na/ rig pa gang nas btsal// ma dag pa nyid dag pa yin par shes na/ dag pa gang nas bcol/ nyes pa nyid lag
314a5(rnying rgyud): pa yin par shes na/ legs pa nyid gang nas btsal/ 'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das par shes na/ mya ngan las 'das pa gang nas btsal/ dran song nyid mtho ris yin par shes na/ mtho ris gang nas btsal/ sems nyid sangs rgyas
314a6(rnying rgyud): yin par shes na/ sangs rgyas gang nas btsal/ rgyu nyid 'bras bu yin par shes na/ 'bras bu gang nas btsal/ rtog pa nyid chos kyi dbyings yin par shes na/ chos kyi dbyings gang nas bcol/ skyon nyid yon tan yin par shes na/
314a7(rnying rgyud): yon tan gang nas btsal/ de yang rang gi sems yin na/ srang zhing deng ba dang thang zhing sprad pa'i rgyu ci yod/ spyan yi nas tsha bas ni 'bras bu la rag ma lus so// yon tan ya nas che bas ni 'bras bu la rten mo 'tshal// che ba'i che bas chung ngu'i
314b1(rnying rgyud): med medan// bzang po'i bzang ba yin pa la/ rgyal ba'i rgyal ba yin pas ngan pa dang zhen pa'i ming med do// bda'i byas bu rgyan pa'i thugs// dag go nam dgra byabyung chub sems/ rang ga na byas// mchod pa bkar sna /
