317a4(rnying rgyud): du legs pa bsgrub mi dgos// dug nyid sman gyi don shes na// gzhan nas bdud rtsi btsal mi dgos// skyon nyid dag par ma rtogs shing // tshu la 'bras bur ma rig na// don dang nges pa'i gtan tshigs med// ston pa thib ma bsnyegs pa bzhin
317a5(rnying rgyud): bdas cang sleb cing zin pa med// de bzhin skyon rgyu mi shes pas// bsgoms pas 'bras bu mi rnyed la// brtags pas chos ting rdzas bu gol// bsrungs pas rtags su mi snang ste// de nyid glen pa'i rang bzhin can// de bas don 'di goms par
317a6(rnying rgyud): byos// byang chub sems kyang skyon gyi rgyu// sangs rgyas thams cad skyon gyi gru// gyon gyi rgyu 'di mi shes na// yon tan tu 'di su la yod// skyon gyi rgya 'di ma rig pa// ma rig pa ni dbyings kyi mdzod// de yi gong na che ba med// skyon
317a7(rnying rgyud): kyai hU~M ni 'dzin rtog gnyis// 'dzin rgyag thabs dang shes rab na// sbyin gyi rgyalas me med// rkyen kyi ni nyon mongs pa// tan mongs ye shes thar dang na// skyon gyi rgyalas cheb mad// skyon gyi lhani rtag chad gnyis// tag /
317b1(rnying rgyud): g+sagasan// na las ba spyo/ bu dgrags pa gdub sus// ca nus sum gcugasapa// gzhanangs bag nga ny-irang da// ltung dag das par da pa nag// 'a mang ga mang ma ga// sang
317b2(rnying rgyud): ts+tsha del yod// bcos med 'phyir med ma 'thos pa// ye shes chos nyid de la spyod// ma'i blang ma btsal mnyam gzhag pa// mnyam pa'i ye shesad la yod// dag pa rjod srin nas gsal// thub pa'i mdzad nang nas gang /
317b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam de gzhi la bzhag/ mkhyen pa'i rgyud sems la spud// bzang dang lam ni thig ler bca'// kun tu bzang po bcom ldan 'das// shes par gyis lnga gyon la zhog/ gyon rgya ye nas che ba med// rnal 'byor gzhung mthun gang zhig yod//
317b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin rgyum pa rtogs 'du/ latsu rnaM las btsal pa stong / bran tu bang bacheb pa nga gnas da wA/ yi nas chab lang pa brje brjid pa// nas yan ta/ gyi yini ma pa
317b5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// yon tan che ba'i rang bzhin la// dag pa nyid du 'di ltar bshud// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan ni// da yi sems las byung ba ste// nga yi sgra ni mi 'gyur ba'o// nga yi gsung ni mI 'gag pa ni// nga yi thugs ni ma bcom
317b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// nga yi mdzad pa khyad par che// nga yi rol pa thabs la mkhas// nga yi byin rlabs 'dus ma byas// nga yi mdu stobs 'dzin tog bcom// nga lang zhes bya ba med// nga med bdag med phyogs med pa'i// 'dzin rtog med pa'i shes rab brdul/
317b7(rnying rgyud): tag ched med pa'i ye shes shing // yon tan ye nas che ba yi// 'di yi gar na sangs rgyas med// 'khor ba med pa'i pha rol na// byang na 'das pa'i ming yang med// 'khor ba nyid na yon tan che// ngan song med pa'i pha rol na// mdo ris
318a1(rnying rgyud): dun rgyu su sa/ /
318a2(rnying rgyud): ma na mi sad nas tu // sa / na zham
318a3(rnying rgyud): she rgyu la satsas pa pa / na pan 'an / na po mad du/ byu sa/
318a4(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pas btags pa'i rgyu tsam dang // shes rab dman la bsten pa'i phyir// rmongs pa'i blo la snang bar zad// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin la// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// tshe chung ma yin rigs rgya
318a5(rnying rgyud): nadam nas nga 'i / nga 'dag de nga / maud pa ma ma byu ma na// rjo/ la rnams/ na tu man ma nyamams la gas/
318a6(rnying rgyud): yongs kyis dag pa la// gnyen pos bcos shing dag tu med// mtshan nyid yongs kyis zhib la// hU~M bas ldan tshad mas de ste rags la// d+hi dang 'bras su byed med pa// mtshan tid 'dzi gas su byed// don dang gal zhingab
318a7(rnying rgyud): par ka'// rang sems gdong nas ma skyes na// 'pho zhing 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang med// btsal zhing sgrib pa'i sa yang med// med pa'ing ma yin 'gyur med bya// 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings nyid do// bzang ngan spang len rnam
318b1(rnying rgyud): med// de ltar med na chu ma bya ma // phyag gnyis kyi mtshan mu med// ma pa'ang ma yin thab pu smra// mi 'byung mnyam pa'i khyod bral// rang spang thabs kyi rgyal pod ngol// 'das ma byas pa'i klong ti na// bcos pa med pa'os shes
318b2(rnying rgyud): shar// 'dzin rtog med pa'i chos nyid la// btsal ba med pa'i sems nyid gnas// gnas tsam nyid na rtog pa med// rtag med chad med bded che// 'gyur med rtsal med rang byung gnas// de med bdag med phyogs ris med// tshe med cha
318b3(rnying rgyud): med gsang ba'i blo// bzang med ngan med kun bzang che// ma spod ji bzhin dbyings na gsal// ma bskyed rdzogs pas rdzogs chen dang // bya bral med pas 'dus ma byas// sprin du med pas rang la rdzogs// khams gsum snod bcud malus
318b4(rnying rgyud): po de ltar gsal// btsal dang bcas pas ma grub ste// ma btsal bzhag pas btsal bas grub// sgro btags mtshan ma'i skyon rnams spangs// thams cad yongs su bde brdal na// yon tan chung ba gang yang med// thams cad kun bzang yon tan
318b5(rnying rgyud): la// gyon du bya ba gang yang med// shin tu rnal 'byor gang yod pas// yon tan rgya chen rtogs 'dod pas// le'u 'di las btsal bar bya// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ yon tan gyi rgyud ye nas che ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//
318b6(rnying rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas le nas che ba 'di skad ces bka' spel to// sangs rgyas ye nas che ba ni// 'khor bsangs pas bde chen byas// snang srid sangs pas bde chen byas// ma rig sangs pas yang dag rgyas// gti mug sangs pas shes rab rgyas//
319a1(rnying rgyud): dus stsol bas ma y-i// rtags / sa snangs// ga \u0f7f stan d+has// sangs rgyas n+tas dzahA // 'du sa gdunas ng+yas nas spyad// rang badz+ra ba rags sto // rdzogs pa nga /
319a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas ye shes klong // ye shes chen po btsal med pas// sangs rgyas ye nas che ba yin// 'byung ba lnga yi yum lnga'i dang // phram chen lnga po dbyings kyi spyod// chos dbyings chen po btsal med pas// sangasar+b+bas ye nas che ba yin// rnam
319a3(rnying rgyud): par shes pa sems dpa'i ngang // sems dpa' chen po sprul pa'i stong // sprul pa chen po btsal myed pas// sangs rgyas ye nas che ba yin// yum gyi rnam par shes pa'i dang // 'khor kyi sems ma khyab pa'i klong // sprul ba chen po btsal
319a4(rnying rgyud): med pas// sangs rgyas ye nas che ba yin// yan lag zhi ba khro ma'i dang // zla ba tha ma rol pa'i thong // rol pa chen po btsal med paste// sangs rgyas ye nas che ba yin// 'jig rten drug po thub pa'i dang // thub pa chen po 'dral bu'i grog
319a5(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba chen po btsal med pas// sangs rgyas ye nas che ba yin// dbyings dang rig pa bzang mo'i dang // kun bzang yab yum gnas pa'i klong // gnas pa chen po bcol med pas// sangs rgyas ye nas che ba yin// sangs rgyasu ye nas
319a6(rnying rgyud): pa yi// 'di yi gong na sangs rgyas med// gang zhig mtshon martag 'dzin la// mangs dang sangs rgyas b+ha ba tsam/ bzungs kyang sangs kyis bablangs las 'das// bablangs kyang ma med pa da las 'das// don dam du ni ga yang med// ji d+hi mtshan
319a7(rnying rgyud): ma yo kyi mang // de bzhin sangs rgyas mu yang yod// dzi srid mtshan ma med pa ni// de bzhi na sangs rgyas su yang med// ji srid grangs dmas yang kyi bar// de bzhin ste mi grangs kyang yong// ji srid bangs rnams med nas ni// de bzhin lha yi dang
319b1(rnying rgyud): rdzing med// ma rig 'khrul pa'i sgo tsam du// grangs la brtags kyi mtshon par zad// don dam bcos pa med pa la// brdal ba'i su gcig bsdus pa las// rigs dang rtags su gang la bstan// sangs rgyas ye nas che ba ni// yod dadangos po pa/
319b2(rnying rgyud): sbyin te// rgun bzhin du rang bzhin med// med de chud pa mA yin te// nam mkha'i dbyings ltar cing yang sdang // gcig ste rtag pa ma yin te// don dam gcig tu thams cad 'dus// gnyis te rgyal ba ma sminaH// yongs la khyab pas brtul ba'i dgu/
319b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs char mi 'dzin rigs mi 'byed// gnyis su mi rtog ngar mi 'dzin// yongs la phra yang dogs pa med// kun la mthun la dron dang 'tshams// bdag tu shes la gzhan sdud pa// sangs rgyas ye nas che ba yin// sangs rgyas ye nas rje ba ni// btsal
319b4(rnying rgyud): pa ma yin rtogs pa yin// grub pa ma yin gnas pa min// gzhan du ma yin bdag nyid yin// bdag nyid ma yin gzhan ma yin// gzhan ma ma yin phyogs rigs min// nus mthu ma yin byin rlabs yin// sprul pa ma yin rtsa la gcig spod//
319b5(rnying rgyud): mongs mi snang 'phro 'du'i tshul// cir yang bstan te cir ma bstan// gang ltar snang yang gang du med// gang ltar brtags kyang gang yang med// med pa ma yin dran cing rig/ chad par ma song rig cing rtogs// rtag par ma song dngos po med// gnyis
319b6(rnying rgyud): su masong rtag pa med// gcig tu masong kun la khyab// dang po bskyed pa'i rgyu med pas// za ma 'chi zhing 'pho ba med// da ltar dngos po rdzas med pas// rtag pas chags shing gzung ba med// 'khor ba sgyu ma'i rdzas 'dra bas// bde sdug/
319b7(rnying rgyud): bzang ngan ngon la med// mi rtag sdug bsngal rmi lam 'dra// gang la brtags kyang de la 'khrul// brtags pas chos ni gcig kyang med// med pa'ang ma yin rig bcom// chu ni rgya mtsho nyid du chu// sangs kyis rtog pa nyid las byung // chos ni
320a1(rnying rgyud): bcos pa med pa'i chos// rtags ni ma 'dres gsal ba'i rtags// don ni 'gyur ba med pa'i don// de ltar thob pa sangs rgyas zhes// ye nas che ba yin par bshad// rnal 'byar 'di togs bcom ldan 'das// gas/
320a2(rnying rgyud): par gyis la de la zhog/ sangs rgyas ye nas che ba'o// rnal 'byor skyes bu gang yod pa// sangs rgyas che ba 'di rtogs na// le'u 'di las btsal bar bya'o// kun tu bzang po che ba larang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyasA yAM nas che ba'i le'u b+he h+Na shu
320a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nus sems can ye nas che ba 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// sems can ye nas che ba yi// don 'di bstan pa 'di yin no// 'byung ba'i
320a4(rnying rgyud): gtos su nam mkha' che// chos nyid gtos su chos can che// sangs rgyas sems can bskyed pas ni// de phyir sems can sangs rgyas yum// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bas na// de phyir sems can sangs rgyas yab// snga rabs 'das pa'i
320a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyang // snga rabs 'das pa'i sems can yin// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // da ltar bzhugs pa'i sems can yin// slad kyi 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // slad kyi 'byon pa'i sems can yin// des na sangs
320a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas sems can pas// sangs rgyas pas kyang sems can che// btags pas sems can thams cad gcig/ sems can gcig pas chos kyi sku// chos kyi sku yang sems can yin// sems can brtags pas dngos po med// dngos po med/
320a7(rnying rgyud): pas chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi dbyings kyang sems can yin// sems can shes pas gsal bar go// gsal bar go ba ye shes te// ye shes nyid kyang sems can yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'byung gnas mdzod// de phyir sangs rgyas sem
320b1(rnying rgyud): can med// sangs rgyas sprul pa cir yang ston// da pyir sems can sangs rgyas sngas// khams gsum sems can sku gsung thugs// srid pa gsum gyi dbyings kyi klong // rgyud drug sems can don dam dang // mtha' yas sems
320b2(rnying rgyud): can lam gyi mchog/ thabs kyi rgyal por gang shes pa// de nyid don rdzogs chos kyi sra// mnyes shes rab don shes la// de nyid bcos med man ngag 'chang // rang byang rgyal po'i sems can la// rig pa'i rgyal po rnam shes shar/
320b3(rnying rgyud): phung po thig le chen por rol// rnam par dag pa'i bde ba brdal// phye mched ting 'dzin gsal ba la// thabs kyi 'phro 'du gsal bar ston// gang la dpe bstan de bzhin du// de bzhin sems can dper bstan pas// bde ba chen po'i man
320b4(rnying rgyud): ngag 'byung // dag pas brtags pa kun kyang gtsang // rtogs pas bsam na gang yang 'grub// ltab yangs pa'i nam mkha' la// 'dzin rtog med pa'i 'od brdal bas// gang yang ma spangs lhun gyis grub// mu mtha' med pa'i shes rab
320b5(rnying rgyud): la// skye ba med pa'i klong brdal bas// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su mkhyen// ma byung ma skyes skye ba med// skye med tha snyad sgro btags pa// nan gyi mkha' la 'dzin pa ltar// de dag rtags su mi snang bas// shes rab chung ldan
320b6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul par 'gyur// tshig dang ldan yang don las gol// man ngag gdeng du yongs mi chud// gang zhig shes rab zhan pa yis// sgro btags chos la yi rang ba// long ba la ma nor 'khrul pa ltar// ngam thog gcod rod nges par ltung //
320b7(rnying rgyud): spyan theg rgyal nges pa 'di// shes rab dman la bstan mibya// don du mi 'ong skur pa 'debs// gang zhig bka' smod 'gal byed pa// don du mi 'gyur log pa'i lam// thar pa'i gnas med ltung ba'is// nor pa'i lam 'tshol 'khrul pa
321a1(rnying rgyud): zhing // kun bzang ston pas yangs ma bshad// glang bag srin chog mtshan macan// bde ba'i don med yug pa'i chog/ ma rig rmongs la 'khrul pa'i sems// log pa'i lam myol por 'dzin// rang do
321a2(rnying rgyud): la phyogs char 'dzin// don ldan snod can ma yin pas// bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du// nges par don la gzhug mi bya// mkhas pas don dang mi ldan zhing // bden pa'i don por phyogs char 'dzin// tshig tu mkhas la don du g.yel//
321a3(rnying rgyud): log pa'i las dga' bka' 'tshal na// de ni bdud kyi slu ba yin// skye bo'i gzugs la sdig la spyod// sdig pa don dang mi 'gal zhing // kun la spyod la kun spong zhing // gang dang mthun zhing dul ba'i sems// skrod cing gang la'ang ma cha
321a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i// ji ltar spyod dang bka' dang mthun// gdeng chen don dang rtogs pas mthun// nges pa'i bstan pa'i gzhung 'tshol na// de ni sangs rgyas sprul pa yin// yang dag bden pa sems can no// mnyam pa nyid kyang sems can no// srang len
321a5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i spyod pa la// 'du 'bral med pa'i dam tshig bsrung // bzang ngan med pa'i lta ba la// phyogs ris med pa'i sgrub pa slab// bden pa'i don dang tshul shes na// sems can yin na yin du zad// yin kyang sems can che ba yin//
321a6(rnying rgyud): don ldan skyes bus shes par gyis// shin tu rnal 'byor yang yod pa// sems can che bar rtogs 'dod na// le'u 'di las btsal bar bya'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ sems can ye nas che ba'i le'u ste nyi shu
321a7(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// // de nas rtogs pa ye nas che ba 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rtog pa med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// rtogs pa ye nas che ba yi// don 'di bstan pas 'di yin no//
321b1(rnying rgyud): stong ngas na gags pan// mangs pa'i na nin duyin gas pa kyas nyung ba na s+ho// bshad bcwos mgags/ bkang du man pa ku dum ngan ma pas dang zhes su dang/ nga du
321b2(rnying rgyud): na/ su chu
321b3(rnying rgyud): shes che// phyi nang rtogs pas thig le che// che chung rtogs pas mnyam nyid che// yangs dog togs pas klong chen che// bzang ngan rtogs pas bde chen che// bya btsal rtogs pas bde chen che// bde skrag rtogs pas byang chub che//
321b4(rnying rgyud): smaka rtogs pa'i klong chen phyogs ris med// mnang gdon ldan dbye bri med// bden pa'i don 'chang 'dzin rtog med// rang byung rang shar bya btsal med// thar pa'i gnas rigs sngang len med// dbyings kyi bde brdal phyogs ris med// rtogs
321b5(rnying rgyud): ni bcos med snying por rtogs// ston na rang byung 'bras bur ston// thob rna rnam dag bcos med thob// nyi ma shar bas mun pa sangs// rtswa ni thob pas 'di pa nub// lung 'di byung bas rtag chad bros// stong gsam ma lus g.yul ngor rang
321b6(rnying rgyud): khams gsum mA lus tshar la ton// srid gsum ma lus tho les btab// 'dzin rtog gnyis ni 'tshor med bzung // chags sdang gnyis ni dbang du byas// rtag chad gnyis ni rdul du brlag/ ljang len gnyis ni bye mar btags/
321b7(rnying rgyud): bzadang na gnyis ni sngags kyis bsres// sangs rgyas sems can gcig tu byas// mtho ris ngan song gcig tu gnas// bde ba chen po'i zhal du gsol// dmyal ba chos nyid dang du blangs// yi drug bzos skom gyis bsregs/
322a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa nags sa rnas/ e mi ga pas su masas// sa kyis/ thAg sa skyes gyug// smrasla du na sa /
322a2(rnying rgyud): na po sangs rgyas par// gzhan du bya ming yang med// sangs rgyas mdzod pa de ltar snang // rtogs pabyung pade ltung da// nam mtha' yangs pa'i mtshan nyi la// dngos pa mtshan mthun shing lta // rtog
322a3(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa// 'dzin rtog mtshan mni yang shong // gong pa pas snang yangs kyang langs// rma myi rdzogs pas kyi nga // don dam rtags pas nang du badre// dper med rtogs pas gnyis med pade// sems can sangs rgyas yin rtogs/
322a4(rnying rgyud): kun nas sangs rgyas nong pa'i lam// snang srid sangs rgyas yin rtogs na// gzhan nas chos nyid nor ba'i lam// thams cad 'dus pa'i dbyings nyid ste// ma lus 'dus pa'i theg pa // kun la rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// bzhi
322a5(rnying rgyud): rtog med shes rab 'tshal// rmongs pa 'khrul pa'i bya ba nor// don dang mi ldan nor pa des// gang yang mi shes don mi shes// ci yang mi rtogs don mi rtogs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // gang martog pan de rje
322a6(rnying rgyud): bdud // bdud dang log pa'i phyogs rnams kyang // gang gis rtogs na de li t+ta// smra ba'i rgyal po'i dmag dpung rdung pa// sde gri med pas gtsu lo lded// bzung ngan med par sman gyis bsred// chogs rim med par po las brtag
322a7(rnying rgyud): dngos po mtshan ma gtan nas bcwag// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas thugs pa la sa ngas// rtogs pa'i rgyal po rtsod pa med// la ma ni ti lam de rdzogs pa// bcos pa med pa chos nyid lam// phan pa bzhin dus smras pa
322b1(rnying rgyud): pa bcas mdag/ don 'di dang la s+ya gnas pa// rtogs ban+danas che bya'o// don rtogs rnal 'byor shes par gyis// don 'chang rnal 'byor gang yod pa// rtags pa cha ba 'tshal 'dad na// 'jadzad las btsal bar bya'o// kun tu brdang
322b2(rnying rgyud): che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ rtogs pa ye nas che ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud 'di rtogs par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ rang gnas chen po dgu yi don 'di yid la zung zhig
322b3(rnying rgyud): de yang gang zhe na/ rgyu dang 'bras bu med par ye shes su gnas pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad ma gyes par rang gnas pa dang / phyi nang snod bcud kyis bsdus pa thams cad chos kyi skur gnas pa dang // sangs rgyas dang sems
322b4(rnying rgyud): can gnyis su med par rang gnas pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad bcos pa med par rang gnas pa dang / bzang ngan thams cad ma bcos par rang gnas pa dang / mtho dman tshe chung thams cad ma bcos par rang gnas pa dang / kye shi dang 'pho 'gyur
322b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad mi 'gyur bar dang gnas pa dang / blang dong chags sdang phyogs ris med par rang gnas pa'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu btsal ba med par ye shes su gnas pa ni/ brgyad khri bzhi stong ches rnams dang // rgyu bras chos rnams theg pa cir bstan pa// gas
322b6(rnying rgyud): dnges par dbyings gcig pas// rim pas btsal zhing bsrub tu med// dbyar dgun ston dpying la sogs pa// rgyu 'bras rim gyis gsung ba yang // dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir// rgyu dang 'bras bur bstan pa med// rang sems sa
322b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas ma yin na// mched bu nor bur mi 'gyur bzhin// las dang las min cing bcol yang // sangs rgyas byang chub thob pa med// chu nyid 'bras bu yin shes na// sa gser bzhin du ye dag pas// sangs rgyas ye nas yin pa la// bcol
323a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsamapas dbyings mi bskyod// stangs rgyas rdzun rgyal sems la med// byang chub sems ni na pas// nyes brgyad kyang dang 'a // byabacom mad pang ldan gyis thag/ khyed ma btsal 'as
323a2(rnying rgyud): gyu gnas// thams cad byung med rang bzhin dag/ bsrub cing grub pa'i 'bras bya ni// btsal med dang la jigs par gnas// rgyu dang 'bras bu batshol ba maud// kun te bzang po cheb la rang gnas pa'i rlud las/ btsal bya me pang na
323a3(rnying rgyud): ba pa ye shes su gnas pa'i lang kye nyi shug sum 'o// / de nas 'khor ba dang ma nam su 'das pa brtul pa med par dganas pa gsum pa/ 'khong ba'o chos dang mya ngan 'das// gnyis su bstan pachogs rna
323a4(rnying rgyud): ma skyes rang bzhin rnam par dag/ kun tu bzong po nyid kyis gsungs// bang pa thob pas btags pa yi// bu dang ye shes che ba yang // ngan mang 'khong ba'i thug bsngal yin// ma skyes dbyings su yon tanags la// khams gsum 'khor ba'i
323a5(rnying rgyud): chos 'di la// phyin ci log tu rnam btags kyang // rang bzhin le nas gnyis med pas// spyam 'ang nye bub pa med// de bzhin chos rnams rnams cad byung // dbyer bang rdos tshul gcig dus// rang bzhin gdong nas ma skyes phyir// 'jos pa med/
323a6(rnying rgyud): bya bzhin gnas// skye ni skye lu sags pa// smig smra 'a ste rang bzhin med// de bzhin gyi rnams thams cad byung // dbyed med po tshu gcig sas// rang bzhin 'dod nam mi skye hrIH// bcos pa med pa rang bzhinaganas// kye dang mi
323a7(rnying rgyud): rgya lo sa // sgyum 'a ste nga bzhin med// de bani brtanag sa la sogs sun// de nagacig gnyis med pamed// mas da yang byung chu 'amapa/ rgya nyi las rim gnyis med// mabyas pa song bzhinan/
323b1(rnying rgyud): nas// sa / snab sa la su sa // // / sa sa
323b2(rnying rgyud): ngan slo na
323b3(rnying rgyud): mapa kyi sa ma nyid gu rgyugs/ ga pa na com// ma dang #
323b4(rnying rgyud): na/ / sa/ @
323b5(rnying rgyud): rji pa mgasapa / gyis ma sa gon spod pas/ mi gas nyi de nyid pas nga pa mags na/
323b6(rnying rgyud): rlabs yi snadrug/ das panas med pa gnas / na pa la nga gnas pa'i rgyud may-i/ dang rjod 'drang ba nas cad ces kyi spya ma patshas ba ga gnas pa'i ma tshul / ngan sa sangs
323b7(rnying rgyud): da sems can gnyis su med par ma brtsim ba nga gnas pa 'dzin 'di gsungs pa/ bams nga khyen pa'i sangs mye // ma ga rgyal pa'i sems can gnyis/ nga// gsengasasas pa
324a1(rnying rgyud): labyungs nags tshal thams cad // thong shes sbyinan yin bya// spyod mags pas drug 'gyur bzhin// sangs na sa sems can de bzhin no// ma thams sems rjes nyid la// rgyang chub kru nga/
324a2(rnying rgyud): la 'gyur med na// rin chen gling du phyin pa ltar// sangs rgyas sems can btsal du med// chos dang sems dang nam mkha' la// rnam pa'i mtshan ma cing brtags kyang // cis kyang mi 'gyur 'grub med pas// ma bcos gnyis
324a3(rnying rgyud): ye sangs rgyas// 'bras bu smin pa'i snye ma lA// sa bon nyid las gzhan ma yin// bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // sems can sems las gzhan ma yin// de bzhin rgyu 'bras rnam pa yang // ye nas gnyis med byang chub sems//
324a4(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen por ye gdal bas// ye nas gnyis med kun tu bzang // gser bzhin ma bcos rang bzhin gnas// rang bzhin gdod nas dag pa la// tshig dang yi ges bcos su med// gang ltar spyad kyang thog ma med// kun tu bzang po che ba
324a5(rnying rgyud): b+hasngal gnyis med pa// rang 'dod bcos pa'i smon pa yin// ye nas de ltar gnas pa ni// kun gzhi kun tu bzang por gsungs// nam mkha' bzhin du ye gsal ba// rtog dang mi rtog gnyis med pas// mtho sa ngan song btsal du med// de
324a6(rnying rgyud): rtog byis pa'i spyod yul yin// rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid sems// ye nas kun tu bzang po la// gtsang dang sme ba gnyis med ltar// bde sdug rtog pa nyid du gsal// rang sems 'gyur ba'i chos can ngan// bde dang sdug bsngal rim par nges//
324b1(rnying rgyud): sems kyi chos nyid 'gyur marnapas// bad sdug bcol yang rnyed mi 'gyur// thams cad dang gi sems yin na// drug bsngal nyid kyang ba ba'i grong // rang byung ba shes yin pas na// ngan sang nyid ljang sangs rgyas zhing // mnyam pa rjid du ldan bud
324b2(rnying rgyud): pas// phyogs dang ris su btsal du med// mA bcos ye nas kun tu bzang // bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis su me// byang chub sems nyid pade chen po// rgyu nyid dag pas 'bras kyi che// tshig dang yi ge las 'dus pas// btsal med lhun grub
324b3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ma btsal bar dang gnas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bzung ngan dang gtsang sme med par rang gnas pa'i don gsungs so// mi rig mun pa'i
324b4(rnying rgyud): g.yung drung la// ye shes nyi ma shar ba ltar// rtog dang mi rtog rang bzhin la// byang chub sems gsal bzang ngan med// bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin la// dug dang bdud ci gnyis med ltar// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// skyon dang yon
324b5(rnying rgyud): tan ming yang med// dran pa nyid dang bzang ba med// skyon rnams yon tan nyid du dag/ mi gtsang ba las gtsang ba med// dug nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin pas// gnyis med don 'chang ye nas rlig/ b+ha med don du med pa la// 'du byed btsal ba shin
324b6(rnying rgyud): sa// me bcos ni mong sa nas dag/ med kyi yod par yidzin pa chos// nam mapa' bag pa ga'abyed pa bzhin// ni myod las la chub med pas// gzhan du rna la 'khyod sa snong cig// don med sbyi me b+hen+d+ha mI zang // theg pa sa
324b7(rnying rgyud): mongs mazin// nges pa'i man dag rtog pa dgol// don med de 'dra gnas ngan 'khyam// de bas 'gyur med byang chub sems// rdzogs chen 'di la gang spyod pa// de ni kun bzang nyid yin pas// brdang dang gtsang gyi gnyis su med// man pa/
325a1(rnying rgyud): don na pa thod// sems ma ngas pargya sa pa'adan// dzu pa sa myong bas// spangs rgyas te dag sa/ ku rtsa na ba yang gnas pa byung las/ babang na rtag
325a2(rnying rgyud): da par nga gnas pa'i le m+b+hi chu brgyad pal// den pa mthong pa na khyi ma pa ma bkyis ba ga nas pa dzan/ zhen pa mapa thod pa // gas tsugs pa// blar ma 'anal
325a3(rnying rgyud): bshin/ d+hI ya ba d+hA myed// rlu zhin / g+sa d+hA blas kyi ma sa dag// shes pagaN+DIg d+ha madz+ha // nga na dumams tsam mtshan// de shi nyid las pas y-id / mamathun ma
325a4(rnying rgyud): yang // ye shes nyid la mnyam pa med// tshig dang yig badzod ldas 'das/ ting gi 'a gtan ma 'a khams// ny-i dzin pa med pa dang // hUM la bu nga brgya gshegs rnams// mi skyes gang du ma chung ba // kun gzhes
325a5(rnying rgyud): byas pa// yenas rnam par dag pa la// sangs rgyas che ba sgra bcos la// sems can chung nas bcos su med/ chos rgyas sems su sangs rgyas pas// ji lta dzod pa gsil byar 'byung // ma dan 'das dngul bang ba ches// ma Ta /
325a6(rnying rgyud): ming par rang gnas pa'o// kun tu babang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ mamo man dang tshe chung med par dang gnas pa'i lang hU~M te rgya dgu pa'o// / de nas b+he shi dang 'pho 'gyur med par ma btsal bar ye shes su dang gnas pa 'di
325a7(rnying rgyud): sems dang chos dang rnamam pa'al/ da pong bskyed pa'i rgyas pas// pa mang kyizhi sam 'gyur// de bzhin cig mthas med// 'das dang mang sad ltad dus// thachag rtag pa ga la 'gyur// sa
325b1(rnying rgyud): ni med pa'i phyir// sngon dang phyis med gdod nas dag/ skad cig yung la bskal pa'i zangs// ring byung bye brag blangs bstan pa// rnam rtog mongs par 'gyur snang yang // chos nyid dus las 'gyur snang med// de bzhin tshe tshad la sogapa ga/
325b2(rnying rgyud): lus med grangs kyis grangs bstan yang // rmi lam pham rgyal bgrangs pa bzhin// grangs dang ring dung brtags pas nor// bdag gi bskal pa bgrangs gyur kyang // thog ma nyid las 'gyur ba med// mtha' dbus phyogs rab cing bstan yang /
325b3(rnying rgyud): drug po'i dang las nyams pa med// 'jigs pa'i bdud dang dbar snang yang // sems lagasapa don mang du med// snang skying medang chung gyur byung // byang chub stems la 'gyur ba med// med pa ma yin cir ya gsul// gsal tsam
325b4(rnying rgyud): dan phyogs ris med// yod med brjod pa'i tshig 'das pas// mi 'gyur g.yung drung nyid gnas pa'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ skye shi dang 'pho 'gyur med par ye shes rang gnas pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// /
325b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang byung dor dang phyogs ris med par deng gnas pa 'di ched du brjod do// skyon rnams byang chub sems yin pas// spyan pas sems cang po mi ti/ ji ltar legs par spyad pa// kun bzang don gyi spyod yul yin// yin ta tid
325b6(rnying rgyud): zhan med de// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// ye nas btsal med de bzhin nyid// gzhan nas rgyal bas btsal du med// tshad med slang dor spyod pa'i chos// nam mkha' 'dra ste grub pa med// ma bas pa ye nas yod mi 'dzim
325b7(rnying rgyud): cing yang 'gyur ba med// ma btsal dang sems sangs rgyas pas// bde chen gzhan du 'tshol ba ni// brtags shing btsal kyang mi rnyed pas// de bas ma rtogs sems nyid 'tshol// rnam rtog nyid kyang ye shes pas// log rtog zhe srang gang
326a1(rnying rgyud): rAn yod // phyogs rnyis med par zha sdang stong // b+h+yo nang mang bar ye shes dang // bzang dun che chung mnyam pa nyid// skye 'chi 'gyur med byung chub sems// 'khor bya'i lkog tog mtshan ma'i chos// mang
326a2(rnying rgyud): la 'ja' tshon sdang ba bzhin// brtags shing btsal bas mi rnyed pas// de bas ma rtogs sems nyid la// ji ltar bstan pa bde ba che// gang ltar spyad pa kun tu bzang // nges pa'i don du nyid gnas pas// don 'dri ma rtogs med pa'o// kun tu
326a3(rnying rgyud): bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ blang dor dang phyogs ris med pas ma btsal bas ye shes su dang gnas pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang ston pa kun tu bzang pos skye shi med pa'i sems kyi 'khor ba la sogs pa
326a4(rnying rgyud): rnams ma gsungs par tshig 'di ched du brjod do// kun tu bzang po'i man ngag 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par gang byed pa// chos nyid rtogs pa shar bas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsun yin// 'di thos sangs rgyas lag tu len// thams cad
326a5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi bdag nyid du// rgyud 'di 'dzin pa'i shes rab gnas// man ngag 'di nyid yin shes na// kun tu bzang po ngas bshad de// gang zhig gang la rtogs 'dod pas// man ngag 'di la blta bar gyis// de skad ces gsung pa med pa'i kun tu
326a6(rnying rgyud): bzang pos bka' stsal pas/ phyogs ris med pa'i snang sring thams cad gnyen pos ma bcos pa'i thabs kyis rtogs pa gcig tu med/ thob pa med pa'i su thob pa/ grub pa med pa'i 'bras bu thob pas/ rang bzhin btsal ba med par sangs rgyas pa'i don du
326a7(rnying rgyud): sus kyang ma bslabs par shes so// man ngag gis kyang ma bstan par rig go// lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po che ba la dang gnas pa'i byung chen po rdzogs so// / pa di ga ma tshig yong chu dag
326b1(rnying rgyud): ga sha nga/ klub tu mam tika TI ka tan nam/ bod gdang / sku gdung bar bcarjo dang macad tan gyi sgyad sa thapa bcom ldan 'dus gsang ba'i bdag pa la phyag 'aN+Dal la// 'dri mang bdag gis thos pa'i ngas gcigan/ bang
326b2(rnying rgyud): ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse mo seng ge'i za 'jam lta bu'i gnas na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ lang ka'i bdag mo blo mos thabs spun dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen blo zos rgya mtsho dang / rmongs pa gtsug
326b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin blo gros mtha' yus dang / gnod sbyin srang mnga' gdong blo gros dang sel dang / li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa blo gros rab zhi dang / chos kyi rgyal po chen po'i pho brang na thams cad theg pa chen po 'don la thabs cig tu bzhugs so// den
326b4(rnying rgyud): dge slong chen po li tsa gyi dri ma med par grags pa rang gi gdan las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la 'di skad rjes gsol ba 'debs so// sems can spangs rgyas lam 'dod na// dge ba'i las la
326b5(rnying rgyud): khyad 'phags dang // bde gshegs zhabs tog bya ba'i phyir// mchod rten bzhed na ji ltar ste// rnying nas gsar par bzhed na ni// bdag gis sprul pa'i ston pa la// thos bzhin khyod kyis kyang par du// gsang sngags lam gyi
326b6(rnying rgyud): rten gsungs// zhes zhus so// de nas gdul dka' 'dul ba'i ded dpon chen po gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// theg pa thun mong mchod rten dang // khyad par rgyud lung man ngag lugs// thun mong byung tshul man ngag
326b7(rnying rgyud): l-iH// khyang par gsang ba'i lugs rnams ni// gzugs su gnyis kyi min dag rnams// khyed la bshad kyis rab tu nyon// ces gsungs so// tsha tsha dang mchod rten gyi rgyud kyug dung 'bar ba las/ kla gni dang phreng bslang na
327a1(rnying rgyud): dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos theg pa thun mong gi mchod rten gyi byung tshul 'di dag gsungs so// mchod rten la rgyas wa yod de// de yang gang dang gang zhem// mchod rten
327a2(rnying rgyud): na med pa'i rgyu// yid kyi mchod rten zhes bya dang // rang bzhin gyis grub mchod rten dang // sprul par byung ba'i mchod rten dang // gzugs brtan rtsigs pa'i mchod rten no// bla med mchod rten zhes bya ba// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi
327a3(rnying rgyud): sku gsung 'jom gling phrag brgya las// gling bzhir chags pas mchod rten snang // shar du byams pa brtsegs pa la// lho phyogs snying rje rin chen brtsegs// nub tu dga' ba brla brtsegs// byang du btang snyoms don yong srung // 'di
327a4(rnying rgyud): dus shAkya thub pa ni// srid rtser byang sems bcu drug dang // dgra bcom bskor nas bzhugs pa'o// yid kyi mchod rten zhes bya ni// nam mkha'i dbyings snyam rgya mtsho'i gling // mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mchod rten ni// byang chub sems kyi yid
327a5(rnying rgyud): kyis bri// phyag gis rgyas gdab grangs bzung zhing // ngag gis sngags brjod byin gyis brlabs// yid kyis rin chen mchod rten bsam// sdang zhing stong la stong zhing gsal// rang bzhin grub pa'i mchod rten ni// srid pas dzu ba da
327a6(rnying rgyud): sprul pas grub// srid pas grub pas ri rab nyid// de yang ji ltar grub ce na// chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin las// ak+Sho tu'i byin rlabs dang // nam mkhas gsal ba'i go yang 'byed// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gnas sar chags/
327a7(rnying rgyud): de ni yod grub pa'i byin rlabs pas// de las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chags// rlung lta bangan thigs rnams gnas// rin chen 'byung ldan byin rlabs las// de steng me yid kyil 'khor chags// me lha'i tshogs rnams den gnas// nga
327b1(rnying rgyud): mthang yas byin drabs las// chu yi dkyil la bar rgya mchor gyur// klu li gnas kyang don yod// rnam par snang mdzad byin rlabs las// sa gzhi chen po chags pa la// sreng bzhi ri bu grub pa ra// gling bzhi gang phan ma
327b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// ri rab rgyal chen rigs bzhi sogs// gnod sbyin gza' skar lha chen gnas// rtse la 'thab bral min chad nas// gzugs khams gnas ri sa bcu bdun dang // gzugs med ming bzhi phung por gnas// nyan thos
327b3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang de na bzhugs// b.li ba'i don du mdzad pa'i gnas// sprul pas grub pa'i mchod rten ni// shAmra thub pa lhums zhugs dus// u dum par su gyur gyur// 'dzam gling sprul pa'i mchod rten gcig/ shAka thub byang chub shing
327b4(rnying rgyud): gsum bde rgyas ston mabyung // bdud brtul po rangs sangs rgyas dus// lo ma las ni me tog shar// shar du byams ldan bsod nams gter// mya ngan 'dang ba'i tshul bstan pa// mthar legs g.yung rnga rdzogs bkar// rang bzhin mchod rten
327b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes su// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rtsed po che// mtshan ma'i sdug bsngal yongs bsal zhing // sems can kun la byams thugs ldan// sprul par 'byung ba'i mchod rten ni// byang phyogs rnam thos sras kyi spyan// g.yas mthong sreg la
328a1(rnying rgyud): g.yon mthong 'jig/ mig mi bzang gis gar bltas sar// mi nad phyugs nang mu ste 'bebs// rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la zhus// bdag gis ma bsgrubs gnod pa'i mig/ ji ltar thabs kyis bsgyur du
328a2(rnying rgyud): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos bu'i// phyag tu ring bsrel mchod rten byin// mig ngan smin mtshams shA ri rAm// mchod 'bul byas pas shin tu dge// sprul pa'i mchod rten ting 'dzin sku// byams shing snyoms pa'i kun gyi
328a3(rnying rgyud): mgon// thugs rje chen pos pa gyod du med// nub byang rgyal po'i mig nad sel// gzugs chen mchod rten brtsigs pa ni// rgyal po d+harma a sho kas// ri gsum ce gdong lung gsum mdo// ri lung mang po 'dus pa'i rgyun// pho zang batra
328a4(rnying rgyud): pas bstun nad zin// rmi lam 'byung zhing mchod rten bzhengs// nad las thar te rgyal srid 'dzin// tha chung sras grongs phung po bsregs// tsha tshe btab cing mchod rten bzhengs// dgra bcom 'bras bu thob par gyur// sras 'bring nad kyis zin de
328a5(rnying rgyud): 'das// bdun tshigs bdun gyis rigs drug drangs// tha lab tsha tsha btab nas ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob// li tsa pi yis mi shes sam// de nas li tsa pa dgyes nas// da wAr shar gyi phyag rdor khyod// dus dwer ba zhugs pangs ma mthong
328a6(rnying rgyud): bag chags so la lA gsang bar shod// ces gsungs so// sku gdung 'bar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ mchod rten byung tshul lo rgyus kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos dam pa'i rigs can rnam pa lnga la
328a7(rnying rgyud): thun mong mchod rten gyi man ngag 'di dag gsungs so// mchod rten bya ba'i sa btsal ba// bra ma zhim bol la mnyan pa'i sar// yungs kar dag la sngags 'di yis// lan bdun brjod la mtshams bcad do// oM a mr-i ta ha na ha na hrI phaT/ sa
328b1(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing lags phung srong ba d+hAd lA// dzarnga phung par bsams nas nA// lan badran sngags brjod dbus dang ne// grwa bzhir btab la gzhag padaH// o b+had+ha d+hi la yas da d+ha d+hAngab/ dA nas theg srung can la// rdo rje srung byar rab bas pa
328b2(rnying rgyud): nas// rgya khyon ci ran thig gis bskor// sngags 'di lan ni gsum brjod pas// sa gzhi rin chen gyur par bsam// oM badz+ra swa tra hU~M phaT/ oM badza la na kha na hU~M paT/ des ni rdo rjer bsam pa yi// lag chas sa ni rko ba'i sngags/
328b3(rnying rgyud): tshar nas gnas gcod phyin nas ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje rtse gsum mnan nas ni// lan bdun sngags bzlas thobs brdung // oM badz+ra mung+ka ra a ko Ta ya a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ tsan+dan gur gum dri chab rgyas// 'jim pa
328b4(rnying rgyud): sa
328b5(rnying rgyud): na chen bsam// oM badz+ra pra mar ta na ye hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas 'jim pa'i gong bu la// sngags 'di gsum brjod byin brlabs pas// 'od lngas don mdzad 'phros 'dus nas// rin chen lngar ni gyur par bsam// oM na maHsa man+ta bu t+tAr/
328b6(rnying rgyud): pra te ha ta shA sa nA nAn/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ de nas 'jim pa byin rlabs kyi// sngags 'di nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// mchod rten gcig byas tsam gyis ni// bye ba byas par 'gyur pa'o// oM na mo d+ha ga lA te be ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dz+nyA ya/ a
328b7(rnying rgyud): drunas bu yi/ oM skyes mes mas/ sa ma nyes maras/ an par date dam pa la ga// mahA tid rlung bu le ni d+ha ni/ sarba ta stag to thangs/ a tit+pa na N+Di te swA hA/ rigs lngas sa'i thugs gajug ga// yengs sgrub
329a1(rnying rgyud): snum gang kyad sngags// zis d+ha 'i nang d+ha gzugs/ bau g+ha gur gu ma dag gis bri// oMd+b+ha dat+ta ra ta ra yad+hA ra ya 'du drug/ oM ga shwat+tha pU ga tu ba can ngon ga/ oM ta / bam
329a2(rnying rgyud): mas ma ya tA ma a hA ratA d+h+r-ig/ oM badz+ra d+hArma sa mA ya d+h+yaM wu hUM waM a ro li ka/ oM ts+tsha pra hi hit+ta rat+ta ra sa ga// yang na sngags thung 'di zis te// tsha tshe chung ngu'i nang du gzhug/ oM tri yad+h+wi kAn+taM/ sarba ta thA ga tA nan/ taHthA/ oM swadz+dza
329a3(rnying rgyud): sh+tsat+ma/ ni nga le/ ya sha~M sa / ta~M/ sa baH/ ya tib+h+yoH/ de nasa'i ba bigazhug pa'i sngags// gsum brjod thabs dang shes rab 'grol bam// chos de myos nyid dudab par bsapa// de'i sngagasam
329a4(rnying rgyud): 'di yinano// oM a mr-i tA ya? she swA hA/ de nas 'bi 'di bya ba'i sngags// ma zin pa ri dri brjod par bya// oM tre ya t+te sarba ta thAg two hr-i da ha yaM/ gar+b+he la/ d+harbad+d+ha d+ha gar+b+he sang ha ra ra/ A yAn saM sho d+ha ya~M pA pa ma/ sarbatathA ga tas ma ba ma
329a5(rnying rgyud): bi shud+d+he swA hA/ mar dang nyung rtsi 'bul ba'i sngags// nyon mongs rdul bral byang chub bsam// oM a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ kol phor nang du gzhug pa'i sngags// thabs dang shes rab 'grel pa chos dbyings bzhugs// oM d+ha tu gar+b+ha ste tra/
329a6(rnying rgyud): phor sau li brdab pa'i sngags// mchod rten grub pas 'gro don bsam// oM d+ha ra ma ra te badz+ra mud gA ra a kro Ta ya NAM/ de nas mchod rten dbyung ba'i sngags// shel song dag pa lta bur bsam// oM badz+ra d+ha dod pra ba ya swA hA/ chu yi chos rnams rdzogs pa
329a7(rnying rgyud): la// gzugs kyi speni rnam pa gnyis// 'bras bu'i chos rnams rdzogs pa las// chos kyi sru byin gyis brlabs// oM sarba ti thA ga ta ni \u0f7fkA ma sa ma sam+b+ha aM sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+hog kA ya sa ma la sI/ aM sarba ta thA ga tid+hi kA ya meng+ga su la badz+ra
329b1(rnying rgyud): ma maH/ da pags / ma // rgyub d+ma yang kya ba shAs/ chug/ sa pa ga gapas // sa rnas d+hA // smras// pa sa
329b2(rnying rgyud): dang shas dang ldan par bya// yo tag la ma sA+eH/ bden tshigs 'phyang gu yis// sems can sa kyi sbyin pa rdzogs/ oM btag saH/ rje srin rgyal mtshan btsugs pa masabarji ba kyi 'khor
329b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyis mams cadam lus pan// blan med pa'i byang sri nga ldan// maM ma ta ma tar+tha la sa twa/ metogacong ba bcings pa yis// sa mas can ma brjid gzungs rnams 'dzin// oM tA mA l-idzi thAM/ mtshan dang ba byang nga ldan pas// sa
329b4(rnying rgyud): mi ngoms ldan pa'i sngags// na ma s+t+rai la teN+Da rbe ga te/ pA tita shus ge ta reH/ tathA ga d+hA ya/ aH te sa h+ya ka mi da? d+ha ya/ tad+ya bA bat+ti swAH/ gdan rnams ma lus dbul ba'i sngags// rin chan te tha sems can pad// i d+ha ngoms ga
329b5(rnying rgyud): las byung dru gshegs pa'i dgas// da hr-i ng+ra ti / rin nag tul ma chos kyi / chen gdan la bzhugs su gsan// slod pa ti snye/ de 'dab ma sa pa// rdzog
329b6(rnying rgyud): sam/ // sbyi ma pa tid / os nyimad+hAsam+b+ha / gam mangs pa/
330a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las// mtshad rten gdang thabs man ngag gi le'u sde gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos thun mong gi mchod rten las kyi rim pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos
330a2(rnying rgyud): dbyings mngon gyur ye shes su brnyes shing // sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thugs rje'i ci 'dul yid bzhin ro skong ba'i// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs du gsel yon tan+da 'byung ba'i gnas//
330a3(rnying rgyud): gsung rab bcu gnyis 'phags lam rgyal ba'i bka'// bcom ldan shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// rnam dag dbyings kyi dam chos gshegs su gsol// chos sku gzugs brtan byang chub sems kyi dang // thing bzhi 'dul mdzad/
330a4(rnying rgyud): mchod rten chen po brgyad// bsod nams zhing dang 'gro ba 'dren pa'i gtso// sku gdung ring bsrel ma lus gshegs su gsol// sa bcu rgyal sras che la mnga' brnyes shing // byams dang snying rjes brtson 'grus go bgos nas// shes rab
330a5(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// byang chub sems dpa' ma lus gshegs su gsol// bden bzhi'i don rtogs log lha'i skyon spangs shing // tshul khrims ji med dug lnga'i sgron bsal nas// 'phags la mdon brtson yon tan rgyan
330a6(rnying rgyud): mnga' ba// dgra bcom rang rgyal ma lus gshegs su gsol// byang chub sems ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor// khams gsum sa drug gnas la mnga' mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa srung mdzad pa// srid gsum srung
330a7(rnying rgyud): ma'i tshogs kyar gshegs su gsol// zhes sbeng sbyin dang bar gsungs so// chos dbyings rnam dag bzang mo'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// nyon mongs ma gos nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// rtogs pa'i tong 'dzin chags pa'i srung bstan nas// tsha
330b1(rnying rgyud): na dra ma rten gshegs su gsol// byams pa chen po dpag tshad med pa chos// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad 'dul sna dadu // ma long lta du chos kyi ngan+ya rtogs nas// rdo rje brtsegs pa'i nga rgya rtan gshegs su gsol// dga'
330b2(rnying rgyud): rab don gyir 'khrul pa kun spangs shing // 'jigs med rin chen bang rim brtsegs pa la// sprul pa'i yon tan tshogs kyi phreng bas brgyan// rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs skyon bral pad+ma'i gdan steng na//
330b3(rnying rgyud): dablang po brtsegs pa'i bang rim bdud bzhi 'joms// bum pa chos dbyings smyos pa med pa'i dbyings// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las kyis sbyangs// rnam par
330b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma kun bcom nas// bsod nams dge tshul bsags pa'i mchod rten brtsegs// byang chu rdzogs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// shAH thub pa sngal pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// su mo 'ang nor sprul bas spang ba bya
330b5(rnying rgyud): yon tan tshogs kyi cha las srung brten pa// 'od 'byung sprul pa'i mchod te gshegs su gsol// byang chub tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i kye// 'dzam gling kun nas bsod nams srin mogs 'dra// bkra shis dge ba bsod na pas tshogs pas sa zhing /
330b6(rnying rgyud): si mthur thub pa'i bag chags bsal ba'i phyir// bkra shis brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su byasol// dge tshul bsad na mus mchod rten gshegs su gsol// yon tan tshogs kyi mchod rten gshegs su gsol// ton mangs yunasas
330b7(rnying rgyud): mur mi gshegs su gsol// zhes so so'i spyan drang bar gsungs so// de nas bzhugs su gsolar gsungs// 'ja' tshon spel legs bkod 'dra ba'i// dge bcu dag pa'i badz+ra'i gang na steng du// rim bzhin 'tshams par bzhugs
331a1(rnying rgyud): ya sa na/ ga sa / su ga ga smra/ smras sa sa
331a2(rnying rgyud): pa byung yang / nus du shAn gyi brgya pa na/ mo sa rgyas ldanarnams papa spya dus/ basbyi pa dgas sa jug sungs gang bamyigasas// da cig

331a5(rnying rgyud): sa
331a6(rnying rgyud): pa sa / byed pas gnas/ ga

331b1(rnying rgyud): shing // tshwa ba dang mi tho ba 'phags la mngon bsgoms te// rig pa gsum gyi mtshan ma'i dgra bcom pa// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la phyag 'tshal la// srid pa gsum gyi bdas pa'i gzugs 'don cang // lha klug dud sbyin bdag po shal
331b2(rnying rgyud): 'ches pa'i// rnam bzhi 'khor du gtogs la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs mngon dga'i sangs rgyas zhing khams na// rdo rje ri bo lhun po'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma stong gi gzi// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i 'khor la phyag
331b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// lho phyogs dpal ldan yid bzhin zhing khams na// rin chen ri bo lhun po'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma stong gi gzi// sangs rgyas rin chen 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs bde ldan dga' ba'i zhing khams na/
331b4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma ri bo ldan po'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma stong gi gzi// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na// las kyor po lhun po'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma stong gi
331b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas don grub 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// sdang 'das rgyal ba'i ring bsrel yum gyi dbyings// 'gro don ldan grub bsod nams dbyings kyi gtso// mtshan pa med las mtshan ma'i skur yang gsal// sangs rgyas rab bdun da ltar bstan pa'i skur/
331b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bdun te phyag rgya'i mtshan mar gsal// log par dang sel gser thub 'khor ba 'jigs// thams cad skyobs dang 'od srungs mar me mdzad// shAkya thub pa la sogs sangs rgyas sku// 'gro don lhun grub mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo//
331b7(rnying rgyud): nga po 'gro yis mchod rten 'dzin pa yang // nges par mkhyen pa'i khyad par ka Ni ka/ 'jig rten ye shes mun sel zla ltar gsal// 'di la'i rmad mchog dam pa chos kyi dbyings// de phyid bla na med pa'i mchod rten la// lus rab btud de rmi
332a1(rnying rgyud): thas bya ga rgyag 'tsham// da ga 'dus spya sa ga ma tshad pa 'jal// di dag drug sa na sa gas grags pa// rabadu pan bdags sus sa rgyag rnam/ pab sa bya pa sa
332a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas 'grub par shog/ de nas mchod pa 'phrul ba gsungs// ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku gsum ldan gyis zung // bzhi bcom drug ldan mi gnas mya ngan 'das// thugs rje rdul pas 'khor ba'i 'dam rnams pa'i// phyogs ba
332a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgya sngarnams la mchod pa 'dul// ye shes nyi mas ma rig mun sel ba'i// dri med bdud rjes 'khor ba'i nad rnams 'joms// don dam dmigs med bde ba gshegs pa'i gnas// 'phags pa'i lam gyur chos la mchod pa dbul/
332a4(rnying rgyud): byams dang snying rje dga' dang bting ljoms tshul// bde gshegs rjor byin pa rlo las kyi rtags// rin chen bzhi lus mngon du byung ba'i sku// rigs pazhi mchod rten rnams la mchod pa 'phrul// ho phyogs dzam seng rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dir/
332a5(rnying rgyud): shes dpag yas thugs rjes 'brel pa'i rtsa// rang byung rgyal pa'i mchod rten chen po dang // yid bzhin ldan gyis babra la mchod pa bral// nubaphyogs dngadi ldan pa d+mo'i dkyil 'byar na// thongs kyi pral phung bstan+da pa// dpe ma
332a6(rnying rgyud): bsam pas 'das pa'i mchod rten dang // rmad zags chos kyi dbyings la mchod pa' stsal// byang phyogs dpag yas yid bzhin kyil 'khor na// thams cad dag byeng dab bzhi chos kyi gdung // yon tan me len brtsigs pa'i mchod rten dang /
332a7(rnying rgyud): mas gsum pade rgyas thon la mchod pa sal// gang kyi lus 'phags pa shes dkyil khor na// byams pas 'khong pa 'dzin mang ming bsrel b+ha// byams lda pa sod rnams patshod rten da / legs gsung drung rdzogs pa mtshad
332b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyu// 'phang dang por dran pa nyid gzhags// s+yas ngan sems can ces danangs mya na// dang rangag mtshan ted mang rtogs pa'o// reg pa shes rab mthun la mdzad pa 'dul// bang ngam gnyis par yang dag rung ba ga// sdug rnams de /
332b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed dge ba'i chos spel zhing // dge ba'i chos bskyed chos don rdzogs mdzad pa// rtog pa'i bag chags bral la mchod pa 'bul// pang rim gsum par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// 'dun dang sems dang dpyod dang brtson 'grus rnams// spong ba'i 'dre byed ldan pa'i
332b3(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyis// thogs med 'gro don mdzad la mchod pa 'bul// pang rim bzhi par snang ba dbang po lnga// dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin dbang po dang // shes rab dbang pos chos la dbang bsgyur nas// 'dod dgu dge rtsa spyod la mchod pa 'bul// 'gyur
332b4(rnying rgyud): med bum rten 'degs pa'i stobs lnga ste// dad dang brtson 'grus dran dang ting 'dzin stobs// shes rab stobs kyis nyon mongs zil gyis gnon// mthu dbang mngon du gyur la mchod pa 'bul// bum par mngon 'phags byang chub yan lag bdun// dran
332b5(rnying rgyud): dang tshor byed brtson 'bras dga' ba dang // shin tu sbyangs dang ting 'dzin btang snyoms kyis// 'grub 'gyur thogs pa med la mchod pa 'bul// kha khyer 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad// lha dang rtogs dang ngag dang las kyi mtha'// 'tsho dang rtsol
332b6(rnying rgyud): dang dran dang ting 'dzin gyis// 'phags lam gnas rab 'dug la mchod pa 'bul// srog shing mkhyen pa bcu yi bdag nyid de// thabs das shes rab rig pa'i rtsal mchog gis// dam chos bdud rtsi 'dzin la srog tu gyur// shes rab don kun rag
332b7(rnying rgyud): la mchod pa 'gul// 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu nyer gzhag gsal// shes rab spyan ldan thams cad mngon gzigs pa'i// shes bya'i bag chags skyong la thogs pa med// ye shes phun sum tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// char khabs
333a1(rnying rgyud): ca thams ca thugs sde sa dus byed de// 'dul ba'i dus dang sanas ca na mthun nus// 'jig tanarnams la pan dgas pa btsun pa'i/ khyim rnams bzhugs pas tshad pa tucham// dad bson thug
333a2(rnying rgyud): kyis las ngag sems brgyad de// brtson 'grus drag pos rin chen sna lnga dang // 'byung ba lngalas grub pa'i mchad nan sogs// sgra gdung ring bsgyel rnams la mchod pa 'dul// srug sung thugs las sprul pa'i tshul ba'is sa//
333a3(rnying rgyud): thugs sdes phyi mtha' gzhin don mdzad// kyi 'gag med pa'i don gyi gyi blangs la// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa 'phrul// nam gro la phreng lam mchog tu rab brtson pa// zung bzhi la bcang rig pa'i skyes bu'i tshogs/
333a4(rnying rgyud): 'brel ba rig pa'i sangs rgyas pas// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun nam skal mchod pa 'dul// dge ba 'chu ba byed pal ldan sangs rgyas zhing // rmongs pa'i skal kyis ngan song mthar ldangs te// rdu 'phrul shugs kyis 'drib don mdzad pa/ 'dzin
333a5(rnying rgyud): rten srung ma'i tshigs lam chod bu 'jal// rings rjes nas bu srin rgyal margyan dang // gdugs dang bdan dang gyi yod pa na dang // da N+Di ng+gA gi sa snyan hU~M biras// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldani dmigs pa dag pas macad// ti 'dzin drugs
333a6(rnying rgyud): da byeshi kya'i mthagyur ba'o// yan chab bdug sbom no rtog mang bye dang // bgom gang drirgyam mtshogs gyur ba dang// mtshad lan rnam rje'i phyogs kyi mdzad pa 'bral// dngos su 'byor dang byed kyis rnam sprul pa'i// 'jig rten 'ad de
333a7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gru po rdzas// kun ba zang rnam dag mtshan mo'i spyid rlung gis// nas mkha' grang bar dmigs te mchod pa 'phrul/ jig rten kha sa gnas nas drang ba dang // tsha na med pa'i thugs ngas bas //
333b1(rnying rgyud): sa mtshanam ston grang sunas// byams pa'i zugs rgyas mad pa / gas pa// rgyal ba 'ad bcwa snang bas ts+tsha pasanam // kun sa drug latshams rgyad ba sa // na pa pags pas / sangs da
333b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro drug tshogs rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shig/ de nas a d+ha'i gsol mchod bshad// mchod rten sku yi cha lugs ni// 'og gi rmang bting ye shes bzhi// gyen du khri 'phang rnam thar gsum// chags med pad+ma'i gdan skang ni//
333b3(rnying rgyud): pa bzang po chos kyi rje// gser gyi pre phul 'od zer 'gro// srog shing drang srong bla na med// 'khor lo bzhi dang ye shes brgyad// 'bar ba me dpung rdo rjes bskor// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// phra med mchad pa'i gdan bsha
333b4(rnying rgyud): shing // chu bo gad+hA'i rgyun bzhin du// a d+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// mchod rten gsung gi cha lugs ni// man ngag tshig gi snying po brjod// bzlas brjod
333b5(rnying rgyud): gsung rab pacu gnyis brjod// don dam sgra skad kun la mkhas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas// gsung gi mchod rten thams cad la// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// ma med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams rdzas//
333b6(rnying rgyud): gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// et+ma'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// mchod rten thugs kyi chu lugs ni// dpe med bas ma 'das nam mkha' che// ting 'dzin nyid las ci
333b7(rnying rgyud): nga gsal// ye shes nyid yini ci yang rtogs// shes rab nyid dpal mabye ngapags la// thams cad mkhyen pas spyan gyis thub// ngan ma sems rtog yid las 'das// bkra shes dpa' tshogs gzhal yas 'dir // med
334a1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa'i rgyun bshams nas// chu ba ga t+yAng rgyun bzhin du// ar+d+ha'i rgyun yang me 'chad de// bas shes mtshad pa'ang 'phrul na// thugs rjes dgongs la bzhis sngags su// rtswa med mchod rte ma run/
334a2(rnying rgyud): rin cen ba pa'i glid rjen// ti ye shes pa'i// bab shes dpa' tshigs gan pa su / rje ba mchod pa'i can pa zhams zhing // chu bo gang+gA rdzun pa sbyin du/ mad+hA'i thun phreng mi 'an // byabya shis mdzod pa 'di
334a3(rnying rgyud): sa dgongs shes spa gsal// ming kyi da rkyen ma chags ng+ge// dmam padi gyi tsho pa // ca chubapa pas kyi macad sa/ rlung shi srod la sto ni gis la// yid kyi cho thams ca la/
334a4(rnying rgyud): bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas na// tha med mchod pa'i rkyen pa shams shing // chu bo gad+hA rgyan bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// 8
334a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin mchod rten cha lugs ni// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmang po che// mtshan ma'i lhag bsngal rab bsil nas// sems can kun la byams thugs ldan// bab shis dang la tshogs gzhal yas 'drir// tha med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/
334a6(rnying rgyud): byo ba d+ha'i rgyun bzhin du// an+ta dz+nyAn yang ming chad de// papA shi sa mchod pa 'di bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes du gsol// spel pa'i mchod rten nyi 'dzin tu// byams shing sems pas kun gyi mgror// thugs chen
334a7(rnying rgyud): skyong ba mdo// rjeb byang rgyal po'i miganangs pa// sprul pa'i bachod rten rnams ca // badri shes dab 'tshogs gdapa pas 'dir/ nga mchod pa'i na shengs shing // slong ba phyin bzhin/ na par mi zu /
334b1(rnying rgyud): gos da pa yad// thugs / ga nas panas snyam pa// gsus na ba sbyin gas \u0f7f// rgyu pa ga pa // bad pas da/ smras// bad na gas sarnams cadaH//
334b2(rnying rgyud): mthu stobs 'phrog mdzad pa'i// gnod sbyin srin po'i n+ya srang gcod// gzugs chen mchod rten thams cad la// bkra shes dpal tshogs gzhal las 'dir// da med mchod pa'i rgyun pa shams shing // gru bo gang+gA kun bzhin du/
334b3(rnying rgyud): Ad+hi'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bum na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// de nas mchod rten bstod pa gsungs// tha med mchod rten bstod pa ni// tshogs chen rdzogs pa chos kyi sku// tha med byang chub zugs
334b4(rnying rgyud): dza gnas// khams gsum 'as rnams don gyi b+hi// ye shes gzugs sprul mdzod rtem di// gzhi mang dge bcu patha dag pas 'dum// dzan pa rjer gzhag rlung gi 'i me brten// sdig pa spangs pade bang rim gnyis pa las// @
334b5(rnying rgyud): rkang babang rim gsum pa ste// rnam grol dbang po bang rim bzhi pa bcang // thugs rje'i tshad med chos kyi char khebs lding // bden pa ji'i bstan pa 'jig rten kyang bzhis btsugs// sobyas pa'i bras pa'i dbyings sug kun du zlum// byang chub
334b6(rnying rgyud): yan lag bad+ma shin tu mdzes// ting 'dzin bskabs pas gang tshe ba legs pa// 'phags la mthe lags gru bzhi rim pas sdug/ shes bcu srog shing gzhung tshugs med par dang // stobs bcu'i 'phang lo gshig pas sgrib pa spangs//
334b7(rnying rgyud): med rnyes pa'i gdugs mchog ma la sa 'phags// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chubacod pan ldem// mang rjes te gzhag gzugs kyis rnam pa ma// dbang pa rab yan lag gsung snyan dril bu 'khros// chos 'khar bsko ba ri gas byang
335a1(rnying rgyud): 'phur// mi 'jigs pag sbyong rdo rings seng ge brjid// thabs ldan sprul bas rtse bo 'dul bar mdun// rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul du l+h+wa ma me ba// byang chub sbyang ba'i rten la phrag 'tshal bstod// yid kyi mchod
335a2(rnying rgyud): rten bstod pa ni// 'khor ldog med pa'i gnas dang spyod yul ni// nam mkha' sa gzhi la mi gzhi blangs te// ye shes bzhi yi khri phang bzhini brtsigs// mtshan med bum ten la ni gzhi blangs te// chos dbyings mkha' las 'phags pa'i
335a3(rnying rgyud): bum pa bgyis// dpag tu med pa'i srog shing legs btsugs nas// pha rol phyin bcu'i 'khor lo legs btags nas// mtha' gnyis bum pa'i gdugs ni yas 'brubs la// mnyam nyid dar dbyangs kyis ni rab brgyan te// mtha'
335a4(rnying rgyud): dang dbus med mi dmigs mi rtog pa// ma bcos lhun grub gnas pa'i chos kyi sku// smon bral yang dag nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang bzhin mchod rten la bstod pa ni/ yid bzhin lhun grub bkra shis gzhal yas khang // chags med ye
335a5(rnying rgyud): nas dag pa chos kyi dbyings// sring gsum mi 'khor mchod rnanA ka ni ka/ gzhi yi rlung brjing la mtshan rdo byug/ gyen du khri 'phang khyad par dkon mchog gsu ra// ta 'dab dmar sdug 'khyil cing ldem pa la// shel gyi zam pa'i med rnamapa
335a6(rnying rgyud): dag/ gser gyi bre phul yangs pas chos kyi dbyings// srog shing ma skyes sems kyi ngo bo nyid// ma 'khor ma byung chos kyi dbyings dang 'dra// rma bya chen mo yid 'ong gzugs sgra spogs// stong zhing gsal ba'i me long 'od po che// su gsum
335a7(rnying rgyud): dbyed med byams snyoms kun gyi mgon// mi g.yo mnyam nyid chos mchog dpe las 'phags// sku gsung thugs kyi chos tshul rab kyi dbyings// rin chen sangs rgyas sku mchog mngon bstan nas// thugs rjes sprul pas 'od zer spyi gtsug rdzogs
335b1(rnying rgyud): da dung ma thug bcwa pa'i nga du// nas smrarnam sagags dun pa'// su gapasan pa dgas pas// 'gas bas ya ngas sa/ ga na nasasus sa/
335b2(rnying rgyud): bas mag dun phyogs ni rangs pas med pa'i labad rnams 'jams// srogadas nga 'i meng sri dang su las yang dgang thugs// medang brtag pa rje sa gang shid// dbyu shings bcan ga shed // dgra zhing rnaMn
335b3(rnying rgyud): dul ming go// gnyen te b+ha rgyal chen po rdul mi gyi// ga na sa man mi dag/ mi shes batshad na chos bying pa nam byas// ni tid sa tshal brjod// rdul pa'i mtsho rkyen grub dag/ pa shes
335b4(rnying rgyud): mdun ma ni bsgri ba pa'i yang gas rje pa ldan / byed pa pas pa sladas tsal dzi 'ab ba kyi kyi da rje'angasnyam/ dpa pa gis nas ga

336a1(rnying rgyud): DUr phyen lnga bung yon tan rdzogs par dang // srog shing dpag pas ma ye shes sngon lamatshan po yin// shin tu brten par gnas pa blang byu chos kyi sa// 'khor la ma par brtsegs legs shes bcu'i ris
336a2(rnying rgyud): gsum ste// ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyang de 'dra tshul du sbyar// rnamathar brgyad cis zung bas ma rin chen mgur chu bzang // phan 'dogs sgron ma mchis pas nyon mongs med pa'i tshul// nam gro la shes rab ye shes 'od ldan gzugs na
336a3(rnying rgyud): zel gnon pa// bla med yon tan d+ha nA gcig chos sku bzang lnga dros// sbreng gi rin rkyen gdags mdzes rnam kun mkhyen pa'i mchog/ bsnyel ba med pa'i rgyus bzung thugs rje khyud par byung // de phyir yang dag rim bzhin dam chos rba ldog pa// mi shes
336a4(rnying rgyud): gnyed las sad mdzad yan lag bcu gnyis ldan// nor bu'i phreng ba spel legs pha rol phyin bcu ste// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dpal dang bkra shis kun mnga'i zhing // sa steng gdugs kyis skyabs ltar tshad med ba'i sa khyab pa// rgyal ba mi rnams
336a5(rnying rgyud): la yang dgongs pa mnyam par 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu'i dod 'bur mngon par mkhyen pa drug/ 'khor ba'i mngang la rtag gsal kun tu snang mdzad pa// mi 'gyur kha lo sgrad mchog tshogs chen yongs rdzogs phyir// dam chos rgyal por mngang
336a6(rnying rgyud): gsol gser gyi cod pan 'phur// byang chub sems kyi glu tshes dkar po'i chos rgyu dang // ye shes chen po'i me ldong dus gsum sgrib med dang// hUM 'brus bzang por 'brel zhes brtan pi yongs kyi dbus gnas pa// 'gro ba'i ston rnams sel la phyag 'tshal
336a7(rnying rgyud): bstod// rgyal chen phyogs bzhir bkod pa snyems pa mi mnga'i tshul// bsrung med do pas bad+ma'i rtsal yang sa 'dzir ba seng gyi ste// rgyal bas bad+mo kyi tshogs brtul mkhyen ldan pa'i// ye shes lhun gyis grub la phyag 'tshal bskyod// theg gsu ma dzang
336b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgras btsugs rnam thar blo ldan pa// so so'i dbang po rim bzhin bskal nas kyang // byang chub chen po'i gdung rgyud 'phel mdzad pa// spyan mnga' rnam par sbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang bzhin bzod mthar rnam dag de bzhin nyid// spros
336b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dri mas ma gos dkar ba'i tshul gcig kyang // rin chen rnam par spras pa'i mtshan mchog rdzogs pa'i sku// 'gro don lhag par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// bde gshegs sku gdung dbyibs bcas chos sku rnam par dag/ gang gis mthong
336b3(rnying rgyud): thos dran gus mchod cing reg pas kyang // mtho ris des dpal zar mchog bde thob pas// yon tan rmad byung tshogs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bsam gyis mi khyab gnas te brjod par mi nus bzhi ni// dad pas rol gyi cha shas
336b4(rnying rgyud): gus par bstod pa la// don med sku rmongs 'phang smad nongs par gyur to 'tshal// bde gshegs mngon sum spyan la nongs skur shin tu bshad// yon tan rgya mtsho mda' las gal te thigs tsam zhig/ don dang tshig gi sgo nas tshul 'dra/
336b5(rnying rgyud): brjod zhe na// dge ba bzang po de ni bdag gi gter chen de// skye dgu mgron du gnyer phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo// zhes ni gyi rabs 'gyud rnams lung bstan to// de 'dra'i tshul du shes rab kyis gus par bstod do// gzugs chen mchod rten la

337a3(rnying rgyud): gdugs kyi phreng ba bkra// gdugs phreng gsum po ma 'dres dran panye bar gzhag pa la// snying rje chen pos 'phags pa'i chos kyi char khebs snying // zla med go 'phang brnyes pa'i gdugs kyi gnas 'byung mtho// 'jig rte rdzun sel dag pa'i ye shes

337a5(rnying rgyud): bsung ba med gzhi chos kyi them skas mdzes// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bdan dkar po hUM// bdud bzhi rgyal mtshan sbrel ba'i rtags su chu srin rgyal mtshan grags// mi 'jigs bzhi yi rdo 'das seng ges brjod// 'di 'dra'i dam chos ngo mtshad pa

341b1(rnying rgyud): hA// dag rtags \u0f7fyang snang ba phyin// prA gsum 'grub pa'i rgyayin pas// ma dzangs chas la bsgom bsrub rnams// brtson pas byas nas 'bad pas 'bub// rang sras mchod rten rtsen par shad // nya ban drug na
341b2(rnying rgyud): legs pa la// yan lag bzhi po bang rim nyid// mgo ni rnam par gnas pa yin// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po rnam shes mchod rten lha// lus kyi tshul du sangs rgyas pa'o// rdzogs pa a ru yo ga /
341b3(rnying rgyud): srog shing gsum gyi mchod rten la// me rlung gnyis kyi rmang gzhi bting // 'khor lo bzhi yi bang rim la// dbu yi gtsug tor bum par shar// khams kyi bdud rtse lha yi bu// dri chen rnam snang byang chub sems/
341b4(rnying rgyud): da na na / badz+ra g-i rnang mar phrusasasus te/ ltung ba'i ga/ sngags kyi gas// sa 'ab / gang nga chub mug /
341b5(rnying rgyud): lus gnas 'dir gnas// 'gro ba ma lus gnas 'dir 'dus// oM AHhUM/ 'jug dang ldan dang gnas pa yis// sku gsum mi zad rgyan 'khor 'grub// oM AHhUM swA hA/ lnga yi bdag nyid bcwa ming can//
341b6(rnying rgyud): 'di ni rnam shes gzhol ba'i lha// rigs lnga 'khor bcas sangs rgyas pa'o// a nr-i su tri pre du/ 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa rnams// yi ge drug gis rab tu sbyangs// oM gzugs khams bsam gtan gnas pa kun// sngags
341b7(rnying rgyud): mchod rten nyid du nges// gzugs med sangs rgyas a ru sangs rgyas pa// khams gsum ya nas mchod rten sbyangs// zhes gsungs so// sku gdung dbar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ rang lus mchod rten du bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
342a1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis man drug rdzogs pa'i mchod rten 'dri gsungs sa// kun ga zhi rnam shes mchod can la// nan rdzongs med kyi gang dam bzlas// yi kyi rnam zhes rnam pa la// \u0f88\u0f90 wA rnam shes lam rdza
342a2(rnying rgyud): gsapa// kun gzhirna ma dag chos kyi sra// rang b+hA ye shes rdzogs pa'i yid// nyon mongs rnam lnga ye shes 'khor// sgo waM srung ba dal par bshad// 'kho pa nyid ni myang nu 'das// snang srid gzhi bzheng sa chos kyi zla// byas pa med pa drang gis krol/
342a3(rnying rgyud): d+hang shes mchod rten du// 'khor 'angs ma lus rdzogs par gnas// maHpa yun gyis grub pa'o// skye gdung 'ab ba rkyen gyi rgyud las/ man ga rdzogs pa'i mchod byin gyi le'u sa bdun pa'i// / de nas gseng ba'i bdag po la dge slong ma ma
342a4(rnying rgyud): med pa thugs pas zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i sems can sal ba man pa rnams kyi don rje/ mchod rten gyi smon lam rgya chen po yon gyi bdag po rnams kyis go bar ga srung du gsol/ zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tsang dus kyi blo dman
342a5(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis go bar bya ba 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang / bajom ldan 'das mi 'jugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan dang / bcom ldan
342a6(rnying rgyud): 'das spang ba mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan dngas don par thub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das shAs rdung ba la sogs/ sngon pa chos kyi thal pa chen po dru gdu mi dang ye shes pazhi mang ba/ stobs dang ma 'dres pas bcan pa thams cad la/ ming 'di zhes 'bye ba lus ngagapa
342a7(rnying rgyud): dngangs bus par rdzog 'tshal pa// don dam par chos gsung rab mang sdubargya nyis dang / rjo gsum gyis bsdus brgya dang bras bug cis pon sa cad la bu tsham mo// byang chub sems dpa'i dge pa na 'angags pa rnams pa dang / 'a
342b1(rnying rgyud): dpal dang / stan ngas gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / thug na dang / sa dang po dang / rnam pa 'a myong pa dang / sgrib panam bung bral bdang / kun tu bzang pa la sags te sa brgyangs par bzhugs pa thams cad pa phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa nyam ngas rgya da/
342b2(rnying rgyud): 'duna'aphags pa shA d+tha'i bu dang / 'phags pa mo gal gyi zla dang / 'phags pa dab 'byo dang 'od sras la sogs te/ skyes pa zung zhi dang / gang nag la brgyad kyis bsdus pa rnams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// mdzad tan dang sra gdung da
342b3(rnying rgyud): bsrel la sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i skad du/ sems can rnams kyis bsod nams thob par gyi skyong 'i swa \u0f7f/ thugs rje chen pas khyab zlar byin gyis brlabs te/ bzhugs pa thams cad la yang byas par phyag tshal pa/

342b6(rnying rgyud): gang pa bzhi dang / bang rim gzhi pa dbang po lnga dang / zlum nyen gyis stobs lnga dang / bum pa byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / kha dzod kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'bras bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo bcu gsum gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcwa mi brjes
342b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dzin pa'i bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / char khebs kyis thugs rdo bstan pa dang srog shing gi shes pa brlabs te// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'i gzugs can de lta bub kyi ba'i rgya/ da ltar gyis dang rim po 'di dag gsod dang 'angul dang sheb mo so gas pa/ rje
343a1(rnying rgyud): che sna tshogs su dmigs te de dag las grub pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la gyur dpag tshad phyed tsam gyi nang na/ sku'i gzugs brtan tshatsha btab pa rnams/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sha sA

343a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gyur cig/ de ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang bdag cag la sogs pas/ lus rdul snyed du gyur pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid rab tu dang ba dbus pa'i phyogs 'tshalalo// dpal kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sbyin
343a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa thams cad kyis mchod do// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang phrin las kyi yon tan khyad par can mnga' ba rnams la/ sems dang bas dmigs te chags pa med pa'i dbyangs snyan pas bstod do// 'phags pa thams cad ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
343a5(rnying rgyud): dang / bdag cag la sogs pa la de gongs sugs mi/ ming 'di zhes bkyi 'a dang bdag drug la sogs papa/ chos kyi srung du gzugs kyi su mthong shing thob par bgyi ba la/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ni mchis mo 'tshal 'grol zhing bshags so//

343a7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khong po gor nas sems can gyi don maldan po// 'dul ba'i ched du thabs kyis myang ngan pas dzangs pa tsun par bzhed pa di dag rnams cad mya ngan las mi nga ba gas papa rji ngo // nges 'phags pa rnams kyis sems ca kying byang rgya du /

343b3(rnying rgyud): pas// mos pas bzang por ba leng par bya// dngos gzhi 'di ltar bya ba ste// rnying pa gshegs la gsar pa bzhengs// gshegs pa'i cho ga rab gnas gso// mchod cing mang lnga gsol gshegs par zhu// thig sgrib nyam ma bshags gshes su gso/

347b1(rnying rgyud): 'ogs rnal sa byung ba // / byung ba walas b+ha gnas pa'o// nga mas na dpag me byung // brugasum 'bar ba'odang // rlud drug sems can mos par// yid dadabya dam la rgyags// dang dudu gas nga sa du rgya/
347b2(rnying rgyud): ni// yang dgra ba nings bshad do// lnga 'dus ni mamyong b.las// nyan mongs la dang yang drug dang // bshes sa bdag da// chos byi gas pa mdangs 'a kyim las// 'ad cing tshul du rdzogs pa// dgag med pa gang /
347b3(rnying rgyud): chos nyi gnyi dang sa yin pas ngom shes// der 'dzin drim ma rig pas// 'dzin byed shes bzeng pa gcig// bdag dang gzhan du bzung ba// bdag dang nyon mongs lnga dang yid drug dang // brjod sa nas shes pa byed pa gcig/ blomo sbyong brgyad pa la/
347b4(rnying rgyud): 'de ba gnyis snyoms 'dres pa'i dus// ye shes dang rgyal marig pa// gnyis 'dzin sems de mang la du 'brums// pha ma gnyis kyi theg le dang // rgya rkyen 'di dag rab tu 'dres// mtshal de zho la tshul ltang ro// 'byung ba bzhi yi lus su dang // zhas
347b5(rnying rgyud): dudu byu brgyad dag// med mer ma rtang go dgar dang // 'ang shAr mthang phyug ma 'ag dang // dum tha lasas pa sta da// rim pa du sam rnas so// gagan du cin dang grol// byung bcwams dbu bstar te//
347b6(rnying rgyud): thig meni// yungs 'brub yin tsam grags// 'byung bzhi drang sams 'dus pa yis// lus po chags pa'i nyin sems yin// zhag ni bdun phrag gnyis pa la// 'byung ba ste yis rab brten te// yung 'bru ba cu yin mi chags// da
347b7(rnying rgyud): du thugag pa pa la// yul mams sbyin// dung rgyad che mdu chags// ga zag pashes sa/ rgya gis / ga sa nga bar 'jub na/ na pag ga bas/
348a1(rnying rgyud): phrag lnga pa la// 'byung ba chu yis rab bsdus te// yungs 'bru gcig gi tshad du chags// zhag ni bdun phrag drug pa la// me chung gnyis kyis rab sbyin te// yungs 'bru gnyis kyi cha tsam chags// zhag ni
348a2(rnying rgyud): bdun phrag bdun pa la// 'byung bzhi 'dus nas med mer po// yungs 'bru gsum gyi cha tsam chags// mig gnyis rab tu 'phra bar 'gyur// zhag ni bdun phrag brgyad pa la// 'byung bzhi rab tu 'thugs pa yi// chus pa shigs sas mnan mes sa su
348a3(rnying rgyud): bsregs// rlung gis gtor zhing med par byas// de nas chu yis rab bsdus te// nur nur sran ma bcu cha chags// shar gyi rtsa ni ri bong rdul// stong du btang ba'i cha tsam chags// zhag ni bdun phrag dgu pa la// 'byung ba sa yis sra bar byas//
348a4(rnying rgyud): sran ma dgu yi cha tsam dang // lho yi tsa ni gong ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu pa la// me yis rjod bskyed brtan par byas// sran ma bdun cha tsam pa dang // nub kyi rtsa yang gong ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu gcig la// 'byung ba
348a5(rnying rgyud): gis rab gtor nas// sran ma lnga cha tsam gcig chags// byang gi rtsa yang gong ltar bskyed// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu gnyis la// lus ni sran mjog po tsam// nur nur po dang sa zag ltar// khyad par mig gnyis gsal bar chags// zhag ni
348a6(rnying rgyud): bdun phrag bcu gsum la// / 'byung bzhi 'khrugs te slar bshig go// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu bzhi la// rab tu 'dus te mthe bod tsam// rtsa lang shin tu rags pa bskyed// zhag ni bdun phrag bco lnga la// rlung gis phye zhing chu yis bkrus// sa yi
348a7(rnying rgyud): bzung zhing me yis smin// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la// rtsa dad ba drug cu rtsa bzhi chags// rlung sems 'dus pa'i spyan gnyis chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu drug la// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ste// rtsa 'dab sum bcu rtsa gnyis chags//
348b1(rnying rgyud): zhag ni bdun phrag bcu bdun la// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lor chags// rtsa ngadab bcu drug sun gnyis chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcod rgyad la// rtsi bo bde chen 'khor lor ni// rtsa 'dab sum brgya dag cu dang // rlung sems 'dus pa rje
348b2(rnying rgyud): sman gnyis chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu dgu la// rlung gis bskyed nas so sor che// chu yis bsdus shing sa yis bzung // me yis smin cing mkhrang bar byas// dbus suH gsum ka ba dang // 'khor lo bzhi dril te chags// zhag ni
348b3(rnying rgyud): 'dun phrag nyi shu la// 'byung bzhi'i las kyis mkhrang gyur zhig/ khyab 'jug ny+dza ltar gyur pa'o// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gcig la// sas bzung mes smin dbang po dong // zhag ni bdun zaganyer gnyis la// chus bskyed pas su lus grub ste/
348b4(rnying rgyud): sbal lta bur khyud gang gyur// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gsum la// me yis sprin cing yan lag ste// zhag ni bdun tshan nyer bzhi la// rlung gis bskyed nas dbu mar chud// de dus lus kyi 'byung ba nyams// ye shes dag kyang bskyed pa'o// zhwa
348b5(rnying rgyud): bdun phrag nyer lnga la// chu yis smin cing sa yis zin// sha dang khrag gyad grub pa'o// lus ni skal pa lta bu ste// mtho gang tshad du bskyed pa'o// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer drug la// me yis mig dang shes pa gas pa// rlung gis yan lag don
348b6(rnying rgyud): sgyid thams cad dang // rnam shes phung po khams dang skye mched gsal// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer bdun la// zas kyi dngas ma btsud zil bas// pags pa bas+t+ra sgra rnams bskyed// nyon mongs rlung gis 'phrig 'phrul byed// phal cher za gsu
348b7(rnying rgyud): ti gcig na// 'phrig 'gul byed par bshad pa'o// sa dang chu dang me dang gsum// rlung gis kye shing lus smin no// de nas bdun tshan dgu la ni// rlung gis phul nas bying 'gyon te// gzug nas zon te sbal bar rtse// thog mar rig cal
349a1(rnying rgyud): shes wa// ma rig 'khrul pas byung ba ste// 'byung ba lnga las byung ba'o// des na lus 'di sbrul mu dngos// ye shes chen po'i 'byung gnas nyid// lus can kun la bzung ngan med// bde gshegs
349a2(rnying rgyud): kun la// til la mar gyis khyab bzhin gnas// ma rig gro' tsho 'byung ba'i lus// lhag med ye shes dang du zlog/ lus 'di sgyu gsum nyid yin no// rtsa khams thams cad lha yi sku// lte bdag nas rim bzhin nyid// gzung

350a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ sems zhes ming du btags pa'o// sems can kun rig drir med// phung ba 'byung nga yab yum la// na khams rgya mched sems dpa'i chags// srid pa gsum dang lus sems so// sems ni dran sems
350a2(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i rtsal// snang shes dag tu gyur tshad kun// rig pa nyid las logs na med// khyad par rig pa'i ye shes nyid// lus can kun la khyab pa ste// khyad par 'di ltar nyid du gnas// snying dang rtsa dang dung khang dang // mig dang bzhi yi gzha
350a3(rnying rgyud): sbe du// ye shes chen po den gnas// sems can kun gyi lus kyi nang // tsi t+ta dung khang rtsa nang b+h+yo// de ni rig pa'i gnas yin no// sems kyang rig pa'i rang rtsal yin// ngo bo sems ni yul po rjes med yin// rang bzhin sems ni gsal
350a4(rnying rgyud): rig stong pa yin// thugs rje'i sems ni phra rags thog pa med// sems ni rtog byed gsal la ngo bo stong // rig pa nyid dang gnyis su med// rin chen lus kyi nang dag na// yongs la khyab pa'i sems gcig po// ngo bo stong gsal su ru gnang/
350a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin stong gsal thig le'i 'od// thugs rje snang stong sgron ma 'bar// dang rig ngo bo skur gnas te// gsal la rang bzhin ma grub pas// snying nang zhi ba yab yum tshul// dung khang khro bo'i tshul du gnas// lus la gnas pa'i rig pa yang //

350a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// rig pa ye shes thig le'i rtsa// stong gas la rang mdangs nyid du gnas// rig pa su yi rang mdangs nyid// rtsa yi nang du nyi zer bzhin// dbang po'i sgol nges thon te// thig le'i sngon ma nam mkha'i dbyings su gsal// rig pa
350b1(rnying rgyud): su ni thum su bzhin// ye shes bum pa'i mad me 'dra// thig le me long ngos ltar gsal// rdza le gtso bo gsum la ni// yan lag grangs las 'das pa gyis// so sa'i dbang ba m+WAr ston kyad// de ya chos bu rtson par byed/
350b2(rnying rgyud): pado snying nas 'brel pa yi// dar sdud pa mnar 'dra'i kha// dbang po mig la zug pa ste// de ni chos nyid gsal ba'i lam// yid dpyod tshig phyir ma lus pa// mngon sum 'char ba'i sgo ni mig/ gzhan la de ltar ma yin no// de yang phyi nang gas

350b4(rnying rgyud): yul snang dang mdangs nyid du gsal// de nyid shes rab smon ma yin// nyams kyi snang ba gong 'phel lo// yul du gron ma dag pa ni// lam snang rig pa lu gu chud// lam skang ldan grub rig mdangs lnga// lam snang thugs rjes dbang po gsal

350b7(rnying rgyud): ma'i kang ga ye shes lnga// de la dbyer med spu lnga ste// de gsal 'od lnga de mra'i rdza// ye shes mkha' bo shes dang lnga// kun kyang ye shes rtsal yin no// de ltar sus dang sems la gnas// nga rig dri ma med pa 'di// ma long
351a1(rnying rgyud): nang thal yin// rang ga sde bsnam pa lda di// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dade// rang rigags pa stong ngagag med dade// sa sar rtogs pa'i pa shes pan// dang sa num bya la bral bad// bya ba
351a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes yin// rang rig grub pa med pa 'di// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes yin// lam lnga dag kyang rang la tshang // rang rig dri med gsal ba 'dri// me long ye shes lam nyid do// stong ba gyogs rgyu bral ba 'di// mnyam nga
351a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes lam du 'dod// rang rig gsal stong so sor shar// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes lam// dang rig shar grol snang tshul 'di// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes lam// ye nas rang rig bsgom bral 'di// chos dbyings ye shes lam yin no//

360a5(rnying rgyud): yon tan thams cad 'brang // sems can gang dag che 'phos pa// de dag rnams la rig pa bajug// rig pa gang lagatad pa rnams// rjod kyi mtshams med lnga spang kyang // las la bzang na med pa rtse// dang dang mnyam por sangs byu //
360a6(rnying rgyud): mngon par shes pa thogs med cing // ri rabu rnams la zang thal chu// 'byung bzhi'i gnod pas tshugs mi 'gyur// de ni thob pa gsum gyi gzeng ga/ ma yin// sa ma ya/ gter rtsa/ sras \u0f7f/ zab rdza/ tha ma nam bya maH// de ltar sha ma pu da
360a7(rnying rgyud): pa yis// rtags dang cid dang gde bani nyid// ji ska rtags tshad pas ma 'das kyang // me 'byung gdong chen bani du 'dus matog le zhes tshang brdung ba// yang mar gdeng che bzhi rung 'drub// dang po par /
360b1(rnying rgyud): gyi gdeng gnyis ni// dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan bsam mi khyab// dpag med thob kyang dga' brod mi skyed do// yar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la// de ba med de dang rig gdeng // mad gyi 'gro ba rigs drug gi// sdug bsngal mthong yang 'jigs
360b2(rnying rgyud): ba med// rig pa 'phrul ba med pa'i gdeng // mar gyi ngan song gsum po la// lhung gi dogs pa med pa ste// mkhan po ma grub dang byung ste// rgyaH// gdeng chen ba ni yi mthar drug ni// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
360b3(rnying rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// phung po lhag ma med par rgyas// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// 'od dang sku dang swa dang gdung // sa g.yos la sogs 'chi rtags 'jug// mngon par rton te sa

365b4(rnying rgyud): stong par snang la phyogs ris med// gsal bar snang la dngos po med// lnga ru ye shes srung la kha dog med// zlum por snang la gzugs su med// ma 'gags pa la sgron ma tshang med// mu lngar snang la gzugs med pa// stong par snang la bem po med/
