372b4(rnying rgyud): da do// sangs rgyas rnam sa la mtshan dade bad// rang gi mtshan nyid yod par// 'dzin pa gang pas rang gi ma nyid stong // chos rnams mi dmigasu pa du ni// ma ts+tsha ma 'dzin pa stong bas na// mi dmi gus pa yi stong pa nyid do// dngos par dpa
372b5(rnying rgyud): na pa rnams// mtha' de stong pas dngos po med// ngo bo nyid kyis spang pa'o// de dag thams cad gcig tu dril// nang gi dngas ma'i dngas ma yin// yang gcig bcud du dril ba yis// de la thig pa nyag gcig zer/ 'or du du gsum
372b6(rnying rgyud): yin// thig ni chos suka dag go// le ni longs su rang snang ngo // nywag ni sbrul gru kun khyab po// gcig ni sku gsum 'du 'bral med/ sems can kun gyi rgyud la gnas// zhes don dam pa'i mu gsum gcig tu tshol ba gnas pa'i le'u ste 'jugasum
372b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / me+e shra tA sh+tsa/ yang gcig srin du bzang mo la// 'khor tshogs 'dus pas yang zhus pa// kyai kye bde stong kun bzang yum// ma thub thog ma'i gong dag tu// kun byab ye shes gnas pa la// 'dul med 'khrel dang
373a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i tshul// spyi rngom rim pa gsung na yang // sems can kun gyis migo bsdu// kye zag rgyas par gsung du gsol// zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// kyai te 'dus pa'i 'khor chags nyon/
373a2(rnying rgyud): thog ma'i ka dag gsal stong khyab// 'khrul pa ka nas dag pa la// ye shes nyid lam ma rig 'khrul// ye shes gsal ba'i yul lnga las// gnyis 'dzin sems can byung ba'o// bdag rtog der tog der 'dzin gyis// ye shes lnga la yul lngar
373a3(rnying rgyud): 'khrul// yul dang rkyen bzhi shar ba las// 'byung ba lnga yi sa bon rgyas// ye shes lnga yang 'byung bzhis 'thums// 'byung bzhi'i rtsal las snod bcud chags// sdod bcud kun gyi dngas ma las// nyi ma dang ni zla ba gnyis// yab yum tsha grang nyid//
373a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan 'byed// de yang snod bcud rtsal yin phyir// 'dzam gling bye ba phrag brgyad khyab// nyi ma me yi dngas ma yin// zla ba chu yi dngas ma yin// gza' skar sa yi dngas ma yin// rlung ma dngas yin pas rgyu ba'o// 'byung bzhi gcig thogs gcig
373a5(rnying rgyud): yin pas// 'byung bzhi rgyas dus nyi ma ring // 'byung bzhi snyoms dus nyin mtshan mnyam// 'byung bzhi 'khrug dus nyi mthung // drod mdangs thams cad nyams pa'o// 'byung bzhi byer dus nyi zla 'grib// kha char bu yug thams cad kun// 'byung ba
373a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi yi rtsal yin phyir// dbyar ni 'byung ba rgyas pa'i dus// rtsi thog lo 'bras rgyas pa'o// skyon ni 'byung bzhi snyoms pa'i dus// 'bras bu thams cad bcud du smin// dgun la 'byung bzhi 'khrugs pa ste// rtsi bcud thams cad nyams pa'o// dpyid//
373a7(rnying rgyud): gsum 'byung ba byer ba ste// mdangs stobs thams cad nyams pa'o// de rnams 'byung bzhi'i dang bud do// byer zug rnams kyang de dang 'dra// bskal pa lo zla zhag zam// byer dang zug dang snyoms pa'o// 'khrugs pa dag kyang bzhi ru 'dus// bskal
373b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i byed drug 'di lta ste// bskal ba 'jig dus byer ba yin// bskal pa rtags dus zug pa yin// bskal ba gnas dus snyoms pa yin// bskal ba skyongs dus 'khrugs pa'o// la yi byer zug 'di ltar // bya sbal kyai yi lo la ra// swA ga
373b2(rnying rgyud): yos ta yi lo la zug/ byi phag glang gi lo la snyoms// 'jug sbrul lug gi lo la 'khrugs// zla ba'i byer zug 'di ltar ro// dpyid zla gsum la 'byung bzhi byer// dbyar zla gsum la 'byung bzhi zug/ ston zla gsum la 'byung bzhi snyoms// dku
373b3(rnying rgyud): glagasum la 'byung bzhi 'khrugs// zhag gi byed zug 'di ltar ro// nam langs nyi shar 'byung bzhi byer// nyin par 'byung bzhi snyoms pa'o// dgongs mo 'byung bzhi 'khrugs pa dang // nam phyed 'byung ba zug pa'o// zhi rgyas dbang drag las rnams
373b4(rnying rgyud): kun// 'thung bzhi dag gi byed la sogs// des na byer zug brtsi bar bya// byer ba'i dus su zhi ba 'grub// zug pa'i dus su rgyas pa 'grub// snyoms pa'i dus su dbang rnams 'grub// 'khrugs pa'i dus su drag po'o// de ltar dus rnams kyang shes
373b5(rnying rgyud): na// 'byung bzhi thams cad dbang du sdud// kun tu bzang mo klong gsal 'bar ma nyi ma'i gsang rgyud las/ 'byung bzhi rnams kyi byed las kyis dang gud/ 'pho 'gyur yod pa'i chu/ byer zug snyoms 'jug rtsi ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // yang
373b6(rnying rgyud): gcig kun tu bzang mo yis// 'khor gyi tshogs la yang gsungs pa// kye ma snang ba'i 'khor tshigs nyon// da ni 'byung bzhi bshad par bya// de yang bshad lugs 'di ltar ro// 'byung ba phyi nang par gsum la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum// dang
373b7(rnying rgyud): gud 'bo 'gyur long ba'i chu// bem po dag ni 'dod g.yos pas// shed bu shing la rog ces pa// thabs shes nyi zla 'byor bar// 'byung ba zhi dmigs pa'i rkyed g.yos te// 'byung ba lnga la phye gnas pazhi// rigs drug sems can dpang med rtsen/
374a1(rnying rgyud): sas ni lus kyi gshegs te// 'brel bas shangs pags pad+ma skri// nus rnaMs su kun bsdus pa ste// 'brel bas khwag dang rga se sbyin// mes ni sras kun ldan par// 'phel bas dzad ni rgyas par 'dod// chung na
374a2(rnying rgyud): las kun 'degs pa ste// 'phel bas skabs su smin par 'dod// nam mapa' rang bzhin 'phrul 'brib myed// de ltar 'byung bzhi'i byed las kyis// khams gsum pa li khang pa rba// spyad drug sems can re mos 'azor// mi da nga gzugs kyi
374a3(rnying rgyud): 'ad ma la chags// rnyeng rlom shes rang rgyud 'khrul// 'khrul pa'i lus kyi grub tshul ni// ma rig 'gru ba rig rig mo// don la rig pa'i rtsal yin kyang // chung la te byas yid du 'gyur// der 'dzin chung sems 'grus pa las// skyon mongs lnga dang
374a4(rnying rgyud): srid rdug drang // 'dod pa'i rtags sems bsdongs nas s+ya// gti mug dag gis grA zhi bcas nas// de sdang dag gis dpung babyed de// dkyil dag gis dbya dag nas// 'dod chags drug gis rab tung te// phag dog dag gis rab ba zims
374a5(rnying rgyud): sems zhes bya ba thig thig po// me dang 'dra ba hur phung po// sa dang 'ja ba ti gnyig po// chu dang 'ja ba myur sbar po// nam mkha' 'ja ste rgyal phyal po// lnga 'dus lus sems myor ba la// 'dod chags dag ni rab g.yos te// pha ma'i
374a6(rnying rgyud): bde ba 'bar ba'i dus// pha yi thig le zho ltar lug/ chu yi thig le yungs 'bru tsam/ zla ba'i tshul du mngal la babs// ma yi rak+ta dkar dmar gnyis// klu yi k+ta sran ma tsam// dmar la dngas pa nyi ma'i tshul// bla nyi gnyis ni thabs
374a7(rnying rgyud): zhes te// gzhub skyor tshul du gnas// de gnyis par du chung sems gnyis// don la ye shes rang rtsal te// gsub rtsor bar du 'thams// yi ge oM yi tshul du khrid// dzan pazung tshor thams cad 'gags// lha khang nang du chud par sems//
374b1(rnying rgyud): bad brtson pa'i nga du gnas// sems yid thogs pa can du song // mang sa rgyur ma 'thams dar duni// srid pa'i ba do zhes bya ste// rngon du med pa'i sha gzugs can// dbang ba klan chang yid kyi lus// thogs med pa sa san rnga// de yang dgra
374b2(rnying rgyud): dang ma dgra gnyis// mngal dang tu gyen gcig pa'o// dag pa ye shes 'khor ljags dang // ma dag rigs drug 'khor tshul la// de yang rang dbang can dang ni// rang dbang med pa'i 'dug tshulalo// rang dbang can du rnarnams pa na?// dran bzhin
374b3(rnying rgyud): medal sbyong ba skams pa dang // ngan bzhin 'tsho don dgongs pa dang // d+hAn bzhin skabs rtswa 'tshad rgya dang // dran bzhin ldan grub 'tshang rtswa dang // dzan bzhin mang la du 'tshong cha dang // dzan bzhin dang dbang can la nges pa sbed// rigs drug pa sogs
374b4(rnying rgyud): nges brjod// bye ba rnam bzhi gang yang ra // dag pa ye shes 'jug go'o// rang dbang med pa'i 'khor lugs ni// las dAn dbang gis lus ngan len// mngal spro bsdam pa'i dbar med pas// srid pa las kyi 'phen len gyis//
374b5(rnying rgyud): rnabs rigs ngan ma lpags sa ma// mi phyag rtsol so ga can gcan rnams// raja ma dra la sogs thog rgyags rnams// mi gtsang 'dus phyag ma drangs par// ng+ge rnam bzhi gang yang rung // rang ngom she pa dang thA la cul// ma dge pa
374b6(rnying rgyud): ngas rgya thams// de ni dbang med 'khor chags s+ho// de ltar rnam pa yang mad ga nyiste// yang lde ka dag tshus su yin// mar gyis dgra rje myal// de 'isprin skye ba rnam pa bAni// yang dang mang gnyis shes pa \u0f7f// yar gyi skyong skyes
374b7(rnying rgyud): rjesams// nga gyi rgong skyes byang nga pon// yang kyi 'jus skyes bral la// mir gyi rdzus skyes ye rigs tshogs// nga skyes mi tshig// sa kyi rjod kyis 'bu min tshags// yar kyeman gyis yis// sang myi
375a1(rnying rgyud): kyis pad daN+Dal dang // yang kyi mngal skyes sgras/ sna sa// dkyi mngal thos nyon mongs drag// 'du ba 'ja stan la // de skar myu d+ga la rgyam zhugs pa // rad sums dbyer myed ma gas d+ha/ nga
375a2(rnying rgyud): padang / dang ldan// de tshe nges dz+nyAn drug po gces// des rngan mngal kyar 'brums pa ni// mI was len pa'i rlung sems dang // pha ma'i thig le dkar dmar dang // bu chen bzhi po 'angom pa la// 'brang ba bzhi yi was su song // sa tshwa lnga dang zho gnyis
375a3(rnying rgyud): bkres pa wA re// 'thung bzhis res bsdus res bshigs pas// mer mer po dang nur nung po// gor gor po dang ltar lcar po// mkhrad 'gyur khyab 'dug rus wal ltar// dam pa bzhin du lus sems chags// zhag ni bdun tshan bcu bzhi'i bar// 'thung ba'i
375a4(rnying rgyud): lus rnams rim bzhin bskyed// lus la tsa chags kya 'thig/ de la sku dang ye shes so// rlung ni kun la khyab byar chags// de ltar zla dgu ngo babul// mngal de btsog pa'i 'du shes kyi// lus rdzogs mngal nas kyil 'tshon// 'bul byed rdung gi sa snang
375a5(rnying rgyud): la 'phrul// mgo mjug yog nas phyir la 'byung // de nus mdul gyi rgyu dang thal// sngar gyi bag chags zab tu srong // gyis kyi nyer len dro mu zad// shes pa ra las mi gsal sdeng // rtsa chung kun gyi rtogs ma mes// 'ams kyi dngas snyigs mA gyi pas//
375a6(rnying rgyud): nad gdon mi mthun sna tshogs ldang // de nas khams kyi zos gom gsos// dngas mes khams kyi nus pa bskyed// snyigs mas lus kyi stobs bskyed de// lus sems rim bzhin bskyed pa dang // ngag lnga drug gsum nyon mongs rnams// rim ba'i
375a7(rnying rgyud): mdzeg nye bur chags// reg rtsol nyid kyang dug lngas 'bums// dper na mar medza phub 'dra// lu rdzogs me yi lus de nyid// dang po 'thung bzhis skyed par byed// bar du srud pon rtsoms par gnas// rnga me 'thur 'khrug byed pas 'dza
375b1(rnying rgyud): zhes kun tu bzang mo grong gsal 'bar ma nyi ma'i gsang rgyud las/ nang bcud sngams can gyi chags tshul nang 'thung bzhis brdzus pa'i lus rang dbang can dang / rang dbang med pa'i 'khrul tshul gyi la ja wAn rtsa rdza ba la// ta ga Nata/
375b2(rnying rgyud): gru bzang mos yang gsungs pa// kye ma 'jus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// rkyen gzhi lus kyi 'khrul dz+wal las// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon dang // spu dang ye shes gsum brtsegs nas// 'thung bzhis gang khyab lus kIs khyab// lus rgyas pa
375b3(rnying rgyud): brtsa yis khyab// rdzu yis gar khyab rlung gis khyab// rlung gis gar khyab thig ldes khyab// thig les gar khyab chu yis khyab// luswA ni bu gsum lus yin te// lu gsum yi ge gsum dang ldan// mi lus rin chen de dag ni// mngal zhug
375b4(rnying rgyud): lnga ldan no// zla ba dgu ni theg dbu ste// rib cus bcu'i tshul du'o// skye gnas rang bzhin sprul pa'i phra// ye shes chen po'i 'thung gnas yin// lus can kun la bzang ngan med// bde gsheg su snying pos kun 'khyab// de ba rang bzhin thugs ri ga sa/
375b5(rnying rgyud): skyil la mar gyis khyab bzhin gnas// ye nas rang rig ye shes la// da lta 'khrul kyang mi shes cal// marig grol tshe 'jung bzhi'i lus// lha med ye shes lnga ru rngog/ sems can dang rdzu rtog tshogs rnaHsa// sangs rgyas grangs las 'das pa'o// lung
375b6(rnying rgyud): po 'thung ba yab khyu ma bcu// dug lnga ser rje thub pa drug/ tshogs brgyad sems dpa' sab yun pakyang // rko ba di rmo ba ya yAm pa'i// mig gnyis ti ma tha ba gnyis// rang thang rig pa'i rtsal la// rdza lnga dang de ye shes lnga// 'od lnga kha dog snang lA dang /
375b7(rnying rgyud): mig shes rab rtog palnga// gzhi lam lnga 'bras bu'o// rig pa'i ye shes su tra shar// nam ra mi bgyod rin chen yang // rA don yod drug/ da
376a1(rnying rgyud): chen por gnas/ zhes kum pacang mthong gas la 'bang mi sti n+ya'i gas gyud las/ rten lus kyi dkyil 'khor pa/ spu dang ye shes gnas tshul bstan pa'i 'du nye bcu drug pa'o// / drang gcig nga sa
376a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs la// kun tu bzang mos yang gsungs pa/ kye sa rig pa'i 'khor tshogs sngon// da ni rtsa yid spod bstan// wIr na rtswa bshad thams cad kun// don pa yod pa ma yin te// dmigs pa'i rten du bshad par bya// lus la gnas pa carnams ni// skye mer
376a3(rnying rgyud): 'bum gnas pa'o// de rnams tshung la bsdus pa yis// stong phrag brgya dang bcu gnyis gnas// de yang tshur la bsdus pa yis// lus kyi dkyil 'khor lnga ru 'dus// spyi bo bde chen 'khor lo ru// rgya 'dab sum brgya drug tu gnas// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor
376a4(rnying rgyud): rtswa 'dab brgyad gnyis bcu drugu gnas// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo Ta// tu 'dab sum nu mo gnyis gnas// ste bskyal ba'i 'khor lo dra// bya 'dib drug cu rtsa ba ni gnas// gsang gnas bde rkyen 'khor lo rgya// chu 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnas// 'jo
376a5(rnying rgyud): rjeb dpas// chags cig shing shAs/ don gams chung na gnon// kun nga sa pas mi gnas// daM nas rbang mas// shin dang mini gis kyang // shel thabs ca la // rdzas thong pas / dbus
376a6(rnying rgyud): lnga ldan gnas// maM/ r-I/ e/ b+h+yAM/ su/ khaM/ nang gyur 'ams gsum/ oM// e/ gsang ba ltar rnamakha' 'thong// tiri nIs/ yang byas de nyu narab phram gnyis/ ra// thaM/ ya/ bla med ltar na gangs sa 'das// 'di ni tsamadza de das/
376a7(rnying rgyud): 'a'o// se nas kyig kyin// das ma su 'das pa gnas pa // de rnam kyi'i tshi ga pa rin// klung du rnas na d+hi 'jas// sems ca dun gyi lus kyi dkying/ chen gags lasas// ni stong rdza gagrangasam sang // za pa rung bzhi
376b1(rnying rgyud): de'akyang ma spyan dang ma// ri la thubs can pa smra// 'dis du ba ba nga// nga ga dzin mas shes ni// gnas shing rdu ga ta zhon// 'dar shin chu // la mas skyel zags// nam ma phyi byas sacan nas/
376b2(rnying rgyud): gsum ngo bo dzin par blang // zhes kun rgya bzang mo grong gsal 'bar mthi ma rigasang rgyud las/ lus kyi rtsa gnad bshad pa'i le'u skye bcu bdun pa'o// / yang gcig 'dus pa'i 'khor chags la// kun tu bzang mos bka' stsal pa// kyem
376b3(rnying rgyud): 'jus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// rtsa yi nang du rgya ba'i chung // nyi khri dang ni stong phrag gcig/ drug brgya dgatu gru ba yin// 'grub chen po'i drung du 'dod// de'i byed las rnam pa gnyis// gyen nu zur sel las rnams byed// rtsa nas nges par 'gyu ba ni// 'bram rdza/
376b4(rnying rgyud): gcig dang mi thag gnyis// stong phrag drung dang bas phrag drug// tra nas nges par 'gru te// 'bru ba rgyang ba'i drung du 'dod// mkhas pas rgyad nad brtag pa gces// ye shes dra dag pa dog med // dod kyang 'di ltar shes par bya// parba me m+ba ma chung dang // rnamam
376b5(rnying rgyud): rlung dang rgyu rlung dang // rnam pa lngal ming lnga ste// srog 'dzin rlung dang me rnams chung // khyab byed rlung dang srog 'dzin rlung // dngas snyigs 'byed pa'i rlung dang lnga// re re la yang lnga lnga ste// 'khor lo lnga la rtsa lnga gnas// yin kyang ye shes lnga ru 'dus// ye shes lnga yang bya
376b6(rnying rgyud): grub dang // don la rig pa'i ngo bor gnas// rlung zhes rig pa'i rang rtsal yin// thams cad drung gi byed las so// rtsa dang rlung dang sems dang gsum// tha dad bshad kyang gcig tu 'dus// khyab pa'i rlung lnga snying la gnas// khyab ni lus rnams kun la khyab//
376b7(rnying rgyud): ni sems kyi rta po yin// 'gru ni rtsa gsum nang du 'gru// / khyab ni stong gsum yongs la khyab// ces rlung gi gnas lug+sa do sbed ba'i legre skye ba po brgyad pa'o// / yang gcig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// kun tu bzang mos bka' stsal pa//
377a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'ang rigaton// ye shes rgya la rjes sus grub pas// del ma gru cig las byag// sgra'atheg pa sagang gnas// ngal sgra dang ye shes na// thig pa dag ni gnas pa'o// 'ad pang rtsa gsum pa' ba da
377a2(rnying rgyud): gzhi yi thig le bzang po dang // lam gyi thig le bzang po dang // bzang po rnams kyi rtse mo dang // bzang po rgyan dang ldan pa yang // rtsa rnams kun gyi nang na gnas// spyir na thig le 'od ltar gnas// rtsa re'i nang na rlung re gnas// rlung ngo'i rtsa thig le re// theg
377a3(rnying rgyud): le sku dang ye shes so// thig le chos nyid lta 'dod na// don dam dang ni kun rdzob gnyis// don dmathig le chos kyi sku// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma'o// thig ni chos sprang pho 'gyur med// le ni longs sur gsal ba dang // nyag ni sAl chu kun la khyab// gcig ni wa
377a4(rnying rgyud): gsum gcig tu 'ong // kun rdzong thig le 'di ltar ro// pho la thig le dngos su 'bab// mo la bde ba rgyas pa'i dus// rna bug g.yas su 'bab par 'gyur// kun rdzob thig le de nyid ni// 'byung ba lnga yi dngas ma yin// de la mi gzig la gnas// kun rdzo jig la
377a5(rnying rgyud): sbyangs pa yis// don dam yi ge thig le mjal// 'dod chags can byirnal 'byor las// rig ma mtshan nyid ldan pa la// kun rdzobargya mi thig le ni// zab cing gzung dang zlog pa dang // rtsa la btab cing drung la sre// stong nying brten rjo blo rjes bcad// lus dang
377a6(rnying rgyud): sems gnyis go bskyog bya// de ltar byas pa'i yon tan ni// chos thig le nyag gcig thob// mugasum rdon gnas par mdzod// / spyir yang thig yang theg longamatshan rnyed de// grangs can rnam pa bcu drug ste// blangs med du yi grangs dang mnyam// 'das dang /
377a7(rnying rgyud): ma 'das gnyis kyi sro// don dam thun rdzo gnyis su med// hUM'i thig le yi gang gnas// rtsa dang drung dang theg le gsum// gyi lhar 'byung ba rnam lnga yin// nang ltar yum chen rnam lnga yin// gsang ba ltar na khrob pan// yang gsang ltar na ye shes lnga/ yang
377b1(rnying rgyud): gcig rgyu yi thig le ni// phyi ltar 'khor lo lnga yin no// nang ltar thig le lnga yin no// gsang ba ltar na ye shes lnga// a ha ri ne sarba ces pa'o// yang gsang ltar na mkha' 'gro lnga// yang gcig rgya yi thig le ni// phyi ltar 'byung ba lnga yin no// nang ltar nyon mo ma dug
377b2(rnying rgyud): yin// gsang bltar na sum+b+he ste// yang gsung ltar nu ye shes lnga// de ltar reg thog ngo yang sprad// ces kun tu bzang mo klong gsal 'bar ma nyi ma'i gsang rgyud las/ thig le ngo lgad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / yu gagang// ya
377b3(rnying rgyud): gcig kun tu bzang mo yis// rig snang 'khor la 'di skad do// kye kye 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// da ni yi ge'i gnas lugs bshad// rtsa rlung thig le gsum gyi rtsal// ye shes 'od kyi gong bu gnas// yi ge'i grangs ni bas ma las 'das// bye ba zer 'thams
377b4(rnying rgyud): ya ste// bsdus na grangs can 'di ltar ro// a/ ha/ Sha/ sa/ sha/ ma/ oM AHhUM/ de ltar yi ge rnam pa dgu// 'gag med lam la de bzhin gshegs// yi ge'i sgra ni stong pas tshig las 'das// a/ ha/ 2/ sa/ sha/ ma/ oM AHtraM/ tshen rdza
377b5(rnying rgyud): cad kyi 'gag gnyis sku med pa'i yi ge rang shAr ba'o// a/ ma/ 2/ sa/ shaM/ na/ d+ha ma/ sarba/ ka ma/ b+ha ni/ sarba/ g+ha ta/ d+ha swa nI/ sarba/ ya sho/ d+ha ni/ sarba/ sa/ saM/ pra/ b+ha/ b+ha sa?/ d+ha na/ sarba/ pan tri/ pa ra/ sarba/ Da duH/ ye/ sarba/ sha/ sarba/
377b6(rnying rgyud): a/ ka du/ gla/ oM swa ra/ sho ta ni/ A~M/ sku gsum 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes nam mkha' nas dang shar ba'o// IM/ kro sho ma ti yI/ a pra b+ha na sarba ha na du ya yA/ don mtshon du med pa'i yi ge'o// nga ni ji tsam mo snyam ma nus pa/ sarba d+harma kA ya ma ti si b+ha ra/
377b7(rnying rgyud): sku yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i yi ge rang shar ba'o// 'o de drog mi lA ta ad ma ko sha tsakra la ki/ gsung rnam par dag pa'i yi ges ngag yongs su dag pa bya ngan las 'ding ba'o// shrib dz+dza Tu tad te se ta/ prad nya bar sa dus stan ka ti/ thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
378a1(rnying rgyud): rang sha ban// ma thugs / yan tan me zad pa'i ye shes rang shA nan// sa tag su mu la hA ga t+ta&ta/ d+haH/ a naH/ bran las thogs pa med pa'i yi ge dang gar ba // a/ laH/ sha/ sam/
378a2(rnying rgyud): drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// sangs rgya ba yi thabs bstan pa'o// a bag kye/ e ma kai re/ mataH/ siSha saM ta sa mi ta/ su ru su ru kun d+ha le/ ma su ma s+ya/ i kA ra li swA/ b+ha sa ti me/ tse kar b+ha li ye/ sa munaH/ tsan+da swa sh+tsa hrI/ b+hi ta sa na/ 'byung d+ha mri rI/
378a3(rnying rgyud): ci/ sasbyin
378a4(rnying rgyud): sidaH/ d+his ta las laM/ b+h+yad d+had+hA d+ha/ mtsha shab ga ma~M/ sa r+tha/ oM mA~M/ mamaranam kun d+ha ba mo'i gzungs nas byab/ btags pas sangs rgyaba'i gud mas ga yang dab ga/ mAM ma gnas ma/ mi yin nams ma
378a5(rnying rgyud): yi ge'i nga smad kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / yang gcig kun tu bzang mo yis// sdang srid 'khor la 'di skad do// nyon cig snang srid 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lnga las 'byung lnga grub// 'byung ba lnga las lus grub ste// lus la rtsa grub
378a6(rnying rgyud): nang rlung// rlung mtheg la yig 'tshul// de rnams kun gyi dang rtsal la// spu dang ye shes smin pa'o// de yang gnis tshul 'di ltar ro// 'jig rten 'ams kyi sems can la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying don// mra dang ya shas rtsa dang drung // thig /
378b1(rnying rgyud): nyag gcig bla rnams ni// rang cas su ni 'di ltar gnas// til la mar gyis khyab bzhin no// lus can rnams la bstan nas ni// gnas ni snying gi dkyil dug nas// byini n+ya yang ma 'dal la// nang du 'od lnga ma 'gags pa// kun pa zang ga su la sgyur bya// dang dang
378b2(rnying rgyud): bas yi ga'u bzhin// kha byor tshul du gnas pa'o// ga'u de yi dkyil shed du// 'od lnga'i dkyil du zhi ba'i sku// yungs 'bru tsam gcig 'od du gnas// de ni rigs pa'i gnas lugs so// rig pa'i sku ni bus spa 'dra// ye shes bum nang mar me 'dra// thugs
378b3(rnying rgyud): ma'i 'od zer 'dra// de las 'byung ba ye shes ni// khro bo spu ni yungs 'bru tsam// ma 'gags spyan ni phul dag tsam// 'od dang 'od zer tshul du bzhugs// gnas ni klad pa'i nang du gnas// spu dang ye shes de dag ni// thog ma dag dang gnas pa'o// de las
378b4(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i 'od zer ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o// me long dkyil 'khor dngas pa yis// nya yi mig bzhin gnas pa'o// de yang rig pa dag dang 'brel// tsid+d+ha snying gi rtse mo nas// rtsani dang dkar lu dang tsam// sgal tshigs radab nas yar la yed/
378b5(rnying rgyud): de nas rtse'u chung g.yas su zhugs// mgo bo klad pa'i rgya dang 'brel// de yang sna 'dab g.yon nas gnyis// tshang tshing nang nas mig dang 'brel// dar srung ba men rwa 'dra'i dkyil// rgyal mo'i dkyil du rtsa de zug/ snang ba yi ni 'char byed lam// rkyen gyis ma bsgribs
378b6(rnying rgyud): can mig/ ming ni kyang zhags chu sgron zer// snying la ye shes gnas pa de// lam ni rtsal zhugs nas su// thon ni ye shes mig lathon// gsal ni nam mkha'i dbyings su gsal// dper na me long dkyil 'khor dngas pa la// gang bstan rkyen ni 'char ba bzhin// de bzhin rnam dag
378b7(rnying rgyud): spyo ba'i nam mkha' la// don ni snying po ma 'dres tshom bu lnga// ma skyes rdzogs pa'i tshul du gsal// 'di rnams rang chas yin pas gzhan du mtshol zhig/ rang byung rang shar ye shes rjod// rkyen gyis ma bsgribs zang thal nyid// thig lo thig phran 'od kyi mu khyud
379a1(rnying rgyud): bcas// hi zas bstan pa'i rin chen khang pa ru// 'od ldam 'dres ye shes tshom bur gsal// rdza ldan momabu'i lha tshogs rnams// dpag med dmigs med pasam bu 'thur// phyedang ma pang thal wA // zhekra phul pa ra la
379a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rang gi 'od dang zer bzhin du// rang nas rnams su rnam par snang // 'char byed 'byung tshul mi 'gag pa// dbang po rnams dang 'brel ba'i tshul// snang ba'i yul dang gsal bar snang // kun gyi spyan la 'char ba'o// chos nyid stong pa de ma ma
379a3(rnying rgyud): reg pa ye shes zang ma gang la// ye shes 'od snang kun tu gdal// rigs drug lus kyang 'od kyi sku// bem po rnams kyang ye shes lus// zang zhal nyid du gnas pa'o// kun tu bzang mo klong gsal 'bar ma nyi ma'i gsang rgyud las/ rtsa dang rlung gi thig le dang
379a4(rnying rgyud): sru dang ye shes gnas tshul dang / lam dang 'chir sgo yul gang gsal nges par gsungs pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// / pA/ bsam/ tsa tu brgya \u0f7f dang da tha' thas shar6\u0f7f// de nas 'byung lnga'i 'khor tshogs dang // snang ba chen po
379a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor la sogs// 'khor tshogs 'dus pas yang gsol pa// kye to kye to kye ma klong / ma skyes pa'i nam mkha'/ ma 'gags pa'i snang ba/ kun la chags pa'i reg pa/ sku gsum gcig tu rdzogs pa'i mkha' krong / de lta bu'i sku dang ye shes/ sku'i sku
379a6(rnying rgyud): mchog/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas dang la rang chas su gnas pa las/ ma rig pa yong lags sam zhus pa'i lam du bka' stsal pa/ kye kye 'byung ba'i bdag mo nyon// legs par dgongs la thugs su chud// srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can la// nyon mongs ma reg
379a7(rnying rgyud): cher gnas// rten ni gzugs phung dag la brten// gnas ni glo snying bar du gnas// ma rig pa dang sems dang yid// rnam pa gsum du gnas pa'o// ma rig rkyang ba med pa ste// sems kyis bag chags thams cad sdud// ma shes nyid la sgrib par byed//
379b1(rnying rgyud): bcom las sa snas// gas byud pa tha ma/ dgasus mas/ rna / na// ga smra / ga ga rdza / !
379b2(rnying rgyud): byang // nyon mongs rnam rtag rnams ni// lam ni gang dbyung ba ni// blo d+hing gnyis su 'brel ba'i bar// rtswa srog dmar po zhes byab// srog srug tsam gyi nang nas yang// ma rig rna ma tog thams cad 'dra// da ni rkang rtsegag yon nas yang //
379b3(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa dag nas 'brel// de nas sna 'dab g.yon pa nas// gyes te khwa sa gnyis pazug/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad ni// dbugs kyi rna la sgron byas nas// nyon mongs brgyad bri ba ni stong 'bru// drug 'khor khro rang shing spyod// yul rkyen rnams la ban byas
379b4(rnying rgyud): nas// gzung ba'i yul dang dzin pa'i sems// thams cad sogs pa'i gzhi ma ni// rnam pa gsum du byib ste// ye thog dang po'i sran ga zhi na// dag pa'i snang brgyad cing bsogs// spyor 'don gyi kun gzhi ni// nyon mongs sna tshogs sogs par byed/
379b5(rnying rgyud): mongs sogs pa'i kun gzhi ni// phung po khams la brten byas nas// nyon mongs du ma'i rten gnas byed// dper na rigs ngan khye bzhin// sgo 'i'i yul la sems kyis bzung // snar yul du ma nyid du bzung // depyir khams gsum khang parba/
379b6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid du 'khor ba'o// de rnams dang du ma shong bas/ rig pa rnam ma khar brdal ba // bar snang khams su ye shes ngos bzung ngo // zhes ma dag pa'i sems can thams cad la/ nyon mongs pa dang khang she chegs na/ ma rig pa dang sems dang/ yin
379b7(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi gnas lam yul bstan pa'i bdun nyid gsum pa'o// / sa ma la/ gtaH/ swAsaH/ thab ma/ gtang bya/ dmaH/ mas thams dazab rgya pa ma can tha ga ca gnas pa rjes non tug
380a1(rnying rgyud): pa r+dz+dza ma ta/ Thagam/ m+b+ha b+h+yamatan cwo/ bras ga \u0f7f/ 'dre nyed bustan pa 'di nyid la/ byud thams ca kyi mtha' bzlas te// grong gas la gsum du blan lad // tha s+yA kun ma
380a2(rnying rgyud): da// klo gas pa'ab 'i rgyang dkyilas// mdu thog ma gong dgaH// can thab ye shes gnas pa'is// 'gyul med dakhrul dang gnas pa'i tshul// pa ma dpa cher blo ru la ga gas la// rkyen gyi pang chad rig D+ha// zhes pa chog dang dbu bol//
380a3(rnying rgyud): bar chung bstan// gal te rnal 'byor gang zhig rnams// rang ngom shes rang rgyud 'khrul// snang ba rtog pa'i yul la shor// stong pa dngos po mtshan mar shod// bdag 'dzin gnyis kyi bar chad nas// bag chags rim pa bsal dka' bas// de la nyams len 'di
380a4(rnying rgyud): gces// nyams len gong 'phel grol ba'i rtags// bar chad byung na chud 'di nyid// rim pa lteng du ngo yang spad// legs par ngo ni ma 'phrod na// bag chags gar sbyin 'byad skabs// 'gogs par dka' ba nyid du 'gyur// sems la sangs rgyas gnas sna kya/
380a5(rnying rgyud): ma 'asgoms par du b+hu ni tha// rang rig ye shes yin gyur kyang // ma bltas par dugs la mi bgyur// dper na til 'bru yungs 'brul// ma ni ye nas gnas gyud kyang // ma btsi bar du mar mi 'byung // 'o ma mer kyi rang bzhin te// ma bsrubs par du mer
380a6(rnying rgyud): sa la drod rgyun ldan gyur kyang // so nam ma byas 'bru mi 'khrungs// lus po sangs rgyas zhing khams kyang // ma sbyangs par du las mi dag/ ngag rnams chos kyi rang sgra ste// ma gsal bar du don mi rtogs// yid ni kun tu bzang mo ste// matogs par du brda mi 'ja
380a7(rnying rgyud): de ltar don ni bsgom par bya// zhes so// kun nu babang mo nyi marigs brgyud las// zhal gdams gnad du bslab pa'i le'u ste te gsum pa'o// / de nas nyon pa kun du bzang mo/ yum gyi mkha' nas slong rdo te// su yi dbyings nas gsung gi zer/
380b1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi blang nas rege pa'i ljags// dgu 'gyur lcog chung gro mo'i spang // snar ba'i yul na chos kyi sgra// rang skad du ni 'di skad do// kye ma dbyung ba'i bdag mo nyon// snang ba gzugs kyi sku shwa rabs// rdo nyid kyi 'khor tshogs dgongs// dus gsumasangs rgyas
380b2(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi brgyad// gsang ba yang gsang zan med// kun tu bzang mo snying gi thig/ mthar thug a ti'i dgongs pa 'di// tshig dang yi ger mi 'os kyang // skyegs ma'i sems can badrug pa'i phyir// ma bcos lhag par mthong zhes pas// pad 'byung ba dag gis
380b3(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bkod// lha lham pad gsal yi dam mdzod// rdo rje rje chung thugs la 'chang // rgyal po yab yum gsang mdzod cig/ nam zhig rkyen gyis par chod na// rgyud 'di 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal// khyad par snang lug khyi 'brug pa'i// lhag sgril bya yi cho pa
380b4(rnying rgyud): rigs pha rol phyin drug meng // rnam pa bcu gcig dpal du shog/ smon lam re re bcugs pa snyings la gsol// de nas yum gyis gsungs pa'i chos rnams ni// snying po gcig tu bkrus pa'o// zab mo gnad kyi gdams pa ng+ge// dus gsums ngas rgya
380b5(rnying rgyud): pa na// mtha' 'gro rnams kyi snying khrag yin// yum rkyen pa ni yi snying brgyad do// mkha' 'gro sde lha'i thugs la spos// rdo rje 'chang gis don 'di shod// longs su rigs lngas rgyu 'di khrol// dpa' dang rdo rjes rgyud 'di zung // sing gi nyid kyi cho
380b6(rnying rgyud): shod// pad+ma'i mtshan gyis yi ger thob// stegs ma'i dus su chos 'di dar// ku su lu yi don ched du// nga yis don 'di bshad par bya// snang ba ye shes blta ba'i phyid// nyams len rim pa 'di ltar ro// ma rig sems yid rnam pa gsum// nam mkha' gar
380b7(rnying rgyud): khrub gsum gyis khyab// gsum po gar khyab nyon mongs khyab// sems can nyon mongs gsum sdong yin// de dag thams cad bsrub na// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong yin// de yang bsdus na dug lngar 'dus// de yang bsdus na dug gsum yin//
381a1(rnying rgyud): de yang bsdus na gzung 'dzin gnyis// de yang rnam rtog gcig tu 'dus// rnam rtog nyid kyang ma rig pa// ma rig pa la rten byas nas// gzung 'dzin thag pad ma du bsnams// ngan song gsum gyi srog tu bcug/ 'ang rab ta /
381a2(rnying rgyud): dung yor pa'o// 'khor ba de la skyob pa'i thabs// dkon mchog gsum po ma gtogs pa// gzhan ma rgyob gzhan me 'dug mas// nyon mongs rnam rtog sdug bsngal gyis// gang du byeb pa thams cad kun// 'phags pa'i thugs rjes khrang //
381a3(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes gar khyab spu yis khyab// sgra yis gang khyab zer gyis khyab// de rnams bsdus par gyur pa na// gsang sngags kun gyi gnang 'dus pas// gsang sngags gnang rgyud ces su grags// 'di ni nor burin po che// 'di ni myen pa'i sprin mo'o// mngon
381a4(rnying rgyud): suMpa rang gnad bcar phog tu// smyon par byed pa'i rgyud 'di la// thugs nas thugs su brgyad pa'i phyir// rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyad pa tshang // brda' nas brda ru brgyud pas na// brda' yi brgyad pa zam ma chad// spyan nas snyan du brgyud pas na// stan khung brgyung
381a5(rnying rgyud): zam mchad// gter nas gter du brgyud pa'i phyir// gter gyi brgyud pa zam ma chad// 'dri med dbang gzhi bskur ba kun// lag rdum gser gling phyin pa 'dra// kha brag lam lazhugs pa'am// brag skam so nam byas pa 'dra// chud 'di rin chen gser gyis
381a6(rnying rgyud): bris// rtag tu mi 'bral lus la bcang // rgyun du ma yengs don rnams bsgom// rgyud 'di reg pa tsam gyis kyang // yum chen nga dang 'du 'bral med// 'dzin chags skyes bu bud+ha'o// rgyun du gus pa'i mchod pa yis// khyim mi ma yul gnas sa phyogs
381a7(rnying rgyud): de// mthun rkyen yon tan dpag med 'byung // phyi ma par do meng per grol// rgyud 'di su yis klog pa de// lta ba'i don ni khong du chud// rgyud 'di su yis bris pa'i maM// phyi ma sprul pa'i su thob 'gyur// rgyud 'di gang na gnas pa na// mkha' 'gro
381b1(rnying rgyud): chos snong sbyin ltad 'khrigs// lha dang snga mos mchod pa byed// de lta bu'i rgyang chen 'di// bla ma mi 'khur pa che 'dzin// dam tshig nyams dang rdzun po che// bril mnor chung tshang rdzing so// sgom sgrub mi nus chang nag srid// shes rab che yang nyams len dor/
381b2(rnying rgyud): 'bul ba mi rus stong khrus byed// dad kyus med cing g.yo bram sbyar// blo mi brtan cing snying dus med// de lta bu la bka' 'di gsang // blo chung brkam dred can la gsang // skal med rang 'dod can la gsang // dam nyams lag tu shor ba na// gsang sngags thams
381b3(rnying rgyud): cad bka' 'tshal nas// mkha' 'gro khrugs te mi dge 'byung // bka' spyang 'khrug cing srid mi sreg/ de bas rab gsang nan chags bya// gtang bar bya ba'i snod ldan ni// mkha' 'gro sde lnga rnams la gtang // rig rtal mkha' 'gro khyed rnams kyis// spyan
381b4(rnying rgyud): rang gzigs kyi sprul pa mchog/ bad+ma tha~Md phre rtsal la gtod// des kyang don chen gted du gdams// nam zhig dus kyi rnam la// sems can nyon mongs dang / spyod// chos thugs mang yang chos brgyad rtsub// dom chen sgom sbub yal bar dong // dge ba shes
381b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad bzang rngus 'debs// gsang sngags khrom bshad rang gar stod// mtshan nyid sdeg sum chos la yang // dge bcu pa dro'i phyin drug dang // lam lngas bcu sprod mkhan med// bdag 'dzin rtog pas khengs pa'i tshe// 'dus byas skyes bu las 'gro can
381b6(rnying rgyud): 'bras chos mkhyen dag gnas mkhas/ rdorje dathugs pa// 'jam dpal nyid kyi sprul ba mchog/ theg chen mato doni skyong pa// d+ha me ti la bdage bol// bka' 'di gtod rjegs ma ya// des kyang don bzung rdzaldan pa'i// thung chog
381b7(rnying rgyud): rje seM su / la// rdzogs pa dru la/ na ci ba ba migs pa ba / sa sa ma sa na
382a1(rnying rgyud): kyis yon tan thams cad rdzogs nas/ slar yang 'khor ba dong nas sdug pa la 'jug cing / sems can rnams srin grol la bkod do// theg pa kun gyi mthar thug/ rmad byung snying po'i bstan pa/ mkha' 'gro gsang thig klong gsal 'bar ma 'i
382a2(rnying rgyud): ma'i gsang rgyud las/ le'u brgya drug cu rtsa drug pa las/ dbang bzhi'i le'u gsang sngags gnad kyud ces bya ba'i mjug yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ swA te ra N+ya/ sras rgya/ zab rgya/ dam rgya/ sngags
382a3(rnying rgyud): srung shan pa nag po dang / gza' bdud dug gi spu gri 'bar ba/ dam can rdo rje legs pa gsum gyis bka' 'di yi srung ma gyis shig/ thub par srungs shig// u rgyan gyi skad du/ ASh+Ta tra la ha mA hi na/ mA na hra/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po
382a4(rnying rgyud): kun krol chen po zhes bya ba'i gyad/ bcom ldan 'das lhun grub 'dus ma byas pa'i dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ldan grub 'das ma byas pa'i dpal chen po/ de bzhin nyid kyi gnas
382a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings spros thams cad dang bral ba'i pho brang na/ rang byung stsal pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang d+ha k+ki sems can nyid las mi gzhan pa rnams dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ldan gyis grub pa'i ngang du bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor bya
382a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin thugs rje'i ngang gdangs las/ rang byung ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba zhu ba por langs te/ 'khor thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// bcom ldan lhun grub 'dus ma byas pa'i dpal/
382a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das kun la ma lungs khyab pa yi// ring byung tshig rtsod byang chub sems kyi don// rang byung 'dus pa'i 'khor la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lhun thur 'dus ma byas pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ kye
382b1(rnying rgyud): rang byung sprul pa'i 'khar tshogs rnams// skang srid kun la zab pa'i byang chub sems// rang byung ba nas kyi khyod sbyin pa ste// 'di zhes mabyon bya'o tshig las 'das mod kyang // maH byud tshig gis ma brnyan mgobs// mtshon med pas de da'adzan cig pa
382b2(rnying rgyud): ston// log na ston rgyu yod pa ma yin te// rgyal ba'i thugs kyi dgongs pa gcig la ni// rang byung rang gi ngo bo bstan pa yin// zhes bka' stsal to// rang byung ye shes rdo rjes yang gsol pa// rang byung tshig chod byang chub sems nyid de// rang rang
382b3(rnying rgyud): ston pa la// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang byung tshig chod byang chub sems nyid de// ngo bo rang rtsal ma 'gags 'chang tshul las// rang byang rnam pa snang srid thams cad 'byung // mdo
382b4(rnying rgyud): dang ma rig lam gsum ste// rang byung ma rig nyon mongs sems dkrugs nas// bdag 'dzin sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i sems can byung // rang rig ye shes 'dzin med rtogs pa yis// bdag med mya ngan 'das po'i sangs rgyas byung // 'khor 'das gnyis po
382b5(rnying rgyud): dbyer med rtogs pa'i thabs// lam gyi theg pa phyi nang grasang gsum byung // de rnams rang rang ngo bos bston pa yin// don la thams cad sems rgyud gcig pa'i phyir// yang gsang tshig chod a tid rdzogs pa yin// de don bshad pa'i thabs ni thug gis ston//
382b6(rnying rgyud): gang zag yid ches skyed phyir lo khyad bshad// chos kyi byangs bsnyen phyir rtsabs bshad// 'char tshul rnga dad byung phyir theg rnams bshad// de rnams thabs su gol phyir dgos ched bshad// dgos ched don gyis sgrol phyir man ngag bshad// de don che ba'i yon
382b7(rnying rgyud): tan gtad rgyas bshad// ces bka' stsal to// rdzogs chen tshig chod kun grol chen po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi gleng spong gi le'u ste dang po'o// b+hanya nasaH// rang byung ye shes rdo rjes yang gsol la/ e ma ho// bcom ldan lhan grub 'dus ma bya
383a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dpal// rang byung tshig tshod byang chub sems nyid de// dang po lo rgyus don gyis ji ltar bshad// ma bshad skyon ci bshad pa'i yon tan gang // de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la bshad du gusol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom
383a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang byung tshig chod byang chub sems nyid de// dang po lo rgyus don gyis ma bshad na// dper na rgyal rigs rgya las 'dzin pa'i dus// rgyal rigs ma bshad dmangs rnams yid mi chos// de bzhin dang byung tshig chod byang chub sems
383a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pas na// dper na nyi 'od chu nang shar ba bzhin// byin gyi brlabs kyi dgongs pas bshad pa yin// longs sus su yi sgo nas bshad pa ste// bshad nas thos pa ma yin mtshan dang dpe byad kyi// dper na gzugs mthong de yis kha dog shes pa
383a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin// rang dang ngo bo'i sgo nas dpe don bshad pa yin// sprul pa'i sku yis gsung gi sgo nas bshad// du ma bshad pa ma yin tshangs pa'i dbyangs gcig gsungs// dper na pi wang sgra bzhin dang rang skad// mthun pa'i chos su gsungs nas bshad pa yi
383a5(rnying rgyud): de ltar rgyal ba rnams ni dgrongs pas bshad// byang chub rig 'dzin rnams ni brda yis bshad// gang drug sgrub pa po la tshig gis bshad// thams cad sems rgyud gcig las brgyud pa e ma to// zhes bka' stsal to// rdzogs pa chen po che ga mod
383a6(rnying rgyud): chen po'i rgyud po rgyus don gyis bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// nyams/ rang byung ye shes rdo rjes yang gsol pa// e ma to/ bcom ldan tshun du ba 'dus ma gyes pa'i dpang // lo rgyas don gyis brgyad pa'i byang chub sems// rtsa
383b1(rnying rgyud): don ni ji ltar yin// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang byung byung sems rtsa ba yin pa ni/ dbenan num mkha' chen po'i klong yangs las// snong brgyad byed po thams cad
383b2(rnying rgyud): skyed pa bzhin// dang byung tshig tshod byang chub sems su las// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad byung ba yin// de yang thog mnga' khong 'das gang du yang // ci yang grub pa med pa'i dus tshod du// sman gzhi byung chub sems kyi rangartsal las// bas la
383b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'degs byed gcod byed 'phen// rlung lnga byung nas rang gis 'byung lnga chags// de yi rang spu lnga las rgyung la byung // de nyid ma reg bdag 'dzin sems can byung // de yis drug lnga dang rgyang bcas pas 'khor// rig pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas rang las byung // sna
383b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das sems las pa byung byung // thams cad byung bas kun gyi rtsa ba yin// de phyir kun gzhi byang chub sems zhes btags// dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i chu bo ni// phyogs su babs nas rgya mchod 'du ba bzhin// thams cad sems las skyes shing
383b5(rnying rgyud): sems su 'dus// dang pral lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes yin// sems las ma rtogs snod bzung 'jig rten med// sangs rgyas sems can med cing 'khor 'das med// nyon mongs med cing dgag sgrub med// stong dang mi stong rtogs dang mi rtog med
383b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dag med// rig dang mngag yod med gang yang med// sems kyis ma brdung de rnams gang yang med// sems kyis byis pa rnams cad byung ba yin// de phyer rnamachog sems zhes ming du btags// thams cad sems pas
383b7(rnying rgyud): sharang grol du// dbyed med gcig tu rig na rig pa'i ye shes te// de la 'dzin rtog med pa'i gsal ba de// kun la khyab pa'i chos drung ming du btags// yod ni gcig las med par theg pa lnga tshogs byung // dI tshogs byung yang byang chub sems su 'dus//

384a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan sun grub 'dus mabyas pa'i dpal// gcig las theg pad+ma mthong ba rnams// de rnams 'bras bu gcig gam tha da bsgrag// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor ba bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
384a7(rnying rgyud): gcika las du ma byung bas 'khrul pa yin// dper na gros kyi glang po gcig nyid la// dmus long rnams kyis glang por 'dod pa pa// glang po ma yin sna tshogs mthong ba bzhin// thun mong theg pa 'bras bu mi gcig ste// 'jig rten pa rnams tshe 'di'i
384b1(rnying rgyud): byed khrus 'ad// ngas pa rnams kyadang dang zlag/ kun sadas ma na la dod smra// byu rbab sams dus ma spangasas sasasu ga/ thos zung rdzogasus sa rgyas skrag/ mams rgyas ngas nas dras
384b2(rnying rgyud): bo gcig la theg pa sgra tshogs byung // 'bras bu mi gcig 'dod pa so sor grub// de rnams gcig tu ma rtogs ma med kyi// 'bras bu mi thob snang ba'i lam tsam yin// mig ldan phung po rdzogs par mthong ba bzhin// rdzogs chen thams cad kyi ni don rtoslapas//

384b5(rnying rgyud): lhas mo byas pas rang nyid stong nas su// rang ngom shes gzhan du mthong ba bzhin// thun mor theg pa sna tshogs 'dod pa yang // rang sems sangs kyis mi shes gzhan du 'khrul// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan du 'tshol// 'jig rten pa ni nyon mongs dang gar spyod// nyan thos dang rgyal sem
384b6(rnying rgyud): kyis nyon mongs spangs// byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs lam gyis spyod// gsar sdigs thun mong nyon mongs gzhi las bsgyur// gdod kyis rma med 'bras bu thob par 'dod// spang blang chos kyis bskal par bsgoms gyur kyang // sems ma rtogs pas
384b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thob mi 'gyur// rdeg pa blo tshogs thabs su zhen pas babri'as// a ti shes ra chen po'i lhan mig gis// kun shes kun chos sun yon pa rtogs// spar thang med de 'khor 'das dbyer med grol// de phyir tha med rtogs kyi pas te

391a3(rnying rgyud): skye ba med pa'i pho brang du// zag med nyams chal tshig rdzogs dbang bsur cu// zhes pas gsol ba la nags ma gdab par bya// de nas bla mas rig pa sems kyi bu// tshig chod don la 'dug pa sgrol gas sam// zhes brjod slob mas lan sgo zhes bya// de nas thob
391a4(rnying rgyud): ma'i dam bca' dpog pa ni// khyod kyis mtshan ma'i 'khrul phyir ma 'brengs par// rtsol med chos nyid don la ma yengs pa'i// dmigs med skom pa'i nyams len dam chos shing // de las log ma khyod nyid rlag par 'gyur// ces pas dam du byud la dam 'char gzug/
391a5(rnying rgyud): de nas parda yid kyil dakhor bstan pa ni// snang ba sems su 'dzin pa'i sgrib g.yogs phud// sems nyid stong gsal ye shes mig phyel// snang stong rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di la smos// me long de la gas la yang 'dzin tu med// de bzhin snang ba 'char yang stong pa'i ba/
391a6(rnying rgyud): shel la sgo yi 'od lnga shar ba 'dri// stong pa'i rang rtsal ye shes 'char ba'i brda// shar yang dngos por mgrub snang stong yin// de nas bla mas bu khyod su yin dri// nga ni rig pa sems kyi bu yin bya// khyod kyi stod kyi lus 'di ci yin dri// stod ni gcer bu smad ni gos yod zer//
391a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin sems nyid 'di yang shes par gyis// lus la brten nas gos kyang snang ba 'di// sems la brten nas byung bar shes pa'i brda// gos kyis gtums pas lus 'di mi mthong bzhin// sems nyid snang bas 'khrul pas sems ma mthong // gos phud lus de ga
391b1(rnying rgyud): na na
391b2(rnying rgyud): na na/
392a1(rnying rgyud): yin// dmigs gtad mtshan ma med pa'i nga bsgo med// 'od gsal 'dzin pa med pa'i longs su yin// rang byung ye shes chen po mngon gyur pa'o// de nyid gtan la phebs pa'i rtags cad ni// dngos kyi rtags su lus ga yod gsum
392a2(rnying rgyud): la// rang bzhin kun gyis mthong bar lus po yang // dag ni gsong bor ma bslabs chos skad 'od// yid la mngon par shes pa thogs re 'char// bla ma'i mos gus lhag par che ba 'od// nyams kyi rtags su rang lus 'od du 'gro// rang gi sgra rnams brag cha lta bur 'char//
392a3(rnying rgyud): rnan tu
392a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan med de rmi lam du zin na// chos nyid stong par nyams kyi tshad la phebs// de nyid bskyungs na lo gsum zag bcas kyi// phung po mi snang longs sur sangs rgya'o// tshad la maphebs par dor grol bar 'gyur// nyams snang 'phel 'gri bzad nas tshad la phebs// chos/
392a5(rnying rgyud): nyid stong gsol longs su mngon gyur pas// chos nyid go yul mi 'jog myong bas grub pa e ma ho// sems kyi ngo bo stong pa yin pa la// gang zag tha mal de nyid ma rtogs na// de yi man ngag tshig tu sgrog pa ni// sems nyid stong pa'i nyams sdang dang shar la// dbyings
392a6(rnying rgyud): rig gnyis med nyams su mi shes par// nyams la mngon par zhen na mtshan ma dgol// mtshan ma bzung na chos su bzung yang 'khrul// zhen pa yod na stong pa nyid kyang gzugs// snang ba stong pa nyid du mi grol bas// sdang stong gnyis med don de ma rtogs na//
392a7(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob yin te rtag chad mtha' la shor// sdang ba sems su shes kyang mthol bas// gsal stong dang byung ye shes ma mthong sgribs// de don rtogs phyir bsgoms pas gtan la dbab// mthong nyams tshor nyams shes nyams gang shar la// de yi steng du ma yangs
392b1(rnying rgyud): de nyid bsgom// bsgom pas de nyid gtang med yal nas 'gro// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul ra po gcig pa ste// 'gro la sems rgyud gnyis su mgrub pas// sems nyid ma bcos rang sar bzhag pa yis// dper na sdig d+ha'i chur snang bye btsam// rgya mang skrag
392b2(rnying rgyud): min pas mal nas gro// dul dan med par mi 'gro bzhin// nyams rna 'acar cul dngas por shang na yang // ded nga la brtags shing dpyad pa tsam// gzhi med pa thal tang par grol nas bya// dmi pa mnan 'chang byug par cu// nags
392b3(rnying rgyud): bar snang yang 'dzin rgyu med// nyams sdang gsal yang 'dzin pa'i yul ma grub// 'dzin pa med pa gsal yang stong pa yin// stong pa yin pas ma 'gags cir yang 'char// shar yang stong pa nyid la stong par shar// rang shang rang grol chu dang chu drangs bzhin//
392b4(rnying rgyud): sna tshog shar yang sems nyid stong par grol// stong pa nyid la dngos po mtshan ma med// med bzhin gsal bas nam mkha' lta bu yin// nam mkha' ma 'gags sprin dang 'ja' tshon shar// shar yang nam mkha'i dang la nam mkhar grol// de bzhin sdang ba 'di
392b5(rnying rgyud): dag sems la shar// sems kyi glong na gnas shing sems su grol// sems nyid ci yang ma grub ngo bos stong // stong pa'i rang bzhin gsal la 'gag pa med// 'gag med rnam par dag pa sems nyid de// dang po byungs med de rgyu yis stong // bar du skyes
392b6(rnying rgyud): med de rkyen gyis stong // tha mar 'gag pa med de rdo bos stong // dug gsum snga phyi med par mnyam pas stong // dbyibs dang bdog med de ngo bos stong // thog mtha' 'gro 'od med de rang bzhin stong // snang ba ngos gzung med de mtshan mas stong // sems
392b7(rnying rgyud): la phyi nang med pas gzung 'dzin stong // sems la dngos po med pas rtag lha stong // gsal la 'gag pa med pas chad lha stong // mtha' dbus phyogs cha med pas gnyis ka stong // phyogs med rtsis las 'das pa gnyis kas stong // nye skyon yangs pa med
393a1(rnying rgyud): bsapa mas dang// gdonanas thab ba med pa bdagags dang // yangs rabatur 'dapa bas dang / du chu nyi bdadas// ses san gas pa dang // da
393a2(rnying rgyud): yordul tsam med// 'das pa'i snang ba nam mkha'i bya rjes 'dra// da lta'i snang ba dngos med byar drang dra// mdod d+ha ba cha med yul dang 'dra// dus gsum bye gag med pa gdod mnas// ye nas yin pa gnas lugs shes par bya// gas
393a3(rnying rgyud): nyid du stong pa'i sems// lce 'jig datho 'gyur med pas nam mkha' 'dra// mthar dbus phyogs cha bral bas nam mkha' 'dra// gang stong gsal 'grib med pas nam mkha' 'angadra // ku khya ngos gsung med pas nam mkha' 'a // snga tshogs ris med nga mdangs rnam
393a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'dra// don la 'gro 'ong med pas nam mkhar 'dra// nam mkha' lte bu'i sems la ci shar yang // dper na rmi lam dag gi bde sdug rnams// sangs stong ste de sdug rang grol bzhin// rnam par tog dang mi tog tshogs kyang // gnas lugs dran pas stong
393a5(rnying rgyud): rnong pa med// mdor na bzung 'do mtshan ma'i nyams byung can// de ltar snang yang rig sems yin te stong// sems nyid gdod nasum skyes kyi med la/ dus gisu mdus med stong pa cig nod du// ye shes mig gcig dri med shes par byed// gzung na
393a6(rnying rgyud): zhen bral ba'i rig pa yis// spyong 'dzin dri ma bral ba'i dang nyid du// gnyis med ye shes rol bar spyod pa yis// rang sems longs spyod rdzogs sur ldan gyis grub// kun snang byang chub sems kyi chos nyid la// bde chen rgyal po gnyis med rol pa'i dpa'//
393a7(rnying rgyud): stong nyid snying rje'i mang bdag yang dgadon// rnam rtog pa'angathu nga poche// de nyid rtogs na dag jig med pa 'thong// 'di byeng rtogs dag rdzog gang blad kyang // mithongs na song ngabong ba las ming dgas// 'di nyid rtogs na sdig pas gnod pa phyi'o//
393b1(rnying rgyud): dang rtswa yang du mi chag pa dang/ sa ma dag pa 'bral ma byag/ dag dgags pan ma ldan to// btsun ma man pa'i tha~Md dam pag // khyim gam thathun pas la gyu/ bdugs nyam ma 'a'aphag da/ du
393b2(rnying rgyud): 'brel 'bri gang yang mi nus bzhin// 'a'i zas phyo gas pas shes togs canan// dgebs panag dod gang yangam zung // de bas ma tis gas citshigacod de// oM mtha tshogs sam te// mes gang dag la nga rnalas bstanapas thol// skad sems
393b3(rnying rgyud): ba rtogs pa rigs kyi sa/ dang chos nyid don mo blad pa// dag patshad pa mas pa drang ba mas// dgro jig cod rtogs kyi shAm la// gnyis med 'thong dbang phyu ba zhes pa'i// madro dres su slob mas gsol btabapa// thanas nam mapa'i kyis
393b4(rnying rgyud): na cing rgyas pa da 'angs nas mthun na nang po na shegs pang/ bdas ga sathos pa thob // sags pad me dbya pas na sbyo ba 'as// ngags
393b5(rnying rgyud): med zlos bral dkyil 'khor na// rang byol gnyis med chen po'i dbang bsrur Ta// zhes gsol ba lan gsum gang babar bya// de nas blams stong nyid sems cebu// rang grol don la 'dug par sgrolags sam// zhes brjod spobams la nang khro zhes bya// de nas
393b6(rnying rgyud): slob ma sna ma pargya dbog n+d+he// khyong kyis pang sto den ng+ge phreng da bu/ skyongags parang sa chos don ni// rang bzhin drug par pyod pa dam chos shig/ de las log na khyod nyid bad+hag pa 'thar// ces pa dang nasbyin dam pa // denas
393b7(rnying rgyud): 'dri yid kyi la 'khor nga rten ni// stong pa stod 'dzi de gams kyi thang ba// da gro 'dri med migagis dal 'dod/ dkyi' 'khor chen po rnamam pa'i yangs payin// namamakha'agasal yang dngos po med pa pazhed// sems nyid gsal la dngos po med pa'i bas/
394a1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dngos med kyi sa nagasal ba bzhin// sems nyid ma yang car pa'i ban// rnams pa gas mardzogs kyi med pa shin// sems nyid gas ma stong dben med pa'i byed// nam mkha' mtha' bral ba rtang ya rdzu
394a2(rnying rgyud): sems nyid ma bcos glos bral yin pa'i brda'o// de nas bla mas bu khyod su yin dri// nga ni rang byung ye shes yin bya'o// khyod kyi gcer bu'i lus ni ci yin dri// nga yi lus 'di gos med ga cer zur// zhes pa slob mas brjod la bla ma yis// lus po gzer bu gdod
394a3(rnying rgyud): pa// dgas nas 'ang byung// da pasas da du su spongs// de sa shA/ ma / sa rnye pag me gas// na sems pa da

394a5(rnying rgyud): grub par byin gyis rlobs// zhes pas rang grol brda yi dbang bsrung la// slob mas lon dbul rtogs pa'i dga' skyon bya// bdag 'dzin rangs grol phyir b+h+ra ma la// rang gi lus dag yid gsum thams cad dbul// glogasum phul bas su gsum 'bras pa thob//
394a6(rnying rgyud): gang zag 'bring gis brda yis mgo ni// de la man ngag gnad kyis bstan pa ni// stong gsum sngon bzhin byas pa'i gzigs stangs ni// srul sku'i gzigs stangs mig gnyis maral blta// gsal stong gnyis su med pa'i ngangal bzhag/ de nyid don la yun du
394a7(rnying rgyud): bskyangs pa las// steng ba nyams kyi 'phel nyams 'char tshul yang // rang bzhin med pa'i stong pa nyid du grol// stong pa nyid la stong nyid zhen pa med// zhen 'dzin med pa'i stong gsal chen po rtsa// gsal le seng nge le re cir mi dgongs// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma'i bas
394b1(rnying rgyud): chags gang yang meng // 'od gsal bar ni ngas gsum dus med par// gnyug mar dgrol bde ba chen po'i dang // ji ltar byas kyang gsal 'grib med par rtogs// snang stong gnyis 'dzin dngas dgrol ba yas// rang byung rig pa 'ang ba zlog mthong bas/
394b2(rnying rgyud): mabacos lhun grub chos sku de ka yin// de nyid don thog tshad la phebs pa'i rtags// dngos rtags rang bzhin kun gyis mthong snang du// lus kyi dngos 'dzin med cing chud mi 'bying // lus la de ltar med pa'i mtshan rtags dang // ngag gis ma bslabs chos dang gzhan
394b3(rnying rgyud): phan 'ong // yid la zag pa med pa'i mngon shes 'char// khyad par dang nyams lus ngag yid gsum la// gang yang 'dzin pa mi dran brjed nas su// stong gsal 'dzin med dang du ci byung yang // thams cad de kar khro la khro la song nas su// ri brag la sogs zang
394b4(rnying rgyud): thal sdang ba yod// de nyid dang la nyin mtshan bye brag med// rmi lam 'khrul ba gtan nas chad nas 'gro// 'di nyid bskyangs na lo gcig mngon sangs kyi// 'bras bu phyogs su mgol kun grol sems// rang grol tshig chod lhun grub e ma ho// gang zag tha ma gnang
394b5(rnying rgyud): kyis ma grol na// man ngag tshig chod bkrol nas bstan pa ni// sems nyid ye nas rang grol chen po la// stong dang mi stong bsgoms pas gol sar lhung // snang bar bltas na mtshan ma'i phyogs su 'khrul// de la bzung na rtag par lta bar gol// stong par bltas na
394b6(rnying rgyud): shes gsal cha med// de la zhen na chad par lta bar gol// gnyis med bltas na gcig tu ngos 'dzin byung // gcig tu grub na mang po dag kyang 'ong // des na stong dang mi stod yul las 'das// ma bcos rang grol 'di ka chos nyid yin// 'di la phyogs cha'i
394b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa ce yang med// 'dzin med shugs 'byung dang de sbyong ba yin// gal te 'char tshul dgag tu med pa yis// ji ltar shar yang 'dzin med rang grol du// dper na tshul ri mo bris pa bzhin// dran stong skad cig sra phyi grol nas 'gro// gdod nas ngo bo ye

395b6(rnying rgyud): du med de shes bya'i yul las 'das// yengs su med de ngo bo nyid kyis gsal// sdang stong rang grol chos nyid chos kyi sku// sangs rgyas las kyis mi bsgrub sngon gyur pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dus 'dir mthong ba yin// sems// / e ma ho// stong pa rang sar grol
395b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i skyes bu mchog/ gang zag rab la brda yis bstan pa ni// rang grol lhun grub don la ngo sprang pas// chos nyid zang sar stsol ba'i snang ba yis// lhun grub tshig chod rtogs phyir bla ma la// yun grub de nyid dbang bskur zhu zhes pa'i// nyin gung dus su bla ma la
396a1(rnying rgyud): zhus la// bla mas dben pa'i gnas su slob ma khrid// slob ma gcer ba nyid du phyag btsal la// thal ma sbyar te gsol ba 'di skad gdab// em to// sun bzang blam bde ba chen po la// rang gsal chos bu'i dang nas gsong ba 'ad
396a2(rnying rgyud): spun grang bde ba chen po dkyil 'khor du// kun mkhyen rdzogs sangs rgyas par byin gyis rlobs// zhes pas gsol ba la na gsum gdang pa / de nas rnams dang grol chos nyid bu// spyan bu bdon la 'dug pa sgo lags sam// zhes brjod slob mas lan du bre zhes bya// donas
396a3(rnying rgyud): bla mas dam bca' dbog pa ni// khyod kyis grol rgyu'i 'dzin pa zad nas su// zag med sangs rgyas ldan grub bde ba yi// rtog med mkhyen pa'i don la dam chos shig/ de las 'gal na khyod kyi 'tshig par 'gyur// ces pas dam tshig 'gyur med bstan byas la// de nas brda yi
396a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni// khyod kyis 'dod zhen po 'dzin dang grol la// sgrib med ye shes ma bltas ma mthong ba'i// bcos pa med pa'i lun grub dkyil 'khor ltos// blta ru med de gsal ba 'di ka yin// gsal la mi rtog chos spu'i dkyil 'khor la// phyogs ris med de kun khyab

398b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal 'phrig men yin// lus kyi dngos 'dzin dag cha b+habral yin// 'dzin pa ma drug bya rgya yod pa stan// gcig pa dben par sdod la rnal dum pa// 'dzin med lus de lus med rgyas kyi mchog/ glang du mi gnas rang b+ha la ngas med spyod// rdzogs na
398b6(rnying rgyud): don la brjod du med pa yin// ngag gi brjod med dang gsod lhag par smos// ji skad skyes kyang 'dzin thal brjod med yin// ngag la 'dzin pa 'dug na brjod bye yin// me sbya gos don gzhan dang blo mi 'gro/ 'dzin med dag de tshangs pa'i didekyi
398b7(rnying rgyud): phyi yang mi ba'ang rgyalags phyi skye rdzogs tsho pabasla zhing bayim mang kyis rlom mdab tung me drags pa sa payod kyig zung 'drims kyi ma mngaseMn// drisri sa cu mi ni songs spyong dum na
399a1(rnying rgyud): yengs su skom dag pa brtson 'grus kyis// gzung 'dzin med pa'i sems de sems dpa' mtshan/ ci yang me tog cang thal la shes gsal// rdzogs pa chen ba kun grwar bya chu nasras dan
399a2(rnying rgyud): gsum rang grol lhag par skyongs/ gang du 'dzin pa med na rang grol yin// 'dzin med lus ngag sangs rgyas su gsung thugs// 'dzin pa 'dug na ma grol sems can yin// dben par gcig byar lha sgom gtan la ga//
399a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin med na rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// he ru ka dang gnyis med bcom ldan 'das// mngon par sangs rgyas lhun grubazang thal lo// tshig tshong don la gnyis su ma grub kyang // gnyis po gzhan snang thabs la spyod pa ni// mi dge wang zhing dge
399a4(rnying rgyud): shugs kyis spyod// dge sdig 'bras bu 'dod pa'i blo ma grub// dam tshig bsrung sdom spyod pa shugs kyis legs// nyes lung nyams chag skyon dang 'dzin pa med// bla ma'i mos lus 'gro la snying rje 'apyod// bdag sems ma tha ma
399a5(rnying rgyud): log lta med// 'gro kun don du thabs kyis rmon lam gdag// dmigs med shes rab stong nyid pang du bsngos// dper na snyam mkhan gyi sprul pa bzhin/ bden dun med pa'i gzhan spang babs pa spod// khyod kyang thabs kyis med phyir byag /
399a6(rnying rgyud): sngags// thabs shes drag gis mi 'chi dus kyang sman// sngags kyis mthebs drug can bzas ni// che zos chung zos thams cad 'tsho ba bzhin// dngos po gshes kyi gnas lugs martogs na// dge ba'i chos lnga sdang bang 'khor bar
399a7(rnying rgyud): bya na// sems nyid nyag gcig rtsa bra ma dza rten na// thebs shes gnyis med zung 'jug chos su yin// byams dang sbeng rje'i dkyil 'khang yang ba yin// pad+man bu'i gar gyi rnam phrul gyis// thabs kyis mi mnga' shes rab
399b1(rnying rgyud): mamaman du chunas ma dunan sa/ sa mnan na /
399b2(rnying rgyud): chags la ma khyer 'dod phral gzungs mal// dang po 'dod chags bskyed pa rang nyid ni// bde pa'i rang bzhin gzungs ma mdzes la blta/ rngon badra bskyod pas 'dod chags 'brar// rnam pa lce 'dzin na pa thog sa 'bab// de na ma
399b3(rnying rgyud): chags bzung ba thig le rnams// tig gis gsung ba'i gnas su phab la gzung // bshang babasdams la dmigs pa u rgyan gtad// de yis 'dod chags bde ba chen por zin// bde ram gyis bskyod pas tshad med bye// de nas mazin
399b4(rnying rgyud): chags nang du sgom// nyeg ces brjod pas rlung sems spyi bor drang / gsang gnas tig de yar la byi bor sim/ lus dgra bde ba'i thig les gang bar bsam// yan lagazug cing lus tho bamig par bya/ ni mi dang
399b5(rnying rgyud): dag don la bzhag/ 'dod chags bde stong ye shes chen por 'char// thun mong yon tan gas sra gnyer ma med// stobs rgyas tshe yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhe sdang drod kyi lam khyer bstan pa ni// dang po zhe sdang bgyed pa phyil rung

400a7(rnying rgyud): par bsam// de ka ding la gang gdon pa bad/ de'i sang rgyas nadang rtsos nyid 'chang/ na mang pon tan lus kyi pa dag pa/ phrin dog su 'dres ma byer pani/ das ste rjegadag pa gang gdod 'dro// gang ni ma
400b1(rnying rgyud): gnas nas bsam byas pa// yid la khrugs nas rnam pa snying la'ang // de nas lha 'dre 'dzin pa ha ru bsam// rlung sems rtse gcig de la ma yengs gtad// lha 'dre ma bzod ljang myung byed du 'ong // de nas mazin lha 'dre rgyang du ni// ha zhes bzhi
400b2(rnying rgyud): pas rlung sems rgyang ngu 'phang // a 'drenamam pa'i dbyings su lal bar bas na/ deg 'i nga dug dag don la bzhag/ phrag dog su 'dre 'odags la chen por 'char// thun mong yon tan dngos grub thams cad ster// rdzogs che na drug lA mi grang ni
